title: Ki prokram ai jinghikai ka SBI Ribhoi

content: Shillong:Mynhynnin ka sngi haduh san ngut ki MLA kiba la iehnoh kam ki la rung sha ka United Democratic Party (UDP) bad ban long syndon ruh kum ki kyrtong ha kane ka elekshon ka ban long ha u Rymphang. Ha kane ka jingpynbna kyrtong, u bah Process T Sawkmie um shym la lah ban don ryngkat na ka jingkhlad noh ka kiaw kurim jong u. U bah Sawkmie ula long u dkhot ba pura ha ka parti UDP hadien ba ula dep resaiñ noh kum u dkhot jong ka ïingdorbar thawaiñ jong ka jylla.Ha kane ka jingialang ba la pynlong ha Bomfyle Road la wan sakhi ruh da ki paidbah nongkyrshan jong kane ka parti. U bah Mayralborn Syiem, nongthawaiñ ba la iehnoh kam na Nongpoh konstitwensi ha ryngkat 26 ngut ki nongialam ba hakhmat eh jong u lem bad u bah Balajied Ranee, MDC bad ki spah ngut ki nongkyrshan jong u ki la wan ban synran lang ia u.Ha ba ai jingkren ha kane ka sngi, u bah Mayralborn Syiem ula ong ba hadien jong ka jingjia at phyllung ba shyrkhei bha ha ka saiñ hima sima ha ka jylla bun na ki nongkyrshan ki jong u ki la dep ban rung sha ka parti katba hadien ba ula resaiñ kum u MLA, haba shit haba shai ula rung sha ka parti UDP ba ki paidbah kin tip ba u la resaiñ noh kum u.Haba kyntu ia ki paidbah ba kin ai jingkyrshan ia ka parti UDP ha kane ka elekshon ka ban wan, u bah Syiem ula ong ba ka parti UDP ka don ka lyngkor kaba khia ban kit haba ia dei bad ki mat u pud u sam, ka inner line permit (ILP), ka jingpynrung ia ka ktien Khasi ha ka khyrnit ba phra bad ka ioh kam ioh jam jong ki samla ha ka jylla bad ula ban ruh ba ki paidbah kin ai jingkyrshan pura ia ka parti UDP na ka bynta ka lawei ka ban wan.Na Sutnga-Saipung konstitwensi, u ma Shitlang Pale ula ong ba u dap da ka jingsngew kmen ban don noh bad ka parti UDP. Ula iathuh ruh ba kum uwei na kiba la don slem bha ha ka parti Congress, ula iohi ia ka jingiapait ha ka parti ka pynlong ia ka parti ba kan duh noh lut ia baroh ki MLA kiba la jop ha u snem 2018 haduh 21 ngut. Haba kren shuh shuh u ma Pale ula iathuh ba u la don ruh ha ka parti TMC ha kine ki khyndiat por, hynrei ula mih noh na ka TMC dei hadien ba ula dep ban ia syllok bad ki nongkyrshan ki jong u. Kumta ki nongialam ba hakhmat ki la rai ban pyniasoh noh sha ka parti UDP ka long ban peit ia ka bha ka miat.Ha kane ka sngi ia u ma Shitlang Pale la wan synran lang da u ma Arbor Hima Darnei MDC, Marshal Biam, u ma Hopingstone Bare, Rockywell Sutnga kiwei. U bah Lambor ula ong ba u dap da ka jingkmen ban long kum kawei ka ïing bad ka parti UDP. Ula kyrpad ruh ba ki paidbah ki dei ban ailad ia ka parti UDP namar ba baroh katto ki snem ngi la ailad ia ki parti na shabar, hynrei ha ka kynti ba mynta khlem artatien ka parti UDP kan tam ia ka 20 tylli ki konstitwensi bad ka bor synshar kan dei lypa ka jong ki.
title: Rung 5 ngut ki MLA barim sha ka UDP, kin iakhun kum ki kyrtong 2023

content: Shillong: Ka 27 tarik Rymphang 2023 kaba long ka sngi nyngkong kan long ka sngi ba ki paidbah ka jylla Meghalaya kin leit thep vote bad ka jingniew vote pat kan long ha ka 2 tarik Lber 2023. Ha ka 7 tarik Rymphang, ki kyrtong kin hap ban leit thep kyrteng, katba ha ka 8 tarik pat yn bishar bniah ia ki jingthoh jong ki kyrtong bad lada don kino kino kiba kwah ban weng noh ialade na ka jingiakhun elekshon ki lah ban pyndep ia kaba donkam ha ka 10 tarik Rymphang. Kine ki tarik kin treikam ha ka jylla Meghalaya bad ha Nagaland.All npp-udp candidates will surely lose
title: Ha ka 27 tarik Rymphang yn jied ki paidbah ka Meghalaya ia ki nongmihkhmat

content: Shillong:Ka PDF ka la pynkupburom ïa ki arngut ki MLA kiba dangneh haduh myn ta bad ka party kata ïa u MLA bad Myntri sorkar na Mawkynrew Constituency u Bah Banteidor Lyngdoh bad ïa u MLA ka Sohra Constituency u Bah Gavin Mylliem kum ka dak ka burom lyngba ki Ryndia bad ki momentos.Na ka liang ka PDF lyngba ka jing ïalang paidbah kaba la pynlong hapoh ka Khasi National Dorbar Hall Mawkhar.Ha kane ka jingïalang ba la pynïaid da u Vice President Bah Ban Basaïawmoit la pynbna ïa ki kyrtong ki ban ïa aireng ïa ka ilekshon MLA.Napoh 3 Raliang SC Constituency u Bah Shemhok Garod, na 8 Mawhati Roswel Shadap, na 11 Umsning Donlang Sohkhlet, na 16 East Shillong Romeo Phira Rani, na 22 Nongkrem Egenstar Kurkalang, 24 Mawphlang Auspicious Lyngdoh, 28 Sohra Bah Gavin Mylliem, na ka 29 Mawkynrew Bah Banteidor Lyngdoh.Na ka liang ki kyrtong ki la kren ki long U Bah Shemhok Garod uba na ka Shnong Nangbah uba la ïathuh ba u la longteng u MDC barim naduh u snem 1999 kumba 3 term uba la ïakhun na ka seng UDP. U la ïathuh ba hapoh ka constituency ki la don lypa kita ki high level ne kiba riewspah bad kine ki bat ïa ki kam khaïi, kam Sorkar bad kiwei ki kam baheh, hynrei ki Low level ne kiba duk kim ïoh eiei bad mynta kine ki Low level ki la rai ban ïakhun na kane ka jingshah khñiot.La kren ruh u Bah Roswell Shadap na Mawpat, Mawhati uba dei u nongïalam ki nongrep ha kane ka constituency.La ïoh jingkren na U Bah Phira Rani uba dei uba la ïeng ilekshon kumba 12 sien bad u la ïathuh ba ha Laitumkhrah ki don bun kiba duk, nangta u Bah Egenstar Kurkalang na Nongkrem u ong ba ka PDF kan weng ïa ka High, kan weng ïa ka low bad ban buh tang ka level ne ka ïa ryngkatlang. Kiba shna ïa ka high bad ka low level dei ka NPP bad UDP. Ka NPP ka pyndonkam bakla ïa ka pisa Sorkar baroh ki tnat sorkar ki tyrkhong pisa naba uba bat ïa ka pla tyngka um ai hynrei ki pynkhreh mynta ban pynlut sha Tripura, Nagaland ban pynlut ka ilekshon.La kren ruh u Bah Donlang Sohkhlet na Umsning, u Bah Auspicious Lyngdoh Mawphlang Secretary PDF na Mawphlang constituency.Na ka liang u President, Working President, Vice President bad General Secretary ki la kitbok ïa baroh ki kyrtong ba kin ïoh ïa ka jingjop.
title: Sei ka PDF, ïa 8 ngut ki kyrtong ban aireng ha ka MLA ilekshon

content: Shillong:Ki Pulit jong ka East Jaiñtia Hills District ki la ïoh ban kurup 650 kilo u jingsiat Dynamite na shnong Jalaphet bad ki pulit kila ïoh ruh ban kem saw ngut ki briew, kiba la shah kem ki long u Point Chyrmang 30 snem, u Nikalai Chyrmang 21 snem, u Mij Chyrmang 22 snem bad u Shanbor Chyrmang 22 snem.Ki pulit jong ka East Jaiñtia Hills District hadien ba la ïoh jingtip ba ki don ki briew saw ngut eiei bad ka don ka jingsuba ia ka rukom ïaid jong ki hajan khlaw jong ka shnong Jalaphet ha East Jaiñtia Hills District ki rah ïa ki jingsong synduk kot bad ki.Na ka liang jong ki pulit hadien ba kila ïoh jingtip ïa kane kila phah ïa ki pulit ban khynra ïa katei ka khlaw hapoh jingïalam jong u additional Superintendent ki pulit u Bah B Jyrwa bad arngut ki pulit Sub Inspector u Bah K Pdahkasiej ba dei peit ïa ka Umpleng bad u B Marbaniang ba dei peit ïa ka Saipung PS.Ha kane ka jingkhynra ïa katei ka khlaw la shem ba ki don saw ngut ki briew kiba la thiah hapoh sem masi, ki pulit kila leit ban kyrsiew ïa ki bad ha kane ka sem masi ki don ki synduk kot bad haba la plie ïa ki la shem ba ki don ki Dynamite bad haba la peit bniah la lap ba ki don 26 synduk ba don ki Dynamite bad 4 synduk ki tikli.Na ki 26 tylli ki synduk la lap ba u Dynamite ki don haduh 650 kilo bad na ki saw tylli ki synduk la shem ba ki don 200 ki Tikli ban pynbthei, na kine ki briew la ïoh ban kurup saw tylli ki mobile. Ïa ka ejahar la register hapoh Saipung Police Station bad la pynngat ïa ki ha ki kyndon aiñ bapher bapher.
title: 650 kilo u dynamite kurup ki pulit EJHD, kem saw ngut

content: Shillong:Ka KSU West Jaiñtia hills district hapoh ka jingïalam jong u President samla Laitphar Syngkrem bad u Gen secretary samla Leningrad Tariang ki lah ïakynduh ïa u Deputy commis sioner ka West Jaiñtia Hills mynhynnin ka sngi.Kane ka jing leit kynduh ka long hadien ba ka Seng ka lah lap ba ka sorkar Assam kam kheiñ snep eiei ïa ki jingïakren bad ka sorkar Megha laya hadien ka jingjia ba sngewsih ha Mukroh 22/11/2022.Hynrei ka sorkar Assam ka lah pynsted pynban ban tei ïa ka office jong ka tnat forest jong ka kaba ka shna beaiñ ha Mukroh da kaba tei ïa ki kynroh pynheh ïa ki office bad shna ïa ka surok sha Samatan.Kaei kaba la pynbitar ka long ba ka sorkar Assam ka lah pynjulor ka ki lynti leit lyngkha ki paidbah da kaba tih da ki thliew bad buh da ki diengbah hapdeng lynti, halor kane u DC u lah ong ba ulah tip ïa kane bad u la kular ban shimkhia ban ïa kynduh bad ka DC jong ka Karbi Anglong kumjuh ruh bad u DIG jong ka Karbi Anglong ha ka 27 Tarik mynta u bnai.Ha katei ka jingïakynduh un ïakren ïa kiei kiei kiba jia ha kine ki sngi kiba lah dep bad ruh ban khanglad ïa ka Assam ban nym wan pyndik ne tuklar shuh shapoh ka jylla, ka seng kan ap ïa kane ka tarik ba kilah buh ban ïakren hapdeng ka Assam bad Meghalaya.Na ka liang jong ka KSU ka la pynpaw ba lada ka jingïakren kam seisoh lada ka sorkar Assam kan ïaibteng ban pyndik ïa ki paid nongshong shnong jong ka bri Hyñiewtrep kiba shong basah sha ki thaiñ khappud blok 1 ka Seng kam banse ban shim da kiwei pat ki lad ki lynti bad ka sorkar ka dei ban shim ïa ka jingbah khlieh, kane ka dei ka kyrwoh na u General secretary ka KSU West Jaiñtia Hills District.
title: Ym kheiñ snep ka Assam, ka leit tei pynheh ophis ha Mukroh, ong ka KSU

content: Shillong:U Gourav Gogoi MP ka Congress na ka jylla Assam ba dei u nongpeit pyrman ha ka jingjied ïa ki kyrtong ka party ban pynïakhun ha kane ka MLA elekshon sha ka Ïing Dorbar Thawaiñ ka jylla ban long ha u bnai ban wan mynta ka sngi u la wan ban ïa kynduh ïa ki kyrtong ka party ha Congress Bhavan Shillong.Haba kren ha ki lad pathai khubor la ong ba u la ïa kynduh ïa ki kyrtong kiba pan tiket marwei marwei ban ïakren bad ki ban tip ïa ka jingtrei kam ka jong ki, ïa ka jingpule ka jong ki bad ka jingdon jong ki ha ka party, na ka jingïakynduh la sngewthuh shai ïa kaei kaba ki paidbah ka jylla ki kwah.U Nongïalam ka party Congress u ong ba ki don ka jingkyrmen kaba khraw ba kin sa leh bha ha kane elekshon bad kum ka party ka sngewkmen ba ha kane ka kynti kaba mynta baroh ki kyrtong ki dei kiba ka party ka kyrmen ba kin poi sha ka thong, ïa ka kyrteng yn sa pynbna noh shen ha kine ki sngi.Haba la kylli haba ïadei bad kane ka jingïakren pynbeit pud hapdeng ki ar tylli ki jylla la ong ba kaei kaba leh hapdeng ka sorkar Assam bad Meghalaya ka dei kaba yn nym lah ban pdiang ba tang ki arngut Myntri Rangbah ka jylla kin ïashim ïa ka rai.U Gogoi u la ong ba ka jingleh donbor kaei kaba la jia hapdeng ka jylla Assam bad Mizoram bad kaei kaba la jia hapdeng ka Assam bad Meghalaya kala wanrah ïa ka jingbym ïahun hapdeng ki paidbah nongshong shnong.U President ka MPCC u Bah Vincent H Pala la ong ba u la kren hapoh Parliament ban dawa ba ka sorkar Pdeng ka dei ban thung ïa ka “Boundary Commission” ym tang kata la phah ruh da ka shithi sha u Myntri Rangbah duh ka Ri India naba ban pynbeit pud kam dei ka kam kaba suk.
title: Ym lah ban pdiang ïa pynbeit pud tang hapdeng ki 2 ngut ki MR, ong u heh Congress

content: Nongpoh:U Heprit Wanlambok Rani na Shnong Umden Arka ha Ri Bhoi lem bad u Heprit Forme Khongji na Umkrem (Dawki) na East Khasi Hills District, ki la mih mynta ka sngi na ka jylla, na ka bynta ban leit pdiang ia kata ka khusnam riewshlur bad kaba la tip kum ka (National Bravery Award).Ia kitei ki arngut ki heprit na ka jylla, kin sa ioh ban pdiang ia katei ka Khusnam riewshlur na kti u Narendra Modi, Myntri rangbah duh jong ka ri, ha kaba kitei ki arngut kin sa iohpdiang ia katei ka khusnam ha ka 24 tarik mynta u bnai ha Nongbah Delhi.Ia katei ka khusnam riewshlur bad kaba la tip kum ka ‘National Bravery Award’ ka dei ka khusnam kaba la ai lyngba ka Indian Council for Child Welfare, ia kaba la pynlong manla u snem, na ka bynta ban ai khusnam sha kito ki heprit kiba dang hapoh ka 18 snem bad kiba la lah ban leh ia ki kam shlur.Lah ruh ban kdew hangne, ba kitei ki arngut ki heprit kiba yn sa iohpdiang ia katei ka khusnam, ka dei hadien ba ki la lah ban leh ia ki kam shlur jong ki bad kiba la lah ban pynllait im ia kiwei pat kiba la jan ngam jyllop, ha kaba kawei ka jingjia ka dei ha wah Umiam bad kawei pat ha ka Kshaid Umkrem.
title: Yn pdiang khusnam riewshlur ki 2 ngut ki heprit Khasi na u MRD ka ri

content: Kyiv: Ki dak ki shin, ki kdew, kumba ka Mariupol, kan hap noh ha ka kti jong ki shipai Russia bad katei ka dei hadien ba ki 1,000 ngut ki shipai Ukraine, ki la pyndem noh ialade ha ki shipai jong ka Russia, hynnin ka sngi balang.La pyni ha ka telebishon jong ka Russia, ba kitei ki shipai Ukraine, ki mih na ka krem, kaba ki rieh tngen ialade bad ki da rah ia la ki kti shajrong, kum ka dak ba ki la pyndem ialade, ha katei ka thma, kaba la sdang naduh ka 24tarik Rymphang 2022.Kitei ki shipai, ki rieh tngen ialade ha kawei ka krem, kaba trei karkhana nar. Na ka liang ka Russia, ka kam, ba kitei ki dei ki 1,026 ngut ki shipai jong ka Ukraine, kiba la pyndem ialade ha  Ilyich, ha kaba na kitei ki kynthup ruh ia 162ngut ki ophisar jongki; hynrei ia katei ka khubor jong ka Russia, ka Kyiv, ka kyntait.U Mayor ka Mariupol, u kam ba ki don 21hajar ngut ki riew paidbah, kiba la shah pyniap ha katei ka thma ha katei ka nongbah. Ha katei ka nongbah, ki don sa tang ki shynrang suda, kiba ieng skhem ban ialeh bad kitei ki iakhun pyrshah ia ki shipai jong ka Russia, kum ka jingiada ia ki shilak ngut ki riew paidbah, kiba don ha katei ka nongbah, kaba dei ruh ka kad khaii jong ka Ukraine.
title: Kam ka Russia, ba pyndem ki shi hajar ngut ki shipai ka Ukraine ha Mariupol

content: Shillong:Ka jingialeh ha Shillong hynnin ka sngi jong ka second leg MSL, ka Khliehmawlieh ka bym shym la kamai ei ei ha ka first leg da 1-0, ha ka second leg ka la lah ban kamai 3-1 pyrshah ia ka Mawlai SC ba lah ialeh ha SSA Stadium. Ka Rang dajied pat kaba lah buddien da 3-0 ia ka Shillong Lajong FC ha ka first leg, hynnin ka sngi ka la ioh jop da 3-0 kaba la pynlong ia ka Rangdajied bad ka Lajong ban iadraw ha ka jingiaioh poin da 3-3. Kumta ban pynkut ia ka jingiakhun hapdeng jong ki, la pynialeh noh da ka penalty ha kaba ka Rang dajied ka la jop da 4-3.Ka jingiakhun hynnin ka sngi ka la long shisha kaba pynlyngngoh bad kaba pynitynnad shikatdei ia kiba bun ia kaba kane ka MSL ka la pynmih mynta u snem. Ka Khliehmawlieh bad ka Rangdajied kin ioh ban shongthait katto katne sngi ha shuwa ba kin iakynduh ha ka jingiakhun ia ka final ha SSA Stadium ha kane ka sngi saitjain ba mynta.Ha Shillong, ka Mawlai ka la ioh ban lam khmat ia ka jinglehkai hadien ba u Donlad Dieng doh u la ioh ban pynrung ia ka bol shapoh ka jar da kaba pyntyngkhuh khlieh pyrshah ia u nongap ka Khliehmawlieh u Handbill Savio Syiemlieh da ka jingioh bol na u Nikelson Bina.Da ka jingioh ban thep ia katei ka kol, ka Mawlai ka la ioh ban lam khmat ia ka Khliehmaw lieh da 2-0. Ha kaba sdang jong ka jinglehkai watla, ki la don katto katne ki jingpyr shang jong ka Khlieh mawlieh kiba ikob ban pynkylla ia ka jing lehkai hynrei da ka jingap bha u kol ka Mawlai u Neitho vilie Chalieu bun ki jingpyrshang jong kane ka kynhun ki la shu duh lehnohei.Ha shuwa ban kut ka kylla step la iohi ba ka Mawlai ka la iada duriap ialade na ka jingwan tur ka liang pyrshah bad da kum ne ka Mawlai kam shym la lah shuh ban phikir ia ka jingwan suh ka bol jong ka liang pyrshah haba u Maining star Marngar u la ioh ban pyneh daw ia ka Khlieh mawlieh ha ka minit kaba khatduh jong ka kylla step kata ha ka 45+1 minit.Ka kol kaba ar jong ka Khliehmawlieh ka la long haba u Livingstone Nongrang u la ioh ban rah ia ka bol na ka phang ka mon bad ha ka jingpyrshang jong u ban pas ia ka bol, ka la suh beit beit shapoh ka jar kaba la long shisha ka kol ka bym shym la poi pyrkhat.Haba ka por ka la jan kut, la iohi ba katba ka Mawlai ka la ialeh ban rah ia ka bol shaneng, hynrei da ka jingbym khmih bha ia u nongialeh ka liang pyrshah uba la wan swait na ka phang ka mon bad da ka jingioh kyrshan sa uwei u nongialeh na ka phang ka diang, ki nongialeh ka Khliehmaw lieh ki la ioh ban ia tawiar ia u nongialeh ka Mawlai bad da kumne u Nongrang da ka buit sianti jong u u la lah ban khring sha khmat ia u nongap ka Mawlai u Chalieu bad tang kumne u Kyntiew Myrthong u la ioh ban pynrung ia ka kol kaba lai jong ka Khlieh mawlieh ha ka minit kaba 90.Haba phai sha Mawkyrwat, ka jingjop jong ka Rangdajied ka la pynpeitmat ia ka Shillong Lajong hadien ka jingioh kiew kyrdan jong ka ha ka I-league. Ha kaba kut jong katei ka jingialeh la iohi ba baroh lai tylli ki kol ki dei kiba lah thep da ki nongialeh kiba rim jong ka SLFC kata u Tremiki Lamurong ha ka minit kaba 32 bad 73 bad ia ka kol kaba lai lah ioh ban thep da uba la mih pli u Batskhem Thangkhiew ha ka minit kaba 56.Da ka jngiadraw hadien ba la khein ia ka jingioh poin hapdeng kine ki ar kynhun, la hap ban pynkut ia ka jinglehkai da kaba buh noh da ka penalty, bad kum ban shu kynmaw ba ka Lajong ka la pynliem ia ka Rang dajied ha ka samoi ialeh jong ka MSL u snem 2019 da ka penalty, hynrei ha kane ka kynti ka Rang dajied ka la lah ban pyntam ia ka jingioh poin ha kane pat ka jingialeh da 4-3.
title: Yn sa iakhun final ka Khliehmawlieh bad ka Rangdajied, ha ka MSL 2023

content: Nongpoh: Ha ki kynta ba ther kynsan u lapbah ha Nongpoh, wei u rangbah ba la 40 snem rta eiei, u la khlad noh hadien ba u la shah rong noh ha ka umsaw hadien ka jingjur slap kaba la jia hynnin ka janmiet ha Nongpoh.Haba ïadei bad katei ka jingjia ba khlad utei u rangbah, la ong ba katei ka jingjia ka la jia ha ka por 10 baje eiei mynmie, ha kaba la ong ba utei u rangbah u la hap ha katei ka wah ba ka umsaw ka la rong noh ïa u haduh ba u la duh noh ïa la ka jingim.La ong ruh ba une u rangbah u la don ha ka rta kaba 40 snem bad u dei u nongshong shnong ka shnong Umlyngkdait ha ka thaiñ Nongpoh.Shuh shuh, la ïathuh ruh ba utei u rangbah katba u dang rieh slap ha kawei ka dukan kaba don mar jan bad katei ka wah, u la btuid ki kjat katba u dang ïaleh ban rieh slap bad u la hap ha katei ka wah bad namar jingjur jong u slap ka la pynlong ïa katei ka wah rit ba kan khlaiñ bad rong ïa utei u rangbah haduh ba ym lap shuh.La ong ruh dei hadien katto katne kynta ba la ïa wad da ki briew shnong ha kapor 12 baje shiteng synñia la lap noh ïa ka met jong utei u rangbah ha kaba la rah noh sha Civil Hospital Nongpoh ban pyndep ïa ka Postmortem Examination.
title: Ha ki kynta ba ther u lapbah, khlad u rangbah ba shah rong ha ka Umsaw

content: Shillong: Ka Prachi Ghosh, kaba 17 snem ka rta, kaba sah ha Upper Mawprem, ka la jah naduh ka 2tarik Jylliew 2023, na St Margareth School, Laitumkhrah.Ki pulit, ki la iai buddien ia katei ka thei samla bad mar ia ioh ksai, la aiti ia ka jingtohkit, ha U Sub Inspector, Md Kayum, uba la leit sha West Bengal, ban wad ia katei ka samla bad ha ka jingleit wad, ki la lap ia ka, na ka nongbah Malda, ha West Bengal, ha ka 12tarik Jylliew 2023.
title: Lap na Malda, ia ka samla kaba jah na skul St Margareth

content: Shillong:U Vice President ka UDP, u bah Process T. Sawkmie u la ong ba dalade shimet u kloi ban iakhun ia ka elekshon MP na Shillong Parliamentary konstitwensi, hynrei ka shong ha ka rai jong ka party iano kan jied.Na ka liang u bah P.T Sawkmie u la ong ba u la long u MLA 4 term, kum u MDC shi term bad kum u myntri 3 term mynta la 30 snem eiei bad kum uwei u rangbah uba la rim bha ba ki kam shakri paidbah, u sngew ba ka la dei ka por ia u ban mih iakhun noh ha ka election MP, bad ia kane un ieh ha ka jingstad jong ki nongialam ba hakhmat jong ka party.“Nga la jop MLA bad MDC bad nga la shakri ia ki paidbah ka Mawlai bad ka jylla, bad ha kaba iadei bad ka elekshon MP, nga kwah ban kner ia ka jingiarap ia ka jylla baroh kawei”, la ong u bah Process.Haba tyrwa ialade ban long kum u kyrtong elekshon MP kaban sa wan, u bah Process u la ong, “Kum u kyrtong, nga tyrwa ialade ia ka party ba kan phai sha nga ban ai tiket ban iakhun ia ka MP elekshon, hynrei ka shong ha ka party. Lada ka party ka ai tiket nga long uba khreh ban iakhun hynrei lada jia ba ka party kam ai, nga kloi ban kyrshan ia u kyrtong ba ka party ka pyniakhun”.U la ong ba kum u nongialam paidbah u don ka jingshemphang ha ka kam sain pyrthei bad nalor ba u long MLA, MDC, u la long ruh iadon bynta ha ka seng samla, kum u president ka KSU Mawlai.
title: Kloi U bah Process, ban iakhun MP, lada ioh tiket, na ka UDP

content: Shillong:Ka heprit Mansa Najiar, kaba dangdon mynta 12 snem karta, ka la ioh pdiang ia ka khusnam Young Author Award 2023 bad kaba long ruh kawei na ki heprit ba khynnah tam bad ka ioh ban ithuh kum ka nongthoh kot.Hadien ba kane ka heprit ka la ioh pdiang ia kane ka khusnam kaba heh, na ka liang ka UDP Youth Wing ka la ioh ban Pynkupburom ia kane ka heprit ha ka ophis treikam jong ka UDP, ha ka jingiadon lang u hah Titosterwel Chyne u ba dei u working President, u bah PT Sawkmie MLA barim ka Mawlai, ki nongkitkam ka UDP central body ha ryngkat ruh ka jingiadonlang kiba ha iing hasem jong kane ka heprit.U bah Titosterwel Chyne haba ai jingkren ha kane ka sngi u la ong ba ka UDP, hi ka ai mynsiem ia ine i heprit ha ka sap ka phong ba idon bad ka long ka burom ym tang ia ka state jylla, hynrei ia ka jaitbynriew hi baroh kawei.“Ka jingsngewsarong jong ngi ka long ba i khun jong phi i ba dang ha ka karta ba dang khynnah i la lah ban thoh ia kane ka kot kaba la ithuh da ka organization kaba long ka World organization bad ha kajuh kapor ruh ba ine i heprit i thoh ia kane ka kot tang 3 sngi” la ong u bah Titos.U la ong “Bunsien hi haba ngi thoh kot ngi ju thoh bad pynshitom da ki bnai bad ki snem ruh, hynrei ine i heprit I thoh kot tang 3 sngi lah pyndep. Kane ka long ka jingai mynsiem ia kiwei pat ki samla pule jong ngi kiba don ha ka jylla ki ba don ha ki skul bapher bapher ba ka jingthoh kot kadei kawei kaba pyni ia ka jingproh bad ka jingiohi jngai”.U bah Titos u la ong “Bun na ngi baroh haba ngi la pass ia ki degree, ki Master ngi nang tang ban pule, hynrei ban thoh ngi kham jaituh, kumta ka iing ka sem jong ine i heprit i donbok ba la mih kawei kaba long ka nongthoh kot ha ka karta ba dang 12 snem bad nga ngeit ba ka ri jong ngi kan nangsei ia ki nongthoh kot kiba ym dei ban paw tang ha ka jylla, hynrei ha ka pyrthei hi baroh kawei”.U la ai mynsiem ia ine i heprit ba in nangthoh shuh shuh ia kiwei pat ki kot, namar ka karta ruh ka dang jrong bad u la kyntu ia i Mansa ba in nym thoh tang da ka ktien phareng, hynrei lada i lah shim ban thoh da ka ktien khasi ruh ban pynriewspah ia ka ktien lajong.
title: Ka heprit, kaba 12 snem, ka thoh pyndep ia ka kot, tang 3 sngi

content: Shillong:Ha kaba khatduh u Ayush Kumar u la shah pynduh ha kaba ïadei bad ka bhah pule MBBS namar ka jingïeng pyrshah jong ka seng Jaiñtia Students’ Union (JSU) bad ki nongïalam jong ka shnong Thangskai, East Jaiñtia Hills District.Hynrei na liang ka JSU ka la ïai buddien halor kane ka jingleh shukor jong u Ayush ha kaba ka la dawa mardor na ka sorkar ba ka dei ban pyndam ïa u na state quota ban pule MBBS ha ryngkat ka jingïasnohkti lang ki nongïalam shnong Thangskai.Na ka liang ki nongïalam ka JSU mynta ka Sngi ki la ïathuh ba ki la ïakynduh bad ai ruh da ka jingthoh sha ka Myntri ka tnat ka koit ka khiah ka Kong Ampareen Lyngdoh bad kumjuh sha u Bah Cyril V Diengdoh IAS uba dei peit ïa Home and Political Department ka sorkar jylla ha kaba ïadei bad kane ka phang.Nalor kata ka JSU ka la buh ruh da ka shithi ujor sha u DC ban pynshisha ba u Ayush Kumar um dei hok ban ïoh ïa ka state quota ban pule MBBS namar u dei u bar jylla bad ba u kpa jong u don Aadhaar sha Bihar bad ka EPIC ruh ki don sha Bihar bad u kpa jong u, u dei uba shu sah trei ha Dalmia Cement bad ba um don hok ban ïoh PRC namar um dei u ba shong sah hapoh ka jylla.Kumta ruh na ka liang ka JSU ka pynpaw ka jingsngewnguh ïa shnong Thangskai kaba lah pdiang ïa ka jingbakla da kaba buh da ka shithi ujor pyrshah ïa u Ayush bad ïa u kpa jong u sha u DC ka East Jaiñtia bad kane ka jingdawa ka seng ka long kaba jop.Ha kajuh ka por ka JSU ka phah ruh ïa ka khubor sha baroh ki nongïalam shnong ka Bri u Hynñiewtrep ba kim dei satia ban ai klumar ïa ki syrnot shnong lane NOC ïa ki bar jylla nangne shakhmat namar ka lah ban ktah jur ha kiba bun ki liang bad ka long ruh kum ka jingïuhroit ïa ka hok jong ki trai ri trai muluk.Lah ban kdew ba ka JSU hadien ba la lap ba u Ayush Kumar u la pyndonkam da ka PRC kaba shu ïoh thok na DC East Jaiñtia Hills ha u snem 2021 da ka ba aplai lyngba ka Temporary Residential Certificate na ka shnong Thangskai u lah ïoh ïa ka PRC, bad ha u juh u snem u la aplai da ka state quota MBBS 2023-24 bad ïa kane ruh u lah ïoh.
title: Shah pynduh noh u Ayush, ïa ka bhah pule MBBS, namar ka JSU

content: Shillong:  Ka Rangdajied United FC kala pynliem ia ka Langsning FC da 4- 2 ha ka jingiakhun ka Shillong Premiere League kaba long myn hynnin ka sngi.Ia ka Rangdajied la thep da u O.Langshiang 18′ bad u D.Diengdoh ula thep 3 kol marwei ha ka 37, 75, 80′.Katba ia ka Langsning la thep da u I.O.Khongjee 21′ bad u K.Lhuid 73′.Lashai ka sngi ka jingiakhun kan long hapdeng ka Laban SC pyrshah ia ka Nongrim Hills SC.
title: 4-2 kol pynliem ka Rangdajied ia ka Langsning ha ka SPL

content: Shillong:U President ka UDP, u bah Titosstarwell Chyne u la ong ba ka party kam kyrkieh ban pynmih ia ki kyr teng jong ki kyrtong ban iakhun ha ka elekshon MDC kaban sa long ha u snem u ban sa wan.Ha kaba iadei bad kane u bah Titos, u la ong ba ka party ka la don ki kyrtong kiba biang ban iakhun ha ka election bad kan peit ia kino kiba la trei bha ha kine ki 4 snem ba ladep bad khamtam ia u paidbah uba la iohi ia ka jingtreikam jong ka EC ha KHADC hapoh ka jingialam jong u kum u CEM tad haduh ba kin shah pynkhyllem syndon na ka shuki.“Ngi la pynkhreh ban iakhun ia ka MDC, khamtam ha ki konstitwensi ba la don MLA hynrei ym don MDC”, la ong u bah Titosstarwell.U la ong ba hadien ka jingialang ne ka jingpynkhreh kabar ka long, yn sa ithuh ia ki kyrtong ban iakhun ia ka MDC.“Kam dei ba ngi khohreh ia ka elekshon hynrei kaba kongsan ka long kaei kaba ngi la leh ha kine ki saw snem ba ka UDP ka la ialam ia ka jingsynshar ha KHADC”, la ong u bah Titosstar.U la ong ba kaba kongsan ka long kiei ki ain kiba la thaw ka UDP ha ka por ba synshar ha KHADC.Ha kaba iadei bad ka MP election u la ong ba haduh mynta kam pat don kano kano ka jingiakren bad ki la don katto katne kiba la sdang ban mih shakhmat ban pynpaw kyrteng bad ka party kan sa shim ia ka rai hadien.“Na bynta ka tiket MP, ngim pat iakren ia ki kyrtong wat la ki don kiba pynpaw shimet ba ki kwah ban iakhun ia ka MP elekshon”, la ong u bah Titosstar.
title: Ka parti, kam pat kyrkieh, ban pynmih kyrteng ia ki kyrtong MDC, ong U bah Titos

content: Shillong: Ka Shillong ha ki 24 kynta ba ladep, kam shym don slap eiei satia bad kumjuh ha Sohra ruh, katba ha Umiam, ka jinghap slap ka long kaba bniop bniop.Ka jingshit ha ka nongbah Shillong, ka long 23.5 degree kaba shit eh bad 14.5  degree kaba khriat eh.Ha Sohra kaba shit eh ka long 25. 7 degree, katba kaba khriat eh, ka long 16.4 degree, katba ha Umiam, kaba shit eh, ka long 27.3 degree, katba kaba khriat eh, ka long 18.7 degree.
title: Ha ki 24 kynta ba ladep, ym don slap ha Shillong, Sohra

content: New Delhi: Ki kot ki sla kiba pyni ia ka jingbuh pisa ha ka  fixed deposit kaba long T.8.77 lak ha ryngkat bad ki pisa khutia kiba don baroh 1.5 lak, la lap da ki pulit na ka iing sah jong uwei u nongkhrong, uba la iap ha ka jinshah lymbub kali ha Mumbai.La iathuh ba u pulit, uba leit sha ka iing sah jong utei u nongkhrong, U  Birju Chandra Azad, u hap ban shong hi khui ban niew ia ki bun tylli ki pla, ba la dap ki pisa khutia kiba don haduh T.1.5lak.Utei u khar khrong u shong u sah hi marwei ha Govandi jong ka Southeast Mumbai.Ki pulit ki dang wad ia kiba ha iing ba kin shimti ia katei ka pisa jong U Birju bad ia kiwei de kiba don ha Bank. U Birju, ula iap, katba u dang iaid lynti ha ka lynti rel hapdeng ka Govandi bad ka Mankhurd steshon, ha ka 4tarik Risaw 2019, ong ka khubor pulit.
title: U nongkhrong bad ka pisa jongu, kaba jan don T.10lak

content: Guwahati: Saw ngut ki nongtrei ka NEEPCO, ki la shu iap ei, haba ka um kaba khlain bor jong ka  Kopili hydro electric project kaba don ha  Umrangsu jong ka Dima Hasao District jong ka Assam, ka la bthei mynta ka sngi, ha ka por 6.30 mynstep.La iathuh ba na kitei ki 4ngut, ki kynthup ia arngut ki junior engineer bad nangta sa arngut ki nongsar iing, kiba la duh ei, ia la ka jingim, ha katei ka jingshah rong ha ka um saw mynta ka sngi.Katei ka projek, kaba la pyntrei da ka  North Eastern Electric and Power Corporation (NEEPCO), ka la pynshlei lut ia ka jaka sam bor ding, ong ka khubor.Ki bor pyniaid jong ka NEEPCO, ki la pan jingiarp na ka  National Disaster Response Force (NDRF) bad na ki shipai Assam Rifles, ba kin iarap ban teh lakam ia katei ka jingshlei um kaba triem.Ka jingkhlain jong ka jingkynshait jong ka um, la iathuh ba ka long haduh 14hajar litar ha ka shi sekhon bad ka jingkyan jong ka um, ka kynting jrong sha suin, ha ka por jong ka jingbthei mynta ka step, ong ka khubor. Ka jingjur jong ka jingshlei jong ka um, ka la pynshlei mam ia ki katto katne ki bynta jong ka nongbah Umrangsu.Ka Kupli projek, ka dei kaba don 275 MW ka bor ding bad ka dei kawei na ki projek bor ding ba khlain bha ha Assam. Katei ka projek bor ding, ka sdang trei kam ha u snem 1976.
title: Bthei ka dam um ha Umrangsu, iap 4ngut ki nongtrei ka NEEPCO

content: Shillong: Myntan ha ka por 6.06 janmiet, ka la don ka jingkhie jumai, kaba la pynkhih malu mala ia ki iing ki sem ha Assam, Meghalaya bad ha Manipur ruh kumjuh.Na ka liang ka National Centre for Seismology and the Indian Metrological Department kam pat ai jingtip satia, halor ka jingkhih jur jong utei u jumai.
title: Khih jumai ha Assam, Meghalaya

content: Mumbai: Ka Mumbai Metro Rail Corporation (MMRC), ka pynshai mynta ka sngi, ba ka la dep pom ia  2,141 tynrai ki dieng, ha ki bynta ba shatei jon gka Mumbai, ha  Aarey Colony bad kaba heh 33 hectare bad ka daw ka long na ka bynta ban shna ia ka sem kali bad katei ka jing pyntip, ka dei hadien ka hukum, ba la pynmih da ka Supreme Court, mynta ka sngi, kaba khang ban dang iai bteng ka jing pom dieng ha katei ka jaka.Ha ka jing pyllait khubor, ka  MMRC ka iathuh ba kan nym pom shuh ia ki dieng nangne shakhmat, kat haduh ba ka Supreme Court, kan ai ia ka hukum jongka, hynrei la ong shuh shuh ba ka jingtrei kan iaid shakhmat, ha kito ki jaka, ba la dep pyn ngat ia ki dieng.La iathuh ba ka jingthmu jong ka MMRC, ka long ban pyn ngat ia 2,646 tynrai ki dieng bad ka jing pyn ngat ia kitei ki dieng, ka la sdang naduh ka miet sngi thohdieng bad katei ka dei hadien ba ka Bombay High Court, ka la kyntait ia ka jing dawa ban pynsangeh.Katei ka jing pyn ngat dieng, ka la pynmih ia ka jingiakhih pyrshah, ha kaba ki la don 29ngut ki briew kiba la shah kem, namar ba ki khanglad ban pyngngat ia kitei ki dieng.
title: Khang ka Supreme Court ban pom dieng ha Mumbai, pynshai ka MMRC ba la dep pom ia 2,141 tynrai ki dieng

content: Ka jingbuhteng ban maramot ia ka surok bah na  Kiratpur Sahib sha Una, ka la pynlong ia ka tnat Public Works Department (Central Works) ban dain kuna  T.1.05 lak shi sngi ia ka kompeni Rohan Rajdeep Tollways Limited.Katei ka kompeni, ka trei ia ka surok halor ka jing iateh, kaba la tip kum ka  build, operate and transfer (BOT)  bad ka la buh ia ka jaka lum khajna hajan  Kiratpur Sahib. Katei ka kompeni, ka dei ban shna pynbha ia ka surok ha U Naiwieng jong u snem ba ladep, hynrei namar ba kam shym la leh satia kumta, U  Executive Engineer (XEN) jong ka PWD (Central Works), ula dain kuna ia katei ka kompeni T.1.05 lak shisngi.U Jaswinder Singh jong ka PWD XEN, u iathuh ba ka kompeni, ka dei ban shna pynbha ia ka surok man la ka san snem bad kaba nyngkong, ka dei ha u snem 2012, hynrei ha katei ka por ruh kim shym la shna pynbha satia.  Nangta, ka la dei biang naduh U Naiwieng jong u snem ba ladep, hynrei kim shym la sdang bad hadien ka jing iai pyn kynmaw, kumta ki la sdang maramot ha ka 22tarik Jylliew 2019, hynrei ha katei ka sien, ki la shna tang 500 metre, na kaba dei ba kin shna pynbha haduh 38 Kilometre bad kumta halor katei ka jing pynslem jongki, ka tnat PWD, ka la dain kuna T.1.05lak shisngi, kaba sdang naduh ka 1tarik Jylliew 2019, ong ka khubor jong ka Tribune.
title: Bym shym maramot surok, dain kuna ka PWD, T.1lak shisngi ia ka kompeni

content: Khublei ïaphi ruh u Rupang, nga kyrshan pura ïaphi naduh ba nga dang don 18 snem haduh mynta 27 snem ngam ju mis ban pule Rupang wat tang shi sngi ruh, hynrei kaba sngewsih bad sngew thaid ka long ba lada la pule page 2 mut pule noh sa kawei tang shu back ka wan phai biang haka page 1, lada long sngewbha pyn neh kumba long mynshwa.Khublei shibun.
title: Ka jingkhie step

content: Shillong:  U Director ka phlim Iewduh u bah Pradip Kurbah bad u tyngshop jong ka phlim Iewduh u bah Albert Mawrie ha ka 5 tarik u Risaw 2019, ki la leit mihkhmat ha Busan International Flim Festival 2019 ka ba la pynlong ha ka ri South Korea.U bah Pradip kurbah bad u Albert Mawrie ki la shah khot sngewbha ban leit ban mihkhmat na ka bynta ka phlim jong ki “Iewduh”.U bah Pradip Kurbah u ba dei u director jong ka phlim Iewduh, u la shah jied ia ka kyrteng kum u wei na ki director u ba lah ban ioh ia ka Kim Jiseok Award ha Busan International Flim Festival 2019.Ia ka phlim Iewduh yn sa pyni ha ki 11 tylli ki Jylla ha ka ba nalor ka Jylla Meghalaya,ia ka ne ka phlim yn pyni ruh ha Delhi, Mumbai, Pune, Bangalore, Kolkotta, Assam, ArunachalPradesh, Nagaland, bad ha Manipur.Ia kane ka phlim, yn pyllait paidbah ha ka 15 tarik u Naiwieng 2019.
title: Mihkhmat ka phlim Iewduh sha ka  Busan International Film Festival 2019

content: Jowai:  Ka Star Cement ka la ioh ia ki jingkyrshan na ki seng baher baher na ri lum Jaintia, East Khasi Hills bad kumjuh na ribhooi halor ka jingthmu jong ka ban tih marshun na ka par kaba heh haduh 42 hacter kaba don ha ka shnong Brishyrnot ka thain Lumshnong.Kitei ki Seng kiba la ai ka jingkurshan da ka jingthoh ba la phah sha u Member Secretary ka Meghalaya State Pollution Control Board ki la don haduh 19 tylli kiba kynthup ia ka  Youth and Unemployment Organisation, West Jaintia Hills, Jowai Citizenship Association, Poor People Conference Organisation, Jaintia Hills, Khasi Jaintia Farmers Association, Umphyrnai, East Khasi Hills, The Dorbar Shnong Bamkamar, WJH, Thadlaskein Sub area Marketting Society, Phra Shnong Association (Mukhla, Ummulong, Wahiajer, Moodymmai and others), Muskut Mookyndur FMC.Nalor kine ka North East India Environment Association, Jaintia Hills Branch ha ka shithi sha u Member Secretary ka MSPCB ka la pynpaw ba ka Star Cement ka la wan ha katei ka jaka bad ka la ai ruh ki jingmyntoi ia kiba bun naduh ka ioh kam iohjam ki samla haduh ki kam pynroi ia ki shnong ba don marjan khamtam ia ka shnong Lumshnong. “Halor kane ka nongrim ngi ieng ban ai ka jingkyrshan ia ka Star Cement halor ka jingthmu jong ka ban tih mawshun na katei ka jaka kaba ka la thied na ki paidbah nongshong shnong”, la ong u Secretary ka seng u ma W. Thubru.Ka Land and Forest owner Association, East Jaintia Hills ruh ka la rai ban ai ka jingkyrshan ia ka Star Cement bad ha ka juh ka por ka la kyntu ia ka bor pyniaid jong ka ban thaw ki lad ban pynioh kam kham bun ia ki briew jong ngi khamtam ia ki samla ba la nang la stad bad ruh ban wanrah ia ki kam pynroi khambun.Ka Labour Union West bad East Jaintia Hills ruh ka la ai ka jingkyrshan ia katei ka kharkhana bad ha ka juh ka por ka la ai jingmut ban pynioh kam 60 percent ia ki Khasi Pnar. Bad ka la kyntu pat ia ka sorkar ba kadei ban peit ngor ia ka jingjakhlia ka mariang.Nalor kine ki seng, kane ka karkhana ka la ioh ruh ia ka jingkyrshan ba pura na ki trai trok kiba shalan cement halor ka seng bapher bapher (Transporters Associations) bad ruh na ki Cements dealers Association jong ka East Khasi Hills, Ribhoi bad Jaintia Hills.
title: Ioh jingkyrshan ka Star Cement  halor ka par tih Mawshun

content: Nongpoh:  Uwei u samla uba la tip kyrteng kum u Augustine Shadap (25) snem, u la mynsaw jur hadien ba u la hap sha kawei ka riat kaba jylliew bha, kaba don ha u wei u lum u ba ju tip kum u Lumknia ha Nongpoh.Ka jingtip kaba la iohlum, la iathuh, ba u tei u samla u dei uba shong basah ha ki thain Down-Gate, Nongpoh Proper bad katei ka jingjia ka la jia ha ka 3 ne 4 baje ei ei hynnin ka janmiet.La iathuh ruh, ba halor katei ka jingjia, ki briew na ka Fire Service (Rescue Team) ki la leit mar mar sha katei ka jaka na ka bynta ban iarap ia utei u samla, ha kaba ki la lap ruh, ba u tei u samla u don hapdeng ka jingshoh jong u khawiang, kumta na ka liang ki Pulit ki la pynkit noh marmar sha Nongpoh Civil hospital, hadien kata pat la rah noh sha ki jaka sumar sha Shillong, namar utei u samla u la mynsaw jur na katei ka jingjia.
title: Mynsaw jur u samla ba hap shapoh  ka riat ha u Lumknia ha Nongpoh

content: Shillong:  Ki nongialam ka NPP na ka jylla bad kumjuh U President rangbah u Conrad K Sangma uba long ruh u myntri rangbah jylla, kin hiar sha Shella ha ka taiew ban wan ban ialap elekshon ia u kyrtong ka UDP bah Balajiedkupar Synrem ha kane ka elekshon shiteng samoi na Shella.Katkum ka khubor, nalor u Conrad, u symbud myntri rangbah bah Prestone Tynsong bad kiwei ki nongialam kin hiar sha Shella ban pynthikna ba u kyrtong ka UDP un ioh ia ka jingjop.Ka NPP kam shym la pyniakhun kyrteng na Shella ha kane ka elekshon shiteng samoi bad ka la rai ban kyrshan ia u kyrtong ka UDP kum ka jingburom ia u Dr Donkupar Roy uba la khlad kyndit noh.Ki nongialam ba hakhmat jong ka seng HSPDP ruh kin leit ban ialap elekshon na ka bynta u kyrtong ka UDP.U President ka UDP East Khasi Hills u Bah Titosstarwell Chyne u la iathuh ba u Myntri Rangbah ka jylla u Conrad K Sangma, u Symbud Myntri Rangbah ka jylla u Bah Prestone Tynsong, ki MLA, ki MDC bad ki nongialam bahakhmat ka HSPDP kin leit ban ialap elekshon na ka bynta u Bah Balajiedkupar Synrem ha kine ki sngi ban wan.“Ka jingiakhun ha Shella kala long kaba shai kdar ba u kyrtong ka UDP yn jop suk iaka elekshon katba kiwei kiwei ki kyrtong kiba iakhun ki iaknieh iaka kyrdan ka baar ha katei ka elekshon” ong u Bah Chyne.Ha kawei pat ka liang, ula iathuh ba 40 ngut ki nongialam jong ka seng Congress bad PDF kila leit ban pyniasoh bad ka UDP ban ai jingkyrshan ia u Bah Balajiedkupar Synrem ba yn jop iaka elekshon.U Bah Chyne u la ong, kitei ki 40 ngut ki nongialam kidei na ki Unit bapher bapher jong ki shnong kiba don ha Shella Constituency bad la pdiang ia kine da u kyrtong ka UDP u Bah Balajiedkupar ha kaba la iadonlang ki nongialam bahakhmat jong ka seng UDP.
title: Yn hiar ialap elekshon u Conrad,  ia u kyrtong UDP ha Shella

content: Shillong: Ka Nongrim Hills Sports Club ka la pynliem noh da 2-1 ia ka Nangkiew Irat ha ka jingialehkai Shillong Premier League ka SSSA ha ka sngi Saitjain ha madan JN Stadium Polo.Ia ki kol na ka Nongrim Hills la thep da u B. Swer  ha ka 13 minit ka kylla step bad u N Bina ha ka 54 minit jong ka kylla miet.Ka Nangkiew Irat ka la pynphai shikol lyngba u D.Syih ha ka 18 minit jong ka kylla step.Ka jingialehkai mynta ka sngi (07/10/19) ka Langsning FC pyrshah ia ka Rangdajied United FC ha ka por 3 baje.
title: Pynliem ka Nongrim Hills ia ka Nangkiew Irat ha ka SPL

content: New Delhi: Ka  Reliance Jio ka la pynbna mynta ka sngi, ba kito kiba don ia ki number Jio, kin hap ban siew hynriew pisa shi minit, lada ki iakren ia kiwei pat ki number, kiba kynthup ia ki number  Airtel, Vodafone-Idea, BSNL bad kiwei.La iathuh ba katei ka dei kaba ki khot ka  Interconnect Usage Charge.Ka Jio, ka ai ruh ia ki plan, ha kaba ki nong pyndonkam Jio, ki lah ban shim.Rs 10 plan will offer 124 minutes of IUC minutes to non-Jio numbers and 1GB data.Rs 20 plan will offer 249 minutes of IUC minutes to non-Jio numbers and 2GB data.Rs 50 plan will offer 656 minutes of IUC minutes to non-Jio numbers and 5GB data.Rs 100 plan will offer 1,362 minutes of IUC minutes to non-Jio numbers and 10GB data.
title: Lada phone na ka Jio, sha kiwei ki number, phin hap siew 6 pisa shi minit

content: Shillong: Ka Legal Rights Observatory (LRO),  ka dawa ia ki bor pyniaid jong ka East Khasi Hills District, ia U Chief Secretary, ban weng noh ia ki jingthoh Baibl na Mawphlang CHC, kaba don ha East Khasi Hills District.Ka khubor, kaba la pynmih da ka North East Now, ka iathuh ba katei ka dei ka seng, kaba la ialam da U Vinay Joshi, u nongtrei barim ka RSS, ka la dawa ha ki khyndiat sngi ba ladep, ia shibun ki mat kiba long pyrshah ia ki Khristan ha ka Jylla.“Ha ka jylla kum ka Meghalaya, ha kaba ki don 25 percent, ki bym dei satia ki Khristan, kumta ka jing leh khristan palat, ka buh jingma shibun eh” ong ka email, ba la phah sha ki heh sorkar Jylla.La pyni ia ka jingthoh kaba la shim na ka lynnong U Jeremaiah, 33, ha kaba la thoh “To khot ia nga, te ngan phai ktien ia me bad ngan pyni ruh ha me ia kiei kiei kiba khraw bad kiba eh, ia kiba mem tip”.La dawa namarkata, ba dei ban weng noh mardor ia katei ka jingthoh na katei ka hospital Sorkar.Shu ai jingmut ia ki LRO ba ka jingphah weng Jong ki kam don jingmut , namar ka khlem dei ka kyntien ba sniew , ban shu bishni ia kiwei kam ju bha khamtam haka Ri ba AI laitluid ban mane ha la ka jingngeit. Kan bha shibun lada ma ki ruh kin shu ai lang ia ki qoutes na ka Bhaquat Gita , ne ngin buh Ruh ki qoutes na ka Quran, bad kiwei kiwei kane Kan pyni ia ka jingieid bad ka jingsuk.Lada Kum ba kwah ma ki pat ka long kum ba kwah ia ka jingsniew  ban sdang.Ka jingphah weng pat ka JSU ia u Ganesh ka don jingmut mo lada pyndonkam da ka logic jong me?Balei ba kyrshan ia ka jingweng ia ki idol jong kiwei ki niam bad iam pat lada phah weng ia ka kotbah na ki jaka sorkar?Ka niam jong lade ka don hajrong jong ka secularism mo?Ka India ka dei ka ri secular, ym don jaka ia ki kotbah, ki idols ha jaka sorkar.India as such ka dei ri secular. Ka sorkar India kam Don niam. Na kata ka daw ki jaka sorkar baroh Kim dei ban buh I eiei ba dei Jong ka no ka no ka niam. Nga kyrshan ia kane.Kat kum ka riti synshar jng ka Ri India jongnggiii…..Kam Don Kano Kano ka jongkdew bn Weng Noh iaki jingthoh sa tang Lada ki dei ki ‘tiensniew te hooid’ kn…Nga te Ng Chu Ong bt nmar ngi dei ki Chakri haei???? Ngin hap kohnguh btUnlike America, we still haven’t understand the true meaning of secularism.. ‘In God We Trust..’India is a secular state…donhok ban mane blei..tangba kamdei pat  ban ktah ia ka imlang sahlangKum ba nga kyrshan ia ka demand ban weng ia u idol Ganesh na NIT, ia Kane ruh mga kyrshan. Une u reporter ruh kumno u thoh ba ka dei “ka jingpyrshah ia ki kristan”? Lada kata ka logic, ka demand ban weng ia u Ganesh kam dei ka jingpyrshah ia ki Hindu mo?Ka India ka dei ka ri secular, kam dei ban don ki jingthoh niam, kot niam lane ki idols ha ki jaka sorkar.Ngam smgewthuh ba balei kine ki ” Kristan” ki pyrshah ia u Ganesh ha NIT bad ia ïam pat lada phah weng ia ki jingthoh/kot bah jong ki na jaka sorkar? Jingarsap mo?Kita ki JSU bad ki RSS ki khlain bat ktien palat Kum ki” secularism  state / people ba shisha, tang na ka daw u Ganesh na NIT ba la weng Noh !Ha peit Sha bar ka jylla meghalaya ha duh katno ka Jing shah thombor ki Kristan ha ki ( RSS,VHP, Bajranddal,ia ki skul ,ki hospital,ki iingmane,ki dur mot jisu,la pyn jot pyn pra Bad la pynbor BN leh da ki cultures ne ki costom Hindu .Hato ki ta ki JSU,RSS ki dang sngew dei hi mo BN Ong ba ka meghalaya Lane ka India ka dei ka secularism country? Ka Jing BN beIN ia ki Kristan ka jur bha namar ba jur bha ha ki jaka ba khlain kum ki ne ki Seng ka ba Ong ” ka Jing sniew ka kyrtoh lyndet Sha lade”#lada ma ki ki leh ki sngew Beit ba ka biang bad ka kit Jing mut# ha ba ki kristan  ki leh kumjuh Kum ba ki ruh ki leh ki sngew ba la lah long palat .Balei  ba ki wan tuklar ia ka kam Jong ngi ki khristan hangne Ha ri meghalaya ki don hok au ban phah weng ia kita ki jing thoh balei Tang ba phah weng ia uta u Ganesh mut wan leh trai jaka mut wan tuklar da u dkhar shi sngi Kidei kiei ban Batai stad kumta da sngew kwah buh plt ruh Leit buh sha shong lade kn Kim lah seh
title: Dawa ban weng ia ki kyntien Baibl na Mawphlang CHC

content: Shillong: Ka kynhun myntri sorkar pdeng ba la pyniaid da u Myntri Rangbah duh ka ri, Narendra Modi mynta ka sngi ka la mynjur ban pynlait ia ka jingsiew kaba dang sah jong ka Dearness Allowance (DA) sha ki nongtrei sorkar pdeng bad ka Dearness Relief (DR) sha ki nongbam penshon naduh ka 01 tarik Naitung, 2019 kaba la pyni ka jingkiew kaba 5% na ka dor kaba mynta kaba long 12% jong ka Basic pay/Pension, ban pyniahap dor bad ka jingkiew ki mar ki mata. Kane ka jingpynkiew kalong katkum ka jingai jingmut ka 7th Central Pay Commission.Ka jingktah ia ka pla pisa na ka liang ka Dearness Allowance bad Dearness Relief kan kot sha ka T. 15909.35 klur shi snem bad T. 10606.20 klur ha u snem mang tyngka 2019-20 (na ka bynta phra bnai naduh Naitung, 2019 sha u Rymphang, 2020).  Kane kan pynmyntoi ia kumba 49.93 lak ki nongtrei sorkar pdeng bad 65.26 lak kiba bam penshon.Kane ka pynpaw ia ka jingkiew ha ka Dearness Allowance ia kaba la buh ba ka la kot sha ka T. 8590.20 klur ha ka shi snem, bad T. 5726.80 klur ha u snem mang tyngka ba mynta jong u 2019-20 (na ka bynta 8 bnai naduh u bnai Naitung 2019 haduh Rymphang 2020).Ka jinglut ha kaba iadei bad ka Dearness Relief sha kiba bam penshon la antad ba kan long T. 7319.15 klur shi snem bad T. 4870 klur ha u snem mang tyngka ba mynta.La siew ia ka Dear Allowance/Dearness Relief sha ki nongtrei sorkar pdeng bad kiba bam penshon ban pyniahap bad ka jingkiew dor. Ia ka Dear Allowance/Dearness Relief la pynthymmai arsien ha ka shi snem naduh 1 tarik Kyllalyngkot bad 1 tarik Naitung.
title: Mynjur ka kynhun myntri 5 percent ka DA/DR jong U Naitung 2019

content: Halor katei ka phang ngi ka shnong Mawbidong kaba peit bad khmih ia kane ka jaka ba itynnad bad kaba khring bha ia ki ban jngohkai(tourism) hajrong Lum Tyngngaw kaba don ha syndah ka Shnong Mawbidong, South West Khasi Hills District.Une u Lum Tyngngaw ulong uba jrong  bad sawdong sawkun ki jingitynnat kiba lah ban khring ne iapmat lyngba ki jingitynnat haduh katta katta.HALOR UNE LUM: Une u Lum iohi ia ka Shnong Mawsynram, ia ki shnong ka Hima Malai Sohmat, iaka wah Um-ngi, WahKynshi, ia kiba bun ki Shnong ka South West Khasi Hills, ki jaka Rep jaka riang kum ki diengkwai, ki Sohmarit, ki dieng Sohñiamtra, ki synsar, slatyrpad, diengsohphnat, kiwei² ki jait jingthung dieng, ki siej bad wat iaki shnong jong ka Ri Bangladesh.HATRAI  UNE U LUM: Ha trai une u Lum don ka shnong Mawbidong, Manad, Lummawbah, Pyndenlyngdoh, Ka wah Um-ngi, ka wah Um-it, ki wah rit babun, ki jaka Rep jaka riang jong kane ka Dongriwar bad ka khana (history) une u Lum naki tymmen hyndai kaba sngewtynnat shisha  ha kaba ka society ka don naduh nyngkong haduh mynta kumba ka long.Kumta ka shnong ka la pynlut daka bor dalade naka bynta ban leit pynkhuid iaki kynbat, ki lynti syngkien bad ban pynbiang malu mala ia kane ka jaka khnang ba ki nongwan jngohkai (tourism) kin lah ban ioh kiew halor une u Lum bad bun bah ki nongwan jngohkai na kine ki thaiñ  bad wat kiba na Sor Shillong ruh ki don kiba la wan jngohkai ia une u Lum wat Lada ki lynti ki dang khohruh khohram bad ka Madan halor une u Lum ruh la taplut ki kynbat  kaba shu khuid tang ban lah ban iaid briew.Ka Shnong ka pynpaw lyngba ka khyrwoh na u Bah Tanlum k.kharai uba dei u Secretary Shnong Mawbidong bad ha kajuh ka por u dei u Secretary jongka shnong Mawbidong nga kyntu iaki department sorkar, ki bor district bad ki bor ba dei peit iaki kam jngohkai (tourism) ba kin ia phai khmat lem ban iarap khnang ba ka Shnong kan nang lah ban pynjanai bad lada ngi lah ban pynjanai ia kane ka jaka jngohkai lehse kan long kawei ka jaka jngohkai ba pawnam ha ka jylla ne wat haka Ri India.Na u Bah Tanlum K.Kharai, Secretary Shnong Mawbidong village.Nangtrei bn nang pynkiew iaka thain lajong……
title: Ka jingbym phai khmat ki Department Sorkar sha ki jaka thaiñ nongkyndong kiba long ki jaka ba itynnad ban shna Tourism

content: Shillong: Ha ki 24 kynta ba ladep, ka jinghap slap ha Umiam, ka poi sha ka 29.4 millimetre, katba ha katei kajuh ka kynta, u slap u hap tang 0.1 ha Shillong, katba ka Sohra pat ka rang ka bneng.Ka jingshit kaba jur eh ha Umiam, ka long 25.4, katba kaba khriat eh ka long 17.2 degree. Ha Shillong, ka jingshit ka long 21.9 la 13.7, katba ha Sohra, ka jingshit jingkhriat ka long 25.2 la 16.3
title: Ther slap jur ha Umiam, tyrkhong sa ka Sohra

content: Shillong:Mynta ka sngi kan don ka jingialeh kai kynjat bol paralok (friendly match) ha pdeng ka team India bad ka team Northeast united  ka ban sdang ha ka 7.30 janmied ha  Sarusajai Stadium ha Guwahati.
title: Yn ialehkai paralok ka team India bad ka North East United

content: Ka Confederation of Meghalaya Social Organisation ka kwah ban pynkynmaw ia ka sorkar Jylla Meghalaya ka pynkynmaw ba  kumno kumno ha une u bnai Risaw ka sorkar ka dei ban wanrah noh ia ILP system ha ka Jylla Meghalaya bad ngi khmih lyngti ba kan leh ia ka ei kaba ka la kular ba kan tynsat bad pynrung ia ki bor jong ka  ILP ha ka Meghalaya residential safety and security Act.Ka CoMSO ka la long kaba la pynkhreh ban ia treilang lang bad ka sorkar ban pynbeit bad pynjanai ia ki Rules kumno ban pyntreikam ia ka ILP ha ka Jylla bad ha kajuh ka por ngi la long ruh kiba la pynkhreh ban pynlong ki jingiakhih ba tyngeh lada ka sorkar ka dang buhteng ia kane ka kam . Ngi la leh la ka bynta ban ai jingmut bad ban ai por ia ka sorkar ba kan leh ia kaba donkam bad mynta ka  kam ka sah sa ha ka sorkar.Ha kine ki khyndiat sngi , na ka liang ka CoMSO ka la ia kynduh ia ki Minister , ki Nongialam jong ki kynhun ba don ha ka sorkar bad kumjuh ruh wat ia ki MLA ki don ha ka opposition. Ngi la pynsngew ha ki ba ka Jylla ka la donkam kyrkieh ia ka ILP khamtam eh hadien ba ka Assam ka la dep ban pynbna ia ka thup kyrteng ha ka NRC bad ha u bnai December kan kut ka por ban ailad ia ki poiwir ban iasaid na bynta ia lade. Kumjuh ruh na ka daw ba Ka sorkar kmie hapoh ka jingialam ka BJP ki la Rai kut ban pyntreikam noh ia ka CAB.U Amit Shah (Union Home minister ) hadien ba u wan na Mizoram u la kren shai ba ia ki lai tylli ki jylla ba don ia ka ILP, yn buh kyndon kyrpang ia ki  ha ka Cab ban lait ka jingrung ki poiwir . Ka mut ka sorkar kmie kan burom tang ia ki jylla kiba dang burom ia lade bad kiba dang kwah ban iada ia lade na ka jingrung ki poiwir ,  Ia kito ki jylla  ba ka shyntur ka pyrshah CAB katba ki kam pat ki iada poiwir mynderri ka BJP imat kan nym map ban Kan pyntreikam beit ia ka CAB ha Kita ki jylla.. U Amit shah u kwah ban phah ka khubor ba lada ki jylla ki kwah ban lait na ka CAB ki jylla kin pyntreikam noh ia ka ILP. Te ka Meghalaya ka dei ban kyndit ban pyntreikam noh mardor ia ka ILP  ban lait na ka CAB bad ka kti ki poiwir ki mynderri.Ka Jylla Manipur ka la dep pass ia ka Manipur people protection Bill 2018, ka Assam nalor ka NRC  Mynta ka dang pynkhreh shait shait ban ia kren lyngba ka High level committee halor ka clause 6 Jong ka Assam Accord kumno ban iada ia ki Trai Ri  bad wat ka trai muluk ka Tripura ki dang pynrhem ka Jingdawa ia ka Twipraland ( ka jylla ki Riewlum ) la ka Jong. Kine ki jylla ki la pynpaw Shai ba ki dang kwah ban iada ia ki Riewlum . Katba sah  ka long ba sa ka Meghalaya Kan pynpaw ki Kam Jong ka ba Ka dang kwah ban iohi ba ia ka jylla yn dang longtrai bad dang synshar da ki Trai Ri lajong .Kam  don jing iapher ban shah synshar ha ki Barri na Bangladesh Lane ha ki heh paid poiwir bar jylla . Ngin long hi ki mraw ha la ka Ri Lada ngi la shah tyllep noh ha ki poiwir .Te Lada ka sorkar ka pyrshah ia CAB ka dei ban pyntreikam noh ia ka ILP namar ka jingpyrshah ia ka CAB bad ka jingpyntreikam ia ka ILP ka mih na ka juh ka sain pyrkhat bad kata ka long ban iada ia ki Trai Ri ha la ka RI.Khublei shibunSd/Robertjune KharjahrinChairmanCOMSO
title: Ka sorkar India, kan burom tang ia ki Jylla, ba don ILP, ong ka CoMSO

content: New Delhi: Ka jingrakhe ia ka  Durga Puja ka la kut bad nangta sa ka  Diwali, ka la jan poi, hynrei ka jing pynmih kali, ka la hiar shi katdei ha kine ki sngi ruh bad la iathuh ba ha U Nailur 2019, kiba bun ki kompeni die kali, ki pynhiar shibun ia ka jing pynmih kali, namar ba ki iohi, ba ka jingdawa kali ha kine ki sngi tamasa kam don satia.Ka kompeni Maruti Suzuki, ka pynmih duna da  17.5 per cent ha U Nailur bad kaba dei ruh ka jing pynmih duna kali, kaba la iai bteng na ka bynta phra bnai kynthih. Ka kompeni, ka pynmih  1,32,199 tylli ki kali ha U Nailur ba ladep, katba ha u juh u bnai jong u snem ba ladep, ki pynmih 1,60,219 tylli.La iathuh ba wat ki kali kiba iaid iew iew bha, kum ki Alto, WagonR, Swift, Baleno bad ki Dzire ki hiar bha ka jing iaid iew jongki.Ka Tata Motors, ka pynmih duna  63 per cent drop ha U Nailur, ha kaba ka pynmih tang  6,976 tylli na kaba ju long 18,855 tylli ha u juh u bnai jong u snem ba ladep.Ka Ashok Leyland, ka pyntip ha ka sngi thohdieng ba ladep, ba kan sangeh trei kam, na ka bynta 15 sngi kynthih ha U Risaw 2019, katba ka Bosch India, kaba dei ka kompeni kaba na Germany, ka la rai ban khang ka jing pynmih kali na ka bynta shiphew sngi ha ka shibnai, kaba sdang naduh U Risaw haduh U Nohprah, ong ka kyrwoh jong ka kompeni ha ka Sngi Saitjain ba ladep.
title: Nang hiar ka jing pynmih kali, ka Maruti, Tata bad kiwei

content: Ka la iaid mynta la shi taiew kynthih, ba ka mih iew ka phlim War jong U Tiger Shroff bad U Hrithik Roshan bad ha kine ki hynniew sngi ba la iaid, katei ka phlim ia shoh ia dat, ka la kamai palat ia ka T.200klur.Katei ka phlim, ka kamai T.50klur ha ka sngi sdang bad ka poi sha ka T.100klur ha ki lai sngi ba la pynmih bad mynta ka la poi sha ka jing kamai ba T.200klur.Hynnin ka sngi, la iathuh ba ka War, ka kamai T.30klur bad lyngba katei ka jing ioh kamai, la khmih lynti ba kan poi sha ka T.217.75 klur antad.Katei ka phlim, ka la pynrem noh ia kiwei de ki phlim, kiba iaid iew bha, jong u snem 2019, kum ka Kabir Singh, Bharat bad ka  Uri:The Surgical kiba kamai T.200klur ha ka hynniew sngi. Ka phlim Kabir Singh jong U Shahid Kapoor, ka kamai T.200klur ha ka 13 sngi bad ka phlim Bharat, jong U Salman Khan, ka kamai T.200klur ha ka 14 sngi bad kumta ka jingsted kamai, ka long mynta ia ka phlim War.
title: Kiew ka jing kamai ka phlim U Tiger, Hrithik sha ka T.200klur

content: Shillong:  Ka pung Polo ka la lynguh pum da ka jingpynngam blei ki riew ngeit Hindu myn hynnin ka sngi kaba dei ka sngi kut ka lehniam Puja.Mynta u snem, ki don 242 tylli ki pandal mane blei kynthup 118 ha Khasi, 14 tylli ha Jaintia hills bad 110 tylli ha Garo Hills.Ha Shillong la pynlong ia ka jingpyn ngam um ia ki blei thaw ha pung ha Polo ba la wan iashim bynta ki riew ngeit Hindu kynthei bad shynrang ba la sawa da ka ksing ka dhah, ka jingshad ka jingkmen.Kumjuh ka la don ruh ka jingpyn ngam um ia ki blei ha Jaintia, ha Garo Hill.Ia ka jinglehniam Puja la pynlong hapoh ka jingpeit ka Central Puja Committee (CPC) .Ki por ba la leit ba ki green warriors ki pynkhuid ia ka wah umkhrah long Kum ba pynkhuid na ka bynta ban Bret blei ki niam Hindu. la dei ban shna kyrpang ia ka jaka Bret blei Jong ki ym dei ban shah shuh ban Bret ha ki wah.
title: Lynguh pum ka pung Polo, ba  pynngam blei thaw ki riew ngeit Hindu

content: Shillong:   Ka lympung ialap elekshon na ka bynta ka elekshon shiteng samoi ha Shella konstitwensi kan thnem hadien ba la kut ka Puja mynta ka sngi.La ioh jingtip ba ki nongialam jong ki party bapher bapher naduh ki nongialam ka BJP, UDP, NPP bad Congress kin hiar sha Shella ban ialap ia ki kyrtong jongki.Ki hynriew ngut ki kandidet ba la mih madan ki kynthup ia u kyrtong ka United Democratic Party (UDP) bah Balajied Kupar Synrem uba dei ruh u khun u Dr Donkupar Roy ba dang shu khlad, u kyrtong ka Bharitya Janata Party (BJP) bah Joshua Warjri, u kyrtong ka Congress (INC) bah Batyngshain Laitmon Ryngnga, u kyrtong ka People’s Democratic Front (PDF) bah Mosjo Rockfeller Wanswett, bad 2 ngut ki kyrtong shimet, Grace Mary Kharpuri and Komen Laitmon.Ka elekshon kan long ha ka 21 tarik bad ka jingjiew kan long ha ka 24 tarik.  Ha Shella ki don  29,582 ngut ki nongthep ne nongjied kynthup 14,844 ki kynthei bad 14,698 ngut ki shynrang.
title: 29,582 ngut ki paidbah ka Shella  kin jied ia ki 6 ngut ha ka 21 tarik

content: Shillong:  Ka Meghalaya Asha Workers Union Central Body myn hynnin ka sngi, ka la pynlong ia ka jingialang ha Amlarem Block  ban ia mir jing mut halor ka jing shem jingeh bad shah iuhroit jong ki Asha ba na ki Dispensary na  Padu, Jarain, Amlarem, Pdengshakap bad Nongtalang halor ka hok jong ki, ba ki dei ban ioh  tikna ia ka pisa kaba long na ka Asha benefit scheme, ka MMBs bad  Incentive kaba ki dei ban ioh naduh u snem 2015  kat haduh mynta u snem.Na ka liang ki Asha, ki la pynpaw ba ka jingsiew kaba ki ioh, kam ia hap shuh, ha kaba  la shu siew ia ki kat bamon. Ki iathuh ruh ba ha ba ki la pyrshang kylli shaphang kane ka jingsiew ia ki, ka ba rit naduh u snem 2015 na u doctor ba dei peit ia ka Amlarem PHC.Na ka liang u doctor  H.Sengmon, u la iathuh ba ym don jingbuh record ia ka jingtrei jong ki, namar ba baroh  ki record la rah lang u Accoutant barim jong ka PHC Amlarem jong u snem 2015 bad na ka liang u doctor H.Sengmon u la iathuh ruh ia ki, ba  u sheptieng ruh ia u accountant ban pan ia ki jingthoh jingtar (records).Hadien kane ki la pan jing iarap noh na ki nong ialam ka Union Central body jong ki bad na ka liang ki nong ialam ha kane ka sngi ki la ong ba ia kane ka kam kin rah sha district  bad ki la pynpaw ruh ba  kin leit ban iakren bad ka tnad ka koit ka khiah  jong ka Jylla.Na ka liang ka MAWU ki la leit buh noh da ka dorkhas ha u Director jong ka  DHS ha ka 19 tarik u Naitung 2019, ban dawa ba kin ai noh da ka ka jingsiew ka dei hok ia baroh ki Asha.
title: Ujor ki ASHA na thain Amlarem,  ba kim ioh jingsiew kumba dei hok

content: Shillong: Ka kong Agnes Kharshiing, kawei na ki nongtrei mon sngewbha, ha ka jingthoh ha ka twitter myn hynnin ka sngi, ka kynnoh ba ka jingpait jong ka jaka pynlang um ka NEEPCO, ha Umrangso, ka dei na ka daw jong ka jingtih dewiong beain kaba la jia hajan katei ka jaka pynlang um, kaba don ha u pud jong ka Assam bad ka Meghalaya.La iathuh ba kito kiba la shah rong um, kiba dei ki nongtrei jong ka NEEPCO, ki dang jah rngai haduh mynta ka sngi ruh, ong shuh ka khubor.Ka kong Agnes, ha ka twitter jongka, ka ong “Ka jingjia ha Kopli Dam, ka dei na ka jingtih dewiong beain ha Meghalaya bad ka Assam bad lada ki bor sorkar kim leh eiei noh, kumta ka don ka jingma ia ka jingim jong ki nongtrei jong katei ka tnat bor ding”.Ka Umrangso, ka dei kaba don ha syndah jong u pud ka Assam bad ka Meghalaya bad ka dei ruh ka jaka, ha kaba ka jingtih dewiong beain, ka iaid bha ha kitei ki marjan jong katei ka jaka sam bor ding.
title: Bthei ka nan um ka NEEPCO,  ba tih dewiong pathar: Agnes

content: Ka Sonali Phogat, kaba dei ka kandidet jong ka seng BJP, ka la khie bitar ia ki paidbah, kiba don ha ka jingialang jongka, namar ba kim treh ban pyrta “Bharat Mata Ki Jai”.Ka Sonali Phogat, kan iakhun ia ka elekshon na Adampur ha ka Jylla Haryana bad haba kim treh ban pyrta, kumba ka kwah, ka la kylli ia ki, la ki dei pynban kiba wan na Pakistan.“Kito ki bym lah ban pyrta  Bharat Mata Ki Jai, ki vote jongphi, kim don dor eiei ruh em. Nga sngew lehrain, ba ki don ki nong India, kiba kum maphi” ong ka  Sonali Phogat.Ka jingthep vote, na bynta ki 90ngut ki dkhot jong ka iing dorbar ha Haryana, kan long ha ka 21tarik Risaw bad ka jingniew vote, kan long ha ka 24tarik Risaw 2019.
title: Phim treh ong “Bharat Mata ki Jai,  ka vote jongphi kam don jingmut”

content: Shillong:   Ka jingkamai spah run u Raj Biswa bad u Punit Bisht  ka la pynlong ia ka Meghalaya ban pynliem ia ka Mizoram ha ka jingiakhun ka plate group jong ka Vijay Hazare Trophy kaba long ha Dehra Dun myn hynnin ka sngi.Ka Meghalaya ka la kamai  316/5 ha ka 50 over shwa ba ka Mizoram kan hap tang ha ka jingkamai kaba 139 bad ka la pynlong ia ka Meghalaya ban jop da 177 run.U Biswa u tied 134 ia ka Meghalaya  katba u Bisht u tied  103  na 76 tylli ki bol.Ka Meghalaya ka la jop ia ka kynting pisa ka la kam ban tied ban kamai haduh 316 run bad hap 5 ngut.Ka Mizoram kaba beh ia ka Meghalaya ka la lah ban tied tang 139 run.Ka Meghalaya kan iakhun ia ka Uttarakhand ha ka 11 tarik.
title: Pynliem ka Meghalaya ia ka Mizoram da 177 run

content: Shillong: Kawei ka jingjia kaba sngew sih ka ba jia mynta ka sngi ha ka ba uwei u briew  u ba la tip kyrteng kum u Atul Aroa 46 snem ka rta u ba shongsah ha Nongmynsong dong kadiang u la khlad noh ha shen, hadien ba u la shah iuh na ka trok ka ba kit ia ki blei thaw, katba ki dang thmu ban leit rakhe  ia ka Durga Puja ha polo.
title: Iap uwei ba iuh ka trok kit blei thaw

content: Shillong: Ka Ribhoi Student Union mynta mynstep, ha ka por kumba 1:00 baje eiei ki la ioh kem ia ar ngut  ki nong die kynja na Iomawroh kaba ka khappud jong ka Assam bad Meghalaya.Kine ar ngut ki ba la shah kem ki dei  U Dingborlin L.Nonglait 38 snem ka rta bad u Albert Sangma 25 snem ka rta. Kine baroh arngut ki dei ki ba na ka shnong Nongkhlaw West Khasi Hills District.Katba ia u wei pat u ba dei u nongniah jong ka kali kaba dei ka taxi kamai kaba don ia u number ML 06 9204, u la ioh phet noh na ka ne ka jaka.Na ka liang ka BBSU ki la aiti noh ia kine arngut sha ki pulit jong ka Patharkhmah Police Out Post Ribhoi District.
title: Ioh kem ka RBSU ia arngut ki nongdie kynja na Iomawroh

content: Nongstoiñ, 8 Risaw: Ka Seng Khasi Student Union Mawshynrut Circle ka la pynpaw ia ka jingsngewkhia kaba jur halor ka jingshah khang tala noh ka Sub Centre kaba don hapoh ka shnong Tynhiang,West Khasi Hills kaba dei ruh kawei na ki jaka ai jingsumar kaba shakri ia kiba bun tylli ki shnong ha katei ka thaiñ.Katkum ka kyrwoh khubor ba la phah da u President ka Seng KSU Mawshynrut Circle u Samla Armstrong Sohshang, u la iathuh ba ia katei ka Sub Centre la khang tala noh naduh ka 11 tarik u Nailur mynta u snem da ki trai khyndew kiba la ai sngewbha ia ka jaka ban tei ia katei ka Sub Centre.Shuh shuh ka kyrwoh khubor na u tei u nongialam ka ong ruh ba ka daw halor ka jingshah khang tala noh jong katei ka Sub Centre, ka dei tang namar ka jingshah weng kam jubor jong u wei u samla u ba dei ruh u trai khyndew u ba la trei ha ka tei ka Sub Centre kum u chokidar ha ka jaka jong u kñi jong u uba la khlad noh.La ong ruh ba u tei u trai khyndew u ba la trei ruh kum u Chowkidar ha katei ka Sub Centre ha ka jaka jong u kñi u la ioh ruh ia ka shithi thungkam kaba shipor kata naduh ka 25 tarik Nailar haduh ka 22 tarik u Risaw, hynrei ha shwa ba ka por jong u kan kut noh ki bor ba halor ki la phone ia u ban pynsangeh noh ia u bad tang hadien katto katne ba u la shah bthah ban sangeh noh u la ioh pdiang pat sa ka shithi ba u la shah weng kam noh na katei ka tnad ha kaba la thung bujli ruh da uwei ha ka jaka jong u.Ka kyrwoh khubor ka iathuh ruh ba na ka liang jong ki trai khyndew kiba la ai sngewbha ia katei ka jaka na ka bynta ban tei ia katei ka Sub Centre bad ki la iasoi ruh ia ka jigmynjur bad  ka sorkar lyngba ka tnad jong ka koit ka khiah ha u snem 1992 bad la ia soi ruh ba kino kino ki kam kiba lait kum ka kam chowkidar dei ban ai bad thung beit da ki trai ba ai jaka khlem da pynrung sha ka District Selection Committee (DSC) bad la ong ruh ba dei halor ka jingpynkheiñ ia katei ka jing mynjur, kaba la pynlong ia ki trai khyndew ban khang tala noh ia katei ka Sub Centre.Na ka liang jong u Samla Armstrong Sohshang President KSU Mawshynrut Circle haba iadei bad katei ka bynta u la ong ba ka jingshah khang tala noh jong katei ka jaka ai jingsumar ka la pynshitom bad pynkhuslai jingmut ia kiba bun ki paitbah jong ki hynniew tylli ki shnong ba kynthup ia ka shnong Proin, Rimardon, Tynhiang, Porla bad kiwei kiwei ki snhong ba marjan khamtam eh ka jingktah ka long ia ki longkmie kiba dei ban leit ai injekshon ia ki khyllung jong ki bad kumjuh ruh ki longkmie ba armet.
title: Khang tala ia ka Sub Centre ha Tynhiang, shah ktah haduh 7 shnong

content: Shillong: Ki kynhun jong ki nong shong shnong jong ka shnong Khlieh Tyrshi kaba don ha west jaintia Hill District ki la wan ban pynpaw ia ka jingpyrshah ia u jingbym patiaw jong u Dolloi Elaka Jowai u bah Puramon Kynjing, u ba thmu ban jied ia u waheh shnong ka ban long ha ka 21 tarik u Risaw 2019.Haba ia kren bad ki lad pathai khubor mynta ka sngi,  u wei na ki nongshong shnong u bah Wanbun Dkhar u la ia thuh ba ka jingpyrshah ban jied ia u waheh shnong ka long ba ki kwah ba ka Excutive menber barim ka ba la kut kapor ban trei naduh ka  15 tarik u Nailar 2019 kadei ban ai shuwa  ia ki jingkhein jingdiah ka ba dei jong ka shnong ka ba la peit da ka Excutive body ka barim ha kine ki 3snem.U la ong ruh “Kane jingbym lah jong ka Executive body barim ban ai ia ki jingkhein jingdiah jong ka shnong khliehtyrshi ka dei ba ka don ka jingpyndon kam bakla jong ka pisa shnong.”U la bynrap da ka ba ong “Na ka liang jong ki nongshong shnong Khlieh Tyrshi ki la pan jingshai na u waheh shnong ba rim u bah Kitbok Rymbai, hynrei na ka liang une u waheh shnong ba rim ym shem la treh ban ai jingpynshai dei na ka ne ka daw ba ki la leit ujor noh sha ka JHADC.Na ka liang ka JHADC ka la phah ia u Dolloi jong ka Elaka Jowai u la leit ban wad jingtip ha ka 13 tarik u Nailur 2019”.“Hynrei ha ka 3tarik u Risaw 2019 u Dalloi u la pynbna ba kan don da ka jingjied waheh shnong ha ka 21 tarik u Risaw 2019 khlem da lah ban ai ia ka jingkhein jingdiah jong ka shnong kumba kwah da ki nongshong shnong.”Na ka liang ki nongshong shnong ka Khlieh Tyrshi ki kyrpas ia ka JHADC ba kan shimkhia lang ia kine ki jingeh jong ka shnong.
title: Bym lah ai jingkhein jingdiah, pyrshah ki nongshong shnong Khliehtyrshi ia ka jingjied Waheh Shnong

content: Shillong:  Ka Nongrim Hills ka la pynliem ia ka Laban Sports Club da 4-2 kol ha ka jingiakhun jong ka lympung Shillong Premiere League kaba long myn hynnin ka sngi ha madan Polo. Ia ka Nongrim Hills la thep da u  B.Swer 30′,  N.Bina 49′, B.Nongrum 61′  bad J.Surong 90′ katba ia ka Laban la thep da u A.Krose 66′ bad P.Shadap 85′.Mynta ka sngi, ka jingiakhun kan long hapdeng ka Shillong Lajong pyrshah ia ka Ryntih.
title: Pynliem ka Nongrim ia ka  Laban

content: Shillong: Ka East Khasi Hills District ka la long ka la lahduh ha ka lympung ïalehkai Wushu kaba la tip kum ka 17th Meghalaya State Level Wushu Championship 2019 ba la pynlong da ka Meghalaya Wushu Association (MWA), katba ka Ri-Bhoi District ka la jop ha ka kyrdan ba nyngkong ka West Khasi Hills District ha ka kyrdan ba ar.Ia kane ka lympung ïalehkai la  pynlong ar sngi  ha ka 7 bad 8 tarik Risaw ha Indoor Sports Hall Polo, Shillong ha kaba la wan ban ïashim bynta haduh 150 ngut ki nongïalehkai kynthup ïa ki nongpynïaid na ki District kum ka East Khasi Hills, Jaiñtia Hills, Ri-Bhoi bad West Khasi Hills District.Ia kane ka lympung ba ar sngi la wan ban pynhap pyrda noh da u Bah Ian Lyngdoh Vice President ka Meghalaya State Olympic Association haba kren ha katei ka sngi u la ai mynsiem ïa ki nongïalehkai Wushu ba kin nang ïai tei shitom ha ki snem ki ba dang ban wan bad u la pyntip ruh ha kaba ïadei bad ka Meghalaya Games ka ban sa long shen ha u Bnai Nohprah.Ha kane ka sngi kut la don lang u bah Ian Lyngdoh u Vice President MSOA kum u kongsan.
title: Lahduh ka East Khasi ha ka lympung Wushu ha ka jylla

content: Shillong:  U Bah Phrikshon Kharshiïing u la wanrah sha ka jaidbynriew sa kawei pat ka kot kaba thymmai “Ka Par Kordor Jingtip – I”.Ïa kane ka kot la pyllait paidbah da u Myntri Incharge ka Hima Mawphlang Bah Hodling Kharshiïing ha ka Dorbar Kur kharshïiing kaba la long ha ka 12. 10. 2019 ha Iing Dorbar Shnong Nongrum Mawphlang. kane ka long ka kot kaba khadwei kaba u nongthoh u la noh synñiang sha ka thoh ka tar ka bri u Hynñiew Trep.Kane ka kot ka long ka thup kaba la kynshew ha ka, ïa ki jingtip bad ki jingjia na ka mynnor kiba u nongthoh u la lum u la lang bin pa bin. Kane ka kot kan long ka jingmyntoi na ka bynta ki nongpule ba kin ïoh shibun ki jingtip kaba kordor kiba u nongthoh u la lum la lang da ki phew tylli ki snem. Da ka jingmih paidbah jong kane ka kot  “Ka Par Kordor Jingtip – I” la nang sakhi ïaka jingnang kiew bad nongroi ka thoh ka pule ha ka ktien Khasi kaba dang iaksaid mynta ban ïoh rung ha ka khyrnit kaba phra ka Riti Synshar ka Ri India.
title: Pynmih  kot thymmai  U bah Phrikshon

content: Shillong:San ngut ki Lyngdoh jong ka Hima Nongspung ki la ai da ka jingujor sha ka Khasi Hills Autonomous District Council (KHADC) bad sha ki bor Sorkar pyrshah ïa u Acting Syiem ka Hima bah Kyntiewborlang Syiemlieh halor ki jingkynnoh ba u donkti ban lum pisa be-aiñ bad ban soi thok ïa ka kyrteng ki Lyngdoh ban mynjur ïa ka Executive Committee jong ka Dorbar.Kine ki san Lyngdoh ka Hima kila buh ïa kane ka jingujor hakhmat ka Deputy Commissioner bad ka Superintendent of Police ka East Khasi Hills, haba dawa ruh ba dei ban kem mardor ïa une u Acting Syiem u Bah Kyntiewborlang Syiemlieh uba dei na ka Shnong Mawkneng.Ki san ngut ki Lyngdoh kiba buh ïa kane ka jingujor ki dei u Bah Swending Lyngdoh, Lyngdoh Nongspung, u Bah Phestinejohn Myrthong, Lyngdoh Umlang mar, u Bah H Rosiland Jywa, Lyngdoh Lawkhla, u Bah Orestar Lyngdoh, Lyngdoh ka Raid Lyngkhoi bad u Bah Ingdaron Wahlang Lyngdoh Mawsya.Kine ki Lyngdoh kila buh nyngkong eh ïa ka jingujor hakhmat u Chief Executive Member (CEM) ka KHADC bad Dy CEM myn ha ka 16/08/2019 ba dawa ïa ka Council ba kan pynduh noh ïa ka jingmynjur ïa ki Dkhot ka Executive Committee jong ka Dorbar Nongpung ba thymmai namar ka jingkynnoh ba une u Acting Syiem ula soi thok ïa ka kyrteng jong ki. Ki ïathuh ba u Acting Syiem ula lum ïa ka Dorbar Hima ha ka 03/08/2019 bad ula thaw ïa ka Executive Committee jong ka Dorbar Hima khlem ma ki hynrei ïa ki kyrteng jong ki, la kynthup lang bad la pynsoi tuh.“Kane ka jingleh u Acting Syiem ka dei kaba be-aiñ bad kaba pyrshah ïa ka Riti ka Dustur bad ka rukom pynïaid jong ka Executive Dorbar jong ka Hima” ong kine ki san Lyngdoh ha ka jingujor sha KHADC.Ha ka 19/08/2019, kine ki Lyngdoh kila leit buh ïa ka jingujor sa hakhmat ka Deputy Commissioner ka East Khasi Hills bad ha kane ka jingujor la kynnoh ba une u Acting Syiem ula donkti ha ka jinglum pisa be-aiñ kum ka bai musur jongka Hima kaba jia ha ka 17 tarik Nailar ha ka shnong Mawkneng.Kine ki Lyngdoh kila pyntip ruh ïa ka jingujor ba kila buh hakhmat ka KHADC haba dawa ban leh da kaba tyngeh ïa une u Acting Syiem.Sa kawei pat ka jingujor la buh hakhmat ka Superintendent of Police ka East Khasi Hills halor ka jingkynnoh ba u pynsoi tuh ïa ka kyrteng jong ki ha ka jingthung ïa ka Executive Committee jong ka Dorbar Hima.La kynnoh ruh ba u Acting Syiem ula pynsangeh jubor ïa ka jinglum musur ha ka shnong Mawjongka khlem ka jingtip jong ki Lyngdoh bad ka jingsam notice ba byrngem byrsit da ki ktiem ki bym iahap ha ka imlang sahlang. Halor kine, kila dawa ban kem mardor ïa une u Acting Syiem haba pyntip ruh ba u dei u briew uba la donteng ïa ka case ha ka tnad Pulit.
title: Ujor ki Lyngdoh ka Hima Nongspung pyrshah ia u Acting Syiem

content: Shillong:U Bah Generous Warlarpih, President ka kynhun ki Nongotdoh ha Ri Lum Khasi bad Jaintia kaba la tip kum ka Khasi Jaintia Butchers Welfare Association (KJBWA), u la ong ba watla ki Nongotdoh ki la iakynduh ia shibun ki jingeh, haba iadei bad ban ioh ia ki Masi otdoh bad ban die sha Iew sha hat, hynrei kim nud shuh ban pan jingiarap nangno nangno ruh, kata ka long na ka sorkar ne Seng bhalang, namar haba ki pyntip halor ka jingeh kaba ki iakynduh na ka jingjyllei ki nongshalan Masi beain sha Bangladesh, ka kylla long pynban kumba ki leit iathuh ha ki ba ka don ka pisa kaba heh bha, na katei ka kam shalan Masi beain sha Bangladesh.Haba iakren bad u Nongthohkhubor, la sngewthuh ba ka nongrim kaba la pynlong ia utei u rangbah nongialam ka kynhun ki nongotdoh ba pynmih ia kitei ki kyntien, ka dei hadien ba ki la shem ba mynshwa ba ki dang sngapjar bad dang duna kiba tip, ka jingiaid tuh ki Masi beain sha Bangladesh ka dang duna bha, hynrei ka jingkiew kynsan jong ki nongshalan beain sha Bangladesh, ka dei hadien ba kitei ki nongotdoh ki la leit ban pan jingiarap na ki nongialam sengbhalang bad ruh hadien ba ki la leit ban kynduh ia ki  bor sorkar.Khyndiat por mynshwa, kum ki nongotdoh haba ngi leit ban thied Masi na Iew Masi ha Baridua, ngi dang ioh ia ki masi ban thied na ka bynta ban pynlong kum ki Masi otdoh bad ban die ha kylleng ki Iew hapoh ka Ri Khasi bad Jaintia, hynrei kumba ka long mynta, namar ka jingjur ki masi kiba la shalan sha Bangladesh, ka pynlong syndon iangi ba ngim ioh masi shuh ban thied na katei ka Iew.Haba iadei bad ka jingeh ban thied Masi na katei ka Iew ha Baridua, utei u nongialam u la ong, ba lada thied masi na katei ka Iew, ka la pynshem jingeh ym tang ia ki nongotdoh, hynrei wat ia ki paidbah nongbam doh Masi, namar lada ngin thied na katei ka Iew, ka dor jong ka Doh Masi kan sa poi haduh T. 400 tam ha ka Shi kilo.Nalor ka jingeh haba iadei bad ka jingbymioh masi na katei ka Iew, hynrei ngi iakynduh sa ia kawei pat ka jingeh bad kata ka long, haba ngi leit ban thied Masi na ki shnong ha Assam, hynrei ngi shem jingeh pat ban pynpoi sha jylla, namar ka jingbymdon ia kita ki Sertiphiket na ka tnat Veterinary, kaba long ka jingpynshisha na ki Doktor halor ka jinglong jingman ki masi bad khamtam na ka bynta ban die sha ki paidbah.Haba ngi thied Masi na Assam bad thmu pynpoi sha jylla, ngi shah bat pat ha ki Pulit ha Byrnihat bad kane kam banse iangi ba ngi hap ban siew pisa ia ki, khnang ba kin pyllait bad ban gin ioh ban poi sha ki Iew ki hat, na ka bynta ban shohdoh bad die sha ki paidbah, ha kaba kane ruh ka la dei ka jingeh kaba khraw bha iangi ki nongotdoh bad kiba la im ja im jhur na kane ka kam otdoh, pynpaw utei u rangbah.Ha ka jingshisha, lada ka sorkar ne kita ki sengbhalang ki don ia kata ka mynsiem ban iarap kyrpang iangi ki nongotdoh kiba dei ruh tang ki para Khasi suda, thikna beit ba kin lah ban khang ia ka kam shalan masi sha Bangladesh, hynrei kumba ka long mynta ngi la long tang kum ki nongpeit kai halor ka jingiaid ki masi sha Bangladesh, bynrap utei u rangbah.Namarkata, haba ngi lap bad iohi ba ym don kiba iarap lem ia ki jingeh jongngi, ka pynlong iangi ba ngin sngapjar, hynrei lada ka long ha kane ka rukom kumba ka long mynta, ka por kam slem ba ka kam otdoh masi kaba la trei tang da ki Khasi suda, kan sa jah noh, namar ym don shuh kiba nud ban thied ia ki masi, u la bynrap.
title: Ka jingpan iarap na ki Sengbhalang, ka long  kum ka jingpyni ia ka pisa heh sha Bangladesh

content: Nongstoiñ: Ka Seng HYC West Khasi Hills, hapoh ka jing ialam jong u Samla Lumlang Kharsyiemlieh ha ka sngi Saitjaiñ ba ladep, ka la hiar shapoh ka karkhana sain nar kaba la tip ruh kum ka Shree Shakhambari Ferro Alloy Pvt Ltd kaba don hapoh ka shnong Riwiang na ka bynta ban leit khynra ia ki bar Jylla kiba trei ba ktah hapoh katei ka karkhana la ki biang ne em ia ki kot ki sla kum ka Labour Licence na ka KHADC bad kumjuh ia ka NRC ia ki nongtrei ba na ka Jylla Assam.Na ka liang jong ka HYC ka la ioh ruh ban iakynduh bad iakren bad u Vice President katei ka Karkhana u S.C Mahanta bad ki dkhot jong ka Seng ki la phah wan ruh ia baroh ki nongtrei bar jylla kiba trei hapoh katei ka karkhana, hynrei na ka liang jong u Mahanta u la iathuh ba kim shymla don satia namar ba ka karkhana ka dang khang namar ki jingpynbit pynbiang ia ki tiar ki tar, kumta na ka liang jong ka Seng kala bthah ia u Mahanata ba un shu pyni noh da ki kot ki sla jong baroh ki nongtrei ha katei ka karkhana.Ha ka jingjurip ia ki kot ki sla na ka liang jong ka Seng kala lap ba katei ka karkhana kam shym pat la ioh satia ia ki Labour Licence na ka KHADC hynrei u tei u heh jong katei ka karkhana u la shu pyni da ki receipt na ka KHADC da kaba u la kam ruh ba ka karkhana kala dep ban pynapllai lut ia ki Labour Licence hynrei ka KHADC kam shym pat la lah ban pyndep bad haba ki dkhot jong ka Seng kila phah wanrah ia ki NRC jong ki nongtrei kiba na ka Jylla Assam u tei u heh ka karkhana u la lah ban pyni tang jong ki katto katne ngut.Kumta na ka liang jong ka Seng kala dawa na u tei u heh jong katei ka karkhana ba u dei ban pynbiang lut noh ia baroh ki kot ki sla jong ki nong bylla khatma ka Labour Licence bad ka NRC jong kiba na ka Jylla Assam ha shwa ba kin wan ban trei biang ynda la plie ia katei ka karkhana bad na ka liang jong u S.C Mahanta ruh u la kular ban pynbiang ia ki kot ki sla bad ban pyni ruh sha ki dkhot jong ka Seng ynda ki nongtrei kila wan trei biang.Nalor ki kot ki sla jong ki nongtrei bar Jylla hapoh katei ka karkhana na ka liang jong ka Seng kala dawa ruh ba katei ka karkhana kadei ban siew dep noh ia baroh ki bill jong ki supplier kaba sah mynta sa kumba 1 klur shiteng bad ka Seng ka ai por ruh ia katei ka karkhana 10 sngi ba kan siew dep lut ia baroh ki bill ba sahteng jong ki supplier.Ym tang kata ki dkhot jong ka Seng kila dawa ruh ba katei ka karkhana kadei ban pynmyntoi lang ia ka shnong Riwiang bad ia ki shnong ba marjan kum ha ki kam pynroi namar ia kane la kular hi da katei ka karkhana ha kapor ba don ka jingpynsngew paidbah (Public Hearing) ha shwa ban pynieng ia katei ka karkhana.Ha kaba iadei pat bad kitei ki ar tylli ki mat jingdawa jong ka Seng na ka liang jong u S.C Mahanta u la ong ba ia ki bill jong ki supplier ka karkhana ka ju siew beit manla kapor la ka long ha ka shisien shi taïew lane shisien shibnai bad haduh mynta na ka liang jong ka karkhana kam shym pat la ioh pdiang ia ka jingujor na ki supplier ha kaba iadei bad ka jingbymbiang ka rukom siew ia ki bill.Katba ha kaba iadei pat bad ka jingiarap ia ki kam pynroi u la kubur ba haduh mynta ka karkhana ka dang lah ban shna tang ia kawei ka Dorbar Hall hapoh Riwiang bad u la ong ruh ia kiba bun ki lad jingiarap ym lah ban leh hi na ka karkhana kumta ka ju iarap bad noh synniang lyngba ki jingdonkam jong ki Sport Club, ki seng bapher bapher haba ki wan pan jingiarap haba donkam na ka liang jong ka karkhana kam ju kyntait
title: Dawa ka HYC na ki karkhana saiñ nar ban siew ia ki bill jong ki supplier

content: Mumbai: Ka Tata Motors kan sa pynlong ia ka jingialap paidbah ba la tip kum ka  organize Grahak Samvaad campaign, kyrpang tang na ka bynta ki kali kamai ba la pynmih da ka kompany Tata Motors’, ia kane ka jingialap paidbah yn pynlong naduh ka 10 tarik haduh ka 21 tarik mynta u bnai.Ha kine ki sngi ki nongtrei ka Tata Motors kin ia kren bad ki nongthied kali kumjuh ruh bad ki trai kali ban pyntip sha ki jingai jingshakri bapher bapher kiba ka kompany ka ai ban pynsuk ia ki nongthied kali.Lah ban kdew hangne ba ka Grahak Seva Mahotsav kadei kawei na ki lad ai jingshakri jong ka kompany Tata Motors ha kaba yn peit bad khmih bniah bad ia ki kali ioh don kino kino ki jingthut ha ki kali ba la pynmih ne shna da kane ka karkhana, ia kane ka jingshakri ki trai kali kim hap ban siew dor eiei.Ia kane ka jingshakri ban peit bad pynbha ia ki kali yn pynlong ha palat 1500 tylli ki jaka shna kali ba la ithuh da karkhana pynmih kali jong ka Tata Motors naduh ka 4 tarik haduh ka 11 tarik u Naiwieng. Ha kitei ki sngi ban ai ia ki jingshakri, ki trai kali kin ioh duna dor lada pynshna bad thied ia kino kino ki tiar kali kiba la sniew.Shuh shuh yn rakhe ruh ia ka sngi ki nongthied kali ne ka National Customer Care Day ha ka 23 tarik u Risaw. Ka shnat treikam jong ka karkhana Tata Motors ba la tip kum ka Tata Motors CVBU division ka ju rakhe ia kane ka sngi ha man la u snem ha ka 23 tarik u Risaw kum ka dak ban kynmaw burom ia u nongthied kali ba nyngkong tam uban thied ia ka kali ba pynmih da ka Tata Motors. Dei ha kane ka sngi jong ka snem 1954 ba la wan thied nyngkong eh ia ka trok na ka jaka shna trok kaba don ha Jamshedpur. Kumta da ka jingthmu ban pynhun ia ki nongthied kali ha baroh shi lynter jong ka jingpyniaid jong ki ia ka kali, ka Tata Motors ka la pynmih syndon ia ka lad ai jingshakri ba la tip kum ka Sampoorna Seva 2.0, kaba long ka lad ka lynti kumno ban ai ka jingshakri ba bha tam ban pynbha ia ki kali khnang ba ka kali jong ki kan lait na kino kino ki jingthut bad suk ha ka leit ka wan.
