title: Pynbna ka Tata Motor ban pynlong jingia phylliew jingmut bad ki nongthied, halor ki lad ai jingshakri   jong kane ka kompeni

content: 3.Biodiversity —- U wei u dieng bah u lah ban long ka iing naka bynta ki spah tylli ki khniang barit, ki mang kariang, ki mrad ba ri khun, u phlang jem bad ki jingthung jingtep. Ka shong katkum ki jait bam bad ki jaka rieh baki donkam. Ki mrad ba har rukom ki donkam laki jong ki rukom im ne rukom sah. Khlem ki dieng ki jingthaw ba im ha khlaw kin ym lah ban thaw ne shna iing shna skum. Dei namar kata haba don ka jingpom dieng pathar ka pynjot noh iaki iing ki sem jong ki hajar tylli ki jingthaw ba im ha khlaw.
title: Ki dieng ki siej

content: Shillong: Ka kynhun nongpyniaid jong ka Madonna Diversity Cultural and Modern Society kan pynlong ia ka jingiakop pyni sap ia kaba la tip kum ka Talent of the Eastern Hill.Ka Audition kan long nyngkong eh hapoh Nongpoh ha ka 14 tarik bnai ba khatar por 11 baje mynstep, Nongstoin 16 tarik bnai 12 por 11 baje mynstep, Mairang 18 tarik bnai 12 por 11 baje mynstep, Amlarem 20 tarik bnai 12 por 11 baje mynstep, Jowai 21 tarik bnai 12 por 11 baje mynstep, Pynursla 8 tarik bnai 1 por 11 baje mynstep, Bhoirymbong 10 tarik bnai 1 por 11 baje mynstep, Khliehriat 13 tarik bnai 1 por 11 baje mynstep, Shillong 15 tarik bnai 1 por 11 baje mynstep, Shangpung 17 tarik bnai 1 por 11 baje mynstep snem 2020. Ki lahduh kin ioh ban rah ia ka Maruti Alto 800 kaba dang thymmai, ba wan ba ar ka song pisa kaba Rs. 50,000 tyngka bad uba lai un ioh Rs. 30,000/- tyngka consolation prize 7 tylli da ki Mobile Handset Oppo A5S. kan don ruh ka Lucky Draw na ka bynta ki Ticket uba donbok un ioh Rs. 40,000/- tyngka phi lah ban phah WhatsApp’s da ka Video clips ban leh Audition lyngba u No: 8730933292/8732059866/8787866090, ong ka   kyrwoh khubor ba la pyllait da u Vice-President u samla Bormi Syngkon.
title: Ka jing ia kob pyni sap; ka khusnam lah duh da ka alto thymmai bad ka song pisa

content: Ki don kumba ar phew ngut eiei, ki dkhot jong ka seng ehrang, ka  Garo National Liberation Army (GNLA), kiba dang trei kam bha ha kien ki sngi, ha ki bynta ba shaneng jong ka Bangladesh, ha ka jing pyniaid jong ka seng ULFA.Ki lad khubor, ki iathuh ia kitei ki jingshisha, hadien ka jingshah kem U Nikrak M Sangma, ha ka Sngi U Blei, ha kaba ki kam ba ka don ka jing ia treilang hapdeng ka GNLA bad ka ULFA bad kitei ki trei kam bha ha ki bynta jong ka Sherpur, Mymensing bad ka Netrokona, kiba don ha ki bynta ba shatei ka Bangladesh.
title: Don kumba 20ngut eiei ki dkhot ka GNLA ha Bangladesh

content: Shillong: Ki pulit ka West Jaintia Hills, ki la ioh bat ia uwei u briew, uba thoh pynbudnam  ia ka Balang Katholik. La iathuh ba ki pulit Jowai, hadien ba ki la ioh jing ujor, ki bat ia uwei u briew, uba kyrteng U  Rimialson Daw.U Bah Lakador Syiem, Superintendent of police, West Jaintia Hills, ha ka jing pynmih khubor mynta ka sngi, u iathuh ba ki pulit ki la leit wad ia utei u briew, uba kren pynbudnam ia ka balang Catholic bad mar kumta, ki la lap ia utei u nongthoh pynjah burom ha ka peij jongu ha facebook.La ialam ia utei uba shah kem sha Jowai, ha kaba la phah eksamin ha ki doktor, halor ka koit ka khiah jongu, namar ba kiba ha iing jongu, ki kam ba u dei uba don jingduna ka bor pyrkhat.Ha kawei pat ka khubor, la phah sha ka email jong U Rupang, lyngba ka email jong ka AJHSWO, ha kaba la pyni ba u para jong U Ma Rimialson Daw, uba kyrteng U Moonlight Daw, ula pynmih ia ka shithi jing panmap paidbah jongu, da kaba kynnoh ba u hynmen jongu, u dei uba pang bad uba shah sumar ha kine ki sngi, ha MIMHANS, kaba dei ka hospital ia kiba pang khlieh ha Shillong.
title: Shah kem uwei, uba pynbudnam ia ka balang katholik ha facebook

content: Shillong: U bah John Kharshiing lem bad ki katto katne ki riew rangbah kiba dei na ka Hima Mawphlang kiba sah shabar jong ka hima, mynta ka sngi ki la leit ban kyrpad ia u bah Pyniaid Sing Syiem ba dei peit ia ka Elaka halor ban pynsangeh shuwa ia ka ilekeshon ban jied ia u Lyngdoh jong ka Hima Mawphlang.Haba kren ha ki lad pathai khubor u bah John Kharshiing u la ong ba kane ka jingwan ban kyrpad jong ki ka long kum ki riew shimet kiba dei na katei ka hima kiba sah sha bar jong ka Hima ban kyntu ia ka KHADC ba kan pynsangeh shuwa shipor ia ka ilekshon jied Lyngdoh hapoh ka Hima.Ia ka Hima Mawphlang la pynlong da ki 12 tylli ki kur bad na kine ki don san tylli ki kur kiba lah ban jied ia u Lyngdoh, kita ki long ka kur Lyngdoh Mawphlang, ka kur Blah, ka kur Kharshiing, ka kur Kharhunai bad ka kur Kharsohlia kine ki long kita ki kur kiba don ia ka hok ban jied ia u Lyngdoh.U bah John u la iathuh ba ha ki por mynshuwa la juh pynlong ia ka jingjied ia u Lyngdoh da kaba niew khlieh briew ba kane ka wanrah ia ka jinghuri hura, ha dien kane kala mih ka rai ba ban jied ia u Lyngdoh dei ban long tang kiba sah hapoh jong ka Hima.Kane ka jing kyrpad  jong ki ka long ba ki kur kiba don ia ka hok ban jied ia u Lyngdoh ki dei ban ioh ia ka lad wad la ki sah sha bar jong ka hima da kaba pynshisha lyngba ki kot ki sla kaba ki don, na ka liang jong ki ki kwah ba kito kiba sah shabar jong ka hima ruh kidei ban ioh ia ka hok ban jied ia u Lyngdoh ka hima.Na ka liang u bah Pyniaid Sing Syiem Deputy CEM, ba dei peit ia ki kam elaka, u la kular  ba un pynsangeh shuwa ia ka ilekshon Lyngdoh ka ba thmu ban pynlong ha ka 28 tarik mynta u bnai bad khot ia ki nongpyniaid jong ka hima ban ia kren sani halor kane ka kam, kane ka long katkum ka jingiathuh jong u Dy CEM ha kane ka jingiakynduh mynta ka sngi, la iathuh u bah Kharshiing.
title: Kular u EM Elaka  ban pynsangeh shipor ia ka ilekshon Lyngdoh Hima Mawphlang

content: Shillong:U bah John Kharshiing mynta ka sngi u la leit ban kynduh ia u Incharge Elaka jong ka KHADC u bah Pyniaid sing Syiem halor ki mat jong ka Hima Mylliem State ha KHADC.Ha ba ia kren bad ki lad pathai khubor u bah John Kharshiing u la ong “Ka jingmih na ka Hima Mylliem ka long da ki phew klur hynrei haei ki ta ki jingkhein jingdiah ki don, da ki phew snem kam don jingkhein ia ki jing mih na ka Hima Mylliem  ym don jing khein ka ba shai ha ka wat kito ki 48 ngut ki kur kiba long  myntri ruh bun na ki, kim don jing tip.”“Ka Hima Mylliem ka dei ka constitutional body, wat lada kam pat ioh ka jingithuh ruh. Kumta ngi kum ki paid jong ka Hima Mylliem ngi don ka hok ban tip ia ki jingkhein jingdiah ka iaid shano ruh” u la bynrap.Kumta na ka liang u bah Kharshiing, u  dawa jur ba ka dei ban don ka jing lum ia ka dorbar Hima, kaba  ban long shisien shisnem kumjuh ki ong lada ka dorbar Hima kam lum ka dei ka kamram jong ka district Council ba kan lum ia ka.Na ka liang u Bah Kharshiing, u la dawa ba u dei ban lum kyrkieh ia ka dorbar Hima hapoh arbnai ha kaba ki phang ka long ba dei  ban pynkylla  ia ki rule ki ain jong ka Hima da ka ba ong “Ha ka Executive dorbar Hima Mylliem ki dei ban  don lang  ki rangbah shnong bad ki nongsynshar raid kumba ka long mynta ki don tang katto katne ngut ki myntri bad u syiem jong ka excutive dorbar Hima Mylliem. Kane kan wanrah ia ki jingeh ia ki  paid jong ka u Dorbar Hima Mylliem namar ba kim lah ban ia pyni ne kdew ia ki jingeh ha ki”.
title: Ka jingmih na ka Hima Mylliem ka long  da ki phew klur, hynrei haei kita ki jingkhein jingdiah:John Kharshiing

content: Shillong: Ki nongtrei sngi hapoh jong ka Meghalaya S-port Council, ki la pynbna ba kin dang  bteng ia ka jingiakhih jong ki, kaba la sdang ha ka 27 tarik jong u bnai ba la dep ban dawa na ka sorkar ba ka dei ban pynkiew ia ka bai bylla sngi jong ki.Ki nongtrei kiba ia shim bynta ha kane ka jingiakhih baroh ki long 50 ngut, na ki 61 ngut kaba ki don ha kane ka nongbah Shillong.Ka MSC ha u snem 2015 ruh ka la pynlong ia ka jingiakhih ba kin ioh ia ka bai trei kaba na ka T.1500 tyngka sha T.5000/-   bad mynta ka kynti ruh kim banse ban iakhih biang ban dawa ia ka bai trei jong ki ban pynkiew.Na ka liang u bah Thomas Passah u nongialam ka KHNAM Youth Wing, u la ong ba kum ka party ka iarap ban ia kren ia kine ki jingeh jong kine ki nongtrei katkum kum ki kyndon jong ka ain,kaba dei katkum ka Labour Law kaba ka sorkar jylla hi ka la pynmih ia ka dor ban siew ia ki nongbylla sngi.La iathuh ba kane ka jingiakhih jong ki ka long ha dien ba ki la dep ban phah ia ki jingthoh sha ka sorkar la bun bun sien, hynrei ka sorkar ka la leh kum bym ioh sngew ia ka jingdawa jong ki bad namar ba ka sorkar kam sngap kim don lynti shuh da kumwei hynrei ki hap ban pynlong ia kane ka jingiakhih.Ha ba ia kren bad ki nong pathai khubor, ka kong Mersilin Marwein  ka la iathuh ba ka jingiakhih ka jong ki, ka long halor ka jing  dawa na ka sorkar ban pynkiew noh ia ka bai bylla sngi na kaba ki ioh mynta T.5000/- shibnai.
title: Byrngem ki nongtrei ka Meghalaya Sport Council ban dang bteng ia ka jingiakhih

content: Shillong: Ka Seng Samla Bhalang Nongkhyriem, Nongthymmai ryngkat ka jingiatreilang bad ophis jong ka Nehru Yuva kendra Sangathan(NYKs) Shillong, Ministry of Youyh  Affairs & Sports,Govt. of India ka la pynlong ia ka prokram kaba shisngi, kata ka  Block Level Neighbourhood  Youth Parliament  ba hap hapoh ka Mawpat Block ha Dinet Manik Syiem Memorial Higher Secondary School, Nongthymmai ha ka 6tarik Nailur 2019 ryngkat ka jingiadonlang u Samla Wansuk Kharkongor (National Youth Volunteer) jong kane ka  Block.Ha kane ka prokram la khot sngewbha  ia ki riew shemphang, kiba la ai jingkren bad sam ki symboh pyrkhat  bad ki jingnang jingtip sha ki khynnah bad samla. Ki  saw ngut ki long  U Dr. Jemino Mawthoh, Ex MLA Nongthymmai, Bah Joshua Rynjah, Lecturer Department of English, St Mary’s College, kong Ebiangmidaka Kharshandi, ANM Nongthymmai UPHC bad U Bah Anthony Syiemiong, Director Manbha Foundation, Shillong.La pyniaid ia ka prokram da U General Secretary jong ka Seng Samla Bhalang Nongkhyriem, Samla Synsharlang.L.Rngaid bad la ioh ia ka jingpdiang sngewbha  ia baroh kiba la poi sha  kane ka prokram da  U President  ka Seng Samla Bhalang Nongkhyriem, Samla Bankerlang Kharpran. La ioh ia ka jingkren nyngkong na U Dr Jemino Mawthoh ba la kren halor ka phang “Environment Conservation and Volunteerism” ha kaba u nongkren u la kham ban ha kaba iadei bad ka khuid ka suba ha ki sawdong sawkun  ha la ki jong ki shnong ki thaw ne ha ki jaka pule bad kyntu ruh ban long barabor kiba leh khuid da kaba  sdang shuwa na la ki jong ki iing ki sem. U la pynsngew ruh halor ka jing pyndonkam ia ki plastik bad  ka  jingjot ba mih na ka, u la pynkynmaw ruh ba ha ki por khynnah jong u  mynshuwa ki kham pyndonkam  bha  da ka pla iew ha ka por leit siew sha ki iew ki hat ban ia ki plastik bad  kyntu ruh ia baroh  kiba don ha kane ka prokram khamtam ia ki khynnah bad samla badei ban sdang shuwa na lade ia ka sien jam kaba rit ban wanrah ka jingbha ha kino kino ki bynta jong ka imlang sahlang. La pynsngew bad kyntu ruh ban don ka jing kitkhlieh bad ka mynsiem iatreilang ban kyntiew ia ka shnong ka thaw, ka jylla bad ka ri hi baroh kawei.U Bah  Joshua Rynjah Lecturer Department of English St Mary’s College,Shillong halor ka phang “Education” ba la batai ha kaba dei bad ka jingmyntoi  lada long kiba nang ban pule  ban tip ha ka thoh ka tar bad ki  jingmyntoi  jong ka bad kumjuh ruh u  la pynsngew ha kaba  iadei bad ka jingnang  jingtip bad ka jing pyndonkam ia ki kor komputor khamtam ha kane ka juk  ba mynta ha kaba kiei kiei ki kam baroh la iaid online bad kumjuh ruh u la pynsngew ha ka jing pyndonkam ia ka social media bad ban long kiba kham adkar kumno ban pyndonkam ia ka. Shuwa ban shong u la pynsngew ia kawei ka kyntien, kata ha ka ktien nongwei “THINK before You SHARE”.La ioh ruh ka jingkren na ka kong Ebiangmidaka kharshandi ANM Nongthymmai UPHC halor ka phang  “Health,Family Welfare and Nutrition” ba la batai ha kaba iadei bad ka koit ka khiah bad khatduh  la ioh ka jingkren na U Bah Anthony Syiemiong Director Manbha Foundation,Shillong ba la kren halor ka phang “Social Issue”  kaba iadei bad ki jingkyrni ha ka jingdih pynbuaid u Drok bad Ka Kyiad ha kaba u la pynsngew sha ki khynnah, uei u Drok bad kiei ki jingsniew ba har rukom kaba pynmih shisien ba la kyrni ha ka jingpyndonkam ia u Drok bad ka jingktah ia ka iing ka sem, imlang sahlang bad kumjuh ruh ba ha kine ki sngi ka jing jyllei jong une u jait jngdih. La pynsngew ruh ia ka jingbun jong  ki briew ba kyrni ha une u jait jingdih ki nangkiew man la u snem bad  kyntu sha ki khynnah ban kiar na kine ki jait jingdih .La ioh ruh ka jingkren na I Principal jong ka skul , ha kaba I la ai khublei ia ka Seng Samla bad pynsngew ruh  ba ki long kiba donbok tam ha kane ka step ban ioh bynta ha kane ka prokram, ban iohsngew ia ka jingkren na ki Resource Person ha ki bynta bapher bapher  bad ka long kaba myntoi bha ia ki khynnah bad kumjuh ia baroh kiba ia don ha kane ka sngi.
title: Ka khuid ka suba, ka thoh ka tar bad ka jingma jong u droks, ha ka prokram jong ka SSBN

content: Badapjied KurkalangHa ka juk jong ka social media bad internet mynta ngi lah ioh shibun ki khubor kiba ai jingmyntoi ha kiba bun ki bynta ha ka jingim jong ngi kaba man ka sngi. Hooid ki don ruh shibun ki khubor kiba ngi ioh lyngba ki social media bad internet kiba lah ban ialam bakla bad wat ia kaban pynjot ruh ia ka jingim jong ngi. Namarkata ngi dei ban long kiba husiar ia kaei kaba ngi iohsngew bad iohi lyngba ka social media bad internet.Ka long ka jingshisha kaba ngi iohi bad kaba paw lyngba ka media bad internet ha kine ki sngi kaei kaba jia ha ki ri Iurop kiba pher bapher wat ha ka ri Amerika ruh. Ka jingwan rung jong ki briew kiba na bar haduh kaba ym lah shuh ban tehlakam bad ka daw jong ka jingbym lah ban tehlakam ka pynlong ia ki bor synshar ba kin shem jynjar ban buddien ia ki. Ki briew jong kine ki ri Iurop ki don shisha ka mynsiem kaba sngewlem kaba bha haba ki pdiang ia kine ki briew sha ka ri jong ki, hynrei kaei kaba kim lah ban iohi pat ka long ka jingshim kabu jong kine ki briew kiba wan ban tuid sha ka ri jong ki. Ka jingpynbthei bom ha ka nongbah Paris bad ha ki jaka bapher bapher, ka jingshahleh beijot jong ki kynthei ha ri Sweden bad ka jingkiew jong ka jingngeit Islam ha ka ri England, France, Germany, Norway, Sweden bad kiwei kiwei de ka nang pynshlur shuh shuh ia kine ki nongbuhai shnong ban pyntreikam shisyndon ia ka ain jong ki (Shariah law) ha kine ki ri Iurop katba ki nang ia roi bad ioh bor na kawei ka por sha kawei pat.Kaba phylla pat ka long ba kine ki briew kiba leit buhai shnong sha kine ki ri Iurop ki leit sha kine ki ri namar ka daw jong ka jingshah pynshitom ha la ka jong ka ri bad kham bunsien ka dei ruh na ka daw jong ka jingpyntreikam ia ka ain jong ki (shariah law) kaba pynlong ia ki ban poi buhai shnong sha kiwei pat ki ri; bad kaba kham phylla shuh shuh pat ka long haba ki wan ban buhai shnong sha kine ki ri Iurop kiba long ki riew kiba laitluid, hynrei hadien ba ki la ioh ia ka jaka baskhem  ki sdang pyrshang ban pyntreikam pynban ia ki ain jong ki  (shariah law) ha kine ki ri Iurop kaba long kawei na ki daw kaba pynlong ia ki ban phet  na la ka jong ka ri.U David Cameron jong ka ri England, u Nicholas Sarkozy jong ka ri France bad ka Angela Merkel jong ka ri Germany ki kubur ba ki la bakla ban pdiang ia kine ki briew sha ka ri jong ki kaba khlem pud bad kiba kham bun napdeng jong kine ki nongwan buhai shnong ki dei na ki ri Muslim bad ki lap ruh ba kine ki briew ki long shisha kiba eh ban bud ia ka rukom pyniaid kiba don ha ka imlang sahlang. Ka long ruh ka kabu kaba khraw ia kine ki nongbuhai shnong sha ki ri Iurop namar haba ki poi sha kine ki ri ki ioh ei lut naduh ka iing ban sah, ka dawai dashin, ka bam ka dih haduh ka pule puthi bad ki trai shnong pat mynta ki don hapdeng ka jingshitom ban ioh ia ka jingmyntoi kaba ki dei hok ban ioh namar ba dei ma ki, ki trai shnong kiba siew khajna. Hynrei lada ki kren pyrshah ia kine kiei kiei baroh ki kylla long pynban ki nongshun bad ki khot ia ki, ki “racist” bad ki lah ban hap ha ka jinghshah pynshitom.Ka long da shisha kaba sngewsih haba ki nongialam ha ka jaka ban iada ia la ka jong ka jaidbynriew, hynrei tang namar ka vote ki die pynban ia la ka jong ka jaidbynriew. Mynta ki briew kiba hap hapoh ka European Union ki la shu ia ang bad peit jawdud ia ka ri Poland namar dei tang ka ri Poland ka bym shym la pdiang wat tang uwei ruh u nongbuhai shnong na kine ki ri Muslim. Ka ri Poland ka kren pyrshah peit peit ia ka jinglong kylluid jong ka European Union watla ka dei kawei na ki dkhot jong ka European Union ruh. Bad dei namar kane ka daw ba ka European Union ka buh ia ka jingpyrkhing halor ka ri Poland ha ki katto kane ki bynta. Hynrei ha kaba kut pat ka long ka jingjop ia ka ri Poland ban iohi ia ka jingsuk bad ka jingshngain ha la ka jong ka ri. Ka ri Poland ka sngewthuh ia kaei kaba ka ieng namar ka la mad bad iaid lyngba ia ka jingdum kaba khraw tam ha ka thma bah kaba ar bad kaba baroh ngi tip bha ia kaei kaba jia ha Auschwitz, kaba hynriew million ki Jiw ki shah pyniap ha ka hukum jong u Hitler bad hadien ka jingsynshar jong u Stalin kaba la pyniap da ki phew hajar ngut ki nong Poland.Hato katno ngi long kiba iapher na ki? Ngi long tang shitroh napdeng ki jaidbynriew kiba bun hapoh ka ri India bad lada kam don kano kano ka ain kaba lah ban treikam ban tehlakam ia ki briew kiba na bar kata mut ka la nang shem jingeh katba ngi dang iaid shakhmat.Hooid nga lah ban ong ba, baroh ki Niam bad ki jingngeit bad ki jaidbynriew bapher bapher jong kane ka pyrthei ki don la ka jong ka jingthmu bad ngi dei ba long kiba husiar ban ioh jinghikai na kaei kaba ngi iohi ia kaba la leit bad ia kaba mynta bad ka jingbynsuidniew ia ka, ka pynlong ia ngi ban pynbud ia kajuh ka jingbakla.Phi iohi lada ngi ki briew ngi pyrkhat ba ngi kham nang bad kham stad ban ia U Blei bad ia ka Ktien jong U, te ka la long lypa ka jingma. Haba U Blei U thaw ia ka pyrthei, U buh ruh ia ka kyndon khnang ba ka um kan ym ryngkang na ka hukum jong U (Pro 8:29). Haba U pyni ia u Abraham ia ka jaka kaba U mut ban ai ia u bad ka pateng jong u, U Blei U buh ruh ia ki kyndon ryngkat bad ka bynta khappud (boundary) kaba mut ba u Abraham bad ki pateng jong u ka Israel kam dei ban tam ia ka khappud kaba U Blei U la ai (Jen 15:18). Namar ka ri bad ka jaidbynriew (nation) ka dei ka jingmut kaba wan na U Blei, hynrei ka jingsynshar kaba khlem pud khlem sam ne kaba tam ia u pud u sam ba la buh ka dei kaba wan na u Bymman (Empire). U Blei U ai ia ki ri bad ki jaidbynriew ia la ka jong ka bynta ban synshar bad kaba kwah rhah na kaei kaba la bynta ka wanrah ia ka jingjot jingpra bad ka jingsngewsih. Ngam donkam ban pynshisha ia kata ka, hynrei  ka histori hi ka pynpaw ia ka sakhi.Kaei kaba nga kwah ban ong ka long, ka ri bad ka jaidbynriew jong ngi ka long ka ri kaba la shon muhor da U Blei. Haba ka long kumta ka long kaba donkam ia ngi ban iakhun ia la u jong u pud u sam ban pynsah ia la ka jong ka ri bad ka jaidbynriew. Ka ri Israel ka hap ban iakhun tyngeh ban ioh bad pynskhem ia la ka jong ka ri bad bun ki Khristan napdeng jong ngi ngi peit ia kane ka ri kum ka ri kaba kyntang bad ngi kren shaphang ka jinglah jong kane ka ri la i kumba ba lada ka ri Israel ka khlain bad ka kiew ha ka ioh ka kot ngi ruh ngi long kiba khlain bad kiba kiew ryngkat bad ki. Ngi shu ia mutdur ia kaei kaei kabym lah ban long suda. Ngi donkam ban iit ialade bad ioh jinghikai kumno ban tei ia kane ka jaidbynriew kaba kyrpang jong ngi ba kan long kaba skhem bad kaba khlain naduh kaba hapoh bad shaduh kaba shabar. Ngim don da kawei pat ka jaka ban buhai shnong, kane ka long ka jaka kaba ngi hap ban iakhun tyngeh ban pynsah lada ym dei na ka bynta jong ngi, hynrei na ka bynta jong ki hep kiba rit kiban dang wan.Ngi la khmihlynti ia ki nongialam jong ngi ban pynbeit ia u pud u sam bad ban pyntreikam ia ka ILP la bun bun snem, hynrei kam i poi shano shano ruh. Balei ka long kaba eh ia ki nongialam Khasi jong ngi ban iakhun ban pyntreikam ia ka ILP bad pynbeit ia u pud u sam haduh mynta? Ka lah ban long tharai, lada ki pyntreikam ia ka ILP ka ioh ka kot ka nang hiar nang hiar bad ka lah ruh ban dei na bynta ka vote? Hato kaei kaba kham kordor ka ioh ka kot, ka vote ne ka ri bad ka jaidbynriew? Ne ka jingbym lah ban pynpeit ia u pud u sam ka long ka eh namar ngim don kot don sla bad ka sorkar Assam kan nang leh katba mon namar ka biang lut ia ki kot ki sla? Namarkata ki hap ban shu ap haduh 50 ne 100 snem ia ka sorkar Assam ban iakren hadien ba ka lah ban pyllait por. Kaba mut hadien ba ka ioh ban klun bad pynsah bad pyndap lut da ki nongwei kibym dei ki nong Assam ha ki jaka khappud kan sa shong ban iakren halor ka issue khappud.Ka jaidbynriew jong ngi ka donkam ia ka jingithuhpaw bad ngi donkam ruh ban pyrkhat janai halor kine kiei kiei baroh bad ym tang ban pyrkhat hynrei ban pyrshang ban leh eiei ruh halor kine ki bynta. Kam dei shuh ka por ia ngi ban ia kdew kti iwei ia iwei, hynrei ban pynleit jingmut kumno ban trei shitom bad pynsgewthuh ia iwei pa iwei khnang ba ngi lah ban iohi ia ka jingsynshar  kaba don ia ka jingkitkhlieh ia ka ban pynurlong ia ki jingeh kaba ka ri bad ka jaidbynriew jong ngi ka mad.Kaba sngewtynnad ban pyrkhat shaphang ka jingsynshar laitluid ne jingsynshar paidbah ka ba U Blei U la ai ha ngi kum ka ri bad ka jaidbynriew ka long ba, ka bor ka shong ha ngi ki paidbah, ngi ki paidbah ngi shim ia ka rai ia ka ban pynbha ne pynjot ia la ka jaidbynriew na kawei por sha kawei por. Ka jaidbynriew jong ngi ka la iohi shibun bad ka dang ap khmih lynti ia ki nongialam kiba lah ban iaid ryngkat ban pynurlong ia ka jingthrang jong ki.Khadduh khadwai ka histori kaba kumno ngin pynsah bad ngin ai ia ka lawei kaban dang wan? Hato kin iaroh ne kin tim ia ka jingleh jong ngi?
title: Ka jingiada kaba khraw na ka bynta ka jaidbynriew jong ngi

content: -B.M.LanongHa ka sngi 1st October 2019, haba la pynbna ha ophis SDO Sohra, ba u Balajied Synrem ruh ula long uba biang ban ialeh napdeng 6 ngut ki nongialeh ha kane ka ilekshon shiteng samoi na ka 26-Shella Constituency, kaba don haduh 29542 ngut ki paid nongthep vote, nga la kren da kaba sngew thikna lypa ha ka jingialang ha ing jong u ha Sohra, ba u don ka daw ban jop beit namar kine ki daw harum bad namar u kpa jong u, nuima u la don-ka-kupar (Donkupar) hynrei une te u la dei lypa u Balajied  (The chosen one).Ki 3 tylli ki daw ba u Balajied un jop ki long:-jaw ummat tang kiba longdoh longsnam, Balei kiba shah sympat pat 31 snem lynter kidei ki sniang seh???
title: Ki 3 tylli ki daw ba u Balajied un jop beit

content: Shillong: U bah Shembhalang  u  dei na ka shnong Mawlong  bad u la pyndep ia ka jingpule na Saint Anthony College.Haba ia kren bad ki lad pathai khubor u bah Shembhalang u la ong “Nga la don ha ka seng BJP naduh u snem 2017 bad na ka liang ka BJP kan ym sei ia u kyrtong ban ia leh ia kane ka elekshon, kumta nga la rai ban ialeh ia kane ka elekshon kum u kyrtong shimet ban shim ia ka jingkit khlieh ban kyntiew ia kane ka thain namar  la don 30 snem mynta ba ka konstituensy kam shem la ioh ia kano kano ka kam pynroi ha ka thain jong ngi”.U bah Shembhalang u la ong “Mynta  la 30 snem u MLA barim u Dr Donkupar Roy (bam kwai ha dwar u Blei) ym shem   la wanrah ia kano kano ka jingkiew ha kine ki thain”.U bah Shembhalang u la pynpaw mynta kaba donkam tam ha kine ki thain ka long ka surok namar ka surok ka long ka budlum jong ka roi ka par, hynrei  ka skim North Eastern Council (NEC) ka ba  47  ban shna surok na Mawsmai sha Shella ka la shu long leh noh ei lut” .U la ong ruh ba lada u ioh ia ka jingjop um trei shitom ban wanrah ia ka lad ban seng kam na ka bynta ki samla bad ki long kmie ha kine ki thain.U la ong ruh ba lada u ioh ia ka jingjop um trei shitom ban wanrah ia ka lad ban seng kam na ka bynta ki samla bad ki long kmie ha kine ki thain.Ha ba u jubab ia ka jingkylli halor ban ialeh ban pynlong  District ia ka sohra u  la ong “ban wan rah ia ka District khlem ka roi ka par ha ki thain kan long leh noh ei kan shu long tang kum ba un shu don tang u mawnongrim hynrei ka roi ka par bad ka jingai jingiarap ia ki samla bad ki long kmie ban ieh hala ki jong ki kjat ka long ka ba donkam bad kaba kham donkam mynta ka long ka surok ka ba ki thain shatei ki donkam eh ngan wan rah lada nga jop.”
title: U bah Shembhalang L Khain  u kyrtong shimet, u ban ia khun ia ka  election shiteng samoi na shella konstituensi

content: Shillong: Ka kynhun United Progressive Front (UPF) kaba don ka PDF 4 ngut ki MLA, ka NCP 1 bad MLA shimet bah Lambor Malngiang, ka la kiew ka jingbun briew sha ka 7 ngut hadien ba u MLA ba marwei ka KHNAM u bah Adelbert Nongrum, u la pyniasoh bad kane ka kynhun mynta ka sngi.Ha ka kyrwoh ba la thoh sha u chairman ka UPF, u bah Adelbert u la ong ba u la rai ban pyniasoh bad kane ka kynhun UPF lada ka mynjur ban rah ban pynsngew kawei ka sur ban pynbor ia ka sorkar ban thaw da ka Committee ban bishar ia ka State Reservation Policy bad kiwei ki kam ban sa wanrah na ka bynta ka roi ka par ka jylla.Ka UPF la thaw da ka kynhun kaba la iohi kum ka jingpyrshang ban khang lad ia ka UDP ban leh khlieh ha kane ka sorkar bad kala mih hadien ba la khlad kyndit noh u Dr Donkupar Roy dang shen.Ka UPF ka don ka PDF ba don 4 ngut ki MLA, ka NCP 1, 1 MLA shimet bad sa u bah Adelbert.
title: Iasoh UPF U bah Adelbert, kiew jingbun MLA sha ka 7ngut

content: B.M.LanongNga ruh nga dum ka buit-ka stad, haba ka Seng Congress kaba la don bynta ban shalai ia kata ka dulir aiti, Instrument of Accession (IOA), hapdeng ki khlieh Nongsynshar Hima Khasi bad ka Sorkar India (1947-48) bad ki la pynsah kumjuh shi lynter,  mynta ynda ki la kut ka bynta synshar, ki khyllie stong kylla ynda la palat 70 snem bad don ruh kiba iakyrshan la ka kyrshan. Bun kibym sngewthuh ia kane.Tip i Kong Ampareen Lyngdoh MLA i mut aiu namar i wanrah syndon da ka mat-iatai  (resolution) ha Assembly ban pynrung mynta ia kata ka dulir aiti sha ka Sorkar (Instrument of Accession-IOA ) bad ka Dulir Pynsnoh (Annexed Agreement) hapoh ka Art.371 jong ka Constitution of India, kumba ioh rung ka Mizoram, Nagaland Goa, Andhra bad kiwei ki jylla.Ki jingbatai jong i ruh kim long kiba biang kumba paw ha ki kot khubor, namar kine ki jnit-ki jnat kiba don ha ka Constitution, wat hapdeng ki nongiasaid ain batbit ruh ki ju don ka por, ba ki iapher jingmut, haduh ban da rai kut da ka Kashari bahalor tam. Kan bha lada i Kong Ampareen in kham pynshai ban kham sngewthuh i mut aiu.Kata ka Art. 371, ka ong kumne – “special provisions with respect to the States …..” (ki jingmang kyrpang ha kaba iadei bad ki jylla…..)Tang ban shu ai nuksa lyngkot, kata ka Art 371 (E) ia ka Andhra ka ong kumne- ‘Ka Dorbar Parliament kan thaw ain ban ai University ha jylla Andhra Pradesh.’Ka Art 371 (I) ia ka Goa ka ong kumne:- ‘Ka dorbar thawain ka jylla Goa, kan don 30 ngut ki dkhot.’Ka Art 371 (G) ia ka Mizoram pat ka ong- ‘Kano –kano ka ain jong ka Parliament kan ym ktah ia ki kam mane Blei ha Mizoram; kumjuh ruh ia ki riti-dustur jong ki; ne ia ki kam synshar-khadar ne ia ki kam ain bishar, kiba peit bad pynbeit da ki riti-dustur jong ki, ne ia ki kam khyndew-shyiap jong ki.Ba ka dorbar thaw ain ka Mizoram kam dei ban duna ia ka 40 ngut ki nongmihkhmat MLA. Kum kine ki iasyriem ia ka Nagaland ruh, Sikkim ruh.Ka Meghalaya ruh ka don lut kum kitei ki hok bad ki jingiada kyrpang hapoh ka Constitution hi, wat la kam don hapoh kata ka Art 371.Kine ki long kita ki jingkyllain kiba nga kdew haneng, ia kaba hap ban sngewthuh janai tang da ki riew shemphang jong kine ki jait kam, kiba ki ain bad ki kyndon ki long kiba kyllain bha, hynrei ki don pat ki jingiapher, ia kiba ki riew paidbah ki shem shitom ban sngewthuh. Kumta kam long ban ia kren paidbah ia kine ki jait kam, namar kin shu kulmar jingmut kai.Na ki 29 tylli ki jylla bad 7 tylli ki Union Territory ha India, tang 11 tylli ki jylla kiba don hapoh katei ka Art 371. Hato kiwei ki State kim don jingiada?Ka jylla Meghlaya jong ngi ka don ki University, kynthup ia ka Central University, NEHU. Ka dorbar thawain ruh ka don 60 ngut ki dkhot, sa ki District Council bad ki hok pura ia ki riti dustur, ka khyndew ka shyiap, ka mane Blei bad baroh ki jingdonkam, kynthup ia bun ki bynta jong kata ka I0A por phareng bad kiwei ki jnit ki jnat. Ia kine baroh la kynthup hapoh ka Constitution jong ka ri India, kumba la ong haneng.Dei halor kine ki daw ba ka Dorbar Meghalaya ka dei hok ban kyntait ia kane ka resolution dum- bakyllain.Ngi dei ruh bann tip ba ha ri India, ym don shuh kita ki Hima bad ki Syiem Hindu ne Muslim. Hynrei ha ri Khasi, ngi dang don. Ki Syiem jong ngi ki don ka bor Synshar (Executive), ka bor Bishar ain (Judicial) bad ki ain riti-dustur pyniaid Hima-Sima (Legislative). Kum ban kdew nuksa, ki iew syiem ruh ki don ha kylleng. Ka Iewduh ba pawnam ka don hapoh u Syiem Mylliem.Khyndiat halor ka IOA, nga la thoh ha ka kot jong nga (Ka Bynrap Bahynriew-6th Schedule). Ki 25 ngut ki khlieh nongsynshar Hima jong ngi ki la iasoi bad aiti ialade ban iasnoh (accede) bad ka Sorkar India. Ym tang kata, ki la soi ruh ba ka Sorkar kan thaw ia kino-kino ki ain na ka bynta jong ki.Kata ka Annexed Agreement (Dulir Pynsnoh) ka kdew tang ia 3 tylli ki mat, kiba ki Hima kin don bynta lang bad ka Sorkar ban peit, ka Excise (kam kiad), Forest (kam khlaw) bad Land and water rights (ki hok halor ka khyndew bad ka um ka wah.)Kato ka Standstill Agreement pat (ka dulir sahteng sah) ka la kut naduh kitei ki por, namar la kynthup ha ka Dulir Pynsnoh. Kumta ka lynti ban khyllie biang mynta ka la kut bad ym don jingmut shuh, namar la dep pynrung ia ki lad jingiada ba la kdew haneng.I Kong Ampareen bad kiwei kin sngewbha ban pynshai ia kane ka bynta kwah khyllie biang, namar lada ki long kiba don jingmut, lah ban ia ai kti lang.Hynrei nga la dep pynshai ha ki Khlieh Nongsynshar, ba kane ka bynta ka la dep, kaba sah ka long tang ban sah kynmaw bad pynkynmaw lada mih ki kam kiba don jingiadei (historical references only).
title: Ka Seng Shalai I0A, ka Kwah Art 371

content: 35 ngut ki briew ki la iap ei bad saw ngut ki mynsaw, haba kawei ka bos, ka kylla ha ka Jylla Madinah jong ka Saudi Arabia, ong ka khubor.Kitei kiba shong ha katei ka bos, ki dei ki nong Asia bad ki nong Arab.Ka jingjia ka dei ha ka surok Hijra, kaba jngai 170 Kilometre na Madinah, ha kaba katei ka bos, kaba kit ia 39 ngut ki briew, ka ia tyngkhuh bad kawei ka kali kit mar, ha ka por 7baje hynnin ka miet bad ka bos ka la kem ding na ka jing ia tyngkhuh.
title: Kem ding ka bos, iap 35ngut ha Saudi Arabia

content: Ki pulit, ki la lah ban pyllait im ia 500ngut ki khynnah shynrang bad ki rangbah ruh, na ka skul Muslim kaba lai bad kitei ki dei kiba la shah teh kynjri nar, ki la shah bom shah tied ha ki nong pyniaid jong katei ka skul, ong ka khubor jong ka Daily Mail.Katei ka dei ka jingkhynra, kaba ha Katsina, kaba don shatei jong ka  Nigeria, ha kaba la leit khynra ha ka sngi balang bad lyngba ka jinglap kaba hynnin ka sngi, ki la poi baroh sha ka 1 hajar ngut, ba la ioh ban pyllait im.Kham mynshwa, la lah ban pyllait im ia ki 300ngut ki briew, na kawei ka skul, ha kaba kitei ki la shah shoh, shah teh kynjri bad shah bat bor da ki bun bun phew sien.Kitei kiba leit ha kitei ki skul, la iathuh ba ki leit da ka jingmut ban nang ban pule ia ka Koran bad kawei na kitei ka dei ka skul ha Daura, kaba don shatei ka Katsina.
title: Pyllait im ki pulit ka Nigeria, ia 500ngut, kiba shah teh kynjri ha ka skul Muslim

content: Ki la don palat ia ka saw lak ngut ki Muslim ha Assam, kiba la dep miss call ban long dkhot sha ka seng BJP bad katei ka long, ha ki lai bnai ba ladep bad katei ka pyni, ba ka jingrung seng sha ka seng BJP, kan dei kawei na kiba kiew bha ha Assam bad kitei ki long, na ki ar lak ngut, kiba la pyniasoh ialade sha katei ka seng, naduh u snem 2015 bad katei ka pyni, ba ki don 13 percent na ka jingdon jong ki 47lak ngut kiba la pyn iasoh ialade sha ka seng BJP.La iathuh ba ha shwa jong u snem 2015, ki Muslim, kim shym la leit pyniasoh ialade sha ka seng BJP, hynrei hadien jong katei ka snem, ki la nang kiew bha ha kine ki sngi, ong U Vijay Gupta, Vice President ka seng BJP.Ha u snem 2011, ka jingdon ki Muslim ha Assam, ka long  34.22 per cent lane kaba long  10,680,000 ngut ki nongshong shnong, na baroh kiba don  3.12 klur.La iathuh ba ka jingbeh jong ki Muslim, ban pyniasoh sha ka seng BJP, ka long halor ka nongrim jong U Narendra Modi, myntri rangbah duh, ha kaba u ju pyndonkam da ki kyntien “sabka saath, sabka vikas”.Lah ban pynkynmaw ba ha U Nailar ba ladep, ka National Register of Citizens ha Assam, ka kyntait ia ki 19lak ngut ki nongshong shnong, ha kaba la shim ba katei ka jingleh, ka dei kaba la thew khnang ia ki Muslim.
title: Palat 4lak ngut ki Muslim, kiba pyn iasoh BJP ha Assam

content: Shillong:  Hynnin ka ngi, ki shipai BSF, ki la ioh bat ia U Bhola Sangma (68), uba na ka shnong Anandopur, kaba don ha Sunamganj District jong ka Bangladesh, na Rajai jong ka Gumaghat jong ka East Khasi Hills.Ha ka jing talasi, ki shipai BSF, ki la lap ia 53 tylli ki kot ar hajar kiba shu thaw thok bad kiba shongdor T.1,06,000. U Sangma, u la sop bha ia kitei ki pisa bad u thep ia ki hapoh patlun poh jongu. La ioh ruh na u ia ka mobile phone bad ar tylli ki Sim Card, ong ka khubor. Ki BSF, ki la aiti ia utei u nongkhaii thok sha ki pulit jong ka Ranikor, na ka bynta ba kin tohkit bniah halor ka kam jongu lem bad kiwei kiba don bynta lang ha katei ka kam khaii tuh.
title: Kurup pisa thok ki BSF, haduh T.1lak

content: Bah Francis SyiemliehHaba ong ‘Ka Niam’ kamut ka rukom      jingim ba manla kasngi (way of life)      jong u briew (u jingthaw) da kaba u pynsngewbha îala u Blei (u Nongthaw). Da kane ngi sngewthuh ba, ‘Niam’ kamut ruh ka riti ka dustur ne ka Kolshor jong ka jingîadei hapdeng jong u briew bad u Blei.Kane kam dei ka kolshor kaba lathaw da u briew ban pynsngewbha îala u para briew hynrei kadei kolshor kaba la îathaw lang da u Blei bad u briew (Covenant) ban pynsngewbha îa u Blei, khnang ba u briew pat ha ka pyrthei un îoh îa ki jingkyrkhu-blei, kum îa ka ‘Divine Providence’bad kiwei kiwei ki jingaiei, kiba u briew u donkam, khnang ba un nym kylla long u mrad lane u mraw jong u ksuidtan, bad ba ka mynsiem jong-u kan nym shah shop shapoh dujok ding akher kasngi.Lada phin wad îa ka internet phin lap ba kidon shibun bah ki jingsaidnia (arguments) shaphang jong ka niam ban batai îa ka jingmut jongka kamut aîu. Hynrei bun na kitei ki jingsaidnia kim dei kiba mih na ki briew kiba biang ka jingîatiplem (conscience) bad ka jingsngewthuh (understanding). Bun naki kidei ki riewleh menleh khrawpyrkhat (pseudo or wannabe intellectuals) bad kiba kum kine ki briew kidon ha Rikhasi ruh. Bun ruh kidei ki suri kup snieh langbrot, pyrshah tang îa ka Niam Kristan hi marwei (wolves in sheep skin, against Christianity alone).Îa ka kyntien ‘Christianity’ la krap lang da artylli ki noun, kawei kadei ka Common noun ‘Christian’ kaba thew îa u/ka briew bad kawei pat kadei ka Abstract noun ‘-ity’ban pynpura îaka sha ka kyntien ‘Christianity’ ban mut ka jingleh jingkam jong u/ka briew. Kumta ‘Christianity’ kamut u briew (u Kristan) bad ka jingleh jingkam jong-u ban pynsngewbha îa u Blei.
title: ‘Christianity’ ka dei ka niam Blei

content: Shillong:  U myntri rangbah ka jylla u Conrad K Sangma u la ong ba ka sorkar kam don kano kano ka jingthmu ban shimti ban pyniaid ia ka kali 108 kumba la dawa da ki nongtrei.“Ka sorkar ka la rai naduh mynshwa ban ailad ia ka kompeni shimet ban pyniaid ia ka. Kam dei ka sorkar ba kam lah ban pyniaid da lade hynrei ngi dei ban shim ia ka rai kaba kham husiar,”, la ong u  Conrad.Halor ka jingkynthoh ba lada ka sorkar ka lah ban pynlut 8 klur shi snem ban pynlut ia ka kam shakri ki kali 108, u Conrad u la ong ba kam pat iakren eiei halor kane.“Kam long kaba dei ia ka sorkar ba kan tuklar ia ka GVK EMRI halor ka jingeh jong ki nongtrei kiba iakhih hynrei ka dei ka kamram ka kompeni bad ki nongtrei ban iapynbeit ia kane ka jingeh”, la ong u Conrad.U Myntri Rangbah u la ong ba ka sorkar ka pyrshang ban iakren ia ki bor pyniaid ka GVK EMRI bad ki nongtrei ba kin ai ia ka jingai jingmut jongki ban pynbeit ia kane ka jingeh.U Conrad u la kyrpad ia ki nongtrei ban iapynbeit noh ia ka jingeh bad ka bor pyniaid ka GVK EMRI namar ba ka ktah jur ia ki paidbah.Lah ban kdew ba ki nongtrei ka 108 hapoh ka lama ka Meghalaya EMRI Workers Union kila pynlong ia ka jingiakhih ba khlem pud naduh ka 30 tarik u Nailur ba la dep.
title: Ka sorkar kam don jingmut ban  pyniaid hi ia ka kali 108, ong u Conrad

content: Shillong:  Myn hynnin ka sngi, u Symbud Myntri Rangbah ka jylla u Bah Prestone Tynsong u la hiar sha shnong Mawkliaw bad Nongjri ban ialap elekshon na ka bynta u kyrtong ka UDP u Bah Balajiedkupar Synrem bad u la kyntu ia ki paidbah ban jied ia u Bah Balajiedkupar Synrem kum u MLA bathymmai jong ka Shella Constituency.Haba kren ha kitei ki jingialang, u Bah Prestone uba dei ruh u National Vice President ka NPP u la ong, ka NPP ka burom ia u (L) Dr Donkupar Roy namar u la maitphang ha kaban thaw iaka sorkar Meghalaya Democratic Alliance (MDA), bad ka NPP kum ka dak jong ka jingburom ia u Dr Donkupar, kala shim iaka rai ban ym pynieng kyrtong ha Shella Constituency hynrei kan ai jingkyrshan pura ia u UDP khnang ba u khun jong u Dr Donkupar yn jop iaka elekshon.U la ong, ki paidbah ki la jied ia u Dr Donkupar kum u MLA jongki hynrei une u nongialam ula khlad noh, kumta u la kyrpad ia ki paidbah ban ailad ia u khun jongu, u Bah Balajiedkupar Synrem ba yn mih pli ban long kum u MLA jongki ba yn pyndep iaka samoi treikam jong u kpa jongu bad ban pyndep ruh ia ki kam kiba la maitphang da u Dr Donkupar Roy.Na ka liang ki nongialam ka UDP bad u kyrtong ka UDP u Bah Balajiedkupar, haba kren ha kitei ki jingialang, kila pynpaw iaka jingsngewnguh ia ki nongialam ka NPP bad HSPDP kiba la ai jingkyrshan pura bad ialap elekshon kyrpang, ban pynthikna ba u kyrtong ka UDP yn jop iaka elekshon shiteng samoi na Shella bad kane ka jingjop kan nang pynkhlain shuh shuh iaka sorkar MDA kaba la ialam da ka NPP.Ha kitei ki jingialang la ioh iaka jingkren na u President ka UDP u Bah Metbah Lyngdoh, ki Myntri Sorkar na ka seng UDP kiba kynthup ia u Bah Lahkmen Rymbui bad u Bah Kyrmen Shylla bad la iadonlang u CEM ka KHADC u Bah Teinwell Dkhar, u MLA ka UDP na Ranikor u Bah Pius Marwein bad kiwei kiwei.
title: Hiar ialap elekshon u bah Prestone  bad ki UDP, sha Nongjri Mawkliaw

content: Shillong:   U Executive Director ka National Bee Board, New Delhi, u B L Sarswat hynnin ka sngi ula iakynduh ia ki nongri ngap ka East Khasi Hills District ha Seminar Hall ka Directorate of Agriculture, Shillong ba la don lang u K N Kumar u Chairman ka Meghalaya Farmers’ Empowerment Commission bad ki ophisar ka tnad rep ka jylla.Kane ka jingiakynduh ka long ban pule bniah ia ka jinglong jingman ka kam ri ngap ha kane ka jylla bad ruh ban iarap ia ki nongri ngap da kaba seng iaka Integrated Bee Development Centre (IBDC) ban lut T.10 klur ban bei pisa na ka tnad Tribal Affairs.Haba kren ha kane ka sngi, u B L Sarswat u la ong ba ka Meghalaya ka don kyrhai ka spah ban ri ngap hynrei ka donkam ban ai ka jinghikai ia ki nongri ngap katkum ka jingstad ka juk mynta khnang ban kyntiew ia ka kam jongki.Katba u K N Kumar u la iathuh ba ka jingpyntreikam ia ka Apiculture Mission ha ka jylla, ka la kyntiew ia ka kam ri ngap.Haduh mynta ki don 7000 ngut ki nongri ngap ha kane ka jylla bad ka la don ka jingdawa um ngap kaba shyrkhei na ka jylla Meghalaya.U la ong ba ka Meghalaya kan dei ka jylla ba nyngkong ha kane ka dong mihngi ban ioh ia ka IDBC.
title: Yn buh noh da ka IBDC ba 10  klur ban kyntiew ia kam ri ngap

content: Shillong:  Ki dkhot barim kiba la wan pyndem ka seng HNLC kila la thaw ia ka seng kaba kyrteng ka Tyllilang Welfare Organisation (TWO) ha ka jingialang kaba long ha ka 19 tarik Nailar 2019.Ia ka kam Adviser la bynshet ha u bah Cherishterfield Thangkhiew, president Kynsai Manik Jyrwa, Vice President Mayborn Rapthap, General secretary Ronning M Dohling, Finance secretary Itjanai Soanes, Organising secretary Elbin Lyngdoh Nonglait bad Publicity Secretary Donlang Kharkulia, nalor 13 ngut ki Executive member.
title: Thaw seng ki dkhot barim ka HNLC

content: Jowai:  Yn plie bad kyrkhu ia ka Joseph Nardini Seminary, ka Jowai Diocese, ka persara jong ki khynnah shynrang kiba pyrshang ban long Lyngdohñiam kaba don ha Ummulong, Parish Ummulong ha kane ka 3 tarik u Naiweng 2019, ha kaba ïa kane ka ïingshong ïingsah jong ki khynnah Seminary yn wan plie da u ma Vincent H Pala M.P bad yn kyrkhu da ka Umkhuid Umkyntang ïa kane ka ïing da u Most. Rev Victor Lyngdoh DD, Bishop ka Jylla Niam Jowai.Ka jinglehñiam plie bad kyrkhu ïa kane ka Seminary yn sdang ha ka por 10 baje mynstep bad 10.30 AM ka jingkñia Mass Iukharist ka ban lamkjmat da u Most.Rev. Victor Lyngdoh ha ryngkat ki Lyngdohsohblei ki ban wan na ki 18 Parish jong ka Diocese Jowai bad na kiwei de ki Diocese kiba marjan  ka Diocese Jowai.Ha ka jingplie bad kyrkhu ïa kane ka Seminary na ka liang u Most. Rev Bishop Victor Lyngdoh, Bishop ka Jylla ñiam Jowai, u ong  ban pynlong ïa kane ka sngi kaba iphuh iphieng ban ïaroh sngewnguh  ïa ka jingkhu kyrdoh jong u Blei ha kaba la lah ban tei ïa kane ka ïing Seminary kaba heh bad kaba itynnat bad ha ka juh ka por kum ka jingai mynsiem bad pynshlur ïa ki khun samla jong ka Balang kiba don ha kane ka Seminary ba kin nangsngew ïa ka sur ka jingkhot jong u Blei ban shakri ïa U bad ïala ki para briew u khot u wer ïa ki paidkhristan jong ka Jylla ñiam Jowai bad na kiwei de ki  Parish jong kiwei de ki Jylla ïiam ban ia wan shongshit sha kane ka jingplie bad kyrkhu ïa kane ka Seminary kaba don ha Ummulong, ka Parish Ummulong.La ong ruh ba ha kane ka sngi ha ka por shibaje nohphai sngi yn don ka jingmane Sakrament (Eucharistic adoration) nangta bud sa ka Cultural Programe da ki jingshad, ki jingrwai tynrai kiba la pynkhreh janai bha da ki nongïashim bynta ha kane ka Cultural programe. Ka jinglehñiam kan long ha Mynshem ïingskul jong ka Little Flower Higher Seconday School, ka jingpynkhreh ka la nangïaid shait shait ban pynlong ïa kane ka sngi kaba iphuh iphieng ong u Phadar Augustine Lamin, Rector ka Joseph Nardini Seminary Ummulong.
title: 3 tarik u Naiweng yn plie bad kyrkhu  ïa ka Joseph Nardini Seminary

content: Shillong:   Ka kur Wahlang ka la pynlong ia ka Dorbar Bah kaba XIII jong ka ha District Library, Nongpoh, Ri-Bhoi District.Ha kane ka dorbar baroh ki kur kiba najan bad kiba najngai ki la ia wan ban ia shim bynta ha kane ka dorbar kaba shisien shisnem, ha kaba ia ka Dorbar la pyniaid da U Rev. H.F. Wahlang bad kumjuh u la pdiang burom ia ki Kur kiba la pyllait por ban wan shane kane ka Dorbar.Na ka liang jong ka Seng Kur, ka la don ruh ka jingpynsngew ia ki jingtrei kam jong ka haba kaba bun ki mat lyngba ka snem 1918-19 bad kumjuh ia ka report na U Treasurer, Education Secretary bad na U General Secretary jong ka Seng Kur halor ki mat treikam.Ha kane ka sngi la ioh ia ka jingkren na u President jong ka Seng kur, u Rangbah R.O. Wahlang, IFS(Rtd) bad u la sneng la kraw ia ki para Kur kiba poi sha kane ka jingialang.Ka la don ruh ka jingai khusnam ia ki samla na ka kur kiba la pass bha ha ki exams ha une u snem.Na ka liang jong ka Dorbar Kur Wahlang ka la pynmih katto katne ki rai jong ka Dorbar bad kita ki long ba ka Kur Wahlang ka kyrshan ia ka jinglong kawei jong ka Kur bad ka jaitbynriew Hynniewtrep-Hynniewskum bad kam kyrshan ia ki jingpyrshang ban wanrah ia ka jingsngewpher halor ka jingngeit bad jingmane Blei, ka shongkha shongman, ne ha ki jaka shong, ne ha ka rukom kren ia ka ktien Khasi.Ka kyrshan ia ki jingpyrshang ban pynriewspah ia ka ktien Khasi, bad ban pynioh ia ka jingithuh hapoh ka Riti Synshar jong ka Ri.Ka kyrshan ia ka jingpynneh pynsah ia ki riti ki dustur jong ka jaitbynriew, khamtam eh ia ka TIP KUR, TIP KHA, kaba long ka thymmei jong ka jaitbynriew.Ka Seng Kur Wahlang ka pynsngew ha ki bor synshar-khaddar ba ki dei ban bud ia ki riti-dustur Khasi bad ban don ka jingiaphylliew jingmut shuwa ban shim ia kino kino ki rai, ne thaw ia ki ain  ki ban ktah bad pynkylla ia ki riti-dustur kiba ju don ha ka jaitbynriew naduh mynhyndai.Ka Kur Wahlang ka pyrshah ia kino kino ki jingpynkylla ia kane ka thymmei shim jait/khein jait na ka kmie kiba lah ban mih namar ka jingkylla niam ne jingpdiang ia kita kiba  ka ain ka kdew kum ka “Personal Law”.Ka kyrshan ruh ia ka jingpyrshang ban buh beit buh ryntih ia ki rit-dustur da ki jingthoh jingtar bad da ka Ain, kat kum ka jingdawa ka por. Ka la pynpaw ruh ia ka jingsngewkhia halor ka jinglong jong ka imlang-sahlang jong kane ka juk mynta, ha kaba ki jingsniew ba har rukom ki jur bha ha kine ki sngi.Namarkata ka kyntu ia ki para samla ba kin kiar na ki jingsniew kiba ap ban pynthohbria ia ka longrynieng bad ka khot ban pynshlur ia ki samla ban kiar hordit hordang na ki jingsniew bad ban iabeh shaphrang ban long ki nongjop ha ka pule ka dangle ban pynkhraw ialade ia ka Kur bad ia ka jaitbynriew.Kumjuh ruh ka la pynpaw ia ka jingdiaw bad jingsngewkhia halor ka jingwan rung kyrthep ki bar jylla sha ka ri baieid jong ngi.
title: Pyrshah pynkylla thymmei shim jait ka Kur Wahlang

content: Shillong:  Ha ka 11tarik Risaw 2019, ka seng The Ultimate Legend biker association Sohryngkham Unit, ka la pynlong ia ka jingialang ba shisngi, ban iakren  halor ka phang ban pynneh mariang,  ha kaba lah ia wan ia shim bynta ki skul ba pher pher na shnong bad na marjan shnong.Ka jingthmu jong kane ka prokram, ka long kumno ban iada ia ka mariang na ka jingpynjot jong u khun bynriew.La ioh jing kren na u president ka seng, u Samla Kyrshanlang Nongbri, ha kaba ula iathuh  ba kane ka jingthmu jong ka seng ka long kumno ban pynneh pynsah bad ban sumar ia ka mariang khnang ba ka mariang ka lah pat ban sumar ia u briew ka jing kylla  ka mariang haba kaba shit ka lah ban shit eh bad khriat ka lah ban khriat eh.Ka jingthmu jong kane ka jingialang, ka long ban ktik ia ki jing mut jingpyrkhat jong ki khynnah kumno pat ban sumar ia ka mariang.Ha kane ka juh ka sngi la ioh ban sam syndon ia ki khusnam, ia ki nongjop ha ki secondary bad upper primary, ong ka kyrwoh na U Bah   Malcolm Kharpran, Secretary.
title: Jingialang pynneh mariang ka TULBA

content: Shillong:  Ka Meghalaya kala shah rem da hynriew wicket ha ka Chandigarh ha ka jingiakhun kaba khyndai bad kaba kut artad ka Vijay Hazare Trophy ka plate group myn hynnin ka sngi ha Dehra Dun.Ka Chandigarh kaba jop ia ka kynting pisa, kala ap ktem da kaba ailad shwa ia ka Meghalaya kaba la lah ban tied tang 184/8 ha ka 50 overs.Ki nongialehkai ka Meghalaya u Swarajeet Das (9) bad u Wallam Lyngdoh Kynshi ki kamai 45 run ha ka wicket ba nyngkong ha kaba u Kynshi bad u Amiangshu Sen kila hap noh ha ka 27 run bad u Punit Bisht (6) bad Ravi Teja (21). U Sanjay Yadav u kamai  61 run na ki 63 ball.
title: Liem ka Meghalaya ha ka Chandigarh  ha ka Vijay Hazare

content: Shillong: Ka second semi final kaba la long hapdeng ka Mookbu sc pyrshah ia ka Kyortyrkhang sc ha mini stadium Khliehtyrshi ka long kaba ia jwat hi thoi namar baroh arliang kitei ki kynhun ki long kiba khlain bad biang bor.Ha ka kylla step ka jingialehkai ym don satia ba ioh ban pynkhih jar, kawei ruh ka dei namar ka jingbom palat u slap kaba la pynlong ia ka madan ban dap um. Kumta haduh ba kut ka kylla step ka jingialeh ka long 0 la 0.Hynrei mar ia sdang ka kylla miet pat tang kumba katto kattne por ka Mookbu  ka la khyrniom tyngeh ia ka Kyortyrkhang bad pynsma bun tylli ki ball. Bad dei ha ka minit kaba 70 da ka jingbat ka um ia ka bol ka Mookbu khlem pynsepei  u Shem War u la pyndei tiak bad ka bol ka la rung shapoh jar.Wat la ka jing ialeh kaba mar ia khyrwit phewse ka jingpyrshang ka Kyortyrkhang kam lah ban sei soh. Kumta lyngba katei ka shi kol na u Shem ka Mookbu ka la biang pura ban ia ai reng sha ka final pyrshah ia ka Nongkhroh kfc kaba la ap lupa ban iakhun ha ka 23 tarik mynta u bnai ha ka por 1baje nohphai sngi.
title: Rung final sa ka Mookbu SC ha ka TSA League 2019

content: Shillong: U myntri rangbah ka jylla u Conrad K Sangma ha ba iakren bad ki lad pathai khubor halor ki jingdawa ia ka Inner Line Permit (ILP) mynta ka sngi u la iathuh ba ka kamram ka ba hakhmat eh  jong ka sorkar ka long ban iada ia ki trai Jylla, kane ka dei ka kam kaba ha khmat eh jong ka sorkar.Na ka  liang jong u myntri rangbah u la ong  “Ka ILP ka dei tang kawei na ki bynta jong ka ain, hynrei ki don bun kiwei ki lad ki lynti kumno ban iada ia ki trai jylla,Ka sorkar kan iada ia la ki jong ki briew, ka sorkar ka long kaba la kloi ban ia kren bad ia mir jingmut  halor kane ka bynta bad ha dien ka jingiamir jingmut ka sorkar kan shim ia ka rai ia mynta ym lah ban ong lano hynrei ha dien ba la kut ka ilekshon shiteng samoi bad ka jinglehniam Diwali kin sa ia kren bha ia kane ka bynta.”U myntri rangbah u la ong ruh ba  ka sorkar mynshuwa, ka la shim ia kawei na ki lad ban iada da kaba wanrah ia ka Meghalaya Residence Safety and Security Act, kane ruh ka long kawei na ki lad ki ba ka sorkar ka la shim, ka jingiamir jingmut ha kaba ia dei bad kane ka bynta ka dang bteng da kaba ia kren ruh bad baroh ki seng sain pyrthei kiba don ha ka jylla.I L PKA SORKAR MYNSHWA KAM SNGEWTHUH IA KA JINGKWAH KI PAIDBAH MYNTA RUH KA SORKAR KAM SNGEWTHUH TE  YMTIP SHUH IANO  NGIN JIED BAROH KI PARTY KI JUH
title: Ka kamram kaba ha khmat eh  jong ka sorkar ka long ban iada ia ki trai Jylla: Conrad K Sangma

content: Shillong: Ka “Select Committee”  hapoh ka jingpyniaid jong u myntri rangbah u Conrad K Sangma, kum u Chairman  mynta ka sngi ki la khot ia ka jingialang ban ia kren halor ka jingthung ia ki dkhot jong ka “Search Committee” ban jied ia ki dkhot  jong ka Lokayokta.U Myntri rangbah ka jylla U Conrad k Sangma haba kren ha ki lad pathai khubor ha dien ka jingialang, u iathuh ba mynta ka sngi la thaw ia ka “Search Committee” ha kaba la jied hynriew ngut ki dkhot ba kin wad ia ki briew bad ai jingmut sha ka sorkar ban thung ia ki kum ki dkhot jong ka Lokayata.Na ka liang jong u myntri rangbah um shym la iathuh katno por la ai lad ai kane ka “Search Committee” ba kan phah ia ki kyrteng sha ka sorkar na ka bynta ban thung ia ki dkhot, hynrei u la iathuh ba kane kam dei ka kam kaba suk, namar hap ban peit iaki briew kiba dei na ka iing bishar.Ka sorkar ka la dep ban wan rah ia ka jingpynkylla ha ka Lokyaokta ha kaba ka sorkar ka la thung ia u Chairman ha ka snem kaba la dep bad kane kala lah ban trei kam, hynrei mynta ka la thaw ia “Search Committee” ban thung ia ki dkhot hapoh jong ka Lokayokta.Na ka liang jong u nongialam ka liang pyrshah, u Dr Mukul Sangma u la iathuh ba ha kane ka jingialang kaba la long mynta ka sngi, u la ong ba balei ka sorkar ka la pynslem haduh shisnem ban thung ia ki dkhot jong ka Lokaykota.La iathuh ba ia ka Lokakya Act ha u snem 2014 bad katkum kane ka ain, ka long ban peit ia ki jingshah kynnoh bamsap wat ia ka ophis jong u mytnri rangbah ka jylla bad kiwei kiwei, kumba la paw ha ki lad pathai khubor halor ka jingkynnoh bamsap kaba la sdang tohkit ha GHADC ruh kumjuh.
title: Thaw U Conrad da ka komiti, ban wad ia ki dkhot jong ka Lokayukta

content: Shillong:Mynta ka sngi u EM Incharge jong ka tnad Trade u bah Paul Lyngdoh u la pynshai  ia ka jing pynmih ia ka jing pynbna paidbah  ka ba la mih ha ka 4 tarik u Risaw 2019 lyngba ka tnad jong ka trade ha  kaba  ka la buh ia ki kyndon pyntrei ka ia ka rukom khaii  pateng ka ba ia dei ha ka die madan (street hawking).Na ka liang u bah Paul u la maham ruh ia ki trai jylla, kiba ju kam ne kiba ju  leh  benami ia ki dukan jong ki bar jylla da kaba ong “Kita ki la ki tih liewlep lupa ia lade, namar mynta ka kynti na ka liang ka Council, ki la pynkhreh bha ban tehlakam ia kum ki ne ki briew namar ngi don la ka jong  ka ain ban pyntikna bha ban teh ban khum ia ki trai shnong ki ba shah pyndon kam  ha kine ki bar jylla ban  wanrah da ki khasi ban phah shong ne ban  phah leh benami ia ki khaiii pateng jong ki. Ngin trei ha kata ka rukom  ba shisien ba ngi la lah ban weng ia ki kin ym don kino kino kiwei pat ki ban lah buh ia kiwei ki wei ki briew ki ban phah shong ne  ban phah leh benami”.Na ka liang u bah Paul Lyngdoh ha ba ia kren bad ki nong pathai khubor ha ophis trei kam jong u ha KHADC u la ong “Ngi ladep ban pule bha ia ki act 1954 bad act 1959 ia kaba ngi la pynbha shuh shuh, ngi lap ba kane ka dei kawei ka jingkhaii ka ba ym shym la don nongpeit ne pynjari ne pyntrei kam ia ki ain ha ki nongkhaii ha madan dei na kane ka daw ba ki bar jylla (non tribal) ki la nang shim kabu ha ka ba ki la tur sha ki jaka jong ki paid bah ha ki jaka iaid kjat, ki kyndong kynshrot jong ki surok, bad ha ki jaka iaid ki paidbah.U la ong ruh ba la lap ba kane ka dei kawei na ki jait jingkhaii, kaba ki dei ban ioh ia ka lisen lyngba ka tnad trade, hynrei ka jing bym trei kam jong ka ain ha kine ki snem ba la dep ka la wanrah ia ka jing ioh lad jong ki bar jylla ban khaii laitlan ha kaba ka la buh ia ki jingeh ia ki paidbah ha ka jing ia dei ha ka jingshngain, ha ka iaid ka ieng, ha kaba ki briew kim don jaka shuh wat ban iaid ban ieng ha ki lynti. Ka wan rah jingma ruh ia ka  koit ka khia ha ka ba ki la shu die madan ia ki  jingbam ha ka rukom bym ikhuid suba.“Haba ngi iohi ba la don ka ain ba ki dei ban ioh ia ka lisen na ka council, hynrei ha ka jing bymtrei kam ia kata ka ain ka long  noh shiliang bad ka pynkhia noh ia ki jing kit tang ia kito ki ba don dukan kiba ha ka ba ki hap pan ia ki laisen ki hap ban pynthymmai  ia ki laisen man u bnai bad ki hap wanrah ia ka bai siew wai ha ki  trai dukan, ki hap wan rah ia ki NOC na ki  shnong kat ba kane kawei pat ka kynhun jong ki nongshongdie  madan ki trei kam khlem da bud ia ki no kino ki kyndon ain jong ka KHADC bad kane ka wan rah ia kajing jyllei u bar jylla u ba die madan ha duh ba la poi ka pud  ba ki lynti iaid paidbah ki ladap da ki briew ba die madan ha ba ka ain ka don kam dei ban don tang ha ki kot sada.Kane ka  jingthmu ngi la pynmih ia kane ka jing pynbna paidbah (notice)”u la bynrapHalor ka jingdon jong  ki 7 ngut ki trai shnong ki ba la leit ban ujor pyrshah ia kane ka jing pynbna paidbah ba la pynmih da ka tnad Trade jong ka KHADC ha ka High Court jong ka jylla Meghalaya u bah Paul u la iathuh ban a ka liang ka High Court  Meghalaya ka la ai ia ka jingbishar ka ba bha “Ha ka ba ka la  la kylli kylla ia kine ki briew ba ha kano ka rukom phi wan sha kane ka court ha ba kane ka jingbthah kam ktah eiei ia phi bad phi pyllut por kai ia ka por jong ka court ha ka ba phi wan rah ia ka mat ka bym don jing mut eiei bad ka ne ka order ka la dain kuna ruh mar 5000 tyngka  uwei uwei”.“Na ka liang ka tnad Trade  ngi la dep pynmih ia ki jingpynbna paidbah phim dei ban ong ba ngim tip kam dei shuh ka daw ba ka council ka khlem ai lad ban pynbiang ia ki kot ki sla bad ka council ka la shu niom ia ki jaka khaii jong ngi ngi la pynmih ia ki jingpynbna paidbah” u la ong .“Ka kamram jong ka council mynta ngi la dep ia ka kam  ba nyngkong ha ka ba ai ia ka jing pynbna paidbah (public notice), ka ba ar ka dei ban kine ki bar jylla (nontribal) ki ba die jingdie ha madan ha ki lynti  ki dei ban burom ia ka jing pynbna (notice) jong ngi bad ban pan (apply) lyngba ki lynti jong ka ain  ia ki lisen jong ki bad ka rai ka ba khadduh ka dei hi jong ka district council hadien ba ka ladep ban bishar bniah ia ki kot ki sla jong ki, la ki biang ne em ban ioh laisen bad kino ki no  ki ba iaid lait ia kane ka ain ngi la pynkhreh ba kin kynduh ia ki jing pynsaja ki dei ban siew kuna lane ki ki don ki lynti jong ka ain ki ban khang pyrshah ia kine ki rukom khaii ki ban isaitmet ha ka por mynta.
title: Kiba leit ban kam ei ia ki khaii ne kiba leh benami ia ki dukan jong ki bar jylla kamut,  ki tih liewlep lypa ia lade:Paul Lyngdoh

content: Shillong: La iathuh ba  la pyndep ia ka autopsy, ia ka met iap jong U Archbishop Dominic Jala bad lyngba ka jing pyndep ia katei ka autopsy, la khmih lynti, ba yn lah ban wan rah noh mar mar ia ka met jongu sha Shillong.Ia ka met jong U Archbishop, la kynriah ia ka jaka buh met iap ha ha Mc Nary Moore Funeral Home kaba don ha Colusa Country Coroner bad ki bor pyniaid jong ka Indian Consulate ha San Francisco, ki dang pynbeit lut nadong shadong, na ka bynta ban kit ia ka met sha Shillong, katba kum ka jingtip, ba la sam da U Phadar  Michael Makri, Director (operations) ka Don Bosco Media Network, Shillong mynta ka sngi.Ha kawei pat ka khubor, la iathuh ba U Phadar Richard M Majaw, Secretary, ka Shillong Archidocesan Education Society, ka la thoh sha U Director School Education and Literacy, jong ka sorkar Jylla, ha kaba la iathuh ba ha ka sngi tep ia U Archbishop, ki skul Katholik ha East Khasi Hills bad Ri Bhoi District kin khan glut na ka bynta shisngi.La iathuh shuh shuh ba U Ma Vincent H Pala, MP jong ka Shillong, u don mynta ha America, ban iarap lang na ka bynta ban wan rah noh ia ka met jong U Bishop sha Shillong.Haba iakren bad ki katto katne ki lad pathai khubor, U Ma Pala, u iathuh ba mar ia ioh ia ka met iap, kin aiti sha ka kompeni kaba leh ia katei ka kam bad katei kan bah khlieh ban pynpoi beit ia ka met na California sha Guwahati, ha ka Sngi Hat Majai ne Sngi Balang bad ba ka met kan mih ha ka sngi saitjain na America.
title: La pyndep  ia ka autopsy ia ka met U Archbishop, lah ban poi Shillong ha ka Sngi Balang

content: Shillong: Mynta ka sngi, ka Khasi Students’ Union (KSU) Narpuh Circle hapoh ka jingialam u bah KS Suchiang President, u S. Bamon General Secretary, ha ryngkat ki trai khyndew ba na Huroi kiba shah ktah bad shah pynjulor ki jingthung ha ka jingpyntrei ia u surok bad Indo Bangla Border Fencing da ka National Border Construction Company (NBCC), ki la ia kynduh ia U Deputy Commissioner, East Jaintia hills, ha kaba ki la iakren halor ka jingkyntait katei ka company ban siew ia ka bai luksan (Compensation)sha kitei ki trai jaka ba julor ki jingthung jingtep ha ka jingpyntrei ia katei ka project.Haba ia kynduh mynta ka sngi, u DC u la ong ba ia kitei ki jaka ba julor la dep ban siew sha ki trai jaka naduh u snem 2012 bad ia katei ka jingsiew jingtda la leh da ka ophis u DC West Jaińtia naduh katei ka por, kito ki jaka ba hap hapoh Lahaleiñ.Haba kylli pat kine ki trai jaka ba dawa na ka por sha ka por ia ka hok kim pat ioh satia ka jingsiew wat shi anna ruh, u DC u la ong ba katkum ka jingtip ha ka jingiadei bad katei ka jingsiew la dep pynbna (Notification) shwa ban siew, u ong ruh ioh lehse ba la shim kiba ha ing ha sem jongki. U ong ruh ba katei ka company kam lah ban siew arsien ia ka juh ka jaka, kumta kim donhok ban pynthut ne pynsangeh ia ka jingtrei bad u ong ruh ba lada ki leh kumta yn phah shipai ban pynshitom ia ki. Ki trai khyndew pat ki la ong ba kim tip shaei ka company bad ka ophis u DC ka siew ia katei ka pisa.Ha kajuh ka por ka seng ka la ai ha u DC ia ka kopi, ba la thoh sha u Member Secretary Meghalaya State Pollution Board halor ka jingpyrshah ka seng ia ka jingpan jingbit ka Star Cement Ltd ban pyniar (Expand) ia ka jingkhlong mawshun ha Brichyrnot. Haba pynpaw ia ka jingpyrshah, u DC u la ong ka jingpynsngew paidbah kan iaid beit kumba la dep pynbna, hynrei ka shong ha u paidbah ka rai la ki kyrshan ne kyntait.Haba pynpaw ia ka jingpyrshah, ka seng ka ong, ba kim pyrshah ia ka roi ka par ne kata ka development, hynrei namar ki shem ba katei ka jaka ban khlong mawshun kaba heh haduh 42.051 hectare ha Brichyrnot ka don marjan bad ka Wah Lukha bad Wah Lunar bad ki ong ba kaei ka ban jia ia kitei ki wah lada ioh lad katei ka company ban tih mawshun. Haba ia kren ia kane, u DC u la kubur da kaba ong ba ka mariang shisha ka la jot sha kito ki thaiñ  bad u la ong ruh ha ka jingshisha ka Brichyrnot kam dei ban ai jingbit haba pan katei ka company. U DC u la ong ruh ba ka kam jong ka ophis jong u ka long tang ban pyniaid (Conduct) ia ka jingialang pynsngew paidbah (Public Hearing). Ha katei ka jingiakynduh ia u DC, la iadon lang ki dkhot KSU JHDU, u bah C. Suja GS bad u bah Shaniahskhem Dkhar Asst. Fin. Secy KSU JHDU.
title: Halor ka bai jaka sainar shiah bad pyrshah Brichynrot, ujor ka KSU Narpuh sha U DC

content: Shillong: Ka tnat Meteorological Department jong ka sorkar India, ka maham ba ha ki 24 kynta ban wan, ka mariang ha Shillong, kan long kaba dum lyoh bad kan don ka jinghap slap bad ka jingtied pyrthat ruh.La maham ruh ba ha kiwei ki bynta jong ka Jylla, kan don ka jingmeh leilieh bad ka jingtied pyrthat.Ka suin bneng ha ki 24 kynta ba ladep, ha Shillong, ka long 22.4 kaba shit duh bad 13.9 kaba khriat duh bad ka don ka jinghap slap bniop bniop. Ha Sohra ka long 24.7 la 17.0 bad u slap u long 0.0 mm, katba ha Umiam ka long 27.9 lane 17.6 bad ka jinghap slap ka long 2.6 mm.
title: Yn meh leilieh bad tied pyrthat ha ki 24 kynta ban wan ha ka Jylla

content: Ha ka jingtyllun ka sha lyntem jong ka por ban bud dien ia ka mynnor, to ngin ia pynher ia ki jingmut jingpyrkhat jong ngi ban kynmaw burom ia ki kynrem ki lyndan jong kito ki mynsiem shlur kiba la pha ia la ka jong ka jingim na ka bynta ka ri.Ka 21 tarik u Risaw, ka dei ka sngi kaba ngi kynmaw kyrpang ia ki matti bad nongmuna jong kito ki pulit riewshlur jong ka ri kiba la kyllon iap ba ngin ioh ka shong suk shong sain ha la ka ri.Ka jylla jong ngi bad baroh kawei ka ri hi ka rakhie ia kane ka sngi kum ka “Police Martyrs’ Day” lane “Police Commemoration Day” ha kum kane ka sngi ngi ju pynlong kyrpang ka jingia lum lang jong baroh ki tnat pulit lyngba ki nongmihkhmat jong ki ban sakhi ia ka prokram bakhraw tam ha National Police Memorial ba juh pynlong ha Chanakyapuri, New Delhi, dei hangne kein ba ia ka nam bad burom jong kine ki reiwshlur ba la kyllon bad pha ia la ka jingim ban pyllait ia ngi na ki tyrsim jong ki nongshun kiba ialeh pyrshah ia ka ri da kaba pyrshang ban pynthud ia ka shong suk shong sain ha ka ri. Dei ha kane ka nongrim jong u bud lum jong ka ri ba ngi kynmaw kum ha kane ka sngi ia kine ki riewshlur kynthei bad shynrang.Naduh ba ioh ia ka jylla jong ngi ha ka 21 tarik u kyllalyngkot 1972, ki riewshlur ba la shah pynkhmati ban bat ia kam shong suk ka shong sain ha ka jylla jong ngi, la don haduh 127 ngut kum ki riewshlur ba ka jylla ka la sakhi ba ki la pha ia la ka jingim ban iada ia ka jylla bad ka ri na ka jingwan lynshop jong ki bor ki bathmu ban pyntlor bad synjor ia ka im suk im sain kat kum kariti ka dustur ba la bynshet lyngba ka constitution jong ka ri India jong ngi. Dei lyngba jong kine kein ki riewshlur ka ri ba ngi lah ban ring mynsiem bad ban iaid pawing sawdong ka ri khlem jingshah teh kynjri.Ha kum kane ka sngi ba ngi kynmaw tympang ia ki riewshlur jong ngi, ai ba ki khun kynthei-shynrang ka ri kin bsut ha ki ia ka mynsiem ieid ri da ka ba ki leit phai sha ka mynnor ki sngi ban ring ia ki nuksa jong ki riew shlur ka ri haba kin thang ka sharak jong ka jingieid ri shakiwei pat ki para ri ha ka jingim ba man la ka sngi, ban peit pyrman ia ka shong suk shong sain ka ri khnang ba ka lawei ka ri ka nnang khlain nang shait ban rat-dieng khong naduh ki phngiat ia ki nongshun ka ri, khnang ba ka ri kan im kan roi bad ka jingsuk-jingkmen kan synshar ha ngi.Ka sorkar India lyngba ki tnat trei kam bapher-bapher jongka, ka lah ithuh ia bun kiba kum kine ki riewshlur ka ri da ka ba pynkup burom ia ki da ki khusnam bap her bap her kum ka dak ka jingithuh ia u synniang u bynhei bad kita ki long kum ka Ashoka Chakra, Ka Kirti Chakra, ka Police Medal for Gallantry, Ka Meghalaya Governors’ Medal bad bun kiwei pat ki kynja khusnam ban kynmaw pyrto ia ki kam bad kyrteng jong ki.Ha ka“Police Martyrs’Day” lane “Police Commemoration Day”, to ngin ia ai burom bad pyrto ia ka nam jong kine ki riewshlur jong ka Ri bad ka Jylla jong ngi, namar ba ki lah pha ia la ka jingim na ka bynta ka shong suk shong sain ha la ka Ri.“Im ka Kyrteng sah ka nam”Dy. Inspector General of Police (A),Meghalaya, Shillong.
title: KA POLICE COMMEMORATION DAY 2019

content: AIS Suja“Nga iohi ia u soitan ba u hap na bneng”. kane kam dei ka jingiohi jong u Nongthoh, hynrei ka jingiohi jong u Jisu ba u soitan u hap na bneng katba u dang ia kren bad ki 70 ngut ki synran jong u ban leit ialap kata ka por. Loukas 10:18.U Jisu haba u ong kumne, kam mut ba u iohi ba u soitan u hap ha kata hi ka por, hynrei u la iohi lypa ia ka por kaba yn sa hap sha kane ka pyrthei ba ka la jan. U Jisu u ong – Nga la iohi ia u soitan ba u hap kum ka leilieh na bneng”. Ka mut ba ka jinghap u soitan kam dei na bneng kaba Lai (Third) ka jaka shong u Blei, namar u Blei u la beh noh ia u na ka Bneng ba Lai ka jaka shong u Blei mynba u dang don ka kyrteng ba la tip kum u Lucifer.Dei haba u Blei u la beh noh ia u Lucifer na ka bneng kaba Lai, u leit shong noh ha ka jaka bneng (Heavenly realm) ba la tip kum ka bneng ba ar. Bad ha kane ka bneng kaba ar la kynthup nyngkong ki jaka hajan ki khlur (Astral plane) nangta ka Hive level ne ka jaka shong ki ksuid bad kaba lai ka jaka shong u soitan (Lucifer) (Kingdom level) ka hima ne jaka u soitan. Kumta lada ka don ka bneng kaba Lai (Third Heaven) 2 Korinth 12:2. Te ka don ruh ka bneng kaba Ar ka jaka shong u soitan Lucifer, bad ka don ruh ka bneng kaba Nyngkong ba ngi khot ka suinbneng (firmament).Ia u Lucifer la beh noh na bneng ba lai sha ka jaka bneng ba ar, na ka daw ka pop ka jingsarong (Pride) bad ba u kwah ruh ban long kum u Blei. Isaiah 14:13-15. Haba la beh ia u, u la kylla long u ksuid bad u soitan, u nongshun jong u briew bad u nongialeh pyrshah ia u Blei.
title: “Nga iohi, u soitan u hap na bneng!”

content: Shillong:  Ki nongialam ka seng sain pyrthei NPP bad HSPDP ryngkat bad ki nongialam bahakhmat jong ka UDP, myn hynnin ka sngi, kila leit ialap elekshon ha shnong Wahkaliar, Laitduh bad Shella ban kyntu ia ki paidbah ban ai jingkyrshan pura ia u kyrtong ka UDP u Bah Balajiedkupar Synrem ha ka elekshon shiteng samoi na Shella Constituency.Na ka liang ka seng NPP la wan ialap elekshon da u Ma Sniawbhalang Dhar uba long ruh u Myntri Sorkar uba khmih iaka tnad Transport, Community & Rural Development bad kiwei kiwei, u Chief Executive Member ka JHADC u Ma Thombor Shiwat bad ki MDC ka NPP, katba na ka liang ka seng HSPDP la wan ialap elekshon da u President bahakhliehduh u Bah KP Pangniang bad u Bah Samlin Malngiang uba long ruh u Myntri Sorkar uba khmih iaka tnad PHE bad kiwei kiwei.Katba ki nongialam ka UDP la ialap elekshon da u u Chief Executive Member ka KHADC u Bah Teinwell Dkhar u ba dei ruh u MDC ka Shella Constituency bad u Working President ka UDP u Bah Titosstarwell Chyne uba long ruh u MDC ka Sohra bad ki nongialam UDP jong ka Shella Constituency.U Ma Sniawbhalang Dhar, haba kren ha kitei ki jingialang u la ong, ba ka jingiadei ka UDP bad ka NPP ka long kum u Kpa bad ka Kmie bad ialade shimet hi u shim ba u (L) Dr Donkupar Roy u long kum u kpa jong u bad u la kyntu ia ki paidbah ha kitei ki jingialang ba kin kyrshan bad ban pynjop don burom ia u Bah Balajied ha katei ka elekshon kaban long ha ka 21 tarik mynta u bnai.Katba u Ma Thombor Shiwat, u la ong ba watla u nongmihkhmat bad u CEM na rilum Jaintia, hynrei ka jingwan ka jongu shapoh Shella Constituency ban ialap elekshon kadei namar ba u burom bha ia u Dr Donkupar Roy namar ba ym dei tang u nongialam jong ka thain Shella hynrei u dei u nongialam jong ka jylla baroh kawei bad ula kyntu ia ki paidbah ba kidei ban ailad ia u khun jong u Dr Donkupar u Balajiedkupar Synrem ban mihkhmat iaka Shella.U la ong, ka seng NPP baroh kawei ka ai ka iatreilang kaba pura ia ka seng UDP ban pynthikna ba u kyrtong u ba ka pynieng yn jop iaka elekshon shiteng samoi.Katba ki nongialam ka HSPDP kiba kynthup ia u Bah KP Pangniang bad u Bah Samlin Malngiang, ki la ong ba u Dr Donkupar u dei u nongialam uba la thaw ia ka kynhun Regional Democratic Alliance (RDA) bad u la long hakhmat eh ruh ban thaw iaka sorkar Meghalaya Democratic Alliance (MDA) bad ka HSPDP kum ka jingburom ia une u nongialam ba radbah uba la khlad noh, kan ai jingkyrshan pura ban pynskhem iaka jingiadei lok bad kan ialap elekshon ban pynthikna ba u khun jong u Dr Donkupar yn jop ia ka elekshon na Shella.
title: Hiar u CEM ka JHADC, HSPDP  ban ialap elekshon ia u kyrtong UDP

content: Rampur: Hynnin ka sngi, U Azam Khan, uba dei u nongialam ba rangbah jong ka seng Samajwadi Party bad u MP ka Lok Sabbha, ula iam rangbah ha ka jingialang elekshon shiteng samoi, namar ba ula shah kynnoh, ba u dei u nongtuh blang bad u nongtuh syiar.“Nga la shah pynngat ha ka ain  IPC 307 (kaba dei ka jingthmu ban pyniap briew). Ka jinglong jingim jongnga, ka la shah ktah shaba palat bad ka jingkynnoh ba nga tuh syiar bad tuh blang, ka la ktah jubor ianga” bad u ong shuh shuh “Ah ko Blei, balei phim pyniap ianga, haba phi lap ba nga tuh syiar bad tuh blang?”Utei u heh jong ka Samajwadi Party, u ong ba u hap ban siew da ka dor kaba rem, namar ba um ju leh niewbein ia u paidlang ka  Rampur. “Kane ka leit jia, namar ba ngam ju die ia phi ne ialade ruh”, ong U Khan.U Khan, ha ka 5tarik Risaw 2019, ula shah khot hajir ha ka    Special Investigation Team (SIT), halor ka jingkynnoh shim jaka tuh, da ki bor pyniaid jong ka  Mohammad Ali Jauhar University.Ha katei ka elekshon shiteng samoi, ha Rampur, ka   Samajwadi Party, ka pyn ialeh da ka Tazeen Fatima, ka tnga jong U  Azam Khan bad la pynlong ia katei ka elekshon sha ka dorbar Jylla, hadien ba U Azam Khan, ula shah jied ialade ban leit mihkhmat sha Lok Sabbha.
title: Iam rangbah U Azam Khan, haba kanbas paidbah, ba u shah kynnoh ba dei u nongtuh syiar, tuh blang

content: Shillong:  Ha ka 12 tarik u Risaw 2019, ka shnong Amlanai hapoh ka jingialam jong u Waheh shnong bathymmai jong kane ka shnong ,u Ma Jembis Khongiong uba la shah pynskhem da u Daloi myn ha ka 18 tarik u September ka la ioh ban lum ban lang ia baroh ki dkhot ka shnong kiba la kynjoh 18 snem shaneng, kynthup ia ki kynthei bad shynrang sha ka jingialang paitbah jong kane ka shnong, kiba don baroh 220ngut.Ka kyrwoh khubor ka iathuh ba ha kane ka jingialang, ki paitbah ka shnong ki la ioh ka jingpynshai halor ki skhem jong ka PHE kumjuh ruh ki la ioh ka jinghikai kumno ban leh khuid leh suba ha ki sawdong sawkun jong ka shnong hi baroh kawei, namar ka jingleh khuid ka long hadien ia ka jinglong Blei bad ka long ka bynta kaba kongsan jong ki paitbah jong ka jylla bad ka ri hi baroh kawei, kumba la shimkhia da u Myntri Rangbahduh ka ri u Shri Narendra Modi.Kumta ha kane ka jingialang u nongialam u la kyntu ia baroh ki dkhot ka shnong ban shim khia ia ka jingleh khuid leh suba khnang ba kan long ka jingkhiah krat ia ki dkhot ka shnong baroh kawei bad kan ai ruh ka lawei kaba kmen.
title: Lum lang ia  ki nongshong shnong Amlanai

content: Ki shipai Border Guard Bangladesh(BGB), ki la siat iap hynnin ka sngi, ia uwei u shipai BSF bad ki la pyn mynsaw sa ia uwei pat bad ka daw, ka long hadien ba ki shipai BGB, ki la ioh kem ia uwei u nongtong dohkha. Katei ka jingjia, ka la jia ha West Bengal.La iathuh ba ki don lai ngut, kiba la ioh kem bad la pyllait noh ia ar ngut. Hadien kata, ka la don ka jingiakren hapdeng ki shipai BSF bad ki BGB bad ha ka jingiakren ki BGB, kim shym la pyllait ia utei u nongtong dohkha, hynrei ki la ker kut ia ki BSF. “Hadien ba ki iohi ia ki dak jingma, ki shipai BSF, ki phai dien noh na katei ka jaka bad ha katei ka por, ki BGB, ki siat ia kitei ki shipai BSF, ong ka khubor.
title: Siat iap ki shipai BGB ia uwei u shipai BSF

content: Shillong:  U nongialam ka NPP uba long ruh u myntri rangbah ka jylla u  Conrad K Sangma myn hynnin ka sngi ula hiar sha shnong  Itchamati kaba hap ha Shella  konstitwensi ban ialap elekshon ia u kyrtong ka UDP u bah Balajiedkupar Synrem.Ha kane ka jingialap elekshon ha Ichamati, u Conrad u la kyntu ia ki paidbah nongshong shnong ban ai ka jingkyrshan ia u kyrtong ka UDP. U la ong ba  ka NPP ka la rai ban ai ka jingkyrshan ia u kyrtong ka UDP ban burom ia u nongialam u Dr Donkupar Roy uba la khlad noh, uba dei ruh u nongsain dur ia ka sorkar Meghalaya Democratic Alliance (MDA).U Conrad u la ong ba u bah Balajiedkupar Synrem u dei uba la biang ka jingstad bad u don ka thong ban trei na ka bynta ki paidbah.”U bah Balajiedkupar u la iohi ia ki kam jong u kpa jong u, bad u la don bynta ruh ha ka sain pyrthei bad u kpa. Ka jingjop jong u kan pynthikna ban kyntiew ia ka thain bad ki kam pynroi”, la ong u Conrad.“U bah Balajiedkupar u la sngew khia ia ka thain bad u kwah ban trei ban kyntiew ia ka thain bad nga ap ban ioh iatreilang bad u khnang ban pyndep ia ki jingangnud u kpa jong u”, la ong u Conrad.U Conrad u la ong ba kane ka sorkar ka kut jingmut ban wanrah ia ka roi ka par kaba ia baroh bad kyrmen ba u bah Balajiedkupar un lah ban trei kham bha bad kane ka sorkar.Ka jingjied ia u MLA thymmai ka Shella kan long ha ka 21 tarik mynta u bnai bad ka jingpynbna kan long ha ka 24 tarik.
title: Hiar ialap elekshon u Conrad  sha Ichamati, ia u kyrtong ka UDP

content: Nongstoiñ:  Ka jingkhih win ban pyrshah ia ka jingdon jong ki karkhana sain dewiong ha Shahlang kala nang iaid bteng haduh kine ki sngi bad la sakhi ruh ba nalor ki sengbhalang mynta sa ki nongialam shnong jong ki shnong bapher bapher ki la ia pyrshah halor ka jingdon jong kitei ki karkhana sain dewiong ha ki bynta bapher bapher jong ka thain Shahlang.Hadien ka jingleit ujor jong ka JAC kaba kynthup ia ki 8 tylli ki Sengbhalang ka thain Mawshynrut sha u DC ka West Khasi Hills, pyrshah ia ki karkhana sain dewiong ha Shahalang mynta na ka liang jong ki nongialam shnong jong ki 8 tylli ki shnong ka thain Shahlang ruh kila pynkhreh bad thmu ban leit ujor sha u DC pyrshah ia kitei ki karkhana sain dewiong.Katkum ka tyllong khubor bala ioh lum da u nongthoh khubor la ong ba ka jingpynkhreh jong ki nongialam shnong jong kitei ki 8 tylli ki shnong ka thain Shahalng kiba kynthup ia ka shnong Doranggre, Khymering, Mawbon Agal, Songsak, Mabon Chittu, Nengchigre, Mawbon Riangna bad Nadonme ban leit ujor sha u DC ka West Khasi Hills, pyrshah ia kitei ki karkhana kadei ruh hadien ba ki la ioh pdiang ia ka jingpyntip na u DC ba lada ki shnong ki don ka jingsngew pyrshah ia ka jingdon jong kitei ki karkhana ki lah ban wan ujor sha u DC da ka jingthoh hapoh 30 sngi naduh bala pynmih ia ka jingpyntip.Shuh shuh ka tyllong khubor ka iathuh ruh ba kitei ki nongialam shnong jong kitei ki 8 shnong ki la pynpaw ruh ba ka jingdon jong kitei ki karkhana saiñ dewiong ha ka thaiñ Shahlang khamtam hapoh ka shnong Nonglampar kaba dei ka khyndew jong ka kur Sohbar bad kumjuh ha khyndew jong ka kur Nongrum kan sa ktah ia ka mariang bad kumjuh ia ki paidbah nongshong shnong katei ka thaiñ.Ym tang katta ki nongialam shnong jong kitei ki 8 tylli kin sa leit ban iakynduh ia u Dc na ka bynta ban ujor bad dawa pynkynriah noh ia kitei ki karkhana sha jngai na kitei ki shnong namar ka jingdon jong kitei ki karkhana ka pynmih ia ki tdem jakhlia khlem ki jingiada kiba biang, ka jingpynmih bad pyntuid jaboh na kitei ki karkhana khlem ki lad jingiada kan sa ktah ym tang ia ki briew hynrei wat ia ki jingthung jingtep ki um ki wah bad kumjuh ia ki jingthaw ba im baroh.Shuh shuh ki la ong ruh la ong ruh ba ka jingkhlia kaba mih na kitei ki karkhana kala pynthut bad ktah ruh ia ki khynnah skul jong ki skul kiba don ha kitei ki shnong kum ka skul Doranggre UP bad LP School, ka Khymering LP School, St. Paul’s Dorangngre bad ka Mawbon Agal UP bad LP School, nangta ia ki wah kum ka Wah Leleng, wah Rengjong bad wah Simareng kiba dei ruh ki wah ba ju pyndonkam da ki paidbah nongshong shnong jong kitei ki shnong.Halor kitei ki mat na kaliang jong ki tei ki nongialam shnong ki la ong ruh ba shen na kaliang jong ki kin sa leit ban aiti ruh ia ka jingthoh sha u DC jong ka West Khasi Hills, ba u dei ban shim khia mardor.
title: Nang jur ka jingpyrshah ia ka jingdon ki  karkhana sain dewiong ha ka thain Shalang

content: Nongpoh:  Ka ophis u District Mission Coordinator, SSA Umling Block Resource Centre, Ri Bhoi, myn hynnin ka sngi, ka la pynlong ia ka prokram kaba kyrpang, kaba la tip kum ka Awareness Campaign on Beti Bachao Beti Padhao, ia kaba ki la pynlong hapoh ka skul Raid Nongbri Presbyterian Secondary School kaba don ha Umsawnongbri ha Ri Bhoi.La sakhi ia katei ka prokram da ka jingdon u Bah Mayraldborn Syiem, MLA ka Nongpoh, U Bah V. S Nongbet, DSEO ha Ri Bhoi, ka Kong A.R Rani, ka Kong S. Lyngdoh, kiba dei ki briew kiba la pynshai halor ka hok ia ki khynnah, ki Rangbah shnong, ki nonghikai, ki khynnah skul na shiphew ki skul kiba don ha katei ka thain lem bad kiwei kiwei.Lyngba jong katei ka prokram, na ka liang ka Kong A.R Rani lem bad ka Kong S. Lyngdoh, ki la ioh ban pynshai halor ka hok jong ki khynnah bad khamtam haba iadei bad ki khun kynthei, namar kumba ka long mynta ka ba kam thombor ia ki khynnah kynthei, ka la nangkiew katba nangmih ki sngi.Haba pynshai halor ka jingshah thombor ia ki khynnah kynthei, kitei kiba la ai jingkren, ki la ong ba katkum ka jingwad jingtip, lap ba bun na kitei ki kam thombor pyrshah ia ki khynnah, la leh da kiba haiing ne ki para marjan bad kaba la kot ruh sha ka 90 persen, hynrei tang katto katne la leh da ki briew kiba nabar ne ki bym ithuh ithaw.Kitei ki nongkren, ki la ai mynsiem ia ki khynnah skul ba lada ki lap lane iakynduh ia kiba kum kitei ki jingjia, kim dei ban buhrieh hynrei, ki dei ban mih shakhmat bad ban ujor sha ki bor ka Ain, khnang ba kito ki nongleh kam sniew kin ioh iala ka jingshah pynsaja.Nalor ka jinghikai sha ki khynnah, kitei ki nongkren, ki la kyntu ruh ia ki kmie ki kpa bad kiba haiing, ba ki dei ban husiar ia ki khun bad ruh ba ki dei ban hikai ia ki, khnang ba kin lait na ki jingsniew baroh.Ha katei ka sngi, la ioh ruh ia ka jingkren na u MLA ka Nongpoh, ha kaba u la pynpaw ia ka jingkmen ban iohi ia ka jingshimkhia da ka ophis u DMC, kaba la pynlong ia katei ka prokram, kaba long ruh ka jingmyntoi kaba khraw ia ki khynnah skul bad khamtam eh ba ki la pynlong ha katei ka jaka, kaba la kham long nongkyndong bad kaba dei ruh ka jaka, kaba bun na ki khynnah kim pat da tip bha ia la ka jong ka hok.Haba iadei bad ki kam thombor pyrshah ia ki kynthei ne ki khyllung khynnah, u Bah Mayraldborn, u la pynpaw lem ia kata ka mynsiem kaba sngewkhia, namar kiba kum kine ki kam thombor ki la nangjyllei bad nangkiew katba nangmih ki sngi, kaba la wanrah ruh ia ka jingshong syier ia ki kynthei bad ki khyllung khynnah.
title: Ha Umsawnongbri pynshai ka ophis u DMC  halor ka hok ki khynnah bad ki khun kynthei

content: Shillong:  Ka sorkar Meghalaya, ka pynbna ba baroh ki ophis sorkar bad ki jaka pule ruh kiba hap ha u pud u sam ka 26 Shella Constituency, kin khang ha ka 21tarik mynta u bnai, na ka daw, ka elekshon shiteng samoi.
title: 21tarik, yn khang ki skul, ophis ha Shella

content: Khliehriat:  Ka Seng Meghalaya  people’s United Front-East Jaintia Hills District (MPUF-EJHD) ha ka jingialam khmat U President jong ka, u Bah Michal Chyrmang   bad u President ka Khliehriat Circle, u Bah Kyrshan Blah bad ryngkat ka jingsynran lang kiwei ki nongialam ka seng, ki la leit thung lane sieh da ka signboard Welcome To Meghalaya ha ka jingkieng shnong Ratacherra East Jaintia Hills District.Ka jingleit buh ka seng da ka Signboard namar ba ka Seng ha ka jing iohi jong ka, kat nang mih ki sngi, ki jaka jong ka Meghalaya ha ki bynta ba don ha khappud bad ka Assam ki don ha pdeng ka jingiakajia na ka wei ka por sha ka wei ka por bad ka Assam ka pyrshang kat ba lah ki bor ki buit  jong ka ban kyntur pud man ki por sha ki bynta ka Meghalaya.
title: Sieh signboard Meghalaya  ka MPUF ha Ratacherra
