content: Shillong:  U myntri ba dei peit ia ka tnad ka koit ka khiah ha ka jylla, u bah Alexander L Hek, u la iathuh ba ha ka sngi saitjain kata ha ka 19 tarik Risaw 2019  un hiar sha Shella ban leit ban ialap eleksion na ka bynta u kyrtong BJP u bah Joshua Warjri u ban iakhun ia kane ka eleksion shiteng samoi.Na ka liang u bah Hek haba ia kren bad ki lad pathai khubor, u la iathuh  ba haba la bun ki kyrtong ka jingialeh kan don beit,  hynrei na ka liang ka BJP ha ka MP elekshon ka la ioh haduh 4000 vote na Shella konstitwensi bad ha ka MLA elekshon ba ladep ruh ka la ioh ha duh 3800 vote bad na ka liang ka BJP ki la don lypa ia ki vote bank;  te na ka liang ki jong ka party BJP ngi kyrmen ba u kyrtong ka BJP lada u la khlain lypa na lade ruh te ngi don jingkyrmen.“Ka BJP mynta ka synshar ia ka ri India hi baroh kawei bad lada ka jylla jong ngi hi ka kwah ba ngin dang kham kiew ha ka ioh ka kot ha ka liang ka roi ka par ngi donkam ban jied ia ka party ka ba synshar ia ka ri India tang kata kan wan rah ia ka jingmyntoi ia baroh kawei ka jylla khamtam ia ka Shella hi”.Na ka liang u bah Hek u la ong “Ynda  nga la leit hi ngan sa tip ba haduh katno ka party jong ngi ka khlain bad kaei ka party ruh ka ba khlain ha kane ka elekshon shiteng samoi”.
title: Lashai ka sngi, yn hiar U bah Hek, ban kanbas elekshon sha Shella

content: Nongpoh:  Ha ka jingiatyngkhuh kali kaba la jia hynnin ka janmiet ha surok Shillong By-Pass kaba hap hapoh ka shnong Mawpun ha Ri Bhoi, la ioh jingtip ba u Nongniah jong kawei ka trok kit Umphniang, u la mynsaw jur hadien ba katei ka kali kaba u niah, ka la leit ban tynrah ia kawei ka Kali kit kali kaba la wan mar pyrshah.Ka jingtip da u nongthohkhubor, la iathuh ba katei ka kali kit kali kaba don ia u number NL-01-AA-7574, ka dei kaba thmu ban leit sha Jowai, katba katei ka trok kit Umphning ka dei kaba don ia u number NL-01-G1154, hynrei haba la poi ha katei ka jaka, ki la iakynduh ia katei ka jingjia kaba sngewsih.Katkum ka jingiathuh da kiba la sakhi ia katei ka jingjia, la ong ba ka jingbakla ka dei ia katei ka trok umphniang, ha kaba ka la iaid na jaka kiwei bad kaba la leit ban tynrah beit ia katei ka kali kit kali kaba la wan mar pyrshah.Haba iadei bad katei ka jingjia, ia utei u nongniah uba la mynsaw jur na katei ka jingaksiden, la pynkit noh mar mar sha ki jaka sumar ha Nongbah Shillong.
title: Mynsaw jur u Draibar naba iatyngkhuh  kali ha surok Shillong By-Pass

content: Shillong:  U myntri u ba dei peit ia ka tnad ka  koit ka khiahu bah Alexander L Hek, u la ong  “Lada don kano kano ka kam ka ba pynwit ha ka jingtrei kam ban ai ia ka jingshakri ia ki paidbah ngin hap ban pynduh pyndam noh ia ka soskular iateh bad ka GVK”.U bah Hek u la ong “Nga la pan ia ki report na ka tnad jong ka koit ka khiah  (Health department) bad kat kum ka report jong ki, ki la iathuh ba ki nongtrei jong ka  EMRI  kim dei ki nongtrei jong ka tnad ka koit ka khiah (health department), ki nongtrei EMRI ki dei ki nongtrei jong ka GVK bad lada ka GVK kam lah ban pyntrei kam bad ka  pynwit ha ka jingshakri ia ki paidbah, ngin hap ban pynduh pyndam noh ia ka soskular kaba ia teh bad ka GVK bad ngin hap ban khot tender  noh da kawei,hynrei kata ruh ngin hap peit  ia ki kyndon ki ba ngi iateh bad ka company GVK”.U la iathuh ruh ba ha kaba iadei bad ki nongtrei, te ngin hap da pyrkhat, namar ba kim dei ki nongtrei jong ngi, namar ka jingsiew ka iaid na EMRI, ka duty ruh ki ai ki EMRI baroh ki  jingkitkhlieh ki dei beit tang bad ka EMRI bad kim don bynta eiei bad ka Sorkar. Ka bynta jong ka sorkar ka long beit ba ka ai contract  bad ka EMRI.”Na ka liang ka sorkar ngi la dep ia ka ba donkam ha kaba ngi la dep pynlong ia ki jingiakren ha ki jing ialang ba ladep, ha kaba ngi la dep aiti ha ka tnad DHSMI bad sha ka DC, hynrei namar ba kim dei ki nongtrei jong ka tnad jobg ngi, ngim don eiei ban ong.Halor ka jingpynjari ia ka ESMA, na ka liang u bah Hek u la ong ba ka dei ka kamram jong ka DC ban pyntrei kam ia ka ESMA pyrshah ia ki nongtrei kat kum kato ka ain.U bah Hek u la kyntait ruh ban shimti noh ia ka jingpyniaid ia ka EMRI da ka ba ong ba ban shimti noh ia ka EMRI te yn ym lah, namar ki bun kylleng sawdong kiba trei, kiba trei hapoh ka tnad ka koit ka khiah kiba shu trei contract ngin ym lah pat ban shim lut ia ki ha ka heath department namar ba ngim don ia ka sanction post.”“Lada ngi shim ia ki EMRI ngim don sanction post shaei ngin thep kam ia ki khlem don ka sanction post, nan sanction post ka dei ban ioh na ka Sorkar bad ngim don sanction post ngi don tang ia ki pisa ban ai contract ia kiwei”. Wat ia ki malaria worker ruh ki ba dei ki ba trei bad hapoh ka tnad ka koit ka khiah ruh ngim lah ban ai kam shuh ia ki, namar ba  ki la kut ka contract ba ai da ka Sorkar pdeng bad ia ki ruh ym don sanction post .
title: Kren biang U bah Hek, halor ka phang  ban pyndam soskular bad ka GVK EMRI

content: Nongpoh:  Ka jingpynsahteng ka sorkar jylla ban pyntrei ne ban pyndep ia ki skul, kaba la tip paidbah kum kita ki Residential School, ka la pynbynniaw shikatdei eh ia kiba bun ki paidbah bad khamtam eh ia ki paidbah kiba sah hajan jong kito ki jaka, kiba ka sorkar jylla ka la sdang ban pyntrei ia kitei ki skul.Na kaei kaba la lap, tang ha Ri Bhoi ki la don haduh lai tylli, kata kawei ha shnong Mawtari Myrdon kaba hap hapoh Umsning Block, ha shnong Nongrim Synjai kaba hap hapoh ka Umling Block bad kawei pat hapoh ka Jirang Block, hynrei ka long pat kaba sngewkhia ban tip ba na kitei ki Lai tylli, baroh ki dang sah khongreng bad khlem da lah ban pyndep lut.Lah ruh ban kdew hangne, ba ia kitei ki Residential School, la sdang ban pyntrei naduh ka por ba ka sorkar Congress ka synshar ia ka jylla, hynrei tad haduh kine ki sngi kaba ka sorkar synroplang hapoh ka jinglamkhmat da ka NPP, ym pat la iohi soh eiei ba kitei ki Residential School kin urlong.Ka long pat kaba sngewphylla, haba wad jingtip ba kiba kum kitei ki skul ki don haduh 20 tylli ha kylleng ki jaka hapoh ka jylla, ia kaba ka sorkar kam pat lah ban pyndep kat haduh kine ki sngi bad kaba la wanrah ruh ia ka jingduhnong kaba khraw ia ki kmie ki kpa jong ki khynnah skul, kiba la ap khmieh lynti ban ioh pynleit skul ia ki khun ki kti, ha kiba kum kitei ki skul.Haba wad jingtip halor ka jingsah khongreng jong kitei ki Residential School, la ioh jingtip ba ia kitei ki skul ka thmu ban tei lyngba ka jingiarap na ka sorkar kmie, ia kaba ka sorkar kmie ka la pynmang pisa kaba T. 55 klur, sha ka tnat pule puthi jong ka sorkar jylla, na ka bynta ban tei ia kitei ki 20 tylli ki skul hapoh ka jylla.Pynban na katei ka T. 55 klur kaba la pynmang da ka sorkar kmie, la ioh ban sei tang T. 25 klur, na ka bynta ban pyntrei ia kitei ki Residential School, hynrei kaba sah nangta ym pat lah ban sei bad kaba la poi kumba 4 lane 5 snem  haduh kine ki sngi.Shuh shuh, la ioh jingtip ruh ba namar ka jingbym dap katei ka T. 55 klur kaba la dep ban pynmang pisa, ka sorkar jylla ka la phah biang da kawei pat ka jingpynmang tyngka kaba thymmai bad kaba la kot sha ka T. 69 klur, na ka bynta ban pyndep lut ia baroh kitei ki skul kiba dang sahteng, hynrei kat haduh mynta ym pat ioh jubab ei ei ruh em.Na ka jingwad jingtip da u Nongthohkhubor, la sngewthuh ba ka dawbah hi kaba la pynlong ia ka jingsahteng jong kitei ki Residential School, ka dei namar ka jingbymler da ki nongialam ka Sorkar jylla, na ka bynta ban pynurlong ia kitei ki skul, kiba ka sorkar kmie hi ka la thmu ban tei haduh 20 tylli ha kylleng ki jaka hapoh ka jylla, kata ha Ri Lum Khasi bad Garo.Haba phai halor ka jinglong jingmang jong ka Residential School kaba la tei ha shnong Mawtari Myrdon, ki paidbah jong katei ka shnong, ki la khnium bha halor ka jingdon jong katei ka Building, namar ka la kylla long pynban ka iing jah bad ka ktem jong ki Awria bad ka jaka rieh jong ki riew shim kabu ha ka por mynmiet myniong.
title: La bun snem khlem lah pynurlong, ia  20 tylli ki Residential School ha ka jylla

content: Shillong:  Ka jingialap elekshon ha Shella ka la lyngngoh pum mynta ha kaba baroh 6 ngut ki kyrtong kila duh thiah duh dem shwa ban poi ka sngi thep ha ka 21 tarik.Haba kren bad u kyrtong ka BJP u bah Joshua Warjri myn hynnin ka sngi, u la kam ba wat la ka jingiakhun kan long baroh 6 ngut hynrei u don ka jingkyrmen.“Ka biang ka lyer, nga don ha ka thong, ngi la don ha lynti ka jingiakhun bad ka shong sa Uba Nalor, ban thoh shun. Ki paidbah ka Shella ki dei ban jied beit da u khun trai namar ba ha Delhi ka sorkar kmie ka dei ka BJP bad kan kham shitom ban leit pan skhim u khunruit”, la ong u bah Joshua.Haduh mynta ym pat don nongialam kiba na seng kmie kiban wan hiar sha Shella ban ialap elekshon ia u kyrtong ka BJP lait noh tang kiba na kane ka jylla kum u bah Sanbor Shullai bad kiwei.“Ki nongialam na jylla kila wan ban ialap elekshon kum bah Sanbor Shullai. Na seng kmie te, ngam pat poi hynrei kam don jingpher bad ngi ki trai iing ngi tip kham bha bad ki briew ki kham kohnguh ia u trai iing ym da kiba nabar. Ka iing ka jong nga ka dei ka konstitwnesi”, la ong u bah Joshua.U bah Joshua u la ong ym lah ban ong badno ka jingiakhun hynrei un iakhun beit bad kiwei ki kyrtong.“Ngam lah ban ong badno ngan iakhun hynrei baroh 6 ngut ngi la iatrei shitom. Ka jingiasam vote Khasi kan long kajuh baroh ki kyrtong hynrei kiwei ki jaitbynriew nga ngeit kin kham noh sha ka BJP”, la kam u bah Joshua.Ha kane ka kynti, ka Shella kan sakhi ia ka jingiakhun jong 6 ngut ki kyrtong ba kynthup ia u bah Joshua Warjri ka BJP, bah Balajiedkupar Synrem ka UDP, bah Batyngshain Laitmon Ryngnga na ka Congress, bah Mosjo Rocfeller Wanswett na ka PDF katba u bah Komen Laitmon bad kong Grace Mary Kharpuri kum ki kyrtong shimet.Ka jingjied kan long ha ka 21 tarik katba ka jingpynba ia uba jop kan long ha ka 24 tarik mynta hi u bnai.
title: Ka biang ka lyer, ngi don jingkyrmen sha ka thong’, kam u kyrtong BJP

content: Nongpoh:  Ha ka phainal jong ka Independence Day Cricket Tournament 2019, ka lympung ialehkai kriket kaba la pynlong da ka Friend Forever Youth Club ha madan Byrnihat, ka Umling-XI Youth Club ka la ioh ban rah ia ka nam lahduh, hadien ba ka la lah ban pynliem noh pyrshah ia ka Byrnihat Amjok Youth Club da 7 Wicket.Haba phai sha katei ka phainal, ka Byrnihat Amjok kaba la jop ia ka Toss bad ka la kam trai ban tied nyngkong, ha kaba ka la lah ban kamai tang 62, da kaba hap lut baroh ki Wiket hapoh ka 14 over.Haba beh ia katei ka thong kaba la buh da ki rangialehkai ka Byrnihat Amjok, ki rangialehkai ka Umling-11, ki la lah ban poi sha katei ka thong tang hapoh ka 11 over, da kaba hap 3 Wicket bad kaba la pynthikna ruh ia ka Umling XI ba kan long kum ka lahduh ha katei ka lympung ialehkai Kriket.La pynkut ia katei ka lympung ialehkai Kriket, da ka jingdon u Bah Bah Rayonald Kharkamni, President ka Ri Bhoi District Cricket Association, kum u kongsan, ha ka jingdonlang u Bah Jeffrey Khymdeit, Secretary ka Ri Bhoi District Cricket Association, u Bah Jeslin Syngkli, Rangbah Shnong ka Byrnihat Proper, u Samla Vigyan Kharkongngor, President ka Friend Forever Youth Club lem bad kiwei ki riew rangbah jong ka thain Byrnihat.Haba kren ha katei ka sngi, u Bah Rayonald Kharkamni, u la pynpaw ia ka jingsngewkmen ban iohi ia ka jingshimkhia da ki nongkitkam ka Friend Forever Youth Club, kiba la shimkhia ban pynlong ia kiba kum kitei ki Lympung ialehkai, kiba long ruh kum shibynta ban nangkyntiew ia ki khun samla kiba don ia ka sap ha ka kam ialehkai kriket bad ka ban sa kyntiew ia ki khun samla ym tang hapoh ka Distrik, hynrei ha ka jylla hi baroh kawei.U la ong ruh, ba ka jingialehkai Kriket, ka dei kawei na ki jait jingialehkai kaba paw bha hapoh ka Ri, namarkata ka donkam ia ki khun samla kiba don ia ka sap ha katei ka jait jingialehkai ba kim dei ban pynsepei, hynrei ki dei ban trei shitom na ka bynta ban ioh mihkhmat na ka Distrik, Jylla bad ha ka Ri.Haba iadei bad ka Kriket ha Ri Bhoi, u Bah Rayonald Kharkamni, u la ong ba ka Ri Bhoi District Cricket Association, ka don ia ka jingangnud kaba khraw na ka bynta ban kyntiew ia ka kam ialehkai kriket hapoh ka Distrik bad halor kane na ka liang ka Synjuk, ka la ialeh shitom ban iakren sha ka sorkar, na ka bynta ban buh ia ki jaka ia kilan ha Umsning, Nongpoh bad Byrnihat.Haba phai pat sha ki khusnam, ka Umling XI Youth Club ka la iohrah ia ka song pisa kaba 30,100 tyngka bad ka trophy, katba ka Byrnihat Amjok ka la ioh ia ka song pisa kaba long 12, 550 tyngka lem bad ka trophy, ha kajuh ruh ka por, la sam ruh ia ki khusnam shimet ha kaba ia ka nam man of the match la rah da u Dibar Khan, Man of the Tournament la rah da u Vastav Hazarika, Fielder of the tournament la rah da u Jitender Singh, Best Captain la rah da u Francis L Nongbri, Best Wicket Keeper la rah da u Babit Lyngdoh, Discipline Team la rah da ka Harlibagan B.
title: Rah ka Umling-11 ia ka nam lahduh  ha ka lympung ialehkai Kriket ka FFYC

content: Shillong:  Ka jingiakhun jong ka Shillong Premier League myn hynnin ka sngi, ka la sakhi ia ka jingiakhaid 1-1 hapdeng ka Rangadjied United FC bad ka Shillong Lajong.Ia ka Lajong la thep da u Phrangki Buam ha ka 7 minit jong ka jingiakhun hynrei shwa wai ka kyllastep, ka Rangdajied ka la lah ban pynphai kylla ban pyniakhaid.Ka Rangadjied ka la iakynduh ia ka khim khait hadien ba ka la shah beh uwei u nongialehkai u Wallamsuk Nongkhlaw haka 25 minit namar ka jingialehkai pyrshah ia ka ain.Ia kane ka kol, ka Rangdajied la pyniakhaid da u Aiborlang Khongjee shwa ban wai ka kyllastep.Ka Shillong Lajong kan iakhun ia ka Laban ha ka 23 tarik.Lashai ka sngi, ka jingiakhun kan long hapdeng ka Langsning pyrshah ia ka Nangkiew Irat.
title: Iakhaid ka Lajong bad  ka Rangdajied ha ka SPL

content: Shillong: Mynta ka sngi, ha ka por 1baje dang step phyrngab, ki pulit ka East Jaintia Hills, ki la ioh bat ia kawei ka bos, ha Khliehriat, kaba don ia u number AS 24C 2829, kaba wan na Karimganj ban leit sha Guwahati bad la ioh kurup na katei ka bos, ia 45 song ki gelatine stick, kiba khia 112.5 kilo bad sa 5,900 ki tiar siat, kiba la song ha ki hynriew synduk bad nangta sa 133 metre ki waiar pynbthei, ha kaba la ioh kurup na ki hynriew tylli ki song jong ki arngut ki nongshong kali.Ki pulit ki la kem ia ki arngut ki briew bad kitei ki dei kiba donkti ha ka kam khaii kynja bad ki ju thied na Agartala ban die sha bihar bad kitei ki long U Dharanveer (33) na Mail jong ka Bihar bad nangta sa U Prince Ray (18), uba na Bihar hi.Ha kawei pat ka jing khynra, ha ka por 4.20 hynnin janiet, la ioh bat ia kawei ka sumo kaba don ia u number ML 04 A 5229, kaba wan na Digorkhal sha Lad Rymbai. La talasi ia katei ka Sumo ha Byndihati bad la ioh kurup ia 0.74 grams u heroin bad sa 260 mg u nitrazepam tablet. La kem ia U Dashwamiki Lamare (30), uba na Jowai, West Jaintia bad u iathuh ba u ju thied ia kitei ki tiar na Kalain, Assam ban dih ialade bad ban die ruh.
title: Kurup tiar siat ki pulit East Jaintia na Khliehriat, shah kem arngut kiba na Bihar

content: Shillong: Ka KSU Mawkyrwat Circle kan pynlong  ïa ka jing ia shong kyllain myngngor, ha ka 22tarik Risaw 2019 ha Mawkyrwat.  marshiliang ka Mawkyrwat CHC naduh ka por 11 baje mynstep, kum ka dak ka jingïakhih pyrshah ïa ka jingshim sting bad leh suki ka Sorkar halor kine ki mat jingdawa.Kane ka jingïashong kyllaiñ myngngor yn pynlong ha lad CHC Mawkyrwat ka ban sdang naduh ka por 11 baje mynstep haduh 3 baje janmiet. Namarkata ka seng ka khot ka wer lem ïa ki Sengbhalang, ki Bor pynïaid shnong bad ki riew paidbah baroh hapoh ka district ban ïamih ryntih bad ïashim bynta lang ha kane ka jingïakhih ha ryngkat ki placards halor ki tei ki jingdawa haneng, ong ka kyrwoh na u samla Rutherford Lyngdoh, General Secretary KSU Mawkyrwat Circle.
title: Yn shong kyllain myngngor ka KSU, ha ka 22tarik Risaw ha Mawkyrwat

content: Shillong: Mynta ka sngi na liang jong ka Bishop House ki la pyntip sha ki paidbah ba ia  ki jingdonkam ha kaba iadei bad ka jingwanrah ia ka met jong U Archibishop ka la lah dep bad ka met mynta ka la don ha ka jingpynbit pynbiang ka ba khadduh (Embalming) kaba dang sah mynta ka long ban ioh tiket liengsuin kaba wan beit sha Delhi.Na ka liang U phadar J.Marngar, u la buh ia ka jingkyrpad sha ki paid riewngeit  ba  hooid ki sngewthuh ia ka jinglynga mynsiem bad ka jingkwah tip ba la no ka tarik bad ka por ba ka met sah jong i Archbishop Dominic Jala kan wan poi noh sha shillong.“Hynrei na ka liang Jong ngi,ngi  kular ba ngi laleh katba lah ban wanrah kloi ia ka met i Archbishop” ong U Phadar Marngar bad u la ong ruh ba Ki ladon lypa u ma Vincent H .Pala bad lai ngut ki lyngdoh sha USA ban pyndep ia ka ba donkam bad ban synran ia ka met i Archibishop sha shillong.Hynrei kaba kham jynjar khynniat kalong ba ym don jaka shuh ynda ngi la ioh tiket ngin sa pyntikna ia ka tarik bad ka por ba ka met jong i Archbishop kan poi shane u la bynrap.Na ka liang jong ka ing u bishop ngi kyrpat ia phi ki paidbah ba roh ba kin iaid duwai bad ap ia ka jingpyntip ba kham bniah.Ki la iathuh ruh ba ynda ki la wanrah ia ka met jong u Archbishop na USA sha Guwahati Airport, na Airport kin rah shuwa ha Guwahati St Joseph Churh, kin pynrung ruh ia ka met sha Byrnihat Parish bad sha Nongpoh Parish nangto kin iaid na Mawlai bye pass sha ing sah jong U Archbishop bad  bad yn pynlong mass ha  Mawlai Parish bad kin sa wan rah sha Laitumkhrah Cathedral.Ha ingmane Cathedral kin buh shisngi kin  buh hapoh ingmane shuwa ba kin pyndep ia ka jinglehniam ba khadduh khnang ba ki paid riewngeit kin ioh ban peit khadduh ia U Archbishop.
title: Ynda ngi la ioh tiket, ngin sa pyntikna ia ka tarik bad ka por ba ka met jong U Archbishop  kan poi sha Shillong:Fr Jimmy Marngar

content: Shillong: Ka KHNAM, State Youth Wing, lyngba U bah F Marpna, Secretary, jong katei ka seng, ka la phah ia ka dorkhas mynta ka sngi, sha U EC ba peit ia ka Trade jong ka Khasi District Council.Ha ka dorkhas, katei ka seng, ka ong ba ka jingpynmih jong ka KHADC ia ka jingpynbna ban khanglad ia ki bar jylla kiba shongdie madan ha ki lynti iaid paidbah ka la wanrah ka jingkyrmen ia katei ka seng bad ia ki ba bun balang.Ha kajuh ka por, ka seng ka pynpaw ia ka jingpyrshah kaba jur ia ka jingthmu jong ka District Council ban ai licence pat ia kine ki bar jylla kiba shong madan. “Ngi iohi ba na ka liang ka tnat trade kala kyntu ia ki bar jylla ban wan ban apply licence na KHADC” ong ka kyrwoh. La ong shuh shuh, ba lada ka KHADC lyngba ka tnat trade ka ai licence ia kine ki bar jylla ba shong die madan kan mut ba ka KHADC kan pynkhein ia ki kyndon ain ba 3A(b), 3A(c) jong ka trading by non-tribal regulation 1954 bad ki kyndon ain ba 4(a) (b) (i), (ii) bad (iv) jong ka Trading by Non-Tribal Rules 2019.Ka dorkhas, ka ong shuh shuh ba haduh mynta ka Council ka la ai haduh 344 tylli ki trading licence bad la ioh jingtip ba dang bun ki ban ioh ha ki sngi ki ban wan, ia kaba ka seng kan sa dang iai wad tynrai.
title: Pyrshah ka KHNAM, ban ai laisen ia ki bar Jylla, kiba shong die madan

content: Shillong:  Ka Seng Samla Shnong Umkiang (SSSU),   ka pyrshah jur halor ka jingthmu ka Star cement ban nang pynheh ia ka jingtih Mawshun (Limestone) sha duh shnong Brishyrnot.Katei ka seng, ka ong ba naduh ki snem 1997- 2002, kam pat don kano kano ka jingktah, kylla rong jngum, ne ym pat don ka jingiap khlam ki dohkha, doh um, hynrei naduh u snem 2005 ba la pynmih ia ki Kharkhana dewbilat , la sdang ban iap khlam ki dohkha, bad khamtam bun ki briew ba duk na ka shnong Sonapur, Chymplong  Borsara, Kuliang, bad Umkiang kiba ju im nong sngi da kaba die ia ki dohkha ba ki ioh khwai  naka wah Lukha, hynrei mynta kim lah shuh ban  kynrshan iala ka ing ka sem, kumba ki ju leh mynshwa, namar mynta man la ka snem ka don ka jingiap khlam ki dohkha,Sa kawei ruh ka jingtih ia u Mawshun( Limestone) shaduh Brishyrnot, kan pynkylla ktieh ia baroh shilynter ka wah Lukha bad kumjuh ruh kan don shibun ki jingpynjot ki khlaw bad ki dieng ki siej, kiba iarap ban pyntngen ia ki sawdong sawkun ka Elaka Narpuh hi baroh ka wei.  Ki nongkitkam ka Seng ki pyrshah jur iaka jingthmu ka sorkar ban ai lad ia kane ka kompani poi ei bam ei shi sngi, bad kyntu jur ia ka Sorkar Meghalaya bad ka Forest  Department ban peit jngai  bad khang shisyndon ia ka jingthmu bym don jingtiplem ia ka bha ka miat ka khia ka shon ki shnong ba don hapoh ka Elaka Narpuh, da kane ka kompani star cement.
title: Pyrshah pynheh par mawshun ia ka Star Cement

content: Nongpoh:  Shisngi hadien ba la mih ka khubor, kaba la kynthoh halor ka jingsuba donkti ki sengbhalang, ha ka ban shalan beain ia ki Masi sha Bangladesh, u Bah Generous Warlarpih, President ka Khasi Jaintia Butcher Welfare Association (KJBWA), u la pynpaw ia ka jingsngewbynniaw halor katei ka khubor bad u la ong ba katei ka khubor, ka la ktah mationg bad ka pynsngewsih eh ia ki paralok Sengbhalang, kiba la ju trei kam ryngkat bad kiba la kyrshan borbah ban kyrshan ia katei ka synjuk ki nongotdoh ha ka por ba ki iakynduh jingeh.U Bah Generous Warlarpih, u la ong ba katei ka khubor, nalor ba ka la ktah ia kiba bun ki nongialam sengbhalang kiba bym shem la donkti ha katei ka kam, hynrei ka ktah ruh ia u Bah Dundee Cliff Khongsit, u General Secretary ka FKJGP bad ha kajuh ka por u dei ruh u Adviser ka KJBWA.U la pynshai ruh, ba ka daw kaba la pynlong ia u ba un pynmih ia kitei ki kyntien, ka dei ruh hadien ba ka kynhun ki nongotdoh, ki la shem sohsat shaba palat haba iadei bad ban ioh ia ki masi otdoh sha iew sha hat, namar ka jingjyllei pat ka jingshalan masi tuh sha Bangladesh, ka la pynduh mynsiem shikatdei eh ia ki nongotdoh bad kiba la duh jingkyrmen ban bteng ia katei ka kam.Shuh shuh, u la ong ruh ba ha ka jingshisha hi, um shem la don jingmut ban kdewkti ne kynthoh iano iano ruh, hynrei nga shu kyntu ia kito ki dkhot jong ki Sengbhalang bapher bapher kiba ia donkti ha ka kam khaii masi beain sha Bangladesh, ba kin kylla noh bad ban sngewthuh lem ia kaei ka jingeh kaba la iakynduh da ki nongotdoh (kiba dei ruh tang ki Khasi suda) bad lashai shisngi, ka jingeh yn iakynduh da ki paid nongbam doh masi ha Ri Lum Khasi hi baroh kawei.Kumta na ka liang ka KJBWA, ka ai ia ka jingiaroh ia kito ki Sengbhalang kiba la sngew ia ka Sur jong ka jingeh kaba ia iakynduh da ki Nongotdoh bad haduh mynta ngim duh mynsiem ngi shaniah tylli ha ki sengbhalang, ba kin nang trei shitom shuh shuh na ka bynta ka bha ka miat ka ri bad ka jaitbynriew.
title: Ba jyllei shalan masi tuh, sohsat shaba palat  ban ioh masi ot doh, pynshai u heh KJBWA

content: Nongpoh:  Na ka bynta ban wanrah ia ka jingiajan bad ka jingiatreilang hapdeng ki Bank bad ki paidbah khamtam ia ki nongrep, hynnin ka sngi ki heh na ka Bank of Baroda, Shillong, ki la hiar sha ka shnong Umrnong, ha Ri Bhoi, na ka bynta ban pynshai paidbah, halor ka jingdonkam ki paidbah khamtam ia ki nongrep, ba kin don ka jingiadei kaba jan bad ki Bank, khnang ba kin nanglah ban kyntiew ia ki kam rep kam riang jong ki, lyngba ka jingiarap na ki Bank.Lyngba jong katei ka sngi, kitei ki briew na ka Bank of Baroda, ki la pynshai sha ki paidbah kiba dei ruh ki nongrep, da kaba ki pynshlur ia ki ba ki dei ban don ka jingiajan bad ki Bank, khanang ba kin nanglah ban kyntiew ia ki kam rep kam riang jongki, namar kumba ka long hi kiba bun ki Bank, ki ju iarap bad pyrkhat kyrpang ia ki nongrep, da kaba pynduna ia ka Sut haba kiba leit ban shim ram na ki bank.Ki la pynshai ruh, da kaba ong ba lada ki kwah ban long shisha kita ki nongrep kiba paka bad kiba kwah ban kiew lyngba ki kam rep, kim dei ban tieng ha ka ban leit shim ram na Bank, hynrei ki dei ban long kiba shlur bad ban leit mih barabor sha ki bank, khnang ba ki Bank ruh kin lah ban ai haba ki shim ram.Shuh shuh, ki la ong ruh ba bun na ki paidbah kim tip ia ki lad jingmyntoi kaba ki dei ban ioh na ki Bank bapher bapher, namar ha ka jingshisha hi ka long ba baroh ki Bank, ki ai beit ia ki lad jingiarap sha ki paidbah bad khamtam eh ia ki nongrep.Ha kawei pat ka liang, ki la ong ba ka dei hi ia ki paidbah ba kin shem jingeh, namar ba ki paidbah ruh kim ju leit wad jingiarap na ki Bang bad ha kajuh ruh ka por ba ki briew na ki Bank kim ki wan mih ne ban pynshai sha ki paidbah, halor shibun ki jingmyntoi kiba ki dei ban ioh.Nalor ka jingpynshlur haba iadei bad ki kam shimram na Bank, kitei ki briew na ka Bank of Baroda, ki la pynshai paidbah ruh halor ka jingmyntoi kaba ki ioh lada ki don ka jingiajan bad jingiatreilang bad ki Bank, kata ka long naduh ki Life Insurance, ki Accident Insurance lem bad kiwei kiwei.Kiba la ai jingpynshai sha ki paidbah ha katei ka sngi ki kynthup ia ka Kong Daphishisha Diengdoh, Senior Manager ka Bank of Baroda, ka Kong L.R Syiem, Branch Manager ka Bank of Baroda, katba kiba la donlang ha katei ka sngi ki kynthup ia u Santosh Chhetri, Chief Manager ka Bank of Baroda, u Syiem ka Raid Mawbuh, u Paiem W. Macdonald Syiem, ki nongialam shnong lem bad ki paidbah jong katei ka shnong.
title: Sha Umrnong, hiar ki briew ka Bank of  Baroda, ban iatreilang ki Bank bad Nongrep

content: Shillong: Ka sorkar jylla, lyngba ka Political Department hynnin ka sngi,  ka la thung dkhot ïa i kong Haffindalyne Giri, ha ka Meghalaya Human Rights Commission.I kong Haffindalyne Giri i dei District & Sessioon Judge ba la shong thait.Lah ban kdedw ba kane ka hukum lane ka Warrant of Appointment ka la mih hadien ba u Lat ka Jylla u Tathagata Roy u la la bthah katkum ka sub-section (1) hapoh ka Section 22 jong ka Protection of Human Rights Act, ban thung dkhot ïa i kong Haffindalyne Giri, ha ka Meghalaya Human Rights Commission.I kong Haffindalyne Giri, in leit ban shimti ïa ka kam ha ka Meghalaya Human Rights Commission kat kum ka sub-section (2) jongka Section 21, Chapter V jongka Act ba la kdew haneng.Ïa kane la bthah ha ka 26 tarik u Jylliew 2017 da u lat ka jylla u Tathagata Roy, bad la pynskhem bad pynbna lyngba ka Memo POL.155/96/Pt111/50 ba la soi da ka kong RV Suchiang, Additional Chief Secretary to the Govt of Meghalaya, Political Department ha ka 15 tarik u Risaw 2019.
title: Thung dkhot ha ka Meghalaya Human Rights

content: Shillong:  Ka Savio Higher Secondary School ka ba don ha 9 mer Baridua Ribhoi District,  ka la rakhe ia ka “Tini Tots Day” myn hynnin ka sngi phyllaw jong kane ka skul.Ha kane ka sngi la pyniphuh i phieng ia kane ka sngi  da ki programme ba pher bapher  jong  ki khynnah skul jong kane ka skul.Ha ka ne ka sngi la iadon ryngkat lang da ka DC Ribhoi ka kong  R.M Kurbah, ha ka ba ka long kum ka kongsan ha ka jingiadon ryngkat ki Principal jong ki skul ba marjan kum ka kongsan.Ha kane ka sngi ka kong R M Kurbah ka la pynpaw ia ka jing sngewkmen  haba ka iohi ia ka sap ba ki khynnah kane ka skul bad ka la pynpaw ruh ia ka  jing bynnud jong ka ia ka jing long khynnah.Naka liang ka DC Ribhoi ka la ai mynsiem ruh ia ki nongpyniaid kane ka skul ba kin nang lah shuh shuh  ban kyntiew ia ki sap ki phong ki ba ki khynnah ki don.Ha kane ka sngi ka D.C Ribhoi  ka la plie ruh ia ka Science and Arts Exhibition ba la pynlong da ka Savio School, ha ka ba la pyni nam ia ka jing stad science ba mynta bad ruh ia ki jing buh jing sat ki por barim ki riam tynrai bad ki jing shet tynrai ka thain shatei lam mihngi.
title: Sngew bynnud ka DC Ribhoi ia ka jinglong khynnah

content: Shillong:  Myn hynnin ka sngi, ka jingthoh ne signboard ka la mih kynsan ba la pynieng ha iew dielang ha Iewduh hadien ba ki nongrep hapoh ka jingialam ka Hill Farmers Union (HFU) ki la iakynduh ia u Deputy Chief Executive Member (Dy.CEM) ka Khasi Hills Autonomous District Council (KHADC) bah Pyniaid Sing Syiem ban dawa ban pyntreikam hok ia ka rai ban khang pyrshah ia ki mahajon ban khang ot kilo ia ki mar rep ha katei ka iew.Kane ka signboard la pynieng da ka Hima Mylliem hadien ba la rai ka jingialang hapdeng ki nongialam ka HFU, ka KHADC bad ka Hima Mylliem ha ki bnai ba la dep, khnang ban mana ia ki mahajon ban ot kilo. Ha kine ki sngi, ym ju don ka jingbuh ia katei ka signboard hynrei ka la mih kynsan mynta ka sngi hadien ba ki nongrep bad ka HFU kila iakynduh ia u Dy.CEM ban pynkynmaw ia ki rai ba la shim mynshwa kiba khlem pyntreikam satia.U general secretary ka HFU u bah Alfonsebirth Kharsyntiew, haba kren sha ki lad pathai khubor mynta ka sngi, u la iathuh ba ka jingiakynduh kam long kaba seisoh namar ba ka Hima Mylliem kam shym la pyntreikam satia ia ki rai ka jingialang mynshwa bad halor kane, ka u Dy.CEM u bah Pyniaid u la kular ban khot biang ia ka jingialang ha ka 28 tarik mynta u bnai ban iakren halor kane ka kam.Ki jingdawa jong ki nongrep ka long ban khang pyrshah ban ot kilo da ki mahajon ia ki mar rep ha iew dielang. Ka jingialang mynshwa ka la rai ruh ba ki nongthied ki dei ban ai da ka rusit kaba pynmih da u Syiem ka Hima Mylliem hynrei kane ruh kam pat shym la treikam. Kawei pat ka long ba ia ka jingkhate dei ban leh tang ia ki khoh ki kriah ne byrni hynrei kane ruh kam pat treikam satia bad ka jingot kilo ka dang bteng haduh kine ki sngi.Kawei pat ka rai ka long ba ki kudam ki dei ban don da ka number ia ki nongkhaii khnang ban suk ban tip ia kiba leh tuh hynrei kane ruh kam shym la treikam.“Ngin ap haduh ka 28 tarik ban iakren bad lada kam long kumba la dawa, yn iaid da kawei ka lad ban leit tied jingkhang sha ka sorkar lyngba ka tnad Metrology bad yn ujor ruh sha u Chairperson ka Farmers Commission”, la ong u bah Alfonsebirth.
title: Mih signboard ha iew dielang, mar  iakynduh ki nongrep ia U Dy. CEM

content: Shillong:  Ka seng Khasi Student’s Union (KSU) Border Area Unit kaba hap hapoh ka KSU South Central East Circle Pynursla hadien ka jingud jong ki paidbah ka thain ia ka jingbymdon doktor ha Pongtung PHC ngi pynpaw ka jingsngewkhia shi katdei eh.Ha ka jingwad jingtip jong ka seng, ka la lap ba u doktor ba dei peit ia katei ka PHC u dang shim shuti kumba lai taiew eiei bad ym don doktor satia ban peit shipor ia katei ka PHC.Ka seng kam pyrshah ne kynthoh eiei halor ka jingshim shuti jong u doktor ba dei peit ia katei ka jaka ai jingsumar hynrei ka pynpaw ka jinglyngngoh halor ka jingbym shimkhia jong ki bor bahalor ba dei peit ia ka tnad ka koit ka khiah ha ka jylla ban phah doktor shipor ban iarap ia ki paidbah ki ba donkam jingsumar kyrkieh.Kum ban shu pyntip katei ka PHC ka dei peit ia bun tylli ki shnong naduh khappud bad ka Bangladesh haduh ki bynta ba sharum jong ka Pynursla.“Ngi kyrpad ia ki bor bahalor ban pyrshang ban thung doktor noh kham kloi ha katei ka jaka ai jingsumar khnang ba kan ym ktah ia ki paidbah ka thain khamtam ia kito kiba duk ba kyrduh”, la ong ka kyrwoh na u President ka seng KSU Border Area Unit u Samla Thawthymmai Suting.
title: Jynjar ki paidbah ka thain Riwar, ba  shim shuti u doktor ha Pongtung PHC

content: Shillong:  Ka ophis ki Basan ka Raid Mawlieh ka la bteng shuh ia ki kam isynei jong ka, da kaba ka la noh synniang da ki shuki sha ka Raid Ri Hynriew Kur na ka bynta ki saw tylli ki shnong ha ka jingiadon lang u Acting Sordar lem bad ki dkhot ka EC jong ka Raid nalor ki riewrangbah, ki longkmie bad ki samla.Ha katei ka sngi u Basan ka Raid Mawlieh u R.F Lyngdoh u la ai ka jingkren bad ka jingkyrkhu kyrdoh ia ki longkur longjait longraid longshnong ba kin ioh ka shait ka nang bad ban biang ka iew ka dwar ban biang ka thung ka tep ban biang u symbai lanai bad ba kin nang lah ban bat ka synshar ka khaddar bad ka tip briew tip blei bad ban ia burom markylliang para markhap markhum ban long kiba sngewrit khlem don ka niew shilliang la rit ne khraw, duk ne riewspah hynrei ban iaineh skhem ha ka nongrim  ban iada ia la ka hok jong ka longjait long kynja ban suk ban palei ka longraid longshnong kaba la seng la buh da u longshwa manshwa naduuh mynnyngkong ki sngi.Ha kaba kut jong kane ka jingialang u secretary ka Raid bah Bah R. Mawiong, u la ai ka jingkhublei sngewnguh bad ki ktien kyrkhu kyrdoh sha u Lyngdoh bad ki myntri kiba iadon lang hangta ha ryngkat ki Office jong ki Basan jong ka Raid Mawlieh ba kin nang lah ban iai trei bha ha ki kam jong ka Raid bad ka Hima.
title: Synniang U Basan Raid Mawlieh, da ki shuki sha Raid Hynriew Kur

content: Shillong:  Ka Meghalaya Squash Racket Association (MSRA) ka la pynlong ia ka lympung ialehkai World Squash Day ba shi sngi ha ka sngi Saitjain jong ka taiew ba la dep.Ka jingthmu jong kane ka lympung ka long ban kyntiew ia ka jingialekai. Ki don kumba 21 ngut ki nongialehkai ba la wan ban shimbynta kynthup ki kynthei bad shynrang.Ka Nandini Bayan ka la rah ia ka nam lahduh na ki kynthei bad ka Chayanika Chankakoti ba-ar baroh ar ngut na Assam.Katba kiba jop ha ka semifinal ki long ka Prerna Jaswara bad Pragya Choudhury na Meghalaya. Na ki shynrang u Sujal Pathak ula rah ia ka nam lahduh bad u Dikshanta KD Sharma na Assam ula wan ba-ar bad kiba jop ha ka semifinal ki long u Pawan Sharma na Meghalaya bad Ishaan Jain na Assam. Ha kane ka sngi u JR Marak, Deputy Director, Sports & Youth Affairs ula long u kongsan ban sam ia ki khusnam ia ki nongjop.
title: Kut ka jingialehkai Squash ka MSRA

content: Shillong:  Ka West Khasi Hills District Badminton Association shen kan pynlong ia ka Inter Office Badminton Tournament 2019 ha ka 30 bad 31 tarik mynta u bnai ha Indoor Stadium Nongstoin.Katkum ka kyrwoh ba la phah da u Secretary jong ka Synjuk Bah B Marwein ula iathuh ba ki jingiakhun ki long ha ki lai kyrdan ba kynthup ia ka team events kynthei bad shynrang, open category kynthei bad shynrang kum ka Singles, Doubles bad Mixed Doubles bad ka kyrdan jong ki Gazetted Officer.
title: Shen ka Badminton ki ophis

content: Shillong:  Ka Ryntih SC ka la pynliem ia ka Nongrim Hills SC da 2- 0 ha ka jingiakhun ka lympung Shillong Premiere League (SPL) ka SSA kaba long myn hynnin ka sngi ha Polo.Ka Ryntih ka la ioh ban pynkhih jar baroh ar tylli ha ka kyllastep katba ka Nongrim Hills kam shym la lah ban thaw pyrthei.Ia kine ki 2 kol ka Ryntih la thep da u B. Marbaniang 38’ bad u M.Iawphniaw 45’.Lashai ka sngi ka jingiakhun kan long hapdeng ka Rangdajied United FC pyrshah ia ka Shillong Lajong FC.
title: Pynliem ka Ryntih ia ka Nongrim Hills da 2-0 ha ka SPL

content: Shillong: Ka Nongkhroh ksc ka la rung sha ka final jong ka TSA league 2019 hadien ba la pynliem ia ka Mookyniang sc da ka tie breaker 5 la 4 kol.Ka jingialehkai naduh ba sdang ka long shisha kaba itynad bad kaba pynhun ia ki nong peitkai. Ka jingialehkai katkum ka por ba la buh ym don satia ba lah ban thep kol. Kumta u referee u la hap ban pynjari da ka extra time shiphew minute shiliang.Ha ka kylla step ka extra time baroh ar ki team bad ki paidbah ki la ia shongshit bha la ka jong ka liang, ha kum kata ka jingksaid doh iap ka Mookyniang ka la ioh ban shut ia ka direct kick lyngba u Chambar Shylla bad ka bol kala rung jlang ha kyndong ka kol ha kaba u nongap kol ka Nongkhroh KSC um lah leh ei ei shuh.Mar ia centre ka Nongkhroh ruh kam aili satia bad tang hadien kumba katto kattne por da ka jingialeh passing kala ioh ba pynryngkat ia ka kol lyngba u Odren Suting. Kumta ka jingialehkai lah hap shim rai da ka tie breaker.Ha ka tie breaker da ka jing ioh u nongap kol ka Nongkhroh ban khanglad ia ia kawei ka bol ba la shut ka Mookyniang sc, kumta ka Nongkhroh ka la tam da 5 la 4 kol bad ka la rung syndon sha ka final.Kane ka long ka sien kaba nyngkong ia ka Nongkhroh ban rung sha ka final jong ka TSA. Lashai ka sngi pat ka 16/10/19 ka semi final hapdeng ka Mookbu sc pyrshah ia ka Kyortyrkhang sc por 2baje nohphai sngi.
title: Rung final ka Nongkhroh KSC ha ka TSA League 2019

content: New Delhi: Ka Reserve Bank of India, ka la sangeh mynta u snem mang pisa ban shon ia ki kot tyngka 2,000, ong ka jubab na katei ka Bank, halor ka jingwad jingtip paidbah.Kitei ki kot 2,000, ki dei kiba la pynmih lang bad ki kot 500, hadien ba la pynduh pisa ha U Naiwieng 2016, ha kaba la pynduh noh ia ki kot 500 bad ki kot 1,000.La iathuh ba la shon 3,542.991 million tylli ki kot  2,000 ha u snem 2016-17 bad hadien kata ka hiar sha ka 111.507 ha u snem 2017-18 bad hadien kata, la nang pynhiar sha ka  46.690 million tylli ha u snem 2018-19.Ka don ka jing iakren ha ki heh sorkar, ba ka jingdon ki kot 2,000 ka pynduh noh ia ka jingmut ban pynduh ia ki pisa tuh, namar ba ki briew ki ioh lad bha ban pyniaid pisa tuh. Dangshen, lah ban pynkynmaw ba la ioh kurup ia ki kot 2,000 kiba don haduh T.6klur ha u pud ka Andhra Pradesh bad ka Tamil Nadu.
title: Sangeh ka RBI, ban shon ia ki kot T.2,000 mynta u snem

content: U heh duh jong ka Akal Takht lane ka kynhun jong ki Sikh, ka dawa ba dei ban pynduh pyndam noh ia ka  Rashtriya Swayamsevak Sangh (RSS)  bad ula kren ia kitei ki kyntien hynnin ka sngi, ha kaba u ong ba ka RSS, ka dei kaba pynjot thiaw ia ka India.“Hoid, ka dei ban pynduh noh shi syndon. Nga ngeit ba ka RSS, ka don ia ka jingthmu ban pynpait ia ka India. Ki jingkren jong u nongialam jongka, kim dei kiba bha na bynta ka Ri” ong u heh duh ka  Akal Takht, U Giani Harpreet Singh, haba iakren hynnin ka sngi ha  Amritsar bad u dawa ia ka sorkar India, ba kan tuklar mardor ia katei ka seng.Na ka liang jong U Gobind Singh Longowal, u heh duh ka  Shiromani Gurdwara Parbandhak Committee (SGPC), u pyrshah jur halor ka jingkren jong U  Mohan Bhagwat, ha kaba u khot ia ka India, ka  “Hindu Rashtra”.
title: Dei ban pynduh jait ia ka RSS, ong u heh duh ka Akal Takht

content: New Delhi: La ioh khubor, ba ka jingiakren hynnin ka sngi, hapdeng ka NSCN IM bad U RN Ravi, uba dei u nongkren jong ka sorkar India, kam shym la poi satia shaei shaei. La iathuh ba katei ka jingiakren, ka long ha New Delhi.La iathuh ba ka jingiakren, ka la neh la 3-4 kynta, hynrei kam shym la poi shaei shaei ruh, namar ba kam don ka jing ia beit jong ki arliang mamla, halor ki mat bapher jongki.U RV Ravi, uba dei U Lat ka Jylla Nagaland, un iakynduh ia ki kynhun bapher, ha ka 18tarik mynta u bnai, ha Kohima, na ka bynta ban iakren halor katei ka mat jong ka soskular iasuk hapdeng ka sorkar India bad ka NSCN (IM).
title: Pulom biang ka jing iakren hapdeng ka NSCN (IM) bad ka sorkar India

content: Shillong:  Ka Assam ka la pynliem ia ka Meghalaya da 6 wicket ha ka jingiakhun ka  Vijay Hazare Trophy ka plate group ba long mynta ha Dehra Dun.Ka Meghalaya kaba ioh ban kam ban tied nyngkong ka la kamai tang 100 run ha ka 34.5 overs.U Wallam Lyngdoh Kynshi u la mih buli ha jaka u Raj Biswa katba u Punit Bisht u la shimti kum u  kapten na u Biswa. U Tengchan Sangma u la mih bujli ha jaka u Larry Sangma.Tang u Ravi Teja bad u Sanjay Yadav kiba la kamai ar dak ha kaba u Teja u kamai 51 ron katba u Yadav u kamai 12. U Roshan Alam u pynhap 4/25 ia ka Assam.Ka Meghalaya kan iakhun ia ka Chandigarh ha ka sngi Balang.
title: Pynliem ka Assam ia ka Meghalaya ha ka Vijay Hazare

content: Shillong:  Ka Langsning FC ka la iakhaid bad ka Laban mar 3 – 3 kol ha ka jingiakhun jong ka lympung Shillong Premiere League kaba long myn hynnin ka sngi ha madan Polo.Ia ki 3 kol ka Langsning la thep da u  B . Lyngdoh 7′,  K.Lhuid 48′ bad u K.khongmalai 86′ katba ia ki 3 kol ka Laban la thep da u  A.krose 34′, B.kharkongor  57′ bad u S.Lepcha 82′.Lashai ka jingialeh-kai kan long hapdeng ka  Nongrim Hills SC pyrshah ia ka Ryntih SC.
title: Iakhaid  ka Laban bad ka Langsning ha ka SPL

content: Shillong: Ka jingialehkai kaba san sngi ka Carrom Championship 2019 ba la pynlong ka Nongthymmai Sports & Cultural Club ka la kut ha kane ka sngi Saitjain  Indoor Hall, Nongthymmai.Ha kane ka jingiakop, ka Jewel Star ka la rah ia ka nam lahduh katba ka Madanrting Carrom ka long baar napdeng ki kynhun.U MDC ka thain u bah Latiplang Kharkongor u la long kum u kongsan ba la wan lang u bah B. Khyriem, President, Rev. N Diengdoh, Chairman, Indoor Games & Sports Committee, bah D.S Wallang, Secretary, Nongthymmai Carrom Club bad kiwei.Ha ka Men’s Doubles la rah khusnam nyngkong u bah S Syiem & K Nongrang, baar R. K Rani & R. Nongrum. Ha ka Men’s Singles, la rah u bah S Sawkmie bad baar  J Kharkongor. Ha  Women’s Doubles, la rah ka kong S Mukhim & B Dohling bad baar ka S Nongbet & W Kharmawlong. Ha ka Women’s Singles la rah da ka kong S Mukhim, baar  M Mukhim.Ha ka jingiakhun ki khynnah shynrang, la rah da u  M Rapsang bad baar Mri. K Kharkongor.Kane ka long ka kyrwoh na u Secretary bah John Cajee.
title: Rah ka Jewel Star ia ka nam lahduh ka siat Carrom ka Nongthymmai

content: Shillong:  Ka Muaythai Association of Meghalaya (MAM) kan pynlong ia ka 1st Meghalaya State Level Muaythai and Pro Championship 2019 naduh 24-26 tarik mynta u bnai ha Shillong.U President ka seng u bah Angelus Sunn haba kren sha ki lad pathai khubor u la ong ba ka Muaythai Association of Meghalaya (MAM) u la iathuh ba ha kane ka jingialehkai yn pynlong ia ka kyrsan Amateur, Elite bad Pro Fight.Katkum ka jingong u bah Sunn, ki don palat 500 ki nongialehkai ban wan iashim bynta.Ia ka MAM la thaw ha u snem 2016 bad ka la iaid lai snem eiei mynta.“Ngi la shu kyrpad na ka sorkar jylla lyngba ka tnad ialehkai ban iarap lada ioh ia ka pisa”, la ong u bah Sunn.U la ong ba ka la don ka jingkyrmen ba ka jingialehkai  Muaythai  kan rung ha ka jingialehkai Olympic 2024.Katkum ka jingong u bah Sunn, ka jinglut kam duna ia ka 3 lak eiei na ka bynta ka jingialehkai.
title: 24-26 tarik ka lympung Muaythai ha nongbah Shillong

content: Shillong:  Ka HYC Seng Kmie lyngba ka Central Executive Committee (CEC) kaba long mynta ka sngi ka la sngewdei ban pynleit jingmut bha ia ki mat ba khia ba ki samla pule ki ia kynduh na ka por Sha ka por. Ban pynjanai ia ka jingshakri ha ka pule puthi bad ban iarap ia ki samla pule ka jaidbynriew ka seng ka la shim ia ka rai ban don noh ia ka ” HYC Students’ Wing ” .Ha ka kyrwoh ba la phah da u bah Roykupar Synrem, u general secretary, ka seng ka la ong ba ka Students’ Wing kan dei ka shnat treikam jong ka Seng ka ban pynleit jingmut beit thik ia ki mat ka pule puthi bad ia ki samla pule. Kan shim khia ban kyntiew ia ka pule puthi, ban iarap ia ki samla pule bad kan shim ia ki mat ban dawa kyntiew ia ki baibam, ban dawa ba ka baibam dei ban siew ha ka por ba biang, ban pynlong ia ki prokram ban kyntiew ia ki samla pule kum ki jingpynshai paidbah, ki jinghikai seng kam ne ïit kam bad ki jinghikai bapher bapher ba iadei bad ki samla, ki  coaching class, ban dawa na sorkar ban don ki jaka pule ba biang bad ban dawa na ka sorkar ba kan wanrah ia ka Education Policy kaba bit ba biang na bynta ki samla pule.Ka Seng kan sa shna ia ki unit ha man ki College bad University kiba don ia ki samla pule ka Jaidbynriew Hynniewtrep. Ha ki Secondary bad Higher secondary school ia mynta yn nym buh ne shna Unit.Ha ka Students’ Wing yn shah tang ia ki samla pule Hynniewtrep kiba dang pule naduh Class XI shajrong bad kiba dang don ka ki jingpule bapher bapher, la pynkut ka kyrwoh na u bah Roykupar Synrem.
title: Thaw ka HYC da ka Students’ Wing

content: Shillong:  Baroh ki Parish bad ki iing niam jong ka balang katholik, kin pynlong ia ka dak jong ka jingsngew lem halor ka jingkhlad noh U  Archbishop Dominic Jala.Katei ka jingsngew lem, kan long katba kum ka jingpynbeit jong ka  Shillong Archdiocese, ha kaba kan bteng haduh ban da dep leit on tep ia U Archbishop.Katei ka long ka jing pyntip sha baroh ki parish, ki skul, ki kolej bad ki balang ruh, kiba hap hapoh ka  Archdiocese of Shillong, kaba la pyntip da U Diocesan Administrator, Fr John Madur.
title: Yn kynmaw sngewlem ki Katholik ia U Archbishop

content: Shillong:  Ka Mawngap Multipurpose Cooperative Society Ltd kaba dei peit ia ka TWE Music School, ka la rai ba kan pynkynriah noh ia ka Music Festival “Scaling Height park 2019” ka ba la pynbeit ban long ha ka 19 tarik u Risaw 2019 ha madan Madan St.Paul Higher Secoundary School Mini stadium Marbisu bad yn pynlong ia kane ha ka 30 tarik u Naiwieng 2019.Kumta na ka liang ka seng ka pan map  ia ki nong kyrshan ki sponsor bad baroh kiba ia trei lang halor ka jing bym lah ban pynurlong ia kane ka programe ha ka 19 tarik u risaw bad ka pan ruh ia ka jing kyrshan ia ka jingthmu jong ki ban pynlong noh ha ka 30 tarik u Naiwieng 2019.Ia ka Music Festival “Scaling Height park 2019” yn pynlong  kum shi bynta ban  jingrakhe ia ka jingdap 7 snem jong ka  TWE music. Ka TWE music ka la sdang ia ka kam ban ai jinghikai lynba I jingsdang  i barit hynrei ki khynnah ki la paw sted bha na kane ka skul la ka dei ha ka shnong ka thaw, ha ki balang bad ha ki skul don na pdeng kine ki khynnah ki ba la plie ia ka jinghikai tem lyngba ka jingiarap jong kane ka skul.Ha kane ka sngi yn sa wan ban pynshongshit da ki kynhun tem ba pawnam ka jylla ka Snowwhite ha ryngkat ka jing synran lang ka kynhun tem Empirical Tribe bad kiwei. Ka Mawngap Multipurpose Cooperative Society Ltd ka ba dei peit ia ka TWE Music School kum shibynta ban burom bad ban pynpaw ia ka dak ja jing sngewsih ia ka  jing khlad kyndit jong u Archbishop Rev Dominic Jala bad ka seng ka la rai ba kan pynkynriah noh ia ka Music Festival “Scaling Height park 2019” ka ba la pynbeit ban long ha ka 19 tarik u risaw 2019 ha madan Madan St.Paul Higher Secoundary School Mini stadium Marbisu.
title: Kynriah ia put ia tem ka TWE

content: Shillong:  U Acting Syiem ka Hima Nongspung u bah Kyntiewborlang Syiemlieh  u la wer ia baroh ki khun ki hajar jong ka Hima Nongspung ban ia poi ryntih sha ka Dorbar Bah jong ka Hima ka ban long ha ka 19 tarik Risaw, 2019 ha Nongspung, ha ka por 11 baje mynstep.Ki mat iakren ha katei ka Dorbar Bah kin long halor ban pynbeit ia u pud u sam jong baroh ki shnong kiba hap hapoh ka Hima Nongspung ryngkat jong ka Hima hi baroh kawei. Ban iakren halor ka khyndew ka shyiap jong ka Hima khamtam ha ki thaiñ khappud bad ka Assam ba la lilam da ki Syiem ba hashwa bad ban saiñdur ia ka Riti Synshar jong ka Hima bad kiwei kiwei.U Acting Syiem u la khot la wer lang ia baroh ki Lyngdoh, ki Sordar, ki Rangbah Shnong, ki khun ki hajar ba kin ia pyllait por khnang khnang khlem pep ha katei ka sngi kumba la pynbna khnang ban lah ban kyntiew ia ka bha ka miat, ka roi ka par ha ka lawei jong ka Hima bad ka jingtip ba kongsan eh halor kiei kiei kiba iadei bad ka Hima baroh kawei kiba long ki kam sahteng naduh ki phew snem ba la leit noh.
title: Wer u Acting Syiem ka Hima  Nongspung sha ka dorbar Hima

content: Nongpoh:  Kan dei ka jingjia kaba sngewphylla ba ki samla hapoh ka shnong ba kin hap ban pom da ki dieng na khlaw shnong, na ka bynta ban pynmih pisa bad ban ioh thied jaka ban pynlong kum ka madan ialehkai.Katei ka la jia ha ka shnong Nongmawlong ha Ri Bhoi, kaba hap hapoh ka Umsning Constituency, ha kaba ki samla hapoh jong katei ka shnong hapoh ka Nongmawlong Sports Club, ki la hap ban kyrpad rit na ka Dorbar shnong, ba kin sngewbha ban ai ia ki dieng napoh ka khlaw shnong, ba kin pom ia ki bad ba ki die, khnang ba kin ioh ban thied jaka, na ka bynta ban pynlong kum ka madan ialehkai.Haba iakren bad ki nongthohkhubor, kitei ki samla, ki la pynpaw ba watla ki dei ki briew kiba ieid maring, hynrei kim banse ban leh ia katei ka kam, tang na ka bynta ban ioh madan kaba biang bad ba kin ioh ban pynlong kum ka madan ialehkai.Kitei ki samla, ki la iathuh ruh ba ki la shah shukor la bunsien ha ki nongmihkhmat, ha kaba ki la kular ban pynshna bad ai da ka madan kaba paka sha ki, hynrei katei ka jingkular, ka la shu kut tang ha ka jynhaw, naba da ki bun bun snem kaba ki la ap, pynban kam shem la wan urlong satia.Ha kajuh ruh ka por, kitei ki samla ki la pynpaw ia ka jingsngewdiaw, hadien ba ki la mad ia shibun ki jingshah kular kai ha ki Nongmihkhmat bad kiba la ong ruh, lada kane ka jingkular da ki nongmihkhmat kan iai bteng, ka lawei jong ki samla ha ki shnong nongkyndong, kam poi shaei shaei ruh.Ha kawei pat ka liang, kitei ki samla ki la kyntu ia ka sorkar ba ka dei ban pyrkhat lem ia ki khun samla kiba don ha ki nongkyndong, ym ban pyrkhat tang ia kito kiba don ha ki shnong kiba la kham long sor, namar ia kaei kaba ki la mad, ki la pynpaw ba ka sorkar lem bad ki nongmihkhmat, kim da pyrkhat eh ia ki samla ha Nongkyndong bad kiba la ong ruh ba lada ka long ha kane ka rukom ka lawei jong ki khun samla, kam poi shano shano ruh.
title: Tang ban ioh madan, da ki dieng na khlaw  shnong, pom ki samla ban pynmih pisa

content: Shillong:  U MLA ka NPP u Bah Sniawbhalang Dhar bad u MLA ka HSPDP u Bah Renikton Lyngdoh Tongkhar, ryngkat bad ki nongialam bahakhmat jong ka UDP, mynta ka sngi ki la leit ialap elekshon ha Laitkynsew bad Mawlong ban kyntu ia ki paidbah ban kyrshan pura ia u kyrtong ka UDP u Bah Balajiedkupar Synrem, ha ka elekshon shiteng samoi na Shella Constituency kaban long ha ka 21 tarik mynta u bnai.U Bah Sniawbhalang Dhar haba kren ha kitei ki jingialang u la ong, ba ka NPP ka don ka jingiadei kaba iajan bad ka UDP khamtam eh bad u (L) Dr Donkupar Roy bad dei halor katei ka nongrim ba ka NPP kam shym la pynieng kyrtong ha ka elekshon bad ka NPP baroh kawei ka iatreilang bad ka UDP ban pynthikna ba u Bah Balajiedkupar yn jop suk iaka elekshon.U Bah Renikton Lyngdoh Tongkhar, u la ong ba ka HSPDP kadei ka seng kaba donlang ha ka kynhun Regional Democratic Alliance (RDA) kaba donlang ka seng UDP, bad kum ka dak ban burom ia u Dr Donkupar Roy kim shym la pynieng kyrtong ha ka elekshon shiteng samoi hynrei ki ai jingkyrshan pura ia u kyrtong ka UDP uba dei ruh u khun jong u Dr Donkupar Roy ba yn jop ia katei ka elekshon ban pynkhlain shuh shuh iaka kynhun RDA bad iaka sorkar Meghalaya Democratic Alliance (MDA).U Bah Balajied u la kyntu ia ki paidbah ba kin ai jingkyrshan ia u bad u la ong ba yn nym ai jingkular iano iano hynrei yn ialeh ban pyndep ia ki kam kiba sahteng kiba la ieh da u kpa jongu bad ynda u la jop ruh yn iatreilang bad baroh ki paidbah na ka bynta ban kyntiew iaka thain baroh kawei.Ha katei ka jingialang la ioh ia ka jingkren na u President ka UDP u Bah Metbah Lyngdoh, u Working President ka UDP u Bah Titosstarwell Chyne ha kaba la iadonlang u Chairman bad Deputy CEM ka JHADC u Bah Finelyness Bareh bad u Bah Lasky Rymbai bad kiwei kiwei. Na u Bah Titosstarwell Chyne, Working President UDP.
title: Ka NPP, ka don ka jing iadei kaba jan  bad ka UDP, ong u Ma Sniawbhalang

content: Shillong: Ka Seng samla Catholic Umsning Parish, ka dap da ka jingsngew tmang mynsiem, halor ka jingkhlad noh jong U Archbishop Dominic Jala. Katei ka seng, ka ong ba U Archbishop, u long u paralok ba hajan eh bad u nong kynpham ia ki khun samla ban iaid ha lynti ka hok.
title: Sngew tmang mynsiem ka Seng Samla Catholic Umsning

content: Nongpoh: Ki Nongialam ka Ri Bhoi District Sports Association (RBDSA) hapoh ka jingialam u Bah RB Shadap kum u President, ki la shim ia ka rai ba kin leit rung sha manla ki shnong na ka bynta ban wer ia ki kynhun ne ki club, ki bym pat iasoh bad ka RBDSA, kaba long ruh kum ka jingpynsuk ia ki ban ki wan pyniasoh ialade bad ka RBDSA.U Bah RB Shadap President ka RBDSA, u la ong ba ka jingthmu jong ka Association ban leit sha ki shnong ka long ban pynsuk ia ki Sports club bad ki Club kynhun, ba kin nym lait than ban lut naka bynta ban pyniasoh ialade bad ka Association.Shuh shuh, ua la ong ruh ruh hadien ba ki club bad ki kynhun ki la dep ban pyniasoh bad ka RBDSA, kin sa ioh ruh ia ka syrnod kum ka jingithuh ba ki dei ki kynhun kiba la dep ban pyniasoh bad ka bai pyniasoh kan long T.1500/-  shi club na ka bynta 3 snem.Ki jaka kiba ka RBDSA kala dep ban pynbeit ba ki kynhun lane ki sports club ki lah ban wan pynïasoh bad aiti ïaki form kan long haka 05.09.2019 kan long ha Iing Dorbar Umden naduh ka por 2 baje, 05.10.2019 kan long ha Iingskul Sumer haka por 8 baje mynstep, 19.10.2019 ha C&RD Block Bhoirymbong, 22.10.2019 ha Mawhati EAC Bulding naduh ka por 11 baje mynstep, 25.10.2019 kan long ha Madan Mawlasnai naduh ka por 11 baje mynstep, 28.10.2019 kan long ha ïing Dorbar Sajer Nongpoh naduh ka por 10 baje mynstep, 28.10.2019 ha ophis ka RBDSA ha Umsning, 01.11.2019 ha ïing Dorbar Byrnihat Proper naduh ka por 11 baje mynstep bad 07.11.2019 kan long ha IB Umsiang naduh ka por 11 baje mynstep.Kumta na ka liang ka RBDSA ka khot bad wer ia baroh ki kynhun lane ki Sports Club ba kin wan pyniasoh ialade bad ka RBDSA kum ki kynhun ba ithuh, la bynrap u Bah Shadap.
title: Yn rung shnong ki nongialam ka RBDSA ban pynsuk ia ki kynhun kiba kwah pyniasoh sha ka Synjuk

content: Shillong: Ki samla pule jong ka  North Eastern Hill University (NEHU), ki la pynlong ia ka jingthang rupang mynta ka janmiet ha phyllaw jong katei ka University, ban pynrem halor ka jingshah ktah kti jong ki arngut ki samla pule jong ka University, ha ki riew tap khmat, ha ki khyndiat sngi ba ladep.Da ki spah ngut ki samla pule, ki la shim bynta ha katei ka jingiaid paidbah, ba la pynlong da ka  North Eastern Hill University Students’ Union (NEHUSU).La pynlong ia ka jingiaid paidbah, naduh ka por 6.30 janmiet bad ki la iaid ruh kylleng kylleng katei ka University.Ki nonghikai ruh ki shim bynta lem ha katei ka jingiaid paidbah mynta ka janmiet, kiba don ha ka kynhun jong ka  NEHUTA.Lah ban pynkynmaw, ba ki 2ngut ki samla, ki la shah shoh ha ka 9tarik Risaw 2019, kaba dei hadien ka jingthaw ia ka shnat trei kam jong ka   Hynñiewtrep Youth Council (HYC) NEHU unit.Ha kawei pat ka khubor, na ka liang jong ka HYC NEHU-UNIT ka pynrem jur iaki khawpud kiba wan thom bor pyrshah jong u para dkhot. Ka jing thom bor ia u kam pyntieng ne pynsmiej ia ki dkhot jong ka HYC NEHU-UNIT bad ka seng hi kan ieng kum u diengbilat ban trei hok na bynta ka Ri bad ka Jaidbynriew bad ban pynkyntiew ia ka im lang sah lang ha ka Bri u Hynniewtrep ha ka bor ka ba rit ba ka Unit ka don.“Ngi ai khublei ia ka NEHUSU ba ka la  kner la ki kti ban iarap bad ban don ryngkat nabynta ki khynnah pule jong kane ka skul bah.Ngi ai khublei ia ki nonghikai bad ki nongtrei ka NEHU kiba la pynpaw ha ngi ba ki pyrshah ia kane ka kam shah thombor” ong ka kyrwoh.Sa shisien la kyntu ia ki bor pulit ban kem mardor ia ki khawpud kiba wan thombor bad la kyntu ia ki samla ka Bri u Hynniewtrep kiba pule ha NEHU ba kim dei ban tieng ia kine ki khawpud kiba buhrieh ia ka dur jakhlia ka jong ki da kaba tap da ki Jain.
title: Pynlong jingiaid paidbah bad thang rupang ki samla NEHU

content: Shillong: Halor ka jingkhang jong ka Khasi District Council, ban nym die madan shuh, kaba sdang naduh mynta ka sngi, ki la don kiba leit mudui sha High Court, ha kaba la iathuh bad kitei kiba leit mudui ki dei ki Khasi suda lane ba la thoh “tribals” bad ha ka jing ia said, ba la mih khmat da U bah ND Chullai, uba dei U Additional Advocate General jong ka sorkar Jylla bad nangta sa U Bah VGK Kynta, uba mihkhmat na bynta ka Khasi District Council, la kren shai ba kitei ki Khasi lane ki tribal, kim don hok ban leit rah ia ka jingujor sha kashari, namar ba kim dei ma ki kiba shah ktah bad la ong ba kitei imat, ki don ia kano kano ka buit arsap ha ki.Ha ka jing bishar, la ong jong U Chief Justice, ka Meghalaya High Court, la pyni ba kitei ki Khasi, kim don daw eiei ban leit rah ia ka jingujor, hynrei ki leit ban pynwit ia ki kam jong ka kashari.La rai namarkata ban weng noh ia ka jingujor bad ban dain kuna T.5,000 marwei ia kitei ki nong ujor bad ba ki hap ban siew hapoh ka ar taiew sha ka Khasi District Council.Kitei ki la ujor halor ka hukum ba la pynmih da ka Khasi District Council, ha ka 4tarik Risaw 2019, kaba khang ia ki bar Jylla, ban die madan ha u pud u sam jong ki jingtrei kam ka Council.Kito kiba leit ujor sha kashari, ki long ka kong Julie Warjri na Sunny Hills, kong Theila Marbaniang na Mawlai Mawdatbaki, kong Banisha Jyrwa, na Mawprem, Kong Idaris Kharwanlang na Mawbah, Kong Deneris Thongni na Mawkhar, kong Risuklang Marwein na Shyiap, kong Margrete Khongwir na Bishnupur.Jahdait emmmm……phi mut ki MDC ba ngi lah jied mangi ki dei ki bieit ne kheinpoh ……kum I Bah Paul,Teinwel…….etc ki dei ki snar Jong ngi…Wow KHAs ngi te mih beit ki langiong kynthei man ki kam ba ktah ia u menderWow khasi ngi te mih beit ki langiong kynthei man ba ktah ia ka kamai u menderKi Nongujor da ki kynthei suda…wewKatno nga dap da ka jing sngew kmen,ba lano kanpoi ka por,ba kin khang syndon ia kine ki khyllah jait bn nymailad ba kin shu wan pynwit wat tang ki phut pat bn iaid ruh ymlong shuh bn iaid, hynrei kine ki ieng khong shyllang mat pat ki saport pynban ia ki ??lh dei bn kyntait noh ha ka Jing shi sha bn khot ia ki ki khasi,na ka liang ka District council jong ngi.kine kein ki dei kita ki NOC jong ki mynder ri, mynta. ki lah paw kyrteng lah dei kine ki ta ki Langiong ba ia baroh baroh. sangsot ki bapli ki nongda mynder riLa dei ba ki ioh King mum too,  Kane ka daw ba kine ki nongujor ki iarap ia ki minder.  Ha kaba mynta ngi iohi ba kine ki mynder ki lah leh mon haduh ba da sngew trai ban rung ha ing jong ki ba bun ki ing jong ki parasnam u paid khasi jong ngi. Ym shim la tieng shuh iano iano ruh…. Namar la don ki thei, ki Kong ban iarap ia ki lada ki shah Kem  Lane ki shah pynshitom.  Ka pynhiar jinglong, jingsngewsih haba ka jia kumne.  Lada leh tingeh ka  NGO’s ha ka jing ialam da ka District Council.  Ngin sa lah ban sar kum ba sar ing ia kine ki mynder na ka nongbah jong ngi baroh kawei.Balei ba dain tang 5000,,,lah dei ban dain kuna da ki phew hajar shaneng ba kin ia sngewthuh ,Nga sngew sarong iakine ki longkmie ba ki shlur ban kdup mynder…ieid mynder mama kaha hei mama kaha hei mama kaha didi….. Phuit ka myndie ri ka riewpoh …..ka khun jynrein lah dei ban beh syndon iakine ki kynthei na poh ka ri baieid jongngi..mar 5000 te pha LA ia jahdait hi.
title: Shah dain kuna, ba ujor pyrshah ia ka jingkhang die madan ka KHADC

content: Shillong: U Conrad K Sangma u ba long u myntri rangbah ka jylla  mynta ka sngi ha ba ia kren bad ki lad pathai khubor u la iathuh ba ka sorkar jylla ka la shim khia ban pynpoi kloi noh ia ka met jong u Archbishop Most Rev Dominic Jala ha Shillong.U Myntri Rangbah u la ong ba na ka liang jongu, u la dep ban ia kren bad ka sorkar ha Delhi, kum juh ruh bad ka embassy ban peit ba ka met jong u Bishop ka dei ban poi kloi sha Shillong.U Myntri Rangbah u la ong ba ha ka jingiakren jong u bad ka ophis embassy ki la iathuh ba kan shimpor lai saw sngi ban pyndep ban soi ia ki kot ki sla kiba don kam baroh bad ban wan rah ka shim por shi sngi.U la ong ba mynta ka sngi ruh na ka liang jong u, un dang budien ia kane ka kam bad la iathuh ba  na ka liang jong ka sorkar  ka la shim ia ki lad ki lynti baroh ba kumno ban pynpoi noh kham kloi ia ka met Archbishop Most Rev Dominic Jala sha Shillong.
title: Shim khia ka sorkar Jylla, ban pynpoi kloi ia ka met U Archbishop

content: Shillong: Ki nongshong shnong ki hynriew shnong ki la byrthen ban leit tied jingkhang sha ka Supreme Court lada ka sorkar ka la ai bor ia ka kompeni Star Cement Pvt Ltd ban khlong mawshun na Brishyrnot ba hap ha ka Elaka Narpuh ha East Jaintia Hills.Hapoh ka lama ka Hynriew Shnong  Wah Lukha Association (HSWLA) lem ka Sonarpyrdi Eco Tourism and Socio Economic Development Society (SETSEDS) kila pyrshah jur ia kane ka jingthmu ka kompeni Star Cement ban khlong mawshun ha ka jingheh kaba 42.051 heactar ha Brishyrnot.“Nga ryngkat ki nongkitkam ka  seng, ngi sngewkhia jur ia ka jingkhot pynlong ia ka jingsngap paidbah ban pynlong  bad ngi ieng pyrshah beit ia kane halor ka nongrim ba kan ktah ia ki 6 shnong ba kynthup ia ka Sonapyrdi, Kuliang, Borsora, Lumtongseng, Sakhri, Shamplong”, la ong u bah Womsa Talang u waheh shnong.U la ong ba katei ka thain kaba thmu ban pynjot ia ka khlaw ban tih mawshun, ka dei ka ïing jong ki kynbat dawai, ki kynja ba im bad kan long ruh ka jingma ia ka wah Lukha kaban sa kylla bih bad ki khlaw kin sa syllen lada ailad ban tih mawshun.Ka jingsngap bishar paidbah ia kane ka kam la buh ban pynlong ha ka 19 tarik mynta u Risaw.
title: Yn ujor ki 6 shnong sha ka Supreme Court lada tih mawshun ka Star Cement

content: Shillong: Mynta ka sngi u myntri rangbah ka jylla u Conrad K Sangma u la  plie ia ka jing ai jinghikai ka ban long ar sngi ia ki ophisar jong ka tnad lum khajna jong ka sorkar jylla mynta ka sngi ha Khasi Jaintia Presbyterian Conference Hall, Shillong, u la ong ba dang don ka jingbym ioh lumhok ia ka khajna kaba dei lyngba ka GST.Ia kane ka jaka jinghikai ka ban long ar sngi,  la pynbeit da ka National Academy of Customs, Indirect Taxes and Narcotics (NACIM) ryngkat jingiatreilang bad ka ophis jong ka tnad lum khajna jong ka sorkar jylla Meghalaya  u la ong “Ka jingdon jong u ka long ba pyni ka jinglum khajna ka long kaba don kam.”U la ong ruh ruh ba na ka liang jong u shimet, u la shim khia bha ia kane ka bynta kumno ban pyniaid beit iaid ryntih ia ka jinglum khajna bad ha ka juh ka por kumno ban khanglad ia ka jinglait tuh ka khajna bad ban pynbeit ia ki jingduna ban pynbha ia ka jinglum khajna.U myntri rangbah u la ong ba ka sorkar jylla ka shaniah ha ka sorkar pdeng 84% haduh 86% ka jingioh na ka sorkar pdeng bad ka jingmih na ka jylla ka long tang ha pdeng 14% haduh 16% bad lada shim ia ka jingtyllun ka pisa ha kane ka jylla man u snem ka long haduh 4 billion kaba mut ka jinglum khajna ka dei ban long hapdeng 30% bad 35%.Haba phai ia ka jinglum khajna na ka GST, u myntri rangbah u la ong ba ha u snem mang tyngka 2017-18 la ioh ban lum tang T.500 klur, ha u snem mang tyngka 2018-2019 la ioh ban lum T.878 klur bad mynta u snem mang tyngka 2019-2020 kan kot sha ka T.1500 klur. Haba shim ia ka jingkhein ha ka jylla kiba dei ban siew ia ka khajna lyngba ka GST ki don haduh 29000 ngut.Ban pynbha ia ka jinglum khajna kam dei tang ha ka GST, hynrei ka dei na kiwei kiwei ki bym hap hapoh jong ka GST ruh, kum ka jinglum khajna na ki marpoh khyndew kaba ka sorkar ka dang ialeh kumno ban weng ia ki jingeh kiba wanrah ia ka jingleittuh ka khajna bad kiwei kiwei ki lad kumno ban pynbha.U Myntri rangbah u la ong ba kane ka jinghikai kaba ar sngi kan iarap shibun ia ki ophisar kumno ban dang sngewthuh shuh shuh ha kaba ia dei bad ka jinglum ia ka khajna namar kane ka long ka jingmyntoi ia ka jylla bad ia ki paidbah hi baroh.Haka jingkren jong u C Sangate Additional Director jong ka NACIN Zonal Compus ha Shillong, u la ong ba nalor kiwei ki kam kaba ki hap ban trei kum ki Customs ka sorkar pdeng ka la bynshet ha ki ba kin peit ruh ia ka GST ha ka Ri baroh kawei.Haba phai sha ka dong shatei lam mih ngi jong ka Ri India u la ong ba ia kane ka kam la pyniaid na ka iing sah wai kaba ki trei mynta, hynrei ka jingtei ia ka ophis ba pura ka dang iaid mynta ha Mawdiangdiang bad kane kan long ka jaka ai jinghikai ia baroh ki jylla ka dongshatei lam mih ngi jong ka Ri India ha kaba ia dei bad ka GST bad kane ka jinghika kaba ar sngi kan long tang ia ki ophisar jong ka jylla Meghalaya.Ia ka jingkren plie ia kane ka jinghikai la kren da ka Sariga Agarwal Synrem, ia ka jingkren ai khublei la kren da u Arunkumar Kembhavi kiba dei na ka tnad lum khajna jogn ka sorkar jylla bad ia ka jingialang la pyniaid da u bah Leo Khongsit, uba dei U Joint Commissioner jong ka tnad lum khajna jong ka sorkar jylla.
title: T.1,500klur kyrmen U Conrad ban lum GST mynta u snem

content: Shillong: Ka Shangpung Kickboxing Training school ryngkat bad ka Dorbar Shnong Shangpung Koira ha ka 3 Tarik October 2019 ha ka por 8:30 janmiet ka la pdiang donburom ia u Khlur Rang ialehkai Kickboxing jong ka Ri India U Hame Shaniah Suiam uba la khur  Takma Ksiar bad Rupa ha ka X WAKO World cup Diamond Kickboxing Championship 2019 kaba sdang naduh 24-29 September 2019 kaba long ha Nongbah Anapa,Russia.Ha kane ka jingialang ryngkhat u paidbah jong ka Shnong Shangpung Koira ki lah iamih paitbah na la ki ing ki sem jong ki ban ia pdiang donburom ia u Rangialehkai Kickboxing ryngkhat ka jingiadon lang u PA Dalloi ka Elaka Shangpung Chanki Langbang kum u Kongsan,  Rangbah Shnong Ka Dorbar Shnong Shangpung Koira U Ma Witting Born Langstang, ki dkhot nongkitkam ka Shnong Shangpung Koira, ki nong Shong shnong ka Dorbar shnong Shangpung Koira Ki Longkmie Longkpa, ki Rangbah ki Samla,ki hep barit,ki bahiang ba hasem u Hame,ki parlaok parajor bad ki khynnah ialehkai Kickboxing ki lah dap dap ka jingsngewkmen kaba khraw hadien ba u Hame u lah jop ha ka lympung ba khraw Jong ka pyrthei kaba long ruh ka jingrahnam ia ka Shnong ka thaw, ia ka ing ka sem, ia ka West Jaintia Hills District,ia ka State Meghalaya, ia ka Ri India bad kumjuh ia ka Jaitbynriew Jong ngi.Ha kane ka jingialang la pynkup burom ruh ia ki 2 ngut ki Rangialehkai jong ka shnong Shangpung kiba la jop Takma Ksiar ha ka jingialehkai shabar Ri ha ka Nepal Open International Kickboxing Championship 2019 kaba long ha Kathmandu,Nepal naduh 1-4 June 2019, kita ki long u Samla Heimonmi SUCHIANG bad u Samla Pynshrainmiki Rabon.
title: Pdiang burom ka Shangpung, ia u khlur ialehkai ka India

content: Shillong: Ka LS Production shen kan sa pyllait paidbah noh ia ka phlimha ka 18 tarik u Risaw 2019 ha Bijou Cinema Hall.Ka por ka ba kin pyni ia kane ka phlim ka long naduh ka por 11:30 mynstep, 2:00 mynsngi bad 5:00 janmiet. Ka bai tiket ia ka ne ka phlim kan long 60tyngka 80tyngka bad 100 tyngka.Ki tyngshop ki puron ki ba shim bynta ha kane ka phlim ki long u Lansius Syiemlieh Zarina  Marbiang Regina Lamoo bad u Tony khriem. La direct da u Cores Marwein bad ka script da u Lansius Syiemlieh bad  producer da u Lansius Syiemlieh ia kane ka phlim la ai ia ki surjingrwai  da u Anthony khriem, Emsalon Jana bad ka kong Alisha Pyngrope.La pynwan dur ia kane ka phlim ha Ribhoi,Shillong bad Assam. Ia kane ka phlim la shna ha ka jinglut kaba 10lak eiei.Ka jingiathuh khana jong kane ka phlim ka dei shaphang ka kam ing kam sem ha ka ba kumno u rangbah, ne ka longkmie lada ki la ki thaba shawei kan pynjot ia ka ing ka sem.
title: Yn pyllait paidbah noh ia ka phlim To wanphai sha nga

content: Shillong: La  pyntip sha baroh ki nongshong shnong ka Elaka Darrang bad  kiba sah shabar jong ka Elaka, ba kin ia poi khnang ha ka 16 tarik u Risaw 2019 ba kan don ka ka jingpynkup burom kyrpang ia u Doloi ba pura ka Elaka Darrang kaba kynthup ia ki shnong Dawki,Darrang,Kongwang, Lymba, Ri Kynjai bad Shnongpdeng.Ka jingpynkup burom ia u Doloi ba pura u Ma Pyrwa Lymba kan long ha ka por 11 baje mynstep ha ing skul Darrang. Kumta u Doloi bad ki riew rangbah ka Elaka ki khot sngewbha ia baroh ki khun ka Elaka ba phin ia poi lang sha kane ka jingpyn kup burom ia u Doloi ba thymmai kum u Doloi ba pura ka Elaka.
title: Yn pynkup burom ia U Dolloi ka Elaka Darrang

content: Shillong: Ki pulit jong ka Meghalaya, ki la ioh kem hynnin ka sngi, ia u snar nongialam ba satar bha jong ka seng lehnoh Garo National Liberation Army (GNLA), U Nikrak M Sangma ha Rongara jong ka South Garo hills district.Ki lad khubor ki iathuh ba utei u snar ehrang, ula wan poi sha India, haba u wan phai na Bangladesh.U Nikrak M Sangma, ula pyniasoh ialade bad ka GNLA, ha u snem 2011 bad ula leit sha Bangladesh naduh u snem 2015.Ka GNLA, ka la sdang duh jait ha Garo Hills, hadien ka jingshah pyniap U   Sohan D. Shira ha U Rymphang 2018, katba U  Nikrak M Sangma, u iai bteng ban sah ha Bangladesh.
title: Ioh kem ki pulit ka Jylla, sa uwei u snar ehrang ka GNLA

content: Shillong: Ka Shnong Umkiang, ka pynpaw ia ka jingpyrshah jur ia ka Public jingialang ban ioh jingmynjur jong ka Star Cement ka ban long ha ka tarik 19tarik Risaw 2019, na ka bynta ban pynheh ia ka jingtih mawshun, hapoh ka Elaka Narpuh, Brichynot.Ka daw ka jingpyrshah ia katei ka public hearing jong ka star cement ka long ba lada ailad ban tih ne pynheh ia ka jingtih mawshun kan ktah ia ka mariang khamtam kan ktah ne pynjakhlia ia ka wah lukha nalor ba ka la shah pynjakhlia lypa.Kaba ar ka long ba ka jingdon jong ki company kiba don hapoh ka Elaka Narpuh, kim ai jingmyntoi ei ei ruh ia ki ngi ki paitbah ka thain border Narpuh la ka long ha ka roi ka par, ka iohkam ioh jam bad lada ailad ia ka star cement ban khlong mawshun ne ban pynheh ia kaba la dep pynjot lypa kan ai jingmyntoi tang ia katei hi ka company.Ka kyrwoh ka ong shuh shuh, ba kaba sngewsih ka long ba ha shwa ka puplic hearing, ki company ki tur iap ban leit khroh leit kjor ia ki paitbah ban iarap ia ki ne ban ai jingkyrshan ia ka puplic haring ryngkat shibun ki jingkular kiba heh baheh , hynrei hadien ba la dep ka kam ka jam ki company kim ju bna ia u paitbah khamtam ki samla ka thain kiba la biang ka jingnang jingstad bad kiba kyrduh kam kyrduh jam ne ki briew kiba duk ki bym don nongiarap ne nongkren sha ka company,Kumta ka Shnong Umkiang, ka kyrpad jur ia ka Sorkar ban pynsangeh noh shisyndon ia katei ka public hearing ne ban nym ailad ia ka star cement ban khlong ia u mawshun namar kan ktah haduh katta katta iaka mariang khamtam ia ka wah lukha bad lada ka sorkar ka ailad ia kane ka jingtih mawshun jong ka Star Cement, ba kan iaid shaphrang, ka jingialang ban pynneh pyneh mariang jong ka sorkar kam don jingmut eiei bad la ong shuh shuh ba lada ka sorkar ka ailad ia kane ka public hearing, ki nongialam shnong jong ka Shnong Umkiang, kin nym iatreilang shuh bad ka sorkar lyngba ki tnat sorkar kiba dei peit ia ka khlaw (forest) ne kino kino ki tnat kiba dei peit kumno ban pynneh pynsah ia ka mariang nangne shakhmat.Ka kyrwoh ka ong shuh shuh “Bad kaba sngewlyngngoh, ka long ba haba ki paitbah ne khynnah skul ki leit ban pan jingiarap na ka star cement ne kino kino ki company badon ha Narpuh, barobor ki phah leit ne phah ai jingthoh sha ka Association jong ki company cement. Kane ka jingleh jong kine ki company ka long ba kim khein snep ia ki briew jong ngi da kaba pynshad shrieh shane bad shatai” ong ka kyrwoh na U Ma Lasting Pala, Waheh Shnong Umkiang bad U Bah Nicholas Lyngdoh, General secretary, Umkiang.
title: Pyrshah jur ka shnong Umkiang, ban pynheh ia ka jingtih mawshun ka Star Cement

content: Ka la mih mynta ka jing ia kynad kaba jur hapdeng ka Turkey bad ka Syria bad ka daw, ka long hadien ba ki riew ialeh jong ki Kurds lane ki Syrian Democratic Forces (SDF), ki la mynjur ban ia trei lang bad ka sorkar Syria, na ka bynta ban pynher krad ia ki shipai jong ka Turkey, kiba la rung ha kiba bun ki bynta jong ka Syria.La iathuh ba ka jing ia mynjur hapdeng kitei ki ar kynhun, ka long ba ki shipai jong ki Kurds, ki dei ban iaid lang synrap bad ki shipai jong ka Syria, ban pahara ia ka thain khappud jong ka Syria.Ki bor pyniaid jong ki Kurds, ki iathuh ba ka sorkar India, ka la iatrei lang bad ka Syrian Democratic Forces (SDF), na ka bynta ban khanglad ia katei ka jinghiar thma bad tam pud jong ka Turkey.Ka khubor jong ka SANA, ka iathuh ba ki shipai jong ka Syria, ki la kiew shaneng jong ka Ri, na ka bynta ban ia khun pyrshah ia ka jingthombor ka Turkey.La iathuh ba hynnin ki shiphew ngut ki briew, ki la iap ba kynthup ia ki nongthoh khubor bad ki riew paidbah, ha ka jingshah ther ha ki shipai na Turkey.
title: Nang jur ka jing ia kynad, mih sa ki shipai Syria ban iakhun ia ka Turkey

content: Hadien ba ka la kha ia ka khun kynthei jongka, kaba khia hynriew kilo, ka kmie, ka ong ba ka la ioh da ka khun ia lympat briew lane  “mini sumo wrestler”.Ka Emma Millar ka dei ka kurim jong U  Daniel bad ka la ioh ia ka khun kynthei, ba ka la jer kyrteng ka  Remi Frances Millar ha ka taiew ba ladep, kaba la kha khlem pat dap bnai pura.La iathuh ba katei ka khyllung, ka don mynta 35 taiew bad ka jingkhein lyngba ka ultra sound, ka long 4 kilo, hynrei ka la nang khia palat ia kata.
title: Ba kha da kaba 6 kilo, ong ka kmie dei ka mini sumo wrestler

content: Ka All India Catholic Union (AICU), ha ka jing pynmih khubor jongka, ka ai burom shi katdei ia U Mohan Bhagwat, uba dei u nongialam ka  Rashtriya Swayamsewak Sangh, ha kaba ula pynkynmaw ia ka India, ba U Jisu, u hikai ban long uba map ei, uba sngewlem bad uba pyrshah ia ki kam pyntriem ba har rukom bad ban nym thombor ia kito kiba tlot bor.La ong shuh shuh da katei ka kyrwoh, ba ha ka jing wohdaw jongu, ia ki kyntien ka Baibl, ka long ba u kwah ban pynduh ia ka jingsngew bad ka jinglong khristan bad ban pynieng niam halor ka jingshah shoh jong ki Dalit bad ki rit paid, da ki riew runar kiba kam ba ki dei ki nongsumar masi, hynrei katei ka pyni sha khmat ka pyrthei ia ki kam pyntriem jong kito ki briew kiba bud ia ki jinghikai jongu.Ka jingjia ha kaba U Jisu, ula shimti ia ka kynthei, kaba shah shoh ha u paidbhur ha Israel, ka dei ka mat kaba donkam bha ha ka New Testament bad ka la dei ban shah thombor ha u paidbhur, ha jingbishar jong ka kangaroo court, lada U Jisu, um shym la iarap noh ia ka bad u da byrngem ia u paidbhur bad u ong “Dei tang uta u bym ju leh pop, ba un bishar ia ka bad ba un kawang ia u maw uba nyngkong” bad kitei ki kyntien, ki la pynlong ia u paidbhur ban pyllait noh ia katei ka kynthei.La ong shuh shuh ba ki don bun bah ki kynhun Muslim bad ki Khristan, kiba la shah pyniap ha ka kynhun ki ehrang Hindutva, halor ka jingkynnoh ba ki kit doh masi bad nangta ki don ruh bun bah ki rit paid Dalit, kiba la shah shoh, shah lehbein bad shah pyniap bad kitei ki dei kiba kohnguh ia ka hukum jong ka seng U Bhagwat, ong ka AICU. Katei ka kyrwoh, ka ong shuh shuh ba ym dei satia tang U Bhagwat, hynrei U President jong ka seng BJP, uba dei u myntri korbar ri ruh, u shim ba ki rit paid, ki dei ki nongshun bad ki niang dait aiu re.U Modi, uba kwah ban pyni ialade ba u dei u riew khraw jong ka pyrthei, u dei namarkata ban khanglad ia ki kam thombor bad ki kam leh niewbein ia ki para ri, hynrei ban bat ia ka jinglong laitluid niam jong ka riti synshar Ri, ong ka kyrwoh na U  Dr John Dayal.
title: Ai khublei ka AICU ia U Mohan Bhagwat, ba u kren ia ki jinghikai U Jisu

content: U Reverend Vijayesh Lal, General Secretary, ka Evangelical Fellowship of India ha ka jing pynmih khubor, u shim ba ka jing wad daw jong U Mohan Bhagwat, nongialam ka RSS ia ka kam shoh briew, da kaba pyn ia syriem bad ki jingjia ha ka Bible, kim dei satia kiba dei ban khein sting, hynrei dei ban pynrem jur. La ong shuh shuh ba ki jingkren jongu, la ju pyni paidbah ha ka prokram Doordarshan bad kane ka pyni, ba ka dei kaba la ai jingbit da ka sorkar India.La ong shuh shuh da U Lal, ba ka RSS, ka dei kaba la donkti bha ban pynjop biang ia U Narendra Modi, ha ka elekshon kaba mynta u snem, da kaba pyni nia, halor ki kam pynroi kiba la trei da ka sorkar BJP.La ong shuh shuh ba U Bhagwat, u pynieng nia, ia ka kyntien Abrahamic religion, kaba kdew ba ka niam Islam bad ka niam Khristan, ki dei ki niam nongwei bad kumta ki nongbud jongki, ki dei ban hap ha ka kyrdan kum ki nongshong shnong kiba ar. La ong shuh shuh ba mynta la iohi, ba kum ki Khristan, ki shah shoh ha Jharkhand, ha ki riew ieid masi bad kiba bun ki Dalit bad ki Muslim ki la shah pyniap halor ka jingsngew iapher niam iapher jaitbynriew.Na ka liang ki Balang Khristan ha India, ki duwai ba ka jingshai kan wan ha ki nongialam bapher, ba kin sangeh noh ia ka jing isih ia kiwei pat bad la ong shuh ba ka pyrthei, ka la mad jingeh shi katdei, ha ka spah snem ba ladep, na kine ki jing ia isih para briew, ki jingsngew iapher jaitbynriew bad kiba la pynmih ia ka jing ia kynad ha Ri Europe.
title: “Ka jing pyn syriem U Mohan Bhagwat ia ki kam shoh briew na ki kyntien Babl, kam long ban khein sting”

content: Shillong: Ka ‘Cherra Bosconian Union’ (CBU), ka seng jong ki khynnah skul barim jong ka St. John Bosco Boys’ Higher Secondary School, Sohra; ka la kyntiew ia ka Lama Jubili Ksiar (Golden Jubilee) jong ka ha ka 14.10.2018 da U Ph.  Paul Vadakumpadan SDB, Professor ka Sacred Heart Theological College, Mawlai ha ka jingiadon lang U Bah Wilfred Khyllep IAS bad ki past pupils ryngkat ki bahaiing hasem jong ki.Ia kane ka ‘Jubili Ksiar’ (Golden Jubilee) yn pynhap pyrda noh ha ka 24tarik Risaw (October) 2019. La khot la wer ia baroh ki khynnah skul barim jong ka skul St. John Bosco Boys’ Higher Secondary School, Sohra, ban ia wan shim bynta lang sha kane ka jingrakhe Jubili kaba shisien ha ka rta jingim briew. Ka prokram kan sdang da ka Mass Bakhuid por 10 baje mynstep bad ka ‘Cultural programme’ ha ka por 1 baje nohphai sngi.Ka CBU ka la noh synniang shikatdei eh ym tang ha ka ban tehsong lang ia baroh ki khynnah skul barim jong u Don Bosco bad ban kyntiew ia ka pule – ka dangle, hynrei ruh ban iarap bad kdew lynti lem ia ki khynnah skul sha ka lawei babha lyngba ki prokram bapher bapher ki jong ka naduh ba la seng ia ka ha ka 6 tarik Risaw (October),  1968 haduh mynta.Bun na ki dkhot ki dang iai kynmaw kyndiang ia ki kam babha ba la leh da kane ka Seng ki khynnah skul barim, kum ka ‘Drama’, ka ‘shad tynrai’, ka ‘tem ksing-nakra’, ka ‘put besli-singphong’, ka tem duitara, ka ‘jingrwai khasi tynrai’ bad kiwei.  Ka jingai ‘Award’ ia ki khynnah skul ba ioh heh eh ‘mark’ ha ka ‘sobjek Khasi’ ha ka matrik (MBOSE) naduh u snem 1984 haduh 2015. Bun ki khynnah skul na kylleng ka Ri Khasi-Jaintia kiba la ioh ia kane ka Khusnam. Naduh u 2017, ka Seng ka la phai khmat noh sha ka thong ban noh synniang jingiarap sha ki khynnah skul kiba wan na ki iing ki sem baduk, ong ka kyrwoh na U bah Bah Priak. K. Riahtam, General Secretary, Cherra Bosconian Union (CBU),  SOHRA.
title: Ka jing pynhap pyrda ia ka Jubili ksiar ka CBU, Sohra

content: Nongpoh: Ha ka Dorbar Shnong kaba la long hynnin ka sngi Saitjain, ka shnong Quinine Nongladew ha Ri Bhoi, ki la rai ban mih paidbah ban leit peit ia ka Phlim Khasi kaba la tip kyrteng ‘To Wanphai Sha Nga’ ka ban sa pynlait ha ka 18 tarik mynta u bnai ha Bijou Cinema hall, Shillong.La sngewthuh ba ka nong rim hi kaba la pynlong ia ki paidbah jong katei ka shnong ba kin shim ia katei ka rai ban iamih paidbah, ka dei ba ia katei ka phlim ‘To Wanphai Sha Nga’ kaba la pynwandur bad ruh la pynbit pynbiang da ka L.J Film Production, la khlieh da u Bah Lansius Syiemlieh kum u Producer bad ruh u kum u Tynshop, jong katei ka film bad uba dei ruh u nongshong shnong jong katei ka shnong.Haba iadei bad katei ka rai ban iamih paidbah ban leit peit ia katei ka phlim, na ka liang ka Dorbar Shnong, ka la pynkhreh da ki bus bad ki kali rit ban pynsuk ia la ki nongshong shnong ba kin iohlad ban leit kiew sha sor Shillong ban leit ia katei ka phlim, kaba sa pyni ha ka 18 tarik naduh ka por 11 baje mynstep, 2 baje bad 5 baje janmiet.
title: “To wanphai sha nga” kwah leit peit ka Quinine Nongladew

content: Ngi la kyndit haba ngi la ioh jingtip ba u Archbishop Dominic Jala, u khlieh ka Shillong Archdiocese ka Balang Catholic ula khlad ha ka jingtyngkhuh kali ha California USA ha ka 11 tarik October 2019.Ngi kynmaw ia ka jingiajan jong ngi bad ka ing ka sem u Archbishop Jala, haba u hynmen jong u, u Anthony Jala ula ialeh ilekshon teng ha u snem 1983 na ka seng rim jong ngi ka APHLC na Mawlai.Nalorkata, i kpa u Archbishop, i Babu Marius Lien Kharumnuid ruh iba la don bynta ha ka jingialeh ban ioh ia ka jylla Meghalaya.Ha kaba pynpaw ia ka jingdap mynsiem jong ngi halor kane ka jingjia basngewsih, ngi halor ka jingduh noh ia une u khlieh ka jingngeit ha ka jylla ngi bad u paralok ki babun ha ka imlang sahlang bad kiwei ki balang de, ngi phah ka jingsngewlem sha ki bahaing hasem, sha ki paid riewngeit baroh, kiba don hapdeng ka jingsngewsih, ngi duwai ruh ba u Blei un ai ka jaka shongneh basuk bad ka jingsuk ia u Archbishop Dominic Jala ha ka Hima jong u.S/d- B.M.LanongChief Advisor UDP
title: Ngi la kyndit haba ngi la ioh jingtip ba u Archbishop Dominic Jala
