content: Jowai:  Hadien ka jingiohkem ki pulit ka East Jaintia jin haduh 17 ngut ki Nong Nigeria ha une u bnai ba la dep, imat kine ki Khar-iong ki la sdang pat ban wat ki lad sa na thain khappud ka West Jaintia Hills lyngba ka thain Dawki bad Muktapur.Kane ka la paw shai ba hynnin ka sngi, ki pulit ka West Jaintia Hills hapoh ka jingialam u DSP Donkupar Moksha ki la ioh ben kem ia 3 ngut ki Nong Nigeria bad 4 ngut ki nong War Jaintia kiba la iarap ban ia ki ban kam sha shiliang na Bangladesh sha India.Kitei ki 3 ngut ki Khar-iong la ithuh kyrteng kum u Chukwuma Celestine Okwuwa-34 years, u Lucky Osas Enebi-36 years bad u Ndubuisi Moses Chime-28 years. Kitei ki nong Jaintia pat kiba la shah kem lang ki kynthup ia u  Ronaldo Syndai- (21) na  Syndai Kmaishnong village, u  Ni Pohleng- (20) na shnong  Syndai Lyngkot, u Kliar Mon Pohthmi-(18) uba na Syndai Kmaishnong bad u  Rihok Chyrmang-(28) Uba dei na  Syndai Kmaishnong. BKi pulit ki dang tohkit ia baroh kitei kiba la shah kem.Ia baroh kitei ki 7 ngut ba la shah kem la iohben kem na ki na Shnong Pdeinshakap katba ki dang mut ban wan sha Jowai.Ha ka jingtohkit ba malu mala ki pulit, kitei ki nong Nigeria ki la iathuh ba ki la mih na Logo, Nigeria ha ka 6 tarik bad ki la  her sha Istanbul, Turkey ha ka 7 tarik bad nangta pat ki la her sha Bangladesh, Dhaka ha ka 8 tarik.Nangtei pat ki la wan kiew sha Border India Bangladesh ha  ka 9 tarik da ka jingiarap uwei u Khar Bangla bad hadien katta pat ki la kam shiliang ka wah lyngba ka thain Muktapur ha kaba kitei ki saw ngut ki la wan baniarap ia ki ban pynrung ia ki shapoh India.Ha kawei pat ka khubor, la iathuh ba hynnin ka miet, ha ka por 11.15, ki pulit jong ka Ratacherra, kiba khynra ia ki nongwan rung beain, ki la ioh bat ia ki arngut ki nong Nigeria, kiba wan da ka Night Bus, kaba don ia u number ML 05 M 1899, kaba leit na Agartala sha Guwahati.Ki pulit ki la bat ia kitei ki arngut bad haba la kylli ia ki kot ki sla jongki, hynrei kim shym la lah ban ai ia ki kot ki sla kiba donkam, halor ka jingwan rung jongki sha India. Kitei baroh arngut ki don tang ki Xerox copy jong ki passport jongki bad ki iathuh ba ki buh ia ki kot kiba donkam baroh ha Bangladesh bad ki wan rung sha India, lyngba ka Tripura.Kitei kiba shah bat ki long U Victor Ujichukwu Okeke (30) bad sa uwei pat u dei U Ifechkwu Emmanuel Obi (34) bad kitei ki dei kiba Nigeria hi baroh arngut.
title: Kem ki pulit 5 ki Nigeria bad 4 ki  nongiarap ban pynrung tuh na Bangla

content: Shillong:  U chairman ka Khasi Hills Autonomous District Council (KHADC) u bah Pynshngain N Syiem u la ong ba ka jingneh ka thup kyrteng jong kiwei ki riewlum ne schedule Caste/Tribes nalor ki Khasi, Jaintia bad Garo ha kane ka jylla, ka dei namar ba la bakla ban dawa ban pynbeit ia ka Presidential Order (PO) 1950  ha ka por ba ioh ia ka jylla Meghalaya.Haba kren sha ki lad pathai khubor myn hynnin ka sngi, u bah Pynshngain u la ong ban pynkylla ia kane ka Presidential Order 1950, ka donkam ban leh da ka parliament lyngba ka sorkar pdeng ban pynbeit ia kane.“Ka jingbakla halor kane ka dei namar ba bakla ha ka por ba ioh ia ka jylla ban pynkylla ia ka presidential order 1950 ba la phiah ia ka Meghalaya katkum ka North East Re-organisation Act 1971”, la ong u bah Pynshngain.Kumba ka long haduh mynta  ki don haduh palat 50 tylli ki riewlum kiba la don ha ka thup ka Presidential Order 1950 kaba treikam ruh ha kane ka jylla Meghalaya namar ba la shu shim na ka Assam ha katei ka por.Ka la don ka jingiakhih ban dawa ban weng noh ia kine ki riewlum ban ithuh ha kane ka jylla namar ba kin knieh lut ia ki bhah ki bynta jong ki Khasi, Jaintia bad Garo kiba dei ki trai shnong.U bah Pynshngain u la ong ba ka sorkar jylla, bad ka District Council kim lah leh eiei ban weng ia ki lait noh tang ban shu ai da ka jingthoh khnang ba ka sorkar pdeng kan leh ia kane.“Ha ka jingshisha ka la dei ha kato ka por ba la ioh ia ka jylla Meghalaya ban dawa ban pynkylla ia ka Presidential Order kaba la phiah na ka Assam lyngba ka Nort East Reorganisation Act 1971”, la bynrap u bah Pynshngain.Katkum ka jingong u bah Pynshngain ka jingioh jylla ia ka Meghalaya ka long ban pyntreikam na ka bynta ka jingbit jingbiang ki trai jaka hynrei ka la don ka jingeh namar ba ia kane khlem pynbeit ha katei ka por.Ka KHADC ka la pyrshah ia ka jingbsuh ia ka kyntien ban ailad ia kiwei ki jaitbynriew riewlum ne unrepresented tribes ha ka Territorial Autonomous Council kaba dang iaid ha ka jingpynkhreh ka sorkar pdeng ban pynkylla ia ka Sixth Schedule ka Riti Synshar ka ri mynta, namar ba la thaw ia ka KHADC tang na ka bynta ki Khasi, ka JHADC ia ki Jaintia bad ka GHADC ia ki Garo, ym ia kiwei ki jaitbynriew.
title: Bakla por ba ioh ka Meghalaya ia  ka PO 1950, ong u bah Pynshngain

content: Shillong: Ka East Khasi Hills District Chess Association (EKHDCA) kan pynlong ia ka Open Inter-School Chess Tournament 2019 ha ka 19 tarik Risaw, 2019 naduh ka por 9:30 mynstep ha Government Girls’ Higher Secondary School, Jail Road, Shillong.Kane ka jingiakob ialehkai chess kan long ha ki lai tylli ki kyrdan – kata ki nongialehkai kiba hapoh 11 snem ka rta, kiba hapoh 15 snem ka rta bad kiba hapoh 18 snem ka rta.Ka bai ia shimbynta ka long Rs 100. Ki nongjop kin ioh ia ki trophy, ki syrnot (certificate) bad kiwei de ki jingai sngewbha.Na ka bynta ban ioh ia ki jingtip ba kham bniah, kiba kwah ia shimbynta ki lah ban phone ia u Bah F Thangkhiew (87300-17829) bad u Bah R Katrai (87873-33937).
title: Da ka ialehkai chess ki skul yn pynlong ka EKHDCA

content: Shillong:   Shi bynta ban rakhe ia ka jingdap 75 snem, ka Nongthymmai Sports & Cultural Club, Shillong,  lyngba ka Indoor Games & Sports Committee ka la sdang ia ka jingialehkai  Carrom Board Championship ha kane ka sngi Balang ha Indoor Hall, Nongthymmai. Kane ka jingialehkai kan kut ha ka 12 tarik mynta u bnai.Baroh ki don 12  tylli kiba iashim bynta kynthup 80  ngut ki shynrang ha ka para marwei, 40 ngut ha para ar ngut, 10 ngut ki kynthei ha para marwei, bad 6 ngut ki khynnah shynrang ha ka para marwei.Kiba wan iashim bynta ki long na Madanrting, Rynjah, Mawlai, Malki, Nongpyngrope, Lama Villa bad na kiwei ki  jaka.Ia kane ka jingialehkai la plie da u bah LatiplangKharkongor u MDC ka thain ba la don lang bah R.VDkhar, RangbahShnong ka Lumiablot, bah F. Dkhar, Secretary Shnong Lumsohphoh, Rev. N. Diengdoh, Chairman, Indoor Games and Sports Committee, bah D.SWallang, Secretary, Meghalaya Carrom Association, bah B. Khyriem, RangbahShnong ka  Nongkhyriem bad u President ka Sports Club nalor kiwei, la ong ka kyrwoh na u bah John Cajee u secretary ka seng.
title: La sngi Saitjain yn kut ka iakop siat Carrom ha Nongthymmai

content: Shillong: Ka seng United Democratic Party (UDP) hapoh ka jingïalam jong u president ka party, bah Metbah Lyngdoh mynta ka janmiet ka la pan jingkyrshan ban pynjop ïa u kyrtong jongki u bah Balajied Kupar Synrem ha ki lai tylli ki jingïalang.Kine ki jingïalang la pynlong ha ka janmiet jong ka sngi Palei bad ha ka shnong Saitsohpen, Nongsawlia bad Mawpun.Haba ai jingkren ha katei ka sngi, u president ka UDP u la ong, ba u don ka jingngeit ba ka Shella kan sei biang ïa u nongmihkhmat ban long u Rangkynsai na ka bynta ka thaiñ kumba la sei mynshuwa kum ïa u Rev. JJ M Nichols Roy,  Dr Donkupar Roy bad kiwei.U la ong, ba u kyrtong ka UDP uba mynta ruh um duna ban long lang kum kiwei namarba u mih na ka ïing u Dr. Donkupar.“Ha ki khyndiat por jong ka jingïaid lynti jong nga bad u bah Balajied, nga ïohi ba u ruh u skhem ban shakri ïa ki paidbah,” ong u bah Metbah.Na ka liang u bah Metbah u la ong ruh, ka UDP kan ïai buddien ïa ki kam kiba sah jong ka Shella kaba kadei hok ban ïoh.Nalorkata u la ong, ha kane ka ilekshon, ngim kwah ban kynthoh ne ban kren ban pynmong briew namar ka kam jong ngi kadei ban kren ïa ka jingshisha bad ban trei da ki kam kumba long u Dr. Donkupar.Ha kawei ka liang, u general secretary ka UDP, u bah Jemino Mawthoh u la ong, ha ka jingïaid lynti jong ka jingïalap ilekshon, nga shem ba ngin ïoh ka jingjop na ka daw jong ka jingwan ai Jingkyrshan jong ki paidbah.“Phi la duh ïa u nongïalam ba radbah bad kumjuh ruh ma ngi. U la don la ka bynta ha ka synniang bad u long u nongïalam uba khampher na kiwei namar ha u ka don ka nongrim kaba u leh ïa ka kam kumba u kren ym ban shu bun ñia,” ong u bah Jemino.U bah Brolding H Nongsiej uba long u nongmihkhmat jong ka seng UDP,  u la pan ïa ka jingkyrshan na ki paidbah ba kin pynjop ïa u bah Balajied kum ka burom ïa u nongïalam ba radbah jong ka Jylla uba la leh ïa ki kam bad ka synniang kaba u nongïalam u la leh.U MDC ka Sohra na ka seng UDP, u bah Titos Chyne pat u la pynshai haba ïadei bad ka mat jingdawa distrik.U bah Titos u la ong, ka jingdawa distrik kam dei ka mat elekshon ban pynbiej ïa u paidbah hynrei kadei ka mat jingdawa jong u paidbah kaba ki la angnud naduh mynshuwa.“U Dr Don u long kum u nongïalam ban ïakren, ban pynbeit bad ban pynurlong ïa ka jingangnud jong u paidbah. Kumta kum ka seng kaba burom ïa la u nongïalam, ngin ïakhun ban pynpoi sha ka thong,” ong u MDC ka Sohra haba ïadei bad ka mat ban pynïoh distrik ïa ka Sohra.Ha kine ki jingïalang kiba la ïadonlang ki kynthup ïa u MLA ka Ranikor, bah Pius Marweiñ, bah Ryngkat Lyndem MDC ka Laitlyngkot, u MLA barim na Garo Hills Sengman Marak bad kiwei kiwei.
title: Ka Shella kan sei biang ia kum u bah Joy, Dr Donkupar, ong u president ka UDP

content: Shillong: Ka National Council of Churches in India, ka pynrem jur ia ka jingkren bakla jong U Mohan Bhagwat, uba dei U Sarsanghchalak ka RSS, ha kaba ula sot bakla ia ki kyntien jong ka Bible, ban pynshlur ia ka jing shoh briew bad katei ka dei ha ka jingkren bad ka India Today ha Mumbai.“Ngi sngew kyndit jur ba ki mih kum kito ki jait jingkren, kiba thmu ban pynpait jaitbynriew ha ka kyrteng jong ka niam. Ka jing sot bakla ia ki kyntien jong ka Baibl, ka la dei ka kam thombor ia ki rit paid Khristan” ong katei ka kyrwoh kaba la pyllait mynta ka sngi.Ka jingsot jong utei U Sarsanghchalak, ia ki kyntien ka Baibl, ka thew ia ka jingshah lehbein jong kawei ka kynthei bad la ong ruh ba U Jisu, um shym la pdiang satia ia ka kam shoh ne tied briew, hynrei la pyni ba U Jisu, u sngew lem bad u sngew diaw shibun halor kitei kam thombor. La ong shuh shuh ba U Jisu, ha ka jingshisha, ula shim ban iada ia katei ka kynthei, kaba shah ktah kti bad shah lehbein ha ki briew.La ong ruh ba ki kam lehbor ne ktah kti ia ki rit paid ha kine ki sngi, ki dei beit ia ki rit paid bad kito kiba tlot ha ka long briew manbriew.Ka NCCI, ka kyrpad ia ki bor sorkar, ki nongialam sain pyrthei jong ka sorkar India bad ki sorkar Jylla, ba kin pynrem ia kitei ki jingkren shim kabu, ba kan neh ka shongsuk shongsain ha kane ka Ri.
title: Kren bitar ka NCCI, ba sot bakla u heh duh ka RSS ia ki kyntien na  ka Bible

content: Shillong: Ka Khasi Hill Autonomous District Council, ka la pynmih ia ka jing pynbna ba naduh ka 14 tarik u Risaw 2019, kan khang ia baroh ki bar jylla (non Tribal) ba kin shong die madan ha baroh kawei ka Ri Khasi.Ia kane ka jingpynbna la shim kat kum  ka Ain  Trading by NonTribal Regulation ka long beain ia ki bar jylla (non Tribal) ban shong die jingdie ha madan ne ha ki jaka iaid kjat (footpath).Na ka liang ka KHADC ka la hukum ruh ia ki syiem bad ki Rangbah shnong ne ki khlieh nongsynshar ba kin ujor sha ka KHADC lada ki lap ba don ki bar jylla (non tribal).Ladei ka por ba ngin kyndit bynriew kum ka jaidbynriew ba ngin ieng hala ki Jong ki kjat, khamtam haka trei ka ktahKi driver local taxi ruh balei u dkhar u ioh ban kamai local taxi hato ki don hok mo ki dkhar ban kamai local taxi.Kadei shisha,,,✌️✌️??ka jaitbynriew khasi barit paid ka la dei ban shim ti hi da lade ia ka jingiatylli ban ïeng Noh Hala ki kjat,ban trei nh hi ki Kam ki jam baroh, ym dei ban ai Kam  iaki bar kylla namar Tang ki Trai ri ruh ki ioh Kam ,Kim dap Kam dap kam,,iaid shaphrang ki riewshemphang khlur ka ri?✌️?Ym dei bn ai lad iakine ki bar jylla haman b ng phai la sha kamon ne ka diang kine suda laha ka khaii pateng ne kino2 ruh la dei bn beh shi syndonMano pat na ki Khasi jong ngi kiba nud bad treh ban sdieh bad die shana harud surok? Lah la dei ka por ba ngin trei hi ia baroh ki kam wat la ki dei kiba slem ban iohnong. Donkam ban iaishah bad trei shitom.Lada khang ban die madan ia ki dkhar ka ba ma pat ka long ba ki kynthei khasi ki kam ba ki dei trai dukan te nga kwah ban ai jongmut lada ki kynthei ki kam ba ki dei trai ki dei ban shong hi ha kito ki dukan ba ki kam trai ym dei ban ai lad ban buh nongtrei da ki dkhar ban die madan. Khublei shibunKa long ka ba bha eh kane rai jong ka KHADC,hynrei kam dei pat ban pynkheiñ hi ia ka ne ka aiñ..Teng teng ha ka por ba niah kali ha surok na Motphran sha Police Bazar,ngi kum tyngkhuh briew,namar la pynkhap ngiah ki dkhar ia ki foot path,…Uff ha Shillong la I ngiah ban peit, ki dkhar ki don ha baroh ki dong Jong Ka sor, khamtam ha 9lad. Ki nongdie kiba la pynkhim ia Ka lynti namar ki die ha Madan. Haba ianujor bad kiwei ki nongbah, Ka sor Shillong Ka long Ka bapoh tam ha Kaba teh lakam ia ki nongdie Madan, la Shu ia ai Mon pathar ia ki dkhar, kat haduh ban da block ia ki footpath ruh, ki Shu ieh beit kumto.
title: Naduh 14 Risaw, khang ka KHADC ia ki dkhar die madan ha kylleng ka Ri Khasi

content: Shillong: Ha ki 24 kynta ki ban wan ka bneng, kan long kaba dum lyoh bad kan don ka jinghap slap ba malu mala ha Shillong bad ki jaka ba marjan.Ha ka Jylla baroh kawei, kan don ka jing meh leilieh bad tied pyrthat ha ki katto katne ki jaka bad ha ki 24 kynta ba ladep, ka nongbah Shillong, kam don slap, ha Sohra ka long 0.8mm, katba ha Umiam ka long 4.8mm.Ka jingshit jingkhriat ha  Shillong ka long 19.7 la 14.0, ha Sohra 21.0 la 16.8 bad ha Umiam ka long 23.2 degree kaba shit duh bad 18.5 kaba rit duh.
title: Lah ban meh leilieh bad tied pyrthat ha ki katto katne jaka ha ki 24 kynta ban wan

content: AIS SujaYn ym pat dep ban ialap ia ka Gospel ha  Israel tad haduh ka jingwan u Jisu sha  kane ka pyrthei. Kane ka long ka jingphylla na ki jingphylla baroh. U Jisu u la kren da lade hi u ong – “Naba shisha nga ong ha phi, ba phin ym pat lah pyndep (ialap Gospel) ia ki shnong ka Israel, tad ynda un wan u khun u briew (Jisu) Mathaios 10:23. Kaei ka daw? Ka daw ka long ba ki Israel ne Jiw (Jewish) kim ngeit kim pdiang ym dang mynta hynrei naduh mynshuwa naduh ki hajar snem.Ki Israel ki ngeit ha ka hukum jong ki kpa tymmen jong ki hyndai bad ha ki hukum u Moses de. Namar ha ka por ba la kha ia u Jisu la kha ia u hapoh ki ain ki hukum u Moses, bad ki Israel ne  Jiw kim lah ban pdiang ba u long uta u Blei ne u khun u Blei uba la wan na bneng hynrei ki shu ong ba u dei u briew ba la  kha na ka briew na ka Mary bad u dei u khun u Joseph u misteri, ha ki hi ki ngeit, ba uta u Messiah un wan hiar na bneng ym ban kha ia u, kane ka dei ka jingngeit jong ki Jiw ne Israel, bad  ka long ka jingbiej ha ki lada kin pdiang ia kane.Ki Israel ne Jiw kim iohi ia ka jingshisha jong kine kiei kiei kiba u Blei u la leh, kim iohi ia ki dak bakhraw ba la leh da u Blei ha Israel, u Blei u la leh shibun ki jingphylla wat haduh ba ki la iaid lyngba ia ka duriaw basaw (Red sea) hynrei kim sngewthuh. Dei na kata ka daw ba u Blei u la pynsakma kylleng ia ki naduh u snem 70 AD. Hynrei dei namar ba u Blei u ieit pat ia ki u la wallam ia ki sa shisien pat sha ka ri lajong namar u Blei u la kular naduh u Abraham u Isaak bad u Jakob bad u Blei um ju kylla um ju lamler ia kaba u la kular ha u Abraham, namar ba u dei u Blei. Jingkhein 23:19.Haba u Jisu u la wan sha kane ka pyrthei ki Jiw (Israel) ki kyntait ia u kim pdiang ia u. Ioannis 1:11. Bad kane ka jingkyntait ka neh haduh mynta mynne.Ka jingkyntait jong ki Jiw ia u Jisu ka long mynta ruh bad kim pdiang ia ka kyrteng Jisu ha Israel. Na kata ka daw u Jisu u phai sha ki Jentil sha Samaria. Haba u Jisu u la kren bad ka nong Samaria, ka nong Samaria ka ong – “Nga tip ba u Messiah u wan ia uba ki khot u Khrist …… ki nong Samaria ha kata ka shnong ki la ngeit ha u Jisu. Ki ong – Mynta ngi ngeit ym namar ka jingong jong pha hynrei namar ngi la iohsngew ma ngi hi ia u, ngi tip ba une u long shisha u Khrist u Nongpynim ka pyrthei” Ioannis 4:24-42La pdiang ia u Jisu ha Samaria bad sha kylleng ki ri Jentil. Hynrei katba ha ki Jiw (Israel) lyngngai kim tip briew la pynmatlah ia ki, la katta ruh u Jisu u ong ha ka Samaria bad sha ka pyrthei – “Ka jingpynim ka long na ki Jiw, Salvation is from the Jews” Ioanis 3:22. Ka daw ka long namar a u Blei u la mon ba jied ia ka Israel bad na ka jaid Jiw ka Mary Theisotti kein ban kha ia u Jisu Khrist ha ka jinglongdoh.Naduh mynshuwa hi u Blei u la ong ba ki Israel ki long ka jaid bynriew ba eh ryndang. Exodus 32:3-6. Ki long shisha kiba eh bad ki la tylli ruh kum ka jaid bynriew. La kyntait ia u Jisu da ki Jiw hynrei ka long ka lad jingpynim pat ia ki Jentil namar ki pdiang bad ngeit ba u Jisu u long uta u Khrist u khun u Blei.Na kata ka daw, u Apostol Paul u ong – “Kumta shaphang ka Gospel, ki long ki nongshun na ka bynta jong phi (Jentil) hyrnrei shaphang ka jingjied (election) ki long ba la ieit ia ki, na ka bynta kita ki Kpa” Nong Rom 11:28. Ki Jiw kim pdiang ia ka Gospel u Jisu Khrist kein haduh mynta.Na kata ka daw ka la wan ka jingpynim sha ki Jentil na ki Jiw (Salvation for the Gentiles from Jesus). Kumta ka pynksan ia ngi (Jentil) da ka snam jong u (Jisu). Yn pynim ia ngi da u na kata ka jingbitar u Blei” Rom 5:9. “Naba u Blei ula buh ia ngi ym ia ka jingbitar hynrei ia ka ban ioh jingpynim da u Jisu Khrist uba u Trai jong ngi” 1 Thessoloni 5:9.U Jisu u iohi ia kane naduh mynshwa ia ka jinglong ki Israel kein. Dei na kata ka daw u iam na ka bynta ka Jerusalem uda ong – Ah Jerusalem Jerusalem! …… katno sien ba nga la kwah ban kdup ia ki khun jong pha kumba ka syiar ka kdup ia ki khun jong ka hapoh ki thapniang jong ka, PHI TE PHIM MON” Mathaios 23:37.U Jisu u iam ym namar ba u isynei ia ka Temple u Solomon ym ia ki maw ki dieng hynrei ia ki Jiw kein ba kim pdiang kim ithuh ba u long u jong ki, kim tip ba u long u Syiem jong ki, u Messiah uba ki kwah la slem bah.U Jisu u la hukum ban ialap ia ka Gospel ha ki kynja bynriew baroh – “To leit sha ka pyrthei baroh to ialap ia ka Gospel ha ki bynrew baroh” Loukas 16:15. Kane ka hukum ban leit ialap ka la sdang sha ki Jentil ha kylleng ka pyrthei lyngba ki synran bad ki Apostol. Ha Antiok u Paul bad u Barnabas ki ialap ia ka Gospel u Khrist, hynrei ki Jiw ki pihuin ia ki bad kren bein ruh. Kumta u Paul bad u Barnabas ki la kren shlur ha ki Jiw ki da ong – “La donkam ban ialap ha phi NYNGKONG ia ka ktien u Blei, hynrei namar ba phi la kyntait noh ia ka bad phi rai ialade ki bym bit ia ka jingim bymjukut, HA KHMIH NGI PHAI NOH SHA KI JENTIL” ki kam Apostol 13:44-46.Ki Jiw ha lade ki sngew bahok badk i bud ia ki niam ki rukom ki kpa tymmen jong ki hyndai. Rom 2:19-24. Hynrei kim tip ba ki kyntait ia ka jing shisha (Truth) bad ia ka jingpynim (Salvation) kaba u Blei u la ai lyngba u khun jong u u Jisu Khrist.Kumta ki Jiw ki la duh noh ban long ki Lyngdoh bad ka hima Lyngdoh (Kingdom of Priest) namar ka jingeh ryndang jong ki. Exodus 19:3-6. Bad kane ka jia haduh mynta ba ki Jiw ne Israel kim pdiang bad kim kwah ban sngew ia ka jingialap Gospel shaphang u Jisu Khrist. Ki kren bein pynban bad bynthiew lada uno uno u ialap shaphang u Jisu Khrist. Kane ka jia myta hi ha Israel ha Jerusalem.Ia ka Gospel u Jisu Khrist la ialap bad dang ialap sha kylleng ka pyrthei lyngba ki Channel ki Media ba bun rukom bad lyngba ki Nongialap (Preachers). Katta ba ha Israel ki pdiang bad kim kwah ban iohsngew ia u Jisu Khrist, namar ia ka Gospel, ki long ki nongshun kein. Lah ban pyndep jingialap ia ka Gospel ha kylleng pyrthei hynrei ha Israel yn ym lah pyndep tad haduh ba u Jisu un wan pat sha kane ka pyrthei. Dei na kane ka daw ba u Jisu u la kren lypa u ong – “Phim ym lah pyndep ia ki shnong ki Israel, tad ynda un wan u khun u briew” Mathaios 10:23.Te lano yn pyndep ban ialap ban pynsngew ia ki Israel? Dei tad haduh ka jingwan u Jisu, ban pyndep ban ialap ha ki da ki angel na bneng. une u angel u don ka Gospel bymjukut ha ka kti – U ong da ka ktien ba jam “To sheptieng ia u Blei to ai ka burom ha u, naba la wan ka por ka jingbishar jong u” Jingpynpaw 14:6-7.Ki Jiw ne Israel kin ngeit bad kin iohi ruh ia uba ki la kyntait u dei uta u Jisu ia uba ki Jentil ki la ialap ia ki. U dei u Messiah jong ki. “Ha kata ka sngi ki kjat jong u (Jisu) kin ieng halor u lum Olive ha pyrshah Jerusalem” Sekharaiah 14:11 “Te ha kata ka sngi – ngan theh buk halor ka iing u David, halor ki nong Jerusalem ka mynsiem jingaiei bad jingkyrpad ……. Kin khmih ha nga ia uba ki la sum kim iam briew ia u Jisu ……. Ha kata ka sngi kan long ka jingiam briew bakhraw ha Jerusalem” Sekharaiah 12:10-11.Dei ha kata ka por ki Jiw ne Israel kin shai ki khmat kin ong pleng une u Jisu ba la ialap hapdeng jong ki da ki Jentil, u dei u Messiah jong ngi.Kin sngew dung ngak ha la ki dohnud ba ki la kyntait ia u ki la la leh bein ki la sahnarphna ruh. Na kata ka daw kin iam rangbah rangsan bad kan long ka sngi jingiam briew bakhraw ha Jerusalem ha ki sngi ban sa wan, ong ka ktien u Blei kein.Kumta ban ialap mynta ha ki Jiw ia ka Gospel u Jisu Khrist, ka long ka jingbiej ha ki. Kin ong kine ki briew kiba biej. Na kata ka daw yn ym lah ban pyndep ia ka jingialap Gospel mynta ha ki Jiw ne Israel tad ynda u Jisu un wan hiar na bneng da lade hi, tad ynda kin tip ba u Jisu u dei u Messiah uba ki la ap la slem bah mynta, tad ynda kin sa ia iam rangbah rangsan na ka bynta u Jisu bad dei hangta ma ki pat kein pynkhraw ia ka kyrteng jong u ha kata ka por.Balei une u  AIS Suja u ialap Niam ha kot khubor ruh manla ka por kumne.hato ymdon jaka mo ia u ban leit ialap ha ingmane lane ha kiwei kiwei ki jaka ba lah shna kyrpang ban ialap niam .nga kyrpad ia u Rupang u nongthoh ia Kane ka khubor ba phin sngewbha ban nym pynmih kum Kane ka khubor ialap Niam hangne ,namar ka khubor khasi Kam dei tang na bynta kiba lah kylla Niam kristan,ha ka jingshisha kane ka khubor kadei na bynta baroh ki Khun khasi lane u Khun hynñiew trep hynñiew skum.Te na kata kadaw nga kyrpad biang iaphi daka jingsngewrit mynsiem ba phim dei ban pynmih kum Kane ka khubor ialap Niam ,namar ka jaka ialap Niam ka lah don lypa ba kin ialap bad kumjuh nga pan map naphi ki ba ngeit ba phim dei ban sngew ei ei halor kane na bynta kabha kamiat Jong u paid khasi jongngi bad kumjuh na bynta ka jingiatylli lang kawei ka jaitbynriew phi dei ban leh salonsar khnang ba ymdon ka jingsngewpher Niam .Khublei shuibunShihajar nguh.
title: “Yn ym pat dep ban ialap ha Israel, tad ynda u Jisu un wan!”

content: Khliehriat: Ka Rural & Urban Development Society, East Jaintia Hills District ka long kawei na ki Seng treimon sngewbha kaba trei naka bynta ka bha ka mait bad ka roi ka par jong ki nongkyndong hapoh ka district kala pyrshah jur ia ka  public hearing Jong ka star Cement halor ka jingthmu Jong ka ban pynheh ia ka jingpyntih mawshun ha ka shnong Brishyrnot, elaka narpuh. Ka Seng kala pyrshah jur ia ka public hearing halor kiba bun ki nongrim:-Halor kane ka nongrim ka Seng ka la dep ai jingthoh ka jingpyrshah ia kane ka jingthmu ka star cement ban pynheh ia ka jing tih mawshun sha ka Meghalaya State pollution control board, shillong. Bad ruh kala kyrpad ia ka meghalaya state pollution control ban pynpep noh ia kane ka jingthmu jong ka.
title: Pyrshah jur ka Rural & Urban Development Society (RUDS)ia ka public hearing jong ka Star Cement

content: Shillong:Mynta ka sngi ki dkhot jong ka Hynniewtrep Youth Council (HYC) NEHU unit ryngkat bad ka HYC Central body ki la leit ban kynduh ia u SP city u Bah Steve Rynjah ban ia kren shaphang ka jingshah shoh jong uwei na ki dkhot jong ka HYC mynnin ka miet 9 u risaw 2019 ha ka por 11 baje eiei.Haba ia kren bad ki lad pathai khubor u General secretary ka HYC NEHU Unit  u Endlang Sawian u la iathuh “Hadien ba la dep ban pynskhem ia ka jingpyn kit kam kum ba 11 baje eiei myn miet, ki briew kiba don 10 ngut eiei ki briew ki bym lah ban ithuh ha ka ba ki la sop la spain ki la leit ban shoh ia u wei na u dkhot ka HYC NEHU unit ha ka kamra number ba 18 ha hostel kupli NEHU.”U la ia thuh ruh “Kine ki briew ki  la wan rah da ki tiar ki tar bad rung beit beit sha kamra bad kylli beit ia ki mano ba dei u dkhot HYC te ki la shu shoh shu dat bad byrngem ruh ia u ba u dei ban weng ia lade na ka HYC.”Ym tang une u khynnah, hynrei u wei u khynnah u ba dei na ka jait bynriew Assamese ruh u la shah shoh lang ha kine ki briew.Na ka liang ka HYC ki la ujor da ka ejahar ha Mawlai Police Station pyrshah ia kine ki briew mynnin hi ka mied bad mynta ka sngi ki la wan ban kyrpad ia u SP city ba un shim khia ia kane ka jing jia ha NEHU.Na ka liang u bah Steve Rynjah u la kular ba un shim khia ia kane ka jingjia khang  ban ioh  kem noh ia ki ne ki runar ki ba don kti ban shoh pynmynsaw ia kine ki khynnah pule ka skul bah NEHU.
title: Ujor ka HYC sha U SP City, ba shah shoh u dkhot ha NEHU

content: La iohi ia uwei u shrieh, uba kiew ha tyrpeng u pulit bad uba bunkam ban iit ksi. Katei ka dei ha kawei ka thanat ha Pilibhit jong ka Uttar Pradesh. La iohi ruh ba katba u pulit, u dang trei kam, utei u shrieh ruh u nang bunkam ban iit ksi bad kam don satia kano kano ka jingsngew wit hapdeng jongki.Katei ka video, ka dei kaba don 53 sekhon bad ka dei ka jong U  Shrikant Dwivedi, uba dei u pulit Inspector, uba dang trei kam, katba u shrieh u dang shong ha tyrpeng bad trut ia u shniuh jongu.Ym shym la tip pat, la katei ka video, ka dei kaba la ring mynno, namar ba ym shym la don ba batai satia.
title: U shrieh uba shong ha tyrpeng u heh pulit bad nang iit ksi

content: La ioh khubor ba ki shipai ka Turkey, ki la rung mynta sha Syria, na ka bynta ban hiar thma bad pynjem toin ia ki kynhun jong ki Kurds, ha kaba la shim ba ki dei ki ehrang kiba dei ban pyndem noh mardor.Kitei ki shipai, ki la poi ha ka nongbah Tell Abaid bad Sari Kani, hynnin ka miet, ong ka kyrwoh na ki Kurds.Na ka liang ka Turkey, ka kyntait ba ka la dep rung sha u pud u sam ka Syria, hynrei la iathuh pat ba ka jingther bom na suin, ka la sdang naduh hynnin ka miet, ha kaba katei ka ri, ka khot ia katei ka jingiakhun, da ka  Operation Peace Spring.Ki shipai jong ka Turkey, ki la ther hynnin ka miet ia ki surok, kiba dei ki lynti iaid ba kongsan jong ki Kurds bad ki jaka ban kit mar bam mardih bad la iathuh ba ka jingther bom, ka la iai bteng hynnin ka miet ha ka nongbah Ras al-Ain, ha kaba ki tup ki man ka Turkey ki ther tyngeh ha katei ka thain.U Donald Trump, U President ka America, ula pynpaw, ba um pdiang satia ia katei ka jingleh jong ka Turkey bad u khot ba katei ka jinghiar thma, ka dei ka jingmut kaba sniew.Ka jinghiar thma jong ka Syria, ka sdang tang hadien khyndiat sngi, ba ka America, ka la rai ban mih noh na katei ka Ri.Ki shipai Kurds  kiba la tip kum ka Syrian Democratic Forces (SDF), ki iathuh ba ka jingther bom jong ki liengsuin iapom ka Turkey, ha ka miet jong ka Sngi Balang, ka la pynher mynsiem ia ki nongshong shnong ha katei ka nongbah.
title: Rung ki shipai Turkey sha Syria, hiar thma da ki liengsuin iapom ia ki Kurds

content: Tura: Uwei u khynnah rit, uba 10 snem ka rta, U  Sachin Koch, ula iap ei, haba ka trok, kaba u shong, kaba dang leit bret blei ha Purakhasia, West garo Hills, ka la tylliat noh ia u.U Sachin Koch, u dei uba na ka shnong Borjhora bad u shong hadien jong ka trok, kaba kit blei thaw ha ka shnong Purakhasia hynnin ka sngi, hynrei, ula bakla bad ula hap na ka trok, ha kaba ka la tylliat, da ka shaka kaba na dien, ha kaba ula iap syndon ha shen.Hynnin ka sngi ha Shillong ruh, U Atul Arora (42) uba na  Nongmynsong, ula iap ei, haba ula shah tylliat hi ha ka trok kit blei thaw. La iathuh ba utei u hap na ka trok, kaba don ia u number ML05 C 3959, kaba dang iaid sha ka jaka bret blei ha Polo.
title: Khlad u hep rit ba hap na ka trok bret blei

content: Ka juti, kaba dang shu mih thymmai, ka dei kaba la ai kyrteng Jesus shoes bad katei ka dei ka juti, kaba la buh khyndiat ka um khuid, ha kaba la pyn kyntang da u lyngdoh niam bad ka dor jongka, ka long $3,000 lane kaba shongdor T.2lak tam ha ka pisa India.La iathuh ba ki don bun bah kiba kwah ban phong ia katei ka juti bad ka dei kaba la pynmih da ka kompeni MSCHF, kaba na Brooklyn.La iathuh ba katei ka juti, ka don ka um kaba la tong na ka wah Jordan bad nangta la ai rong ban ithuh ba ka don hapoh juti. Ha katei ka juti, la thoh ruh ia ki kyntien jong ka Baibl na U Mathaios 14:25 bad la buh ruh ia shi jaw ka snam, kaba pyni ba ka dei ka snam U Jisu Khrist, kaba don ha ka thylliej jong ka juti.Ym tang katta, la buh ruh ia ka dur diengphna ha katei ka juti.
title: Jesus shoes, ka dei ka juti kaba dang shu mih thymmai

content: Nongpoh:  Kiba ha iing jong uwei u pulit ba la shongthait, uba la tip kyrteng kum u Harka Bahadur (78) na ka shnong Umdihar, Ri-Bhoi District, hynne ka janmiet ki la leit ban ujor sha ki Pulit ka Nongpoh Police Station, namar ba utei u Rangbah ba la noh ka rta um shem la wanphai iing shuh hadien ba u la mih na iing naduh dang step phyrngab.Ki bahaiing ki la iathuh, ba u tei u rangbah u la mih na iing naduh ka por 5 baje ei ei mynstep, da kaba shong da kawei ka Tourist Sumo khlem da rah eiei ha met, hynrei haduh janmiet ki bahaiing kim tip shano u don bad kaba la pynlong ruh ia kiba haiing ba kin ujor syndon sha ki Pulit.Ki la iathuh ruh ba u tei u rangbah, u don hapdeng ka jingshitom bad ym pat tip haduh mynta shano u leit bad naduh ba u mih na iing u phong ia ka patlun lyngkot ba rongiong, ka t-shirt ba ronglieh bad ka slipar jri ba rong jyrngam.
title: Ujor kiba haiing ba jah u rangbah na Umdihar

content: Shillong:  Ki nongtrei ka Meghalaya EMRI Workers Union (MEMRIWU) ki la byrthen ba ki lah ban iakhih da kaba shah thngan syndon lada ka sorkar jylla ka iai mynthi ia ki jingdawa jongki.Ka jingiakhih jongki ka la sdang naduh ka 30 tarik Nailur ba la dep bad ka la iaid haduh mynta ka sngi.Kine ki nongtrei kila iashong miet bad sngi ha ïing dara ba ki shna ha phyllaw ka kompeni GVK EMRI 108 ha Lawmali, Shillong.U president ka seng u bah Roipar Kharraswai u la ong ba sngew lyngngoh ba ka sorkar ka la niat sha ka kompeni ban pynbeit ia kane ka kam watla ka dei ma ka, kaba ai pisa ha kaba ka kompeni lei ka dei tang ka nongpyniaid.“Lada ka sorkar ka dang iai mynti, ngim banse ban iakhih ruh da kaba shah thngan”, la ong u bah Roipar.
title: La 10 sngi iaid ka jingiakhih  khlem pud ki MEMRIWU, byrthen ban shah thngan syndon

content: Shillong: Ka East Student Union ka la phah shithi sha u Union Home Ministry ka ri India u Amit Shah kaba phah ka jingujor pyrshah ia ki Student Union bapher bapher kiba don ha kane ka ri lum Khasi, ia ki iingmane Khistan bad ki nongialam jong ka, ba ka ju don ka jingthombor kaba man ki por pyrshah ia kiwei pat ki jaitbynriew ne wat la ki jong ki jait ki bym dei ki Khristan kiba im ba sah hapoh kane ka jylla.Kumba ngi tip ba ka Meghalaya ka dei ka jylla kaba la tap byllen da u riewngeit Khristan, hynrei kaba lyngngoh pat ka long ba ka jur bha ka jingsngew iapher jait iapher kynja bad ka jingiapher niam kaba la lam sha ka jingsyier ka shong suk shong sain ia jaitbynriew rit paid kiba shong ha ki shnong ki kyntoit kane ka jylla. Ha kane ka shithi ka East Student Union ka la pynpaw ia ki katto katne ki jingjia na ka daw ka jingsngewiapher niam iapher kynja.Ha ka snem 2001 ka la don ka jingpyrshah na ki katto katne ki nongialam ka niam Khristan kaba ha ka kyrteng jong ka Dorbar shnong, ka pyrshah ban thang ia ka met jong u Lt. Pharsaited Buhphang namar ba u dei na ka niam tynrai. Ha ka snem 2002 u nongtrei ba ha khmat jong ka seng Social Worker uba dei ruh u nongialam ka seng Khasi u Bah Rijoy Sing Kongshah u la shah rahbor, namar ba u la leit bud ia ka niam tynrai. Katto katne ki kynhun ki la pynpra ia ka jaka leh niam ha u Lum Sohpetbneng, ka jaka kaba ki riewngeit ka niam tynrai ki shait pynlong ka jingiaid pilgrim. La don katto katne ki kynhun kiba la khang pyrshah ia ki riewngeit Hindu ban leh niam ha u Mawjymbuin kaba don ha Mawsynram. Ka la don ruh ka jingia ieng ialeh pyrshah ha kaba ka kynhun ki riewngeit Khristan ka la khang pyrshah ia ka kynhun ki riewngeit ka niam tynrai ban thang ia ka met u nongialam ka seng Khasi, ha ka jaka thang kaba don ha Mylliem. Ka shnong Kongthong kaba don kumba 80% ki riewngeit ka niam tynrai, myn ha ka snem ba la dep ki la mad ka jingshah thombor na ka kynhun ba la ialam khmat da ki nongialam ka niam Khristan ha kaba ki la pynpra ia ka jaka leh niam jong ki. Dang shen ka Jaintia Students Union ka la shah pynthame na ki nongialam ka niam Khristan ban pyrshah ia ka jingbuh ia u blei Ganesha ha NIT Campus Shillong kaba la buh ia ka mynsiem khohnioh ha ka imlang sahlang.Kane ka shithi ka ong shuh shuh ba tang namar ba ka Meghalaya ka dei ka jylla Khristan, ka sorkar bad ki pulit kim ju shim khia ia kum kine ki case bad um ju don ki bor kiba paka ban khmih ia ki Office sorkar ki skul bad ki college bad wat ha ki jaka paidbah. Lada ka jingthang ia ka met, ka jingbuh ia u blei Ganesha, ka jingbud ia ka niam tynrai ka long ka kam beain lane ka long pyrshah ia ka jinglaitluid ha ka rukom mane blei te balei ba ki Missionaries Khristan ki lah ban khring sha ka jingngeit jong ki haduh mynta, balei ba ki skul bad ki College Khristan ki buh ia u statue u Jisu bad ialap ia ka niam Khristan ha ki jaka pule, balei ba ki Office sorkar ki buh ia ka dur u Jisu ha ki kamra jong ki, balei ba ka North Eastern Hills University kaba pdiang ia baroh ha la ki jong ki jingngeit, pynban ki dang don ki kam ialap hapoh ka campus ba la ialam da ki nongialam ka niam Khristan ban Khring sha ka jingngeit jong ki, balei ba bun ki kali sorkar ki buh ia u statue bad ka dur u Jisu, balei ba ha man la ki dong bad ki jaka paidbah ha Shillong la pynieng ia u statue u Jisu Khrist.Ha kane ka shithi ba la thoh da ka kyrteng U bah HG Nongrum President bad U AC Sangma, Secretary, ka East Student Union ka pynpaw ka jingbynniaw kaba khraw lada kano kano ka seng khraw paid ka lah ban thombor ia ki rit paid, te ka jingsynshar paidbah ha ri India kaba la ju pynshong nongrim baroh shi katta ha ka jinglaitluid ha ka rukom synshar bad ha ka mane blei ka la pynbakla noh haba ngi khmih ia kine ki jingjia kiba la jia ha kane ka jylla, te ngi kum ka Union ngi dawa ba ki bor ba halor kin shim da ki lad ban pynshitom tyngeh ia kine ki Student Union, ki iingmane bad ia ki nongialam ka niam  Khristan khnang ba ngin lah ban pynneh ia ka shong suk shong sain ha ka imlang sahlang.Ka dei ka jingkynnoh tang bn pynthohbria iaka niam khristan, bad ki shim kabu jait ba ki (Hindu) don ka bor synshar.Ym slem shuh ngi ki khristan ngin mad iaki jingeh bakhraw ha Meghalaya namar ba ngim burom shuh iaka Jing ngeit kiwei pat ki bym dei khristan.Kane ka dei ka jingkynnoh bym don nongrum haei haei ruh, ka dei tang ka khubor wanrah jingkulmar haka imlang sah lang, hangno ju don’t ta ka jinglehbor thombor ngam ju ioh sngew hynrei ka dei tang ka tien thawnang jong kine .ki riewharam mimok ne haram mi klat khlem jingmut, da pyrkhat sani ko rangbah shwa ban kren wat, ju thaw jingkulmar khlem nongrum…..Ka ksow poh jait kum kita roh nang ban wanrah kloi por sang mo mia roh ban thoh sa ia kata. Ba men da thoh shithi iaki khappud jong ki jaidbynrow jong ngi ki hynniewtrep te hooid mia.Balei ba Tang ki hindu ki don ka bor Synshar ngi ki khristan ngim don ngim lah seh khamtam hangne Ha ri khasi lade
title: Ujor sha U Amit Shah, ba thombor  ia ki bym dei Kristan ha Meghalaya

content: Shillong: Ka Meghalaya Athletic Association (MAA) ha ka sien nyngkong kan leit ban shim bynta sha ka 59th National Open Senior Athletic championship ha Ranchi Jharkhand ka sdang naduh 10 haduh14 tarik mynta u bnai 2019.Ka MAA ka la sei ar ngut ki nongialehkai u Dising Phawa,West Jaintia ha ka jingiakhun ba 3000 mt ba la khur takma ksiar ha ka iakop 1500mts U-20, bad Batsrang Sangma ha ka 5000 mts ba la paw ha ka iakop mareh ba jngai bad bun ki jingiakop mareh half marathon na Tura.Ia kane ka kynhun yn ialam da ka manager cum coach ka Babira Momin na ka tnad ialehkai ka jylla.Katkun ka kyrwoh ba la phah da bah Finely Pariat Secy ka MAA ula ong ba kane ka dei sien banyngkong ban kyntiew ia ki khynnah ka jylla ha ka jingialehkai ban pynkhreh ia ka National Game 2020. Na ka liang ka synjuk ka kitbok ia ki nongialehkai ba kin lah ban ialehkai bha ban wanrah burom ia ka jylla da ka nam jop.
title: Ar ngut ki nongialehkai Athletic, jied ka MAA sha ka National Athletic C’ship

content: Shillong:  Ka KSU Mawlai Circle lyngba ka jingtrei shitom jong kawei na ka tnat treikam jong ka KSU Mawlai Mawroh Unit, myn hynnin ka sngi,  ha ka por kumba 2baje 2shiteng nohphaisngi sngi,   ka la iohkem noh ia 5ngut kiba kynthup lang bad nongdie.Hadien ba la suba bad ishankhmat iaka rukom iaid rukom ieng jong kitei ki briew na ka liang ki dkhot jong katei ka shnat treikam ki la bat iaki bad mardor ki la pyntip sha ki pulit jong ka Pasteur Beat house ba kin leh iaka ba donkam.Hadien ba lawan ki pulit na Pasteur bad jong ka tnat Narcotics la pynlong ia ka jingkhynra ia ka met jong ki bad ha katei ka jing khynra na ka met jong u Khrawbok Pamthet 25snem na Mawlai Nongpdeng uba la suba ba u dei u nongkhaii la ioh ban kurup ia u drug uba poi ka jingkhia kumba 0.94grams ryngkat ka pisa kaba don ka long T.16,590 ia kaba la suba ba ka dei ka pisa kaba u ioh na kaba die drugs,katba na ka met kitei ki 4ngut kata na u Bokstar Syiemlieh 23snem na Umiam Nongsder,u George Nonglait 26snem na Wahingdoh Block 1, U Aman Sunar 20snem na Laitumkhrah Upper New Colony bad u Evenzar Basaiawmoit 30snem na Wahingdoh Block 2, kiba suba ba ki dei tang ki nongdih kiba thmu ban leit thied ym shym la ioh ei ei, lait noh tang ka pisa kaba long T.2,730 tyngka.Hadien ba ladep ban leh iaki test baroh la pynshisha ba utei u powder uba ioh naki u dei u drug uba bun na ki khun samla bad ki hep kiba rit ki shait pyndonkam bha.Kumta naka liang jong ka KSU Mawlai Circle kam sngew don jingmut  shuh ban sneng ne ban pylong ia kita ki jingai jinghikai ne ki jingialap pyrshah drug, hynrei nangne shakhmat kan nang bthah ia baroh ki Unit kiba don hapoh ka jylli treikam jong ka Mawlai Circle ba kin long kiba peit bad ban ialeh pyrshah ia kum kitei ki jaitkam kampher la un dei tang nongdih ne u nongdie ruh.Ha kajuh ka por na ka liang ka Circle ka khot kawer ia ki Dorbar Shnong Seng Longkmie bad Seng Samla jong ki shnong bapher bapher kiba don haka shnong Mawlai ba kin ai ia ka jing iatrei lang kaba radbah khnang ba ngin lah ban iakhun ia utei u jingdih uba long ka jinghiar thma kaba jar jar jar ia ka jaitbynriew hi baroh kawei lyngba ki khun samla bad ki hep barit,pynkut ka kyrwoh na ka KSU Mawlai Circle.
title: Iohbat nongdih bad nongdie  drug ka KSU Mawlai Circle

content: Shillong:  Ka Youth Development Cell (YDC) jong ka Meghalaya Football Association ka la sdang ia ka prokram jied khynnah ialehkai U-17 Junior Team na ka bynta ban leit iashim bynta ha ka lympung ialehkai Football National Junior Championship jong ka AIFF ka ban long ha u bnai Nohprah.Ka YDC ka la shim khia ban pynlong kham kloi ia kane ka prokram na bynta ban ioh pynkhreh kham bha ia ki khynnah ialehkai watla kadei ka por ba ki khynnah ki bun kam ban pynkhreh na ka bynta ki final eksam.Ka MFA ka la pynshang ban lum ia baroh ki khynnah na ki District kiba la pyniasoh ban ioh ia ki khynah ba kynsai hynrei ki don tang khyndiat ngut kiba la wan iashim bynta ha ka prokram.Na ka liang ka MFA ka la pyntip ba kan pynlong biang ia ka jingjied khadduh kynthup ki khynnah ba la dep ban jied na ka kynhun ialehkai Subroto Cup ba dang shu dep shen bad na kiwei ki District. Ka prokram ban jied khynnah kan long ha Tura.
title: Yn jied nongialehkai ka MFA sha ka National Junior Championship

content: Nongpoh:  Ka Sonidan Sports Club lem bad ka Lumniwar Sports Club, ki la long kum ki kynhun kiba la poi sha ka thup jong ka Phainal ha ka Ri Bhoi League Championship 2019, ka lympung ialehkai football kaba la pyniaid da ka Ri Bhoi District Sport Association (RBDSA).Lah ruh ban kdew hangne ba kitei ki ar kynhun kiba la poi sha katei ka thup jong ka Phainal, ki dei kiba la mih na ka Mawhati Zone bad kiba la pynliem lut ia baroh ki kynhun ialehkai, kiba la mih na Umsning Zone, Bhoirymbong bad Nongpoh Zone.Ia katei ka phainal, kaba na RBDSA ka la pynbeit ba kan pynlong ha ka 11 tarik mynta u bnai ha ka madan ialehkai ka shnong Umdihar, ha kaba ka kynhun ialehkai jong ka Sonidan SC kan  iakhun pyrshah ia ka Lumniwar SC, na ka bynta ban pynthikna ialade kum kita ki kynhun kiba khlain tam ha Ri Bhoi.Na ka liang ki bor pyniaid ka RBDSA, ka la nang pynkhreh shaid shaid ban pynlong ia katei ka jingiakhun ia ka phainal kaba shongkun bad kaban sah jingkynmaw hadien ba la lah ban pynkhie im biang ia kane ka lympung ialehkai football kaba heh jong ka district hadien ba ka la jah noh shipor.Haba ia kren bad ki lad pathai khubor, u Bah G.S Shadap kum u Senior Vice President ka RBDSA, u la pynpaw ia ka jingkmen ba sa shisien pat kane ka lympung ialehkai jong ka Ri Bhoi League la lah ban pynlong ia ka hadien ba ka la jah shipor hynrei ha kane ka kynti da ka jingiatreishitom lang jong baroh ki nongkitkam ka synjuk la lah ban pynlong ia kane ka lympung ialehkai football kaba jop bad kaba shongkun.U la pyntip ruh, ba ka RBDSA ka la pynkhreh bha ban pynlong ia ka phainal kaba itynnad bad kaba shongkun ia kaba la buh ha ka 11 tarik mynta u bnai ha madan Umdihar, ha kab u Bah Banteidor Lyngdoh, Myntri ka tnat ialehkai sport ka jylla un wan ban long kum u kongsan ha ka jingiadonlang ruh kiwei kiwei ki riew pawkhmat kynthup naduh ki MLA, ki MDC ka Ri Bhoi District, ki heh ophisar bad ki rangialehkai ba pawkhmat ka jylla kin wan ban sakhi ia ka jingpynhap pyrda ia kane ka Ri Bhoi League 2019.Namarkata, na ka liang ka RBDSA ka kyntu ia ki paidbah ha Ri Bhoi, ba kin wan ban sakhi ha katei ka sngi, kaba yn pynkut noh ia ka Ri Bhoi League Championship 2019.
title: Ka Lumniwar pyrshah ia ka Sonidan ha ka phainal jong ka Ri Bhoi League 2019

content: Shillong: U bah Lambor Malngiang, u ba dei u  Chairman jong ka Meghalaya State Planning Board (MSPB), u la ong ba na ka liang jong u, un ym leit ban ialap ilekshon na bynta jong no jong no ruh ha kane ka ilekshon MLA shiteng samoi ha 26-Shella Konstitwensi ka ban long ha ka 21 tarik mynta u bnai.Utei u MLA shimet u ba don lang ha ka sorkar Meghalaya Democratic Alliance (MDA) u la pynpaw ba na ka liang jong u, u kwah ba ka jing jop kan wan sha u  kyrtong ba don lang ha ka sorkar MDA bad kitei ki long u kyrtong jong ka UDP bad jong ka PDF bad u kyrtong shimet.Haba pynshai halor ka United Progressive Forum (UPF), u bah Lambor u la ong ba kane kam dei ka seng sain pyrthei, hynrei ka dei ka tang ka  kynhun.U la ong ba lada u leit na ka bynta u kyrtong ka party UDP, ka la shitom ban kiar, namar ba u don ka jingiadei kaba jan bad ka iing ka sem jong u Dr Donkupar Roy  (bam kwai ha dwar u blei), lada u leit na ka bynta u kyrtong ka PDF, kam bha namar ki ia don lang ha UPF. Kumta u la rai ban nym leit ban ialap na ka bynta jong no jongno ruh.
title: Ngan ym  leit ialap elekshon na bynta jongno jong no ruh, nga kwah ban jop u briew ka MDA: Lambor

content: Shillong:    U Chairman ka Meghalaya State Planning Board u bah Lambor Malngiang u la pyntip  ba ha u bnai Naiwieng, un leit jurip ia ki jaka ki ba la ioh skim lyngba ka Aqua Mission ban shna pung ban ri dohkha.Ha ba ia kren bad ki nong pathai khubor u bah Malngiang, u la ong  “Ngan leit jurip hi da lade ha u bnai Naiwieng khamtam ia ki to ki jaka ki ba la bei haduh 25 haduh 30 lakh ban leit peit hi katno na kito ki jaka ki la lah ban pynmih ia ki dohkha. Kumba long mynta kumba 27 hajar ki pung kiba ka sorkar ka la thmu ban ai jing iarap ban shna ia ki pung bad ban ri ia ki doh kha ha kaba kumba 19 hajar ki ladep shna ia ki pung dohkha.”Ha lor ka jing pynkylla ia ki jaka rep sha ki jaka ban shna ia ki pung dohkha u bah Malngiang u la ong   ba ka jing shna ia kine ki pung dohkha ha ki jaka ki ba mih bha ki mar rep ka ktah ia ki jaka rep, khamtam ha ki thain jong ka Ribhoi District. “Na ka liang jong ngi  ngin hap ban shim khia ha lor kane ka liang khang ba kan ym ktah ia ki jaka ki ba pynmih bun ia ki mar rep ngi hap ban pynkylla ia ki ain (rule) ban iada ia kine ki jaka” ong U bah Malngiang.Halor ka jing kylli ba hato don ne em ka jing pyndonkam bakla ia ka pisa ha ka ba ki la dep ioh ia ki pisa, hynrei kim shym la shna ia ki pung ne khlem da ri ia ki dohkha u la ong  “Ka dei ka kamram jong nga ba ngan leit jurip hi khnang ba ngan tip ia ka jing pyndonkam bakla ne pyndonkam bha ia  kane ka skim Aqua Mission kat mynta ki don ha duh 8 hajar ki pung kiba dang shna ngin leit ban jurip ia ki ne ki pung ban shim khia halor ka jing don  ki dohkha lane ki don ki pung ha  kito ki  district ki ba la don haduh 500 ne 1000 ngut ki ba la ioh jing iarap na ka ne ka Aqua Skim”  ula pynkut.
title: Ha u Naiwieng, yn jurip ka MSPB ia ki pung dohkha kiba shna lyngba ka skim Aqua Mission

content: Shillong: Ka Shillong, ka ioh ia ka jinghap slap ha ki 24 kynta ba ladep, haduh 22.0 milimetre.Hynrei ha kitei ki juh ki kynta, ka Sohra, ka duna slap bha, ha kaba ka ioh tang 1.0 mm, katba ka Umiam, ka ioh 4.2mm.Ka jingshit jingkhriat ha Shillong, kaba shit eh ka long 20.0, katba kaba khriat eh ka long 14.1 degree, katba ka Sohra, ka long 24.7 la 17.0 bad ka Umiam, ka long 24.7 la 18.5 degree.Lashai ka sngi ruh ka don ka jing maham, ba kan don ka jingtied pyrthat bad ka jinghap slap kaba jur ha ki katto katne ki bynta jong ka Jylla.
title: Jur slap ha Shillong, duna slap ha Sohra, Umiam

content: Ki nongtrei ha kad liengsuin jong ka Abu Dhabi, ki kyndit thret, haba ki peit ia ka passport jong uwei u briew, uba wan poi ha katei ka kad liengsuin, uba don 123 snem ka rta.Ka jingthoh ha ka passport jong U Swami Sivananda, ka pyni ba la kha ia u, ha ka 8tarik Nailar 1896, ha Behala, India. U Sivananda, u wan na Kolkata ban leit sha London, da ka liengsuin Ethihad bad u sangeh ha Dubai.Lada ka tarik, ka dei kaba shisha, kumta U Sivananda, u dei uba tymmen tam haduh ha kine ki sngi.U Sivananda, u la duh noh ia ki kmie ki kpa jongu, ha ka por ba u don hynriew snem, bad la aiti ia u, ha uwei u guru bad kumta, ula iaid kylleng ka India, kat haduh ba un shong un sah ha  Varanasi.U  Sivananda,u dei uba ju mlien bha ban ialehkai yoga bad uba im ka jingim kaba u bud bha ia ka rukom im kaba shisur.  “Nga bam tang ka ja, ngam ju pyndei umphniang ne musli musla bad nga bam da u dai uba shet syrwa lem bad khyndiat tylli ki sohmynken” ula ong. U Sivananda, u jrong hynriew phut ar inshi bad u thiah da kaba siang da u shylliah bad u thiah ha madan bad ka syngkhlieh jongu, ka dei da ka dieng sawdong. “Ngam juh bam soh ne dih dud, namar nga shim, ba ki dei ki jingbam bam bad ha ka por khynnah, nga ju im bunsngi khlem bam khlem dih”.
title: Kyndit ki nongtrei liengsuin ha Abu Dhabi, ba ki lap ia u briew uba 123 snem

content: Shillong:  Ka kyrteng jong U bah Radha Mawkhlieng, ka dei kaba ki la tip lut naduh ki rangbah, haduh ki samla bad ki khynnah ha ka shnong Umniuh Tmar, kaba don ha ka thain Riwar Pynursla bad ka daw, ka long namar ba U Bah Radha, uba la don kumba 80snem antad, ula dei uwei na ki nong pynkha khyllung uba tbit bad uba la iarap sbun mynsiem ia bun bah ki longkmie kiba kha khyllung ha ka Shnong Umniuh Tmar bad ha kiwei de ki shnong kiba marjan jong katei ka thain.Ha ka sngi Saitjain ba ladep, ki riew rangbah jong ka Elaka, ki la ia kynduh kyrpang bad U bah Radha, na ka bynta ban ai burom, halor katei ka jingshakri, kaba ula leh ia ki longkmie bad ki longiing, kiba donkam ia ka jing iarap jongu, ha ka por jong ka jingkha khyllung.Na ka jingthoh, kaba u tah ha khmat jingkhang jongu, ha ka kyntoit Nongrim jong katei ka Elaka, la pyni, ba U Bah Radha, ula sdang ia ka kam pynkha khyllung naduh u snem 1974 bad ula pyni ia ki jingkhein kiba u iarap ban pynkha khyllung ha ka shisnem shisnem bad haba khein na kitei ki jingthoh, kiba ula buh, la lap ba ki khyllung kiba la pynkha na ka kti jongu, ki long baroh 2,732ngut bad katei ka long ha ki 45snem kynthih.Utei u rangbah, u pyni ba ha u snem 1974, ula pynkha ia 90ngut ki khyllung bad nangta ha u snem 1975, ula pynkha ia 92ngut ki khyllung bad nangta u bteng ter ter khlem pud bad ha u snem 2017, ula pynkha ia 38ngut bad ha u snem 2018, ula pynkha ia 39ngut bad kitei ki dei kiba buh jingkhein, kiba tang ha ka shnong Umniuh Tmar, khlem da ia khein ia kiba shabar shnong.Ha katei ka jingiakren, utei u rangbah, u iathuh ba u ioh ia katei ka sap, ym dei na kano kano ka jingshah hikai, hynrei, u iathuh ba ka dei ka sap, kaba ula ai U Blei Trai Kynrad ha u bad u iathuh ruh, ba nalor ka Umniuh Tmar, kaba dei ka shnong jongu, u ju leit ban iarap pynkha khun sha Nongjri, Nongshken bad sha kiwei de ki shnong kiba bun bah, ha kaba um ju oh dor satia ia katei ka jingleit ban pynkha khun.Haba iakren bad utei u rangbah, u iathuh ba nyngkong eh, ula ioh ia ka sap ban long u nong khem met, ha kaba u ju iarap ban sumar ia kiba laitdoh, kiba mynsaw, kiba ur bad kumta ter ter; hynrei hadien ba ula sdang ia ka kam pynkha khyllung, ula sangeh noh, ha kaba sumar ia kiba laitdoh bad ula trei noh shibeit tang ban pynkha khun.Ula pyni ia ki katto katne ki kot ki sla, kiba la ithuh da ki kynhun shimet, hynrei, kaba sngew bynniaw ka long ba ka tnat ka koit ka khiah, kam shym la ithuh satia ia utei u rangbah bad ym tang katta, ula kren diaw mynsiem, ba ha katei ka rta kaba 80snem eiei, um shym pat ioh wat tang ia ka skhim bam tymmen ruh.Ha katei ka jingleit ban ai burom, la lam khmat da U bah Teibor Shabong, uba dei U Matabor ka kyntoit Nongrim, ha kaba la don lang ki riew rangbah, ba kynthup ia U bah Elbis Diengdoh bad U bah Monarch Shabong.
title: Ha ki 45 snem, pynkha khyllung u rangbah  haduh 2,732ngut ha Umniuh Tmar

content: Ka MP jong ka seng Trinamool Congress, ka  Nusrat Jahan, ka la shah kren bein ha u nongialam ka niam Muslim, namar ba ka leit shim bynta ha ka jinglehniam Durga Puja.U nongialam niam Muslim, uba paw khmat, ula kren bein hynnin ka sngi, ia ka Jahan, kaba dei ruh ka nongak phlim ba pawnam jong ki phlim Bengali bad u dawa ba ka dei ban kylla noh ia ka kyrteng bad ka niam jongka ruh, namar ka la pynlehrain ia ka niam Islam.La iathuh ba U  Mufti Asad Qasmi, u nongialam niam Muslim jong ka  Darul Uloom Deoband, ula ong “Kane kam dei shuh kaba thymmai. Ka la ju leit mane ia ki blei Hindu, wat ka hukum jong ka niam Muslim, ka dei ban duwai beit tang ia U Allah bad ka jingleh jongka, ka dei ka pop kaba khraw tam”.Utei u nongialam niam, u ong shuh shuh “Ka ia poi kha ruh shabar jong ka niam bad kumta, ka la dei ban kylla ia ka kyrteng bad ka niam jongka ruh”. “Ka Islam, kam donkam ia kito kiba shu leh Muslim bad kiba pyn jah burom pat ia ka niam Muslim” ong U  Qasmi.Ka Jahan, ka leit sha ka lehniam  Durga Puja, ha ryngkat bad u tnga jongka, ha ka Sngi U Blei ba ladep, ha kaba ka riam da ka saree bad ka tah sindur ruh.Na ka liang ka Jahan, ka kren shai ba kam sngew wit satia ia kitei ki jing shah kynnoh bad kren bein bad ka ong “Kitei ki jingkren ki ktah eiei ia nga. Em kim ktah eiei ruh em”.
title: Shah tim ka Nusrat Jahan, ha u nongialam niam Muslim, ba ka leit rakhe Durga Puja

content: Shillong:  Myn hynnin ka sngi, U bah Banteidor Lyngdoh, myntri ka tnat ialehkai, ula leh burom ia U Bah Hame Shaniah Suiam, uba la ioh ia ka takma ksiar ha ka jingialehkai  Point Fighting & Silver Medalist ha ka Kick Light na ka bynta kito kiba hapoh 57 kilo, ha ka jing ialehkai jong ka   X Diamond Cup WAKO World Kickboxing Cup 2019, kaba la pynlong ha Anapa Russia.Ha katei ka jingleh burom, la don lang ruh U bah  Lorenzo Pearson Warjri, Founding Member & Hony. Working President, Meghalaya State Kickboxing Association (MSKA).
title: Leh burom u myntri ialehkai, ia U bah Hame Shaniah

content: Shillong:  Ka BJP Meghalaya ka dang ap ia ka jingtip na ka seng kmie na Delhi ba kan phah ia ki nongialam ban ialap elekshon ia u kyrtong ka party u bah Joshua Warjri na ka bynta ka elekshon shiteng samoi ka Shella kaban long ha ka 21 tarik Risaw.Haba iakren bad u president ka BJP Meghalaya bah Shibun Lyngdoh u la iathuh ba haduh mynta ka seng kmie na Delhi kam pat pyntip satia iano kan phah ia ki nongialam na Delhi bad ka daw ka long namar ba ki dang bunkam ia ka jingleh niam Puja.“Ngi la dep pyntip sha ki nongialam ha Delhi hynrei kim pat ai jingtip namar ba ki dang bunkam ka Puja. Lashai ne la shi sngi, kin sa ai ia ka jingtip”, la ong u bah Shibun.Kham mynshwa, ka BJP ka la kwah ba u Kiren Rijiju uba dei u myntri sorkar pdeng, u Dr Jitendra Singh u myntri ka DoNER nalor u myntri sorkar ka Assam u Himanta Biswa Sarma kin wan ban ialap elekshon ia ka party ha kane ka kynti ha Shella.Ka BJP bad ka PDF ki dei ar tylli ki parti kiba iadon lang ha kane ka sorkar Meghalaya Democratic Alliance (MDA) ba ialam ka NPP kiba la sei kyrtong ha kane ka elekshon shiteng samoi na Shella katba ka NPP ka la shu kyrshan beit ia u kyrtong ka UDP u bah Balajiedkupar Synrem, uba dei u khun jong u Dr Donkupar Roy uba dang shu khlad noh ha ki bnai ba la dep.
title: Dang ap ka BJP ia ki nongialam  na Delhi, ban hiar sha Shella

content: Shillong:  Ka jingiakhih khlem pud ki nongtrei ka GVK EMRI 108 hapoh ka lama ka Meghalaya EMRI Workers Union (MEMRIWU) ka la iaid mynta sha ka sngi ba hynniew hynrei na ka liang ka sorkar kam pat khot iakren eiei ne phah ktien eiei ia ki. Kine ki nongtrei ka 108 kila iashong ha ka ïing dara ha Lawmali, Shillong.Haba kren sha u nongthoh khubor myn hynnin ka sngi,  u president ka seng u bah Roipar Kharraswai u la ong ba ka jingiakhih kan bteng beit namar ba haduh mynta ka sngi kam shym la ktien ne phah eiei.“Ka jingiakhih kan dang bteng beit khlem pud, bad ngi don ha ka ïing dara ha phyllaw ka ophis ha Lawmali”, la ong u bah Roipar.U la ong, “Haduh mynta ka sorkar ka khlem khot iakren eiei ne khlem phah ktien eiei wat tang shi kyntien ruh”.Ki nongtrei ka 108, kila sdang ia ka jingiakhih naduh ka 1 tarik Risaw namar ka jingkuman jong ka sorkar jylla ban pynbeit ia ki jingeh kiba la mih hapoh jong ka EMRI kaba la pyniaid da ka GVK ha ka jylla.U bah Roikupar u la iathuh kham mynshwa ruh ba kane ka jinngiakhih ka long kaba khlem buh por bad ban pynbor ia ka sorkar ba kan peit ia ka jingeh ka jong ki kaba kila dawa da kaba jia jia mynta la palat shisnem tam mynta ka sngi kila leit ban buh lut ia ki 108 Ambulance sha ophis trei kam jong ka EMRI kaba don ha Lawmali.La ong ba kaei kaba la pynbitar ia baroh ki nongtrei jong ka EMRI ka long ba ka GVK kaba peit ia jingpyniaid ia ki 108 Ambulance ha ka jylla kam shym la burom wat ia ka High Level Committee kam burom, haba ka jingiakren ka dang iaid kala khate pynban ia ka tulop jong ki nongtrei kane kala pynbitar ia baroh 204 ngut ki nongtrei kiba don hapoh jong ka EMRI.Baroh ki 108 Ambulance ki 43 tylli ki jaka kiba la buh ha kylleng ka jylla Meghalaya Mynta ka sngi kila wan kiew lut sha Shillong  ban leit buh ia ki ha ka ophis trei kam jong ka EMRI ha Lawmali katba ia ki shabi jong ki kali pat la bat da ki nongniah jong ki 108 ambulance.
title: Iaid ka jingiakhih ki nongtrei 108 sha  ka sngi ba hynniew, ym patiaw ka sorkar

content: Aizawl: Ka jingsngap jar U Amit Shah, myntri kam poh iing ka sorkar India, ban iakren halor ka mat jong ka Citizenship Amendment Bill (CAB), haba u leit sha Mizoram, ha ka sngi saitjain ba ladep, ka pyni ba ka sorkar India, kan peit biang ia katei ka ain sa shisien bad kan da ia syllok ruh bad ki kynhun bapher, ha shwa ban pynlong ain ia ka CAB.La sngewthuh ba ki sengbhalang bapher jong ka Mizoram, kin ap khmih lynti shwa ia kaei ba ka sorkar India, kan pynbeit thymmai ia katei ka ain bad hangta kin sa shim ia ka rai jongki, la kin iai bteng ban pyrshah ne em bad la iathuh ba ka jing sangeh iakhih jongki ruh ha ka sngi saitjain ba ladep, ka dei namar ba ka la don ka jing ia kren ia sngewthuh bad U Amit Shah, ha kaba ula kular ba ka sorkar India, kan pynkhreh, da ka ain kaba thymmai halor ka CAB.Ha ka jingleit jngoh sha Mizoram, la iathuh ba U Shah, ula  ia kynduh ia u Lat ka Jylla, U Jagdish Mukhi, u myntri rangbah ka Jylla, U   Zoramthanga, ha ryngkat bad ki heh sorkar Jylla lem bad ki dkhot jong ki seng bhalang bapher, ha kaba ki iakren ia shibun ki mat ba kynthup ruh ia ka  CAB.Na ka liang jong ka kynhun ki sengbhalang, ki la pynbna kham mynshwa ban khot ia ka jing ia lum paidbah, ha katei ka jing leit U Shah sha Mizoram, hynrei, ki la weng noh ia ka jingiakhih ha ka sngi thohdieng, hadien ba U Shah, ula mynjur ban iakren halor ka mat jong ka CAB.
title: Yn thaw ka sorkar India, da  kawei pat ka ain halor ka CAB

content: Imphal:  Ki shipai Assam Rifles myn hynnin ka sngi, ki la ioh kurup ia u droks bad kiwei ki jingdih pynbuaid kiba shongdor  T.28 klur na kawei ka jaka kaba don hajan Moreh, kaba don ha khappud jong ka India Myanmar, ha  Tengnoupal district jong ka Manipur.U Lt Col P Khongsai, uba dei u nong aiktien jong ki shipai, u iathuh ba ia kitei ki droks la ioh kurup bad la tohkit naduh ka sngi Saitjain.Lyngba ki jingtip kiba bniah, la leit talasi ia kawei ka iing ha  Phaicham Veng, Moreh, kaba dei ka iing jong ka  Vahjahat Haokip bad ha ka jing talasi, la lap ia ki tiar ba la buhrieh ha ka sad jong katei ka iing.Ki tiar kiba la ioh kurup, ki long 5,04,000 WIY (World Is Yours), kiba khia  53.54 Kg, ka Crystal Ice Myth kiba khia 15.269 Kg, ki Ketamine kiba  2.206 Kg,  ki Phencydile 194 bitor, ki pisa India, kiba don T.74,150 bad ki pisa Burma kiba don  49,000 Kyats. La khein ba baroh kitei ki tiar ba la ioh kurup ki poi sha ka T.28klur.
title: Kurup droks ki shipai Assam Rifles, kaba shongdor haduh T.28klur

content: Jowai:  Haka lympung iakhun 1st division ka West Jaiñtia District Sport Association ba la tip kum ka 9th Chatister Kharkongor Memorial Trophy, ha madan Kiang Nangbah Stadium ha ka sngi saitjaiñ, ka Evergreen Sports Club Mukhla ka la pynliem iaka Lum Pariat da 4-1 kol bala thep da u Frankinson Bang haka minit ba 8 bad 52, u Hauniwanpaya Bang haka minit ba 19 bad u Meker Pyrtuh haka minit ba 66.Katba iaka kol ka Lum Pariat pat la thep da u Rikenson Suting haka minit ba 7.
title: Jop ka Evergreen Sports Club Mukhla haka 1st Division

content: Shillong: Ka trekking jong ka Yhai, Megh State branch kan long ha 12 tarik mynta u bnai lyngba ka Shnong Wahkdait-Pashung haduh jingkieng Shnongpdeng(Dawki). Ka dei ka healthy Nature route lyngba ki lawbah lawsan bad ki dieng ki siej bad bri kwai bri tympew.Ka bai trekking ka long T. 350 kynthup  shi snem ka member fees ia kiba hapoh 18 snem bad T. 400 pat kiba 18 snem shaneng. Ka tarik khatduh ia kiba kwah iaid kjat sha katei ka jaka ka long ha ka 9 tarik hapoh 5 baje janmiet, ha ophis ka Yhai Shillong. Ia ki jingtip ba kham bniah phone ha 9436111103.
title: Yn pynlong ka YHAI ia ka trekking ha ka 12 tarik

content: Shillong: Ka jingialehkai ba la long myn hynnin ka sngi ha Khliehtyrshi Stadium hapdeng ka Mookbu sc pyrshah ia ka Chiliang sc, ka la kut noh ha ka jingiakhaid.Ha katei ka jingialehkai, ha ka kylla step ka ka Chiliang sc ka la ioh ban thep ia ka kol kaba nyngkong lyngba Arman Dkhar mar ia sdang ka jingialehkai. Ia ka kol kaba ar la thep da u Mark Rymbai ha ka minit kaba 7 bad ia ka kol kaba lai pat la thep biang da u Arman Dkhar ha ka minit kaba 21.Na ka liang ka Mookbu ruh kam shym la ailad satia, da ka jingtrei shitom ka la ioh ban pynphai shi kol lyngba u Bun War ha ka minit kaba 28, ia ka kol kaba ar ka la thep biang ha ka minit ka 35 lyngba u Binus Langshiang, kumta ha ka kylla step ka jingia thep kol ka la long 3 la 2 kol.Ha ka kylla miet pat ka jing ialeh ka long mar ia biang bor na baroh arliang, hynrei da ka  jingksaid dohiap ka Mookbu ka la ioh ban pyn iakhaid ha minute ka 62 lyngba U Teilang Mukhim.
title: Iakhaid ka Mookbu SC bad ka Chiliang SC ha ka TSA League

content: Shillong:  U MDC ka Nong krem u bah Lambor Malngiang u la ong ba um shym la tip eiei ia ka jingkhot jingialang u CEM ka KHADC u bah Latiplang Kharkongor mynta ka sngi ban iakren pyrshah ia ka CAA bad kiwei.Katkum ka shithi ba la ioh, u Secretary ka KHADC kaba la soi ha ka 17 tarik mynta u bnai, lyngba ka jingbthah u CEM, u la khot ia ka jingialang ha  ka 21 tarik Nohprah 2019 por 11 baje ia baroh ki khlieh nongsynshar ha phyllaw ka KHADC, ban iakren ban kyrshan ia ka jingdawa ban pyrshah ia ka Citizenship Amendment Act 2019, ban kyrshan ban dawa pyntreikam da ka ILP ha ka jylla  bad ban pynkhlain ia ki kyndon ka Sixth Schedule.Ia kane ka jingialang la shu phah pyntip ruh sha baroh ki MDC, u chairman, deputy chairman ka KHADC. “Em, ngam ioh jingtip eiei ia kata ka jingialang”, la ong u bah Lambor mynta ka sngi.Kumba ka long mynta, ka KHADC ka la don hapdeng ka kynrum kynram hadien ba u CEM u bah Latiplang Kharkongor um shym la lah ban thaw ia ka Executive Committee (EC) namar ka jingiapyni bor hapdeng ka Council bad ka sorkar.Ka kynhun ba ialam u bah Latiplang ka la kylla rit biang mynta hadien ba ar ngut ki MDC kata u bah Batskhem Ryntathiang u MDC ka Congress na Mairang bad ka kong Grace Mary Kharpuri ka MDC shimet na Nongshken kila weng na ka kynhun ba ialam u bah Latiplang ka United Democratic Forum (UDF) bad kila iasoh sha ka kynhun United Democratic Alliance (UDA) ba ialam da u bah Teinwel Dkhar.Haduh mynta, ka UDA ka don 16 ngut ki MDC katba ka UDF ka don tang 13 ngut ki MDC ha ka iing kaba don 29 ngut ki MDC.
title: Ym ioh jingtip U MDC  Nongkrem ia ka jingialang ba khot u CEM ka KHADC

content: Shillong:  U Commissioner bad Secretary ka sorkar Meghalaya, General Administration (A) Department, u pyntip ba baroh ki ophis sorkar, kin khang ha ka 31tarik Nohprah 2019, hynrei na bynta jong katei ka sngi, baroh ki ophis kin trei kam lut ha ka 28tarik Lber 2020.
title: 31 Nohprah,  ka sngi shuti ka sorkar Jylla

content: Shillong: Myn hynnin ka janmiet u myntri rangbah ka jylla u Conrad K Sangma u la leit ban sakhi ia ka jing wan iew krismas ki briew jong ka jylla Meghalaya. Ha ka jing shem jong u, u la lap ba ki briew ki wan tuid bha sha Khyndai Lad na ka bynta ban pynkhreh ia ka krismas 2019.Hadien ba u la wan jngoh ia ka khyndai Lad u myntri rangbah ka jylla u la rung hapoh ka dukan sha Delhi mistan ban dihsha ryngkat ba ka jing ai khublei ia ki briew ha lynti.Kamkai suda tng ban shu pynbyrnia, shu kwah nguid pre ba kum bakla khlei ialade, bad na bynta ka shuki bad tap eit miaw na bynta ka para jng u?
title: U Conrad ha khyndailad

content: Shillong: Ki shipai iada khappud lane ki Border Security Force (BSF), ki la ioh kurup kyiad na thain Borsora South West Khasi Meghalaya. Ha ka 20 tarik nohprah 2019 haka por 9 baje mynstep ki shipai jong ka 170 BN BSF ki la ioh ban kurup haduh 25 synduk ka kyiad ba shondor kumba 65,916 tyngka na khappud ha ka shnong Borsora.Lyngba ka jing ioh jingtip ba don ki briew ki ba mut ban shalan tuh ia ka kyiad sha ri Bangladeh lyngba ka khlaw, ki shipai BSF ki la pynap shyrip ia ki kynhun ban pyn pulom ia ka jing thmu jong ki briew bym ithuh satia. La ioh jing tip ba ia kine ki kyiad la wanrah na ka shnong Nongjri ka ba hap hi hapoh ka South West Khasi Meghalaya.Lyngba ka jing ioh kurup kyiad myn hynnin ka step ki shipai BSF mynta u snem ki la ioh ban kurup haduh 1915 ki bilor kyiad ki ba shongdor haduh  2,76,735 tyngka.
title: 25 synduk ka kyiad, ioh kurup  ki shipai BSF na thain Borsora

content: Shillong:Ka Goa kala pynliem ia ka Meghalaya ha ka inning da 8 run ha ka jingiakhun ba-ar jong ka Ranji Trophy mynta ka sngi Thohdieng ha Goa.Ka Meghalaya kaba tied nyngkong ka la ioh ban kamai 203 run bad shah pynhpa baroh ki wkt ha sngi nyngkong, u Ravi Teja ula kamai 81 run ban iarap ia ka Meghalaya.Ka Meghalaya ka la pynliem 3 wkt ha ki 40 run, lyngba u Abhay Negi bad Dipu Sangma. Hadien ki nongtied ki la ialehkai bha, Snehal Kauthankar ula kamai 179 run bad Sumiran Amonkar 129 run ban iarap ia ka Goa ban ioh kamai haduh 463 run bad shah pynhap baroh ki wkt, bad tam ia ka Meghalaya da 260 run.U Negi ula khur 5 wicket (5/90) katba u Mark Ingty (2/30), Sangma (2/47) bad Sajay Yadav (1/102) ki nongkawang bol kiba ka khur wkt.Ka Meghalaya kan duh ia u Teja ha ka second innings namar b aula mynsaw bad u hap ban shong thait shwa, kumta kiwei ki nongtied ki la hap ban mih madan kum u Punit Bisht ba la kham paw ula kamai 51 run, kumjuh u Negi ula kamai 50 run (half-century).Kumta, ka Meghalaya ka la ioh ban kamai 252 run, bad pynlong ia ka Goa ban khur ia ka nam jop da 8 run.
title: Rem ka Meghalaya ha ka Goa ha ka Ranji Trophy

content: Shillong: U Chairman ka Confederation Of Meghalaya Social Organisation  u bah Robertjune Kharjarin u la ong ba ym tang ka Inner Line Permit ka ba lah ban iada ia ka Ri bad ka jaitbynriew, hynrei ka Jylla ka donkam ruh ia ka jingpyntrei kam ia ka NRC ka snem ka ba ot kyrteng jong u snem 1971 ka ba don ia ka ain jong ka detect,delete bad deport.Ha ba iakren bad ki ladpathai khubor  ha Shillong Press Club u bah Kharjahrin u la ong ban iada ia ki Jaitbynriew tang ka ILP kam pat biang, hynrei hadien ba ka Sorkar Pdeng kan pyntrei kam ia ka ILP ha ka jylla jong ngi, ngin dawa sa ka jingpyntrei kam noh ia ka National Registration of Citizen  ha ka Jylla.Kumjuh u la ong ruh ba ka donkam ruh ia ka pynkylla Schedule Tribe order jong  ka snem 1950, kata ka long ba tang ki trai jylla ki ba long jaitbynriew jong ki khasi Jaintia bad Garo kin ioh ia ka ST.Na ka liang ka COMSO ka la rai ba kan ym pdiang ia ka CAA bad kan ujor ruh ha Supreme Court jong ka Ri India ha shuwa ka 22 tarik u kyllalyngkot 2020.
title: Ym tang ka ILP, hynrei ka Jylla ka donkam ruh ia ka NRC:COMSO

content: Ka Iran ka iathuh hynnin ka sngi, ba kiba iap na ka jingpang Corona ha katei ka Ri, ki la poi sha ka 26ngut bad katei ka dei ka jingiap kaba bun briew eh shabar jong ka China bad nangta sa kiba ioh pang, ki poi sha ka 245ngut, kiba kynthup ia shibun ki heh sorkar jong katei ka Ri.La iathuh ba ka jing jubor katei ka jingpang, ka la pynlong ia katei ka Ri, ba kan pynsangeh noh ia ka jing ia seng sngi thohdieng, ha kiba bun ki bynta jong katei ka Ri, ba kynthup ia kaba ha ha Tehran. La iathuh shuh ba ka Teheran, ka la khang ia baroh ki nong China, ba kin leit rung sha katei ka Ri.Kito kiba ioh pang Corona,  haduh mynta ka sngi, ki long ka   Masoumeh Ebtekar, vice president for women and family affairs bad sa U Deputy Health Minister Iraj Harirchi. La iathuh ba ka jingpang kam da jur satia ia ka Ebtekar bad kam shym la leit sah ialade ha hospital.“Ha ki 24 kynta ba ladep, ki don 106 ngut kiba dang shu ioh pang shen bad ka jingiap, ka la poi sha ka 26ngut” ong u nongkren jong ka tnat ka koit ka khiah, U  Kianush Jahanpur.
title: Ioh kem pang sa ka Vice President jong ka Iran, kiew kiba iap corona sha ka 26ngut

content: Bah RM ShabongKane ka dei ka juk jong ka social media bad ka bor jongka, ka trei kam kham jur ban ia ki kamra klass ruh la imat bad ka daw ka long, ba ki don ki bym ju nang ban thoh ban pule, hynrei mynta ki la sdang ban duriap ban thoh dak malu mala, na ka bynta ban ioh ia chat paralok shane shatai bad nangta don pat sa kito kiba la shah hikai bha ia u abkd, hynrei ki la pynkylla noh ia katei ka ain jong ka thoh ka pule bad ki ia thoh mata ma dei, tang ban pynsngew thuh jubor ia kito kiba ki ia chat.Ka jing lymmuh jong ka thoh ka tar ha kine ki sngi, ka la iaid sha palat ki social media bad kane ka la pur sha ka rukom thoh, haba ai kot khubor bad shisien ba ka la rung ha ki kotkhubor, ka la rung ne kan sa rung ha ki kamra klas ruh bad katei ka dei ka daw jong ka jing kyrkieh bad katei ka kylla long ka jingmlien ban thoh tangdep bad ka sa pynmlien ia ka jabieng ba kan im ha katei ka dur.Kaba shah ktah eh ha kine ki sngi, ka dei ia ka rukom thoh ha ka ktien Khasi, ha kaba lada ngi spel ialehkai, ki la don kiba buh da ki kyntien yalehkai bad nangta, lada ong ieid, ki la thoh “8” bad kam dei tang kata, hynrei ki don sa haba ki thoh ia ka kyrteng jong ka jaka, lada ki thoh Shillong, kin thoh sHillong bad kumta ter ter bad kane ka dei ka ain jong ka juk social media, kaba la pyn kulmar hi thlim ia ka thoh ka tar ha kine ki sngi. Haduh mynta ka kyndon jong ka thoh ka tar,  lane ka grammar jong ka thoh ka tar kam pat don bad kumta, ngim lah ban khmih lynti mano ban shimti ban pynbeit ia katei ka jing kylla pyrdet ka rukom thoh bad lehse, lada ka don ka lad, la imat, ka dei ia ki skul, ba kin iai  pynkynmaw ha ki kamra klass jongki, ia ki dak heh bad ki dak rit lane ia ki abkd bad ha kino ki bynta jong ka senten ban pyn iapher.Kaba pyn lyngngoh jur, ka long ba ha kine ki sngi, kum ki sengbhalang, ki sport club, ki seng niam bad kiwei de ki seng bapher, ba ki phah ia ki jingthoh jongki sha ki kotkhubor bad sha ki tnat sorkar, da katei ka rukom thoh kaba pyrdet bad haba ka long kumne, ka pyni ba kitei ki la ioh ia ka rukom pyrkhat kaba thymmai ha ka rukom spel dak, ha ka rukom buh kyntien bad kumta ter ter.To ngin kynmaw ba lada ngi ieid jaitbynriew, ngi dei ban ieid ia ka ktien bad lada ngi ieid ia ka ktien, ngi dei ban nang ia ka thoh ka tar, hynrei lada ngim nang; ngi la pynjot ia la ka ktien.La donkam kyrkieh ia ka Khasi Kramar naduh ki klas ba kham rit
title: Pyrdet ka thoh Khasi

content: Ka United Democratic Alliance (UDA) ha KHADC, shen kan sa leit kam hakhmat u Lat, ba kan shimti ma ka ban thaw ia ka Executive Committee (EC) bathymmai, namar ka la don kumba 18 ngut ha ka ing dorbar kaba 30 ngut, hadien ba la mih bun ki kynrum-kynram naduh u bnai November 2019.Ha ka kynhun paralok UDA, ki don ki seng UDP-HSPDP, ka NPP bad katto-katne ki Independent bad na ka PDF ruh. La niew lang ruh sa ia u Pius Marwein, ia uba ka kynhun UDP-HSPDP ka la thikna ba u Bah Pius Marwein un jop suk bad da kaba tam bun ia uno-uno uba wan ba-ar ha kane ka ilekshon shiteng samoi ha Langrin Constituency, katkum ki khubor ba la iohlum na kylleng ka Langrin Constituency. Ia ki vote, yn niew ha ka 3 tarik March 2020.Ki nongialam ki UDA, dang shen ki la iasyllok bad rai lang ba ka EC bathymmai kan buh noh ia ki kyndon treikam bashai, ban pyniaid ryntih ia ka rukom treikam. Hynrei lada don jingiapher jingmut hangne-hangtai ka Executive Committee kan shimti ban pynbeit.La mynjur ruh ban don sa ka Coordination Committee hakhlieh, kaban pynbeit bad ai jingmut ia kino-kino ki kam kibym poi sha ka jingiabeit, lada don bad phah sha ka kum ia kita.
title: Ka UDA kan shimti shen ha KHADC

content: Shillong:Ka ophis treikam jong u District Sports Officer, East Khasi Hills, Shillong kan pynlong ia ka jingiakob “Jingkyntip bad Tyrko” ba la ai kyrteng da ka “East Khasi Hills District Level Inter School Quiz & Debate Competition 2019-2020” ha ka 11 tarik U Lber, 2020 ha U Soso Tham Auditorium, Shillong ban sdang naduh ka por 11 baje mynstep.Ka jingthmu haba pynlong ia kum kine ki prokram ka long kum shi bynta ban ai ka rynsan ia ki samla pule kiba don ha ki skul bapher bapher ban sei madan ia ki sap ki phong jong ki. Ki nongjop kin ioh pat ka lad ban mih khmat ia ka District sha ka State Level Competition ka ban sa long shen.Ki skul kiba kwah ban ia shim bynta ki lah ban ioh ia ki entry form na ka ophis kaba don ha JN Stadium, Polo, Shillong tang ha ki por long trei bad yn pdiang ia ka jingpynrung kyrteng tang haduh ka 6 tarik U Lber, 2020.Haba iadei bad kane ka prokram, na ka liang ka ophis jong u DSO ka iawer khamtam ia ki skul kiba don hapoh ka East Khasi Hills District ba kin wan ban iashim bynta ha katei ka lympung.
title: Jingiakob kyntip bad tyrko, ha ka 11tarik Lber

content: Shillong: Ka Balang Jakrem Presbyterian kan pdiang burom ia ka jing iaseng Synod ka ba 18 sien jong ka KJP Synod Sepngi ka ban sdang naduh 5 tarik haduh 8 tarik lber 2020.Ki nong ialap ha kine ki sngi ki long, pastor R. F Kharkrang ha ka por 10 shiteng mynstep, u pastor L. Nongphlang ha ka por 1 baje shiteng nohphai sngi bad u pastor Dr. B.J Syiemlieh ha ka por 6 baje shiteng janmeit.Kumban shu pynkynmaw ka Jakrem (Um shit) ka don ia ka jaka jngoh kai pyrthei ba paw nam bha hapoh ka jylla ka ba jngai tang kumba 64 km na nongbah Shillong kaba don ruh ki jaka bam khana bad ki jaka sah ruh (Resort).
title: Ha Jakrem yn pynlong ia ka jing iaseng ba 18 jong ka Synod Synod Sepngi

content: Shillong:Wat la na ka liang jong ka tnat AV & Veterinary ka la pynbna paidbah kata ba ka jingbam ia ki jingri kum ka Syiar kam shim la don kano kano ka jingma bad ka long beit ban bam, hynrei na ka liang kiba bun pat ki la pynpaw ba tang katei ka jingpynbna kam pat biang satia, naba kham bun na ki jingri kum ka syiar kiba la wan die sha jylla Meghalaya ki kham bun hi dei kiba wan na bar jylla, khamtam eh na jylla Assam.Kane ka jingpynbna jong u Director jong katei ka tnat ba khmih ia ki jingri ha kine ki sngi ba la dep ba ka jingbam ia ka doh syiar kam don jingma eiei, ka la wanrah ruh ka jingkylli ia kiba bun la kane ka tnat ka la don ne em ki jaka kum ha khappud bad ka Assam kaba dei ha thain Ri Bhoi kata ha Byrni Hat ban peit bniah bad khmih ruh la kitei ki jait jingri kiba wan na Assam ki long ne em kiba koit ba khiah.Kumta halor kane na ka liang jong ka seng Meghalaya Indigenous People’s Front lyngba ka kyrwoh khubor ba la phah da u Publicity Secretary jong ka seng, u Bah Albert Lyngdoh Mawlong kaba ha Ri Bhoi District ula ong, “Ka seng ka sngew dei ban ai jingmut ia ka tnat Veterinary ba kan buh noh ia kawei ka jaka ban khmih bniah ia ki mrad, khamtam eh ka syiar kaba wan na shabar ka jylla khnang ba kino kino ki jingpang kiba la ioh na kine ki jait jingri ne mrad kin nym ktah ia u trai ri trai muluk kiba ju bam ia kine ki jait doh.”Halor kane, na ka liang jong utei u nongialam ula ong ba kumba ka long mynta katei ka tnat ka la buh ia ka jaka khmih bniah ia ki jingri kaba long tang ia ka Masi kata hapoh ka Iew die masi kaba dei hapoh Baridua, ha kaba ia ki Masi kiba la dep pyndeng sohshkor la ong ba ki dei kiba la dep ban khmih bniah (check-up), ki bym don jingpang bad ki sa die na ka bynta ban bam doh.“Hynrei ia kiwei pat ki jingri kum ka syiar pham kiba la wanrah na ki thain Assam, kum na Nagoan, Barpeta, Dubri bad kiwei ki jaka, ki la shu wanrah laitluid shaduh Iewduh bad sha kiwei ki jaka ka jylla khlem da khmih bniah (check-up) da katei ka tnat bad kitei ki kali kiba kit ia kitei ki syiar ruh um ju iohi satia ba kan don kata ka jingpeit ia ki kot ki sla ne wat ia ki briew kiba niah la ki dei ki mynder ne kim dei, kane ka buh ka jingkylli kaba heh bha ia ka jingkoit jingkhiah jong kitei ki jingri, kumba mynta bun na ki briew ki pynpaw ia ka jingshong syier halor ka jingsaphriang jong ka jingpang Coronavirus,” ong utei u nongialam.Kumta halor kane na ka liang ka seng, ha ka kyrwoh ka la pynpaw ba ka sngew dei ban ai jingmut ia ka tnat Veterinary ban buh kawei ka jaka, kum ha Byrni Hat, ban khmih bniah ia ki mrad kiba wan na shabar ka jylla khnang ba kino kino ki jingpang kiba wan na kine ki mrad ne jingri kin ym ktah ia ki trai ri trai muluk kiba ju bam ia kine ki doh manla ka sngi.“Namarba kumba long mynta ngi don ban ong ba ka jylla Meghalaya ka long kaba khlain bha ban bam doh bad tang na ri la jong ym lah ban pyndap satia, hynrei kaba sngewsih pat ka long ba ka Sorkar jylla, lyngba ka tnat kam iohi ia kane ban iada ia ngi ki nongbam doh, teng teng ngi hap ban bam da ki syiar kiba iap ne pang ngim tip shano bad nangno ki wan, namar haduh mynta ym don ba khmih ne peit bha ia kane ka kam, kumta ngi kyntu ruh ia u Myntri ka tnat ba khmih ia ka kam ri jingri (AV & Vet) ba un shim khia ia kane ka kam, khnang ba kan long ka jingiada ia la ki paid ka jylla,” ong ka kyrwoh na utei u nongialam ka seng.
title: Syier ki nongbam doh syiar,  ba wan poi ki syiar na Assam

content: Shillong: Ka Hynniewtrep Youth Council  Shillong City mynta ka sngi ha poh Ka jingialam u President u samla John Lyngdoh bad u General secretary samla Enlang sawian  ki la leit ban ia kynduh ia ka Deputy Commissioner jong ka East Khasi hills District ka Kong Matsiewdor War Nongbri ha kaba ia dei bad ka jingthmu ban pynlong ia ka 21st International  Trade Fair hapoh Nongbah Shillong ha Madan Iewrynghep.Kane jingleit ban kyrpad na ka liang ki HYC Shillong city ka long halor ka jingtieng ia ka jingsaphriang ka jingpang coronavirus bad  ka 21st International Trade Fair ka dei ka iew kaba yn wan iashim bynta lang da ki briew na kylleng ki Ri ka pyrthei kiba kynthup ia ka Thailand,Veitnam,Bangladesh, Malaysia, Nepal Myanmar bad kiwei kiwei ki Ri ba Marjan.Ka Seng ka sngew ba ka jingthmu ban pynlong ia kum  kine ki 21st International Trade Fair ha kum kane ka por  kan buh jingma ia ki nongshong Shnong ka jylla  na ka khlam corona virus.Ka seng ka lah kyntu ia ka DC ban pynsangeh bad ban ym ai jingbit  ia kane ka Trade Fair lane kino kino ki Trade Fare kiba wan iashim bynta da ki briew kiba nabar, namar ka jingiada ka kham biang ban ia jingpynkoit.Na ka liang ka DC ka kong Matsiewdor W Nongbri, ka kular sha ka seng ba yn ym ai jingbit  (NOC) sha ki bor pyniaid ban pynlong ia kane ka 21st International Trade Fair.
title: Na ka Corona, wat pynlong Trade Fair ha Shillong, ong ka HYC

content: Shillong: U Lat ka jylla u Tathagata Roy mynta ka sngi u la ong ba ka jingdawa ban pyntreikam ia ka Inner Line Permit (ILP), kan ktah ia ka kam jngohkai pyrthei ha kane ka jylla. Bad kumjuh u la ong ba ka ain (Ordinance) ba la bsuh ha ka Meghalaya Resident Safety and Security Act (MRSSA) 2016, ka iatyngkhuh bad ki ain ka sorkar pdeng bad na kane ka daw, u dang eksamin bad um pat ai ia ka jingmynjur ba la phah ka sorkar.Haba kren sha ki lad pathai khubor mynta ka sngi, u Lat u la ong ba la shah pynbor ban kren eiei ba ki don ki bynta ki bym iadei dur na ka bynta ka roi ka par ka kam jngohkai ha ka jylla.U la iathuh ha ka jingleit jngoh dang shen sha Sohra, la pynpaw ba ka kam  jngohkai pyrthei ka la shah ktah jur. “Ki kam jngohkai ki la shah ktah bha ha Sohra. Ki dukan, ki jaka sah kila thylli lut”, u la ong.U la kam ba u la ioh sngew ia kane hadien ba u la iakren bad ki katto katne ngut ki briew ha katei ka thain, kiba la pynpaw ba ki la shah ktah bha na ka jingiakhih ILP.Haba kylli hato u kren ha kaba iadei bad ka jingiakhih pyrshah ia ka CAA lane ka jingiakhih dawa ia ka Inner Line Permit (ILP), u Lat u la ong ba ka CAA  kam don eiei bad ka kam jngohkai hynrei lada wanrah ia ki jingpyrkhing, kan wanrah ka jingeh bad ym lah ban mut dur kaei kaban jia.             “Ka shong ha ka sorkar ban rai bad nga shu pynpaw ia ka jingsngew jong nga ba nga la mad ha kine ki bnai ba la dep”, u la ong.Lah ban kdew ba mynshem snem u Lat ula shim shuti ar bnai hadien ba ka la mih ka jingpyrshah ia ka jingkynthoh jongu ha ka Twitter ba kito kiba pyrshah ia ka CAA, ki dei ben leit sha North Korea.Halor ka MRSSA ka iatyngkhuh bad ka ain ka sorkar pdengHalor ka jingbym pat mynjur ia ka Ordinance ka MRSSA, u Lat u la ong ba kam long kaba dei ban ong ba um ai ia ka jingmynjur ia ka Ordinance ka Meghalaya Resident Safety and Security Act 2016 (Ordinance), ba la pas da ka kynhun myntri. U la ong ba u la kdew ia ki katto katne ki jingeh ha kaba iadei bad ka jingpyntreikam ia ka MRSSA namar ba ki don ki jingiatyngkhuh bad ki ain ka sorkar pdeng bad kane kan buh ka jingeh haba pyntreikam ia ka.U la buh jingkylli, kaei ka jingmut ban don ka ain khlem ki kyndon. “Ia ka ain ym lah ban pyntreikam khlem ki kyndon”, u la ong. U la ong ba ka sorkar kan rai ia kane ka kam bad u shu ai jingmut kum u Lat ba lada ka sorkar ka pas ia ka ain ha iing dorbar ban phah sha u, um don lad da kumwei pat lait ban mynjur.  Lah ban kdew ba ka sorkar jylla ka la bsuh da ki kyndon kiba kham pyrkhing ha ka MRSSA ha ka dur ka Ordinance la katto katne bnai mynshwa hynrei haduh mynta u Lat um shym la ai kano kano ka jingmynjur.
title: Ka ILP kan ktah ia ka kam jngohkai, ka MRSSA ka iatyngkhuh bad ki ain ka sorkar pdeng, ong u Lat
