content: Shillong: Halor ka jingsaphriang ka Video lyngba ka Facebook, ba kala don ka jingthang ia ka Lama jong ka Ri India ha ki briew bym lah ban tip satia ba ki dei kiei, na ka liang jong ka tnad pulit jong ka sorkar jylla Meghalaya ka la buh ia ka ejahar halor ia kane ia kaba la tip kum ka “Suo Moto Case”.Haba kren bad ka Deputy Commissioner jong ka East Khasi Hills District  ka kong Matsiewdor War Nongbri, ka la iathuh ba na ka liang jong ki pulit ki la register ia ka ejahar “Suo Moto Case” pyrshah ia  ka Facebook Account  kaba la thep (upload) ia kane ka Video.Na ka liang jong ka DC ka la ong ba ka jingtohkit ka bniah halor kane ka dang iaid sha khmat ban lap ia ki briew kiba don kti ha kane ka kam runar bad ban wad haduh ban da lap ia kine ki runar kiba leh ia kane ka kam.
title: Register ki pulit da ka suo moto case, halor ka jingthang lama India

content: Shillong: Ka Synjuk Seng Samla Upper Shillong Circle kat kum ka kyrwoh na u bah Donbok Thabah publicity Secretary SSS Upper Shillong Circle ka ieng ban kyrshan beit ha man la ki jingiakhih jong ki Sengbhalang na ka bynta ka mat jong ka jaitbynriewban dawa ia ka ILP ha ka jylla.Ka Synjuk Seng samla Upper Shillong circle ka la maham tyngeh ia ki Contractor  ba kim dei ban wanrah ia ki nongtrei ba nabar ki bym biang ki kot donkam jong ki nongbylla. Lada ki wan rah ia ki, kin hap ban bah khlieh hi lada jia eiei iaki ne lada kin leh eiei kiba long pyrshah iaka Imlang sahlang hapoh shnong.Kane ka sien jam ban mahan kalong ba man ka por ki ju pynpaw ba ki don kajuh hi ka thong ban trei bad peit iaka bha ka miat ka imlang sahlang hapoh Shnong poh thaw bad ki ju pynpaw ba kum ka Synjuk Seng Samla Shnong Upper Shillong ki ju ialeh ban beh iaki briew ba nabar jylla bad ki khang ruh iaki jingwanrung beaiñ ki bar jylla hapoh Shnong poh thaw kiba hap hapoh ka Thaiñ Upper Shillong.Na ka liang ki Synjuk Seng samla upper Shillong circle ki la kyntu ba lada ki contractor ki wan rah ia ki nongtrei bar jylla  ki ladei ban biang shuwa ki kot ki sla kiba donkam shuwa ban rung hapoh shnong khnang ba kin lait naki jinghuri hura, bad la maham ruh iaki trai ing kiba ai wai ïng ba kim dei ban aiwai klumar iaki briew kiba na bar bad khamtam kito ki bym don ki kot ki sla ki ba biang ban pynshisha ba ki dei ki nong India, namar ka seng ka la iohi na kawei ka por sha kawei ka por ki ju jia beit ia ki trai ri ban shah shoh ne shah pynmynsaw man ka por.Wat ha kine ki sngi ngi shem ba ki bar jylla ki la nud ban pom daki tiar pynmynsaw iaki Jaitbynriew, wat ban lute bad knieh lut iaki pisa. kumta ka seng ka pyrshah ruh ia kito ki barjylla kiba wan tyrwa tiar ha Shnong ha thaw ba kim dei ba kin wan rung hapoh shnong khlem da ioh jingbit na ki Nongpyniaid Shnong bad kumjuh na ki Seng Samla Shnong Lada ki wan ruh ki dei ban da pan jingbit shuwa.Kidei ban pynbiang lut ki kot ki sla ki biang kum ka Labour Licence , Trading licence, Work permit bad kiwei kiwei ki kot ban pynshisha ialade ruh. Namarkata ka Synjuk ka maham lypa ioh lehse kan poi ka por ba ioh jia kaei kaei kaba sngewsih iaki briew hapoh ki shnong ki thaw.
title: Kyrshan ka SSS Upper Shillong, ia ka jing dawa ILP ha ka Jylla

content: Ka jingiap na ka jing ia kynad ha Delhi, ka la poi mynta sha ka 38ngut bad sa bun spah ngut kiwei pat kiba mynsaw bad kiba dang shah sumar ha Hospital.Ka GTB Hospital, ka kam ba ka la ioh pdiang ia 22ngut ki briew, kiba la iap lypa bad kiba la leit rah sha katei ka hospital bad sa 12ngut kiwei pat, ki iap ha ka jingshah sumar ha katei ka hospital, na ki 200ngut kiba mynsaw bad ka LNJP Hospital, ka don ia 3ngut kiba iap bad nangta sa ka JP Hospital, u don uwei uba iap.Ka sorkar Delhi, ka la pynbna ruh ba kan siew bai lutksan T.10 lakh sha kito kiba iap bad T.5 lak sha kito kiba dang khynnah kiba iap bad T.5lak sha kito kiba ym lah sumar shuh bad T.2lak sha kiba mynsaw jur bad T.20,000 ia kiba mynsaw malu mala.T.3lak sha kito kiba la shah ieh khunswet na katei ka jingjia, T.5 hajar ia ka jingiap jong kawei ka mrad, T.25 hajar ia ka rickshaw kaba la julor, T.50hajar ia ka jingduh ka e rickshaw. T.5lak ia ka iing kaba la julor thiaw bad T.1 ia ki nongshong wai bad T.4lak sha ki trai iing kiba la shah thang lut khoit. T.5lak ia ki dukan kiba la ing khong lut bad T.25hajar yn siew noh sha kito kiba la julor khoit ka iing ka sem.
title: Kiew sha ka 38ngut kiba iap, na ka jing ia  kynad ha Delhi

content: Shillong: Ka District Child Protection Unit kaba don ha Lachumier  mynta ka sngi ka la pyntip ba ha ka 7 tarik mynta u bnai, la ioh ban tam ia iwei ki khyllung kynthei na jan ITI kaba don ha Rynjah. Ia ine i khunlung khynthei la leit ban shimti da ka ophis jong ka District Child Protection Unit bad i ne i khunlung mynta ka don bad ka kynhun Lawei Baphyrnai, Specialized Adoption Agency, Shillong.Na ka liang jong ka ophis DCPU ka pyntip ba lada don ki briew kiba tip ne kiba ha iing ha sem ba kin sngewbha ban ia kynduh ia ki briew jong ka ophis District Child Protection Unit, kaba don ha Lachumier, ia ka Child Welfare Committee, Lachumiere bad Lawei Baphyrnai, Specialized Adoption Agency Nongthymmai.Na ka liang jong ka DCPU, ka la ong ba lada ym don ba leit kam ia itei i khunlung na ka liang jong ka ophis kan shim ba ia ine i khun lung lah ban ai tiengkhun noh, kiba ha iing ha sem lada ki don ki lah ban phone sha kine ki number 0364-250 2310 bad ha une mobile number 9612760415.
title: Ioh tam khyllung kynthei na ITI Rynjah

content: Ban iai kyrsiew biang pat, ia u paid Khasi      Khara, u paid Khasi  baiar. (Khynriam, u      Pnar, maram, u Bhoi u WarBalei ia u Khasi la khot u Hynniewtrep?Ka Ri Khasi ka dei ka ri ki maw. Ka shnong ruh bun hi ka kyrteng “Maw” kum Mawsynram, Mawkyrwat, Mawryngkneng, Mawlasnai etc.Mawryngkew – Napdeng ka jingbuh jingsat ka ‘Lei synshar.Naduh ka sngi, u Bnai, ki Khlur etc. dei tang ka Ramew (pyrthei) kaba don jingim. Ia ka ramew la tap lin da ka um. Te ha ka jinglong lyngki jong ka, ka Ramew ka dawa ia ka Lei synshar (Ka Hukum) donkam ka shongkha shongman halor jong ka. Ka Hukum ka iohsngew, ka sngap, arsut ka pynhiar synjat lator da u Ryngkew na jrong sha tbiang (u maw bym tip u wan na u Bnai ne u Khlur ym tip) la skhem ka shongkha shongman, la pun ka kyan, long lum long them, long riat long ram, ki wah ki tuid sted na lum sha them, la kha arngut ki khun, u maw bad ka khyndew. U maw bad ka khyndew ki long shpara, ka khyndew ka sei ia ki phlang ki kynbat, ki dieng ki siej. Ka Ramew ka sei ia ki khniang, ki ksiah, kiba iai phew jait, ki sim ki doh, ki mrad ki mreng, kiba laiphew jait, kiba laiphew sieh, laiphew khongpong; kiba bam phlang ki don, kiba bam doh ruh ki don. U thlen u dei u Myntri Rangbah duh jong ki laiphew mrad, bad u masi u dei u Basan jong ki laiphew mrad.U Maw ba shipara bad ka khyndew:- U ri ia baroh ki khniang ki ksiah, kiba bha bad ba sniew kiba longbih, bad ki bym long bih. Kumjuh ki mrad ki mreng kiba bha bad ba sniew, wat u Hynniew pansngiat u Hynniew Hima ruh, u shong u sah ha krem maw. Une u Hynniew Pansngiat Hynniew Hima u dei uba shah dawa ha ka mei ramew. Ka Ramew hadien ba ka la dep pynbiang lut nadong shadong naduh u phlang u kynbat, ki dieng ki siej, ki soh ki pai, ki khniang ki ksiah, ki sim ki doh, ki mrad ki mreng. Hynrei mano pat ban synshar ia ka jingbuh jingsat jong ka mei ramrew. Kumta ka mei ramew ka la dawa ia ka Lei synshar (Ka Hukum) kaba long kata ka nongbuh bynta ka Nongsam bynta. Ban phah ia u nongsynshar ban synshar ia ka jingbuh jingsat jong ka Mei ramew. Ka Lei Synshar ka la lum ia ka dorbar bneng. Na ka ka khat hynriew Pansngiat khat hynriew Hima; Hynniew Pansngiat, Hynniew Hima, kin hiar sha pyrthei lyngba ka jingkieng Ksiar ba don ha Lum Sohpet bneng. Ban long u nong synshar ia ka jingbuh jingsat jong ka Mei Ramew. Ha kajuh ka por ban pyndep ia ka shongkha shongman kumba long ba man ka mei ramew. Mar synpoi u Hynniew Pansngiat u Hynniew Hima ka pyrthei, hapoh ka jingialam u Syiem Iakriah ka Hukum kaba long kata ka nongbuh bynta ka nongsam bynta, ka la lum ia ka dorbar ba nyngkong ban hikai, kumno ban bam, kumno ban dih, kumno ban rep, kumno ban riang, lyngba ka ain jong ka “Kamai ia ka Hok”.Ha ka dorbar kaba ar pat ka la lum ia baroh ki laiphew jingthaw ban phah wan hadien 9 sngi 9 miet. Hynrei u mrad u lyngah um lah shah u wan tang 7 sngi 7 miet ka Lei Synshar ka (Hukum) kaba long kata ka nongbuh bynta ka nongsam bynta, ka la ai ha u mrad shi bun ka bor, khyndiat ka buit. Hynrei u Hynniew Pansngiat u Hynniew Hima pat u wan kum ba la bthah ka Lei Synshar 9 sngi 9 miet. Ka la ai shibun ka buit, khyndiat ka bor.Ha ka dorbar kaba lai pat ka la shim jingkylli ia u Hynniew Pansngiat u Hynniew Hima, da  kumno phin im ha pyrthei! U 7 Pansngiat 7 Hima u ong, ngin im da ka kamai ia ka hok kumba la bthah ma phi. Hynrei u Thlen pat u Myntri rangbah jong ki laiphew mrad u tur ha khmat ka Lei Synshar u ong, ka kam jong nga dei da ka Long Spah; da kaba bam ia ka longbriew, u phet die soit, ka ktien u Thlen ka im ki phlang ki kynbat ki long treng lut u 7 Pansngiat u Hynniew Hima um nud shuh ban mih shabar u kyang u pyrta ia ka nongbuh bynta, ka nongsam bynta (Ka Hukum) ban iarap ia u. Ka Lei synshar ka hiar ka lap pynban ia u traw ba u siar buit. Kumta kum ka Apot la bthah ia u traw ban shah slap shah lyer ban da ia ka iing u 7 Pansngiat u 7 Hima. U Siej pat u dei u lymboit u lymbiang (bym don snep) u kwah ban ioh bynta bad u Hynniew Pansngiat Hynniew Hima ban shong hapoh ka jingker jingda jong u traw, naduh ba u Hynniew Pansngiat Hynniew Hima u la ioh ia ka iingtrep la khot noh ia u u “Hynniew trep”. Ka Hukum hadien ba la ioh ia ka iingtrep ka la phah khot ia u masi bad ka la bthah ia u, khie leit sha u khun bynriew ban shet ja tang shi shir ar shir ban dap shi khiew ranei. Hynrei ka tyngap pat ka la iohsngew kyndiang ia ka ktien jong u Thlen; “Kam ia ka long spah bam da ka longbriew”, ka la ong ha u masi wat ong shi shir ar shir, ong shi shang ar shang; khnang ba u khun bynriew un ym lah bam, un theh kai sha madan ban bam ei ma ka, bad ka thiar jong u ruh kan sa lut kloi bad un sa iap thngan hangta hi. Ka Hukum ka tang shu tip ia kane ka la phah khot mardor ia u masi. Hangta hi ka la lop lut noh ia ki bniat jong u bad ka la ong; u Lut Hukum um bit ban biang ki bniat ia ka tyngap pat ka tap da u khliew ranei, hangta hi iong syndon hi ngain.U Thlen um man thait u leit sha u Biskarom (u Biskarom u dei u Bakhraw jong u Syiem Lakriah hadien u syiem Lakriah wan u Syiem Synriang u bakhraw jong u Syiem Synriang dei hi u Biskarom) ban pdiang ia ka kam long spah bam da ka longbriew u Biskarom um treh, um sngap hi ruh, namar ba bun kam ha ka thian kriah thain shang, nangta sa sha u Barikor Karikor (u Barikor Karikor u dei hi u Bakhraw jong u Syiem Synriang) u ruh um treh ia ka kam long spah bam ia ka longbriew, liak u kynmaw ia u Sormoh Sorphin ba ki dang ia bun kam ha ka rep ka riang. U Thlen u la ong; kan myntoi aiu phin rep lada phim pynngat shuwa ia kane ka dieng iei, kaba shu heh ba biej, khlem dur khlem dar, kane ka dieng kan tap op ia ki jingthung jong phi, ba ym dei sngi shuh, sngew iahap u Sormoh Sorphin.Yn iai bteng ……KA JINGTIP BA NGI DEI BAN TIP: Lada khie ka eriong erngit, lane lyer bah lyer san (lyer kyllang) ka lyer kaba kwah lied iing, shim da ka Siang Dieng ba la ju pyndonkam kum ka khatja step bad jamiet, sieh ia ka ha tyngkhap dieng lynnap sah tin, kumjuh ia ka iingphlang ha tyngkhap dieng batap u traw ne tynriew ka lyer kan iaid lait na ka iing jong phi.
title: Don ka por ia kiei kiei baroh

content: Ka jingiap na ka jing ia kynad ha North East Delhi, ka la poi mynta sha ka 30ngut, ha kaba la iathuh ba uwei ula iap ha ka jingshah sumar ha  Guru Teg Bahadur Hospital.Ki lad khubor ki iathuh ba ka jing ia kynad, ka la sdang pur sha kiwei de ki bynta jong ka Jylla, ha kaba ka la don ka jing ia thang dukan bad kiwei de ki jing ia kawang maw. La iathuh ruh ba ia ka met jong uwei u nongtrei jong ka tnat  Intelligence Bureau (IB), la lap mynta ka step na ka nala ha  Chand Bagh.La iathuh ba ki don 200ngut kiba mynsaw, na katei ka jing ia kynad haduh mynta ka sngi.
title: Kiew 30ngut kiba iap, na ka jing ia kynad ha North East Delhi

content: Shillong: Ka lympung ialehkai phutbol ki khynnah hapoh  14 snem ba pyniaid da ka Shillong Sports Association (SSA) ka la sdang myn hynnin ka sngi ha madan Polo, Shillong.Ha ka jingiakhun, ka Nongkrem ka la shah pynbam kput ha kaLangsning da 0-9.Ia kine ki kol ka Langsning la thep da u S.Kharkongor 14) (M.kharbudnah 29,42) (B.Rynjah 35) (R.kharumnuid 39) (D.kharkrang 48) (W.Majaw 56) (G.Thabah 60) (F.Warjri 61).Ha kawei ka jingialehkai, ka Lamlynti ka la shah rem salit ha kaLaitkyrhong da 0- 1. Ia kane kawei ka kol ka Laitkyrhong la thep da u  P.Khyriem ha ka 58 minit da ka penalty.Lashai ka sngi, ka jingiakhun  kan long hapdeng ka  Nongsohphoh   vs   Mawnianglah 1:30 pm, ka Mawkhar bad ka Lummawbah 3 pm.Ha kane ka jingialehkai, la don 16 tylli ki kynhun ba la phiah ha ki jong ki kynhun jongki.
title: Sdang ka phutbol hapoh 14 snem ka SSA ha Polo

content: Shillong: Ka kynhun metiaw ne ka MLP Veteran ka la ïohrah ïa ka nam lahduh hadien ba ka la lah ban pynliem ïa ka Momentum Friendships da 21 run ha ka phainal ka 1st Knock Out Tennis Ball Cricket Tournament Open To All 2020 ba la pynïaid da ka Mawlai Umthlong Local Dorbar ha madan Lummawnei ha ka sngi Saitjaiñ ka 22 tarik u Rymphang, 2020.Ka MLP kaba la mih madan nyngkong ka la lah ban kamai 115 run na ki 15 over ba ki la ïalehkai. Haba wan ban kthong ka Momentum ka la lah ban kamai tang 94 run bad liem lut ki wicket, ha kaba ka MLP ka la jop da 21 run ha kane ka jingïakhun final kaba itynnad.Ka MLP kaba la ïohrah ïa ka Trophy ryngkat bad song pisa kaba T.20,000 Hajar bad ka Momentum kaba la wan ba ar ruh ka la ioh rah ïa ka trophy ryngkat bad ka song ba T.10,000 Hajar.U Rajiv Rai Singh u la ïoh khur ïa ka nam Man of the Match halor ka jinglah ban ïalehkai bha ka jong u. Katba u Gautam Chetri u la ïoh khur ïa ka nam Man of the Series hadien ba u la ïoh khur ïa ki lai tylli ki spah run ha kane ka jingïalehkai, u Chetri u la ïoh khur ruh ïa ka nam Man of the Match ha ka semi final ba nyngkong bad u Kenny Wann ïa ka semifinal ba ar.
title: Rah ki met iaw ka MLP  ïa ka 1st Knock Out Tennis Ball Cricket ha Mawlai

content: Nongpoh:  Hynnin ka sngi ki Magistrate bad Pulit ka Ri Bhoi, ki la hiar sha ki shnong ha Block-2, na ka bynta ban leit jurip ia ki jaka khrong khajna, kaba la buh da ka Karbi Anglong Autonomous Council (KAAC) ha Umru bad Sabuda, ki shnong Khasi kiba don ha Block-2.Katei ka jingleit jurip da ki Magistrate bad pulit ka Ri Bhoi, ka dei hadien ba ki la ioh ia ka jingujor na ki paidbah kiba sah ha katei ka thain, kiba la ujor ba ki iakynduh jingeh haba iadei bad kitei ki jaka khrong khajna, namar kitei ki jaka khrong khajna kiba la wanbuh da ka Assam ha kitei ki jaka, ka long ban khrong khajna, ia ki mar rep mar riang jong ki paidbah bad khamtam eh ha kaba kum kane ka por ba dei ka por ba ki briew jong katei ka thain, ki pynmih ia u Synsar.Ia katei ka jingleit jurip, la ialam da u Raja Brahma, Border Magistrate ka Ri Bhoi, u P. Baidya, CI ka Umiam Police Station lem bad ka kynhun Pulit, ha kaba hadien ka jingjurip, ki la hukum ia ki nongap ha kitei ki jaka khrong khajna, ba ki dei ban sangeh noh ka shim khajna ia ki mar rep mar riang kaba la pynmih da ki paidbah Khasi kiba sah ha katei ka thain.La ioh ruh ba ha katei ka sngi, kitei ki Magistarte bad Pulit, ki la pynpra ia ka khyrdop khrong Khajna kaba don ha Umru, katba ia kaba don ha Sabuda kim shem la leh ei ei, hynrei ki la hukum pat ia ki nongap ha kitei ki Khyrdop ba kim dei ban lum khajna na ki nongrep kiba kit ia ki mar rep mar riang bad kiba pyndonkam ia katei ka surok.Halor katei ka jingdon jong kitei ki jaka Khrong khajna, ki bor distrik ka Ri Bhoi, kin sa phah da ka jingthoh sha ki Bor Distrik ka Hamren District, West Karbi Anglong, kaba long kum ka jingkyntu ia ki ba kim dei ban ailad ha ka ban buh ia kitei jaka Khrong Khajna, khamtam ha kaba kum katei ka jaka, kaba dang dei ka jaka kaba dang don hapoh ka jingia kajia pud.
title: Jurip ki Magistrate bad Pulit ka Ri Bhoi ia ki khyrdop khajna ka Assam ha Block-2

content: Shillong: Ka Chaphrang Iong I Sports Club Barato ka la pynlong program kaba shisngi shaphang ka  Block Level Neighbourhood Youth Parliament hynnin ka sngi, ha ka Shnong Barato da ka jingiatrei lang ryngkat bad ka Office jong ka Nehru Yuva Kendra Sangathan Jowai (Ministry of Youth Affairs and Sports Government of India).Ka jingthmu jong kane ka programme ka long ban hikai ia ki khun samla jong ka juk ba mynta ba kin lah ban im bha im miat, ban don ka jingkitkhlieh na ka bynta ka iap ka im, ka bha ka miat jong ka Imlang ka sahlang bad ban skhem ka nongrim ha kano kano ka kam kaba ki trei. Bad ruh ban hikai ba kumno kin(Samla) lait na ki jingmlien ba sniew da ka ba kin buh ia ka thong ha khmat khnang ba ka lawei jong kawei pat ka pateng bynriew kan long kaba shongsuk shong shngain. La ioh ruh ia ki jinghiakai ba kumno kin seng kam la jong lyngba ki SHG bad kin leit training ha ki kam bapher bapher lyngba ka MSSDS bad ba kin tip ba sumar ia ka mei mariang kaba long ka jingaisngewbha ia u briew ba pyndap ia ki jingdonkam jong ki bynriew baroh, khamtam ban kunai ia ka um ha ki bynta bap her bapher.Ki rangbah kiba ia don lang ha kane ka programme ki long Mr. H Shadap, Waheh Shnong Barato kum u kongsan, ki Recourse Person: Mr. D Wahlang-Headmaster of RMSA Sec School Barato, Mr. H Buam-BSc Assistance Teacher of Govt. U.P School, Mr.L Suchen-SDO of MSSDS Labour Department West Jaintia Hills District, Mr. F Hujon-Cluster Cordinator of Laskein C& RD Block MSRLS, ki invitees: Mr. V Syngkon-Wazir Official, Mr. E Timung-Waheh Dong Barato-A, Mr. Sarlangki Dkhar-Secretary Dong Barato-A. bad ki nongshong shnong jong ka shnong bad ki para marjan shnong ryngkat bad ki khynnah skul jong ka RMSA Sec School Barato, Barato Govt U.P School, Barato Presbyterian Sec School.Ha kane ka sngi ki Recourse Person ki la batai bniah bha ha ki topic bapher bapher , u Sir D Wahlang u la batai shaphang ka Continuing Education of school drop out, u Sir L Suchen u la batai shaphang ka Skill Development & Entrepreneur,u Sir F Hujon shaphang ka Rural Development -formation of self-help groups for income-generation activities.  Bad u Sir H Buam shaphang ka Environment Conservation -water conservation and water use efficiency.U Secretary jong ka Chaphrang Iong I Sports Club Barato u ma Pyrshang Sten u la ai khublei da ka jingsngewnguh ia ka Office jong ka NYKS Jowai kaba la kloi ban iarap ia ka club ban ioh pynlong ia kum kane ka programme ha ka sien ba nyngkong eh ha Barato kaba donkam shi katdei eh na ka bynta ki samla bad ruh u pynpaw da ka jiingsngewnguh ia baroh kat kiba ia don bynta ban pynlong ia kane ka programme kaba jop.
title: Pynlong prokram ka Chaphrang I Sports Club ha Barato

content: Nongpoh:  Ki dkhot ka Hynniewtrep National Youth Front (HNYF), Pahamrioh Unit, ha ryngkat ka jingsynran lang da ki nongialam ka Northern Region, mynta ka sngi ki la leit ban jurip ia ki katto katne tylli ki post ilektrik bad ki sainar bording kiba don ha kane ka shnong Pahamrioh bad ha katei ka jingleit jurip, ki la lap ba ki don shibun ki jingduna haba iadei ba ki kam Bording hapoh ka shnong Pahanrioh, namar la lap ba ki don ki sainar bording bad ki post ilektrik kiba la synjor bha hapoh ka shnong Pahamrioh.Ha katei ka jingleit jurip, la lamkhmat da u samla Ronal Tangsang kum u President bad u Seiborlang Tynsong Secretary napoh ka Pahamrioh Unit ha kaba la ia synranlang ruh da u Bah Donroy Kshiar, Asst. Secretary ka HNYF, Northern Region lem bad kiwei kiwei ki dkhot ka seng.Nalorkata, lyngba katei ka jingleit jurip, kitei ki HNYF ki la lap ruh ba kidon bun tylli ki post ilektrik kiba la synjor bad sarang bha, ki sainar ilektrik kiba la noh shapoh bad ruh ki transformer kiba khlem don kino kino ki jingker kiba la buh jingma shikatdei eh ia ki paidbah nongshong shnong khamtam ia ki khyllung khynnah kiba shong basah hapoh kane ka shnong.Haba iadei bad katei ka jingduna hapoh ka shnong Pahamarioh, na ka liang ka HNYF, ka dawa tyngeh ruh ia ki nongtrei ka MeCEL ba ki dei ban shimkhia noh mardor ban leit maramot bad ban pynbha noh ia ki sainar ilektrik, ki post ilektrik bad ruh ban ker jingker noh ia ki jaka ba don ki transformer ban iada na ki jingmynsaw ia ki paidbah nongshong shnong khamtam ha kum kane ka aiom lyer bad slap jong ka mei mariang.
title: Dawa ka HNYF ban pynbiang bording ha Pahamrioh

content: Shillong: Ki myntri rang bah ka jylla Meghalaya bad ka Assam, ki lah ban iakynduh shen ban iakren halor ka jingiaknieh jaka ha khappud.Katkum ka khubor, la iathuh ba u myntri rangbah ka Meghalaya u Conrad K Sangma u la iakren da ka phun ia u myntri rangbah ka Assam u Sarbananda Sonowal halor ka jingmih ka huri hura ha kine ki sngi ha Umwali ka thain Langpih ka West Khasi Hills, Meghalaya.“Ngi khmih lynti ban iakynduh kloi katba lah, la kumno kumno hadien ba la dep la dorbar mang tyngka bad ia ka tarik yn sa pynbeit”, la ong u Conrad haba kren dang shen sha ki katto katne ki lad pathai khubor.Hapoh kane ka ar snem tam ba la shimti da ka sorkar Meghalaya Democratic Alliance (MDA) hapoh ka jingialam u myntri rangbah u Conrad Sangma, kam pat don satia kano kano ka jingiakynduh markhmat hapdeng ka kyrdan myntri rangbah ban iakren ia ka kam khappud. Ka kam khappud ka dei kawei ka mat elekshon jong ki seng sain pyrthei ha man ka elekshon ha ka jylla kynthup ka NPP ruh.Katkum ka jingong u Conrad, u Sonowal ruh u la pynpaw ia ka jingsngew khia ia ka kam iakajia pud kaba la neh slem naduh bun phew snem mynta.Ka dorbar mang tyngka ka Meghalaya kan neh shiphew sngi naduh ka 10 haduh 26 tarik Lber ban wan. Kane ka jingkren u Conrad ia u Sonowal ka long hadien ba la kynnoh ba ki bor ka Assam, kila thmu ban wan buh ia ka Police Outpost ha Umwali, Langpih kaba la kam ba ka dei ka jaka jong kawei ka longkmie hapoh u pud u sam ka Meghalaya.
title: Hadien ka dorbar mang tyngka, lah  ban iakynduh U Conrad bad U Sonowal

content: U pastor ba rangbah ka KJP Synod Sepngi u C. Jyrwa u ba la shong thait na ka kam, u la khlad noh hynnin ka sngi. Ha ki por ba u dang shakri u pastor C. Jyrwa u la ju bat teng ruh ia ki kam bapher bapher hapoh ka Synod ka Assembly bad hapoh ka PCI.U la long teng ruh kum u Secretary jong ka Bible Society of India, ka Shillong Auxiliary bad u la long ruh u President jong ka John Roberts Theological Seminary.Ka jing pyndep burom khatduh kan long ha ka 29 tarik rymphang 2020 ha ing sah jong u bad ha ing mane balang mawkhar ha ka por 1 baje noh phai sngi.
title: Khlad noh u pastor ba rangbah ka KJP Synod Sepngi

content: Shillong:  U kyrtong ka National People’s Party (NPP) na ka bynta ka ilekshon Member of Parliament (MP) sha ka Rajya Sabha, u Dr. W. R Khar lukhi myn hynnin ka sngi, u la ong ba ka NPP kan sa ia shong biang na ka bynta ban pynskhem kyrtong na ka bynta ka ilekshon MP.U Dr. W. R Khar lukhi u ba dei ruh u president ka NPP ka jylla Meghalaya u la shah jied na ka bynta ban iakhun iaka ilekshon MP wat la u kyntait ha ka por mynshwa.“Hoid nyngkong nga la kyntait ban iakhun ilekshon hynrei ka party (NPP) ka don shaniah ia nga na ka ta ka daw nga la kloi ban ieng na ka bynta ka party namar nga dei u briew jong ka party” u la bynrap.U Dr. W. R Kharlukhi u la ong ruh ba hadien ka jing ialang jong ka NPP kan sa don ruh ka jing ialang jong ka sorkar MDA namar ba ka NPP kan hap ban ia treilang bad kiwei pat ki seng sain pyrthei jong ka jylla na ka bynta ka jing jop.Haba la ai lut ia Sha ka UDP ka bha ban ai Sha ka UDP. Ka UDP ka dei ban ban dawa beit ban ioh ia kane Ruh…
title: Hap shong jing ia lang ka NPP,  ban pynskhem ia u kyrtong MP

content: Nongpoh:  Naduh ka por ba ki Pulit ka Assam, ki la leit ban pynpra noh ia ka Building jong ka SSA LP School ha Khliehumwang, ka la wanrah jingeh shisha ia ka Managing Committee, ki nonghikai lem bad ki kmie ki kpa jong ki khynnah, kiba phah leit skul ha katei ka skul, namar ki hap ban shna bad maramot ia katei ka skul, ha manla ka por ba sdang ka skul.Katkum ka jingiathuh da ki nonghikai jong katei ka skul, ki la ong ba ki shem jingeh shisha halor ka jingduna kiba don ha katei ka skul, namar naduh ka por ba ka Building jong katei ka skul ka la shah pynpra, ki la shem jingeh wat tang ka jaka ban shong ki khynnah skul bad khlem da iakren shuh haba iadei bad ka jingeh kaba ki iakynduh ha ka por Lyiur ka por slap.Lah ruh ban kdew hangne, ba mynshem snem ka MC, ki Nonghikai bad ki Kmie ki kpa, ki hap ban shna hi ia katei ka skul bad kata ka long tang na ka bynta ban iohshong ki khynnah skul bad kaba iada tang ia ka sngi u Slap, hynrei katei ka iing kaba ki shna mynta ka jot bad kam long shuh, kaba la pynlong ruh ka MC, nonghikai ba kim banse ban shna thymmai biang da kawei, wat haba kim ioh ia kino kino ki lad jingiarap na ka sorkar.Ka long ruh kaba sngewsih ban tip, ba tang namar ka jingbym shimkhia ka sorkar ha ka ban iarap ha ka ban maramot ia katei ka skul, ka la wanrah ruh ia ka jingduhnong kaba khraw na bynta jong kito ki khynnah kiba leit ha katei ka skul, namar nalor ba kim ioh ia ka jaka pule kaba biang, hynrei ki iakynduh ruh sa ia kawei ka jingeh bad kata ka long ba kim ioh ia ka lad ban leit skul ha ka por kaba biang.Ban shu pynkynmaw hangne, ba ha u snem uba la dep, kitei ki khynnah kiba leit ha katei ka skul, kim ioh ia ka lad ban leit skul ha kaba por kaba biang bad ka daw hi ka long ba ym don skul bad mynta u snem ruh kajuh ka apot sha kitei ki khynnah, kata ka long ba kim ioh ban leit skul ha ka por kaba biang bad khlem da iakren shuh halor ka hok kaba kum ki khynnah skul ki dei ban ioh.
title: La jan arsnem, ym iohi dak eiei  halor ka skul ha Khliehumwang

content: Ha kata ka por ki kynthei jong ngi, kin ym ioh laitlan shuh kumba ki long mynta; namar kin hap tap jaiñ iong (burqa) lut bad tang shu kum kren bakla, kin ngat ha ka apot jong ka Taslima Nasreen, ka kynthei Muslim na Bangladesh kaba phet rieh kylleng ka pyrthei ban lait na ki tyrsim ka jingiap.Katei ka ‘thei Muslim na Bangladesh ka dei ka doctor briew kaba sumar ia ki kynthei,’Gynaecologist.’ Ka la shah byrngem pyniap ha ki shit niam Muslim namar ka la thoh pyrshah ia ka jingshah lehbeiñ ki kynthei Muslim ha Bangladesh bad mynta ka phet rieh kylleng ka pyrthei, namarba ki shit niam Muslim ki wad ban pyniap ia ka. Ki kynthei Khasi jong ngi pat sha ei kin phet?Dang don ki lad ban iada ia ka jaidbynriew na ka jingduh jait. (1) Dei ban ai noh ka iktiar ha u khun shynrang (Authority). (2) Dei ban ai bhah lem ia u (Property); ka jingkitkhlieh bad ka kamram (responsibility & duty) u la don lypa. (3) Ha dukan sha, dei ban phah shong noh da ki khun shynrang. (4) Ka kynthei ba ioh tnga khyllahjait kan duh lut ia ka hok khasi bad ka dei ban leit bud noh ia u tnga jong ka. (5) Ka KHADC ka dei ban pynkylla noh (amend) ia ka aiñ ‘Khasi Social Custom of Lineage Act,’ ka aiñ shoh dab ia ki khun shynrang khasi, khamtam ka aiñ ‘Rapiieng’, kaba pynlongmraw ia ki khun shynrang ha la iieng-la shnong lajong.Ko phi ki khun dap shynrang u Hynñiew Trep, ngi donkam ia kitei ki aiñ haneng, lada phi kwah ban pynim ia ka jaidbynriew. Lym kumta ka jingiakhih ban iada ia ka jaidbynriew na ka jingwanrung kyrthep u mynder, da ki lynti bapher bapher, ne da kaba shoh dkhar, beh dkhar, kan ym poi shano shano; hynrei kan sa long kumba ong ki Pnar, ‘KI CHYNRANG YNÑIAW TREP, BEH DKHAR KI NA LAIT CHA IUNG; KI WAN CHAH BEH KI YEIDE, NA IUNG CHA LAIT.’ (Ki shynrang Hynñiew Trep ki beh dkhar na bar sha iieng, ialade ki shah beh na iieng sha bar).LYNNONG-VIIKI KHUBOR SHAH ÏUHROIT KI TRAI SHNONGKine harum ki dei ki jynthoh ba la sot na ki kot khubor bapher bapher halor ka jingshah iuhroit ka jaidbynriew jong ngi:
title: KA JAIDBYNRIEW SHAHRAH UMSAW

content: Shillong:  Ka jingialang ka UDP Parliamentary party kaba long ha ka 14 tarik Rymphang 2020, kala jied bujli ia u MDC ka Sohra u bah Titosster Well Chyne kum u nongialam ka parliamentary party.Kham mynshwa, ka UDP kala jied ia u bah Teinwel Dkhar kum u nongialam ka parliamentary party bad ula long ruh u CEM ka KHADC la 9 bnai eiei shwa ba un khyllem noh ha u bnai Naiwieng 2019.Ha ka jingialang ka UDP, la don lang ki MDC ka UDP ba kynthup ia bah Teinwel Dkhar, bah Jambor War, bah Ryngkat lang Lyndem bad bah Bindo M.Lanong, ki la rai da kawei ka sur ban jied ia u bah Titosster ban long kum u nongialam thymmai.Ar ngut ki MDC ka UDP pat kynthup bah Paul Lyngdoh bad bah Teibor Pathaw ki la mih noh na ka United Democratic Alliance (UDP) ba ialam u bah Teinwel Dkhar bad leit kyrshan ia ka kynhun United Democratic Forum (UDF) ba ialam da u bah Latiplang Kharkongor.Kine baroh saw ngut kila phah ia kane ka rai jong ka jingialang sha u president bad secretary ka UDP ba kin tip.
title: Mih bujli u bah Titos ha jaka u bah Teinwel kum u nongialam ka UDP

content: Ha ki 24 kynta ba ladep, ki don sa 29,429 ngut kiba ioh pang Covid thymmai ha ka Ri India bad kiba iap, ki long 582 ngut.Mynta kiba pang baroh, ki la poi sha ka 9,36,181 ngut bad kiba dang shah sumar ki long  3,19,840 ngut bad kiba la jem ki long 5,92,032 bad kiba iap baroh ki la poi sha ka  24,309 ngut, ong ka tnat ka koit ka khiah ka sorkar India.
title: 29 hajar ngut ha ka shisngi, kiba ioh pang khlam Covid 19 ha India

content: Ki don sa  859 ngut kiba ioh pang COVID19, hynnin ka sngi ha Assam bad baroh kiba ioh pang ha katei ka Jylla, ki la poi sha ka 18,666 ngut.U Himanta Biswa Sarma, myntri ka koit ka khiah, ha ka tweet jongu, hynnin ka miet, u iathuh ba na kitei ki 859 ngut, ki don 627 ngut, kiba tang na ka sor bah Guwahati.Haduh mynta, kiba dang shah sumar na katei ka jingpang, ki long  6,444 ngut, katba ki don sa 12,173 ngut kiba la mih na ki jaka sumar bapher ha ka jylla.
title: 627 ngut ha ka shisngi, kiba ioh pang khlam covid 19 ha Guwahati

content: Shillong:Ki hynniew ngut ki ehrang, ki la rahbor ia u wei u nongkhaii dewiong u ba dei ka shnong Jadi, South Garo Hills. Kitei ki ehrang, ki la rah bor ia u Rintu R Marak na ka shnong Ringdim kaba hap hapoh ka Shallang Police Station, West Khasi Hills.Hadien ka jingioh jingtip ha poh ka jingialam jong ki Pulit ka West Khasi Hills,ha ryngkat ki pulit ka South Garo Hills bad ki pulit ka East Garo Hills ki la pynlong ka jingthwet ka ba jur ia kine ki briew ki ba donkti ha ka kam rah bor ia u nongkhaii dewiong.Hadien ka jingshah thwet kaba jur na ki pulit,ki ne ki nongrah bor ia u nongkhaii dewiong ki la pyllait noh ia u Rintu, ha ka 13tarik u Naitung 2020 bad la iathuh ruh ba ki la ioh ia ka pisa, kaba ki dawa na utei u nongkhaii.Hynnin ka sngi ki pulit jong ka East Garo Hills, ki la pynpra ia ka ktem ba ki don kitei ki snar nonglute, kiba donkti ha ka jingrah bor ia u Rintu R Marak bad la kem ruh ia kitei ki runar.Ia kine ki ba la shah kem la aiti noh ha ki pulit jong ka West khasi Hills bad pynlong ia ka jingtohkit ka ba bniah bad ka jingthwet ia kiwei pat ki ba donkti ha kane ka kam ka dang iaid shakhmat.
title: Shah kem ki 7ngut, ba rahbor ia u nongkhaii dewiong

content: Shillong:Ka KSU Sohryng kham Unit hadien ba ka lah ioh ka jing ujor na ki paidbah jong ka shnong, khamtam ki long kmie long kpa, ba ha kine ki sngi  ki don ki briew kiba nabar shnong  ki ba juh wan kai pyngngad sha kane ka thain ha  shi lynter ka surok NH 6 kaba hap hapoh u pud u sam jong ka shnong Sohryng kham ba ki dei ban long kiba adkar ha ki rukom iaid bad rukom ieng  sha kine ki thain.Namar bun kiba ba wan kai pyngngad sha kane ka thain ki wan ban ia dih kyiad pathar, ryngkat ka jingpynjaboh ia ki jaka kiba hap ha ka shnong bad ruh ki ktien ki ba har rukom kiba ktah ia ka burom ka shnong ka thaw kaba wan rah ruh ia ka jingshong syier ia ka iaid ka ieng jong ki paidbah ha kane ka thain.Ha kajuh ka por ka seng ka kyntu ruh ia baroh ki Nongshong Shnong jong ka Sohryngkham ban kiar na ka jingpynher khubor hamsaia ha kaba iadei bad ka khniang jingpang COVID 19. Khamtam ha ki thain nongkyndong ki khubor kiba khlem nongrim kin wanrah ia ka jingshong syier bad ka jingbym sngew shngain hapdeng ki para nongshong shnong ki bym don jingtip ia ka dang ka duh halor U COVID 19.Ka Seng ka kyrpad bad kyntu ban kiar naki ki jngpynshaphriang ia ka khubor hamsaia bad haka juh ka por ka seng ka kyntu ia ki paidbah ban bud iaki kyndon iada haba iadei bad u COVID 19 katkum ka jingbthah na ka Sorkar, ong ka kyrwoh na u samla Dalumbor Kharpran, General Secretary  ka KSU Sohryngkham Unit.
title: Maham  ka KSU kiba  ia dih kyiad pathar

content: Shillong: Ka seng JSU Shillong Circle ka kwah ban pynshai lyngba ki lad pathai khubor, sha ka sorkar ban iathuh ia ka kyrteng kiba ioh COVID 19, hynrei kam mut ban iathuh paidbah ia ki kyrteng jong ki nongpang, hynrei ki bor ba dei peit ki dei ban ai ia ki kyrteng ki nongpang sha ki Dorbar Shnong jong ki, ym ban pyntip paidbah ia ki kyrteng namar lada jia ba pynmih paidbah ia ki kyrteng ioh kan don ka jingsngewthuh bakla bad ka jing ibeiñ ia ki nongpang ba ioh ia une khlam COVID 19.Hynrei ka seng ka ai jingmut sha ka sorkar ba dei ban ai iaki  kyrteng sha ki Dorbar Shnong khnang ba ka bor shnong ki lah ban teh lakam kham kloi ban iada na ka jingpur stet une khniang COVID 19, hapoh shnong hapoh thaw bad kumjuh ka sorkar ka dei ban iatrei lang ryngkat ryngkat bad ki bor shnong khnang ban lait na ka jingpur une u khlam ha shnong ha thaw (Community spread transmission).Ka sorkar ka dei ruh ban test noh naphang ia ki katto katne tylli shnong kiba lah tikna ba ki nongshong shnong ki lah ioh ia u khniang COVID 19 bad ka sorkar kam dei shuh ban pynslem, namar ioh lap ba pur stet katba dang buh por ban test ia ki nongshong shnong.Ka seng ka kyntu ruh ia ki paidbah ba kim dei ban i beiñ ne pyniapher ia kiba ioh ia une u khlam COVID 19 lane ban i beiñ ia ki nongtrei ha ki hospital bapher bapher kum ki Doctor bad ki Nurse.Hynrei ngi ki paidbah ngi dei ban iai ai mynsiem ia ki bad kumjuh ruh ban kitbok kitrwiang ba kin jem noh kloi na une u khlam COVID 19.Ka seng ka pynpaw ruh ia ka jingsngewnguh ia ka sorkar ba ka lah buh shi syndon da ki nongiarap ANM bad ki ASHA ban pynsngewthuh jingmut (Behaviour Change Management Committee) ia ki paidbah ka jylla ba ngim dei ban ibeiñ ia kiba ioh COVID 19 bad iaki nongtrei hospital bad kumno ban leh ban iada ialade na u khniang COVID 19, ong ka kyrwoh ba lah phah da u Publicity secretary ka JSU Shillong Circle u samla Tiphimi Rymbai.
title: Ai kyrteng ia kiba pang Covid 19, sha ki dorbar Shnong, ong ka JSU

content: Chandigarh: Ki MLA jong ka liang pyrshah ha Punjab, kiba dei na ka seng  Aam Aadmi Party, ki sah miet hynnin ka miet hapoh ka iing dorbar jylla jong ka Punjab bad katei ka dei, kum ka dak jong ka jing pyrshah ia ka sorkar jong U  Captain Amarinder Singh bad ka daw ka long, namar ba ka sorkar kam shym pyni ia ka ain kaba ki dang thaw, kaba dei ia ki nongrep jong ka Jylla.La iohi ha ki dur ba ki MLA, ki ia thiah lymbher hapoh ka iing dorbar bad kitei ki dawa, ban iohi, ia katei ka ain kaba dang shu thaw thymmai ban wan ha iing dorbar ha ka sngi hat majai.“Ka AAP, kan kyrshan ia ka ain jong ka sorkar Jylla, ban pyrshah ia ka farm bill jong ka sorkar India, tangba ngi kwah ban iohi ia ki kopi jong katei ka ain. Ngim shym la ioh ia ki kopi jong ka ain bad kumta, kumno ngin iakren ha ka iing dorbar?” ong U Harpal Cheema, nongialam ka seng AAP, uba dei ruh u nongialam liang pyrshah ha iing dorbar jong ka Punjab.
title: Sahmiet ki MLA, hapoh iing dorbar Punjab, na ka ain nongrep

content: Ki bor shipai jong ka Bangladesh, ki dang thwet tyngeh, ia u satar jong ka ULFA (I), U Drishti Rajkhowa, ha ki bynta jong ka Sylhet, ong ka khubor.Katei ka jingtip, ka leit poi sha ki shkor jong ka sorkar Bangladesh, haba la don ba iohi, ba u don ha Jaflong ha ka taiew ba ladep bad kaba dei ruh ka por, ha kaba U Imran Ahmed Siddique, u High Commissioner jong ka Pakistan, u don ha katei ka jaka ban shongkai pyngngad.U Imran, ula leit sha Sylhet ban ia kynduh ia U Mayor jong katei ka jaka, uba dei na ka seng BNP, U  Ariful Haque Chowdhury bad katei ka la pyn artatien jur ia ki heh jong ka sorkar Bangladesh. La iathuh ruh ba U Choudhury, ula kyntait ban iakynduh bad U Imran ha ka minit kaba khadduh bad katei ka la nang pyn suba shuh shuh ia ki bor sorkar jong ka Bangladesh.Ki pulit syntiat ka sorkar India, ki iathuh ba U  Rajkhowa, uba dei uba wan ba ar ha ka jingtrei kam jong ka ULFA, hadien jong U Paresh, ula don ha u bnai ba ladep ha Mendipathar, ha Garo Hills, jong ka Meghalaya bad la shim namarkata, ba u leit hiar khnang sha Sylhet, ba ka don ka daw kaba kongsan bha ia u.
title: Thwet ka Bangladesh, ba mih kyrkieh u heh duh ka ULFA na Mendipathar sha Sylhet

content: Nongpoh:Ka Hynniewtrep Youth Council (HYC), Ri Bhoi District, ka la ioh ban pynskhem pura ia ki nongkitkam ka HYC, Ri Bhoi Circle bad ki ban sa peit ia ka khia ka shong ki paidbah ha katei ka thain, kaba dei ruh ka thain kaba bun ki shnong ki thaw ki don ha khappud bad ka Assam.Ia kitei ki nongkitkam ka HYC Ri Bhoi Sepngi, la leit ban pynskhem da u Bah Hercules Suting, President ka HYC ha Ri Bhoi, ha ryngkat ka jingdon u Bah Jason Lennox Nongrum, General Secretary lem bad kiwei de ki heh nongialam ka HYC ha Ri Bhoi.Kitei ki nongialaam ka HYC, Ri Bhoi Sepngi, ki kynthup ia u Bah Alfred Lyngdoh kum u President, u Bah Banshan Nongtri, kum u Vice President, u Bah Pynsuklang Khar syntiew kum u General Secretary lem bad shibun ki dkhot ka seng.
title: La pynskhem ia ki nongkitkam ba pura ka HYC Ri Bhoi Sepngi

content: U heh duh jong ka kompeni, kaba ai jing pynbna sha ki kotkhubor, ula shah beh kam noh bad ka daw ka long namar ba u rah lang ia ka webcam jongu sha painkhana bad ka dur ba u leit painkhana, ka pan ha ka jing iakren video lane ka  Zoom call.La iathuh ba U Nick Emery, ula rah lang ia ka webcam jongu, namar ba ula sam painkhana palat  bad katei ka dei hadien ba ka jingialang, ka lai bteng bad slem bha.La ong da kiba iohi, ba utei U CEO jong ka Mindshare, ula pyni ia ka dur, ba u dang shong ha painkhana bad hadien katei ka jingleh jongu, la weng noh, da ka kompeni Mindshare, ia U Emery, namar ka jingleh khlem akor jongu, ha ka por ba ka dang iaid ka jingialang lyngba ka video conferencing.
title: Shah weng kam u heh duh ka kompeni, ba u iakren video ha painkhana

content: Shillong:Myn hynnin ka sngi ka kynhun jong Ka Sur U Paidbah ka Bri u Hynniewtrep,  ka la leit ban ia kynduh ia u lamphang ka ingdorbar thawain u ba long ruh u President jong ka party UDP u bah Metbah Lyngdoh, ban ia kren, halor ka jingdonkam ban wanrah ia ka jingpynkylla ha ka Schedule Tribes List jong u snem 1950 bad ban leh ia kane don kam ia ka rai ka ba skhem na ki seng sain pyrthei.Haba kren ha ki lad pathai khubor na ka liang u bah Thomas Passah u dkhot jong ka KSUPB7T u la iathuh ba ia kane ki la iathuh  ha u president  jong ka party UDP u bah Metbah Lyngdoh namar ba ia kane ka list la shu pdiang ha ka snem 1972 ha ka por ba ioh ka jylla Meghalaya.U la iathuh ruh ba la don kam ban pynkylla noh mardor ia ka ne ka bynta namar ba ka long ka ba shai ba u wei u briew na kawei ka jylla ym lah ban kam u Riewlum (Schedule Tribe) ha ka wei ka jylla, kumba ka long mynta la bun ki ba pyndonkam  bakla ia ka jaid ka kur jong ki jaitbynriew khasi.U la ong ruh ba kum ki khasi ha ba ki leit ha kiwei ki jylla kim lah ban kam ia ka jinglong Schedule Tribe ha kiwei ki jylla bad halor kane kila don ruh saw tylli ki shithi ki ba la phah sha ka Ministry Home Affair ha u snem 1975, 1977, 1982 bad 1988.
title: Kynduh ka KSUPB7T ia u President ka UDP, pynkylla ha ka Schedule Tribes List

content: Nongpoh: Ki nongialam ka National People’s Party (NPP) ha Ri Bhoi, ki la ai ka jing iaroh kaba khraw ia u Ma Ngaitlang Dhar, namar ki sngewthuh ba ka jingkiew ka Party NPP hapoh District bad jylla, ka dei namar ka jingwan pyniasoh NPP u Ma Ngaitlang Dhar.Ha ka jingialang kaba long dang shen ha Mawhati, u Bah Clement Mawlong, President ka NPP ha Ri Bhoi, u la sngew thuh ba ka NPP ha Ri Bhoi, ka la nangkiew katba nangmih ki sngi ki por, ha kaba u la ong ruh ba ka don ka jingkyrmen kaba skhem bha ba ha u 2023, ka sa wanrah ia ka jingkylla kaba khraw.Ha katei ka sngi, kaba la donlang da u Ma Ngaitlang Dhar, ki nongialam na ka Party NPP ha Ri Bhoi lem bad ki Nongmihkhmat kiba kynthup ia u Bah Sosthenes Sohtun, MLA Jirang, u Bah Victor Ranee, MDC Jirang bad u Bah Rangkynsai Kharbuki, ki la niew la tang ia shibun kita ki kam lehbha da u Ma Ngaitlang bad kiba la pynpaw syndon ba u la dei shisha u riew Khraw bad uba dei ban ioh ia ka burom.U Bah Victor Ranee, u la ong ba u Ma Ngaitlang Dhar, u la dei kum Paia ba skhem na bynta ka Party bad uba la long kum u Nongsaindur (Architect) ha kane ka sorkar MDA kaba mynta bad uba la ong ruh ba jin lada ym dei da ka jingpyniaid ba stad u Ma Ngaitlang Dhar, kane ka sorkar MDA kaba mynta kan ym neh skhem kumba ka long mynta.Katba u Bah Rangkynsai Kharbuki, MDC Mawhati, u la ong ba u Ma Ngaitlang Dhar, u la dei uwei na ki Nongialam ne Mentor ha u bad u la sngew ruh ba u la dei u riew khraw ha Ri Bhoi, ia kaba baroh ki dei ban ai ka jingiaroh.
title: U Ma Ngaitlang Dhar, u nongpynkiew ia ka NPP bad u nongsaindur ia ka sorkar MDA

content: Shillong:U Myntri Rang bah ka jylla u Conrad K Sangma, myn hynnin ka sngi haba ia kren bad ki lad pathai khubor u la ong ba hadien ka jinglehniam Puja, ka sorkar kan sa shim ia ka rai ban pynjynsur shuh shuh ia ki katto katne ki kam ha ka jylla.U la ong ruh ba ka jingialang kala long mynta ka sngi ka long ban iakren halor ka long jing man jong ka khlam Covid ha ka jylla bad ban pynbiang ia ki protocol khnang ba kan long ka ba lah ban iabiang na ka bynta ban lah ban wanrah ia ka jingiada bad ka jing shong shngain ia ki paidbah ha ka jylla.U la ong ruh ba mynta lada pyllait lut katta kan dang jur ka jingma, hynrei lada khang ruh kan don ka jingktah ha ka ioh ka kot kumta ban pynbiang habaroh ki liang ka sorkar ka la pynlong ia kane ka jingialang.“Hooid mynne ngi khlem shim kano kano karai hynrei hadien ka jinglehniam puja ka sorkar jylla kan sa shim shuhshuh ia ka rai ban kham pynjynsur shuhshuh ia ki kam ki jam ha ka jylla” u la ong.
title: Hadien ka lehniam puja, yn shim rai ban pynjynsur ia ki lad treikam

content: Shillong: Ka kynhun iakhih kaba la tip kum ka Fridays For Future (FFF), Meghalaya kaba iakhih bad wanrah jingtip sha phang ka jingkylla jong ka Mei Ri Saw kun (Climate Change) bad kumjuh ruh ban iakhih na ka bynta ka hok jong ka mariang, naduh ka 12tarik haduh ka 17tarik jong u bnai Risaw, ka la pynlong ia ka jing ialang habar jong ka ophis ka PWD ha Barik, ban pynpaw ia ka jingbym sngewhun ia ka jingthmu jong ka sorkar ban tei ia ka Shopping Mall ha Barik.Kane ka jing iakhih hapoh ka jingialam jong u Bah Joel Kyndiah, ka long shi bynta jong ka online campaign kaba don ia ka hashtag #NoToBarikMall, kaba thmu ban rah ia ka mat ba ka jingthmu ban tei ia ka shopping mall ha Barik Point ka long ka bym don jingmut bad kaba khlem nongrim eiei.Ka FFF ka kwah ruh ban bynrap ba kane ka jingthmu ban tei iaka mall ka iaid ryngkat bad ka jingtei jong ka Delhi Saket Mall, kaba long tang ka jingpynsepei ia ka pisa jong u paidbah, khamtam ha kane ka por ba ka sorkar ka dang bun ki jinglut jingsep ha kaban ialeh pyrshah ia kane ka khlam COVID-19. Ka jingpyrshah jong ka FFF ban tei ia kane ka mall ka long ym tang na ka bynta kaba iadei bad ka jingpynneh pynsah ia ka mei mariang, hynrei ruh ha ka liang kaba iadei bad ka jingwan kynthlep ki heh spah na shabar ka jylla ki ban ioh lad ban seng kam ha kane ka mall, ka ban ialam pat sha ka jing pynduh kam ia ki briew kiba na ka jylla hi kiba thmu ban sengkam dalade, bad kin sa kylla long tang kiba trei hapoh kine ki hehspah, ym dei pat kiba long trai ia ka kamai kajih ha la ka jong ka jylla.“Kum ki nongshong shnong jong ka sorbah Shillong, ngi thrang ba kane ka jaka ha Barik kan jin da kylla long pynban ka jaka kaba ailad ia ki briew, naduh ki khynnah haduh ki tymmen, ki nongput nongtem, ki kaitor bapher bapher, ia kiba smat ban pule, ia ki myllung, ki nongthoh kot, ki nongkren, ki nongshong iew, ki briew kiba don ia ki sap bapher bapher, bad kane ka jaka kan long kaba shong shngain na ka bynta kine baroh ki briew, khamtam na ka bynta ki nongrep kiba na kylleng ka jylla, ki ban iohlad ban die ia ki mar rep jong ki kiba iadei bad ki aiom bapher bapher. Nalor kine baroh, ka jingthmu ban tei ia ka shopping mall ka long ka jingpyni shai ba ka synshar ka khadar ha ka jylla long tang na ka bynta ki riewshimet ym ia ki paidbah baroh,” ong u Bah Joel Kyndiah.
title: Ïakhih ka Fridays For Future Meghalaya, namar ka Barik Shopping Mall

content: U JP Nadda, President ka seng BJP, u kren shai mynta ka sngi, ba ka ain  Citizenship (Amendment) Act, ka shu sahteng mynta shi por bad ula ong ba katei ka ain kan sa trei kam noh shen ha ka Ri.U Nadda, haba kren ha ka jingialang bad ki kynhun bapher ha  north Bengal, u kynnoh ba ka  sorkar jong ka Mamata Banerjee ha West Bengal, ka iaid da ka buit pynpait pynpra bad ka trei kam, tang ban myntoi kito kiba don ha ka seng jongka bad kam dei kum ka seng BJP, kaba trei, na bynta ka bha ka miat jong u paidlang ha ka ri baroh kawei.Baroh phin sa ia myntoi lut na ka jing pyntrei kam ia ka ain  Citizenship (Amendment) Act. Ka dei ka ain kaba la mynjur da ka Parliament bad ngi la kut jingmut ban pyniaid beit shakhmat, ong U Nadda ha ka jingialang. “Mynta na ka daw jong ka U Covid 19, ka jing pyntrei kam ia ka CAA, ka la sahteng, hynrei ka kam, ka la nang iaid shakhmat bad ki ain kin sa mih kiba iadei bad katei ka kam bad kan trei kam noh shen shen” ong U Nadda.Haba kren pyrshah ia ka sorkar  Trinamool Congress, U Nadda, u ong ba ka sorkar jong ka Banerjee, ka la pyndiaw mynsiem shi katdei ia ki jaitbynriew Hindu ha Bengal bad mynta ka sdang ban lum ban lang biang ia ki Hindu, namar ba ka tieng, ioh ka duh, ia ka shuki myntri rangbah bad kane ka dei ka politics thap vote suda, ula ong shuh shuh.
title: Ka ain CAA, kan sa trei kam noh shen, ong u heh duh ka BJP

content: Shillong: Mynta ka sngi, kata ka 19 tarik u Risaw 2020, u la ithuh ba ha ka jylla ki la don 28 ngut kiba pang na u COVID-19, bad haduh mynta kiba dang shah sumar na une u khñiang jingpang ha ka jylla ki la don haduh 2,069 ngut.Ha East Khasi Hills District kiba pang mynta ka sngi ki don 11 ngut, ha West Jaintia Hills ki don 6 ngut, ha Ri Bhoi District ki don 5 ngut, ha West Garo Hills ki don 5 ngut bad ha East Garo Hills I don iwei.Kiba la koit mynta ka sngi na u khñiang jingpang coronavirus ha ka jylla ki la don 110 ngut. Na kine, ha East Khasi Hills ki don 72 ngut, ha Ri Bhoi District ki don 23 ngut, ha West Garo Hills ki don 13 ngut, ha West Jaintia Hills I don iwei bad ha South West Garo Hills I don iwei. Baroh kiba la koit mynta ka sngi ki la don haduh 6,392 ngut.La iathuh ba na ki 2,069 ngut kiba dang pang ha ka jylla, ha East Khasi Hills ki don 1,363 ngut kiba kynthup 30 ngut ki armed forces bad 1,333 ngut ki riewpaidbah, ha West Khasi Hills District ki don 49 ngut, ha South West Khasi Hills ki don 15 ngut, ha Ri Bhoi district ki don 248 ngut kiba kynthup 47 ngut ki Amred Forces bad 201ngut ki riewpaidbah, ha West Jaintia Hills district ki don 84 ngut , ha East Jaintia Hills district ki don 17 ngut, ha West Garo Hills district ki don 177 ngut kiba kynthup 22 ngut ki armed forces bad 155 ngut ki riewpaidbah, ha South West Garo Hills district ki don 10 ngut, ha South Garo hills ki don 33 ngut, ha East Garo Hills district ki don 48 ngut bad ha North Garo Hills district ki don 25 ngut. Baroh kiba la koit ha ka jylla ki la don haduh 5,735 ngut.Kiba la khlad baroh ki la don haduh mynta 75 ngut.
title: 28 ngut kiba pang bad koit 110 ngut mynta ka sngi ha ka Jylla

content: Shillong: U Myntri Rangbah ka jylla u Conrad K Sangma ha ba ia kren bad ki lad pathai khubor mynta ka sngi,  u la pynksan ia ka jingkren jong u Symbud myntri rangbah u bah Prestone Tynsong pyrshah ia ka party BJP, da kaba u ong ba ka dei ka jingiatip lang jongki, ia kaei ka ba la kren da u Symbud myntri rangbah namar ba la da don ka no kano ka Party ka ba don ki jingeh ngi la ju khot ban ia kren bad ban ioh ka wad ia ki lad ki lynti ban weng ia ka ta ka jingeh.U la ong ruh ba kaei ka ba ki la kynthoh  da ka party BJP ban shu pynpaw tang ha ki lad pathai khubor ka long  ka jingkynthoh ka bym don jingkit khlieh bad kam dei kane ka lynti ki dei ban da leh ha ka rukom ka ba dei bad ba ki dei ban don ka jingkitkhlieh ia ka ba ki kynthoh.U la ong ruh  ba kaei ka ba ki nongialam jong ka BJP ka la leh ka long ka bym don jingkitkhlieh  bad ka ei kaba la kren da  u Bah Prestone ka long ka ba dei.U la ong ruh “U briew u ba la kynthoh pyrshah ia ka MDA ,u dei u briew u ba khlem don ha ka por ba la iakren hapdeng ka BJP bad  ka NPP bad  ki khlem tip ia kaei ka ba ngi la iakren bad ki dei ban sngewthuh ba kim don ha ka kyrdan ban kynnoh, kulmar hynrei kum u Chairman jong ka MDA nga long u ba kloi ban ia kren ia ki jingeh jong ki, kata tang da ki long kiba kren don burom”.U la ong ruh, ba  na ka liang jong u kum u Myntri Rangbah, u long u ba kloi ban iakren bad ki party kiba synrop lang ha ka MDA bad ki MLA jong ki party bapher bapher ki ju wan ha ka kamra trei kam jongu, haba ki don kano kano ka jingeh.“Ngi don hapdeng ka jingiadei kaba kylluid bad ki party synrop; baroh ngi long kiba kylluid ban ia kynduh bad ban ia kren ha ba don kano kano ka jingeh, khnang ban lah ban weng ia kata ka jingeh” u la ong .
title: Kaba la kren da u symbud myntri rangbah ia ka BJP, ka long kaba dei: Conrad

content: Shillong: U MLA jong ka 19-Shillong South, u ba dei ruh na ka party BJP u bah Sanbor Shullai mynta ka sngi u la thoh da ka shithi sha u State President jong ka party u bah Ernest Marwei da ka ba ong ba u don ka jingshaniah ha u kum u nongialam, hynrei ha ka juh ka por ba un long u ba adkar ha ba kren sha ki lad pathai khubor, ha kaba ia kren ia ka sorkar MDA namar ba ka BJP ruh ka ia don lang,hynrei u dei ban ia kren ha ka jaka ka ba dei ban ia kren.Ha ka shithi kaba la phah da u bah Sanbor Shullai sha u bah Ernest mynta ka sngi u la ong ba la iohi ha kine ki sngi ia ki jingkynthoh kiba la long jan man ka sngi na ka party BJP pyrshah ia ka sorkar MDA , kane ka la wanlam ia ka jingbym hun ha ka jingmut jingpyrkhat jong ki briew bad u la buh ruh ia ka jingkylli hato ki nongialam jong ka BJP, ki tip ia kine ki jingkynnoh jong ka State BJP pyrshah ia ka sorkar MDA.U la ong ruh ba ka dei ka jingshisha ba ka jingthaw ia ka sorkar MDA ka dei ka jingtrei shitom jong ki nongialam jong ka seng BJP, ryngkat kiwei kiwei ki party kiba ia don lang ban pynlong ia kane ka sorkar MDA kaba khlain bad ka party BJP ka dei kawei na ki seng sain pyrthei, kaba ia don lang ha kane ka sorkar. Ka jingiatreilang ka party NPP bad ka UDP ruh ki dei lang hapoh jong ka Northeast Democratic Alliance ha kane ka thain bad kane ka jingpynmih khubor na ka por sha ka por ka buh ia ka jingkylli ia ka rai jong ki nongialam ba ha khlieh jong ka party BJP.U la ong ruh ba kane ka jingleh jong u State President, ym dei tang ba ka ktah ia ka sorkar MDA, hynrei ka wan ruh ia ka jingthut, ha kaba ia dei bad ka  jingtrei kam jong ka party BJP, namar kum ka kynhun ki juh ia kren ia ki jingeh hapoh ka Coordination Committee ha ka ba baroh ki party ki ia don lang ha ka sorkar MDA bad  kine ki jingkynnoh baroh kam wan rah ia ka jingsngewtynnad hapoh jong ka MDA. Ki jingkynnoh ka long kawei ha ka synshar paidbah, hynrei hap ban don ruh ia ki sabut haba kynnoh bad kumta ka jingkylli ka long hato ki nongialam ba ha khlieh jong ka party ki tip ia kine ki jingkynnoh da ki nongialam ka State BJP bad  ki nongialam ki dei ban kynjoh ktien ruh ia ki MLA kiba la jied da u paidbah.U bah Sanbor u kyntu ia ki nongialam jong ka party ba lada don kino kino ki jingeh ki dei ban wanrah ha ka jaka iakren, khnang ban lah ban ia kren hapoh ka MDA bad lada don ki jingeh kiba ym lah ban ia pynbeit dei hangta ki nongialam ba ha khlieh kin tuklar lem.Kumba ka long ba u Myntri Rangbah ka jylla u juh kyrshan ia ka party BJP ha kine ki ar snem shiteng, wat ha ka por ba ka don ka jingpyrshah ia ka party BJP ha kane ka jylla Meghalaya bad ki ruh ki kyrshan ia u Myntri Rangbah ka jylla u ba dei u Chairman jong ka MDA bad ki don ka jingshaniah ha u kum u nongialam.Ha ka juh ka por u la kyntu ia u myntri rangbah ka jylla ban khot ia ka jingialang jong ka MDA ban ia kren ia ki jingeh khnang ba kan don ka jingiashaniah ha ka jingiatrei kam hapoh jong ka kynhun MDA bad u la ong ba ka jingong ban weng na ka sorkar, kam dei ka bynta jong ki ban ia kren, namar kane ka shong ha ki nongialam ka party ba ha khlieh bad ka jingkren ha ki lad pathai khubor ka ktah ia ka party kiba ia don lang ha ka sorkar bad ha ka 2 tarik u Risaw 2020, la shim ia ka rai ba kino kino ki khubor ki ban phah sha ki lad pathai khubor kiba long pyrshah ia ka sorkar dei ban leh ha dien ba la ia mir jingmut bad ki MLA, hynrei wat la ka la don katei ka rai ki dang mih ki khubor kiba long pyrshah ia katei ka rai.
title: Kren antad, ong U bah Sanbor ia U President BJP ha ka Jylla

content: Nongpoh: Haba kren sha ki paidbah hynnin ka sngi Saitjain ha Mawhati, u Dasa khiatbha Lamare, MLA Mawhati bad uba la long mynta kum u Myntri Sorkar, u la iathuh, ba u don shisha ia katei ka mynsiem ban wanrah jingkylla ha Mawhati Constituency, hynrei ha kane ka kynti kaba mynta u kham shim khia ha ka ban wanrah ia ki skim pynroi kiba iadei bad ki Surok ne ki lynti syngkien.Halor ki surok, utei u MLA Mawhati, u la ong ba u la ialeh shitom ha ka ban pynbha ia ki surok kiba hap hapoh katei ka Constituency, kata ka Surok na Umsning sha Umsiang, ka surok na Liarbang sha Maw lasnai shaduh Umkhen bad kumjuh ruh ia ka surok na Umsning sha Mawrong.Haba iadei bad ka surok na Umsning sha Umsiang, kaba dei ruh ka surok kaba donkam tam na bynta ki paidbah hapoh katei ka Constituency, utei u MLA Mawhati, u la ong ba shen katei ka surok kan sa urlong noh shen, ha kaba ka surok na Umsning sha Sonidan lei lah ban sdang pyntrei noh ha u Nohprah mynta u snem ne ha u Kyllalyngkot jong u snem 2021, namar ia katei ka surok la ioh ia ka jingpynmang tyngka na ka World Bank kaba poi da ki spah klur.U Dasakhiatbha Lamare, u la pynpaw ruh sha ki paidbah, ba kan long shisha kaba eh na bynta u Nongmihkhmat paidbah ban pynbiang ia ki nongdonkam jong katei ka Constituency bad khamtam eh haba iadei bad ki Surok, namar ka dei ka jaka kaba la heh bha bad bun ki shnong ki dei kiba dang sahdien.Na ka jingkren jong u Dasakhiatbha Lamare, la sngewthuh ba kitei ki surok kiba la kdew haneng bad kiba donkam eh na bynta ki paidbah jong katei ka thain, kin sa urlong noh shen bad la kumno kumno kin sa sdang pyntrei ha u snem ban wan bad ha u snem 2022, namar kum u Nongmihkhmat, u la ong ba u la trei shitom shisha ban pynurlong ia kitei ki surok ba donkam hapoh kane ka kynti, kaba u long kum u Nongmihkhmat na katei ka Constituency.
title: Ha u Nohprah ne lyngkot yn pyntrei noh ia ka surok Umsning-Sonidan

content: Nongpoh: Ki nongialam ka Synjuk ki Phra Shnong Pahamroh Circle, ki la ai ka jing khublei kaba kyrpang ia ka Nongpoh Town Committee (NTC), namar ka jinglong kloi jong ki ban sngap ia ka jingdawa jong ban pyllait noh ia ki Phra tylli ki shnong kiba hap ha katei ka Synjuk bad kiba la dawa ban mih noh na ka Nongpoh Town, kaba la shah kynthup ha ka thup Urban, ne kum ki shnong kiba la kham long Sor.Lah ruh ban kdew hangne ba baroh shikatta, kitei ki Phra tylli ki shong ki hap hapoh ka jingpeit jingkhmih jong ka Nongpoh Town Committee, hynrei ha kine ki snem ba la leit noh, ki nongialam shnong jong kitei ki Phra tylli ki shnong, ki la dawa ban mih noh na ka Nongpoh Town, namar kim pat sngew iahap ba ki shnong jong ki, kin shah kynthup kum kita ki shnong kiba la long kiba la kham long Sor (Urban), namar ki dang sngew iahap ba kin shah pynhap kum kita ki shnong Nongkyndong (Rural).U Bah Donbok Kharshandi, Chairman jong katei ka Synjuk ki Phra Shnong, u la ong ba na ka liang ka Synjuk ka ai khublei kyrpang ia u Bah C.B Syiem bad u Bah Rayonald Kharkamni, kiba dei ki nongialam ka Nongpoh Town Committee, namar ka jingiohi jngai ka jong bad ban pyllait suk ia kitei ki shnong ba kin mih noh ha ka Nongpoh Town.Ka la don ruh ka jingkren na kiwei pat ki nongialam katei ka Synjuk Phra Shnong, kiba la pynpaw da kaba ong ba katei ka jingdawa jong ki ban mih noh na ka Urban, kam dei ba ki ialeh pyrshah ia ka Nongpoh Town Committee, hynrei ki sngewthuh ba kitei ki shnong kim pat sngewiahap ban shah kynthup Urbah, namar kitei ki shnong ki dei kiba dang sahdien bad bun na ki paidbah nongshong shnong, ki dang dei tang ki nongbylla sngi bad ki nongrep sha khlaw sha btap.
title: Khublei ki Synjuk Phra Shnong ia ka NTC

content: Shillong:Ka Khasi Students’ Union (KSU) Narpuh Circle, ha ka 30tarik Nohprah, ka la hiar kyrkieh sha Malidor namar ka jingioh jingtip na ki trai shnong ba ki nong Assam da ki phew ngut ki la wan khlong maw beaiñ biang na kane ka wah Malidor kaba dang hap hapoh u pud u sam ka jylla Meghalaya.Ka seng, tang shu dep leit buh syntiew ha u Motdur u Kiang Nangbah ha Khliehriat namar ka dei ka lyngkhuh sngi iap ba 158 snem u khlawait ka jaid bynriew u Woh Kiang Nangbah, ka seng hapoh ka jingialam u Bah KS Suchiang President, bah S. Bamon General Secretary lem bad ki dkhot ki la leit hiar mardor sha katei ka wah Malidor ba don ha khappud bad ka jylla Assam. Ka seng ka la lap shisha da ki phew ngut ki khar Assam ki khlong maw beaiñ na katei ka wah bad ki la thep ha ki kali jong ki. Ka seng mardor ka la bthah ia kitei ki khar Assam ban pynhiar kloi ia kitei ki maw bad beh krad syndon ia ki bad maham ba kim bit shuh ban wan mushlia ne leh baheh shapoh u pud u sam ka jylla Meghalaya.Lah ban pynkynmaw ba dang ha kine ki khyndiat bnai ba la dep, mynha ka 8 tarik September, ka seng ka la dep beh krad ia ki khar Assam ba wan khlong maw na katei ka juh ka jaka bad ka seng ka la ia kynduh ia u DC Bah FM Dopth ha ka 10/08/2020 ha kato ka por, hynrei ka long pat kaba lyngngoh ba kumno kitei ki khar Assam ki nud biang ban khlong maw beaiñ na katei ka wah, imat ki bor synshar district ki khlem leh eiei ne kim nud saham ha khmat ka sorkar Assam. Ka seng ka kynnoh ruh ia ka jingtlot treikam ka tnat forest kaba don ha Umkiang, Apha Range kaba dei peit ia kito ki area. Kumno katei ka tnat kam iohi mo, ne ioh don eiei sha lyndet. Ka jingnud ki nong Assam ban khlong maw na katei ka jaka, ka dei namar ka i poh ia ka sorkar jylla Meghalaya bad ka dei ruh ka jingthmu sop sop ban ioh kyntur pud bad ban ioh knieh ia ki jaka.Ka seng kum shi bynta ban iada ia ki jaka puta, u pud u sam ka khyndew ka shyiap, ka seng kan leit ia kynduh biang ia ki bor synshar district (District Administration) ia u DC ba thymmai bah E. Kharmalki ban buh ka jingdawa ban leh da kaba tyngeh pyrshah ia ka sorkar Assam namar ka jingbym burom kylliang ia u pud u sam bad ka jingpynkheiñ ruh ruh ia ki kyndon iada mariang, ne ka Environment Protection Act 1986, namar ki doh um kim don shuh ki la duh jait.
title: Leit khang ka KSU, ba khlong maw na Malidor

content: New Delhi:Ka jingiakren ha ka sien ba hynniew hapdeng ki nongrep bad lai ngut ki myntri ka sorkar India, ka la kut noh myn hynnin ka sngi, khlem ia poi shano shano ruh bad ka daw, ka long namar ba ka sorkar, kam shym la kular ban weng noh ia ki lai tylli ki ain nongrep, kumba la dawa da ki seng nongrep.U Narendra Singh Tomar, myntri kam rep ka sorkar India, u kyrmen, ba kawei pat ka jingialang, ka ban long ha ka 8tarik Kylla lyngkot, kan long kaba seisoh bad u khmih lynti ba kan don ka jing iahap jingmut na baroh ar liang, ba kan poi sha ka phang kaba iahap jingmut lang.Na ka liang ki nong rep, ki ieng skhem halor ka jing dawa ban weng ia kitei ki lai tylli ki ain bad kumjuh ban thaw da ka ain, ban pynneh ia ka dor kyrshan ka sorkar, lada ka minimum support price, na bynta ki mar rep.Hadien ka jing iakren kaba shi kynta, ka la don ka jing ia shongthait shwa bad ki nongrep, ha katei ka por shongthait, ki bam, da la ki jong ki jingbam ba ki shet hi kumba ki la leh ha ki sien ba ladep bad ki myntri sorkar ruh kim shym la bang lang ia kitei ki jingbam jong ki nongrep.U Tomar, u iathuh, sha ki kotkhubor, hadien ba la wai ka jingialang, ba ka jing iakren, kan long biang ha ka 8tarik Kyllalyngkot 2021.U Yudhvir Singh, u nongialam ka Bhartiya Kisan Union, u kren shai ba ki nongrep, ki dawa ba dei ban weng noh ia kitei ki lai tylli ki ain nongrep ba la thaw da ka sorkar, katba U Tomar, u iathuh ba ki kwah ba dei ban pynkylla ia ki bynta bynta, kiba ki nongrep, ki sngew pyrshah halor ki ain nongrep.Kiba don bynta ha ka jingiakren myn hynnin ka sngi, ki long U Narendra Singh Tomar, myntri ka tnat rep, U Piyush Goyal myntri Railways, Commerce and Food Minister bad U Som Parkash, myntri khynnah ka tnat Commerce Som Parkash, uba dei ruh U MP na Punjab, katba ki nongrep, ki wan ha ryngkat bad 41 ngut ki nongialam na ki kynhun bapher bapher.
title: Pulom biang ka iakren ki nongrep bad ka sorkar, bym weng pura ka ain nongrep

content: Shillong:Ka kong Hamida Kharmawlong na Mairang Civil Sub Division, ka ioh ia ka nam kum ka nongshna iing, kaba itynnad tam, na baroh ki jylla bad ki jylla rit, kiba ioh ia ka skhim na ka Pradhan Mantri Awas Yojana (PMAY) Urban jong u snem 2019.La ai ia ka khusnam, da U Durga Shanker Mishra, Secretary ka tnat Urban and Housing Affairs, Government of India, ha ka jing ialang, kaba la leh da ka video conference, da ka Ministry of Housing and Urban Affairs, Government of India, ha ka 1tarik Kyllalyngkot 2021.
title: Ka kong Hamida, ka nongshna iing ba itynnad tam

content: Shillong:U Symbud myntri rangbah ka jylla u bah Prestone Tynsong, ha ka sngi nyngkong u la ong ba ynda u Myntri rangbah ka jylla u Conrad K Sangma, un wan bteng ia ka kam, un sa iakren ban pynbeit ban leit iakren ia ka sorkar pdeng halor ka jingdawa ban pyntrei kam ia ka Inner Line Permit ha la jylla.Haba iakren bad ki lad pathai khubor u bah Prestone, u la ong ba ka Sorkar MDA ha u snem 2021 kan trei shitom ban pynurlong ia ki mat ki ba dang sahteng bad ban pyndep ia ki kam pynroi baroh ha ka jylla.U la ong ba ha u snem 2021, yn ialeh ban trei shitom ban pynurlong ia ki resolution ki ba la pdiang hapoh ing dorbar thawain kum ka mat Inner Line Permit , ka MRSSA Amendment Bills bad ka jingpynrung ia ka ktien khasi bad Garo ha ka khyrnit ba phra jong ka Constitution.U la ong ruh ba ka sorkar MDA kan trei shitom ban wad ia ki lad ki lynti ban weng shirta ia ki jingeh ha kaba iadei bad ka mat them metor, halor ban pynitynnad ia ka Barik point bad kumjuh ha kaba iadei bad ka mat khappud.
title: Ynda  wan U MR, yn sa iakren ban leit ia kren ILP sha Delhi: Prestone

content: Shillong:Ka longkmie na ka shnong Nongwar Khlieh Shnong, kaba hap hapoh ka Shella constituency, ka la wan ban pynpaw ia ka jingleh donbor jong ka Dorbar Shnong, da kaba ka la kam ba ki nongpyniaid shnong ki la pynjot ia ka jaka rep jong ka ban shna ia ka surok.Haba iakren bad ki lad pathai khubor, na ka liang ka kong Presmity Wanshong ka la kynnoh ba ka Dorbar Shnong ka la knieh jubor ia ka jaka jong ka ban shna ia ka surok ban iaid lyngba sha ka tourist viewpoint ha katei ka thain.Ka kong Wan shong, ka ladep ban ujor da ka ejahar ha ha Sohra police station, halor kane ka jingleh dorbor ki bor shnong; hynrei ka la kynnoh ba mynta ki bor shnong ki la byrngem byrsit ia ka, ba kan ieh noh ia kane ka jaka.Ka kong Wanshong, ka la kam ruh ba u Rangbah Shnong, u bah Kedion Diengdoh, u la kyntait ban ai ia ka syrnot no-objection certificate (NOC) naduh u snem 2016 ban ioh ban ring ia ka bor electrict sha ka ing jong ka bad ki kyntait ruh ban ai ia ka syrnot shong shnong bad ka ing ka sem jong ka kam ju ioh ia ki skim ba ioh na ka sorkar, kynthup ia ka kam 100 sngi na ka skim national rural employment scheme (MGNREGS).
title: Ujor ka longkmie, ba shah pynduh bor ilektrik  bad skhim 100 sngi

content: Shillong: Mynta ka sngi, ka Supreme Court of India, ka la pynmih ia ka hukum, pyrshah ia ka sorkar Assam, halor ka jing kurup jongka tuh jongka, ha u pud jong ka Meghalaya, ha kaba ka sorkar Assam, ka la tuh ia ka jaka jong ka kong Newyearly Thangkhiew, kaba na Nongkseh, kaba dei ka trai jong ka jaka kaba ha Them Marwet, Umling Community & Development Block (village code no.277460 at serial number 212 of the list of villages of Ri Bhoi District, Meghalaya), Khanapara, Raid Marwet, Mylliem Syiemship, Ri Bhoi District, Meghalaya. Katei ka dei ka mukotduma kaba la buh hapdeng ka kong Newyearly Thangkhiew Nongkseh v. Union of India & Ors was registered as WP(C) 672/2021, and was listed on 16.7.2021, ha kaba ka jingshong bishar, ka dei ha ka bench jong U Justice Nazeer bad U Justice Murari. Ka Supreme Court, ka la sngap ia ka jing ujor na U Pragyan Pradip Sharma bad U Junior Luwang bad ka Gurnoor Kaur, ha kaba ka la rai ban ai jingthoh halor katei ka mukotduma.Katei ka dei ka mukotduma, kaba la ia said da U Pragyan Pradip Sharma, ha kaba ula pyni halor ka jing ia kynad kam pud hapdeng ka Assam bad ka Meghalaya bad nangta halor ka jing iadei bad ka 6th Schedule jong ka riti synshar Ri.Ka kong Thangkhiew, ka la ujor ia ka mukotduma, ha ka article 32 jong ka riti synshar ri, ha kaba la pyni ia ka jing ia kynad kam pud hapdeng ka Assam bad ka Meghalaya bad katei ka jing ia kynad, ka la buh jingeh ia katei ka nong ujor bad ia ka kamai jong ka iing ka sem jongka.La ujor shuh shuh ruh, halor ka jingtei jong ka Assam State Transport Corporation, ia ka jaka jong ka kong Thangkhiew, ha ka jaka, kaba ka long trai ma ka bad ka ujor ba katei ka dei ka jaka jongka laen kaba la tip kum ka tribal land bad lada ailad ia ia ka Assam, kumta katei ka jaka, kan kylla long ka non-tribal land.Ka Assam State Transport Corporation, ka la kurup ha u snem 2020, ia ka jaka kaba 30,000 square feet, ban tei iing ha katei ka jaka.La iakren ruh ha katei ka mukotduma ia ka jingeh kaba mih ia ki 100 tylli ki long iing, kiba shong ha u pud u sam jong ka Meghalaya, kiba la shah ktah na kane ka jing ia kajia kam pud hapdeng ki ar jylla.Hat off kong thangkhiew
title: Phah jingtip ka Supreme Court of India, ia ka sorkar Assam, ba ka tei ia ka ophis ASTC ha ka jaka jong ki Thangkhiew ha Meghalaya

content: Shillong: Ym dei satia kito ki nongrep jong ka jylla Punjab, hynrei dei ki nongrep jong ka thaiñ shateilammihngi jong ka jylla Meghalaya ka Ri India, kiba mynta ki long kiba riewspah tam hapoh ka Ri India baroh kawei.Katei ka la paw katkum ka kaiphod jong ka jingleh jurip kaba dangshen kaba la pynlait kaba la ai kyrteng da ka ‘Situation Assessment of Agricultural Households and Land and Holdings of Households in Rural India, 2019’.Katkum katei ka kaiphod, ha u snem 2018-19, ka jingkheiñ pynhab dor ryntih ki longïing kiba wan na ki kam rep ha Meghalaya ki kamai kumba T. 29,348 ha ka shi bnai, katba ki longïing kiba wan na ki kam rep ha jylla Punjab ki kamai kumba T. 26,701 ha ka shi bnai.Ha kawei pat ka liang, ka jylla Jharkhand, Odisha, West Bengal, Bihar, bad jylla Uttar Pradesh ki la shah buh ha ka jingthoh ba ki dei ki nongrep kiba duna bha ka jingïoh kamai.Ha ka jingshisha, ka jinglum jingkheiñ kyllumlang ïa ka jingïoh ba la kamai da ki nongrep jong ki saw tylli ki jylla kum ka Jharkhand, Odisha, West Bengal, bad Bihar ki la long kiba ïoh kamai barit duh ban ïa ka jingïoh kamai ki nongrep ka jylla Meghalaya lane jong ki nongrep ka jylla Punjab.La ong ba namar ba ka India kam shym la don satia ka jingkheiñ kyllumlang da ka tnat sorkar jong ka jingbun ki nongshong shnong kiba im ha ka rep ka riang hapoh ka Ri, kumta kam shym la don satia ruh ka jingkheiñ kaba shisien shi snem ïa ka jingthew pynïaryngkat jong ka jingïoh kaba la kamai da ki nongrep.Katei ka jingïoh jingkheiñ dei ka kaiphod ba la lum kyllumlang da ka National Statistical Office (NSO) lyngba ka jingjurip ïa ki nongrep kaba ka la lah barabor manla ki 10 snem.Kumba long ïa kaba mynta, ka jinglum jingkheiñ ïa ka jingïoh kamai ki nongrep ba la ïoh na ka NSO ka la don ha ki lai snem, kata jong u snem 2002-03, 2012-13 bad kaba dang pynmih dangshen kadei jong u snem 2018-19.
title: “Riewspah tam ki nongrep Meghalaya ban ïa ki nongrep ka Punjab”

content: Shillong:U Zenith M Sangma, ula ia tied miej myn hynnin ka sngi, ha ka jing iakren bad U Marcuise N Marak, (NPP) MLA na William nagar bad ka mat, ka dei hadien ba ula leit rah ia ka mat, ba la kren da U SG Esma taur N Monimin (NPP) , MLA na Phulbari, halor ka jingjia ha u snem 2005, (ka jingsiat briew da ki pulit ha Tura bad William nagar) ha kaba U Zenith, u ong “Kane ka dei ka mat kaba la kut, ka jingtohkit, ka la dep iaid”.Ha katei ka por, ka la mih sa ka jing hylla, kaba la kren da u MLA na William nagar, ha kaba u ong “Balei phi tieng ban iakren? Bad ha katei ka por U Zenith, ula tied miej bad u ong “Sngap, ba nga dang kren bad ngam tieng satia”. Ha katei ka por, U MLA ka Williamnagar, ula ieng bad ong “Balei phi tieng. Balei phi tieng” bad U Zenith, ula jubab bad ong “Ngam tieng, lada jia ba nga tieng, ngan shu sngap beit jar halide”. Hangto, ula tied miej biang, U MLA na Williamnagar, ha kaba u ong “Balei ba ym lah ban iakren?”
title: Tied miej U Zenith bad U Marcuise, halor ka jing siat briew ha u 2005

content: Shillong:U Bah George B Lyngdoh (Congress), ula wan rah ia ka met iakren halor ka jingshah thombor ki Khasi, Jaintia bad ki jait bynriew Garo, kiba shong ba sah ha Bangladesh, kumba la paw ha ki kotkhubor ha kine ki sngi.U Bah George, u iathuh, ba ha ka 25tarik Nohprah 2021, ki don ki nongtrei jong ka tnat khlaw ka sorkar Bangladesh, kiba la pynjulor ia ka bri tympew jong ki Khasi, kiba shong ba sah ha Moulvi Bazar District. La ong shuh shuh, ba ki don ki Khasi, kiba shah shoh ha katei ka jaka, ha kaba la kynnoh ba ki briew jong ka tnat khlaw, ki pynshit ia ki briew jong katei ka jaka, ban ktah kti ia ki khasi, kiba don ha katei ka jaka.La ong shuh shuh ba ha ka 2tarik Nailur 2021, ki don kumba 500ngut ki jait bynriew Khasi, Jaintia, Garo kiba la mih sha surok ban iakhih pyrshah halor katei ka jingshah lehbein jongki, ha kaba ki la ia kynduh ia U Deputy Commissioner, Moulvibazar, ban pynsngew ia ki jingeh, ba ki ia kynduh bad ula ai jingmut ruh ia ka sorkar jylla, lada ki sngew dei ban ialam ia ki MLA sha Bangladesh, ba kin ia kynduh bad ai mynsiem ia ki Khasi, kiba don ha katei ka Ri.U Conrad K Sangma, myntri rangbah ka jylla, haba jubab halor katei ka mat, u iathuh ba ka don ka jingthmu ban beh shnong ia ki Khasi, Garo kiba don ha ka thain Moulvibazar, halor ka jingong ban pynneh ia ki khlaw ki btap ha katei ka jaka. La iathuh ba ha ka 24tarik Nailar 2021, ba la pom naphang ia 28 hajar tynrai ki tynrai dieng tympew na ki jaka rep jongki bad ha ka 27tarik Nailar, ki la don 3ngut ki samla Khasi, kiba shah shoh. La iathuh ba ha ka 2tarik Nailur 2021, la pynlong ia ka jing ia lum lang ha Press Club, Moulvi Bazar lem bad ka jing dawa, ba dei ban pynneh ia ka hok bat khyndew jong ki Khasi, Garo ha katei ka jaka bad la iathuh ba la pynlong ruh ia ka jing ia iaid paidbah, ha ka 6tarik Nailur 2021, na ka bynta ban wan rah ia ka jing ia sngewthuh jingmut hapdeng ki jaitbynriew kiba don ha katei ka jaka. La iathuh shuh shuh, ba ka sorkar jylla, ka la buddien ia katei ka mat bad ka sorkar India, ha kaba iadei bad ka jingshong shngain jong ki Khasi,Garo kiba don ha katei ka Ri.
title: Ba shah lehbein ki Khasi ha Bangladesh, kren U MLA ha dorbar

content: Shillong:Haba jubab ia ka jing iatai, halor ka ILP, U Conrad Sangma, u pyn kynmaw, ia ka jing kren U Mukul Sang ma, myntri rangbah ha ka ka 27tarik Naiwieng 2013, ha kaba ula ong “Ka sorkar kam kwah ILP, ngin nym iakren ia ka ILP”.Ula ong biang “Mynta ki wan ban kylli, iangi ia kaei kaba ngi leh ia ka ILP bad ka dei kane ka sorkar, kaba shim ia ka rai ban dawa ia ka ILP bad ngi buddien ia kane ka kam”. “Ki kylli iangi ia ka them metor bad ki ong, ba kaei kaba kane ka sorkar, ka la leh bad katno kan dang shimpor, ki paidbah, ki khie bitar ha kine ki sngi” bad u ong biang “Phi leh aiu, ha ki 48 snem mynshwa, haba phi la don ha ka sorkar. Ki paidbah, ki khie bitar iaphi ruh halor kane ka phang” kylli U Conrad.Halor u pud u sam, ula ong ba la shu iai buhteng shi buhteng, da kaba ong ban ieh beit kumto, kumba ka long “Balei phim shim jing kitkhlieh ban iakren?” bad ula ong ba ka dei tang kane ka sorkar, kaba shim khia ban iakren ia u pud u sam bad u ong “Ngin iaid shakhmat ban poi sha ka jing pynkut ia ka kam”.Halor ka ain MRRSA, ula kylli “Mano ba sdang ban shna ia ka khyrdop, ia rung ia mih ha Umling, kam dei kane ka sorkar?” bad ula ong shuh shuh, ba ka dang iaid ka jing pynkhreh, ban pyn trei kam ia ka MRRSA, da kaba leh online.
title: U myntri rangbah, ha u snem 2013, u ong um kwah ILP “Mano ba thaw khyrdop MSSRA, ha Umling, ym dei kane ka sorkar, kylli U Conrad

content: Shillong:U nongialam rangbah jong ka United Democratic Party (UDP) u bah Bindo M Lanong, u la ong ba u paidbah u la dep ban ailad ia ka party Congress, la bun bun snem, hynrei ka jylla hi hapoh ka synshar jong ka party Congress ka lyngkrang lut ha ki bun ki liang bad lada u paidbah u ailad biang ia ka party Congress ha u snem 2023 ka jylla hi kan sa ngam sha ka jingjot.Haba ia kren bad ki lad pathai khubor na ka liang u bah Lanong u la ong ba ka jingjop bad ka jingrem hi kan shong ha u paidbah u ba lah ban wan rah jingma ne ka jingshngain ia ki seng sain pyrthei ha ka jylla.“Hynrei kaba nga kwah ban shu ong hangne ka long ba ki paidbah, ki la dep mad ia ka jingsynshar ka party Congress ha kine ki phew phew snem mynta, ha kaba ia ka Ri India hi baroh kawei la ju synshar da ka Congress party shilynter hynrei ki paidbah ki dei ban bishar ba ka Congress ka la leh aiu”la ong u bah Bindo.U bah Bindo u la ong ruh ba ha ka ba ia dei bad ka jingpynbeit ia u pud u sam mynta la jan sa ka 50 snem ka Congress ka khlem shim khia ha ki snem ba la dep wat la ia ka Ri la shynshar da ka Congress ha Delhi ha Assam bad Meghalaya, hynrei kane ka mat ka sah lyngkrang khlem leh eiei.U la ong ruh ba ha kaba ia dei bad ka jingdawa ban pyntrei kam ia ka ILP ha ka jylla, na ka liang jong ka Congress ha ba ka dang don ha ka bor hapoh ka jingpyniaid u Dr Mukul Sangma na ka Inner Line Permit ki wan rah pynban ia ka ain ba ki bar jylla kin wan kin shong suk shong shngain bad yn ym don ba lah ban pynwit ia ki.“Haba ka Ri bad ka jait bynriew ka kren halor ILP ka ban long ka ain ban teh pyrkhing bad ban ym ai lad ba ki bar jylla kin rung ha ka jylla hynrei na ka liang ka Congress ka wanrah da ka Meghalaya Residential Safety and Security Act 2016 (MRSSA) ka ban ai lad ia ki bar jylla ba kin rung ha ryngkat ka shong suk shong sain ha ka jylla” u la ong.U la ong ba ha ba ia kren bad ka ai kam ai jam na ka liang ka Congress ha kine ki phew phew snem ka khlem lah ban leh eiei kat ka ba ki kular ki khlem pynurlong te lada ki paidbah ki jied ia ka Congress ba kan wan haka bor ki la jied lupa ia ka jingma ia ialade.bad la da u paidbah u la jied ia ka party Congress ka Ri bad ka jait bynriew kan sah ngam sha ka jingjot.Halor ka jingkob jong ka Party Congress, ba ha u snem 2023 ka Congress kan sa wan ha ka bor, u bah Lanong u la ong ba baroh hi ki seng sainpyrthei, kiba kob suda, hynrei ki paidbah ki dei ban sngewthuh ba ka UDP ka dei ka party ka ba biang lut nadong shadong bad ki paidbah ki dei ban ai lad ia ka, ba kan wan ha ka bor khnang ba u paidbah hi un ym babe.U bah Lanong u la ong ruh ba ka party Congress hi kam don ia ka jingiatylli ha kaba wat ha ka jingialang jong ki ruh don ka kynhun ka ba leit bad ka don ka bym leit te u paidbah hi un bishar ia kata.LA klumar khlieh u bindo bym ioh bor shuh u LA kren klumar
title: Ha ka synshar jong ka Congress, shu lyngkrang lut, ong U Bah Bindo

content: Shillong: U Bah Bindo M Lanong u nongialam rangbah ka United Democratic Party (UDP), u la ong ba u dap da ka jing lyngngoh, halor ka jingkuman jong u Myntri rangbah ka jylla u Conrad K Sangma, ha kaba ia dei bad ka jingweng kam ia ki pulit kiba donkti ban siat iap ia u bah Cheristerfield Thangkhiew.Haba ia kren bad ki lad pathai khubor, na ka liang u bah Bindo u la ong ba um sngewthuh shuh, ba balei ba u myntri rangbah ka jylla u kuman katne katne, wat la kane ka dei ka case ka ba donkam eh weng kam shipor ia ki pulit kiba donkti ban pyniap ia u bah Cheristerfield Thangkhiew.U Bah Lanong, u la bynrap ruh da ka ba ong ba lada ka jingtohkit ka ladep bad lada lap ba ka jingleh jong kine ki pulit ka dei hok ka sorkar ka lah ban thung kam biang ia ki.Na ka liang u bah Bindo u la pynkynmaw ruh ia ka wei ka Case ka ba la jia ha u snem 1989 ha Dimapur halor ka jingshah pyniap u Francis Sangma, ha kti ki pulit ha kaba na ka liang ka Sorkar Nagaland ka la weng kam shipor ia ki pulit ki ba donkti ban pynshitom bad pyniap ia u bad na ka liang ka Gauwahati High Court ka la ai ia ka rai ba dei ban sei na ka pla jong ki pulit ki ba donkti ban pyniap ia u Francis Sangma bad ki dei ban ai sha ka lok jong u kum ban siew ka bai lutksan.“Hynrei ngi hangne wat la ki pulit ki la leit da ka jingthmu ban pyniap ia u bah Cheristerfield Thangkhiew, ki la pyniap ruh ia u, hynrei na ka liang u myntri rangbah um lah wat tang ban weng kam shipor ia kine ki pulit ki ba donkti ban pyniap briew ruh”u la ong.U bah Lanong u la iathuh ba na ka liang ka UDP ki la dep ban phah da ka jingthoh sha u Myntri rangbah ka jylla da ka ba ka ba ka la ai jingmut ban weng kam ia kine ki pulit.U Conrad K Sangma u la dei ban weng kam mardor naduh ba jia ka to ka jingjia hynrei wat mynta la shibnai ruh ka dang biang palat ia u ba yn shim ia ka rai ban weng kam shipor ia kine ki pulit la ai jingmut u bah Bindo M Lanong.“Na ka liang jong nga,nga la shim khia ia kane ka bynta,nalor ba ka la don ka jingdawa na ki paidbah, na ka liang ka UDP ka la dep ban ai jingmut sha ka sorkar ban weng kam shipor ia kine ki pulit bad na ka liang jong nga, nga la dep ban thoh da ka article ka ba la dep ban mih naduh ka 17 tarik ha ki lad pathai khubor baroh ha ka ba nga la kdew ia ka case jong u Francis Sangma”u la ong.
title: Balei u myntri rangbah, u kuman katne katne, kylli U Bah Bindo, halor ka jingiap U Bah Cherish

content: Shillong: U MLA ka Rambrai Jyrngam, u Bah Kimfa S Marbaniang u la wanrah ia ki mat bapher bapher ban iatai ha ka sngi ba hynriew jong ka Dorbar Synrai ka ïing dorbar thawaiñ ka jylla bad une u MLA ka Congress u la wanrah ia ka mat kaba iadei bad ka them motor ha kaba u la ong ba ym don jingtip satia haduh kine ki sngi ba mynta ruh ba shano kane ka mat ka la poi bad jah.U Bah Kimfa S Marbaniang u ong ba ka Sorkar Jylla ka la thaw ia ka High Level Committe naduh u bnai Jylliew 2018 hynrei haduh mynta ruh ia kata ka kaiphod ha kaba iadei bad ka them motor ym pat ioh satia bad u la ong ruh ba katba don dorbar ki nongmihkhmat ka liang pyrshah ki ju iai kylli na ka Sorkar kaba bat ia ka bor ba ka la leh kumno ia kane mat ha kaba iadei bad ka them metor bad ka jubab kaba mih ka long beit ba ba la jan shi la jan, hynrei kata ka jingong ka long pynban thik kumba ap ia ka phlim thymmai kaba itynnad bha ba kan sa mih hynrei ki dang shu pynmih shwa da ka jingpynitynnad bad ka jingpynbang(Trailer) bad haba kut jong kata ka pynbang mih pynban sa da ka jingthoh kaba ong ba kan sa pyni shen (Coming Soon) bad kane ka jingleh jong ka Sokar ka la pynbitar bad pyndom pynban ia ki paidbah kiba la iai ap ia ka kaiphod ka ban mih halor kane. Shuh shuh u la ong ruh ba ka iing dorbar ka la dep ban shim da ka rai ban pynrung noh ia ka ktien Khasi bad Garo ha ka khyrnit kaba phra jong ka riti synshar ka Ri India hynrei halor kane ruh u la ong ba ym don jingtip eiei satia ka long kumno.U Bah Kimfa S Marbaniang u la kren ruh ha kaba iadei bad ki karkhana Coke kiba don ha Shahlang West Khasi Hills District ba watla ka tnad State Pollution Board ka la pynmih ia ka jingpynbna ba kine ki karkhana ki dei ban khang noh hynrei ym tip pat balei haduh mynta kine ki karkhana ki dang iai treikam sah.
