U Bah Kimfa S Marbaniang u la pynkynmaw ruh ia kawei na ki jingdawa ba ki paidbah ka Mawlai bad ki paidbah ka bri u Hynniewtrep baroh kawei ki dawa haduh mynta bad kata kadei ba ka Sorkar jylla ka dei ban sospon mardor ia ki heh pulit kiba la donkti ban leit bthat jubor ia ka jingim jong u Bah Cherisiterfield Thangkhiew ha ka 13 tarik u bnai Nailur 2021 hynrei ka Sorkar Jylla haduh mynta kam sngap bad ka leh bym patiaw pynban bad u la kyntu ba ka Sorkar ba ka dei ban sngap ia ka jingdawa jong ki paidbah ba bun balang hynrei ki paidbah kin nym don shuh kata ka jingshaniah ia kane ka Sorkar MDA.
title: Ka Them metor, ka long kumba ap, ia ka phlim thymmai, ong U MLA

content: Ka STIEH ka ai khublei iaka Sadar PS, ophis jong u Superintendent of Police, East Jaiñtia Hills Khliehriat khamtam ka Lumshnong PS ba ki lah register iaka Case pyrshah ia kawei ka briew ba kyrteng ka Megha Purkayastha halor ka FIR ba ka seng ka lah ai haka 16 tarik Nailar 2021 namar ka social media post ba ka lah kynthoh khlem nongrim pyrshah iaki riewlum ka jylla Meghalaya haka instagram account jong ka.Ka jingkynthoh khlem nongrim jong ka ka long kaba buh jingma shikatdei eh iaki jaitbynriew Khasi jong ngi kiba trei, ba ktah bad ba pule shabar ka jylla. Ka STIEH ka pynrem jur ia kum kine ki jingthoh jong ki briew pyrshah iaka jylla Meghalaya jong ngi bad ngi dawa ba ka tnad Pulit kadei ban leh daka “suo moto cognizance” ia kane ka case bad ban kem mardor ia kum kine ki briew kiba kynshoit isih jaitbynriew khnang ba kiwei pat kin ym nud shuh ban kynnoh khlem nongrim pyrshah iaka jaitbynriew jong ngi.Ka tnad Pulit kadei ban pyngngat ia kane ka briew hapoh ki kyndon aiñ ba tyngeh katkum ki kyndon jong ka aiñ halor ka jingpynshit jaitbynriew jong ka halor ka nongrim jong ka jingiapher niam, iapher jaitbynriew, bad iapher ktien thylliej. Ki Pulit jong kiwei pat ki jylla hapoh Northeast ki treikam shait shait ban leit kem ia ki briew ba kynthoh khlem nongrim iaki briew jong ka jylla jong ki kum nuksa:1. Mynshem snem ki Pulit jong ka jylla Nagaland ki lah leit kem ia kawei ka briew ba kyrteng Hema Choudhary naka iing ba ka sah ha Andheri (West) halor ka jingkren beiñ jaitbynriew jong ka pyrshah iaki jaitbynriew Naga haka video ba ka post hapoh social media.2. Une u snem ki Pulit jong ka jylla Arunachal Pradesh ki lah leit sha Punjab ban kem ia u Paras Singh uba dei u YouTuber namar u kren beiñ jaitbynriew pyrshah ia u MLA jong ka Arunachal Pradesh u Ninong Ering bad ia ki jaitbynriew Arunachal Pradesh. Te lada kiwei ki Pulit jong ki jylla ki treikam ban leit kem ia kine ki briew kiba kynshoit isih jaitbynriew Balei ki Pulit jong ka jylla jong ngi kim lah leheiei pyrshah ia kine ki briew ba krenbeiñ pyrshah ia ka jylla Meghalaya jong ngi.
title: Ai khublei ka STIEH ia ka Sadar PS, ba register case ia kaba kren pyrshah riewlum

content: Shillong: Ka kong Ampareen Lyngdoh (Congress), ka la leit rah mynta ka sngi, ia ka um shi bitor ha iing dorbar jylla, kaba jngut shibun, ban pyni, ia ka jingjaboh jong ka um, kaba la pynpoi da ka tnat PHE sha ki iing briew.Haba pyni ia katei ka um, ha khmat ka iing dorbar, ka kong Ampareen, ka ong “Lada ngim iap, na ka jingpang covid, ngin sa iap na ka jingpang pynhiar?” Ha kajuh ka por, ka kong Ampareen, ka iathuh ruh, ba ka pynlut T.63,000 shibnai, na ka bynta ban pynbiang um, ha ka iing sah jongka, kaba shongdor T.700 shi kali ka um, na ka daw jong ka jing duna um ha ka thain Laitumkhrah, kaba ka sah.Na ka liang jong U bah Renikton Lyngdoh Tongkhar, myntri PHE, haba jubab, u iathuh ba ka jing jaboh jong ka um, ka long, na ka daw jong ka jing bujli ia ki nar um, kiba don ia ka jingheh kaba 1000mm dia bad kiba lah ban ai um kham bun sha ki nongshong shnong jong ka nongbah Shillong.
title: Da ka um bitor rah ka kong Ampareen, ban pyni ia ka um jngut ha dorbar

content: Nongpoh: Hynnin ka miet ha ka por 10:30 baje ei ei mynmiet, ki la don 3 tylli ki kali kiba mih na Guwahati da ka jingthmu ban leit sha ki thain Killing ha Ri Bhoi, ki la shah lute ha ka kynhun ki riew runar bym lah ban ithuh durkhmat bad kaba ki la shah lute phew hajar ka pisa bad ki mobile phone ruh kumjuh.Ka jingtip kaba la iohlum, la ong ba katei ka jingjia ka la jia ha ka por ba kitei ki kali ki la poi ha kawei ka jaka shwa ban poi ha shnong Killing bad ha ki la poi ha katei ka jaka, la mih ka kynhun ki riew runar, kiba la pynsangeh ia kitei ki kali bad kiba la pynap ruh da ki tiar pynmynsaw, khnang ba kitei ki briew kiba shong ha kitei ki kali, kim nud ban pyrta ne ban pan jingiarap na ki briew.La ong ruh ba kitei ki Kali ba la shah lute ki kynthup kawei ka Scorpio, kaba la shah lute T. 50 hajar ka pisa, nangta kawei pat ka ka Scorpio ka la shah lute 15 hajar bad kitei ki runar ki la knieh ruh ia ki ar tylli ki Mobile na ki briew kiba shong ha kitei ki kali.Tang mar ia dep ia katei ka kam lute na kitei ki kali, la ong ba kitei ki runar ki la phet noh bak sha khlaw, kata hadien ba ki la iohi ba ki la don shibun ki kali, kiba la iaid lyngba katei ka surok. Haba iadei bad katei ka jingshah lute, ki trai kitei ki Kali ki la ujor da ka ejehar ha Khanapara Police Station, khnang ba ki pulit kin buddien bad ban kem ia kiteiki runar.
title: Shah lute 3 ki kali, kiba thmu ban leit sha Killing

content: Shillong: Kiba ioh pang covid mynta ka sngi, ki don 248ngut bad kiba jem, na ka jingpang, ki don 99ngut. Uba iap, u don uwei bad u dei uba khlem pat dep injek satia.Baroh kiba don ia ka jingpang mynta, ki long 1,952ngut bad kiba iap, ki long 1,371ngut baroh.Ka East Khasi hills, ka don 107 ngut kiba ioh pang bad ka West Khasi hills, ka don 77 ngut kiba ioh pang.
title: 248 ngut kiba ioh pang covid, uwei uba iap ha ka jylla

content: Nongpoh: Ka RBYF Umsning Circle, lyngba u Bah Shining Thangkhiew, Publicity ka Seng, ka pynrem jur ia ki runar kiba leit ban pynjot pynpra ia ki banner ai khublei Khrismas, kaba la wah da ki dkhot ka seng na ki Unit kiba don ha ki shnong bapher bapher.Hadien ka jingpynrem, ka kyrwoh kaba la phah da utei u nongialam ka RBYF, ka la pynpaw ba ka seng ka maham jur ia ki briew kiba leh dusmon ban leit pynjot pynjulor ia ki banner khublei Christmas jong ki unit, ha kaba la ong ba lada ka seng kan lap ia kitei ki riew dusmon, kan nym map satia hynrei kan sa ai da ka jingsneng kaba tyngeh.Ha kawei pat ka liang, ka RBYF Umsning Circle, ka ai khublei Christmas Basuk bad ba kmen ia ki paid nongshong shnong jong ka Umsning bad ka Ri Bhoi hi baroh kawei.
title: Pynrem ka RBYF ia ki riew dusmon kiba pynjot ia ki banner, khublei Khrismas ka Seng

content: Shillong: Ki la mih ha ki kotkhubor bad ki news portal, ba ka  Legal Rights Observatory (LRO), ka la ujor sha U  Chief Secretary, U Secretary ka tnat ka koit ka khiah bad kumjuh U Deputy Commissioner, ha kaba ki dawa ban weng noh ia ka Bible na Civil Hospital, Shillong.Katei ka jing dawa, ka dei haden ba ka  Jaintia Students’ Union, ka la dawa ban weng noh ia ka dur blei  Ganesha, na ka ophis jong ka  National Institute of Technology (NIT).La dawa da ka LRO, ba dei ban weng noh ia ka Bible, ba kan don ka jing laitluid ka synshar paidbah halor ka kam ai dawai dashin.“Ha kaba bteng ia ka phang jong ka jingweng dur blei thaw na NIT, ngi dawa ia ka sorkar jylla, ba kan weng noh mardor ia ki kot bah, kiba la ju buh hajan jingthiah jong ki nongpang ha  Shillong Civil Hospital, ong ka LRO.“Ban buh ia ka Bible, hajan ka jaka thiah u nongpang bad ban pynbor ia ki bym long Khristan ba kin pule, ka dei ka jingthombor ia ka hok laitluid u briew shimet” ong ka  LRO.  La ong ruh ba katei ka long pyrshah ia ka article 18 jong ka UN, kaba dei halor ka  Universal Declaration of Human Rights.Ha kajuh ka por, la dawa ruh ban khang noh ia ka jingleit jong ki riew niam sha Hospital, namar ba ki ju pynbor ia ki bym long niam ban pule Bible, ba kin ioh khiah.“Ngin sa dawa na ka tnat ka koit ka khiah jong ka sorkar India, lada ym shym don kano kano ka rai halor kane ka phang” ong shuh ka LRO.Amos 8:11behold the day cometh saith the lord. kamut kane kieñ ka sngi ainguh i’u Blei Amen.Kadei f kadei ban wengnoh mardorNga kyrshan ia ka jingthmu ka LRO
title: Weng ia ka Bible na ki kamra thiah nongpang ha Civil Hospital, dawa ka LRO

content: Shillong: Ka Meghalaya ka la khur ia ka nam jop ba-ar hadien ba ka la pynliem ia ka Manipur da 3 wickets ha ka jingiakhun Vijay Hazare Trophy plate group ha ka sngi Saitjain ha Dehra Dun.Ka Meghalaya ka la pynmih madan ia ki juh ki pleiar jong ka thup XI, u Dipu Sangma ula mih ha ka jaka Wallambok Nongkhlaw.Ha ka jingialehkai ba 40 over ka Manipur  ka la kam ban tyied nyngkong bad ka la kamai 90 run bad shah pynhap baroh ki wkt ha ki 25.1 over.U Sanjay Yadav ula khur 3 wkt ha ki 19 run. u Abhay Negi (2/14) bad Akash Kumar (2/24) ki la khur mar 2 wkt  katba u Aditya Singhania ula khur 1 wkt (1/16).Haba ban wan beh nadien ka Meghalaya ka la iakhun tyngeh bad poi sha ka thong ba buh da 94 run bad shah pynhap noh 7 wkt ha ki 18 over.Haba kaba sdang ka Meghalaya ka la duh jingkyrmen haba ka la shah pynliem 3 wkt bad kamai tang 2 run, hynrei rangialehkai ba kynsai u Punit Bisht (29) bad Ravi Teja (19) ki la ialehkai suki bad kamai ar ngut  42 run.Hadien ki la shah pynliem noh bad lyngba u Amiangshu Sen (15 not out) bad u Negi (16 not out) ka Meghalaya ka la lah ban poi sha thong jingjop.Ka Meghalaya kan pynkhreh ia ka jingiakhun ban wan pyrshah ia ka Mizoram ha ka 8 tarik.
title: Pynliem ka Meghalaya ia ka Manipur ha ka Vijay Hazare Trophy
Ai nam ka NEHU ia ki artylli ki Guest House jong ka sha ki kyrteng jong ki riewshlur ka bri u Hynniewtrep

content: Nongstoiñ: Ka Lyngngam Presbyterian College Mawthengkut hynne ka sngi ka 4 tarik u risaw ka la pynlong ïa ka jingrakhe pynkup burom kaba nyngkong eh ïa ki samla pule kiba la pyndep ia ki jingpule lane ka ‘1st Graduation Day Cum Celebration’ na ka bynta ki 23 ngut ki samla pule kiba la pyndep ïa ka jingpule na katei ka College kiba long ruh artad ki soh ba nyngkong jong ka College bad ia ka jingioh Affiliation jong ka College bad ka North Eastern hills University (NEHU) kata naduh ka Acedemic Session 2019-2020.Ha katei ka jingialang rakhe pynkup burom bad lehkmen jong katei ka College ka Prof Ceclile Mawlong Dean of Social Science North Eastern Hills University I la kong kum I kongsan ha ryngkat ka jingiadonlang ruh I Dr. CAR Diengdoh Director College Development Council NEHU, Tbn B.K Laitflang Principal jong katei ka College, I Dr. I. Mawthoh Principal ka Nongstoiñ College, u Rev. B.K Shangpliang, Rev. P.R Marthong, ki nonghikai ki samla pule bad kiwei kiwei.Haba kren ha ka jingïalang kaba la pynlong ha ka Hall jong ka Lyngngam Presbyterian HSS na ka liang jong u Tbn B.K Laitflang Principal jong katei ka College u la ai ka jingiaroh ia kitei ki 23 ngut ki soh nyngkong jong ka College da kaba u la ong ruh ba “Kane ka sngi kadei ka sngi jong phi ki 23 ngut bad ka jingiadon ka jong ngi baroh hangne kadei namar kane ka sngi ba kyrpang jong phi”.Na ka liang jong U Dr. CAR Diengdoh Director College Development Council NEHU haba ai jingkren ha katei ka jingialang u la ai ka jingiaroh ia ki bor pyniaid jong katei ka College kata naduh u Principal ka Management bad ki nonghikai kiba la ialeh shitom ban kyntiew ia katei ka College kat haduh ba kala lah ban sei ia kitei ki 23 ngut ki soh nyngkong jong ka College bad ha kajuh kapor I la ai mynsiem ruh ia kitei ki 23 ngut da kaba ong ba kila plie ia ka jingkhang bah sha ka lawei kaba phyrnai ka jong ki.Katba na ka liang jong I kongsan I Prof Ceclile Mawlong Dean of Social Science haba ai jingkren ha katei ka jingialang I la sam ruh ia ki katto katne ki jingai jingmut kiba kongsan khamtam na ka bynta kitei ki 23 ngut ki samla pule da kaba I la kyntu ruh ia ki ba kin long kiba ithuh shwa ia lade da kaba kin ïit bad peit bniah ia lade.Shuh shuh u la ong ruh ba sa kawei pat ka mat kaba donkam ka long ban pyrkhat janai namar dei na ki jingmut jingpyrkhat kiba pynlong ia ki briew ba kin leh lada ki pyrkhat ia kaba bha kila leh ia kaba bha bad kumjuh lada ki don ha ka sawdong bad ki briew kiba ai ia ki jingmut jingpyrkhat ban kyntiew kin sa kiew kumjuh ruh lada ki don pat ia ka jingmut jingpyrkhat kaba sniew kin leh ia kaba sniew.Ym tang kata I la ong ruh ba kaba kongsan tam kadei ban shong bad ruh ban bat ia ka jaka ñiah khnang ba yn lah ban tehlakam iala ka jingim da lade bad ym dei ban ailad ba kiwei kin pyniaid ia ka jingim jong phi bad phi dei ruh ban shim iala ka jong ka rai namar ba ka jingim ka bun bah ki rai ia kaba kan sdang na phi hi bad kan kut ruh ha phi hi bad phi dei ban shim ia ka lad ka kabu haba phi ioh namar ki lad bad ki kabu ki leit bad kiwan ban ban leh ia kata phi hap ban long kiba phikir bad ban long kiba phikir phi hap ban tip ia lade.Na ka liang jong I I Prof Ceclile Mawlong bad I Dr. CAR Diengdoh kila la ioh ruh ban sam ia ki momentos sha kitei ki 23 ngut ki soh nyngkong jong katei ka College.Ha katei ka sngi la pynphuh pynphieng ia katei ka prokram da ki jingrwai bala aishim bynta da ki samla pule jong katei ka College
title: Pynkup burom ka LPC ia 23ngut ki soh nyngkong

content: Kawei ka trok kaba don ia u As-01 JC 0727 kala leit tynrah ia kawei kapulsar bike(brandnew) ha Nongthymmai Median Opening Bye pass road, Umsning Ri-Bhoi District.Ha kane ka jingjia aksiden U Roycherter Narlong 35 snem ka rta uba dei u nongniah kane ka bike ula khlad noh ha shen katba ka kong Pdiang hun Maring 28 snem ka rta kaba dei ka kurim jong u kala mynsaw jur.Kine arngut ki dei na ka shnong Mawlyngkhung kane ka jingjia kala jia kumba haka por 8:30 mynstep ei ei ha kaba kine ki arngut kila mih na ka shnong Mawlyngkhung ban leit sha Nongpoh bad ki la ngat noh hakane ka jingjia aksiden.
title: Khlad ha shen u tnga, katba mynsaw jur ka tnga ha ka jingjia aksiden ha Umsning

content: AIS SujaNgi im ha ki sngi ba khadduh tam eh,      ki sngi jingpyndep ia ka ktien u Blei      ba ia kaei kaei kaba ka ktien u Blei (Bible) ka la kren, ka la jia bad long ruh kumta. Kawei na kita dei ka jinglum lang pat ia ki Israel ba la kyntait. Ka Kitab Salm ka ong kumne: “U Trai u tei ia ka Jerusalem; u lum lang ia kiba la tait jong ki Israel” “The Lord builds up Jerusalem, He gathers the exiles of Israel” Salm 147:2.U Blei kumba u la kren u la pyndep ruh ia kata. Isaiah 46:11. Mynta ka pyrthei hi baroh kawei ka tip bad ka iohi ia ka jinglum lang pat ia ki Israel sha ka ri lajong hadien ba u Blei u la pynsakhma ia ki sha kylleng ki ri ka pyrthei naduh 70 AD ha kaba wat ia ka Temple ka ba Ar ki la duh noh la pynjot thiaw ia ka bad ym shym la iehnoh maw halor u maw ia ka. Mynta pat ki la don ha la ka ri kumba 70 snem ei ei naduh ba ki la ioh ia ka ri kynti lajong bad la pynbna da ka UNO ha u 1948 AD.Hapoh kine ki 70 snem. Ka Israel ka la kiew irat ha ki liang baroh bad ha ka jingstad science and technology jong kane ka juk. Ki ri shyiap jong ka kiba 65% ki la sei soh bad shong briew kumba u Blei u la dep kren. Kiei kiei ki long kiba pawnam bad phylla ha Israel mynta ha kaba kiba bun bah ki nongshangkai Tourist na kylleng ka pyrthei ki sngewtynnad bad leit jngoh ia ka ri Israel ia ki jingphylla ba maian ha ka. Ka long ka ri kaba khlain bor ha ka pyrthei mynta ha ki tiar thma baroh, bad ka lah ban iakhun ia kiwei pat ki ri kiba la biang ki bor shipai bad tiar thma kane ka juk. Lah ban ong ba ka la biang nadong shadong.Hato kane ka shu jia ryngkhat? Em ka don ha ka jingthmu u Blei na ka bynta ka ri kaba u la kular naduh ki por u Abraham u Isaak bad u Jakob. La ka long ka ri kaba rit tam hynrei ka long kaba khraw tam namar ka don hapoh ka jingkular jong u Blei, na kata ka daw, la ong ia ka ka Promise Land ne ka ri jingkular jong u Blei naduh hyndai haduh mynta, bad ia kata ngin iohi mynta, ka pyrthei hi kan tip bad kan iohi. Ka jinglum pat jong u Blei ia ki Israel (Jiws) na sawdong pyrthei sha ri Israel, ka dei ka history kaba la shem bah slem san bad ka la jia hapoh kine ki 70 tylli ki snem, bad hapoh kine ki 70 snem ka Israel kam dei shuh ka mraw hynrei ka kynrad halor kiei kiei baroh. Ka jingwan phai pat ki Jiws sha ka ri lajong ka long ka dak jong ki por bakhadduh (end times) namar kin wan kin tei kin shna bad pynkhreh lut nadong shadong wat ia ka Jerusalem hi. Na kata ka daw la pynbna da u President ka America Donald Trump ba ka Jerusalem ka dei ka Nongbah Capital jong ka ri Israel. Ia kine kiei kiei baroh ka ktien u Blei ka la kren lypa – “U Trai un tei ia ka Jerusalem” Salm 147:2.
title: “U Blei u la lum pat ia ki Israel!”

content: K. KyndaidHa ka state Meghalaya don 3 tylli ki jait bynriew ri lum ba bun pait kata ka long u khasi, u Garo bad u Jaintia. Ia kane la ai jingpynbna la kham slem da ka sorkar Meghalaya.Ha uwei na ki kot khubor Khasi la thoh dang shen da u Bah G. Sing Syiemlieh, uei u Khasi? Bad u la batai katkum ka jinglah jong u. Mynta pat la don kiba kylli, uei u Jaintia? U jaitbynriew Jaintia u la wan buhai shnong da ki hajar snem mynshwa sha kane ka thain ba mynta. La iathuh u la wan beit beit na ka Ri Pershia bad la tip ia u kum u Jaintia. U pher bak la bak na kiwei pat ki jait bynriew bad wat kiba marjan ruh. Hoid don katto katne ba la iasyriem ruh.Ia ka jingiapher jong u la pynpaw iathuh shai kdar da ka Jerman commission. Ha ka Ri lum Jaintia don 3 (lai) tylli ki sub-tribes ia kba la batai shai ha ka kot Khasi Geography ba la thoh da u (L) Andromuney, Retired Inspector of School. Kaba long ka jingbatai kaba shisha bad kaba don nongrim. U batai kumne – “Ia ka Ri Jaintia la pyniabynta ia ka ha ki 3 (lai) bynta. Ka bynta kaba hapdeng la khot Pnar, ka bynta sha ka liang East Pakistan (kaba khot mynta Bangladesh) la khot ki War, kaba ngi tip mynta kum ka War Jaintia bad ka bynta kaba shaphang shatei la khot Bhoi (kaba khot mynta Karbi Anglong). Ia kine la khot ki Jaintia. Ki don hapoh u pud u sam ka Jaintia Hills Autonomous District Council. Kane ka ia syriem kum ka England, Scotland bad Wales la khot British.Shuwa ban ioh ia ka Meghalaya State, ka sorkar Assam ka la ithuh ba u Jaintia u dei u jaitbynriew bapher na kiwei pat. Kumta la ai District Council ba kyrpang ia u ha u snem 1964 kaba ngi tip ha kato ka por kum ka Jowai Autonomous District Council hynrei la pynkylla noh da ka Sorkar Meghalaya sha ka Jaintia Hills Autonomous District Council.  Mynshuwa ia ka ri lum Jaintia la pyniasoh lang bad ka Ri Khasi la ha ka synshar khaddar bad District Council ruh kum ka United Khasi and Jaintia Hills District lane District Council. Na ka ktien UNITED bad AND la sngewthuh hi. Ha ka por ba long u Chief Minister u (L) Purno Sangma la don ba dawa separate District Council hynrei um lah ban ai namar ba dei u juh u ri lum Khasi. Hadien ba ka sorkar Assam ka la ai separate District Council ia u Jaintia, u ma (L) E. Bareh, u Chief Executive Member, ka United Khasi and Jaintia Autonomous District Council Shillong u la ai case ha High Court pyrshah ia ka sorkar Assam ha ka nongrim ba u Pnar, War bad u Bhoi (kum la batai haneng) u long u juh u jait bynriew Khasi, u la apil sha ka Supreme Court hangne ruh kam sei soh ei ei ruh. Khadduh u la long pynban kum u C.E.M uba nyngkong eh ka Jaintia Hills Autonomous District Council kaba u la pyrshang ban pynduh. Kumta ka iing bishar ki la pynskhem ia u Pnar, u War bad u Bhoi ba ki long ki Jaintia bad la pynskhem ia ka jinglong Jaintia jong ki ha u snem 1970. Nangne ka District Council ka la treikam haduh mynta lyngba ki elekshon.Batai stad te leh, ia ki Scotland bad Wales kim ju khot British ki knot Scottish bad Welsh
title: U ei U Jaintia?

content: Imphal: Ki shipai Assam Rifles, ki la ioh kem ia ar ngut ki nong khaii droks lem  bad ki  WY tablet ha Khudengthabi Check-Post jong ka Tengnoupal District ha ka 2tarik Risaw jong ka Jylla Manipur.La iathuh ba hadien ka jing ioh jingtip, ki shipai, ki la ioh bat ia kawei ka kali  Eeco Van, kaba don ia u number  DL 04 AS 4404, kaba la niah da u  Jamminlian Vaipheu bad hadien ba la talasi, la lap ia  u brown Sugar uba don  3.336 kilo bad sa  20000tylli ki  WY tablet, kiba shongdor baroh sha ka T.7.2 klur.
title: Kurup droks, uba shongdor T.7.2 klur na Manipur

content: Shillong:  U President jong ka seng ki nongrep Hill Farmers Union (HFU), u bah Commander Shangpliang, u la iasaid halor bun tylli ki ishu kiba ki nongrep ka jylla ki iakynduh ha ka jingialang jong ka National Level Conference Consultative Group kaba la long ha Lucknow, Uttar Pradesh.Ha kane ka jingialang ba la iadon lang ruh ki ophisar jong ka tnad ka rep ka riang jong ki Nongrep jong ka sorkar India bad ki heh jong ka National Bank for Agriculture and Rural Development, u bah Commander Shangpliang, uba mihkhmat ia ka jylla hatei ka jingialang, u la kren halor ka jingdonkam ia ki symbai kiba bha, ban pynpoi um sha ki jaka rep, jingthung uba koit ba khia bad kumjuh ruh ia ka Iew kaba biang.U la kren ruh halor ka jingdonkam ban kyntiew ia ki symbai tynrai na ka jylla bad kumjuh ruh bna iarap halor ka rep kaba khlem pyndonkam dawai (chemical fertilizer) lane ka rep organic. U la kren ruh halor ka jingdonkam ban pyntreikam bha ia ki skhim ka sorkar India kum ka PM Kisan, ka skhim shongthait na ka bynta ki nongrep, ka crop insurance nalor kiwei kiwei.Halor ka iew ka hat u Bah Commander Shangpliang u la pynsngew ia ka jingdonam ban ioh ia ka iew kaba biang bad ban lait n aka jingshah ban bein ha ki middle man bad u la ban jur ba dei ban plie ia ka Iew khappud bad ka Bangladesh kyrpang na ka bynta ki mar jong ki nongrep bad kiwei ki rukom pyniaid iew ia ki mar rep mar riang.Na ka liang jong ka ka liang jong ki bor ba dei khmih jong ka tnad ka rep ka riang jong ka sorkar India ki la sngap halor kitei ki jingpynsngew kynthup ruh ia ki jingeh ba la kren da kiwei pat ki nognrep na kawei ki jylla bad ki la kular ban sa bishar bniah kawei hadien kawei pat bad khamtam ban pynsngew sha ki bor ba halor jong ka sorkar India ba dei khmih ia ka rep ka riang.
title: Iasaid u heh HFU, ia ki jingeh ki nongrep ka jylla

content: Shillong: Ha ka miet jong ka 2,3 tarik Risaw, ki riew runar, ki la rong tuh ia ka  motorcycle (ML-05R-9828) kaba dei ka jong U Bah  Kyntiewbok Lyngdoh Mawphlang na ka iing sah jongu ha  Dongkadiang, Nongmensong, Shillong.
title: Shah tuh Scooty na Nongmensong

content: Shillong:  Ka bor ba dei khmih ia ka iaid beit iaid ryntih ki kali ha ka nongbah shillong ka la pynbeit ba na ka bynta ban um don ka jingdheng kali ha kane ka taiew ban wan na ka jingrakhe ki paid riewngeit Hindu ha ka jinglehniam Puja ka la buh da ka ‘NO ENTRY’ ha ki katto katne ki kyntoit ka sor shillong ka ban sdang naduh ka 5 tarik haduh 8 tarik u October, 2019. Bad kiba leh pyrshah ia kane ka jingpynbeit kin shah pynshitom katkum ka Ain jong ka section of Motor Vehicle (Amendment) Act 2019. Ki kyntoit ki long kumne harum:Sardar Area: NO ENTRY: naduh Jail Road Petrol Pump ter ter shaduh ka Iew jail Road, na Forest Colony shaduh C.R.P.F Camp, najan Gandhi Bunyadi Higher Secondary School shaduh Pynthor rit, na lad Oakland shaduh Oakland Puja Pandal, na Bamboo Hut shaduh Keating Road.Laban Area: NO ENTRY: na Lawsohtun/CID quarter shaduh Iew Bishnupur, na lad Oxford shaduh Railbong Beat House, na Office Shillong Times shaduh Railbong Beat House, na Last Stop shaduh lad Oxford, na Harrison bridge shaduh Office Shillong Times, na Batti Bazar shaduh Hari Sabha Puja Pandal, na MGCC sahduh lad Oxford.Lumdiengjri Area: NO ENTRY: na District Council shaduh MES bad yn shah ia ki kali heh tang lada kylluid ka surok, na Trenching ground shaduh Round Building Jhalupara, na Kyrbom shaduh Mawbah,Rynjah Area: NO ENTRY: na main road 1 shaduh main road 2, na Lumshngain shaduh Rynjah Dispensary, na Lumsohphoh shaduh Iew NongmensongMadanrting Area: NO ENTRY: na Garoline shaduh Ram Krishna Mission bad hakhmat ka P.S, na khmat ka P.S shaduh  Puja Pandal, na Fire Brigade shaduh Puja Pandal, na Law College shaduh Main road, na New Colony shaduh lad Puja Pandal.
title: Pynbeit kali ha ka lehniam Puja ha Shillong

content: Nongpoh:  Ki nongialam ka Hynniewtrep People’s Federation (HPF) na Ri Bhoi, myn hynnin ka sngi ki la leit ban jurip ia kawei ka jaka kaba don ha syndah ka Madan Kurkalang, Bhoirymbong, kaba dei ruh ka jaka kaba ki briew jong katei ka thain, ki pynlong ia katei ka jaka kum ka jaka ban bret ia ki jaboh jabain, kiba la mih na ka Iew Bhoirymbong.Haba leit ban jurip ia katei ka jaka, ki la don ki nongialam ka HPF, kiba kynthup ia u Bah Apbor Nongrum, President ha Ri Bhoi, u Bah Sylverious Masharing, President ka Eastern Zone lem bad kiwei ki dkhot na ki Unit ba Circle.Ha katei ka jingleit jurip, la lap ba katei ka jaka ym tang ba ka don marsyndah bad ka madan Kurkalang, hynrei ka don ruh hajan jong ka shong Lumdaitkhla, ha kaba la lap ruh ba ka jingbret jaboh ha katei ka jaka, ka la long kaba pathar shaba palat bad kaba lah ruh ban ktah ia ka koit ka khiah jong ki paidbah kiba don ha katei ka shnong.Haba kren sha ki lad pathai khubor, kitei ki nongialam ka HPF, ki la ong ba ka seng ka sngewkhia ban iohi ba ki briew, ki la pynlong ia katei ka jaka kum ka Marten ne ka jaka ban bret ia ki jaboh jabain, namar ba ka dang jan eh bad ka shnong bad khamtam eh bad katei ka madan ialehkai.Ki la ong ruh, ba ka seng kan sa buddien bha halor katei ka jingbret jaboh ha katei ka jaka, da kaba iakren ia ki briew ka shnong bad lada donkam kin sa leit ban kynduh ia ki bor ba kham halor, na ka bynta ban khang noh shisyndon ka bret jaboh ha katei ka jaka, namar kan sa ktah ia ka koit ka khiah jong ki briew kiba sah hajan jong katei ka jaka.
title: Lap ka HPF ba kylla marten, ha syndah ka Madan Kurkalang Bhoirymbong

content: Thiah dang shai khie dang step wat klum sah hapoh ka nep. Ia kine ki kyntien la hikai iangi naduh dangrit bad kadei kajinghikai kaba kongsan tam kaba ngi dei ban kynmaw baroh shirta. Lada phi lah ban khie thiah step kan ai jingmyntoi shikatdei eh, lahaka jingkoit jingkhiah ne ka span ka phew bad ka jing nang jingstad ruh de. Kat kum ka jingshem naki jing pule, ka jing iohthiah bha bad ban khie step ka iarap iaka met bad jabieng ban pynjah thait bha bad kalong ruh kaba donkam naka bynta ban ioh baroh ki jingkoit jingkhiah haka met jongphi. Haka jingshisha, naka bynta kiba bun kam long kaba suk ban khie step khamtam lada ka bneng ka dang dum ngiew. Hynrei ki riewstad ki ong ‘lada phi jop iaka step phi jop iaka sngi ruh’. Haba peit bniah ki don shibun ki jingmyntoi phin ioh naka jingkhie step. Hangne kidon katto katne ki jingmyntoi kiba kham kongsan phin ioh na kaba khie step:—
title: KA JING KHIE STEP

content: Shillong:  U MLA ka BJP u bah Sanbor Shullai, u la ong ba un leit sah miet sha Shella  na ka bynta ban ialap elekshon ia u kyrtong ka BJP u bah Joshua Warjri, namar ba ka BJP ka don ka thong ban rah ia ka jingjop ha kane ka elekshon shiteng samoi.Haba kren sha ki lad pathai khubor myn hynnin ka sngi, u bah Sanbor u la ong ba ha ka taiew ban wan, un hiar ban sah miet sha katei ka thain Shella ban leit ialap elekshon.“Ngan leit sahmiet sha Shella ban ialap elekshon ia u kyrtong ka party”, la ong u bah Sanbor.U bah Sanbor u la ong ba ka party ka la iakren ruh ban khot ia ki katto katne ki nongialam na Delhi ba kin wan ban ialap elekshon ia u bah Joshua kum u Dr Jitendra Singh uba dei u myntri ka DoNER, u Himanta Biswa Sarma u myntri sorkar Assam, u Arjun Manda u myntri ba peit ia ki riewlum bad kiwei.Haba kam ba ka BJP ka don ha ka thong ban jop, u bah Sanbor u la ong ba ka party ka don ki nongkyrshan kiba khlain.Haba kam ba u kyrtong ka BJP u bah Joshua u don ka jingkyrmen ban jop, u bah Sanbor u la ong ba ha ka MP elekshon ba la dep,  ma u uba la iakhun  kum u kyrtong, u la khur haduh 4 hajar vote tam tang na Shella konstitwensi bad khlem pep, lada kine ki 4 hajar ngut kiba la kyrshan ia ka BJP ha ka MP elekshon kin ioh sa tang mar 2 ngut ki nongkyrshan, ka BJP kan don ha ka jingjop.
title: Dei ban ieh ia ka CAB, ha  ka mon laitluid ki sorkar jylla, ong U bah Sanbor

content: Shillong:  Ka Hynñiewtrep Youths’ Council Sohïong Circle myn hynnin ka sngi ka 4tarik Risaw, 2019 hapoh ka jing ïalam jong u President, Samla Purningstar Shabong ka la leit ïa kynduh ia u General Manager Telecom District, Meghalaya jong ka BSNL ha kaba ïadei bad ka jing ujor ki paidbah nongshong shnong ka Sohïong sha ka Seng ïa ka jing pynduh kynsan ka BSNL ïa ka network ha Sohïong mynta lah kumba shi bnai eiei.Na ka liang jong ka HYC kala pynsngew ïa ka jingeh kaba ki paidbah kiba pyndonkam ïa ka SIM card jong ka BSNL ki ïa kynduh na ka jingkhang kynsan jong ka ïa ka network ha poh Sohïong. Bad haba ïakren ha kane ka sngi na ka liang u GMTD ula kubur ba ka don ka jing khang kynsan ïa ka Network da ka GTL Infrastructure Provider bad na ka liang jong u ula kular ba un shim ki lad ki lynti kloi katba lah ban pynïoh biang ïa ka network ha Sohïong. Halor kane, na ka liang jong ka Seng kala ai jingmut ba katba ym pat lah ban pyndep ïa ki jingdnkam ban pynbiang ïa u Tower uba don ha jan Sohïong, dei ban tan network noh shwa na Laitlulong kaba kham jan da kaba pynkiew ia ka bor(power) jong u Tower uba don ha Laitlulong, namar ba u  don kham jan bad kham suk.Haba ïadei pat bad ka pisa kaba la lah dep recharge da ki paidbah ha ka tei ka thaiñ, na ka liang jong ka HYC kala ong ba ïa ka pisa kaba la dep recharge da ki paidbah kiba pyndonkam BSNL ha ka tei ka thaiñ ym dei ban pynduh ei bad dei ban pynphai biang sha ki paidbah namar ba ka jingleh jong ka BSNL ka long kaba khlem da tip lypa. Halor kane na ka liang jong u GMTD ula kular ba un pynbteng biang ïa ka jingtreikam (services) jong ki kat kum ka sngi kaba kin kut (validity).Kumta na ka liang jong ka Seng ka kyrpad ïa ki paidbah ha Sohïong ba kin buh jingthoh mynno la thep pisa (recharge) bad lano ne katno sngi kan kut bad ban phah sha ka Seng ryngkat bad u number phone khnang ba na ka liang jong ka Seng kan leit rah sha ophis jong ka BSNL ban pynbteng biang ia ka jingtreikam kat kum ka validity jong ki ynda la lah ban pynïoh biang ïa ka network ha ka tei ka shnong.
title: La shibnai, duh kynsan  ka BSNL ha Sohiong

content: Shillong:  Ka Meghalaya Boxing Association (MBA) ka la pynbna ia ki hynñiew ngut ki nongiakura ki ban mihkhmat ia ka Jylla sha ka jingiakhun jong ka BFI Elite (Senior) Men National Boxing Championship ka ban long ha Baddi, Himachal Pradesh ka ban sdang naduh mynta ka sngi Palei.Kumta na ka liang ka MBA ka sngew ban kitbok kitrwiang ia kine ki nongiakura baroh ba kin ialeh bha bad kyrmen ruh ba kin ioh ban khur takma ia ka Jylla.Ki kyrteng ki nongiakura ka Jylla ki long Phiban Wallamkupar Soh – tun (46- 49kg), Shanborlang Marbaniang (52kg), Pynskhemlang L. Nonglait ( 57kg), Laitpharlin Hoojon (60kg), Subam Gurung (63kg), Arthur Cornelli N. Khongmawio (69kg) bad u Pinku Kalita (75kg).Ia kane ka kynhun la ialam da u Daniel Marbaniang bad u Teibor Kharkongor. Kane ka lympung kan kut ha ka 10 tarik mynta u bnai.
title: Pynbna ka MBA ia ki nongiakura sha ka Himachal Pradesh

content: Nongpoh:  U Acting Syiem ka Hima Myllien lem bad ka Dorbar Hima Mylliem, Shillong, ka la pynbna ia ka hukum katkum ka No.MS/V-67/89-19/1936, July 2019, ia kaba la pynmih da ka Executive Dorbar bad ruh kaba la pynbud da ka hukum No.MS/V07/89-19/2368-74 u August 2019 ba ia ka Sanad No.MS/V-57/98-15/1836 u November 2015, ka la pynduh pyndam noh bad weng noh ia u Bah Ioanis Narleng ba un dang long kum u Rangbah shnong ka Baridua.Ha ka shithi kaba ki la phah sha u Bah Ioanis Narleng, ka Hima Mylliem, ka la phah kopi lut sha baroh ki tnat treikam kiba peit ia ka shongsuk shongsain bad kiba peit ia ki kam shnong kam thaw, ha kaba katkum katei ka shithi la iohi ba ka Hima Mylliem hadien ba la weng ia u Bah Ioanis Narleng, ka la thung ia u Bah Augustine Nongrum ba un long kum u Acting Rangbah jong ka Baridua.Ka Hima Mylliem, ka la kyrpad ia ki paidbah ba lada don kino kino ki kam, ba kin leit kynduh ia u Bah Augustine Nongrum bad ha kajuh ruh ka por la pynbna ruh ba ki kot ki sla ba soi da u Bah Ioanis Narleng, ki long kiba beain bad ki paidbah baroh kim dei ban leit shim kot shim sla na u Bah Ioanis Narleng, shuh shuh u Bah Ioanis Narleng, um dei shuh ban tuklar ia kino kino ki Skim sorkar hapoh jong katei ka shnong.
title: Weng ka Hima Mylliem ia u Bah Ioanis Narleng kum u Rangbah shnong ka Baridua

content: Nongpoh: Ha ka jingjia aksiden kaba la jia hynnin ka miet ha Nongpoh, uwei u samla uba la tip Jahangir Lyngdoh (21) snem uba sah ha ki thain Nongpoh, u la khlad noh hashen hadien ba katei ka Bike kaba u niah, la suba jur ba ka la shah rat ha ki kali heh, namar halor katei ka jingjia ym shem la don mano mano kiba la iohi.Katei ka jingjia kaba la jia ha ka por 11 baje ei ei mynmiet, ha kaba ki nongleit nongwan ki la shu iohi ba utei u samla u la thiah lyngktar hapdeng surok bad ki tiar lyngkhot lyngkhai kiba la pra na katei ka Bike, hynrei ia ka metbah jong katei ka Bike kam shem la don satia ha katei ka jaka.Hadien katto katne por, ba la wan ki Pulit bad kiba haiing jong utei u Samla, la pynkit noh sha Civil Hospital Nongpoh, hynrei haba la poi ha jaka sumar la pynbna ba utei u samla u la khlad noh.Hapdeng ka jinglyngoh kaba khraw, namar ba katei ka Bike kam shem la don ha katei ka jaka, hynrei hadien katto katne por, ki la don ki nongleit nongwan kiba la lap ia katei ka Bike ba ka la don ha Pahamrioh, kaba la don ia ka jingjngia kumba 4 KM eiei na katei ka jaka, kaba la jia katei ka jingaksiden bad kaba la pynsuba ruh ba imat katei ka Bike ka la shah rat ha ki kali heh.Haba iadei bad katei ka jingjia, ki Pulit ka Nongpoh Police Station, kin dang pynlong ia ka jingtokit, khnang ba lap ia ki jingshisha baroh.
title: Khlad hashen u samla na ka jingjia aksiden bike ha Nongpoh

content: Shillong: Ka Dorbar Shnong Umkiang, ka pynpaw ia ka jingsngewkhia jur, halor ka jingbym shim khia ka NHAI /GRIL ban maramot ia u surok National Highway ha ki thain Umkiang.Kane ka jingleh sting jong kiba dei peit ka pynlong ia ki paitbah ban shem jingeh ha ka leit ka wan khamtam ia ki khynnah skul. Ka Dorbar Shnong Umkiang ka pynrem jur ia ki nongtrei / company ki bym shym la maramot ia u surok NH – 6 katba ia ka pisa ki khrong thik thik khlem da map wat tang shi tyngka ruh ha ki khyrdop lum pisa.Ka Dorbar Shnong ka maham ia ka Company GRIL ba lada kam lah ban maramot hapoh shitaiew, ka shnong kan shim da kiwei pat ki lad kiba tyngeh pyrshah ia katei ka Company, ong ka kyrwoh na U Ma Lasting Pala, Waheh Shnong Umkiang.
title: Maramot hapoh shi taiew ia u surok sha Umkiang, ong ka Dorbar Shnong ia ka NHAI

content: Shillong: Ka party BJP hapoh ka jingialam jong u Narendra Modi, ka long  ka sorkar kaba lait na ki kam bam sap bad kata ka dei ka nongrim kaba ka BJP ka ieng bad kane ka la kdew shai ha ka kular ilekshon jong ka party.“Ka jingkren ka jong nga ha kato ka sngi nga kren ia ka nongrim, nga khlem kren iano iano ruh nga kren ia ka nongrim ba ka party ka ieng”, balei u bah Hamlet u khynniuh, ka party jong nga ka don ia ka hok bad kum u MLA jong ka BJP nga don ia hok ban ia kynduh ia ki nongialam ne ki myntri ban kren ia ka jingeh ki briew ka konstitwensi bad jong ka jylla”.“Balei ki tieng lada ki buddien ia ki skhim, balei u Bah Hamlet u tieng” kylli U bah Sanbor. La ong shuh shuh U bah Sanbor, ba  ka dei ka jingshisha ba ka jylla Meghalaya kam dei jong ka BJP, ha ka juh ka por kam dei ruh jong ka PDF, ha ka por ba thaw ia ka sorkar dei jong ki paidbah ka jylla Meghalaya.U bah Sanbor u la ong ba u Bah Hamlet um dei ban tieng, hynrei un pyntrei kam bha ia ki skhim bad u kloi ban iarap ban peit lem bad ki jingtrei ki dei ban long ki lad ai kam aijam bad lada don kano kano ka jingtrei dei ban ai shuwa ia ki briew na ka jylla, ym ban pynshlur ia ki briew ba na shabar ka jylla.
title: Balei U bah Hamlet, u khynniuh, kylli U Bah Sanbor

content: Shillong:  Ka “Forum of Council under Sixth Schedule” (FOCUSS) kaba kynthup ia baroh shiphew tylli ki Autonomous Council kiba don ha kane ka thain shatei lam mih ngi jong ka Ri India ki la ia kynduh ha kane ka nongbah Shillong mynta ka sngi ban ia kren kumno ban iakren bad ka sorkar pdeng na ka bynta ki Council tang kawei ka sur sha ka sorkar pdeng kane ka jing ia kynduh ka long ka sien kaba lai naduh ba la seng ia ka.Ha kane ka jingiakynduh ki la ia iatai  halor ki lai tylli ki bynta kiba ktah lang ia baroh ki Autonomous Council ha kane ka thain shatei lam mih ngi jong ka Ri India.Haba kren ha ki lad pathai khubor u Chairman jong ka FOCSS u bah Pynshngainlang Syiem Chairman jong ka KHADC, u la ong ba “Ki Autonomous Council ha ka ne ka thain ki don hapdeng ka jingeh ha ka liang ka pisa namar ba ka jingbei pisa na ka sorkar pdeng kam wan beit sha ki Council bad la ong ba ha ka jingkwah ka sorkar pdeng ban pynkylla ia ka Sixth Schedule kila buh ia ki Council hapoh ka artikle 280 haba ia dei bad ka jingbei pisa na ka sorkar pdeng ba hap ban iaid lyngba ki sorkar jylla.”Kawei pat ka phang kaba ki la ia kren ka long  ban phah ia ki jingai jingmut jong ki ha kaba ia dei bad ka jingkwah jong ka sorkar pdeng ban wanrah ia ka jingpynkylla ia ka Sixth Schedule hapoh mynta u bnai bad ha u Naiwieng u ban wah ki lah ban leit ai sha ka Parliamentary Standing Committee, ha ka juh ka por kin pan por ban pynjlan lada long kaba lah.Naduh ba la seng ia ka FOCSS, ka la iaid mynta khlem don kino kino ki riti pyniaid ia ka kumta kane ka jingialang ka la rai ban don noh ia ka riti pyniaid ia ka namar kan long kaba iaid beit, haba ia dei bad kane la aiti sha ka sub committee ba kan peit bniah ban sain dur ia ki kyndon trei kam.Haba jubab ia ki jingkylli na ka liang jong u Bah PN Syiem u la ong ba ka jingkwah jong ki Autonomous Council baroh ka long ba kin ia don ia ka juh ka bor trei kam, namar kumba ka long mynta ka bor trei kam ka iapher na kawei ka jylla sha kawei pat, ki kwah ba baroh ki Council kin don  ia ka juh ka bor.
title: Kwah ka FOCUSS, ban wan beit ka pisa na ka sorkar pdeng sha ki Council

content: Ka khynnah kaba dang 14 snem ka rta, ka la iap ei ha  Kazakhstan, na ka daw ba ka bthei ka smartphone jongka, kaba ka buh ha syngkhlieh.Katei ka khynnah, ka thiah ialade bad ka sngap jingrwai, ha ka shnong  Bastobe, Kazakhstan. Ha ka step kaba bud, la lap ba ka la iap bad ka daw, ka long namar ba ka bateri jong ka phone jongka, ka la bthei ha syndah jong ka khlieh jongka hi.La iathuh ba katei ka khynnah, ka sngap jingrwai bad ka pynbam ding syndon ia ka phone jongka. La ngeit ba ka jing mynsaw, ka jur bha ha ki bynta jong ka khlieh jongka, na katei ka jingbthei, kat haduh ba kan da iap syndon. La iathuh ba ka jingbthei jong katei ka phone, ka dei namar ba ka la khluit palat, na katei ka jing pynbam ding.
title: Bthei ka mobile phone, iap ka khynnah 14 snem ha jingthiah

content: U Hrithik Roshan bad U Tiger Shroff, ki la pynkhluit tar ia ki iing cinema, lyngba ka phlim jongki, kaba kyrteng War, kaba kamai T.20 klur ha ka sngi ba ar, ba la pyllait paidbah ia ka.Ia ka phlim War, la pyllait ha ka ktien  Hindi, Tamil bad ka Telugu. Ka jingioh kamai jong katei ka phlim, ha kine ki ar sngi ba ladep, ka poi sha ka  T.77.70 klur. U Taran Adarsh, uba khein ia ka jing ioh kamai jong katei ka phlim, u pyni, ba ka ktien hindi, ka kamai T.23.10 klur, ka ktien Tamil, ka ioh  T.1.25 klur. La iathuh ba ha ka sngi nyngkong, katei ka phlim, ka ioh kamai T. 53.35 klur ha baroh ki jait ktien.Ka phlim jong U Hrithik Roshan bad U Tiger Shroff, ka mih ha ka sngi Gandhi Jayanti bad ka dei kaba la thaw da U  Siddharat Anand.Katei ka phlim, ka pyni ia ka khana jong ka jing don bynta jong ki arngut ki snar runar, kiba iaid beit tang ban pyniap briew bad ka ia syriem ia ka jingialehkai hapdeng ka miaw bad ka khnai, ha kaba la ak da kitei ki arngut ki khlur ba khraw jong ka bollywood, U Hrithik bad U Tiger.
title: Kamai ka phlim U Hrithik bad U Tiger haduh T.77.70klur ha ki ar sngi

content: AIS SujaU Blei u la ai ia u khun na Israel, ban  pynim ia ki jaidbynriew ka pyrtheibaroh. U Blei u la mut ruh ban pyllong syiem ia ka Israel bad synshar halor ki ri ka pyrthei bad kan long ma ka ka syiem ha ka pyrthei, namar ha Israel ki don ki briew jong u Blei kum u Abraham, u Isaak bad u Jakob bad kiwei, bad dei namar ba u Blei u la dep kular ha u Abraham bad ki kaba ong – “Ha u symbai jong me yn kyrkhu ia ki jaidbynriew ka pyrthei baroh” ki kam Apostol 3:25.Ka por ka la jia, “Haba la jia ka ia ba biang u Blei u la phah ia la u khun uba la kha na ka briew, ia uba la kha hapoh ka hukum. Galatia 4:4, mynba dang trei kam ki ain u Moses. U Blei u la phah ia u khun (Jisu Khrist) sha ka pyrthei lyngba kawei ka jaid bynriew Jiw ha Israel. Kumta ka ong ka ktien u Blei : “U la wan sha kiei kiei la ki jong (jaid bynriew Jiw), kita kiba dei la ki jong kim pdiang ia u” Ioannis 1:11.La kha ia u Jisu ha Israel ha Bethlehem Judia, “U la don ha kane ka pyrthei ka pyrthei ka la don bad u pynban ka pyrthei kam shym ithuh ia u” Ioannis 1:10. Ki Jiw ha Israel kim ithuh ba uta u Jisu u dei u khun u Blei ba la phah da u Blei na bneng, kim shym pynbna ne ngeit ha ka kyrteng jong u, hynrei ki kyntait pynban ia u.Ka jingkyntait jong ki Jiw ia u Jisu Khrist ka long ka jingduh bakhraw jong ki, namar ki la ialeh pyrshah ia ka jingpynim bakhraw. Na kata ka daw u Jisu u hap ban phai sha kiwei pat ki bynriew ka pyrthei ba kin pdiang ia u. ka ktien u Blei ka ong – “Hynrei kat kiba la pdiang ia u, ha kito u la ai bor ban long ki khun u Blei, kata kiba ngeit ha ka kyrteng jong u (ha ka kyrteng Jisu)” Ioannis 1:12. Kiba ngeit ha ka kyrteng u Jisu dei ban kha pat ia ki: “Kiba la kha ym na ka snam, lymne ka mon ka doh, lymne ka mon u briew, HYNREI NA U BLEI” Ioannis 1:13.Kumta ka jingkyntait jong ki Jiw ia u Jisu, ka long pat ka lad ia ki Jentil (bym dei Jiw) ban pynim ia ki lada ki ngeit bad pdiang ia u Jisu namar ha u Blei te ym don Jiw ym don Jentil ym don Krik. Ka jingkyntait ki Jiw ka la pyllong ia u Blei ban sngewsih bad bitar halor kane ka jaid bynriew. Dei na kata ka daw ki Jiw ki la sakma sha kylleng ka pyrthei bad ki laduh artad ia ka Temple haba la thang ia ka khlem da iehnoh maw halor u maw ha ka snem 70 A.D.Mynba u Jisu u dang don ha ka pyrthei, u la leh shibun kiei kiei, u la leh ki kambah kam phylla, ula beh ia ki ksuid u la pynim ia kiba iap, u la pyniaid ia kiba dkoh, pynpeit ia kiba matlah bad shibun kiwei pat ki kam phylla.Bun na kine ki Jentil ki pdiang hynrei ki Jiw ki kyntait bad kren bein ia u haduh ka jingsah narphna. Mynba u Jisu u dang don ha pyrthei u la ong ba ia kine ki kam bah baroh u briew ruh u lah ban leh. “Shisha shisha nga ong ha phi, uta uba ngeit ha nga, kita ki jingleh kiba nga leh, uta ruh un leh bad kham khraw ia kine un leh” Ioannis 14:12. Ia kane u Jisu u la kren ha ki synran bad ha ki Apostol ha kito ki por, hynrei u kren ha ngi ruh mynta da ka ktien jong u.Hadien ba u Jisu, u la kiew noh sha bneng, u la ai bor ha kito kiba ngeit kiba pdang ia ka ktien jong u lyngba u Mynsiem Bakhuid ban leh ia kine kiei kiei. Kumta ngi iohi ba hadien ba u Jisu u la kiew noh sha bneng ha u lyoh ki Apostol ki la leh shibun ki kambah bad jingphylla uwei na kita dei u Petros bad u Ioanis, u Petros u la pynkhiah ia uba dkoh, u Petros u ong – “Ha ka kyrteng u Jisu Khrist uba na Nazareth, to iaid. Uba dkoh te u la ieng u la iaid, ki Jiw bad ki Pharisi ki sngew phylla ia kane. U Petros u ong – ko rangbah Israel balei phi sngew phylla ia kane? Balei phi ia khmih phylla namar ym dei da ka bor ne jingriew blei jong ngi, hynrei uta u Blei jong u Abraham, u Isaak u Jakob, u la pyndon burom ia u khun jong u – U Jisu, ia uba phi la aiti noh, phi la len ia u hakhmat u Pilat, phi la len ia uba khuid uba hok, ia u Syiem ka jingpynim phi la pyniap noh ……. Ngi ngi long ki nongphla. Kata ka jingngeit kein kaba ngeit ha ka kyrteng u Jisu, ka la pynkhiah ia u hakhmat jong phi baroh” Ki kam ki Apostol 3:1-16.Hangne ngi iohi ba ki Jiw ki peit lyngngoh ia ki kambah ba la leh da ki Apostol ha ka kyrteng u Jisu, namar ialade kim shym pdiang ia ki jinghikai u Jisu Khrist bad kim ioh ruh ia kane ka bor phylla. Dei ka jingbymngeit bym pdiang ia u Jisu Khrist ki la duh noh ia ki kambah bad ia kiei kiei kiba ki dei ban ioh. Na kata ka daw u Petros u ong ha ki Jiw “Nga tip ba na ka jingbymtip phi la leh ia kata, ki nongsynshar jong phi ruh ki leh” ki kam ki Apostol 3:17.Namar kata uno uno uba kwah ban ioh ia ka bor na u Blei, u dei ban ngeit bad pdiang ba u Jisu u dei u khun jong u Blei da kaba ngeit ha ka ktien jong u Blei namar ha ka ktien u Blei, u don u Blei, u Apostol Petros u ioh ia kane ka bor ki kam bah dei namar u ngeit bad u pdiang. Kumta ha ki Jiw u la ong – “To kylla kaba mut to wan phai khmat ruh ban ioh pyndam noh ia ki pop jong phi” ki kam ki Apostol 3:19.Kane kajuh ka ktien ka dang kren bad ka khot ia kito ki bym ngeit mynta, ba ki dei ban kylla kaba mut (repent) khnang ba u Blei un pyndam noh ia ki pop ia kiba u la thoh mynta ha ka kitab ka jingiap, da kaba pdiang kloi ba u Jisu u dei u khun jong u Blei uba la wan khnang sha kane ka pyrthei ban pynim, pyllait ia ki briew na ki bor ki ksuid bad u soitan bad ka pop. U Blei um dawa ei ei na u briew, hynrei tang ka jingngeit, tang ban ngeit ba u Jisu u long u khun u Blei, uba ka kyrteng jong u ka long halor ki kyrteng baroh, bad ha ka kyrteng u Jisu ki khohsiew kin dem khrup, u thylliej un phla ba u Jisu u dei u Trai” Philipi 2:9-11.“U Blei um shym la phah ia u khun sha ka pyrthei ba un pynrem ia ka pyrthei, HYNREI BA YN PYNIM IA KA PYRTHEI DA U” Ioannis 3:17 – “Uta uba ngeit yn ym pynrem hynrei u bym ngeit u la rem lypa” Ioannis 3.Ki dak ka por ki long hajan ba u Jisu un wan pat sha kane ka pyrthei. Un wan, un hiar ha u lum ki Olives pyrshah Jerusalem” Sekharaiah 14:1-4. Dei hangta kein ba ki Jiw ne Israel kin sa tip bad pdiang ba u Jisu u dei pleng u Messiah jong ki ia uba ki la kyntait 2000 snem tam. Ong u Jisu “Kin ia khmih ha nga ia uba ki la sum bad ki Jiw kin iam briew namar u Messiah jong ki ……. Ha kata ka ngi kan long kaba iam briew kaba khraw ha Jerusalem” Sekharaiauh 12:10-11.“Kata ka ia ka la jan” Jingpynpaw 1:3.
title: “U Blei u ai ia u khun, na Israel!”

content: Washington:  U Kevin Howard, ula kordit sat ha ka jingim jongu, haba ka tnga jongu, kaba ki la ia shong 12 snem kynthih, ka la iehnoh jyndat ia u bad ka daw ka long namar ba ka ia ieid sop sop bad uwei pat, uba ka ia trei lang ha kajuh ka ophis.Hynrei, haba u leit sha kashari, u nongbishar jong ka kashari ha  North Carolina, ula ai ia ka rai, ba utei u shynrang, uba dei u paralok nongtrei jong ka tnga jongu, u dei ka daw, kaba pyn ia pait ia ka shongsha shongman jong U Howard bad ka tnga jongu bad kumta, ula rai ksan ia U Howard lem bad ka bai nong kaba  $750,000.“Ka iathuh ia nga, ba ka kwah ban ia pyllait sanshyieng noh bad nga bad ka ai daw, ba nga trei shitom eh bad ba ngam ju don ha iing” ong U Howard.Hynrei haba la wad jingtip, la lap ba ka tnga jongu, ka don jing iadei bad uwei na ki para nongtrei jongka. “U shait juh bha ban wan kai sha iing bad ngi ju ia bam ja miet lang bad iathuh khana ruh shaphang ki jingim jongngi” ong U Howard.Ka ain ban ujor ia ki shynrang pyrshah ia ki tnga jongki, ka dang trei kam, ha ki san tylli ki Jylla ha America bad kitei ki long ha  Hawaii, Mississippi, New Mexico, South Dakota bad ha Utah bad ka daw ka long, lada ki shem ba ka jing ia pait ka shongkha shongman, ka dei na ki daw bym shongnia lane ki kam leh arsap.
title: Ba klim ka lok shawei pat, ujor U Howard ha kashari, ioh kamai 750,000 dollar

content: Shillong: U Bah Hamlet Dohling, nongialam ka seng PDF, ula kren pyrshah jur, halor ka jingkren jong U bah Sanbor Shullai, ha ki khyndiat sngi ba ladep, ha kaba kyrshan ia U Bah Joshua Warjri, uba dei u kandidet jong ka seng BJP na ka elekshon shiteng samoi na Shella.Ha ka jingkren hynnin ka sngi, U bah Dohling, u ong ba ka Meghalaya, kam dei ka hok nong kynti jong kano kano ka seng sain pyrthei.“Ka Meghalaya, kam dei ka hok nong kynti jongno jongno ruh bad ki skhim, kiba la tyrwa da ka sorkar Jylla, ki dei hi ban iaid ruh lyngba ka sorkar Jylla” ong U bah Dohling, uba dei u myntri kam pynroi sor ka sorkar Jylla.Ka jing kynthoh jong U Bah Dohling, ka long namar ba U Bah Sanbor Shullai, u ong ba ki skhim, kiba dei ban leit sha ka sorkar India, ki dei ban iaid shwa lyngba ka jing peit bniah jong ka seng BJP bad  u iawer ruh ia ki paidbah ka Shella, ba kin jied ia u kandidet jong ka seng BJP, ha kane ka kynti, na ka bynta ba ki skhim jong ka sorkar India, kin iaid beit na Delhi sha katei ka Constituency.
title: Pyrshah jur U Bah Hamlet, ba tyrwa U bah Sanbor ia ki skhim na Delhi sha Shella Constituency

content: Ka dur ba la dro ia ka iing dorbar jong ka England lane ka House of Commons, ba ki don da ki shrieh heh suda lane ki  chimpanzees, ka iaid iew haduh £9.9 million lane T.9klur ha ka pisa India bad la shim ba katei ka dei ka jingdro kaba remdor tam haduh ha kine ki sngi.Katei ka dur, kaba la dro ia ka Parliament, ka dei kaba heh 4 metre ka pyngkiang, la pyniaid iew ha ka Sngi Palei, ha London bad la die  £9,879,500, tang hapoh ka 13 minit jong ka jing ia khlieh dor. Katei ka dur, la iathuh ba ka dei kaba la pynmih da ka kompeni Banksy, kaba ju pynmih ia kitei ki jingdro kiba itynnad bad ba la die ha ka dor kaba rem shibun, ong ka khubor jong ka Daily Mail.
title: Ka dur jong ki shrieh ha ka Parliament ha UK, ka shongdor 9.9million pound

content: Shillong:  Ka jingiakhun na ka bynta ka elekshon shiteng samoi ha Shella kan long 6 ngut. Haduh mynta ka sngi, kaba dei ka sngi khadduh ym don ba weng satia ia ki kyrteng na ka lympung iakhun bad ia kane la pynthikna da u Returning Officer ka Shella u bah L Kynjing myn hynnin ka sngi.Ki hynriew ngut kiban iakhun ki long u bah Balajiedkupar Synrem na ka UDP, Bah Batyngshain Laitmon Ryngnga na ka Congress, Bah Joshua Warjri na ka BJP,  u bah Mosjo Rock F. Wanswett na ka PDF, bad 2 ngut ki kyrtong shimet bah Komen Laitmon, bad ka Kong Grace Mary Kharpuri.Ka jingjied ia u MLA ba thymmai ia ka Shella kan long ha ka 21 tarik mynta u bnai bad ka jingpynbna kan long ha ka 24 tarik Risaw.Ha kajuh ka por, u bah Kynjing u la iathuh ba haduh mynta, kam pat don kano ka jingujor ba ka don ka jingpynkhein ia ka ain elekshon.Ka Election Department, ka la ai ruh ia ka kong Grace Mary Kharpuri, da ka Road Roller, kum ka shap jongka, katba ia U bah Komen Laitmon, da ka shang soh. Kitei ki long ki arngut ki kyrtong shimet.
title: 6 ngut ki kyrtong kin iakhun na Shella

content: Jowai:  Ki trai trok ki la dawa na ki nongialam ka JHTOA ban khot kloi kloi ka General Meeting  na ka ka bynta ban ia kren halor ki jingeh jong trai trok  bad ki driver bad ban pynthymmai ia ki nongkitkan jong seng.Ki trai trok ki la maham jur ia ki nongialam ka JHTOA ba lada kim lah ban khot ia ka jingialang halor kane ka jingeh kim banse ban thaw lane wad dawei pat ka lynti.Ki trai trok ki ka ai por 7 Sngi ia u President bad Secretary ka JHTOA ban lum ia ka jingialang namar la 5 snem ym ju ioh meeting shuh. Lada kim lah la kyntu ia ia ki ban iehnoh lane weng noh ia lade na kane ka kam ba la bat baroh shi katta.“Ngi ki trai trok ngi la sah khun swet namar la 5 snem mynta ngim ju ioh meeting shuh”, ong  ki katto katne ki trai trok.
title: Dawa jingialang ki trai trok na ka JHTOA

content: Shillong:  Ka Amlarem Sub Divisional Sports Association (ASSA) ka la pyntip ba shen kan sdang noh ia ka Amlarem Football League mynta u bnai ha Mini Stadium Ladjaplem, Amlarem.Ka synjuk ka la pyntip ba ki kynhun ba kwah ban iashim bynta ki lah ban phone ia u General Secretary u Bah Dapmon Tariang -8974405178, bad ia u Bah Daniel Khongsit, Sports Secretary -7005906100.
title: Shen yn sdang ka Amlarem Football League

content: Shillong:  Ka Lumshken SC ka la rah ia ka nam lahduh jong ka lympung 2nd division ba la pyniaid daka East Jaintia Hills District Football Association (EJHDFA)  hadien ba ka la pynliem ia ka Pamra Paithlu SC ba la long ha kane ka sngi Balang.Ka Lumshken ka la pynliem da 4-2 kol lyngba ka jingiashut bol hadien ba ka jingiakhun ha madan ka la iakhaid.U Dr. Sankey Shangpung, MDC ka Bataw Lakadong Constituency u la long u Kongsan ha kane ka sngi.Kine baroh ar tylli kin dei ruh kiba la iohlad ban kiew kurdan ialade sha ka First Division  haka aiom kaba bud. Ia ki khusnam la pynsam da u Kongsan lem bad kiwei ki rangbah.
title: Rah ka Lumshken SC ia ka  2nd Division ka East Jaintia FA

content: Shillong:  Ka Meghalaya Football Association (MFA) ka la iashim bynta ha ka tamasa tam niut ba la pynlong da ka Meghalaya State Olympic Association bad ka bor synshar ka East Khasi Hills district ban rakhe ia ka lyngkhuh sngi kha ba 150 jong u kpa ka ri India u Mahatma Gandhi.Ki nongtrei ka MFA bad ki nongtrei mon sngewbha ka Meghalaya Baby League nalor ki nongkitkam ka seng kila iashim bynta ha kaba tam niut plastik na Shillong Golf Course sha State Central Library ha ka step sngi Balang.Ha kane ka jingtam, la ioh ban pyndap ia 20 byrni ki jaboh plastik.
title: Iashim bynta ka MFA ha ka tamasa tam niut

content: Mawryngkneng : Ka Dorbar Shnong Mawryngkneng,Khyrim Syiemship ha ka 2 tarik ka la shim ka rai ban nym shah shuh ban pyndonkam plastik hapoh ka shnong Mawryngkneng baroh kawei kaba kynthup hapoh  ka Iew Pomtiah Mawryngkneng naduh katei ka sngi.Na ka liang   ka Dorbar Shnong  Mawryngkneng ka pynpaw kumba ka sorkar kmie  ka la don ka thong ban pynduh noh ia ka jingpyndonkam ia ka single use plastik kaba la wanrah shisha ia ka jingeh ia ka mei mariang khamtam  Ki um ki wah bad ban buh jingeh ia ka lawei jong ki longdien ka Dorbar Shnong duh  ka shim ia kane ka sienjam ban khang noh ia ka jingpyndonkam ia ka plastik hapoh shnong ha ka dorbar hynnin ka step da ka jingiamynjur lang jong ki paidbah nongshong shnong.Bad ha ka Dorbar ki paidbah nongshong shnong ki lah shim ruh ka jingkular (pledge) ka jingkular ba la lamkhmat da u bah Peter J Lawai, Sordar Shnong ba kin nym pyndonkam plastik shuh.Ha kane ka sngi la ioh ka pynshai bniah na u Secretary ka Dorbar Shnong Mawryngkneng u bah Wanlambok Kharsati ia ka jinpynsniew dur ka plastik ia ka mei Mariang bad ka jingkhuid jingsuba bad u la pynshlur ia ki paidbah ban pyndonkam da kiwei ki lad kum ki sla, ka pla iew bad ki pla organic bag ki bym ktah ia ka meimariang.Hadien ba la wai katei ka Dorbar ka la don ka jinglum plastik da ki paidbah nongshong ka shnong Mawryngkneng ha shilynter ka surok Highway.Bad ha kane ka sngi U BDO jong ka Mawryngkneng u bah Roney Wahlang,MCS  ruh u la wan jngoh da lade ia kane ka jinglum plastik bad u pynshai ruh ia ki paidbah bad Ki nongdie dukan ia ka jingma na ka plastik bad ka jingpynshitom  ia kiba ialeh pyrshah ia kane ka jingmana ban pyndonkam ia ka.
title: Khang plastik, ka dorbar shnong Mawryngkneng

content: Shillong: U bah Hameshaniah Suiam, uba dei u nongjop ha ka jing ia kura ha Russia, ula wan phai mynta ka sngi.La pdiang burom nyngkong eh da U General Manager Airport Authority Guwahati bad nangta sa ka Assam Kickboxing Association bad ka Deputy Commissioner Kong R M Kurbah IAS ha Nongpoh.Nangta la pdiang burom ruh da U Technical Adviser MSKA bad President Muay Thai Association of Meghalaya Bah Angelus Sun ryngkat bad ki Nongialehkai MSKA ha Nongpoh.Ha Hotel Assembly la pdiang sngewbha da U Bah Allantry Franklin Dkhar, Political Secretary & Adviser to Chief Minister uba la pynwandur ha kata ka rukom ban ai ka jingiaroh ba dei ia U Hame Shaniah Suiam da ka jingïaishah bad ïeng beit haduh ban da poï sha ka thong.U Bah Allantry u la ai khublei kyrpang ïa ki kmie Kpa U Hame bad kiba ha ïing bad ki nongialam bapher bapher kiba la noh syñniang lem ban pyn poi ïa U Hame shaduh Russia ban ïoh Gold Medal ha ka below 57 Kgs Point Fighting bad Silver Medal ha ka Light Contact jong ka jingialehkai kilanmet Kickboxing X Diamond Cup WAKO World Kickboxing Cup 2019 ba long ha Anapa Russia naduh 24 – 29 Nailur 2019.
title: Pdiang sngewbha kiba bun, ia u samla Hameshaniah Suiam

content: Shillong: Ha ki 24 kynta ba ladep, ka jinghap slap ha Sohra, ka poi sha ka 77.2 millimetre bad ka bteng biang hi ban long ka jinghap slap kaba jur tam ha Ri Khasi Jaintia.Katba ka jinghap slap, ha ka nongbah Shillong, ha ki 24 kynta ba ladep, ka long tang 16.7 millimetre bad ha Umiam lei, ka long tang 3.0 millimetre.Ka tnat peit mariang, ka iathuh ba ki 24 kynta ba ladep, kin dei ki kynta ba kan jur ka jingtied pyrthat kan jur bha bad kumjuh, kan don ruh ka jingtied leilieh.
title: Jur tam hi u slap ka Ri Sohra, ha ki 24 kynta ba ladep

content: U Bishop ka  Garo Hills, U Rt. Rev Andrew Marak u ia kynduh ia u kpa ba khuid jong ka balang katholik, U  Pope Francis mynta ka sngi, ha ka nongbah Vatican.
title: Ia kynduh U Bishop ka Garo Hills, ia U Pope Francis

content: New Delhi:Ka sorkar India, ka la pyn treikam ia ki 15 tylli ki kyndon bad kitei ki kynthup, ha kaba ker bha ia ki jaka bret blei bad ha kajuh ka por ban dain kuna T.50,000 ia kito kiba bret ia ki blei thaw ha ka wah Ganga lane ha ki shnat jongka, ha kino kino ki jinglehniam.Katei ka dei ka kyndon, kaba la pynmih da ka  National Mission for Clean Ganga (NMCG), ha kaba la bthah ia ki Chief Secretary jong ki 11 tylli ki Jylla, kiba don jing iasnoh bad ka wah Ganga.Ka hukum, ka kren shai ba kam dei ban don ka jing pyn ngam um ia ki blei thaw ha ka Wah Ganga lane ha ki shnat jongka, ong katei ka hukum. La iathuh ba ha katei ka jingialang, la don lang ki heh sorkar kiab na  Uttarakhand, UP, Bihar, Jharkhand bad West Bengal. Nalorkata, la phah ruh ia katei ka hukum sha  ki Jylla ha Delhi, Himachal Pradesh, Madhya Pradesh, Chhattisgarh, Haryana bad Rajasthan.La ong shuh shuh, ba kito kiba bret blei ha ka Wah Ganga, kin shah dain kuna T.50,000.Katei ka hukum, kam trei kam satia ia kiwei pat ki wah, kiba don sha ka thain shatei lam mihngi, lehse kum ka Wah Brahmaputra kaba dei kawei na ki wah bah jong kane ka thain.
title: Ym bit ban bret blei thaw ha Wah Ganga, kiba leh pyrshah, kin shah dain kuna T.50hajar

content: Guwahati: U Ranjeet Kumar Das, u heh duh ka seng BJP ha Assam, u ong ba ka ain  Citizenship Amendment bill (CAB), ka donkam bha, namar ba ki don palat 19 lak ngut kiba la shah weng noh, na ka  national register of citizens (NRC), kaba la pynmih ha ka 31tarik Nailar 2019.U Dass, haba kren ha ka jingrakhe ia ka lyngkhuh sngi kha ba 150 jong U Mahatma Gandhi, u ong ba ki don bun bah ki nong India, kiba la shah weng kyrteng ha ka NRC bad ynda la pyn trei kam ia ka CAB, kane ka jingeh, kan nym mih shuh satia, namar ba ia kitei yn kynthup ha ka CAB.
title: Dei da ka CAB, ban pynrung biang ia kiba shah weng ha ka NRC, ong u heh BJP

content: Shillong: Ka Khasi Students’ Union Narpuh Circle bad ki paidbah ka thaiñ ki pynpaw ka jingsngewdiaw ia ka jingsma iwtung ha ki bynta u surok bah NH 44 (NH 6) ha ki bynta shaneng Myndir bad sha jan ka Sub Station jong ka MeECL ba don ha khlieh Kuliang.Ki paidbah ba leit ba wan kim lah shah ia ka jingsma iwtung tang shu poi ha kito ki jaka. Haba pyrshang ban kylli kaei kata kaba sma iwtung haduh katta katta, ki paidbah ki kynnoh ba bret masi pyut kito ki nongkhaïi masi. Ki paidbah ki iathuh ba kito ki nongkhaïi shalan masi sha Bangladesh haba jia ba iap masi hapoh kali ba ki kit ki shu bret pathar sharud nala ne shapoh riat.Kane ka wanrah ka jingsma iwtung bad ka ktah ia ka jingsngew ki paidbah namar mano hi ba lah ban iaishah ha ka sma iwtung, ka ktah ruh ia ka koit ka khiah jong ki. Ki nongleit nongwan tang shu poi ha kito ki jaka ki kyrthat namar kim lah shu ban ring ne pynhiar mynsiem, tang kito kiba iohsngew dalade ia katei ka jingsma kiba ngeit ia ka jingsma iwtung ba shyrkhei.Ka seng ka buh ka jingkyntu ia kito ki nongkhaïi masi ban pyrkhat lem na ka bynta u paidbah nongleit nongwan bapli, ban kiar na kaba bret pathar ia ki jingri ba la iap jongphi, ha jaka ban bret pathar phi dei ban tep shapoh khyndew ba kan ym ktah ia ka jingsngew u paidbah, ong ka kyrwoh na u Ma WD Gympad Environment Secretary KSU Narpuh Circle.
title: Sma iewtung ka surok bah ha Khlieh Kuliang, ba pyut ki masi, ba bret ki nongkhaii

content: Ha kine ki sngi, ka Priyanka Chopra, ka bunkam bha ban pyniaid iew ia ka phlim thymmai jongka, kaba ai kyrteng  The Sky Is Pink. Ka Priyanka, haba ka don ha India, ha ki khyndiat sngi ba ladep, ka iakren bad U Kapil Sharma, ha ka prokram jongu, na ka bynta ban pynshai halor katei ka phlim ka ban sa mih shen.Ha katei ka jing iakren, U Kapil Sharma, ula kylli ia ka Priyanka, ia kawei ka jingkylli bad katei ka long la u tnga jongka, U Nick Jonas, u nguh ne em ialade ha ki sla ‘jat jong ka kmie jongka, ka Madhu Chopra lane u shu ai tang ka dak jingdoh lane air kisses.Halor katei ka jing kylli, ka Priyanka, ka jubab, da kaba ong  “Dono ke beech mei! Bechara hug karta hai mummy ko!” lane kaba long ba u leh da ka rukom kaba kham iahap bad kata ka long ba u kdup ia la ka jong ka kiaw kurim. Ka  Madhu Chopra ruh, kaba don lang ha katei ka prokram jing iakren bad U Kapil, ka mynjur ia ka jingkren ka Priyanka, da kaba shu kohnguh khlieh.
title: Hato u tnga jongphi, u nguh ne em ha sla ‘jat ka kmie jongphi, kylli U Kapil ia ka Priyanka

content: Shillong: Ka KSU South West Khasi Hills District ka phah ia kane ka kyrwoh ban pan jingshai na ka Garo Students’ Union Khonjoy Regional Unit ba ki dei kiei ba kin ai notice maham ia ki trai jaka bad ki trai shnong Khasi ban nym shna ing ha la ka jong ka jaka ne ban pynsangeh iaki jingtrei ba la trei da ki trai jaka ha ka jaka lajong naduh Khonjoy area haduh Maheshkhola.  “Ngi maham jur iaka GSU ban nym wan tuklar than ia ka kam khyndew kam shyiap bad ngi sngewthuh ba kane ka dei ka jingsdang jongki ban wanrah iaka jingsngewiapher Jaitbynriew” ong ka kyrwoh.“Ki dei kiei ma ki ban leh mynleh pyni iktiar.  Ngi ruh ngi don ka iktiar  ban ai hukum, hynrei ngi sngew ba ngim kwah ban wanrah ia ka mynsiem iapher Jaitbynriew hapdeng ki nongshnongshnong jongka jylla.  Ngi dawa iaka GSU Khonjoy Regional Unit ba ka dei ban pyrkhat arsien bad weng noh ruh mardor ia kine ki hukum ha shwa ba ngi ruh kum ka seng ngin hap ban pyrkhat da kawei ka lynti” ong ka kyrwoh ba la phah mynta ka sngi.Ka KSU, ka ong shuh shuh “Wat pyrshang tuklar ia ka kam khyndew kam shyiap, kumba ngim pat tuklar hi ruh ia ka kam khyndew kam shyiap jongki ha Ri lum Garo lem kumta ngim banse ban hap pynphai pat da ki kam halor kane ka jingleh jongki la ka long da kano kano ka kam ruh”.Ka KSU, ka kyntu ruh ia ki trai jaka Khasi ba kumba ka dei ka jaka jongki, kumta kim dei ban tieng ne syier, namar ka seng ka shim ka jingkitkhlieh ba pura bad ka don ha syndah jongki.  Ki trai jaka ba dei ki Khasi ki lah ban leh katba ki sngewbit ha jaka lajong khlem kano kano ka jingsngewtieng ne sngewsyier bad lada jia eiei, yn  banse ban hap pynphai kylla bad ka GSU Khonjoy Regional Unit ka hap ban shim ia ka jingkitkhlieh namar dei maka kaba sdang ia kaba kum kane ka jingsngew Jaitbynriew.“Kane ka dei ka jingmaham ba tyngeh ba ka GSU ka dei ban weng mardor bad wat sngewkhlain.  Ka jingsngap jar jongngi baroh shi katta ka dei ba ngim kwah ban wanrah iaka jingsngew iapher Jaitbynriew hynrei lada phi sdang ngi ruh ngi hap ban pyni da ka kam” ong shuh ka kyrwoh  na u samla Forwardman Nongrem President KSU South West Khasi Hills District.
title: Ki dei kiei ki GSU Khonjoy, ban korbar ia ka kam khyndew hapoh ka Bri Hynniewtrep

content: Shillong: Ka North East Forum of Indigenous People’s (NEFIP) ha baroh kawei ka Jylla shatei Lammihngi  mynta ka sngi ki la iasnoh kti lang ban pyrshah ia ka ka jingthmu jong ka sorkar pdeng ban wan rah ia Citizenship Amendment bill(CAB)Ha Shillong ruh ia kane ka jingiakhih la ia lam khmat da ka kynhun jong ka Confederation of Meghalaya Social Organisation (CoMSO) ha ka ba ka la ia khih da ka ba shong kyllain myngngor ha parking lot jong ka Additional Secretariat.Ha ba iakren bad ki lad pathai khubor na ka liang u bah Robertjune Kharjahrin u la kyntu ia ki nongialam jong ka Sorkar Jylla ba ki dei ban iasnohkti lang ban pyrshah ia kane ka jingthmu jong ka Sorkar pdeng ban wan rah ia ka CAB.U la ong ba hadien jong ka jingialang ba la pynlong ha Kohima na ka liang ka NEFIP, la rai biang ban sdang ia ka jingiakhih pyrshah ia ka CAB ha baroh ki jylla jong ki thain Shatei Lam Mihngi namar ka jingthmu ba ka Sorkar Pdeng kan wan wan rah beit ia ka CAB ha ka Ri.“Ngi kum ka Jylla ngin ym lah ban pdiang ia ka ne ka ain namar ka long pyrshah ia ka rukom synshar jong ka Ri India” ong U bah Robertjune.U la bynrap ruh  “Ka India lada don ka jingban bein ia ki rit paidHindu ha Banladesh balei ba kam lah ban ujor shah ka United Nation (UN) hynrei ka thmu pynban ban wanrah da ka CAB kadaw la lah ban long ba ka ha India ruh ka don ka jingshah leh bein jong ka  RSS ka ba don jingthmu ban pynkylla Hindu.”
title: Lada don ka jing ban bein ia ki rit paid hindu ha Bangladesh, balei ka sorkar India, kam ujor sha ka UN

content: Shillong: Ka UHM-East Jaintia Hills District, ka bynniaw  ia ka jing leh mynthi ki nongpyniaid ka NH 6 ia ka surok naduh Lumshnong shaduh Ratachera.Ha ka jingleit lynti jong ka seng hapoh ka jing ialam u Yoomeki Kyndait President ka UHM (East jaintia Hills District) mynhynnin ka sngi, ka la lap ba ka jingleh ka NH6 ka long sha kaba palat, naba  sniew u surok, sahkut  sa ki kali baiaid baieng kumba 4kynta eiei. Ka kyrwoh jong ka UHM, ka ong shuh shuh “Kumno ka NH6 kam leh rain ban shna Toll Gate ban lum pisa ha man ki kali ba iaid baieng haba u surok u sniew ban ha ki por bym don Tollgate  bad ka seng ka buh jingkylli ruh ba kumno kumne ha baroh ki District jong ki state ba pher bapher ka pisa ka poi na Delhi sha ki District, hynrei ha East Jaintia Hills District pat ki shim kylla na ngi u paidbah”.Ka seng ka kyrpad ia ki bor kiba halor ban peit ia kane bad ruh ka seng ka maham ia ka NH6  ba kan khang shwa ia kaTollgate, katba ym pat biang  u Surok.
title: Leh mynthi ki nong pyniaid ia ka NH 6, ujor ka UHM East Jaintia

content: Shillong:  Ka NSS unit jong ka khadsawphra College Mairang ha ka 2 tarik mynta u bnai ka la rakhe lang bad ka Ri India baroh kawei ia ka sngikha kaba 150 jong u Mahatma Gandhi.Ha kane ka sngi la ioh ka jingkren halor ka jingim u Mahatma Gandhi kumno u la aiti ia la ka jingim kat haduh ba u la ioh ia ka nam “U Kpa ka Jaitbynriew”  da u Babu Boldness L Nongum Principal ka College bad kumjuh ruh na I Miss Arethel Bakor Nongrang, I ba long ka Programme Officer NSS unit jong ka College iba la kren halor ka jingtrei kam jong ka NSS kiba la pynshong nongrim kat kum ka jinghikai u Mahatma Gandhi khamtam kaba iadei bad ka jingleh khuid leh suba ha ka ri baroh ka wei.Ha katei ka sngi ka NSS unit jong ka college ryngkat bad ka jingiatrei lang bad ki staff ki la pynlong  ia ka jingpynkhuid ia ka campus baroh kawei wat hapdeng ka jingpynthud ka mariang.Ha katei ka sngi la ia donlang ruh I Miss Aida C War Vice Principal lem bad ki Nonghikai kiba la shimbynta lang da ka mynsiem jong ka jingkitkhlieh kumno ban pynduh jait ia ki Plastic kiba la satah kylleng kylleng ki rud ki kiar jong ka college. Ha kane ka sngi  u Principal ruh u la pynbna ba nangne shakhmat ha kane ka College ym nymshah shuh ban pyndonkam Plastic. (Plastic Free Zone Area).
title: Rakhe sngi kha Mahatma ka Khadsawphra College

content: Shillong: Ka Hynniewtrep Achik National Movement, ka la dawa ia ka Sorkar Jylla ba ha u snem 2020, ka dei ban pynbeit noh ia u pud u sam hapdeng ka jylla Meghalaya bad Assam bad u pud u sam jong ka Ri India bad ka Ri Bangladesh.Ha ba ia kren bad ki lad pathai khubor ha Shillong Press Club u president ka HANM U bah Lamphrang Kharbani u la ong  ha u snem thymmai 2020 na ka liang ka HANM ngi kyntu ia  ka Sorkar jylla bad ka Sorkar Pdeng  kan wanrah noh Sa kawei ka resolution ba dei ban pynbeit noh ia u pud u sam hapdeng ka Meghalaya bad Assam bad kumjuh hapdeng ka Ri India bad Ri Bangladesh.Kane ka long ka phang ka ba ktah jur ia ka jylla jong ngi namar naduh ba  la ioh ia ka jylla, ki nongialam jong ngi ki shu kmen ba ki la ioh la ka jong ka jylla hynrei ki khlem da pyrkhat ia u pud u sam.U la ong ruh ba ka jingshah thom bor ka jingiuhroit jong ki para ri khamtam ia kito ki ba sah ha ki jaka ba khappud ka long ka ba la ju sakhi barabor, ngim kwah ba ka Sorkar Jylla kan shim sting ia kane ka bynta namar ba ka dei ka mat ka ba la slem bah bad ka la dei ka por ba kin shim khia noh ha kane ka jing pynbeit ia u pud u sam.Ka jingpynbeit ia u pud u sam ka long kaba la donkam mardor namar hadien ka jingpdiang jong ka Sorkar jylla ia ka ILP, ka donkam ban tip ha kano ka jylla ngi don.Na ka liang ka HANM ha u bnai Rymphang 2020, kin leit ban ia kynduh ia baroh ki MLA ban pynsngewthuh halor kine ki mat.
title: Dawa ka HANM na ka Sorkar jylla ban pynbeit ia u pud u sam ha u 2020

content: Shillong: Kawei ka kali Maruti car, ba don ia u nomber plate Ml O5-N-919, ka la shah thang ha hynriew kilo hajan Kyrdemkulai Ri-Bhoi District Meghalaya. Kane ka la jia hapoh 7 baje janmiet ka 19 tarik nohprah 2019.Ia kane ka kali la niah da u Gilbert Eddie Kharbithai u ba shong ba sah ha North Eastern Police Academy (NEPA) Umsaw u ba trei kum u Assistance Electrician hapoh ka MeECL Kyrdem kulai. Ha kane ka jing shah thang ka kali u nong niah u bah Gilbert Eddie Kharbithai u la mynsaw bad la pynkit nyngkong sha Umsning CHC bad hadien la pynkit noh ioh u sha Civil Hospital Shillong ban phah sumar.Halor kane ka jing jia na ka liang ki pulit ki dang pynlong ia ka jing tohkit.
title: Shah thang  ka kali hajan Kyrdemkulai

content: Shillong:  Ka District Magistrate, East Khasi Hills District has, ka pynbna ba la pynjynsur ia ka korphiw, na ka bynta 16 kynta ha ka 20tarik Nohprah 2019 bad katei kan sdang naduh ka por 5baje mynstep bad kan kut haduh ka por 9baje mynmiet.
title: Pynjynsur korphiw 16 kynta ha Shillong

content: Shillong:  U myntri rangbah ka jylla u Conrad K Sangma mynta ka sngi u la pynbna ba ka sorkar Meghalaya kan ai ‘Christmas gift’ ia ki nong trei sorkar da ka ba kin ioh ia tulop ‘advance’ jong u bnai Nohprah 2019.“Ngi la pynbna ba baroh ki nong trei sorkar kin ioh advance ia ka tulop jong u bnai Nohprah 2019 ka ban long ruh ka Christmas gift ia ki” la bynrap u Conrad K Sangma.Nalor ka tulop jong ki nongtrei sorkar, sorkar Meghalaya kan pyllait ruh ia ka tulop ki nongtrei ‘mustor rolls’ bad ia ki ‘bills’ jong ki kontractor.
title: Ka jingai sngewbha Khristmas na U MR

content: Shillong:      U MLA ka BJP u bah Sanbor Shullai ula ong ba u nongialehkai uba kilanmet tista, u lah ban iakhun na kano kano ka party namar ka party ka dei tang ka sopti.U bah Sanbor ula kren ia kane haba kyrshan ia ka Inner Line Permit (ILP) haba u shim bynta ha ka jingiatai halor ka ïing dorbar mynta ka sngi.Ka jingkren jongu, ka long ruh ka jingpynphai jubab ia ka jingai jingmut u MLA ka North Shillong u bah Adelbert Nongrum, ba ar ngut ki MLA ka BJP kata u bah AL Hek bad bah Sanbor Shullai ki dei ban mih noh na ka party kum ka jingpyrshah ia ka jingpynlong ain ia ka Citizenship Amendment Act 2019.“Lada praktis tista, lah ban iakhun na kano kano ka kynhun namar ba ka jingiada ia ki trai shnong ka dei kaba hakhmat duh bad ka party lei ka dei tang ka sopti”, la ong u bah Sanbor.Ula pynkynmaw ba ha ka 17 Kyllalyngkot 2018, u la phah ia ka dorkhas sha u Narendra Modi bad Amit Shah ha kaba iadei ka jingpyrshah ia ka CAB bad kyrshan ban pyntreikam ILP.“Ha ka 29 Kyllalyngkot 2018, nga la leit sha ka rally ha madan Student ba la poi kumba 80 hajar ngut ki paidbah, ki ong em em wat leit bah Sanbor ba duna pulit kim lah ban iada namar ba bun ki paidbah hynrei nga ong em. Nga pyrkhat ba lada shah hiar thma ha katei ka sngi kan long ka rekod”, la ong u bah Sanbor.Ula ong ba ha ka jingialang ka BJP ha Delhi, u la aiti ia ka dorkhas ha u Modi, bad ha u Lat ban phah sha u president ban pynlait ia ka Meghalaya na ka CAB.Ula kyrshan ba dei ban pyllait pura ia ka Meghalaya na ka CAA ym tang na ka Sixth schedule bad ula kyrshan ruh ban pyntreikam da ka ILP ha ka jylla.Shwa ia kane, haba kyrshan ia ka rai ban pyntreikam da ka ILP ha ka jylla, u bah Adelbert Nongrum u la ong ba ki don 3 jait ki briew ha kane ka pyrthei, kawei ki dei kito kiba leh, kawei kito kiba shu peit bad kawei pat ki dei kito ki bym tip kumno ban leh bad kyrmen ba ki MLA kim nym hap ha ka kyrdan tang kum ki nongpeit.Haba kynthah ia ka BJP kaba la wanrah ia kane ka ain CAA, u bah Adelbert ula ong, “Ki MLA ka BJP ha kane ka jylla ki dei ban mih noh na ka party shi syndon bad ha kane ka por”.U Adelbert uba kren da ka sur kaba jam, u la ong ba ki 60 MLA ki dei ban kyrshan ia ka ILP bad kane ka dei tang ka jingsdang. “Haba ka sorkar phareng ka mut ban mih noh na kane ka ri Khasi, kala kylli, kaei ba phi kwah ba ngin leh, ka jubab jong ki kpa tymmen ha kato ka por ka long, “ieh ia ngi kumba phi lap ia ngi”, la ong u bah Adelbert.Ha kawei ka liang, u MLA ka Mawkyrwat u bah Renikton L Tongkhar  haba shim bynta ha kane ka jingiatai u la ai khublei ia ka sorkar MDA na ka bynta ka jingwanrah ia ka rai ban pyntreikam ia ka ILP ha ka jylla. Ki sengbhalang kila dep iakhih la slem ia kane.“Ka HSPDP kala dep kular ha ka elekshon ba ka ILP ka dei ka mat kaba kongsan. Ka ILP kala pyniatylli ia ki paidbah ka jylla watla ngi iapher ha ka kynhun, ha ka party”, la ong u bah Renikton.Ula ong ba kaMDA ka dei ka sorkar jong ki paidbah namar ba ka ieng bad ai ia ka jingangnud jong ki paidbah. Ula ai khublei ia ka Congress kaba kyrshan ia ka ILP.”Tang ka jingioh ILP kam mut ba ngin duh ia kiwei ki ain ba iada ia ngi hynrei ngi donkam ki ain ban iada ia ki trai shnong”, la ong u MLA ka Mawkyrwat.Katba u MLA ka Ranikor u bah Pius Marwein u la ong ba kum ki riewlum ym don lad lait ban iada na ka jingpyntreikam da ka ILP.“Nga sngew kmen kum u MLA ban iadon bynta ha kane ka rai. Nga kyrpad ia ki paralok thaw ain, to ngin iaklet ia ka jingsngew party, bad kyrshan ia kane ka rai”, ula ong.Kumjuh u bah Lambor Malngiang u MLA shimet na Nongkrem ula ong ba u kmen ba ka sorkar kala shim da ka rai ia ka ILP.“Ka CAA kala pynkhein ia ka riti synshar ka ri halor ka jingiaryngkat hakhmat ka ain. Kane ka ain ka mut ban pyniap ia la ki khun da kaba wanrah da ki briew nabar”, la ong bah Lambor.Ula ong ba ka jingai ILP ia ka Manipur kala plie lad ia ka Meghalaya ban ioh ILP namar ba ka Garo Hills kam don ILP.“Hadien ba la ioh ia ka ILP, ki syntiew kin nang phuh nang phuh shuh”, la ong bah Lambor.Kumjuh u Saleng A Sangma ula pynpaw ia ka jingsngew kmen ba baroh ki seng sain pyrthei kila iatylli. Hadien ba la mong, mynta la iawan lang.”Nga kyrpad ia ka sorkar mynta ban nym bud than ia ki dienjat kiba rim, pyrshang ban leh da kumwei. Ngim lah ban pdiang ia ka CAA namar ka pynkhein ia ka jinglong laitluid ki niam bad dei ban pyndam noh ia ka”, ula ong. Katba u bah Balajiedkupar Synrem  u la ong ba la pynlong ia ki 60 ngut ban shong dorbar kyrpang ka dei namar ka CAA. Ngi dei ban tip mano ba wan sha ing, bad halor kane ka donkam da ka ILP.U bah Jason Mawlong ula ong ba ka CAA kala shet ia ka nongrim ka jingiatylli hapdeng ki jingbun tylli.
title: U nongialehkai ba tbit, u lah ban ialehkai na kano kano party:Sanbor

content: Nongstoiñ: Ka Seng Hynniewtrep Youth Council (HYC) Maweit Circle ka pynpaw ia ka jingsngewkhia kaba jur halor ka jingbym pat treikam satia ki tower jong ka Jio Company kiba la wan ban pynieng ha kiba bun jaka jong ka thaiñ Maweit mynta la kumba ar taiew eie ei.Haba iakren sha ki lad pathai  khubor na ka liang jong u Samla Jeremiia Dkhar President ka HYC Maweit Circle u la ong ba naduh ba la duh noh ka Network jong ka Aircel ka thaiñ Maweit kala mad ia ki jingeh ha kaba iadei bad ka jingpyndom ia ki mobile phone.Shuh shuh u la iathuh ruh ba hadien ba ka kompani Jio kala wan ban pynieng ia ki tower na ka liang jong ki paidbah kila dap da ka jingkmen kaba khraw namar kila ap khmih lynti ba shen kin sa lah ban pyndonkam biang ia ki mobile ha katei ka thaiñ pynban ka jingsuki ban treikam jong kitei ki tower jio kala pynsah umdum ia u paidbah ka thaiñ Maweit.Kumta ha kaba iadei bad katei ka bynta na ka liang jong ka HYC Maweit Circle kala dawa na kibor ba dei peit ia kitei ki tower jong ka Jio kompani ba kidei ban shimkhia bad ban pyntreikam noh mardor bad na ka liang jong ka Seng ka ai por ruh ia katei ka kompani tang 3 sngi ba kadei ban pyntreikam noh ia kitei ki tower lem kumta na ka liang jong ka Seng kan sa shim da kiwei pat ki sienjam kiba tyngeh.
title: 3 sngi, ai por ia ka Jio Company ha Maweit

content: Shillong:  Ki pulit ka jylla Meghalaya naduh ba sdang ka jing iakhih pyrshah ia ka Citizenship Amendment Act 2019 (CAA) ki la ioh ban kem haduh 16 ngut ki ba thaw jing klumar hapoh ka nongbah Shillong. Ka tnad pulit ka la ai mukotduma haduh 41 tylli hapoh ki kyndon ka Prevention of Damage to Public Property (PDPPA) bad ka Meghalaya Maintenance of Public Order Act (MMPOA).Kat kum ki kyndon jong ka MMPOA kino kino ki kynhun ki ba khot ia ki jing iakhih kin shah pynngat hapoh kine ki ain.Hapoh ka thanad Lumdiengjri ki pulit ki la mudui ejahar haduh phra tylli bad kem ar ngut kiba kynthup ia u Meban pynshngain Sun bad u Nelford Rymnai.Hapoh ka thanad Mawlai ki pulit ki la kem ia saw ngut ki ba kynthup ia u Rijied Dohtdong, Raymon Kharthangmaw, Aiborlang Shadap bad u Edelbert Rapsang.Ki pulit ki la mudui ejahar haduh 10 tylli ki case hapoh ka Sardar Thanad bad kem ruh ia 10 ngut ki nong pynklumar kiba kynthup ia u Wanshwa Sun, David Sawian, Hamshwa Laitphlang, Robert June Lyngkhoi, Wilborn Wahlang, Samson Bynnud, Mankupar Bakai, Mebanri Bynnud, Kontathumai Lyngdoh bad u Stowell Chyne.Nga shu kwh ong ba ngi ki paitbah ngin sa leh da kaba tyngeh… Wat lada ka poi sha ka umsnam rh ngim salia…. Tangban iada ia ka ri u lajong wat da u kpa u pulit ne da wan uei2 rh sa shu ia peit nangne shakhmat kan jia au….Lda ym don uba shohler ban ialam shakhmat2 bad lda ym don jngthmu ban ai ika hok bad kyrshan ia kba u paidbah  kwah…..wat ak hero namar jynjar kai ki kmie ki kpa plus ka shah hit ha pulit khasi hi.Yn nym don hi ruh uno2 u riew khasi ban ialeh pyrshah ia ki jngsniew bad lda don ruh yn nym don hi u ban trei hok tng ki riew die bad ki riew kjit suda…da ia puson bha ioh poi ruh…
title: Sdang kem bad pynngat mukotduma ki pulit ia ki nong iakhih CAA

content: Shillong: Ki jaid bynriew Marwari ki ba don ha Shillong, ki kyrshan ia ka jing dawa Inner Line Permit (ILP) hapoh ka jylla Meghalaya. Ki jaid bynriew Marwari ki ba don ha nongbah Shillong ki la pynpaw ka jing pyrshah ba jur ia ka Citizenship Amendment Act 2019 (CAA) bad dawa ba ka sorkar kmie ka dei ban pyntreikam mardor ia ka ILP hapoh u pud u sam ka jylla Meghalaya baroh kawei.Ha ka jing ialang ka ba long ha ka 18 tarik nohprah 2019 ki jaidbynriew Marwari ki la pynpaw ruh ba kin kyrshan tyngeh ia baroh ki sengbhalang ki ba dawa ILP hapoh ka jylla.Ki jaidbynriew Marwari la pynpaw ruh ba ki la ia im lang ba ki jaitbynriew jong ka jylla Meghalaya naduh u snem 1800 khlem kano kano ka jing ia kynnad hapdeng jong ki bad kane ka pynlong ia ki ba kin pyrshah jur ia ka CAA 2019 bad kyrshan tyngeh ia ka jing dawa ILP hapoh ka jylla.Ki jaidbynriew ki la dawa ruh na sorkar Meghalaya bad na baroh balang ba ki dei ban wanrah jing suk biang hapoh ka jylla khamtam ha ka ba dei bad ka tnad jngoh kai bad ka tnad khaii pateng hapoh ka jylla.
title: Kyrshan ILP ki Marwari

content: Shillong:  Myn hynnin ka sngi, katba dang iaid shakhmat ka ‘special session’ ha ing thaw ain ka jylla Meghalaya, lah ioh khubor ba shah ktah kti u nong ialam ka seng Hynniewtrep Youth Council (HYC) jong ka Mawlai Circle u Donbok Kharlyngdoh hapoh State Central Library Shillong.Kat kum ki khubor ba ioh lum katba U Donbok, u mut ban rung shapoh State Central Library ki la don kiba ia lum lang ha ka jingialang paidbah ka Khasi Student Union (KSU) bad ki briew bym ithuh, kiba la pyn sangeh ia ka kali ba u shong ba sdang ban ktah kti ia u.Ha kane ka jing jia u Donbok u la mynsaw na ka bynta jong ka khlieh bad ka kali jong u ruh ka la shah pyn julor malu mala.Nalor katne ka la don ruh ki khubor hamsaia ba u Robert Kharjahrin u ba dei President jong ka HYC ruh u la shah ktah kti, tangba ha ba kren ba ki lad pathai khubor kam dei satia kumta.
title: Shah ktah kti u nongialam HYC hajan State Central Library
