content: Shillong:  U MLA shimet ka Mawphlang u bah SK Sunn u la pynpaw hapoh ka iing dorbar ba ki paidbah ka Mawphlang ki kyrshan ban pyntreikam da ka Inner Line Permit (ILP) ha ka jylla Meghalaya ban tehlakam ia ka jingwan rung ki briew nabar jylla.Haba shim bynta ha ka jingtainia myn hynnin ka sngi hapoh ka dorbar kyrpang ka iing dorbar, u bah Sunn u la ong, “Khnang ban iada ia ki trai shnong na ka jingma na ka jingwan rung ki briew nabar, ki paidbah ka Mawphlang lem bad ki paidbah ka jylla, ki sngew ba ka jingdonkam ban pyntreikam noh da ka Inner Line Permit (ILP) ne ka Bengal Eastern Frontier Regulation 1873”.U bah Sunn u la ong ba ka jinglong jingman kaba don ha ri Bangladesh, ka long ka jingma ia ki briew ha kaba kin phet shnong noh namar ka jingkylla ka mariang ha ki snem ban wan. U MLA ka Mawphlang uba la sot na ki jingtip bad ki jingiathir na kylleng ki jaka ka pyrthei, u la ong ba katkum ka jingtip bad ka jingkhein jong ki stad, ka ri Bangladesh ka dei kawei kaba shah ktah bha na ka jingkylla ka mariang ha kaba kan tap ia ka khyndew bad ha kate ka por, ki briew kin hap ban phet shnong bad kaba ma ka long ba kin wan rung sha India ka ri kaba don markhap bad ka.U la ong ba na ka 4096 km ka khappud ka Bangladesh bad ka India, 2217 km ka don bad ka West Bengal, 856km ka don bad ka Tripura, 443km ka don bad ka Meghalaya, 262 ka don bad ka Assam bad 180 bad ka Mizoram.“Katkum ka jingkren uwei u stad u Karim, la antad ba kumba 50 millian ne 50 lak ngut ki briew na Bangladesh kin phet shnong na Bangladesh haduh ban poi u snem 2050 lada ka jingkiew ka duriaw kan iai bteng”, la ong u bah Sunn.U MLA ka Mawphlang u la ong ba ha u snem 2019, ka Bangladesh ka don 163.59 million ki nongshong shnong ha kaba tang ki Muslim ki don 89.50 percent kaba mut 146.42 million katba ki Hindu ki don 9.6 percent kata 15.70 million ngut bad kiwei ki jaitbynriew ki don 0.90 percent ne 1.47 million ngut.“Ka la donkam kyrkieh ia ka ain ban iada na ka jingwan rung ki briew nabar lym kumta ki rit paid ha kane ka jylla, kin shah tyllep ha kiwei ki jaitbynriew kiba heh paid”, la ong u MLA ka Mawphlang.
title: Ki paidbah ka Mawphlang  ki kyrshan ia ka ILP, ong u bah SK Sunn

content: Shillong: U nong iasaid ain hapoh ka Supreme Court ka ri India u bah Peter A Dohkrut u la kam ba ka jing kren ka MLA ka seng Congress ka Ampareen Lyngdoh halor ka PIL pyrshah ia ka CAA 2019 ka la pynduh mynsiem ia bun paidbah namar ba ka ong ba ka Supreme Court kam treh ban pyn sngew ia ki PIL pyrshah ia ka CAA hapoh ka Supreme Court.U Peter A Dohkrut u la ong ba ki la don haduh 60 tylli ki PIL ba la mudui pyrshah ia ka CAA 2019, bad ar tylli ki dei na ka jylla Meghalaya. U la ong ruh ba ka Supreme Court ka la pdiang ia ki PIL bad ka la dep phah kyrwoh ruh sha ka sorkar kmie ban jubab ia ki ha u kylla lyngkot 2020.U nong iasiad ain u la ong ba ka Suprem Court ka la buh ia ka tarik ban sngap ia kine ki PIL pyrshah CAA 2019 ha ka 22 tarik kyllalyngkot 2020.“Ka kong Ampareen kam don hok re ban kren pynduh mynsiem ia ki paidbah ki ba shaniah ia ki PIL ba la mudui hakhmat ka ing bishar ba khlieh duh ka ri, namar ka kong Ampareen ka khlem mudui PIL pyrshah ia ka CAA ha Supreme Court” u la bynrap.U Peter A Dohkrut u la kyntu ruh ia ka sorkar Meghalaya ban mudui da ka PIL pyrshah ia ka CAA 2019 namar ka la iaid lait ia ka riti shynshar ka ri India baroh kawei.
title: Kynthoh ki nongsaid ain ia ka jing  kren ka kong Ampareen, ia  ka  CAA

content: Shillong: Ka dorbar kyrpang ka ïing dorbar thaw ain ka jylla Meghalaya mynta ka sngi, kala mynjur bad pdiang da kawei ka sur da ka rai ban pyntreikam ia ka Inner Line Permit ne ka Bengal Eastern Frontier Regulation 1873 ha ka jylla Meghalaya baroh kawei bad dawa ruh ban pyllait pura ia ka Citizenship Amendment Act 2019.Ia kane ka rai ba la wanrah da u myntri rangbah ka jylla u Conrad K Sangma, la pdiang da baroh ki MLA naduh ka liangpyrshah bad liangpyrshah khlem don ba pyrshah.Shwa ban shim ia ka rai, la iathir ia kane ka mat haduh saw kynta eiei.Haba jubab ia ka jingiatai nia, u Conrad ula ong ba kane ka rai kaba shim da ka ïing dorbar kam donkam ban pas da ka Parliament hynrei ka donkam tang ban shu pynbna da u president ka ri ba kan treikam ha ka jylla Meghalaya.U Conrad ula ong ba kala don ka jingiakren ia ka Meghalaya  Residents Safety and Security Act (MRSSA) ban pyntreikam noh mardor da kaba kynthah ba ka sorkar kam leh eiei.“Nga kwah ban pyntip ba kane ka ain kala long ain ha u snem 2016 bad ha u snem 2018, ka sorkar kala shim ia ki lad ki lynti bad, ka jingong ba ka sorkar kam leh eiei kam dei kaba shisha. Kane ka sorkar kala thaw ia ka Task Force bad hadien kane, la shim ia ki lad ki lynti ban pyniaid ia ka kam bad kawei ka dei ka jingeh ban ioh jaka ban tei ia ki jingdonkam bad kane ka sorkar kala lah ban sdang ia ka kam ha Ri Bhoi, Umkiang, ha Bajengdoba, ha Mendipathar ka steshin rel ka kam ka la iaid 80 percent, ki kam  kiba dei ki jaka ba bunkam ne bun kiba rung ba mih kila iaid. Kane ka sorkar kam shong kli kti”, la ong u Conrad.U myntri rangbah ula ong ba kumba 90 percent ki dkhot ka ïing ki kmen ban shim rai halor ka ILP hynrei ki don ba pynpaw ka jingarattien bad kane ka dei ka jingkren ibein ia ki paidbah ba kwah ILP.Haba kynthah ia ka sorkar Congress kaba rim ka bym sngap ia ka sur u paidbah ba dawa ILP, u Conrad u la ong, “Haba ka sorkar pdeng mynshwa ka weng ia ka Meghalaya na ka ILP, balei ki sorkar barim ki sngap bad balei ki sorkar ha ki snem ba la dep, kim leh eiei haba ki paidbah ki dawa ILP bad mynta pat kila dawa ILP bad ki kdew kti ia ngi mynta namar ba ngi sngap ia ka sur u paidbah bad kane ka long kaba bakla. Ka ILP ka dei ban iada ia ngi bad kito kiba ong ba kam lah ban iada, kan dei ka jingbein ia kiba dawa ILP”, la ong u Conrad.Ula ong ba haba sdang ban iakhun ia kane ia ka jylla, kam don ka jingpynlait ia ka Meghalaya na ka CAA bad mynta la pyllait tang 97 percent bad ka sorkar ka dang iakhun ban pyllait pura ia ka jylla.“Haba la pyllait ia ka CAA tang ia ki jaka ba hap ha schedule area kumba 97 percent, ngi dang iakhun ban ioh pura bad ngin pynthikna ba um don uwei ruh ban ioh nongshong shnong namar ka CAA”, la ong u Conrad.Haba jubab halor ka jingkren ka Agatha K Sangma ba kyrshan ia ka CAB, u Conrad ula ther ba kito kiba pynrem kim sngap bha ia ka jingkren naduh ba sdang haduh ba kut.“Ka MP Tura ka la ong ba ka khublei ia ka sorkar pdeng kaba la shah shkor ia ka jingpynsngew jong ki  nongialam na ka dong mihngi, ha kaba ka la dawa ruh ban pyllait ia ka CAB na baroh ka jylla Meghalaya bad ka dong mihng”, la ong u Conrad.U la ong ba dei na ka jingiakhih ki nongialam ka dong mihngi, ba ka sorkar pdeng kala shah shkor hynrei kam mut ban shong noh bad ka sorkar kan dang iakhun.“Mynta ka sorkar ka dang iakhun ban dawa da ka ILP bad ka rai mynta ka la dawa ILP bad ban pyndam da ka CAA.  Ngi la sdang na u zero bad ngi jop 97 percent bad ngin bteng ban iakhun ban ioh pura”, la ong u myntri rangbah.Ula ong ba don kiba wohnia balei u myntri rangbah ka Meghalaya um kren pyrshah ia ka CAB kumba leh ka myntri rangbah ka West Bengal. “Don kiba kylli balei u CM Meghalaya um kren, hynrei ka daw ka long namar ba u CM ka Meghalaya ula dep kren naduh mynno shwa ba kiwei kin kren bad ngin iai bteng ban kren”.Ha kaba iadei kiba aplai ban ioh nongshong shnong na ka CAA, ki don tang 3 tylli kiba pan ha ka jylla hynrei kine kim long ain namar ba hangne ha Meghalaya la pyllait.“Kane ka rai ia ka ILP, la dei ban leh naduh mynshwa. Kane ka rai ia ka ILP, kam donkam ban pass da ka Parliament hynrei tang ka jingpynbna na u president ka ri India. Nga kyrmen ba ngi ieng na ka bynta 30 lak ki nongshong shnong ka jylla, ka sorkar kan pdiang ia ka rai”, la ong u Conrad.
title: Tang ka jingpynbna u President ka la biang ban treikam ka ILP, ong u Conrad

content: Imphal: U Biren Singh, myntri rangbah ka Manipur, u iathuh ba ka ain  Inner Line Permit (ILP) kaba pura, kan trei kam naduh ka 1tarik Kyllalyngkot 2020 ha ka Jylla Manipur baroh  kawei.U Singh, u iathuh hynnin ka sngi, ha haduh mynta ka ain ILP kam pat trei kam pura satia, wat la ka la mih ha ka gazette jong ka tnat kam poh iing ka sorkar India.Ka sorkar Jylla, ka la jied ia phra tylli ki ktem ban khanglad ia ka jingrung ki briew kiba nabar bad kitei ki kynthup ia ka  Moreh, Mao, Jiribam bad ka  Bir Tikendrajit International Airport.
title: Wan u snem thymmai, trei kam pura ka ILP ha Manipur

content: Shillong: Da ki hajar ngut ki paidbah  na kylleng ka Ri  Khasi Jaintia ha ryngkat bad ki sengbhalang kiba kynthup ia ka Khasi Student Union,Federation of  Khasi Jaintia Garo People,Ri Bhoi Youth Federation, Hynniewtrep National Youth Front ki la pynlong ia ka jingialang paidbah ha State Central Library bad kumjuh ka COMSO ka la pynlong ia ka jingia lang paidbah ha Mawbynna (IGP) ha kaba ki lawan ban ap naduh dang step ban sngap ia ka rai jong ki 60 ngut ki MLA ban pass ia ka resolution halor ban pyntrei kam  ia ka  ILP ha ka jylla.Hadien ka jingrai ban pdiang jong ki 60 ngut ki MLA ban pyntrei kam noh ia ka ILP ha ka jylla Meghalaya, na ka liang ki paidbah ki la pynpaw iaka jing kmen da kaba ong ba ka long ka kum kawei ka rai ban sah jing kynmaw ha ka history jong ka jylla Meghalaya ba hadien ka jingialeh kaba da ki phew phew snem, na ka liang ka Sorkar jylla ka la rai ban pyntrei kam noh ia ka ILP ha ka Jylla.Kane ka jingpdiang jong ki 60 ngut ki MLA ia ka ILP ha ingdorbar ba kyrpang  ka long tang kawei ka sienjam sha ka jingjop bad ka jingjop ba shisha kan long ha ka sngi ba ka sorkar Pdeng kan pynlong ain ia ka ILP  ha ka jylla Meghalaya.Na ka liang ki seng bhalang baroh ki labuh ia ka jingdawa na ka Sorkar pdeng ka dei ban pdiang bad pyntrei kam mardor ia ka ILP  ha ka jylla Meghalaya.
title: Pynpaw jingkmen ki paidbah, hadien ka rai jong ka iing dorbar ia ka ILP

content: Lucknow: Ka la don ka jing ia pyni bor hapdeng ki pulit jong ka nongbah Lucknow pyrshah ia ki nongiakhih pyrshah CAA bad katei ka mih hadien ba ka la don ka jingshah thang jong bun tylli ki kali, kiba don hajan ka Police Station bad kumjuh ia ka Police Station, kaba don ha katei ka jaka, ha ka jing iaid pyrshah ia ka ain  Citizenship (Amendment) Act mynta ka sngi.U heh duh jong ki pulit, U  OP Singh,u iathuh ba ki pulit, ki hap ban siat da ka lyer pynsat khmat ban pynpra ia ki paidbah ha  Madeyganj bad nangta la kem ruh ia 20ngut ki briew na katei ka jingjia.Kiwei ki lad khubor, ki iathuh ba U Ajay Kumar Lallu, President jong ka seng Congress ha Uttar Pradesh, ula shah kem, katba u dang ialam a ka jingiaid paidbah ha  Parivartan Chowk, kaba don hajan ka ophis U District Magistrate.
title: Shah thang bun ki kali bad ka Police Station, ha kiba pyrshah  CAA

content: Shillong: Ka dorbar Jylla mynta ka sngi, ka la mynjur da kawei ka jingmut ban dawa na ka sorkar India, ba kan pyntrei kam ia ka  inner line permit lane ka  kaba hap ha ki ain jong ka Eastern Bengal Frontier Regulation, 1873.Baroh 60ngut ki MLA na ka liang synshar bad ka liang pyrshah, ki la ia mynjur lang kawei ban pdiang ia katei ka mat, kaba u myntri rangbah, u kam ba ka dei ka sngi kaba khraw tam ha ka histori jong ka Jylla.Kham mynshwa ka liang pyrshah, ka la wan rah ia ka mat jing bym shaniah shuh ia kane ka sorkar, hynrei U Bah Metbah Lyngdoh, u lamphang dorbar Jylla, ula kyntait ban ailad ia katei ka jing ia tainia. La phah ia katei ka mat jing bym shaniah shuh ia ka sorkar, ba la soi da U Bah Himalaya Shangpliang, Bah George B Lyngdoh bad U Zenith M Sangma, ha kaba la aiti sha ka ophis u lamphang dorbar Jylla, ha ka por 9.30 mynta mynstep.Shu pynbang tangka ktien tharai khnang ba kin jai jai ki paitbah,ka kam te ym poi shaei shaei ruh.Balei hap da ioh jingmynjur na ka sorkar india?? shu pyntreikam beit by order na u chief minister lah long ka kam,ym dei ban ap ia ka jingmynjur jong ka sorkar india,da ap ia ka sorkar india te shimpor sa shiphew snem….
title: Mynjur ka dorbar Jylla, ban dawa ia ka ILP na ka sorkar India

content: Shillong: Ki kynhun jong ki sengbha lang ki ba kynthup ia ka KSU FKJGP HNYF bad RBYF mynta ka sngi, ki la lum lang ia ki paidbah ha State central library ban ap ia ka rai jong ka sorkar Jylla, ban pdiang ia ka Inner Line Permit  ha ka ingdorbar ba kyrpang kaba dang iaid ha ka jing ia tainia haduh ka por ba thoh ia kane ka khubor.
title: Lumlang ki sengbha lang ha State central library ban ap ia ka rai jong ka dorbar Jylla

content: Shillong: Mynta ka sngi, ki dukan na Motphran sha Khyndailad ki khang lut bad la sngewthuh ba ka jingkhang kitei ki dukan, ka dei katba ka dang iaid ka dorbar Jylla.Ym shym la tip satia ia ka daw jong ka jingkhang kitei ki dukan, hynrei la sngewthuh ba kin sa plie biang shibit, ynda la wai ka dorbar Jylla, kaba dei ban iakren halor ka mat jong ka inner line permit (ilp).
title: Khang lut ki dukan na Motphran sha Khyndailad

content: Shillong:  U MLA ka Congress na Mawsynram u  bah Himalaya M Shangpliang  ula ong ba ka Congress kan ther tyngeh ia kane ka sorkar MDA ban kyrsiew thiah na ka bynta ki jingma ba ap ia ka jylla.Haba kren ha ka jingialang pyrshah Citizenship Amendment Act (CAA) 2019 ba pynlong ka Congress ha State Central Library, Shillong mynta ka sngi, u bah Hima ula ong “Lashai ngin leit dorbar bad sa peit ha tv ia kaei kaba jia ha ing dorbar. Ngin ther lashai ban dawa ba dei ban buh ka jingdawa ILP, ka MRSSA nalor ki ain ba kham pyrkhing shuh ban khang lad ia ki mynder khnang ba uwei u mynder um dei ban ioh iuh kjat ha ka jylla bad ban pyrshah ia ka CAA. Ngin kyrsiew thiah ia kane ka sorkar lashai ha ing dorbar”.U la ong ba ha ka 11 tarik Nohprah 2019, ka  MP ka NPP na Tura kala mynjur ban kyrshan ia ka bad baroh shi miet um ioh thiah shuh, kumno ki shet kylla ia ki paidbah ka jylla namar hangne ki pyrshah CAB, sha Delhi ka kyrshan.U la ong ba u myntri rangbah u Conrad K Sangma ula ialam ia baroh ki sengbhalang, ki party ha kaba u Dr Mukul Sangma ruh ula soi ban nym pdiang ia ka CAB hynrei ka MP marwei na Tura ka kyrshan bad kumta ka la shet ia ki paidbah ka jylla.U Amit Shah ula pynap 2 sngi ia u myntri rangbah ban iakynduh ia u bad ula khot iakynduh ruh 12 shiteng synia ia u myntri rangbah bad ki nongialam ka jylla, um burom satia ia ki.“Ka jingong jong u ban lehkmen Khrismas shwa bad sa wan biang, ka dei ka jingkhein khynnah ia ki nongialam jong ngi”, la ong u bah Hima bad ula bynrap, “Ngi donkam baroh ar tylli ki ain ka ILP bad MRSSA”.Haba pynpaw ia ka jingsngew syier ia ka thain khappud bad ka jylla na ka jingwan rung ki mynder, u bah Hima ula ong ba ha Mawsynram ki briew na shiliang khappud na Bangladesh, ki la shongshit ba ki la ong ba sa tang katno kin sa wan sha ki lum Khasi.“Nga kum u MLA ngam nym shah ia kane.  Ki jaka khappud bad ka Assam ruh dei ban pynbeit mardor ban khang lad ia ka jingwan buhai shnong na ka CAA bad kin sa kiew sha rilum Khasi jong ngi”, ula ong.Ha kawei ka liang ka kong Ampareen Lyngdoh ka MLA ka Congress na East Shillong, ka la kynther ia kiwei ki party da kaba ong, “Mynta ynda la poi hapdeng ha duriaw, sa wad daw ban kynnoh ia kiwei, ynda la taplup ka umsaw phi nang nud ban kdew ia ka kti sha kawei ka party ba itai bym kwah ILP balei rai tang ma ngi ki Congress. Ka la kup ka juk jong ka jingbym don jingtip, ka Meghalaya ka dei kaba bun kiba la tip kiba la stad, iano ngin kynnoh”.Katba u working president ka MPCC u bah James Lyngdoh, ula pynbna ia ki rai ka Congress ban kit ha ïing dorbar lashai kiba kynthup ba ka Congress kan iai pyrshah ia ka CAA, kaba ar ka dei ban pyntreikam ia ka MRSSA, kaba lai ka dei ka ILP, kaba saw ban pynbeit ia u pud u sam bad ka Assam bad kaba san ka long baroh dei ban pynngat lut ha ka schedule area baroh ki jaka ha ka jylla.
title: U Amit Shah u pynap ar sngi, ia u myntri rangbah bad u khot ruh shiteng synnia, yn ther ki MLA Congress, ia ka sorkar halor ka CAA, ILP

content: Shillong:  Ka Synjuk Ki Rangbah Kur, ka la thoh  sha u myntri kam poh ing ka ri India u Amit Shah ban pyntreikam ia ka ILP ha baroh ki jaka ka Meghalaya bad ban pyn kylla ia ka Sixth Schedule.Ka Synjuk Ki Rangbah Kur ha ka jing ialang jong ka Executive Committee ha ka 12 tarik u nohprah ka la ia mynjur ban dawa na ka sorkar kmie ban pyntreikam ia ka Inner Line Permit (ILP) ha baroh u pud u sam jong ka jylla Meghalaya. Nalor ka ILP ka Synjuk Ki Rangbah Kur ka la thoh ruh sha u myntri kam poh ing ka ri India u Amit Shah ban dawa ba dei ban pyn kylla noh ia ka ‘Sixth Schedule’ hapoh ka jylla.Ha ka shithi ba la soi da u General Secretary ka  Synjuk Ki Rangbah Kur u bah Aristotle Lyngdoh ka seng ka la pynpaw sha ka sorkar kmie ia ka jing ma ka jaidbynriew ka jylla lada ka CAA 2019 ka long ain hapoh ka jylla Meghalaya. Ka seng ka la dawn a ka sorkar kmie ban pyntreikam mardor ia ka ILP hapoh ka jylla Meghalaya.Haba dei ban pynkylla ia ka ‘Sixth Schedule’ ka seng ka dawa na ka sorkar kmie ban pynrung noh ia ka jaka kiba hap hapoh ka ‘Municipality’ sha ka ‘Sixth Scheduled’ lyngba ka kyndon ‘paragraph 20’ kaba don hapoh ka ‘Sixth Scheduled’.
title: Thoh ka Synjuk  ki Rangbah Kur sha U Amit

content: Nongstoiñ:  Ki paidbah nong shong shnong ka thaiñ Nongstoiñ naduh ki khynnah ki samla ki longkmie longkpa da ka jingsngewkhia kila ia mih paidbah myn hynnin ka sngi ka 18 tarik u Nohprah ban wan iashim bynta ha ka jingiaid rali, kaba jai jai bala khot pynlong da ka Confederation of Meghalaya Social Organisation (CoMSO) West Khasi Hills District, kum ka dak ban pyrshah jur ia ka CAB kaba la long mynta kum ka CAA bad ban dawa pyntreikam noh ia ka ILP hapoh ka Jylla.Ia katei ka rali la sdang na Nondeiñ bad iaid ter ter shaduh sha Ïew Nongstoiñ bad ha katei ka jingiaid rally ki paidbah ha ryngkat ki Sengbhalang bapher bapher jong ka District, kila ia pyrta jam ba dei ban pyntreikam noh mardor ia ka ILP hapoh ka jylla ha ryngkat ki jingiarah ia ki placard kiba la thoh pynrem ia ka jingpynlong aiñ ia ka CAB kaba la long mynta ka CAA.Shuh shuh ia katei ka rali la pynkut hapoh Ïew Nongstoiñ da kaba ki Sengbhalang kiba hap hapoh ka lama jong ka CoMSo kila ioh ruh ban pynlong ia ka jingialang paidbah ha khmat jong ka Ïew Nongstoiñ ha ryngkat ka jingiadonlang u Chairman ka CoMSO u bah Robert June Kharjahrin bad kiwei de ki nongialam Sengbhalang na ka WKHD kiba don ha ka lama jong ka CoMSO.U Chairman ka CoMSO u bah Robert June Kharjahrin haba ai jingkren ha katei ka jingialang u la ong ba ka Jaitbynriew jong ngi kam shymla dei ka Jaitbynriew kaba pyndem bad kam shymla dei ka Jaitbynriew kaba shah rem thma wat ha ka sorkar phareng lada ym don u para don para snam u bas het kylla.“U Tirot Sing bad Kiang Nongbah yn nym ioh kem lada ym shet kylla hi ki trai ri bad trai muluk, ka sorkar Bharat haduh da iap kam shymla ioh kem satia ia u Syiem Khynnah ka Hima Nongstoiñ u Wickliffe Syiem bad kane ka pynpaw ba ka Ri bad ka Jaitbynriew ka dang eh daw kumta kadei ka kamram jong ngi ka pateng ba mynta ban rai ia ka pateng ban sakha la ngin pyndem tdong ne ngim ialeh na ka bynta ka shong suk shong saiñ ka pateng ka ban sa kha” ong u bah Robert June Kharjahrin.Ka ILP ka kren shai ba uno uno u bar Jylla um lah ban shu rung katba mon sha ka Ri ka jong ngi khlem da ioh jingbit bad u la ong ruh ba ka Hima Nongstoiñ kala don lypa ia ka aiñ kaba long kum ka ILP kaba kren shai ruh da kaba ong “No dkhar shall settle in a territory of Nongstoiñ without the permission of the Syiem” bad kane kala don lypa hapoh ka Hima Nongstoiñ bad kaba dang donkam mynta ka long ban warah ia kaba kum kane ka aiñ ha baroh kawei ka Jylla kata da ka ILP.Shuh shuh u tei u nongialam ba rangbah duh ka CoMSO u la pynpaw ruh ba ym don shuh ia kano kano ka jingartatien ban ioh ia ka ILP ha kane ka kynti kaba mynta namar ba la jan baroh 60 ngut ki nongmih khmat ka Jylla ki la kyrshan ia ka jingdawa ILP bad wat ka Congress hapoh ka jingialam jong u Mukul Sangma kaba la kyntait mardor ia ka ILP mynshwa mynta pat kala sngewdei ban kyrshan na ka bynta ka jingdawa ban pyntreikam noh ia ka ILP hapoh ka Jylla.“Lada ka sorkar India ka burom ia ka Manipur tang ar sngi ka pyntreikam ia ka ILP kumta kadei ban leh kumjuh ia ka Meghalaya bad lada ka sorkar India ka kyntait ban ai ia ka ILP kaba mut ma ka hi kaba la kyntait noh ia ngi shabar na ka Ri India, lada kiwei ki Jylla hapoh ka Ri India kidon ia ka hok ban iada ia lade ma ngi ruh ngi don ia kajuh ka hok namar ngim dei ki second class citizen ha ka Ri India” la ong biang u bah Robert June da kaba u la bynrap ruh ba ka jingdawa ILP kamdei ba shun ia kita ki nongwan jngohkai pyrthei hynrei kadei ban iada ia hok nongkynti ia ka shynshar khadar da lade.
title: Sawa jam ka sur dawa ILP ha Nongstoiñ

content: Nongpoh:U Ma Vincent H. Pala, MP ka Shillong Seat, myn hynnin ka sngi u la wan ban iashimbynta ha ka Tamasa Ri Kunai la Tynrai, ka Tamasa kaba la pynlong da ka Nongtluh Eri Farmer Association (NEFA) hapoh ka shnong Umden, Ri Bhoi.Katei ka Tamasa kaba la pynlong da ka NEFA, ka dei halor ka nongrim kaba ki kwah ban pynpaw paidbah ia ka Riti dustur kaba la don da ki shnong kiba don hapoh jong katei ka Raid Nongtluh.Lyngba jong katei ka sngi, la iohi shisha ba katei ka Tamasa, ka la long kaba shongshit bad kaba ishongkun, namar la jan baroh na ki shnong kiba don ha katei ka Raid ki la wan ban iashimbynta, da kaba pyni paidbah ia la ki jinglong tynrai, kata naduh ha ka Rwai ka Siaw, ka put ka tem, ka shad ka mastieh lem bad kiwei kiwei ki rukum kaba la leh da u mynbarim.Khyndiat haba kren halor katei ka Tamasa, u Ma Vincent H. Pala, u la pynpaw ia ka jingkmen ban iohi halor ka jingshimkhia da ki nongialam ka NEFA ban pynlong ia katei ka Tamasa, kaba long ruh kum shibynta ban pynneh pynsah ia la ki riti dustur bad kaba long ruh kum ka jingnang pynskhem ba ka Jaidbynriew ka dang im bad kaba dang don ia la ki riti dustur.Namarkata, u la kyntu ia kitei ki nongialam ka NEFA ba kin iai pynlong ia kiba kum kitei ki Tamasa manla u snem, khnang ba ki paidbah na ki shnong bapher bapher kin nanglah shuh shuh ban pyni ia ki riti dustur bad ban pynneh ia la ka jinglong tynrai.Kiba la donlang ha katei ka sngi, ki kynthup naduh u Bah Mayraldborn Syiem, MLA ka Nongpoh, u Bah Balajied Ranee, MDC ka Nongpoh, ki ophisar sorkar, ki nongialam Raid, ki rangbah shnong, ki nongkitkam ka NEFA lem bad ki paidbah na ki shnong kiba hap hapoh ka Raid Nongtluh.
title: Shimbynta shitrhem ki shnong ka Raid Nongtluh ha ka  Tamasa Ri Kunai la Tynrai

content: Shillong: Mynta ka sngi dang step phyrngap ka seng Khasi Student Union (KSU) lem bad ka Federation of Khasi Jaintia and Garo People (FKJGP) ka Hynniewtrep National Youth Front (HNYF) bad ka Ri-Bhoi Youth Front (RBYF) kin leit pahara hajan ka ing thaw ain ka jylla Megha laya ka ba don ha Rilbong.Ha ka kyrwoh ba la pynmih da u General Secretary ka KSU, ki saw seng ki la iawer ruh ia baroh ki paidbah ki ba don ka jing kit khlieh na ka bynta ban ioh ia ka Inner Line Permit ha poh ka jylla ban ia snoh kti lem bad ki seng ban ia ap paitbah ha bar ka ing dorbar ka jylla.Kumba shu pynkynmaw ha ka 13 tarik Nohprah, ki saw seng ki ba kynthup ia ka KSU, FKJGP,HNYF bad RBYF ki la dawa na ka sorkar Megha laya ban khot noh da ka ‘dorbar ba kyrpang’ ban shim ia ka ‘resolution’ ban dawa ILP hapoh ka jylla.
title: Yn pahara ki sengbhalang mynta ka sngi ha khmat dorbar Jylla

content: Shillong:Ka kynhun United Democratic Alliance (UDA) kan leit iakynduh ia u Lat ka jylla, u RN Ravi ban dawa thaw ia ka Executive Committee (EC) ha KHADC hadien ba kane ka kynhun kala don 16 ngut ki MDC da ka jingwan iasoh sa ka kong Grace Mary Kharpuri. Ka KHADC ka don 29 ngut ki MDC bad ka UDA ka don 16 katba ka UDF ka don sa tang 13 ngut.“Ka UDA kala don mynta 16 ngut ki MDC hadien ka jingwan pyniasoh ka Kong Grace Mary Kharpuri, shen ngin leit ban iakynduh ia u Lat ka jylla bad iaka sorkar jylla ban leit kam ba ngi lah don iaka jingbun paid ban thaw noh iaka EC” ong u Bah Teinwell Dkhar mynta ka sngi.Ka UDA ka la pdiang sngewbha ruh ia ka Kong Grace Mary Kharpuri sha ka kynhun UDA mynta ka sngi.U bah Teinwel u la ong, naduh ba ka EC jong ka UDA ka la khyllem bad sah sa tang 14 ngut ki MDC hynrei mynta kane ka kynhun kala kiew sha ka 16 ngut da ka jingwan kyrshan jong u MDC Congress na Mairang u Bah Batskhem Ryntathiang bad ka MDC khlem seng na Nongshken ka Kong Grace.Ka UDA mynta ka don 16 ngut ki MDC katba ka kynhun United Democratic Front (UDF) kaba la ialam da u Bah Latiplang Kharkongor kum u CEM mynta ka la don sa tang 13 ngut ki MDC.Ha kawei ka liang, ka Kong Grace Kharpuri kala ong, ba ka jingleit kyrshan ka jongka iaka UDA kadei halor ka nongrim ba ka UDF kam don shuh iaka jingbun paid bad hadien ba la dkoh lut ki kam ki jam ha ka Council bad bun ki paidbah kila ud iaka jingbym treikam jong ka Council bad kum ka nongmihkhmat kala shim iaka rai ban ai jingkyrshan noh iaka UDA.“Wat la ka UDF kala phah iaka kyrteng jong nga kum ka Deputy CEM hynrei haba nga kyrshan iaka UDA kam don eiei sha lyndet bad ngam shym la dawa eiei na ka bynta ka jingmyntoi shimet namar ba ka Council ka don hapdeng ka saw ka sian khamtam haba ki kam ki jam kila sahkut lut kumta nga la leit ban kyrshan iaka UDA ba kan ioh thaw iaka EC khnang ba kan lah ban bteng ban ai ka jingshakri ia u paidbah” ong ka Kong Grace.Halor ka jingsaphriang ki khubor ba u MDC khlem seng ka Nongkrem ula mih noh na ka kynhun UDA bad leit pyniasoh sha ka UDF, na ka liang u Bah Lambor Malngiang u la ong, “Haduh mynta nga don beit bad ka kynhun UDA bad kam long kaba shisha ba nga la mih noh na ka UDA ban leit pyniasoh bad ka kynhun UDF”.
title: Yn dawa thaw EC ka UDA na u  Lat ba kiew jingbun paid 16 ngut

content: Ka kyrwoh jing pynshai na U Bah Ardent Basaiawmoit –Katkum ka jinglum jingtip jong ki lad pathai khubor kaba ki la ioh na ka jingkren jong u Chief Minister bad u Deputy Chief Minister ha kaba iadei bad ka ILP, ha kaba ki la pynpaw ia ka jingkyrshan jong ki ia ka ILP bad kaba kham sngewphylla shuh shuh ka long ba ki la kubur ia kaei kaba la pynpaw da u Ardent Basaiawmoit ha  ki katto katne sngi ba ia ka ILP la lah ban pyntreikam tang da ka jingpynbna (NOTIFICATION) jong ka sorkar jylla, hynrei ha kane ka kynti kaba mynta kumba la pynpaw da u Prestone Tynsong ha ki lad  pathai khubor ba ka jingpynbna kaba khatduh ba la pynmih da ka sorkar kmie ha kaba iadei bad ka ILP ka long 11 tarik Nohprah 2019.Kaba long ba ha shuwa jong kane ka tarik tang da ka jingpynbna ka ban pynmih da ka sorkar jylla ka la long ban pyntrikam ia ka ILP, hynrei mynta ka kynti pat ym lah shuh ban leh ei ei khlem ka jingai jingmynjur na ka sorkar kmie.Kumta ka jingkylli mynta ka long ba naduh mynno ba ka sorkar jylla kam lah shuh ban pyntreikam ia ka ILP tang da ka notification, bad kaei ka daw ba ka sorkar jylla kam lah shuh ban pyntreikam ia ka ILP tang da ka notification. “Ki dang don shibun ki jingkylli ba yn dang pynbud hadien ba la ioh pdiang ia ki juab jong kitei ki jingkylli ba la buh haneng”.
title: Ia ka ILP, lah ban pyntrei kam tang da ka jing pynbna

content: Nongpoh: Ha ka jingialang paidbah kaba la khot pynlong da ka Ri Bhoi Youth Federation (RBYF) ha Umsning, ki la don da ki hajar ngut ki paidbah na ki shnong bapher bapher ha Ri Bhoi, ki la iamih paidbah na ka bynta ban pynpaw ia ka jingpyrshah jur halor ka jingpyn treikam jubor ka sorkar BJP ia ka Citizenship Amendment Act 2019, bad lyngba jong katei ka jingialang paidbah la iohsngew ia ka sur jong ka jingsawa jam ka jingdawa ILP hapoh ka jylla.Ha katei ka jingialang paidbah kaba la pynlong da ka RBYF, la sakhi da ka jingdon ki nongialam ba hakhmat jong saw tylli ki kynhun sengbhalang hapoh ka jylla, kaba kynthup ia ka KSU, FKJGP bad HNYF, kiba la ioh ruh ban kren bad pynshai paidbah halor ka jingma kaba ap ia ka jaidbynriew Khasi, na ka jingpyntrei kam ia katei CAA bad kiba la pynshai paidbah ba ka jylla ka la donkam ban iohnoh ia ka ILP, ka ban long kum ka stieh ka ban iada ia ka jaidbynriew rit paidbah.Ki nongialam sengbhalang kiba la don ha katei ka sngi, ki kynthup ia u Bah Welbirth Rani, President ka FKJGP, u Bah Donald V. Thabah, General Secretary ka KSU, u Bah Scan Rini, Vice President ka HNYF, u Bah Bipul Thangkhiew, President ka RBYF lem bad kiwei pat ki nongialam sengbhalang na ki District.Haba shim kyllum ia ka jingkren jong kitei ki nongialam seng, la iohsngew ia ka sur jingpynrem bad ther tyngeh halor ka jingleh donbor ka sorkar pdeng, namar ba ki la pynlong Ain jubor ia ka CAA wat hapdeng ka jingpyrshah kaba jur na ki paidbah kiba dei ki riewlum bad kiba don ha ki jylla shatei lam mihngi, ha kaba ki la ong ruh ba ka sorkar pdeng ka dei ban sngewthuh bad kam dei ban lehkai bad ka Jaidbynriew.Nalor ka jingpynrem ia ka sorkar pdeng, kitei ki nongialam sengbhalang, ki la ther tyngeh ruh pyrshah ia ka sorkar MDA ba la lam khmat da ka NPP bad ruh ia ka sorkar barim kaba la laiam da ka Congress, namar ba ki la dep ban lehkai ia ka kam iap kam im jong ka jaid bynriew. Ha kaba ha kine ki snem ba la leit kim ju pyrkhat ia ka jaidbynriew pynpaw dei tad haba la poi kaba kum kane ka khep, ki sa mih bad ban pynpaw ia ka mynsiem ieid jaidbynriew, kaba long ruh tang kum ka dak ban pynbiej ia ki paidbah.Shuh shuh ki la pynpaw ruh, ba kum ki nongialam sengbhalang, kim shem la kmen ia kata ka Special Session, kaba ki party bapher bapher ki la rai ban shong kyrpang kaba long ruh kum ka rai halor ka jingdawa ILP na ka sorkar pdeng.Na ka sur kaba la mih na katei ka jingialang, la iohsngew ba ha kane ka kynti kaba mynta, ki la shim ia ka sienjam kaba kham tyngeh bad kata ka long ban iai dawa na ka sorkar ba ka dei ban pyntreikam noh ia ka ILP, ha kaba kum ki nongialam seng, ki la shim ruh ia ka rai ba lada jia kumno kumno, ki sa mih madan biang wat lada poi sha kaba ia um-snam ne wat ban shah set ha ka phatok, kata na ka bynta ban dawa na bynta ka Hok jong ka Jaidbynriew.Ha kaba khadduh eh, kitei ki nongialam seng, ki la kyntu ia ki paidbah ba kin ai ka jingkyrshan lang ha kaba kum kane ka por, ba ka jaidbynriew ka don ha ka saw ka sian.
title: Sawa jam ka sur jingdawa ILP, na ka  jingialang paidbah ki saw Seng ka Umsning

content: Washington: U President Donald Trump jong ka America, ula shah weng noh na ka bor jongu bad ka daw ka long namar ba u la pynjah burom ia ka shuki President jongu, u khanglad ia ki jingtrei kam jong ka seng Congress bad ba um treh ban ia treilang bad ka jingtohkit jong ka kynhun ki nongmihkhmat jong ka iing dorbar (Congress), ba la ialam da ka kynhun Democrats bad mynta kaba sah ka long sa tang ba kan rai ka Senate, na ka bynta kaba sah ba un hap ban iehnoh ia ka jinglong President jongu.La pynhap shuki ia U Trump, da ka vote kaba 230 lane 197, ha kaba kiba bun ki dkhot kiba don ha ka Congress, ki dei kiba na ka liang jong ka Democrats.Mynta U Trump, un hap ban sha bishar sa ha ka Senate, kaba kiba bun bah ki dkhot ki dei na ka liang jong ka seng Republican bad la khmih lynti ba kitei kin lah ban iarap ban pynneh ia ka shuki jongu.Ka don ka jingkynnoh ba U Trump, ula phah ia u briew, uba na Ukraine, ba un tohkit ia ka jinglong jingim bad ka jingtrei kam jong U Joe Biden, uba dei u nongialam ka Democrats bad u ban ia khun pyrshah ia u, ha u snem 2020.
title: Weng ka iing dorbar jong ka America ia U Trump kum U President

content: Shillong: U nongialam ka liangpyrshah jong ka Congress u Dr Mukul Sangma u la ong ba pynksan nia ia kito kiba kylli balei u la kylla ka nongrim halor ka Inner Line Permit (ILP) mynta haba um ju kwah mynshwa, da kaba ong, ba ka jinglong jingman ka la kylla mynta.Haba kren ha ka jingialang ba la pynlong ka Congress ha phyllaw ka State Central Library, Shillong mynta ka sngi, u Dr Mukul u la ong ba ka jingwanrah ka BJP ban shu thombor ban pynlong ain ia ka Citizenship Amendment Act (CAA) 2019, ka la pynlong ia ka jinglong jingman ban donkam da ka ILP ha ka jylla nalor kiwei ki ain ba kham khlain shuh.“Ka jinglong jingman ka la kylla ha kaba ngi donkam da ka ILP bad ka Meghalaya Resident Safety and Security Act (MRSSA) 2019 bad sa kiwei ki ain ba kham khlain. Ha ki snem ba la dep, ngi la thaw ia ka ain ban iada ia ki briew jong ngi, ka MRSSA bad kane ka dei namar ba ngi sngewthuh ia ka jingeh jong ki paidbah ba ki iakynduh”, u la ong.U Dr. Mukul u la ong biang, “Don kiba kylli, balei phi kylla ka nongrim, kam dei ka jingkylla u Dr Mukul Sangma hynrei ka dei ka rai lang ka Congress bad kiwei kiba don ha kato ka por ban wanrah da ka MRSSA. Ha kato ka por, ym don CAA. Ka jingwan ka CAA kaba ai nongshong shnong ia kiba nabar ri, ka donkam ia ka ILP”.Kane ka jingkren jong u Dr Mukul ka long hadien ba mynshwa ha ka por ba u long myntri rangbah ma u, ba jur bha ka jingdawa ia ka ILP, u ala kyntait mardor ban pdiang.U la ong ba ka Meghalaya ka don khappud ba jrong bha bad ka Bangladesh, kiba loi loi bha ban ioh rung ki briew nabar. “Namar ka jingkylla ka por, ngi la donkam ban thaw lad thymmai bad ka Congress ka donkam da ka ILP katkum ka jingdonkam ka jingkylla, nalor ka MRSSA”, u la ong.U la ong ba kam mut pat ba shisien ba la ioh ILP, ban pdiang ia ka CAA hynrei ka party kan iai bteng ban pyrshah ia ka CAA ba dei ban pyndam shi syndon.“Ka Meghalaya ka don khappud bad ka Assam ha kaba ki don ki jaka bym pat iapynbeit bad dei ban pynbeit noh namar ba kiwei ki lah ban shim kabu ban rung na kine ki jaka.U la kynthah ia ka NPP da kaba ong ba ka la shet ia ki paidbah ka jylla ha kaba ka MP jongka, ka Agatha K Sangma ka la kyrshan ia ka CAB ha ka por ba kren ha parliament.“Ka NPP ka la shet ia ki paidbah ka jylla. Wat ianujor ia ka NPP bad ka Congress, ne ia u Dr Mukul bad ki paralok . ngi dei kiba iapher na kiwei”, u la ong bad bynrap, “Mynta namar ba la tlot ka Congress, ioh leh mon ka BJP hynrei ki paidbah ki dei ban sngewthuh ba ka Congress ka dei kaba donkam ha ka ri.U la ong ba ka Congress ka ieng ban iada ia baroh ki jaitbynriew ha kane ka ri naduh kiba rit haduh kiba heh paid kumjuh.  Hynrei mynta ka jingwan ka BJP, ka la long ka jingma ia ka ri. U la ong ba ka BJP kiwei ki paralok ki pyrshang ban ong ba kane ka CAA kam nym ktah bad ka jingpdiang ka NPP ka pynlong ia ki briew na Delhi da kaba mut dur ba ki paidbah ka Meghalaya ki kyrshan ia ka CAA.U la ong haba baroh kawei ka jylla ka pynmih kawei ka sur ban pyrshah ia ka CAA, ka NPP ka shet kylla ha kaba la shim da ka rai da kaba iasoi baroh ki sengbhalang, ki party ban pyrshah ia ka CAB hynrei mynta kynsan kynsan haba ka NPP ka kyrshan ia ka CAB ba kan long ain. Kane ka dei ka jingshet kylla ia ka jylla bad ia ki paidbah.
title: Ka jinglong jingman ka kylla, ban donkam da ka ILP, ong u Dr Mukul

content: New Delhi: U Nitin Gadkari, myntri ka sorkar India, ula kynthoh mynta ka sngi, da kaba ong balei ba kam donkam ban don noh tang kawei ka Ri ia ki Hindu.Haba kyrshan tyngeh, halor ka ain  Citizenship Amendment Act, U Gadkari, u ong ba kam don wat tang kawei ruh ka ri, na bynta ki Hindu.“Kam don wat tang kawei ruh ka ri ia ki Hindu. Kham mynshwa ka Nepal, ka dei ka ri jong ki Hindu, hynrei mynta kam don kawei ruh ka ri na bynta ki Hindu, kumta shaei ba ki Hindu bad ki Sikh kin leit? Na bynta ki Muslim, ki don bun bah ki Ri Muslim bad ki lah ban leit long nongshong shnong bad ki liang pyrshah, ki thmu ban ialam bakla ia ki paidbah” ong U Gadkari.“Ngim shym pyrshah satia ia ki Muslim, kiba don ha kane ka Ri. Ki don ki seng sain pyrthei, kiba wan rah ia katei ka jingpyntieng koh tympang ia ki rit paid. Nga pyn thikna iaphi, ba kane ka sorkar kam don satia ia ka jingmut ban niew bein iano iano” ong u myntri ka tnat  Road Transport and Highways.Nà ki jingkren jong u la shài kdar ba ka sorkarBJP ka kwàh bàn pynkylla hindu ia ka ri india lyngba ka CAA.ka pyni ba kim burom satia ia kiwei pat ki niam bad ñiew bein ia Ri khasi jong ngiKane baroh ka dei na LA daw ka jing shynshar ka sorkar congress kaba wan rah jingeh iaki ngi mnta kaei pat kaba pynlong namar ngi ki khasi ngim ju pyrkhat arsien ngi pyrkhat beit tng ialade ka mntoi shimet ngi biej pisa palat na Kata ka daw ka wan jingeh pat ia ngi menta ngi dei ban kyndit bynriew noh lem kumta Ngi ki jait bnriew khasi khamtam ngin sa duh jait shi shyn don kynmaw para ri ngin nymdei ban biej pisa shuh
title: Balei ba ym bit ban don tang kawei ka ri ia ki Hindu,ong U Gadkari

content: Shillong: Kum shi bynta ban pynpaw ia ka dak ban pynpaw ia ka jingpyrshah Citizenship Amendment Act 2019 mynta ka sngi ki  long kmie jong ka jylla ki la pynlong ia ka jingialang paidbah hajan ka YMCA Mawkhar ha kaba u paidbah  u la wan ban ia shim bynta ha kane ka jingialang paidbah.Ha ka jingkren ha ka ne ka sngi ka kong D Tongper president jong ka seng STIEH, kala kynnoh ha kane ka jingialang paidbah da kaba ong “Dei tang ka Ri India kaba la pynshitom bein ia ki trai shnong na ka bynta ki bar Ri, ka Ri India kadei ka ri kaba lehbein ia ki nongshong shnong tang ban pynsngewbha ia kiba na bar,katkum ka CAA, 2019 ka long ban ai jingiada ia kito kiba la shah leh bein ha Bangladesh, Pakistan, Afghanistan, hato ka sorkar ka lah ne em ban ai ia ka jingkhein haduh katno kila shah leh bein ha kitei ki ri. Lada ka lah ban ai ka long ban ia nujor ia ka jingshah leh bein jong ki bad ka jingshah ban bein ki rit paid ha kane ka Ri India, lane kane ka jingleh ka long ban pynkylla ia ka Ri India kawei ka Ri, kawei ka jaidbynriew,Ka sorkar pdeng ka dei ban burom ia ki rit paid kiba la don ha ka Ri India, lada ki briew ki poi tang ar lane lai lak kan long ka jingeh kaba briew ha ka liang ka bam ka dih, kumta ka kyntu ia ki paidbah ban ia shnot kti lang ban dawa na ka sorkar pdeng ba kan pynduh noh ia ka CAA, 2019.”Ka la ong ba dei ban dawa ban pyntrei kam ia ka Inner Line Permit ha kane ka jylla na ka bynta ban ia da ia ka jaidbyriew, lada yn don jingiada ka CAA,2019 kan da pynduh jaid. Ki seng bhalang shynrang ki la ialeh ban dawa ia ka ILP, lada ym lah ban iada ka pateng ban weng kan sa kylli aiu.Ka sorkar pdeng lada ka kwah ban pyntrei kam ia ka CAA, 2019 pynlait ia ka North East rah ia ki sha kiwei ki bynta jong ka jong Ri India, lada ka sorkar pdeng ka dang khein ia ki rit paid jong ka North East ka dei ban sngap ia ka jingdawa jong ki paidbah kane ka thain shatei lam mih ngi jong ka Ri India.Kiwei kiba la kren ha kane ka jingialang ki long ka kong, ka kong Kilin Sohshang, ka kong Philistita Majaw, ia ka jingialang la sdang da ka jingduwai na ka kong Kilin Sohsang  bad la pynwai ruh da ka jingialang da ka jingduwai na ka kong Baiamon Nongbet ia ka jingialang la pyniaid da ka kong Agens Sohnoh.
title: Mih ki longkmie ban pyrshah CAA bad dawa ILP

content: Ki Hindu kiba don ha Pakistan, ki la kyntait ban pdiang ia ka  Citizenship Amendment Act (CAA), 2019 bad ki kren shai ba kim mon satia ban kylla poiwir ialade, halor ka jing tyrwa jong ka India.Kitei ki nong Pakistan, ki pynrem jur ia katei ka ain, kaba leh shiliang khmat ia ki Muslim.  Ka khubor ka iathuh ba U Dileep Kumar, uba dei u Hindu, uba na Pakistan, u kam ba ka ain na India, ka dei kaba long pyrshah ia ka jingsngew niam bad ka jingsngew briew lane ka  Sanatana dharma.Ka kyntien Sanatana dharma, ka dei ka kyntien kaba ju pyndonkam ha kaba aiti ha ki kam niam jong ki hindu, khlem da niew ia ka jinglong iapher jait bynriew.
title: Kyntait ki hindu ka Pakistan, ban pdiang ia ka CAA jong ka India

content: Shillong: Ka Khasi Student Union mynta ka sngi ka la kynmaw burom ia ka lyngkhuh sngi iap kaba 79 snem jong u myllung Soso Tham ha State Central Library.Ha ba ai jing kren ha kane ka sngi na ka liang u President ka KSU u bah Lambokstarwell Marngar, u la ong wat la u myllung Soso Tham u la khlad na kane ka pyrthei hynrei ki kyntien bad ki symboh phyrkhat ki ba u la ai iangi kin dang iaid kyrsoi ha ki pateng jong ngi, u la long kum uwei na ki nonghikai u nongthoh bad u la noh synniang shibun ia ka Ri bad ka jait bynriew.“Kum ka jait bynriew ngi long kiba donbok ba ngi la sei ia ki nongialam ki ba ratbah la ka long ha kano kano ka bynta.Lada ngi pule ia ka jingnoh synniang jong u myllung Soso Tham kalong ka ba kit jing mut haba phi ngam jylliew ia ki kyntien jong u.”U la ong ruh ba na ka bynta ka Khasi Student Union ki kyntien jong u Myllung Soso Tham ki long kum ki kyntien pyrsad  mynsiem ia ka seng bad ia ka Ri bad ka jait bynriew.U la ong ruh ba ka jing angnud jong ngi kum ki jait bynriew ka long ban ioh ban pynrung ia ka ktien Khasi ha ka khyrnit ba phra jong ka kot riti trei kam jong ka sorkar India,wat la na ka liang ka ladep dpiang ia ka rai ha ka ingdorbar jong ka jylla hynrei haduh mynta ka dang sah ha ka umdum,na ka liang jong ngi, ngi dawa ia ka sorkar Jylla ba kan iaibuddien ban pynurlong ia ki jing kwah jong ngi ki jait bynriew.
title: Kynmaw ka KSU ia ka lyngkhuh sngi iap ba 79 snem jong u myllung Soso Tham

content: Bah RM ShabongWat la ki kynhun jong ka jait bynriew hynniewtrep, ki don ha ka jing ia kad bun phew liang ha kine ki sngi, hynrei ka don ka jing kyrmen ba kim klet pat ia ki phang kiba don ha khmat duh jong ka jaitbynriew ha kine ki sngi bad kata ka long ba ki pyrshah ia ka CAA bad ba ki dawa ia ka ILP.Haba ka long kumta, ka paw, ba kim iapher hi na ka jingdon jong ki seng sain pyrthei jong ka Congress, UDP, NPP bad kiwei, hynrei  ki ia dawa lang ia kajuh ka mat, ha khmat ka sorkar India ha kine ki sngi.Tang kawei kaba i don jing kyrmen ka long ba ha kine ki sngi, la imat, kumba halor kane ka mat CAB, ba ka pyn ia tylli lang ia kiba bah ki sengbhalang jong ka thain shatei lam mihngi bad ka jing iakhun jong ki, kam dei halor ka bhah bhah jam, halor u pud u sam, halor ka niam ka rukom, hynrei ki ieng halor ka mat kaba dei bad ka jing pynneh ia ka jinglong kyrpang jong ka thain shatei lam mihngi.Ka dei ruh hangne kein ba ka Assam, kan sngewthuh ba lada ka thombor ia ka jing jai jai lane ka jingtieng eit jong ka Meghalaya, hynrei ka jingeh, ka long ba ma ki pat, kin nang shah thombor ha kiwei pat ki bor kiba kham khlain, kumba leh ka sorkar BJP ha kine ki sngi bad ki dak ki kdew, kumba ka jingma ka kham jur ia ka Assam, ha kaba sdang, wat la kan ktah bad kan ia bit lem bad kiwei de ki Jylla jong ka thain shatei lam mihngi.Na kiei kiba paw, lah ruh ban ong namarkata ba u paidlang jong ka Assam, um don ka jingthmu ban ia shrut bad u paidlang jong ka Ri Khasi Jaintia, hynrei ka pynpaw shai ba kine ki briew, ynda haba ki  la kylla long ki nongmihkhmat paidbah lane ki riew sain pyrthei, ba ka jingmut jongki, ka kylla bishni pihuin bad ka don ka jingthmu ban khniot bor ia ki nong Meghalaya, lyngba shibun ki buit bad ki kam poh jait bapher.Ki jingshisha ki kdew ha kine ki sngi, ba lada ka Assam, ka dei makna ka jylla kaba heh tam jong ka thain shatei lam mihngi, hynrei kam pat ioh ia ka jing ithuh jong u paidlang ka ri thor, namar ba ka don tang 14ngut ki MP sha Lok Sabbha bad kumta ka dei ka kamram jong katei ka Jylla, ba kan nym niew bein ne khein dewthala ia ki Jylla rit jong ka dong shatei lam mihngi; hynrei ka la dei ban ialam ha khmat ban pyni da ki kam ia ka jinglong shi para jong ki hynniew tylli ki jylla bad ban kren ia kajuh ka sur, ka ban pynsmiej ia ki nongialam ka Delhi, ba kin khein troin ia ka dong shatei lam mihngi.
title: Ka jing ia tylli ka  Dong shatei Mihngi

content: Shillong: U myntri rangbah ka jylla u Conrad K Sangma u la ong ba ka sorkar Meghalaya Democratic Alliance (MDA) ka skhem beit triang bad kam don kano kano ka jingsyn jor kumba la kam da ka Congress.“Ki MLA ka MDA ki iatylli, ngi kut jingmut ban pyndep ia ki kam ba shah na ka bynta ka jylla bad ia ki paidbah. Kam don eiei ka jingkhih baroh ki paralok ka MDA ki skhem beit triang”, la ong u Conrad.Hynnin ka sngi, ka Congress ka la kwah ban pynkhyllem ia ka sorkar MDA da kaba leit tyrwa myntri rangbah ia ka UDP hynrei la sngewthuh ba ka jingthmu ia mynta, kam lah ban urlong naba ka UDP kam don kano kano ka jingkhih halor kane.Ha kawei ka liang, u myntri rangbah u la ong ba ka jingkhang ia ka internet ka la wanrah ka jingbitar bad ka jingthnum ia ki paidbah hynrei ka sorkar ka hap ban pynthi kna ia ka shong suk shong saiñ namar ba haba kut hi, ka shong suk shong saiñ ka dei kaba donkam tam.“Ka jingkhang internet ka long ban pynneh ia ka shong suk shong saiñ ha ka jylla, wat la ka la wanrah ka jingeh ia ki paidbah hynrei ka sorkar ka hap ban peit ia ka jingiaid beit ka ain ka kanun”, la ong u Conrad.U la ong ba kampher ki paidbah ne kino kino ki lah ban kren ia ka sorkar kumno kumno hynrei ka sorkar ka hap ban pynthikna ba ka shongsuk shongsaiñ ka dei ban neh skhem.
title: Ki paralok MDA ki iatylli,  ym don jingsynjor, ong u Conrad

content: Shillong:  Ka District Magistrate, East Khasi Hills District, ka pyntip ba lashai ka sngi, la nang pynjynsur ia ka korphiw na ka bynta 14 kynta bad katei kan sdang naduh ka por 6baje mynstep haduh ka por 8baje mynmiet.Ka korphiw kan trei kam biang naduh ka por 8baje mynmiet bad haduh ban da pyntip da kumwei pat.
title: 14 kynta, pynjynsur  korphiw  mynta ka sngi

content: Shillong: U myntri rangbah ka jylla u Conrad K Sangma myn hynnin ka sngi u la ong ba ka jing khang ia ka ‘internet’ ka dei ban teh lakam na ka jing mih ki jing klumar hapoh ka jylla.“Nga tip ki paidbah ki shem jing jar bha namar ka jing thut ka ‘internet’ tangba nga kyrpad ia baroh ba kidei ban long kiba iashah shipor” u la bynrap.U myntri rangbah u la ong ruh ba lyngba ka jing khang ia ka internet ka la iarap shibun khamtam ia ki pulit ban teh lakam ia ki jing thmu jong ki nong shim kabu ban thaw jing klumar hapoh ka jylla.U Conrad K Sangma u la ong ruh ba ki pulit ki lah leh katba lah ban pynjem ban ki nong iakhih da ka ba kiar ban pyndonkam da ka bor ha ba dei ban pyn jai jai ia ki jing iakhih. U la ong ruh ba ki don ki nong iakhih ki ba la mynsaw hynrei kam don pat ka jing duh mynsiem briew namar ka jing kiar ki pulit ban pyn donkam bor bah pyrshah ia ki nong ia khih.“ Ki briew ki lah ong kynthoh katba mon ia ka jing leh ka sorkar tangba ka jing khang internet kadei ban khang lad ban jia kano kano ka jing sngew sih ia ki ba ia khih” u la pynkut.
title: Khang internet ban khang na ki jing kulmar

content: Guwahati: Ka jing khang ia ka ‘internet’ hapoh ka jylla Assam mynta ka lah jyndon shitaiew tam. Ka sorkar Assam ka lah pynduh ia internet naduh ka 11 tarik nohprah 2019 hadien ba mih ka jing ia khih pyrshah ia ka Citizenship Amendment Act 2019 (CAA).Mynta ka sngi ka Gauhati High Court ka la phah hukum ia ka sorkar Assam ban pyllait biang ia ka ‘internet’ sha ki paidbah. Kane ka hukum na ka High Court ka lah wan hadien ba ka Court ka la pynsngew ia saw tylli ki mukotduma pyrshah ia ka sorkar Assam ba la wanrah da u Ajit Kumar Bhuyan u Bonoshri Gogoi bad kiwei kiwei de.Ka sorkar Assam ka la ong ba ka jing pynduh ia ka ‘internet’ ka dei halor ka nongrim ban khanglad ia kino kino ki nong shim kabu ban saphriang khubor lamler ba thmu ban wanrah ka jing klumar hapoh ka jylla baroh kawei. K la ong ruh ba ka jing pynduh iaka ‘internet’ ka pynsuk ia ka sorkar ban tehlakam ia ki jing klumar ba mih hapoh ka jylla.Ia ka hukum ban pynlong biang ka internet la pynmih da ki saw ngut ki nong bishar ka Guwahati High Court kiba kynthup ia u Chief Justice Ajay Lamba bad u Justice Achintya Malla Bujorbarua.
title: Hukum ka High  Court ban pyllait internet ha Assam

content: Shillong: Ka MDC na ka Nongshken konstituency ba khlem seng ka Kong Grace Kharpuri mynta ka sngi ka lah wan pyn ia snoh ialade sha ka United Democratic Alliance (UDA) ba lamkhmat da u bah Teinwel Dkhar.Lyngba ka jing wan snoh jong ka kong Grace Kharpuri mynta ka UDA ka la don 16 ngut ki MDC ha ka ïing kaba 29 ngut katba ka United Democratic Forum (UDF), ka la duna paid sha ka 13 ngut kynthup ia u chairman u bah P. N Syiem.Kumba shu pynkynmaw ha 6 tarik nohprah u Congress MDC na Mairang u bah Batskhem Ryntathiang u lah leit ban pyn iasnoh ialade sha ka UDA.
title: Pyniasoh ka MDC Nongshken,  sha ka kynhun UDA ha KHADC

content: Guwahati: U myntri ka pla pisa jong ka sorkar Assam u Himanta Biswa Sarma mynta ka sngi u la ong ba ka la don ka jing thmu ban thang ia ka ‘Assam Secretariat’ ha ka 10 tarik nohprah 2019 ha ka por ba jur bha ka jing iakhih pyrshah ia ka Citizenship Amendment Act 2019.U Himanta Biswa Sarma u la ong ba ia kane ka kam lah thmu da ki runar kiba dei ruh ki ‘urban Naxals’ na ka seng Popular Front of India (PFI).U myntri u la kam ba ka sorkar Assam ka lah ioh sakhi lyngba ki tiar ‘electronic’ ba ki dei ki briew jong ka PFI kiba dei ki nong ialam seng Congress barim. U la ong ruh ba ka sorkar kan kyntu ia ka National Investigating Agency (NIA) ban tohkit halor ka jing shah pynpra ki jing don jing em jong ka sorkar Assam.Na ka liang u myntri u la pynpaw ba un sah thoh sha ka NIA bad ka CBI ban phah briew ban tohkit halor ka jing mih jing klumar hapoh ka jylla baroh kawei.
title: Don ka jingthmu ban thang ia ka  Assam Secreteriat, ha ka 10tarik

content: Shillong:  Ka Federation of Khasi States ka la ai dorkhas ha u Conrad K Sangma, myntri rangbah ka Jylla, mynta ka sngi bad ha katei ka dorkhas, la  kyntu ia ka Sorkar MDA ban shim khia ban ia kren halor ka Instrument of Accession bad Annexed Agreement 17 tarik Nailar 1948.U myntri rangbah, u la kular ban khot kyrpang ia ki Khlieh Nongsynshar ban ia kren halor kane ka phang.Lah ban pynkyn maw ba ka FKS ki la phah ia ka dorkhast ban pyn kynmaw ia ka jingthoh kham mynshwa halor ka ILP kumjuh ruh ka kyntu ban ioh ka jingiada kaba kyrpang ha ka Article ha ka ban pynpaw shai ia ki hok jong ka jaidbynriew Khasi namar ka IOA & AA ka khang ia ki Ain Ri India ba kin shu trei khlem da mynjur shuwa ki Hima Khasi States bad ba kan wanrah ia ka jingsuk ha ka synshar khadar hapoh ka jylla khamtam hapoh ka Ri Khasi.Ha ka jingiakynduh bad u CM la don lang u Paiem PM Syiemlieh, Syiem Hima Nongkhlaw & Adviser FKS, u Paiem KM Syiemlieh, President, FKS, u Bah H L Ryntathiang, Lyngdoh Hima Lyngiong, & General Secretary, FKS,  u Bah W Syiem, Sirdar Hima Nongpoh, Joint Secretary, FKS, u Bah John F Kharshiing, Adviser & Spokesperson, FKS.
title: Yn iakren IOA ka sorkar Jylla bad ki khlieh nongsynshar

content: Shillong:  Ka Khasi Author’s Society ka la thoh sha u myntri kam pohing ban daw pyntreikam da ka Inner Line Permit (ILP) ha Meghalaya.Ka KAS hadien ka jing ialang jong ka Executive Committee myn hynnin ka sngi, ka lah phah da ka shithi sha u myntri kam poh ing ka ri India u Amit Shah ban dawa ba dei ban pyntreikam da ka ILP hapoh ka jylla Meghalaya khnang ba ka CAA 2019 kan nym lah ban treikam hapoh ka jylla.Ka KAS ka lah pynpaw ruh ba ka jing mih ki jing klumar hapoh ka jylla baroh kawei kadei namar ki briew ka jylla kim pdiang satai ia ka CAA 2019. Lyngba ka shithi sha u myntri kam poh ing ka KAS ka pynpaw ba lada ka CAA ka long ain ha Meghalaya kan sah buh jing ma ia ka jing long rit paid u Khasis and the Garos hapoh ka jylla Meghalaya. Ka KAS ka lah pynpaw ruh ba mynshwa ka shnong Jaintiapur ba shong da ki Khasi kadei ruh ka nongbah Hima Jaintia tangba mynta pat ka lah shah knieh noh bad ka Bangladesh.Ha ka shithi ka KAS ka lah pynpaw ba ka kyrshan ia baroh ki sengbhalang ne ki seng sain pyrthei ban pyrshah jur ia ka CAA 2019, bad ban dawa ba dei ban pyntreikam noh da ka ILP kum ba pyntreikam hapoh ka jylla Manipur.Ka KAS ka lah thoh ruh sha u myntri rangbah ka jylla Meghalaya u Conrad K Sangma ban dawa na ka sorkar ba kadei ban shim ka rai ban dawa na ka sorkar kmie ban pyntreikam noh ia ka ILP hapoh ka jylla Meghalaya baroh kawei.
title: Dawa ILP  sa ka KAS

content: (Da U M.M.Thaiang)Jowai:  Ia ka Iingmane bathymmai ha Raliang, Mowkyndeng Parish, Elaka u Doloi Raliang, kaba la bei tyngka da ka kong Bilet Tariang, kaba la kot ka jinglut sha 2 klur shiteng la plie hi da ka kong Bilet Tariang bad la kyrkhu da ka Umkhuid Umkyntang da u Most.Rev. Victor Lyngdoh DD, Bishop ka Jowai Diocese, ha kaba la wan ban sakhi lang ia kane ka jingplie ia kane ka Iingmane da u bah Garod LNS Dykes Deputy Commissioner ka West Jaintia Hills District, bah F.M.Dopth, Deputy Commissioner East Jaintia Hills District, bah Comingone Ymbon MLA ka thain, Doloi Chawas Lyngdoh, Doloi Elaka Raliang,bah Robinus Syngkon MDC ka thain, bah Saron Paswet MDC Jowai South, kong R. Manner Additional District Magistrate, ki Phadar, ki Sister, ki riewkhmat ka Elaka Raliang kiba la shah khot sngewbha bad da ki spahngut ki riewngeit napoh ka Parish Mowkyndeng bad nabar.Ka kong Bilet Tariang ha ka jingkren plie jong ka ia kane ka Iingmane kaba la bei tyngka hi da ka, ka pynpaw ia ka jingsngewnguh ia U Blei ba kum ka riewngeit haba ka la ioh ia ka jingkyrkhu kyrdoh na U Blei, ka ong kaei kaba ka lah ban leh eiei na ka bynta ka burom jong U Blei bad ka la rai ban teinoh da ka Iingmane bad ka la tei ia kane ka Iingmane ha ka jinglut kaba la kot sha ka 2 klur shiteng bad la pynkyntang ia kane ka Iingmane ha ka Dohnud bakhuid tam jong u Trai Jisu.Ha ka juh ka por ka ainguh ia u Blei bad sngewnguh Uba la plie lad ia ka bad ia ki Nongtrei kiba la lah ban pyndep tei ia ka ha ka por kaba biang ia kaba la kyrkhu mynta ka sngi da u Most.Rev. Victor Lyngdoh Bishop ka Jowai Diocese.Hadien ka jingplie bad kyrkhu ia kane ka Iingmane Dewbilat kaba heh bad kaba itynnat, la pynlong ia ka jingknia Mass Iukharist, kaba long shibynta ka jingknia ainguh ia U Blei ba lyngba ka jingsbun mynsiem jong ka kong Bilet Tariang la lah ban ioh ia kane ka Iingmane kaba long kawei na ki Iingmane kaba heh bad kaba itynnat hapoh ka Parish Mowkyndeng. Ia ka jingknia Mass bakhuid la lamkhmat da u Most.Rev. Victor Lyngdoh ha ryngkat ka jingsynran lang u Phadar Hilarius Lamare Vicar General ka Jowai Diocese, Phadar Devasia u Parish Priest ba mynshwa ka Parish Mowkyndeng bad ki Phadar ka Parish Mowkyndeng.U Bishop Victor Lyngdoh haba kren ha kane ka sngi, u la kren halor ka phangpdeng “Ka jingkylla kaba mut kum ka jingpynkhreh kynmaw burom ia ka jingwan longbriew U Trai Jisu sha kane ka pyrthei ha kane ka 25 tarik Nohprah ia kaba la kham iatip ka jingrakhe Khristmas.”Ha ka sneng ka kraw u Bishop Victor, u ong, ha ka longbriew manbriew,ki briew baroh ki bymdap bymbiang ha ka jingim, kiba dap da ka lait ka let ka tam ka duna,la katta ruh lyngba kane ka jingpynkhreh ia ka sngi Khristmas, ngi dei ban phai sha U Blei bad kylla kaba mut na ka jinglong barim sha ka jinglong ba thymmai, naba tang kiba khuid ka mynsiem bad ka dohnud kiba lah ban iohi ia U Blei bad pdiang ia U Khrist hala ka mynsiem lyngba kane ka jingpynkhreh ia ka sngi Khristmas.
title: Plie bad kyrkhu iingmane thymmai ha Raliang

content: Shillong:  U myntri rangbah ka jylla u Conrad K Sangma myn hynnin ka sngi u la iathuh ba ka sorkar Meghalaya ka la ioh lum haduh 445 klur na ka jing die ia u dewiong ba la dep tih lypa.Kumba shu pynkyn maw ka National Green Tribunal (NGT) ha u snem 2014 ka la khang ban tih dewiong hapoh u pud u sam jong ka jylla meghalaya.Naduh ba la khang ban tih dewiong, ka Supreme Court ka lah shah ia ka sorkar Meghalaya ban die ia u dewiong u ba kot palat ka 32 metric tons.“Ka sorkar Megha laya lyngba ka Meghalaya Environment Protection and Restoration Funds (MEPRF) ka lum haduh 445 crore tyngka na ka jing die ia u dewiong” u la bynrap.U Myntri rangbah ka jylla u la ong ruh ba kumba 100 klur ka sorkar ka hap ban siew sha ka Central Pollution Control Board kumba la btah ka Supreme Court.Kumba shu pynkynmaw ka supreme court ka ri India ha ka 2 tarik Naitung 2019 ka la btah ia ka sorkar Meghalaya ban siew 100 crore tyngka namar ka sorkar Meghalaya kam lah ban teh lakam ia ka jing tih dewiong tuh naduh ba la khang da ka NGT ha u snem 2014.Khlem pat ioh jing pynshai ka sorkar Meghalaya halor ka jing thmu shong thait noh u B. P KatakeyU myntri rangbah ka jylla u Conrad K Sangma mynta ka sngi u la kam ba ka sorkar Meghalaya ka khlem pat ioh jing pynshai lyngba ki jing thoh halor ka jing thmu shong thait noh u Chairman jong ka komiti ba la thung da ka National Green Tribunal (NGT) ban peit ia ka jing shalan ia u dewiong ba la dep tih lypa ha ka jylla.“Na ka liang ka sorkar Meghalaya ngi khlem pat ioh jing thoh ei ei na u B. P Katakey ia ka jing thmu shong thait jong u na ka ‘committee’ “ la bynrap u Conrad Sangma.Kumba shu kynmaw ha ka 1 tarik nohprah u B. P Katakey u la kubur ba un thoh sha ka supreme court ka ri India ba ka weng noh ia u kum u Chairman jong ka Komiti.
title: Iohlum ka sorkar Jylla, haduh 445 klur  na ka jing die ia u dewiong ba la dep tih

content: Shillong: U Bah Prestone Tynsong, myntri rangbah ba ar, ula ther kylla myn hynnin ka sngi, ia u nong ialam liang pyrshah ka sorkar Meghalaya u Dr. Mukul Sangma halor ka jing kynnoh ba ka sorkar Meghalaya kam ban tehlakam ia ki jing klumar ki ba mih na ka daw ka jing pyrshah ia ka Citizenship Amendment Act 2019 (CAA).Kumba shu pynkynmaw u Dr. Mukul Sangma ha ka 15 tarik nohprah u la ther ia ka sorkar Meghalaya da ka ba kynnoh ba ka kam lah ban tehlakam ia ki jing klumar nakatakadaw ka sorkar Meghalaya ka pynjari syndon da ka korphiw bad pynduh ia ka ‘internet’.Na ka liang u symbud mynri ka sorkar Meghalaya u Prestone Tynsong u la ong ba u Dr. Mukul Sangma u dei ban kynmaw ba ki paidbah ka jylla kim pat klet ia ki jing duh noh jong ki khyndai ngut ki mynsiem ha ka por ba ia khih MBOSE.“Kadei namar ka jing bym ler ka sorkar ha ka por u Dr. Mukul Sangma ba haduh khyndai ngut ki mynsiem ki lah shu duh ei ia ki mynsiem na ka jing siat pathar ki pulit ha Williamnagar bad Tura” la bynrap u bah Prestone Tynsong.U bah Prestone Tynsong u la ong ruh ba ka sorkar Meghalaya ha ka jing ialam u myntri rangbah ka jylla u Conrad K Sangma ka lah leh kat ba lah ban pyn jai jai ia ki jing iakhih halor ki mat bapher bapher, bad kam pat ju don ka jing duh ei ki mynsiem ne mynsaw jur na ka liang ki nong iakhih ne ki pulit.
title: 9ngut ki mynsiem, ki la shu duh ei  ha ka por U Dr Mukul: Prestone

content: Shillong: U Myntri Rangbah ka jylla u Conrad K Sangma u la ong ba ka sorkar ka la dep ban pyntip hakhmat u myntri kam pohiing ka ri u Amit Shah, ba kan iaid shakhmat ban shim da ka rai ba ka Inner Line Permit (ILP) ne ka Bengal Eastern Frontier Regulation Act 1873, dei ban pyntreikam ha ka jylla Meghalaya.Haba kren sha ki lad pathai khubor mynta ka sngi hadien ba la synran ha ka jingbam smai u Lat thymmai ha Raj Bhavan, u Conrad u la ong, “Ngi la ong ha u Amit Shah ba ngin shim da ka rai ba ka ILP dei ban pyntreikam ha ka jylla”.U la ong ba ka jingiaksaid ka sorkar halor kane ka don ka jingkyrmen ban poi ha ka thong. “Baroh ki jingiaksaid ki la ioh ia ka jingjubab kaba don jingkyrmen. Ka dorbar ka long ban shim rai ban kyntu ia ka sorkar pdeng ban pyntreikam ia ka ILP”, u la ong.Ka sorkar jylla ka la khot dorbar kyrpang ha ka 19 tarik Nohprah 2019 ban shim da ka rai ban kyntu ia ka sorkar pdeng ba kan pyntreikam noh da ka ILP ha ka jylla Meghalaya.Halor ka jingkam u bah Ardent M Basaiawmoit u MLA barim ba ka ILP kam donkam ban shim da ka rai bad tang ka jingpynbna na ka sorkar ka la treikam ha ka Khasi bad Jaintia, u Conrad u la ong, “Ia ka jingpyntreikam ILP, la pynshong nongrim katkum ka Ktien Lamphang (Preamble) ka Bengal Eastern Frontier Regulation Act 1873 ne ka ILP. Ka Preamble la pynkylla da u President bad dang shen, la pynkylla ha 11 tarik Nohprah 2019 ha kaba iadei bad ka Manipur bad kam don ka jingkynthup lang ia ka Meghalaya bad ka Meghalaya ka don tang ha ka por mynshwa”.
title: Ngi la pyntip ha u Amit Shah ba ngin iaid shakhmat ban shim rai da ka ILP: Conrad

content: Shillong: U R.N. Ravi  u Lat ka jylla Nagaland u la bam smai mynta ka sngi ban peit lang kum u Lat ka Meghalaya.Ia u R.N. Ravi la pynbam smai da u chief justice ka Meghalaya u Muhammed Rafiq ha Raj Bhavan mynta ka sngi.U Ravi un peit lang ia ka Meghalaya hadien ba u Lat Tathagata Roy, ula shim shuti shwa.Haba pyrshang ban iakren, na ka liang u Lat thymmai, um treh satia ban kren sha ki lad pathai khubor.Ki sengbhalang bad ki seng saiñ pyrthei ha ka jylla, kila dawa ba dei ban weng noh shi syndon ia u Tathagata kum u Lat ka jylla hadien ba u la pynmih ia ka jingkynthoh ha ka tweeter ba kito kiba sngew pyrshah ne bym iahap jingmut ban pdiang ia ka Citizenship Amendment Act 2019, ki dei ban leit sha North Korea.
title: Bam smai u Ravi kum u Lat thymmai ka jylla

content: Shillong:  Ka Shillong Lajong ka la pynliem ia ka Druma Sandruma  da 1-11 kol ha ka jingiakahun ka kylla baar ka semi phainal ka Meghalaya State League (MSL) ba long ha Resubelpara mynta ka sngi. Da kane ka jingjop, ka Lajong ka la rung sha ka phainal ka lympung MSL 2019.Ka Shillong Lajong ka la pynliem ha ka semi phainal ka kylla ba nyngkong da  10-1 ia ka Druma.Ia ka kol ba nyngkong ka Lajong la thep da u Samuel Lyngdoh Kynshi ha 16 minit, bad ujuh u la thep 3 kol da kaba pynbud sa ha 64 bad 87 minit.Ia ka nam Man of the Match la ioh da u Phrangki Buam ha kaba u la thep 6 kol. U la thep ha ka 26’, 30′, 36′, 42′, 69′ bad ha 75 minit. U Kenstar Kharshong  u thep ha ka 82 minit, u Dajied ha ka 84 minit.Ia kawei ka kol ka Druma Sandruma la thep ha ka 32 da u Bsing Marak.Ka Shillong Lajong kan iaknieh ia ka nam lahduh ka Meghalaya State League pyrshah ia ka Rangdajied United kaban long ha ka 21 tarik Nohprah ha Khliehriat.
title: 11-1 pynliem ka Lajong ia ka Druma

content: Shillong: Ka sorkar Jylla hapoh ka jingialam jong u Myntri Rangbah u Conrad K Sangma  hadien ba lawai ka Cabinet ka ba lalong mynta ka sngi  ki la shim ia ka rai  ba  baroh ki minister kiba hapoh ka sorkar synrop jong ka Meghalaya Democratic Allience (MDA) kin pdiang  ia ka rai ban pyntrei kam noh ha baroh kawei ka Jylla jong ka Meghalaya ia ka Inner Line Permit kaba hap hapoh ka Bengal Eastern Frontier Regulation Act 1873.Katei ka rai, ka long ban leit rah  ha ka ingdorbar ba kyrpang ka ban sa long ha ka 19 tarik u Nohprah 2019.
title: Rai ka sorkar MDA ban pdiang ia  ka ILP ha ka ingdorbar ba kyrpang

content: Bah RM ShabongKa sorkar Jylla, la sngewthuh ba ka don jingthmu ban pynlong ia ka dorbar kyrpang ha ka 19tarik mynta u bnai, na ka bynta ban rai halor ka mat jong ka inner line permit (ilp) bad lada katei ka urlong, kumta katei kan dei ka sngi kaba khraw bad kaba kyrpang, na bynta ka jaitbynriew Khasi Jaintia bad ka Jylla hi baroh kawei.Ka jing iakhih ILP, ha ka Jylla, katba kynmaw, ka la sdang naduh u snem 1987 bad katei ka dei ha ka por jong ka jinglong nongialam jong U bah Bull N Lyngdoh, uba dei u nongialam barim jong ka KSU, hynrei ki jingmut jong ki nongialam sengbhalang, kim shym la rung satia ha ki shkor jong ka sorkar bad kaba kham sngewsih, ka long ba kiba bun na kito ki nongialam, kiba ju pyrta jam na ka bynta ka ain ILP bad kiwei, ki jah kyrteng noh, ynda haba ki don ha ka bynta ban thaw ain ha ka sorkar Jylla bad kitei yn da ki la poi ha iing dorbar, ki kylla noh ki nongthaw pisa bad ki nongthaw shuki bad katei ka dei ka jingduh kaba khraw ia ka jait bynriew Khasi Jaintia baroh kawei.Kumba la iakren baroh shi katta, ngim pat ju lap, ba kan don wat kawei ruh ka sorkar, kaba mynjur ban pyntrei kam ia ka inner line permit (ilp) bad ka daw, ka long (imat) ba ki seng sain pyrthei, ki shah mana ha ka hynmen jongki, kaba don ha Assam ba kim bit ban thaw ia katei ka ain, namar ba ka Assam, ka kwah ban iasam lem ia ki poiwir sha kane ka Jylla.Mynta ngi donbok ba U Conrad Sangma, myntri rangbah ka Jylla, ula shim ia kane ka rai kaba kongsan bha bad kata ka long, ba un khot ia ka dorbar kyrpang, ban iakren ia ka ILP bad kane kan dei ka jingjop ia ka sorkar jong U Sangma bad ki paralok jongka, kiba don ha ka sorkar MDA bad hap ruh ban ai burom ia ki sengbhalang, kiba la ioh mynsiem ha kane ka kynti, wat la ki la ju pheil ha ki phew phew snem ba ladep, kynthup ia u snem jem daw jong u 2013.Ngin nym pat iakren, ia kaei kaba ka sorkar India, kan leh bad kan ithuh ia ka mat ilp jong ka Jylla, hynrei ngi dei shwa ban sdang na la iing bad ynda haba ngi la ia tylli lang kawei, kumta ngin sa peit ia kaei kaba ka sorkar India kan leh bad katba ka jia, kane ka dei ka khyllipmat kaba donkam bad kaba kongsan shi katdei eh, ia ki trai shnong Khasi Jaintia, Garo, ba kin pynbor ia ki nongmihkhmat jongki, kiba dang byrie haduh ha kine ki sngi, ba kin shim ia katei ka rai ILP, kum ka mat treikam kaba kongsan tam.
title: 19tarik, ka sngi ban rai ILP

content: Shillong:  Ki longkmie ka Bri u Hynñiewtrep ka la khot bad wer ia ki long kmie bad ia ki samla kynthei ba kin ia mih paidbah ban wan iashim bynta ha ka rally ka ban sa long ha ka 18 tarik mynta u bnai Nohprah, ha Motphran na ka bynta ban dawa pyntreikam ia ka Inner Line Permit (ILP) ha ka Jylla Meghalaya bad ban pyrshah ia ka Citizenship Amendment Act, (CAA) 2019.Katkum u kyrwoh, ia kane ka rally yn sdang ha ka por 12:00 baje mynsngi ha kaba ki longkmie na ki bynta bapher bapher jong ka Bri u Hynñiewtrep kin sa ai jingkren.18 tarik ka jingialang paidbah CoMSO ha JowaiKa Confederation of Meghalaya Social Organisation (CoMSO) kan pynlong ia ka jingialang paidbah ha ka 18 tarik, Nohprah, 2019 ha Iawmusiang, Jowai ha ka por 12:00 baje mynsngi  bad ha Iew Dawki ha ka por 4:00 baje janmiet ban pynsngewthuh paidbah ha kaba pyrshah ia ka CAA bad ban dawa pyntreikam ia ka Inner Line Permit ha ka Jylla Meghalaya.18 tarik ka jingialang pyrshah CAA ha Sohra ka KSUKa KSU South Khasi Hills Sohra kan pynlong ia ka jingialang pynshai paidbah ha ka 18 tarik Nohprah 2019 ha iew Sohra ha ka por 10 baje mynstep ban pynshai ia ka jingdonkam ia ka Inner Line Permit (ILP) bad ban pyrshah ia ka Citizenship Amendment Act (CAA) 2019. Kane ka long ka kyrwoh na u bah Edmund Khongswa, u GS ka KSU South Khasi Hills Sohra.
title: 18 tarik ka rali ki longkmie  ha Motphran ban dawa ILP

content: Shillong:  U General Secretary jong ka KSU u samla Donald V Thabah haba kren ha ka jingiakhih shong kyllain myngngor jong ki paidbah ka jylla Assam kiba sah ha Meghalaya, u la ong ba mynta ka sngi ka NESO kan ujor sha Supreme Court pyrshah ia ka Citizenship Amendment Act 2019 jong ka sorkar pdeng.Haba kren ha kane ka jingialang u la ong ba ki jaidbynriew ka jylla Assam bad ki khasi kala don ka jingiatreilang naduh ki por hyndai na duh ka por jong ki Syiem Ahom ha kaba ki khasi ki la ai ka jingkyrshan bad kum juh ki Assamese ki la kyrshan ia ki Khasi ha kaba ia leh pyrshah ia ka jingwan kyrthep ki briew ba na bar.Ha kane ka jing ialang u samla Donald u la ong ba don kam ka jingiatrei lang da baroh ban ia khun pyrshah ia kane ka CAA ban pynthi kna ba kane ka ain kan nym trei kam ha kane ka dong shatei lam mih ngi jong ka Ri India. La ong katba ka jingialeh hapoh iing bishar kan dang iaid ka jingiakhih ruh kan dang iaid haduh ban da iohi ba kane ka ain kan nym trei kam ha North East.Ha kane ka sngi kiwei ki nongkren ki long u D Dhyan ba dei na ka jylla Assam u la ong ba ka jingiakhih ka long ban pyrshah ia ka jingthmu jong ka Ri India ban pyniaid paid ia ki briew jong ka dong shatei lam mih ngi jong ka ri India da kaba ai ia ka ILP sha kiwei ki jaka bad sha kiwei ki jylla pat kam treh ba ain.Ka long kmie ka Purobi Barua kala ong ba kane ka jingiakhih shnong kyllain myngngor mynta ka sngi ka long ban pyrshah ia ka ain jong ka sorkar pdeng kaba long pyrshah ia ka Assam Acord kaba la soi ha u snem 1985. Kumba ka long mynta ka Barak Vally kala leit sha kati jong ki Bangladesh kiba don tuid sha ka jylla Assam. Kane ka jingiakhih ka long ban iada ia ki long dien ban wan.
title: Mynta ka sngi ka NESO kan mudui sha  Supreme Court pyrshah ia ka CAA: KSU

content: Jowai:U MDC ka War East u ma Gillroy Tariang u la noh synniang haduh 300 byrni sha ki shnong bapher bapher na ka bynta ban sam sha kiba duk kiba don hapoh ka War East MDC Constituency.Ia utei u khaw la aiti sha ki rangbah shnong ha ka jingiadonlang u Dolloi ka Satpator Elaka, u Daman Lakashiang.Ha kajuh ka por u ma Wailadmiki Shylla uba dei u MLA ka Jowai ha kane ka sngi Palei u la pyllait ia u khaw sha ki 10 tylli ki shnong kiba hapoh ka Constituency jong u.Ha kane ka kynti na la pyllait tang na ka bynta kito kiba don sha ki thain Nongkyndong katba ha sor pat ngan sa pynpoi ha kine ki khyndiat sngi, la ong utei u MLA ka Jowai.Ia u Khaw la aiti ha ki Rangbah Shnong na ka bynta ba kin sam sha kito ki longing kiba duk bad kiba la shah ktah jur na ka jingkhang shnong ban iada ia ka jingsaphriang u khniang jingpang Corona.Ha katei ka sngi ki shnong kiba la ioh ia u khaw MLA Scheme na u ma Wailad ki long Mukhla, Phlongingkhaw, Mihmyntdu, Khliehtyrshi, Sabahmuswang, Ialong, Madur, Niriang, Loomkhudung bad Sohmynting.Shuh shuh ka Dorbar Shnong Tympang, Iawmusiang Jowai ka la ai jingiarap da ki marbam mardih sha ki 41 ki longing baduk kiba don hapoh u pud u sam ka shnong.U Rangbah shnong u ma Edyson Shylla u la ong ba kitei ki dei ki longing kiba im kamai ja kpoh da kaba bylla sngi.Shuh shuh ka longkmie kaba na Wapungskur, ka Chiarmon Dkhar ka la noh synniang da ki mar bam naduh u Khaw, Phan bad kiwei kiwei sha ki 320 tylli ki longing kiba don ha ki dong bapher bapher jong ka shnong Wapungskur.
title: Pyllait u  ma Wailad ia u khaw MLA Scheme, 300 byrni na U MDC ka War East

content: Uwei u briew, uba na Dhubri, ula ioh pang  coronavirus,  ong U Himanta Biswa Sarma, myntri ka koit ka khiah ka sorkar Assam bad da kane ka jingjia, ki la don 30ngut kiba ioh ia katei ka jingpang ha katei ka Jylla.U Sarma, u iathuh ba utei u briew ruh, u dei uba don jingiadei bad ka jinglehniam ki Muslim ha  Nizamuddin Markaz, kaba la long ha U Lber ha Delhi.U Sarma, u thoh ha ka twitter jongu mynta ka step shaphang katei ka jingjia bad kane ka dei ka sien kaba ar, ba kin don kiba ioh pang Covid 19, hapoh ka 24 kynta, ha kaba uwei u dei uba na Dimapur bad nangta sa une uba na Dhubri.Haduh mynta, ka dei tang ha Meghalaya bad ha Sikkim, ba kam pat poi katei ka jingpang Corona.
title: Sa uwei na Dhubri, uba ioh coronavirus

content: Ka jingiap briew ha United States, ka la kiew sa  1,514 ngut ha ki 24 kynta ba ladep, katba kum ka jing ai jingkhein jong ka  Johns Hopkins University.Ka jingiap ka kham duna, na kaba long hynnin ka sngi, kaba long 1,920 ngut bad kiba iap ha America, ki la poi mynta sha ka  22,020 ngut ha katei ka Ri, kaba long ka jingiap kaba bun tam na baroh ki ri ka pyrthei.Ka jingdon kiba ioh pang ha katei ka Ri, ka long 555,313 ngut, katba kukm ka jingkhein ba la ai da ka  University na Baltimore.Ha India, kiba ioh pang, ki la poi mynta sha ka 9,152 ngut bad kiba dang don ha ka jingpang, ki long 7,987 ngut bad ki don 856 ngut kiba jem na ka jingshah sumar bad sa 308 ngut kiba la iap noh, ong ka tnat ka koit ka khiah ka sorkar India.Ka Covid 19, ka la iabit ia  1,846,963 ngut bad ka la pyniap ia  114,101 ngut ki briew, ong ka khubor jong ka  John Hopkins University Tracker/worldometer.
title: 1,514 ngut kiba iap coronavirus ha ki 24 kynta ba ladep ha US

content: Uwei u briew, uba shah sumar ha Guwahati Medical College Hospital (GMCH), u ioh jingpang Covide 19 bad ia katei la pyn thikna da U Himanta Biswa Sarma, myntri ka koit ka khiah ka Assam.La iathuh ba la phah sumar ia utei u nongpang, na kawei ka hospital praibed ha Dimapur, Nagaland; hynrei, ynda haba la peit bniah, la lap ba ka dei ka Covid 19.U Sarma, ula thoh ha ka tweet jongu, hynnin ka miet shaphang katei ka jingjia bad la iathuh ba utei u briew, u dang shah sumar ha GMCH Guwahati.
title: Ioh jingpang Covid 19, uwei uba na Nagaland

content: Shillong: Ka Dorbar Shnong Umlaper Ri Bhoi District mynta ka step ka la sam ia khaw sha ki 22 tylli ki longîng ba duk eh hapoh ka shnong hadien ba la ioh pdiang ia u khaw ba ai da U MDC ka Mawhati Bah Charles Marngar.U Rangbah Shnong Bah Oversel Khymdeit, u la pyntip  ba hadien ka jingiohpdiang ia u khaw kumba 220 kg eiei na U MDC, ka Executive Committee jong ka shnong kala shong Committee ban jied ia ki 22 tylli ki longîng kiba duk eh ki bym don lad shuh da kumwei hadien ba la don ka pakhang shnong na ka Covid 19.Ha kajuh ka por u la pynpaw ka jingsngew nguh kaba khraw ia U MDC uba la iarap kat ka bor ka jinglah jongu sha baroh ki paitbah ka Mawhati Constituency. Shuh shuh u la pynpaw ruh ka jingkyrmen ban ioh sa na U MLA bad ban sam hok sha ki longîng kiba dei hok ban ioh.
title: Sam khaw ka Dorbar Shnong Umlaper, na u khaw ba ai U MDC

content: “Kata pat ka long kat kum ka por phi mei ieid” pynshai ka para marjan.“Hooid nga sngewthuh tangba kat katta ka pisa ha ngi hi mynta nga sngew ka la pynjot lypa ia ki” kren khia ka Mei ieid.“Ah! ba ngan im palat spah snem tip sa kaei ngan iohi” ong ka mei ieid.“Ngam lah mutdur shuh phi” ong ka para marjan.“Phi tharai phi dang lah ban iakynduh sa katto katne phew snem hynrei ma nga la sa tang khyndiat snem eh” ong ka Meiieid ia ka para marjan.“Shu long tang ka jingiathuhkhana tang ban myllen hynrei kiei kiei baroh ki la kylla lut ym dei ba kylla ka pyrthei hynrei kylla ka jingim jinglong jong ki briew” ong ka para marjan bad ka pyndung kwai biang ia ka Meiieid.“Ki shait ong kylla ka pyrthei, hynrei kan kylla leh aiu ka pyrthei, u briew kein bad ka jinglong jong u kaba pynkylla lut ia ka pyrthei. Yn niew tang kaei la jan baroh ki liang khamtam mynta ba la ia stad ia nang lut ki jingkylla ki stet bha” ong ka para marjan bad ka ai ia u waidung ha ka Meiieid.“Ka dei kein ka jingong jong phi. Nga kynmaw mynba dang khynnah ma nga 70 snem tam mynshuwa ki briew kim da ialap eh ia ki skul hynrei bunsien ki kren ia ka rep. Mynta pat da khongpong, ki kham iakren ia ka skul ban ia ka rep. Haba kumta kam iapher re ka por?” ong ka Meiieid bad ka syllud ia la ka khohsiew kum kaba la thait.“Shano shuh kito ki por pahuh shriew, phandieng, jingbam khlaw mynta haba la iabeh lut ka jingshong skul sha sor ne khapsor ne wat shabar jylla. Shano kin phohsniew shuh ia ka kam rep?” ong ka para marjan.“ Sngewtynnad ban kynmaw ia ka mynnor hynrei kumno pat ia ka lanor?” ong ka Meiieid.LYNNONG – 6Ka sngi leit u Kynsai ka sah sa tang 3 sngi. Ka kmie, u Kpa, ka hynmen jong u ki la sngew kynjah. Ki tip ba um slem shuh ban pyndep ia la ka jingpule hynrei ka jingieid shi iing kam duh hi. U Rangsan te um da i patiaw than ia la u hynmen, ka paw pynban ba u Kynsai un dei ka por leit noh sha jingpule.“Shi sngi shuwa ba u khun un leit biang shathie ka biang ba ngin shet ja shi iing bad ngin thied da u syiar Khasi ban bam doh. Ka mat ia rem kam lei lei” ong u Kpa.“Ka biang ka biang Pa” mynjur ka Banrilang.“Katba sngewbit ma phi kpa, nga lei nga biang beit” ong ka kmie bad ka dang ot ia u soh water-melon ban ia bam hadien shi kynta ba ki bamja.“Mano pat ban leit thied uta u syiar?” kylli ka kmie.“Ong ia i Hep kein (Rangsan)” tyrwa ka Banri.“Tang ia nga beit, ong ia u ban leit noh la shi sngi kein” ong u Rangsan da kaba khapbrip khmat shiliang kum ban kdew ia u Kynsai.“To ieh ngan leit ma nga ruh biang ngan ioh iaid bam lyer pyngngad toi” ong u Kynsai.“Te, ka don ka jingmyntoi em ba phin ioh lyer pyngngad” ong u Rangsan bad u wiat samrkhie.
title: LA I SHAIONG

content: Shillong: Ki dkhot jong ka Shillong Khasi Jaintia Church Leaders Forum (SKJCLF) ki iasnoh lang kawei bad ki ba bun ki nongshongshnong ha ka Jylla bad kiwei de, ha ka program ka Meghalaya ka Duwai (Meghalaya Prays) ba la khot bad lamkhmat da u Myntri Rangbah badonburom U Conrad K Sangma ha ka janmiet jong ka Sngi Jingmihpat U Khrist (Easter Sunday) 12tarik u Iaiong 2020.Kane ka long ka jingkhot ban iasnoh kti lang baroh ha ka jingialeh pyrshah ia ka khlam COVID19. Shibnai kynthih mynshuwa, ka Forum ka la pynlong ia ka program Jingduwai na ka bynta ka Meghalaya (Prayer for Meghalaya) ha ka 12tarik u Lber 2020, ha kaba u Myntri Rangbah, ki paralok jong u lem bad kiwei de ki nongialam ki la iashimbynta.Ki jingduwai bad jingrwai lang ha ka ktien Phareng, Khasi bad Garo – ia ki jingrwai “Ka Jingaiei Baphylla”, “Me Long Bakhraw”, bad “Namar b’U im nga don ka Jingkyrmen” ka la tehsong lang ia baroh ki nongiashimbynta kylleng ka Jylla bad shabar ruh, ha u kynjri jong ka jingialong kawei.Wat hapdeng ka jingdonkam ban shong beit ha iing (lockdown) ha ka ri baroh kawei, to ai ba ka jingpynthymmai ia ka jingim kaba ka Sngi Jingmihpat U Khrist (Easter) ka wanrah, kan plie noh wang na ka bynta jong ngi baroh ia ki jingkyrkhu jong ka jingsdang kaba thymmai ha ka jingkyrmen, ka bor iaishah, ka jingjemnud, ka jingsuk, bad ka jingpynkhiah ha ka pyrthei. Ka Forum ka kyntu ruh ia baroh ban bteng ha ki jingduwai na ka bynta ka Sorkar bad ki tnat treikam jong ka baroh hapdeng kane ka por jong ki jingeh bad jingialeh, bad ka ai khublei Sngi Jingmihpat U Khrist ia baroh.“U Trai U la mihpat. U la mihpat da shisha!”
title: Snoh kti lang ka SKJCLF, ha ka prokram ka Meghalaya ka duwai

content: Ha ka por kaba ia syriem kum ha ka jingiap bad por jingmihpat hi U Jisu ba ha kato ka por, ka por sheptieng, ka por sngewma, ia kaei kaba la jia baroh. Ngi ruh mynta ngi don ha ka por sngew sheptieng sngewma ia kata ka jingpang corona virus – covid19, kaba ka pyrthei satlak ka la khynniuh bad ma ngi ruh kum ka jylla hangne ngi la sngew sheptieng sngewtriem, bad da kaba “Kohnguh” ia ka ktien jingpynbeit ki nongsynshar, ngi don ka jingsngewshngain, ha kaba sngew ba ngi rieh ha ki ksangti U Blei ba don bor baroh. Wat ha kum kane ka por ruh, ngi la sngewkmen ba ka jingrhem mynsiem ban ioh mane, Iaroh ia U Nongpynim U ba la iap., U ba mih pat, ba la pyndep ia ki jingiathuhlypa baroh, U ba ha U ngi kyrmen ia ka lawei jong ka jingim bymjukut ruh. Tang katto katne ki rukom pynpaw U Jisu.Paralok para Khristan baroh, ngi la leh kmen Good Friday bad Easter Sunday, ym tang mynta, hynrei man kawei pa kawei ka snem, to ngin nym klet ia kitei ki ktien ba U Trai Jisu U la kwah bad ban jur, “ ba yn ialap ia ka jingkylla kabamut, ia kaban map ia ki pop hapdeng ki jait bynriew baroh” ba ngin long ki sakhi ia ka bor ka jingiap jong U bad ka bor ka jingmihpat jong U. Kumba U la kyrkhu ia ki synran, Un kyrkhu ia ngi ruh haba ngi Kohnguh ban leh ia ka mon jong U baroh . AMEN……………..
title: Ki khubor lyngkot hadien ba U Jisu U la mihpat

content: Shillong:Ka Dorbar Shnong Umsaitsning Lad Mawrong ha ka por 6 baje mynstep kala ioh ban kem ia kawei ka Kali kit jhur ba wan na jylla Assam kaba don ia u number AS13 AC1371 khlem da biang ki kot ki sla ba lah ban wan sha jylla Meghalaya.Ha kane jingiohkem haba tohkit na u nongniah kane ka kali la shem ba ym shem ladon ka curfew pass ne ka interstate permit bad u la shu wan tang da kaba ai kyrteng ha ki khyrdop pahara (check gate).Ha ka jingiakren bad u Rangbah Shnong ka Lad Mawrong u bah Frankie Nongrum u la iathuh ba kane ka jingioh rung jong kane ka kali na Assam khlem ki kot ki sla ba biang ka lah ban wanrah ka jingma ka khraw da kaba ong ruh ba lada ki nongpahara kim peit bniah bad ki briew kiba nabar ki lah ban rung katba mon tang da ka jingleh buit tuh, kumta ka buh jingma kaba khraw ia ka imlang sahlang.Na ka liang ka Dorbar Shnong Umsaitsning, LadMawrong ka la aiti noh ia u nongniah kane ka kali sha ki pulit ka Umsning Police station ban leh ia kaba donkam.
title: Ioh kem kali kit jhur na Assam na LadMawrong

content: Shillong: Kum shi bynta ban ia khun pyrshah ia ka jing pang ‘corona virus’ ha ka jylla Meghalaya bad ka pyrthei baroh kawei, u myntri rangbah ka jylla u Conrad K Sangma u la wanrah da ka “Meghalaya Prays” ban kyntu ia ki paidbah ka jylla lem bad ki paidbah ka ri India ban ia phylliew jing mut ha ki jing duwai na ka bynta ban ioh bor na u Blei ban rat dyngkhong ia ka jing pang ‘corona virus’ na kane ka pyrthei.“Ha kane ka sngi u Blei bakhuid ka jing ia shim bynta ki paidbah ka jylla ha ki jing duwai bad jing rwai kan nang aibor bad jing jop ia ngi ban ia khun pyrshah ia ka COVID-19” la bynrap u Conrad K Sangma.Ia ka jing duwai kaba la buh ha kapor 6 baje janmiet mynta ka sngi la ia shim bynta da ki paidbah ka jylla bad na kiwei pat ki jylla ka ri India kynthup napoh ka thain lam mih ngi. Na ka liang u myntri rangbah ka jylla Meghalaya u la ai khublei sngi u Blei bakhuid ia baroh ki paidbah bad u la kyntu ruh ban nang ia pynkhlain ia ka jing duwai na ka bynta ban rat dkhong ia ka jing pang ‘corona virus’.
title: Shim bynta ki paidbah, ha ka jing duwai Easter ba ialam U Conrad
