content: U myntri ka tnat PWD, ula iai kren biang halor ka jingthmu jong ka sorkar Jylla, ban tei ia ka surok kali kaba heh bad kaba long ban iaid saw kali na Umshyrpi sha Hynniewmer bad ter shaduh sha Tamabil bad katei ka long ka phang kaba donkam bha, ban teh lakam ia ka jingdheng kali kaba jubor bha na Hynniewmer sha Iew, kaba la iai jia man ka sngi.Wat la katei ka dei ka jingmut kaba bha tam bad kaba hap ban ai jing kyrshan radbah ia ka sorkar Jylla bad ia ka tnat PWD, hynrei ha kajuh ka por, katei ka tnat lem bad ka tnat shipai, ki tnat pulit bad ki bor shnong, ki la dei ban wad lad shwa ban pyn duna ia ka jingdheng kali kaba la tasam bad kaba la jia man ka sngi sha ka thain.Haba shu peit kyllum, lah ban ong ba ka dheng kali ha ka thain Upper Shillong, kam pat dei ban jia, lada ki don ki lad kiba yn shim khia bad kyrkieh, da kitei ki tnat kiba la kdew haneng bad kawe na ki lad ka long ban pynbeit noh mardor ia ka surok kyllain ha Laimer, ban nym pynthut ia ki kali kiba leit iew bad ki kali kiba iaid pyllun ia katei ka surok bad kam dei tang katta, ka don ka surok kaba pom na 101 Cantonment, kaba mih sha Umshyrpi bad katei ka la dei ban long ka surok kaba shipor, ba kin iaid ki kali kiba hiar sha Iew bad lada yn ioh ban plie ia katei ka surok, khlem pep, kan pyn duna shi katdei ia ka leit ka wan ki kali.Lait nangta, ka la dei ka por ban pynkhlad ia ki kali kiba leit sha  Iewduh bad ki kali kiba leit sha Lumdiengjri bad lada ka iaid ha katei ka rukom, kumta kito kiba sahkut naduh na Lummawbah, kin sngewthuh ia ka lad ba kin noh ha ka lynti kaba kumno, ban ailad ia kiwei ba kin nang iaid shakhmat bad imat, ka la bha, ba ia ka surok rit kaba najan Umshyrpi ban kiew sha Barapathar, ban pyniaid noh shi kali, ha kaba kiba mut ban leit sha Lumdiengjri, kin pyndonkam ia katei ka surok rit.Ka jingtrei ia ka surok na Umshyrpi sha Tamabil, ka lah ban shimpor da ki bun snem, wat la ka jingthmu jong ka sorkar (lehse), ka long ban pyndep hi, ha shwa ka elekshon MLA 2023; hynrei kat haduh ba ngin da tyllun ia ki 2snem duna eiei, kumta ka donkam ka lad kaba kyrkieh bad kaba shipor bad ka jing pyrshang ruh, kumba ki la pyrshang ia kiwei pat ki lad kiba don ha ka nongbah bad lehse katei kan dei ka lynti ban pyn jynsur mynsiem ia ki nongleit nongwan.
title: Ka surok na Umshyrpi sha Tamabil

content: Ka jingiap na ka jing ia kynad hapdeng kiba pyrshah bad kiba kyrshan CAA ha Delhi, ka la poi sha ka 18ngut haduh mynta ka sngi bad la iathuh ba san  ngut na kitei ki la iap ha ka jingshah sumar ha Hospital.Mynta ka sngi,  yn khang lut ia baroh ki skul ha North East Delhi bad ia ka eksamin CBSE ruh, la pyn kynriah noh shwa, namar katei ka jing ia kynad.Ka khubor ka iathuh ba mynta dang shiteng synnia, kaba dei ha ka por 1baje mynstep, ki arngut ki nongbishar jong ka Delhi High Court, ki la shim bishar kyrkieh bad hukum ia ki pulit, ba kin pyllait mardor ia kiba mynsaw ba kin leit shah sumar sha Hospital. U Justice S Muralidhar bad U Justice AJ Bhambhani, ki la bthah ia ki pulit, ba kin kynriah mardor ia kiba mynsaw kiba don ha Mustabafad’s Al Hind Hospital bad leit rah sha  Guru Teg Bahadur (GTB) Hospital lane sha kiwei pat ki hospital kiba kham bha bad kiba lah ban sumar ia kiba mynsaw.1. ka dei ka policy jong ki riew shit niam hindu bad ka seng BJP (Ym ki hindu bym shit niam) ban pharia shwa ia ka India da kane ka ain CAA  ban beh ia ki Muslim kiba shong ba sah ha India namar ki long ki nong pynwit ha ka ban jied MP bad lyngba ka Muslim Vote ka BJP ka lah ban nym ioh Majority ha ki election MP ban sa wan.2. Bad da kane ka ain nga lah mutdur lupa naduh ba ki mut ban pass ia ka CAB, ba ha India kan sa don ka thma ing(Civil war).3.Ka jingdon jong ki 303 ngut ki BJP MP ha India kan leh beit da kano kano ka buit ban pyntroin ia ki Non-BJP voter, ia ngi ki khristan kam salia namar ngi don tang 2+ %.4.Ka jingshna ia ka detention camp ha Goalpara District bad ha kiwei ki wei ki state ka long kum ban ri ia ki Hindu jiwjiw jawjaw ba sah ha Afghanistan,Pakistan bad Bangladesh, bad da kine yn sa pyndonkam ha kiba bun ki liang, kumba ngi mad ia ka Assam ba ka pyndonkam da ki Nepali ban kynrup jaka sha ka Jylla jong ngi.5. KHLEM ARTATIEN KA INDIA KAN SA DON KA THMA ING (CIVIL WAR) kat kum ka jing shem jong nga.
title: Poi kiba iap sha ka 18ngut, na ka ia kynad CAA ha North East Delhi

content: Nongpoh:  Ha ka sngi kaba u Myntri Rangbah ka sorkar jylla u Conrad K. Sangma lem bad u Symbud Myntri Rangbah u Bah Prestone Tynsong, ki la hiar sha ka shnong Umtyrnga ha Ri Bhoi, ka shnong kaba don ha khappud ka Meghalaya-Assam, ki paidbah jong katei ka thain, ki la phah da shibun ki Dorkhas sha kitei ki nongialam khmat jong ka sorkar jylla.Lah ruh ban kdew hangne, ba u Conrad K. Sangma, u Prestone Tynsong lem lem bad kiwei ki heh ka NPP, ar snem mynshwa ki la hiar sha katei ka shnong, na ka bynta ban ialap Ilekshon ia u Bah Sosthenes Sohtun bad ha katei ka por, ki da kular ruh ia ki paidbah jong katei ka thain, ba lada ka NPP kan wan ha ka bor, kan leh bad trei shitom na ka bynta ban pynioh ia ki kam pynroi sha katei ka thain, kaba dei ruh ka thain kaba don ha syndah bad ka Assam.Lehse dei namar ka jingkular da ka NPP, kaba la pynlong ia ki nongialam shnong bad ki riew rangbah jong katei ka thain ba kin shim ia ka kabu da kaba phah ia shibun ki dorkhas, ha ka sngi kaba kitei ki heh ka NPP bad kiba long ruh ki nongialam ka sorkar jylla ki la hiar sha katei ka shnong.Ha katei ka sngi kaba kitei ki nongialam ka sorkar jylla, ki la hiar sha katei ka shnong, la iohi ba naduh u MLA, ki nongialam shnong, ki nonghikai skul lem bad kiwei ki la shim ia ka kabu ban aiti ia ki dorkhas sha kitei ki heh jong ka sorkar Meghalaya.
title: Shi khung ki dorkhas ha u MR,  symbud MR na ki paidbah Umtyrnga

content: Shillong:  Hadien 2 sngi ba la shah thung kum u ‘Organising Secretary’ ba thym mai ka Khasi Student Union (KSU) shah khot hajir u Ostarnic Marbaniang lem bad ar ngut ki dkhot ka KSU halor ka jing ia shim bynta jong ki ban pyrshah Citizenship Amendment Act (CAA) 2019 bad ban dawa pyn treikam Inner Line Permit (ILP) ha nongbah Shillong.Ha ba kren bad ki lad pathai khubor u president ka KSU u Lambok starwell Marngar u ba la wan synran lem sha thanat u la ong ba ka seng kam sngew phylla ia ka jing shah khot hajir ki dkhot ka seng namar ka seng ka ju iaid mad kum ia kine ki jing leh ka sorkar ban pyn tlot ia ka jing ia khun jong ka seng.U Lambokstarwell Marngar u la iathuh ruh ba ki don kum ba 6 tylli ki jing ujor pyrshah ia ki dkhot ka seng bad u la ong ba ka por hi kan sa batai halor ka jing ia khun ka seng ban ioh ia la ka hok jong ka jaidbynriew ka jylla Meghalaya.Nalor kane u Lambokstarwell Marngar u la ong ba wat lada ki pulit ka jylla kin dang iai khot hajir ia ki dkhot ka seng, ka KSU kan nym pyndem bad kan dang bteng beit ia ka ka jing iakhun khlem da duh mynsiem ne jing kyrmen.
title: Shah khot hajir  u Organising Secretary ba thymmai ka KSU

content: Shillong: Ka “Iada la ka Ri” kala pynlong ia ka jing ialang bad ki Nongsynshar Shnong ka thain Mairang ha ka sngi baar, ha kaba u Bah Ardent Basaiawmoit, u la pynshai ia ka jingthmu jong ka Revolution kaba la sdang ha ka 6 tarik mynta u bnai.Na ka liang ki Nong synshar Shnong hadien ba ki la ioh jingpynshai na u Bah Ardent, ki la pynpaw ka jingkyrshan tylli ia kane ka Revolution, kaba kawei na ki jingthmu ka long ban ithuh bad pynkup bor ia ki da ka ain.Na ka liang ki Nongsynshar Shnong ki la ai jingmut ruh ban pynlong da ka jingialang paidbah ban pynshai shuh shuh ia kane ka jingthmu.Kumta kane ka jingialang ka la rai ban pynlong da ka jingialang paidbah ha ka 12 tarik u Lber 2020 ha Pyndengumiong, ha kaba u Bah Ardent un wan ban pynshai paidbah halor ka Revolution.
title: 12 tarik ka  Jingialang Iada la ka Ri ha Mairang

content: Shillong:  Ki nong hikai ka jylla Meghalaya ki ba don hapoh ka seng All India Primary Teachers’ Federation (AIPTF) ki la leit ban ia shim bynta ha ka jing iakhih ba shi taiew tam ha nongbah Delhi ban dawa ia ka hok ki nong hikai.Kane ka jing iakhih ba la khot da ka AIPTF ka la sdang naduh 21 tarik rymphang 2020 ha Jantar Mantar Delhi la sakhi ia ka jing ia shim bynta da ki hajar ngut ki nong hikai na kylleng ka ri India. Kane ka jing iakhih kan kut la 27 tarik rymphang 2020.Ka mat jong ka jing iakhih ka long ban dawa ia ka jing bam tymmen (Old Pension Scheme) jong ki nong hikai bad dawa ban pyn long ryntih (uniformity ) ia ka jing siew tulop sha ki nong hikai hapoh ka ri India shwa ka 31 tarik lber 2021Na ka liang ki nong hikai ki la dawa ruh ban pynkhlain shuh shuh ia ka pule puthi ki khynnah rit bad ban dawa pynkylla ia ka ‘National Education Policy 2019’. Ki nong hikai ki la dawa ruh ban kyntiew ia ka tulop jong ki sha ‘Sixth Central Pay Commission’ bad ban pynlong ia ka eksamin Teachers’ Eligibility Test (TET) ha shwa ba kin ioh long nong hikai ha ki skul.
title: Shim bynta ki nong hikai ka jylla  ha ka jing iakhih ha nongbah Delhi

content: Nongpoh:  U Myntri Rang bah ka Jylla u Conrad K. Sangma, u la ai ia ka jingiaroh kaba khraw ia u Bah Sosthenes Sohtun, MLA ka Jirang, da kaba ong ba utei u MLA ka Jirang, u dei uwei na ki MLA hapoh ka jylla, uba don ia kata ka jingkitkhlieh na ka bynta ban wanrah ia ka roi ka par ha ki shnong ki thaw bad ruh uba la trei shitom miet bad sngi na bynta ka jingmyntoi jong ki paidbah kiba sah ha kito ki shnong kiba dang sahdien bad ki bym pat ioh ia kino kino ki kam pynroi na ka sorkar.Haba batai halor ka jingtrei shitom u Bah Sosthenes Sohtun, u Myntri rangbah ka sorkar jylla, u la ong ba utei u MLA ka Jirang, u dei u briew uba trei shitom miet bad sngi, na bynta ka jingmyntoi ki paidbah hapoh ka Constitwency, ha kaba na ka por sha ka por u la leit ban kyrpad sha u Myntri rangbah ka sorkar jylla ba u dei ban pyrkhat kyrpang na bynta ka Jirang, kaba lah ruh ban ong ba ka dei kawei na ki Constituency kaba dang sahdien ha Ri Bhoi.Halor ka jinglong u MLA ka Jirang, u Myntri Rangbah ka sorkar jylla, u la ong ba u dei u briew uba sngewrit eh bad uba jem ka sur, hynrei ka rukom treikam pat ka pher bak-ly-bak bad kiwei pat ki Nongmihkhmat na kiwei ki Contituncy, namar u long uba shalak shikatdei eh ha ka rukom treikam bad khamtam eh na ka bynta ka jingmyntoi ki paidbah hapoh katei ka Constituency.U Conrad K. Sangma, u la ong ruh ba haba ianujor bad kiwei ki Nongmihkhmat na ki Constituency hapoh ka jylla, dei u Sosthenes Sohtun, uba la trei shitom eh na bynta ki paidbah, namar kiwei ki leit ban kynduh Myntri Rangbah tang ha ka 2 ne 3 sien ha ka shi Taiew, katba u MLA ka Jirang u leit ban kynduh 3 bad 4 sien ha ka shi sngi, kata ka long tang na ka bynta ban iakren halor ki jingsahdien hapoh ka Constituency kaba u mihkhmat.Halor ka jingioh u Bah Sosthenes Sohtun ban long u Nongmihkhmat ka Jirang, u Conrad K. Sangma, u la ai ka jingiaroh ia ki paidbah ka Jirang, kiba la jied ia utei u briew uba biang eh, na ka bynta ban long kum u Nongmihkhmat ia katei ka Constituency.
title: U MLA ka Jirang uba sngewrit tam na baroh ki MLA, u shalak ha ka rukom treikam, ong u Conrad K. Sangma

content: Shillong: Ha shwa ban sdang ka jingiaseng Samla Synod kaba la pynlong ha madan jong ka  Khadsaw phra College ha ka sngi u Blei ba ladep,  U Pastor R.R. Cunville u la leit ban jngoh ia ka Open Library jong ka College kaba la buh jingkynmaw ia ki jingjia ha ka Centenery Revival jong ka snem 2006 bad 2007 kaba la pynkmen ia ka mynsiem jong  u, ba kane ka College ka la buh jingkyn maw ia ki ei kiei ba la jia ha kito ki snem khnang ban pynsuk ia ki long dien ki ba kwah ban tip shaphang kane ka Revival ka ba khraw ka ba la jia ha Mairang.U Pastor, u la buh ruh ka jing duwai ba kane ka College kan nanglah ban ai ka jingshakri ia ki khun samla kiba pule ha kane ka College.Kane ka College ka la lum thup ia ki ba bun bah ki kot pule ba ai mynsiem ia ki samla bad ki wei ki wei ki jingtip ki ba iadei bad ka pule ka dangleh. Ka Prof. Streamlet Dkhar, Dean School of Humanities  NEHU bad Dr. CAR Diengdoh Director Incharge CDC NEHU ruh ki la wan ban sakhi dalade ia kane ka Open Library bad ai ka jingiaroh shibun eh. Kane ka Library ka la khring ia shibun bah ki samla ba wan ban peit kai iaka hadien ba lawai ka jingiaseng ban leit phai da ka jingphuhmut phuhmat.
title: Leit jngoh U Pastor Cunville ia ka Open Library  ka Khadsawphra College

content: Nongpoh:  Kan long ka jingkmen kaba khraw na bynta ki paidbah kiba sah ha ki shnong khappud ka Meghalaya bad Assam, kaba dei ruh ka thain kaba ki paidbah kim ju ioh ban mad ia ki lynti synkieng kiba biang bad ia ki surok, hynrei mynta pat ka la wan ban urlong, kata hadien ba mynta ka sngi u Myntri Rangbah ka sorkar jylla, u Conrad Sangma, u la leit ban buh ia u Mawnongrim na ka bynta ban shna ia ka surok na 9Mer sha Umsen, kiba dei ki shnong kiba don ha khappud ka Assam.Kiba la sakhi lang ha kaba buh ia utei u Mawnongrim, nalor u Conrad K. Sangma, la donlang ruh u Bah Prestone Tynsong, Symbud Myntri rangbah ka sorkar jylla bad uba dei ruh u Myntri ka tnat PWD, u Bah Sosthenes Sohtun, MLA ka Jirang, u Bah Macmillan Byrsat, MLA ka Nongstoin, u Dasakhiatbha Lamare, MLA ka Mawhati, u Bah Victor Ranee, MDC ka Jirang, ki heh na ka NEC lem bad kiwei de ki heh ophisar na ki tnat sorkar bapher bapher.Halor katei ka surok kaba la buh mawnongrim ha Umtyrnga, ka dei ka surok ka ban sa ai jingmyntoi shibun eh ia ki paidbah ka thain Umtyrnga lem bad kiwei ki shnong kiba don ha katei ka thain, namar ka dei ka surok kaba la pynmang pisa haduh T. 84 Klur bad ka ban sa tei ia ka jingjrong kaba 29 KM, kata naduh 9Mer da kaba pyniasoh ia shibun tylli ki shnong kiba don ha katei ka thain Khappud ka Meghalaya bad Assam.Haba kren ha katei ka sngi, u Conrad K. Sangma, u la ong ba ka jingioh ia katei ka surok kan long ka jingmyntoi shikatdei eh ia ki paidbah jong katei ka thain bad khamtam eh ba ka dei kaba iajan eh bad ka Nongbah Guahati.Shuh shuh, u la ong ruh ba ka jingioh ia katei ka surok kan long ka jingkmen ia ki paidbah jong katei ka thain, kaba dei ruh ka thain kaba ki paidbah kim pat ju ioh mab ia ka surok kaba bha, namarkata lyngba ka jingioh ia katei ka surok kan da long ka jingmyntoi kaba khraw eh ia ki paidbah kiba sah ha katei ka thain, ba kin nanglah shuh shuh ha ka ban nangkyntiew ia ki kam ki jam ha katei ka thain bad khamtam eh haba iadei bad ki kam rep kam riang.U la ong ruh ba kane ka sorkar MDA kaba mynta, ka dei ka sorkar kaba don ia kata ka jingpyrkhat kaba jngai na bynta ki shnong nongkyndong bad kiba duna ha ka roi ka par, kumta haba iadei bad kata, u la ong ba kane ka sorkar MDA kaba mynta ka la trei shitom haba iadei bad ki surok na bynta ki paidbah ban haba ianujor bad ka sorkar kaba la leitnoh.Halor katei ka surok kaba yn sa tei shen bad ki paidbah kin sa ioh ban pyndonkam hapoh ki ar snem, u Myntri rangbah ka sorkar jylla, u la kyntu ia ki paidbah jong katei ka thain, ba ki dei ban long kiba iaishah bad ruh ba ki dei ban ai ka jingiatreilang, khnang ba kan kloi ka jingpyntrei bad ka ban sa long ka jingmyntoi ia ki paidbah jong katei ka thain hi baroh kawei.
title: Ha Umtyrnga buh Mawnongrim u MR, ban tei surok na 9Mer sha Umsen

content: Sa 406ngut, ki don kiba dang shu kem pang thymmai, ia ka jingpang corona ha China, ong ka tnat ka koit ka khiah ka sorkar China mynta ka sngi.Kiba iap mynta baroh, ki la poi sha ka 2,715ngut ha China bad sa 80hajar ngut kiba ioh ia katei ka jingpang.Ha Italy, ki la don 11ngut kiba iap bad katei ka dei ka Ri, kaba jur tam katei ka jingpang ha baroh ki ri Europe, katba kiba ioh pang ki don 322ngut  haduh mynta.
title: 2,715 ngut kiew kiba pang na ka jingpang Corona ha China

content: Shillong:  Ka Langsning Football club kan pynlong ia ka jingjied ia ki nongialehkai (trial) ha Nongstoin ha ka 29.2.2020 na ka bynta ki U-15 bad U-18 naduh ka por 10.00 am haduh 2.00 pm ha madan New Nongstoin.Kiba wan sha kane ka jingjied nongialehkai ki dei ban wanrah ia ka birth certificate na ka bynta ka U-15 bad ki dei ban kha ha Kyllalyngkot 2006 bad ia ka U-18  ki dei ban kha ha Kyllalyngkot 2003.Ha kawei ka khubor,  ka Langsning ka ai khublei ia u bah Dapbor Tariang uba pas ia ka B License.  U bah Dapbor u dei u coach ba dei peit ia U-15 bad Assistant coach jong ka kynhun ki rangbah ryngkat lang bad kiwei de ki nong ialehkai.
title: Yn jied nongialehkai ka Langsning ha Nongstoin

content: U Dr. Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus, Director General, World Health Organisation (WHO) lyngba ka BBC u la appeal sha ki Ri ka pyrthei baroh ba ki dei ban long kiba pynkhreh bha ia lade ban iada na u khniang jingpang Coronavirus uba haduh mynta u la trei ha ki 77,150 ngut ki briew tang ha China bad haduh 2592 ngut kiba la iap; ha South Korea bad Italy ka la trei jur bha bad shawei shawei de.Ka Sorkar Meghalaya jong ngi haduh katno ka la long kaba la pynkhreh ha kane ka bynta ngim tip; kumta nga sngew ba ka la dei ba ka Sorkar Meghalaya ka la dei ban pynkhreh ia ki lad jingiada kiba biang baroh bad ki nongsumar kiba la ioh jinghikai.Ia ka jingwan rung ki briew sha ka Jylla jong ngi la dei ban phikir na man ki lad baroh, khamtam ia ka jingwan kit ia ki Nongpang ha NEIGRIHMS na kylleng ka North East khamtam haba man ka step (5.00 AM) ki la poi ha NEIGRIHMS. Ym dei shuh ban shah ba kin wan kit da ki Bus kumto, ki la dei ban wan kit da ki Ambulance bad shwa ban rung sha ka Jylla ki dei ban ioh jingbit, kata, ba kim dei kiba don ia ki dak ki shin ki ban lam sha ka jingpang Coronavirus, katba dang don kane ka jingma na kane ka jingpang Cornavirus.Kane ka dei kaba kyrkieh ia ka Sorkar Jylla namar kam dei ban khie thiah ynda la ioh rung ka jingpang. Ka jingpynkhuid ia ki shnong ki thaw, ki lynti ki syngkien bad ki iew khamtam, kum ka Iewduh bad kiwei kiwei ki iew kumjuh. Ai ba ngin ieng kum uwei u briew ban iada ba kane ka jingpang kan ym ioh tang ban rung. Ka rukom bam ruh dei ban husiar shipor kumba ki paidbah ki la nang ban kiar na ki jain ki nep kiba wan na China ne Bangladesh, kumta ruh la dei ban kiar kum kaba bam snam jong kino kino ki jingri ne ki mrad. Ki jingbam ia ki khniang, ki doh ksew lah kaba kiar shwa shipor; kata, kano kano ka jingmlien ban bam sih dei ban ia kiar shwa shipor katba kane ka jingpang kam pat jah. Ainguh ia u Blei ba haduh mynta kam pat rung kane ka jingpang ha ka thain bad ka Ri India hynrei ngi dei ban husiar ba kan ym ioh rung la ha kano kano ruh ka rukom, namar ngi hap ialeh ia u nongshun uba ngim iohi. Ki jingduwai ki dei ban jur ba kane ka khlam kan ym rung.Nga kyrpad ia ka Health Department kan iathuh kaei kaba dang duna khnang ban pynbiang namar ynda la dier ka por kam myntoi ban ai report, naduh u Health Minister haduh ki Officer Rangbah ki hap shim ia ka jingkit khlieh katba dang biang ka por. Ngi dei ka Jylla ba sahdien ha ka liang ka jingsumar, te mynta dei ban pynkhlain shwa ba kaei kaei kaba sniew kan jia – Prevention is better than cure. Kane ka dei ka jingmaham ia baroh kiba don mynta ha ka bor la ki Ministers ne ki Officers ki Doctors lada kim shim khia ban long kiba ha khmat duh ban iada ia ka Jylla halor kane ka phang kin hap ai jingkhein.Bah HS ShyllaGood work Sir…go ahead and our state should have the unity to cooperate with each other.
title: Husiar ia ki nongpang ba wan poi ha NEIGHRIMS, ha shwa ka 5baje mynstep

content: Ka jing ia kynad ha North East Delhi, ka la shim ia 13 ngut ki mynsiem briew, kat haduh ka por ba thoh ia kane ka khubor.Ka khubor jong ka GTB Hospital, ka iathuh ba kitei ki dei ki met iap, kiba la poi ha katei ka hospital. La iathuh ba ki pulit, ki la siat da ka lyer pynsat khmat ha ki bynta jong ka Chand Bagh ha North East Dehli, namar ba katei ka dei ka jaka jong ka jing ia kynad kaba jur bha ha kine ki ar sngi ba ladep.
title: Kiew sha ka 13ngut kiba iap ha North East Delhi

content: Shillong: U nong ialam liang pyrshah ka sorkar Meghalaya u Dr. Mukul Sangma mynta ka sngi u la ong ba ka sorkar Meghalaya lem bad ka sorkarAssam ki dei ban ia shong bad ia kren halor ki kynrum kynram kiba mih ha ki thain khappud jong ki ar jylla.U Dr. Mukul Sangma u la ong ba naduh ki por ba synshar ka sorkar Congress ba lam khmat ma u, ka sorkar Meghalaya ka la dep ban ai ia jing thoh sha ka sorkar Assam ban pynshisha halor ka khyndew ka syiap ha ka thain Langpih, hynrei na ka liang ka sorkar Assam pat kam shym la phah kyrwoh halor kane ka mat.Na ka liang u Mukul Sangma u la kyntu ia u myntri rangbah ka jylla u Conrad K Sangma ban pynbor ia ka sorkar Assam ba kam dei ban wan rah ia ki jing tei pynroi ha ki jaka kynnad khlem pat phah kyrwoh sha ka sorkar Meghalaya.“Kat kum ka soskular ba la ia soi ha u snem 2014 ba ar jylla ki dei ban ia kren shah ha baroh ki tnat ka sorkar hashwa ban wan rah ki kam pynroi hapoh ki jaka ia kynnad ha ki khappud jylla” u la bynrap.Na ka liang u Mukul Sangma u la iathuh ruh ba ka sorkar Meghalaya ha ka jing ialam ka congress ka la thoh ruh sha ka sorkar pdeng na ka bynta ban pynbeit ia u pud u sam bad ka jylla Assam hynrei na ka liang ka sokar Assam kam kam sym la mynjur.Dr. Mukul Sangma u la ong ba lada ka sorkar Assam kam pdiang ia ki dulir ka Meghalaya, kadei ban khot iathir jingmut bad ban ia kren ban ia pynbeit ia u pud u sam jong ki ar jylla lyngba ka jig ia syllok ki myntri rangbah ki ar jylla lem bad kiwei pat ki tnat treikam ha ka jing ia treilang jong baroh ki seng sain pyrthei.
title: Donkam ban ia kren bad ka sorkar Assam halor ka jing ia kynnad ha khappud: Mukul Sangma

content: Shillong: U Nongialam liang pyrshah ka sorkar Meghalaya u Dr. Mukul Sangma mynta ka sngi u la ong ba ka liang pyrshah ka sorkar jylla kan ia leh katba ba lah ban pyn bor ia ka sorkar MDA ba lamkhmat da u myntri rangbah ka jylla u Conrad K Sangma ban weng noh ia ka dorkhas pyrshah ia ka hukum ka ‘Meghalaya Lokayukta’ hapoh ka ing bishah jong ka jylla.U Dr. Mukul Sangma mynta ka sngi, u la iathuh ba u la ioh jing tip ba ka sorkar MDA ka ka la ujor da ka dorkhas hapoh ka Meghalaya High Court jong ka jylla Meghalaya pyrshah ia ka rai jong ka ‘Meghalaya Lokayukta’ ban tohkit halor ki kam bamsap ba jyllei hapoh ka jylla bad ka jingkhaii dewiong beain.Na ka liang u Mukul Sangma u la ong ba kane ka jing leh jong ka sorkar Meghalaya ban nud ban leit ujor da ka dorkhas pyrshah ia ka hukum jong ka Lokayukta sha ka ing bishar, ka pyni ba ka sorkar Meghalaya ka don ei ei sha lyndet halor ki kam bam sap.“Ka sorkar Meghalaya ka dei ban weng noh mardor ia ka dorkhas pyrshah ia ka hukum ka Lokayukta khnang ba ka jing tohkit halor ki kam bam sap bad ka jing khaii tuh dewiong kan nang iaid noh shakhmat” u la bynrap.U Dr. Mukul Sangma u la dawa ruh na ka sorkar Meghalaya ba ka dei ban thung noh da ki kynhun laitluid na ka bynta phah tohkit pyrshah ia ki myntri ne ia ki ophisar ba donkti ha ki kam bam sap.U nong ialam liang pyrshah ka sorkar Meghalaya u la pynkynmaw ba ka nongrim ba la pynlong ain ia ka ‘Meghalaya Lokayukta’ ha u snem 2014 kadei ban the lakam ia ki kam bamsap hapoh ka jylla. U Mukul Sangma u la ong ruh ba ka Congress lem bad kiwei ki seng ain pyrthei lane ki riew paidbah ki dei ban iatrei lang na ka bynta ban rat dkhong ia ki kam bamsap hapoh ka jylla.U Dr. Mukul Sangma u la pynkut da ka ba ong ba ka liang pyrshah kan sa ai por ia ka sorkar Meghalaya halor bad ka jing dawa ban weng noh ia ka dorkhas bad ka liang pyrshah kan iai bud dieng ia ki kam bam sap hapoh ka jylla.
title: Dawa ka liang pyrshah na ka sorkar Meghalaya ban weng noh ia ka dorkhas pyrshah ia  ‘Meghalaya Lokayukta’

content: Shillong: Mynta ka sngi ki nongniah kali Tourist  kim shah ban wan rung ia ki kali Assam sha Shillong bad ki kali na Shillong sha Assam ha ka ba ki nongleit nongwan ki hap hiar noh tang ha Khanapara  Ribhoi District kane ka long hadien ka jing shah shoh jong uwei u nongniah kali Tourist u ba dei na Shillong ha ka 22 tarik u rymphang 2020 ha u International Airport, Borjhar, Assam ha ka ba kala mih ka jingiakynad hapdeng ki nongniah kali tourist ki ba na Assam bad Meghalaya.Ha ka 22 tarik u Rymphang 2020 u nongniah kali Tourist u ba tip kyrteng kum u Bah Maitshaphrang Marwein, u la shah shoh ha ki dalal ki ba pyniaid kali ia ki nongleit nongwan (passenger) ki ba dei na ka jylla Assam ha Guwahati Air port ha ka por kumba 2:30 baje janmiet.Na katei ka jingjia kala pynlong ba ki nongniah tourist ka Assam, ki la khang  ia ki Tourist taxi na Meghalaya ban rung sha Assam, ha kajuh ka rukom na ka liang jong ki nongniah kali Tourist  na Meghalaya, ki la khang ia ki kali  na Assam ban rung sha Meghalaya.Kane ka jingiapynibor kaba mar kylliang ka la sdang naduh ka jan miet sngi nyngkong haduh mynta ka sngi, ha kaba ki nongleit na Meghalaya kila hap ban hiar ha Khanapara bad ki hap ban shim da ka kali Assam ban poi sha Guwahati ha ka juh ka rukom kiba wan na Assam ki hap ban shim da ki kali Meghalaya ban poi sha Shillong.U bah Egenstar Kurkalang u wei na ki nongialam ba dei peit ia ki nongniah kali ha kane ka jylla Meghalaya, u la ong ba kum ka seng kan ia kynduh la shai ka sngi ban ia kren ia pynbeit ia kane ka jingeh bad ha dien kata kin sa kren ruh ia kiba na Assam halor kane ka jingeh kaba la mih ha pdeng ki nongniah kali.Halor kane ka jingjia na ka liang jong  ka Meghalaya Labour Union kala ai da ka jingujor sha u Director general ki pulit jong ka jylla Assam ba dei ban kem ia kito ki nongleh kam sniew ka jingdawa pisa palat ka dei ka kam lute.Haba ia dei bad kane u bah Erwin K Syiem Sutnga u la thoh sha u myntri pla pisa ka sorkar Assam u Himanta Biswa Sharma bad kum juh sha u Director General ki pulit ha kaba ia dei bad kane ka jingjia. La pyntip ruh ia kane ka jingjia sha u Commissioner Transport jong ka jylla Meghalaya.Lah dei hi ban ia kamai lakajongka state  .namar ban kham ioh noh nong ki driver shillong.
title: Ba shah shoh u draibar Tourist, ym shah rung kali Assam sha Shillong

content: Shillong: Ka Election Commission jong ka Ri India mynta ka sngi ka la pynmih ia ka jingpynbna ba ia ka ilekshon ban jied ia u MP sha Rajya Sabha na kane ka jylla Meghalaya ha ka 26 tarik u Lber 2020.Ka jylla Meghalaya ka don tang kawei ka seat na kane ka jylla bad ia ka tarik ban pynbna ha ka ba ia dei bad kane ka ilekshon kan long ha ka 26 tarik u Lber.Ka sngi ba khatduh ban thep kyrteng kan long ha ka 13 tarik Lber, ka jingbishar bniah ia ki kot ki sla kan long 16tarik u Lber, lada don ki ba kwah ban weng ia ki kyrteng na ka jingiakhun kan long ha ka 18tarik u Lber bad ka jingiathep vote kan long ha ka 26 tarik u Lber bad ka jingniew vote kan long ha ka juh ka sngi kaban sdang naduh ka 5:00 janmiet, ha ka 30 tarik u Lber yn pyndep lut ha kaba ia dei bad kane ka MP Rajya sabha.ka MP Rajya Sabha ka lah ban kylla ha kaba ka BJP kan ym ioh Majority ki daw :-1. na ki 28 tylli ki state ka BJP ka ioh ban synshar marwei ka long tang 4 tylli kata Kanataka, Himachal, Uttarakhan, bad Gujarat. bad 12 tylli pat kiba khleh party lang tang ban ioh schemes na Delhi kum ka Jylla jong ngi lait noh ka Assam, tripura bad Arunachal Pradesh.2. ka jingwanrah ia ka GST, CAA, ka jing pharia ia ka J&K da ka NDA kan ktah jur ia kane ka election Rajya Sabha ka ban wan.
title: 26tarik Lber, ka elekshon ban jied MP Rajya Sabbha

content: Patna: Ka sorkar Bihar, ka la thoh sha ka sorkar India, ba kan weng noh ia ki katto katne ki kyndon ha ka phom jong ka National Population Register (NPR), ong U Nitish Kumar, myntri rangbah ka Bihar, haba jubab ha ka iing dorbar Jylla mynta ka sngi.“Wat ma nga ruh ngam tip satia,  haei ba la kha ia ka kmie jongnga. Kam donkam satia ban iakren halor ka NRC” ong U Kumar.Ka jingkren jong u myntri rangbah, ka mih  hadien ba ka la thnam ka jing ia kren ha iing dorbar jong ka Bihar, ha kaba ki liang pyrshah, ki kynnoh ia katei ka ain citizenship jong ka sorkar India, kum ka kala kanoon.
title: Nga ruh ngam tip satia, haei la kha ia ka kmie jongnga, ong U MR ka Bihar

content: Ka jingpang Corona, ka la ioh ban trei mynta sa ia u myntri khynnah ka koit ka khiah jong ka Iran, ong ka khubor mynta ka sngi.La iathuh ba U Harirchi, myntri khynnah ka koit ka khaih, ula kem pang Corona, hadien ba ula leit ban peit dalade hi ia ki nongpang, kiba ngat ia katei ka jingpang ha katei ka Ri.U Alireza Vahabzadeh, uba dei u nong ai ktien jong u myntri, u iathuh ba U Iraj Harirchi, u  jyrhoh khah khah bad u mih syer jur bha, ha ka por ba u kren sha ki kotkhubor myn hynnin ka sngi.Ka jingiap jong kiba pang Corona, ha Iran, ka la poi mynta sha ka 15ngut, ha kaba mynta ka sngi, ki dono 3ngut kiba iap bad kaba dei ka jingiap kaba bun duh hadien ka China.
title: Trei ka jingpang Corona, sa ia u myntri ka sorkar Iran

content: Ka jingiap ka la poi sha ka 10ngut mynta ka sngi, na ka jing ialeh pyrshah kiba kyrshan bad kiba pyrshah CAA ha ka nongbah Delhi.Saw ngut ki briew, ki dei kiba la iap lypa bad ba  la leit rah sha GTB Hospital bad sa  35ngut kiwei pat kiba mynsaw.U Arvind Kejriwal, myntri rangbah ka Delhi, U Manish Sisodia, myntri rangbah ba ar ka Jylla, ki la leit jngoh ia kitei kiba mynsaw bad kiba shah sumar ha GTB Hospital bad ha kiwei pat ki jaka.Haduh ka por ba thoh ia ka khubor, la iathuh ba ka jing ia kynad, ka dang bteng ha ki bynta jong ka Maujpur jong ka North East Delhi, ha kaba ki nong iakhih paidbah, ki la pynjot ia ki iing ki sem, ki lute ia ki jingdon jingem jong ki briew bad ki nongthoh khubor, ki shah shoh bad shah weng ia ki jingring video ba ki ring halor ki jingjia ha katei ka thain.Ka khubor pulit, ka iathuh ba ki don 186ngut ki riew paidbah kiba mynsaw ha katei ka jing ia kynad ki ar kynhun bad nangta sa 56ngut ki pulit ruh kiba mynsaw, nalor ka jingiap jong u langrut heh hynnin ka sngi.Balei la jan baroh ki ain ba pyntrei ka sorkar u modi iap briew shwa beit hadien sa pyntreikam ngi hap ban pyrkhat sani bha ,  kine kiei2 baroh kidei na kadaw ka jing bakla jong ka sorkar u modi. Da kynmaw paitbah kiei kiba lajia baroh hapoh ka jing pyniaid ka sorkar u modi
title: Kiew sha ka 10ngut kiba iap, na ka jing ia shoh kiba pyrshah bad kyrshan CAA ha Delhi

content: Shillong: U Dr Mukul Sangma  u nongialam jong ka liang pyrshah haba ia kren bad ki ladpathai khubor u la ong ba ka jylla Meghalaya ka donkam kyrkieh ia  Inner Line Permit namar ka jingpynlong ain ia ka ka Citizenship Amendment Act, 2019  ka ba trei kam ha ka Ri India.Na ka liang u Dr Mukul u la ong ruh ba ka jingpyrshang jong u myntri kam pohing jong ka sorkar India u Amit Shah ban pynsngewthuh sha ki paidbah halor ka CAA ka ha iing dorbar bad sha bar jong ka iing dorbar da kaba ong ba ia ka Ri India la phiah ha ka por ba ioh laitluid ha ka nongrim jong ka niam ka long ka ba bakla bad ka ba pyrshah ia ka history jong ka Ri bad ia ka burom jong ka Ri .U Dr Mukul u la ong ba baroh ki tip ba shuwa ban ioh ia ka jinglaitluid bun ki hima ki ia wan lang ban pynlong ia kane ka Ri kaba khraw bad kata ka jingiawan lang ka long halor ka jingiasngewthuh jingmut lang bad kane ka juh ka jingsngew kaba la long na ka bynta kito ki ba ha Pakistan kiba kwah ba ia ka Ri jong ki dei ban pynshong nongrim ha ka kyrteng ka niam ym ka ri India.U Dr Mukul u la ong ba ka jingialam bakla ia ka histori bad ia ka burom jong kane ka Ri kaba khraw ka don ka jingthmu lupa, ka jingthmu ban wanrah ia ka lynti ban ong ba ia kane ka Ri la seng nongrim ha ka niam bad u la buh ruh ia ka jingkylli ba  kaei kata ka niam kaba ki kren?  Ka sorkar mynta ka pyrshang ban ialam bakla ia kaba dei ban pyrshah tyngeh da ki paidbah jong ka jylla.Haba ia dei bad ka ILP u nongialam ka liang pyrshah u la ong ba ka sorkar Jylla ka dei ban wad ia ki lad ki lynti ban pynsngew sha ka sorkar India  ba ka jylla Meghalaya ka la don kam kyrkieh ia ka ILP.
title: Namar ba la wan ka CAA, ka jylla ka donkam ia ka ILP: Mukul

content: Shillong: Ka Hynniewtrep Youth Council sengkmie ha ka jingiadon ryngkat ka HYC west khasi hill district bad ka HYC Rimuliang circle hynni ka sngi,   ki la hiar sha ka shnong Umwali , Langpih ban ia kynduh ia ki nongshong shnong ka thain hadien ka jing wan thombor jong ki pulit  Assam ban buh ia ka ktem  pulit ha Umwali.Na ka liang jong u President ka Sengkmie  u Bah Robertjune Kharjahrin u la ai burom bad iaroh ia ki nongshong shnong, ki nongialam shnong bad ki Trai jaka kiba la ia ieng ban iada ia ka khyndew ka shyiap khlem da tieng ia ki pulit Assam.U la ai khublei ruh ia ki pulit bad ka District Administration ka West Khasi Hill, kiba don ryngkat bad ki paidbah bad kyntu ruh ia ki nongshong shnong ba kin ia tylli bad iarap lang markylliang ha kano kano ka por.U nongialam ka HYC  u la ong ruh “Lada ka Assam ki pyni ia ka map ki khasi pat kin bat ia kyndew ban pynshisha ba ngi long ki trai ha kane ka jaka, phi ki nongshong shnong phi long kum ki Border security force ka jaidbynriew ban iada ia u pud u sam”.Na ka liang ka HYC  ka dawa ba ka sorkar ba kan buh ki pulit bad ki outpost ki ba biang ha kane ka jaka ban iada ia ki paidbah bad kumjuh ruh ka dawa ba ka ladei ka por ba ki lai tylli ki sorkar kata ka sorkar India, sorkar Meghalaya bad sorkar Assam kin pynbeit noh ia u pud u sam namar ka jing bymlah ban pynbeit ia u pud u sam ka la long kum ki liewlep ki ba ap jingma pynban ia ki paidbah. Ban wanrah ia ka suk ka sain, ka roi ka par bad ka jingiada ba paka ia la u pud ka la don kam kyrkieh ka jing pynbeit noh ia u pud u Sam.Ka Seng ka pynrem jur ia ka jingwan pynkhein ka Assam ia ka “Status Quo” bad kumjuh ruh ia ka jing wanrah ka jong ki pulit Assam da ki shipai 11th Gorkha Regiment ha ka sngi u Blei, ka dei ka kam pyni bor bad ngi dawa ba ka dei ba sangeh mardor ia kum kine ki kam.
title: Lada ka Assam ka pyni ia ka map, ki Khasi kin bat ia ka khyndew ban pynshisha ba ngi long trai:Robertjune

content: Ki saiantis, ki don ka jing antad, ba ki briew, ne kiwei pat ki jingim, kin don kiba shong ba sah ha ki krem kiba jylliew bha, ha u met bneng Mars.Halor katei ka jingshem jongki, kin phah ia ka kali ba kyrpang lane ka rover mynta ka lyiur, ban tih ia katei ka jingshisha, kumba ki la antad.U Scientist, uba wad ia katei ka jingdon briew ha U Mars, U  Vlada Stamenković, u iathuh ba ka bynta ba shalor jong u Mars, ka don kaba don shibun ka oxide, ka radiation bad ka mariang kaba khia bad kam don um kaba thikna bad kumta kam long kaba bit ban shong briew.La iathuh ba ka um, ka lah ban don sha ka mei ramew jong utei u met bneng bad kumta kin phah da ki robot kiba bit ban leit sha kitei ki krem, na ka bynta ban wad ia ki jingthaw ba im, kiba don ha kitei ki krem.Ki don kumba shi hajar tylli ki jaka rung sha kitei ki krem, kiba la dep ring dur bad dro da ka  US Geological Survey’s (USGS) Astrogeology Science Center bad la sngewthuh ba kan dei ka jinglut kaba jur bha ia ka NASA, namar ba kam long kaba suk ban phah da ki robot sha katei ka ktem, hynrei ka donkam ia ki ban shna kyrpang ba kin ioh ban leit ring dur sha kitei ki krem.
title: Antad ki saiantis, ba don ki jingthaw ba im ne ki briew, ha ki krem ha U Mars

content: Ka jingiap na ka jing ia kynad ha ka North East Delhi, ka la poi sha ka 7ngut haduh mynta ka sngi.La iathuh ba ka la sdang biang ia ka jing ia kawang maw ha Maujpur bad ha Brahmpur mynta dang step phyrngab. Ki don 50ngut kiwei pat kiba mynsaw bad kitei ki kynthup ia ki riew paidbah bad ia ki shipai bad ki pulit jong ka nongbah Delhi ruh.Ka jing ia kynad ka jia, namar ba ka don ka jing ia pyni bor hapdeng kiba pyrshah bad kiba kyrshan ia ka Citizenship Act ha North East Delhi.Ki lad khubor ki iathuh shuh shuh ba ka don ka jingklang ba jur jong ka ding ha Karawal Nagar, kaba dei ka iew die shaka kali bad U Amit Shah, myntri kam poh iing ka India, la sngewthuh ba un ia kynduh ia U Lat ka nongbah Delhi bad ia Arvind Kerjiwal, myntri rangbah ka Delhi ha ka por 12 baje nohsngi ban iakren ia ka jinglong ka suk ka sain ha ka nongbah.
title: Kiew ka jingiap sha ka 7ngut, ha ka jing ia kynad CAA ha Delhi

content: Mynta ka sngi, ki don sa 508ngut kiba ioh ia ka jing pang kynsha  coronavirus, ong ka  National Health Commission jong ka sorkar China bad katei ka nang kiew, na kaba long hynnin ka sngi, ha kaba kiba ioh pang, ki don  409ngut.Kat haduh mynta kiba ioh pang ha China, ki don  77,658 ngut bad kiba iap ki la poi sha ka 2,663 ngut, ha kaba kiba dang shu iap ki tam na 71ngut, na kaba long shi sngi mynshwa bad kitei ki long 68ngut ha Hubei bad sa 56ngut ha Wuhan.
title: Kiew kiba iap sha ka 2,663ngut na ka Corona ha China

content: Chennai: Da ki spah ngut ki Muslim, kiba shong ba sah ha ka shong Nagapattinam District jong ka Tamil nadu, ki la weng noh ia baroh ki account jongki napoh Bank, namar ba ki sheptieng her, ia ka jingthmu jong ka sorkar India, ban pyntrei kam ia ka  National Population Register (NPR) bad ha kaba kin duh noh ia baroh ka pisa jongki hapoh Bank.Katei ka jingjia, ka dei ha ka shnong  Therizhandur bad la pyni ia ka video ba ki trai shnong, ki iakren bad ki bor pyniaid jong ka  Indian Overseas Bank (OB), ha kaba katei ka Bank, ka la bthah ia ki, ba kim dei ban sei noh ia la ka jong ka pisa na Bank bad U Branch Manager, ula batai ba ka jing aiti ia ki kot ki sla shapoh Bank, kan nym donkam than satia bad ba ka pisa jongki, ka don jingshngain hapoh Bank.U Jamath, uba peit ia katei ka shnong, u ong ba ki Muslim, ki don ha ka jingsyier mynsiem kaba khraw, hadien ba la pyntrei kam ia ka ain  Citizenship Act, namar ba ki tieng ioh ki duh noh ia baro ka pisa jongki. “Ngi iohsngew ba ki Bank, ki kwah ban pyntreikam da ka NPR, ha ki account lane kaba ki ong  KYC (Know Your Customer) list. Kumta ngi tieng ioh ngi duh noh ia la ka jong ka pisa bad ngim tip ruh ia kiei ki kot kiba donkam ban pyni ia ka jinglong trai shnong jongngi bad kumta ngi la rai ban sei noh ia la ka jong ka pisa kaba don da ki bun bun snem hapoh Bank” ong U  Jamath uba peit ia ka Haja bad ula ong ba kiba bun ki nongshong shnong ki rit mynsiem, namar kim don ia ki kot ki sla, ban pyni ia la ka jong ka jinglong nongshong shnong.
title: Sei noh ki Muslim ia ki pisa na Bank, ba ki tieng ia ka NPR bad ka KYC

content: Jowai:  Myn hynnin ka step, ki pulit ka Umkiang Outpost ki la ioh ban tam haduh ar tylli ki metiap ki bym lah ban ithuh na rud surok bah ha Ratacherra, hajan Malidor, East Jaintia Hills.Kitei ki ar tylli ki mettiap ki kynthup ia kawei ka samla kynthei kaba la 30 snem antad bad kawei pat kadei ka jong u samla 30 snem antad.Ka tyllong khubor ka la iathuh ba ka metiap u shynrang ka dei kaba la puyt katba ka metiap katei ka kynthei ka long kaba dang shu bret ha ki 20 lane 24 kynta.Ha kaba iadei bad ka metiap katei ka kynthei ym pat lah ban ong la ka shah bat tnga jubor ne em ha shwa ba kan shah pyniap, hynrei ka don ka jingsuba jur ba ka lah ban shah ia katei ka jingleh bein.Ki pulit ka Umkiang ki la leit tam ia baroh ar ki metiap kiba thiah lynktar ha ka jingjngai kaba hapdeng 50 bad 70 metre bad la pynkit ia ki sha Khliehriat CHC na ka bynta ban pyndep ia ka post Mortem Examination.
title: Lap metiap ki pulit Umkiang ar tylli  na rud Surok

content: Shillong:   U nongialam ka kynhun Iada La Ka Ri, u bah Ardent M Basaiaw moit, MLA barim, u la kyntu ia ki paidbah ban long kiba iai shah namar ba ka kynhun ka dang iaid mynta ha ka jingiasyllok bad ki dorbar shnong ban pyntyllun ia ka jingiakhih paidbah ne Revolution.Ha ka kyrwoh ba la pynlait, u bah Ardent u la ong ba la sngewthuh ba ki paidbah ka Ri ki la lynga bad sngew kwah tip kumno ka jingiaid lynti jong kane ka jingialeh khamtam hadien ba la rai ha kato ka jingialang kaba lah long ha ka 6 tarik u Rymphang 2020 ha Madan Student.“Nga kwah ban pyntip hangne ba kumba ngi la rai ban iakynduh ia ki Nongsynshar Shnong ha kane ka Ri jong ngi, ha kine ki khyndiat sngi ngi lah iohlad ban ia kynduh ia shibun ki Synjuk ki Nongsynshar Shnong bad kaba sngewtynnad ban pyntip ka long ba baroh ki jingiakynduh ki long kiba jop namar ka jinglong ba la kloi jong ki ban iatreilang bad ban kyrshan ia kane ka Revolution ban pynioh ha ngi ka Jylla ia ki aiñ kiba khlain ba ngi lah ban synshar ia lade katkum ka tynrai jong ngi u Khun Khasi Khara”, la ong u bah Ardent.U la ong ba ka jingkyrshan kaba la ioh ha kane ka jingiakynduh bad ki Nongsynshar jong ki Shnong bapher ka la ai mynsiem shibun ia kiba la lamkhmat ia kane ka Revolution. “Ngi kyrpad ia ki paid ka Ri baroh ba kin iashah shitom sa tang katto katne por ba ngin pyndep ia kane ka jingiasyllok bad ki Nongsynshar Shnong”, la ong u bah Ardent.U la ong ba ka long kaba donkam ban pynkhreh bha ha shwa ban jam shakhmat ha ka jingialeh. Ka por kam slem shuh hi ban khot biang ia u paid ka Ri ban pynsngew ia ki mat jingdawa ban buh ha khmat ka Sorkar India na ka bynta ka lawei ba phyrnai jong ka Ri bad ka Jaidbynriew Khasi.Ha kajuh u la kyntu ia ki paidbah ba kin long kiba la khreh ha kano kano ka por ba sngew ia ka jingkhot ban mih shakhmat ban tur na ka bynta ka lashai ka lashisngi jong ki longdien mandien.
title: Hadien ka jingiasyllok bad ki nongsynshar shnong, yn lum biang ia ka jingialang paidbah ka Iada La Ka Ri, ong u bah Ardent

content: Shillong:  U symbud myntri rangbah ka jylla u Prestone Tynsong u la ong ba ka sorkar Meghalaya mynta u snem kan sdang ban pynheh noh ia ka surok naduh Umshyrpi sha Tamabil na ka bynta ban pyn kham kylluid ia ka jing dheng kali naduh Umshyrpi shaduh 7 Mer Upper Shillong.Na ka liang u Prestone Tynsong u la iathuh ba ia kane ka surok ka ba don kumba 96 km yn bei pisa da ka Japan International Cooperation Agency (JICA). U la iathuh ruh ba ka sorkar Meghalaya mynta ka dang buh por shi bnai na ka bynta ban siew noh ia ka pisa sha ki trai jaka ki ba la shah ktah na ka bynta ban pynheh ia ka surok naduh Umshyrpi shaduh Tamabil.“Nga don jing kyrmen ba ia kane ka surok yn sdang beit mynta u snem bad na ka liang ka PWD (Road) ruh ka dang pynkhreh ban sdang lum jing khein halor ka pisa ban siew sha ki trai jaka” u la bynrap.U Bah Prestone Tynsong u la ong ruh ba ia ka kamram ban lum jing khein na ka bynta ban siew sha ki trai jaka la aiti sha ka ophis treikam ka Deputy Commissioner (DC) East Khasi Hills ban kham suk na ka bynta ki paidbah.Haba dei bad ka jing pynheh ia ka surok (2 Lane) na Demseiniong sha duh Deingpasoh u Bah Prestone Tynsong u la iathuh ba ka sorkar Meghalaya ka dang khot tender na ka bynta ban pyntrei ia ka surok bad ka jing lut kan long kumba 35 klur tyngka. Kane ka surok kan pyllait ruh ia ka jing dheng kali sha ki thain Polo, Nongmensong, NEIGRIHMS Hospital shaduh sha Shillong New Township.
title: Mynta u snem yn pyntrei noh ia  ka surok na Umshyrpi sha Tamabil

content: Shillong:   U symbud myntri rangbah ka jylla u Prestone Tynsong mynta ka sngi u la kyntu ia ki paidbah ka jylla ba kin sdang ia ki kam lajong kam ka kam ri Masi bad ri Sniang na ka bynta ban ioh kamai hapoh ka jylla.Haba kren bad ki lad pathai khubor u Prestone Tynsong u la ong ba lyngba ka ‘Meghalaya Milk Mission’ ka sorkar Meghalaya ka kwah ban kyntiew ia ki paidbah ka jylla ban seng kam lajong da ka ba ri Masi khnang ban kiew ka kamai ka jih hapoh ka jylla. U la ong ruh ba ka sorkar ka don shibun ki jing iarap na ka bynta ki ba kwah ri Sniang ne ri Masi da ka ba pynshlur ia ki paidbah ban seng kam lajong lyngba ki ‘Cooperative Society’.“Ha ka juk mynta ki paidbah ka jylla ki dei ban sngewthuh ba kam don ka kam ka barit bad kim dei ban lehrain ba ki ri masi ne ri sniang na ka bynta ban ioh kamai jakpoh” u la bynrap.Na ka liang u Prestone Tynsong u la ong ba thong jong ka sorkar Meghalaya mynta ka dei ban ia wer ia ki paidbah ka jylla lyngba sha ki ‘Workshop’ ne ki jing ai jing hikai na ka bynta ban pyn sngewthuh ia ki ba ka kam ri masi bad ri sniang ka long ka ba ai jing myntoi shibun ia ki paidbah ka jylla baroh kawei.“Nga kyntu ia ki paidbah ka jylla ba kin ia sdang da ki ‘Cooperative Society’ na ka bynta ban seng kam lajong khnang ba ka sorkar kan ioh ban ai jingiarap pisa lyngba ka ram ka ba la ban kot shaduh ka 25 lak tyngka sha kawei ka ‘Cooperative Society’ na ka ban seng kam “ u la bynrap.U la iathuh ba lyngba ka jing ai ram ka sorkar Meghalaya mynta ki la don haduh 150 tylli ki ‘Cooperative Society’ ki ba la ioh jing iarap na ka sorkar ban seng kam lajong.Na ka liang u Prestone Tynsong u la ai jing iaroh ruh ia ka thain Upper Shillong ka ba la shim khia bha ban thaw ia ki ‘Cooperative Society’ na ka bynta ban ai kam ai jam ia ki paidbah jong ka thain.
title: Kyntu U Bah Prestone  ia ki  paidbah ban ri Masi bad ri Sniang

content: Shillong:  Ka All Megha laya Dancers Association ryngkat ka West Khasi Hills Youth Talented Youth Association kan wan phai biang ban it ia ki riewdonsap jong ka thain West Khasi Hills hadien ka jingmihkhmat jong u samla Gary Kynshi khar ha ka India Talent Fight uba na ka shnong Nongkasen bad Ibatei thymmai Nongrum Yes I Am bad iba la rwai ruh ia ka Album ryngkat bad u Kumar Sanu ha Nongbah Mumbai iba na ka shnong Bynther ia ka state Meghalaya kumjuh ruh ia ka District jong ka West Khasi Hills.Ka AMDA ryngkat ka WKHYTY kan pynlong biang ia ka rynsan pyni sap jong ka thain West khnang ban sei ia ki heprit, ki samla, ki longkmie, ki longkpa kiba don ia ka sap kaba kyrpang khnang ba lah ban pynpaw ia ka sap ka phong lyngba kane ka rynsan.Ka jingmihkhmat jong ki kine ki arngut ki riewdonsap ka thain West ka pynktit mynsiem biang ia ka AMDA ban mih shakhmat ban pynlong ia kane ka rynsan West Khasi Hills Got Talent Season-II ka ban sa long ha ka 29tarik Rymphang, 2020 ha Mairang bad Nongstoin, 7tarik Lber, 2020 ha Nongkhlaw bad Laitdom, ka bairung kan long Rs. 500/- tyngka marwei ne group.Kito ki bym shim la lah ban wan ha ka Audition ki lah ban phah ia ki jingrwai bad ki jingshad ne kino kino ki Talent kiba ki don lyngba ka video ha ki WhatsApp’s No. 8787413701/8131934923/6033144187. Ia ki jingtip ba kham bniah phi lah ban phone ruh ha kine ki number.
title: Yn iit ia ki riew don sap ka West Khasi Hills, ong ka AMDA

content: Shillong:  Ka dorbar mang tyngka ka jylla kan long ha ka 13 tarik haduh 26 tarik Lber ban wan. Ka dorbar kan long tang 10 sngi.Na kine ki shiphew sngi, 7 sngi la mang ia ki kam ka sorkar katba lai sngi ia kiwei ki kam shimet kiban wanrah da ki MLA.Ia ka mang tyngka 2020-21, yn wanrah da u myntri rangbah ba bat ia ka tnad pla tyngka u Conrad Sangma ha ka 18 tarik bad yn pas ha ka 26 tarik Lber.Ia kine ki sngi long dorbar la mynjur da ka Business Advisory Committee (BAC) ka ïing dorbar mynta ka sngi.
title: 10 sngi ka dorbar mang tyngka

content: Shillong: Ka Synjuk ki Nong synshar Shnong Upper Shillong, kaba kynthup ïa ki 12 tylli ki Shnong, ha ka jingïalang kaba la long ha ka 22 tarik mynta u bnai ha kaba la ïadon lang ki Rangbah Shnong, ki Secretary Shnong bad ki dkhot ki Executive Committee ka la ïoh ban ïatai ïa ka mat halor ka Revolution ba la sdang da u Bah Ardent Basaïawmoit. Ka jingïalang kaba la long ha Mawklot hadien ba ka la ïoh jingpynshai na u Bah Ardent, da kawei ka jingmut ka la rai ban kyrshan bad ïashim bynta lang ha kane ka Revolution ban wer ruh ïa ki paidbah ban ai lang ka jingkyrshan.Kumjuh ruh ka Executive Committee jong ka Dorbar Shnong Jaiaw Shyiap Lum Pyllon ha ka jingïadon lang ki ki nongmihkhmat na ki Dorbar Shnong Jaïaw Pyllun ka la pynlong ïa ka jingïalang ryngkat ka jingïadon lang u Bah Ardent ha ka 24 tarik mynta u bnai ha Conference Hall jong ka Jaïaw Shyiap Lum Pyllon. Kane ka jingïalang ka la ai ka jingkyrshan ïa ka Revolution ha kaba kawei na ki mat jingdawa ka long ba ka sorkar kan ithuh bad pynkup bor noh ïa ki Rangbah Shnong da ka aiñ. Ka jingïalang ka la shim ruh ïa ka rai ban ïatreilangban pynurlong ïa kane ka kynhun lyngba ka jingïakhih “Iada la ka Ri”.
title: Kyrshan ki  Nongsynshar Shnong ïa ka Revolution

content: Shillong:  Ka Sorkar Megha laya kam shym la shim khia eiei ha kaba ïadei bad ban ai jingïarap sha ki lanot lynshop mariang jong ki shnong kiba hap hapoh ka jingpeit jong ka Sohïong C&RD Block kiba kyn thup ia ka shnong Mawdngung, Mawlyngthoh, Len Mawtap, Umsohïong, Nongkasen, Sohïong Mawkynjing, Len Pdengshnong, Kyndong Wahlang, Mawsniang, Shilliangdongki, Mawtap Pyllun, Surok Spar, Nongbah Sohïong, Len Mawtap –A, bad Laitnongkseh kiba la ngat ha ka jing lynshop phria ia ki mar rep ha ki ha u bnai Lber – Iaiong, 2018.Kat kum ka jingïoh jingtip jong ka Seng HYC, la iathuh ba ki lanot kiba la shah pynjulor ha u phria ia u phan ha u tei u snem ki long ha ka shnong Mawdngung ki don 52 ngut, ha ka shnong Mawlyngthoh ki don 29 ngut, ha ka shnong Len Mawtap ki don 12 ngut, ha ka shnong Umsohïong ki don 4ngut, ha ka shnong Nongkasen ki don 30 ngut, ha ka shnong Sohïong Mawkynjing ki don 48 ngut, Len Pdeng Shnong ki don 12 ngut, Kyndong Wahlang ki don 102 ngut, Mawsniang ki don 27 ngut, Shilliang Dongki ki don 2 ngut, Mawtap Pyllun ki don 5 ngut, Surok Spar ki don 30 ngut, Nongbah Sohïong ki don 36 ngut, Len Mawtap –A ki don 37 ngut, bad ha Laitnongkseh ki don 23 ngut.Haba ïohi ha ki lad pathai khublor ha u bnai Jymmang jong u snem 2019, mar mar ka Sorkar Meghalaya ka noh jingïarap haduh 1klur tyngka sha ka jylla Odisha, mar syn don ka jing lynshop mariang. Hynrei kaba lyngngoh pat ka long ba lada lynshop mariang ha ka jylla Meghalaya pat ka Sorkar Megahalaya haduh 2snem kam pat lah ban ai jingiarap. Kane ka paw shai ba ka Sorkar Megalaya ka kheiòkor ïa ki ba shabar ka jylla ban ïa kiba ha poh ka jylla lajong. Lada tang hapoh shi taiew la lah ban leit ai jingïarap sha Odisha, balei haduh 2snem ym lah ban ai jingïarap sha ki lanot hala ka jong ka jylla, kylli katei ka seng.Kumba jia ha ka shnong Laitnongkseh leilei ka jing lynshop phria ia u phan ka long haduh arsien kynthih, kata ka dei ha ka por ba u phan u ‘dang shu mih na khyndew bad sa shisien pat ha ka por ba u sdang ban phuh syntiew. Ka jing lynshop phria ha u tei u snem bad ki tei ki shnong ka long kaba lah jur haduh kata kata ha kaba ha kiba bun ki jaka ki dieng phan ki lah dambit ha khyndew. Kumta ha u tei u snem 2018 ka la ktah haduh kata kata ïa ka ïoh ka kot jong ki paid Nongrep ha ki tei ki shnong, bad kala pynlong ka jingduhnong kaba khraw. Kumta na ka liang jong ka HYC Sohïong Circle ngi dawa na ka Sorkar Meghalaya ba ka dei ban pylait noh kloi katba lah ban ai ki jingïarap sha ki tei ki lanot lynshop mariang, ong  ka kyrwoh ba la phah da u Samla Purningstar Shabong, President HYC Sohiong Circle.
title: Hadien ar snem, ym shym iarap lanot mariang sha thain Sohiong

content: Nongpoh:   Ki nongialam ka HYC, Nongpoh Circle, hapoh ka jingialam u Samla Ban Khongdup, Vice-President bad u Bah Tony Shylla, General Secretary lem bad ki dkhot, myn hynnin ka sngi ki la leit ban jurip ia baroh ki nala ba shait jia ki jingshlei um hapoh ka Sor Nongpoh bad hadien katei ka jingleit jurip, ki la leit syndon ban kynduh ia ki Bor Distrik ka Ri Bhoi, na ka bynta ban kyntu ia ki ba ki dei ban leh ei ei halor katei ka jingbym biang ki Nala pyniaid um ha Nongpoh.Ha katei ka jingleit jurip, kitei ki nongialam ka HYC Nongpoh Circle, ki la leit ban jurip ia kiba bun ki Nala ha Nongpoh bad ha katei ka jingjurip jong ki, la lap ba jan baroh ki Nala kim pat biang bad kaba kham ktah eh ia ki paidbah, ka dei ia ka Nala kaba don hajan ka Bethany Hospital, ha kaba katei ka Nala kam treikam satia bad ka um ka neh shi jaka, kaba la wanrah ia ka jingsma ym tang ia ki paidbah nongleit nongwan, hynrei ia ki paidbah kiba sah majan katei ka jaka.Hadien katei ka jingjurip, kitei ki nongialam ka HYC, ki la leit ban kynduh ia u Bah D.P Kharsati, ADC ka Ri Bhoi, ha kaba ki la ioh ban pynsngew ia kka jingeh ki paidbah hapoh ka Sor Nongpoh, kiba la iakynduh jingeh halor ka jingbymbiang ki Nala ha Nongpoh, ha kaba ka jingbym biang ki Nala pyntuid um, ka la wanrah jingeh shikatdei eh ia ki paidbah bad khamtam eh ha ka por Lyiur.Haba iadei bad katei ka jingleit kynduh da ki nongialam ka HYC, utei u nongialam ka HYC, u la iathuh ba na ka liang u ADC u la kular ha ka ban shimkhia halor katei ka mat, khnang ban weng syndon ia ka jingeh kaba la iakynduh da ki paidbah hapoh ka Sor Nongpoh.Namarkata, haba iadei bad katei ka jingbymbiang ki Nala, na ka liang ka seng ka kyntu ia ki Bor Distrik ka Ri Bhoi, ba ki dei ban shimkhia ha ka ban khot ia ki heh ka NHAI, khnang ba kin lah ban pynbha ia kitei ki Nala kiba dang sahteng tad haduh kine ki sngi, namar ka jingsahteng kitei ki Nala ka wanrah jingeh ia ki paidbah bad khamtam ha kaba kum kane ka por ba la jan ka por Lyiur, u la bynrap.
title: Kynduh bor Distrik ka HYC halor ka jingsahkut ki Nala ha Nongpoh

content: Shillong:  Ka Meghalaya ka la pynliem ia ka Manipur da 54 run ha ka jingiakhun ka Women’s Senior One-Day Trophy ba long ha Puducherry hynnin ka sngi.Ka Meghalaya kaba tied nyngkong ka la kamai 202/7 ha kaba 101  run la kamai da ka Saee Purandare shwa ba ka Manipur ka la lah ban tied tang 148/6 ha ka 50 overs.Ka Purandare ka la tied 14 tylli ki saw ha ka 149 bol katba ka Riticia Nongbet ka kamai 16 run kaba pynlong ia ka Meghalaya ban kamai palt 200.Ka Daiaka Warjri ka pynhap 2/12  ha ki saw tylli ki over katba ka Debasmita Dutta ka kamai 1/36 ha ki 7 over.
title: Pynliem ka Meghalaya ia ka Manipur

content: Shillong:  Ka phutbol, “7 Amlarem Constituency Cup 2019-20” kan poi noh sha kaba kut hakaba iaka 3rd place ka jingialeh kan long hapdeng ka Mupyut circle pyrshah iaka Syndai circle ha madan phutbol playground Nongtalang la 27 tarik mynta u bnai ha ka por 11:15 baje mynstep.Haka juh hi ka sngi bad haka juh ka madan, haka por 1:30 baje nohphaisngi ka jingialeh phainal kan long hapdeng ka Nongtalang Circle pyrshah iaka Thangbuli circle.Hakatei ka sngi u Minister ka sorkar MDA u Ma Lahkmen Rymbui un long kum u kongsan, lem bad ki symbud kong san, ka SDO Amlarem kong J.U Kharpuri bad u B.D.O Amlarem u Dr. Damut Lyngdoh, ong kyrwoh na u President ka Tournament u ma Tenyson Rymbui.
title: Ka phutbol, “7 Amlarem Constituency Cup 2019-20” kan poi noh sha kaba kut

content: Shillong:  Ka jingialehkai quarter final ba khatduh jong ka 4th kiw sing memorial football tournament ba la pyniaid da ka seng treilang sports and cultural club pongtung ka la long kaba itynnat ha kaba baroh ki ar tylli ki team ki la ia khun tyngeh ban ioh rung sha ka semifinal jong kane ka tournament hynrei hapdeng ki jingialehkai ki player jong Ka Lyngkyrdem ki la ioh ban pynkhih ia ka jar ha ka minute kaba 35 lyngba u Batskhem Thangkhiew.Ha ka kylla miet ka Lyngkyrdem royal challenger ka la ioh ban pynkhih jar biang lyngba u player khmat jong ka kata u Wildelbert Marbaniang ha kaba u la ioh ban thep ar goal ha ka minute kaba 66 bad 72. Ka PWD da ka jingtrei shitom jong ki player ka la ioh ya ka tie breaker lyngba u Fredy kharbyngar ha ka minute kaba 78.Te ka jingialeh kai ka la poi sha kaba kut ha kaba ka royal challenger ka la ioh ban ioh rung sha ka semifinal na ka liang ka club ka khot sngewbha ya ki riew ieit football jong ka dong ka thain, ban wan sakhi ia ka jingialehkai ba itynnad jong ka semi final kaba nyngkong tam hapdeng ki team ba khlain bor ha jingdon ki player ba paw kong ka Jylla, kata ka Iaikyrsoi mawkajem fc pyrshah ia Ka Galaxy fc ha ka 28tarik Rymphang 2020 ha ka por 2:00 pm janmiet, ong ka kyrwoh khubor.
title: Rung semi final ka Royal Challenger ft Lyngkyrdem da kaba pynliem pyrshah ia ka PWD NH 40 Pynursla

content: Shillong:  Haba phai sha ka jingialeh wushu ka West Jaintia Hills ka lah ioh khur haduh 8 tylli ki takma  ha ka Meghalaya Games 2019-2020 kaba la pynlong da ka Meghalaya State Olympic Association and Directorate of Sports & Youth Affairs, Meghalaya.Ki nongjop ki long U Sambormi Lyngdoh (Senior Men – 75kg)  Gold Medal u ba na ka shnong Jowai Dongmihsngi Ladthadlaboh, U Fivestar Bareh (Senior Men – 56kg) Gold Medal  u ba na ka shong Jalaphet bri – Sutnga u ba dang pule ha Shillong Commerce college, Armi Roy Iakai (Junior Boys- 54kg) Gold Medal  u ba na ka shnong Ïooksi iapkhla Moblang,u ba dang pule ia ka class 10 ha Iooksi Presbyterian secondary school, Refiness Warjri( Junior Girl – 48kg) Gold Medal  na ka shnong Laitkor lumheh Kynton-u-mon ka dang pule ïa ka class X ha Auxilium Girls Higher Secondary school Shillong, Dao wan Suchiang (Senior Men – 60kg) Silver Medal u ba na ka shnong Laitkor mawri lumheh, u ba dangpule ïa ka class Xl ha Shillong college higher secondary, Dakynmoo Nongtdu (Junior Boys – 48kg) Silver Medal u ba na ka shnong Nartiang Jowai u ba dang pule class lX ha Deni Linda persara sec school, laitkor, U Wandyjop Shadap( Senior Men – 65kg) Bronze Medal u ba na ka shnong Ialong Jowai, U Satisfy Syngkon (Senior Girl – 56kg) Bronze Medal kaba na ka shnongNongkynrih kaba dng pule ïa ka  BA 2nd semester philosophy honours ha Thomas Jones Synod college,Jowai, katba u Pynshait Suchiang u ba na ka shnong Bataw u ba trei ha ka Department Superintendent Shillong Jail u lah shah liem noh ha ka Quarter Final.U Ribiang Talang  ruh u na ka shnong Mustem Jowai u lah shah liem ha ka Quarter Final.Ïa kane ka kynhun la ïalam khmat da u Mr. Ferdinand Suchiang ryngkat bad u  Niawki Ïakai.
title: 4 tylli takma Ksiar, 2 tylli takma Rupa bad 2 tylli takam Rnong,Wushu ka West Jaintia Hills District

content: Shillong: Ka Mawphansnar SC ka la jop ha ka jingialehkai phutbol 5th Football Knock-out Tournament 2019-20 ha shnong Nongspung ha ka jingiaknieh ia ka nam lahduh pyrshah ia ka Dilingiem SC da 6-0 kaba long ha kane ka sngi Saitjain ba la dep ha madan Mynrad. Ia kane ka jingialehai la pynlong da ka Mawphansnar Sports and Cultural Club Organisation, Nongspung ha shnong Nongspung.Ka lahduh ka la ioh khur T. 14 hajar bad ka khusnam katba kaba long baar ka khur T. 6 hajar bad ka khusnam.Ha ka jingiakhun sngewbha jong ki kyntei, ka Pyndenglitha ka la pynliem ia ka Seng Samla Nongspung da 2-0 kol. Ka lahduh ka la ioh T. 15 spah katba kaba long baar ka ioh T. 1 hajar.Ia kane ka jingialehkai la sdang naduh ka 23 tarik Nohprah 2019 bad la pynkut ha ka 22 tarik Rymphang 2020. La wan iashim bynta baroh 16 tylli kynhun na shnong bad ki para marjan shnong.U MLA ka thain bah SK Sunn u la long kum u kongsan ba la sam ia ki khusnam sha kiba poi sha ka phainal. Ha kane ka sngi, la don lang ki rangbah shnong na ki shnong ba marjan, ki riew rangbah bad ki paidbah ba la sakhi ia kane ka jingialehkai.
title: Rah ka Mawphansnar ia ka   Football Knock-out Tournament 2019-20 ha Nongspung

content: Ka jingong ba ka rep ka riang ka long u budlum ia ka ioh ka kot ka long da shi sha kaba dei.Halor ka jingkren kaba dei donkam ruh ia ki lynti trei kam kiba ba dei.Baroh u briew u kwah ban leh ia kiei kiei kiba dei ki ban pynbha ia lade,ka yieng ka sem,ka kur ka jaid,ki kha ki man,ka shnong ka thaw,bad kiwei.U briew uba iai ap khmih lynti ban ioh ei ei kaba bha na ki wei u buh ia lade ha ka jingsahdien.Namar kata u briew uba smat uba sting,uba minot uba tista,uba durut bad am dngong hala ka kam u dei u briew uba jop watla um lah ban pynpaw nam ia lade.Ban pyndap ia ka yieng ka sem kam da donkam ruh ia u briew ban long uba paw nam.Ka yieng ka sem ka dei ka tlong ne thymmei jong ka imlang sahlang.Ka jingbun jong ki longyieng longsem kiba tlot ka wanrah ruh ia ka imlang sahlang kaba tlot.Ban pynkhlain ia ka imlang sahlang donkam ban pynkhlain shwa ia ki yieng ki sem.Ban pynkhlain ia ki yieng ki sem donkam ia ka ka kamai kajih bad ka jingnang jingtip kaba biang watla kim lah ban long pura.Baroh ki briew kim ialong ryngkat ha ka pyrkhat pyrdain namar kata ka jingsam lem ia ka jingnang jingtip da kiba la tip sha ki bym pat tip ka long kaba donkam tam na bynta ban pynkhlain ia ki longyieng longsem khnang ba ngin ioh ia ka imlang sahlang kaba khlain bad kaba skhem ha baroh ki liang.Ka kam bad ki lad kamai ki dei ki dei ki ar tylli ki dieng shan ne mawdong ban kynshan ia ki jingdonkam ka longyieng longsem.Hangne ka kam ka mut ka jingtrei ba u briew u trei manla ka sngi ne barabor ban pyndap ia ki jingdonkam ba kyrkieh kum ka bam ka dih,ki Jain ki nep,bai dawai bad kiwei; katba ki lad kamai ki long kum ka ri syiar,ri sniang,ri dohkha ne ka rep soh rep jhur kiba dei ki kam bynrap ban ioh kunai na bynta kiwei pat ki jingdonkam.Kumta ka kam bad ki lad kamai ki long kum ki ar tylli ki liang jong kajuh ka pisa.Ka jingjied ia kano kano ka kam ka shong ruh ha uwei pa uwei.Don pat kiba shim ia ka rep ka riang kum ka kam bad haba la dep ka puh ka dain,ka bet ka thung bad kiwei ki leit bylla tengkhat kum ka lad kamai ban ioh kunai bad ban bynrap ia ki jingdonkam ha yieng.Haba phai sha ka rep ka riang,don ki jaka ba ka la nang kiew; don pat ki jaka ba ka nang hiar.Ki mar rep ba ngi kham ia rep paidbah la jan baroh kawei ka jylla dei u kba.Ka ri bhoi district ka dei kaba khlain tam ban pynmih kba hynrei ngim tip la ka tam ne em ban die sha kiwei pat ki district.Ha kane ka juk, ki briew kim da khein kor shuh ia ki jaka rep bad wat ka sorkar ruh namar kito kiba don pynthor kba ki ia khana ba ka bai buria na bynta kawei ka yieng rit ka kham heh ban ia ka jong ka pynthor kba kaba shi teng acre mynba pyntrei ia ka national high way Umdiengpun – Riangdo.Da ka jingdon ki stad ka rep ka riang,ka jingpynmih kba ka la kiew da ar shah ban ia ki symbai tynrai ba ngi ju thung bad kane ka dei kaba ai mynsiem bad pynshlur shi bun ia ki Nongrep.Watla u kba u dei u mar rep ba bun ki Nongrep kim tam ban die hynrei u dei u nongkyrshan ba radbah ia ka yieng ka sem.Nalor u kba, ki Nongrep ki thung ruh sa ki jhur na bynta ban bam ia lade bad ban die ruh.Ki Iew ki ioh ban lum ia ka khajna ba ngi ju ong ka bai musur na ki nongdie jhur.Kine ki khajna kham bun sien ki leit sha ki Hima namar ba bun ki Iew heh dang dei hi ki Iew Hima.Ki sorkar ruh ha ki snem ba la leit noh ki la pynbijai ei da ki spah klur na bynta ki jingtei ban shna Iew ba la iarap da ka sorkar India bad kane ka dei ka jingduh nong ba khraw eh ia ka jylla namar ba la shu ai ei pynban ia kum kita ki lad kamai pisa sha ki Hima khlem da don kino kino ki jingiateh ban ia bhah ia ka khajna ne bai musur ba mih na kum kita ki Iew.Ka sorkar ba mynta ka la dei ban pynduh noh ia ka rukom pyrkhat bad rukom trei kam ki sorkar barim.Ka sorkar ka la dei bad bat lut noh ha lade ia baroh ki project ba ia dei bad ki Iew ba ioh jingiarap na ka sorkar India.Haba don ka pisa, kam long ruh kaba eh ia ka sorkar ban ioh jaka shna Iew.Ka jingiaroh ia ka shnong Mawryngkneng kaba la kloi ban ai jaka haduh 10 akar ban pynlong Iew die lang na bynta ki mar rep.Kaba dang donkam ia ka sorkar mynta ka long ban pynioh jaka shuh shuh sa na bynta ki nongrep  ki ba wan lyngba ka thain sepngi jong ka Shillong bad  ka lad Mawreng ka dei kaba kham biang lada ka cold storage hangto ka dei kaba longtrai da ka sorkar.Ka jingdon ki Iew die lang sha bar na Shillong kan iarap ban weng ia ka jingkhap ngiah ka Shillong.Ka por ka dawa ba ka sorkar kan shim hi noh ha lade ia ka jingkitkhlieh ban pyllait ia ka jingshah ban bein ki nongrep.Ka sorkar ka hap ruh ban pyrkhat ba ki regulated market nangne sha khmat kim dei shuh ban long kum ha ki por ba la dep.Ka Iew die lang ha Mawiong kam dei shuh ban long ka Iew  ba nion bein ia ki nongrep ha kaba ki nongrep synsar,nongrep phan,nongrep sla tyrpad ki shah khniot dor bad shah khate kilo;hynrei ki nongrep ha kum kine ki Iew ki dei ban tip shwa ia ki dor -ka dor ba rit bad dor ba heh – kat kum ka jingiapher bad jingbha jong ki mar bad dei ban thoh bad pyni paidbah ruh.Kyrmen ba ka sorkar ba mynta kan lah ban leh kham bha kat kum ka Meghalaya State Agricultural Produce & Livestocks Marketing  ( P & F ) Act 2020 watla ngi ki paidbah ngim pat iohi ia ki pasoh jong kata ka act ruh.Ka jingpyrshang ka sorkar ban kham pynbun ia ki Iew kan kyntiew ruh ia ka jnglah kamai pisa jong ka sorkar bad ka donkam ia ki paidbah ban ai jingkyrshan ia ka sorkar na bynta ka jingmyntoi hi jong ki paidbah.Ngi don mynta ha ka juk jong ka jingiakop,ka donkam namar kata ia ka sorkar ia ki rukom trei kam ba iadei ne iahap tar bad ka jingangnud u paidbah.Ka jingtei ia ki yieng bun mala ba ju iarap ka sorkar pdeng ban pynlong Iew kan plie lad ia ka sorkar jylla ban bynrap sa kiwei pat ki kam, nalor ki mar rep , ha kum kita ki Iew bad ka shong ha ka sorkar jylla ban pynsngewthuh ia ka sorkar pdeng ba ia kum kine ki project dei ban aiti beit sha ka ka commerce department jong ka sorkar jylla ym kumba long ha ki snem ba la dep imat na ka N.E.C ka leit sha sha ki D.C bad maki pat ki ai kat ia kiba sngew ieit sngew jan ba sa ioh pynban ki Hima , duh ka sorkar (shu antad,lada kam dei wat ia thew ia ka jingbym tip,hynrei ia pynshai lem).Ka rep ka riang ka don bun jingmut.Ka rep ka mut naduh ka por prat por puh,por bet por thung,por pynkhuid por sumar haduh ka por kheit por ot.Ka riang ka don ar jingmut,kawei ka mut ban sumar ia ki symbai na bynta ka snem ban wan;nangta kaba ar pat ka mut sumar mrad , sumar sim ,bad sumar doh.La ju don kiba pynlong kam kai ia ka kyntien ” Riang ” bad bun ruh kiba ong ba ki kyntien khasi hana ki suk namar ki don tang shi jingmut.Kane ka dei tang ka jingkren ban pynhiar dor ia ka ktien lajong.Ka donkam namar kata ba kin ngam jylliew ia ka rukom iakren iakhana (ne kramar) .Nangta ka kyntien ” Riang ” ka mut ruh ki jingeh.Te lada uno uno u kwah ban thoh kot ban pynkylla na ka khasi sha ka english kan bha shi bun ba un/kin thoh kumne ( Riang -(verb – ( 1 ) ri, ( 2 ) sumar ( 3 ) tyngkai ( 4 ) pynrkhiang ; nangta noun (1 ) ka jingri (2 ) ka jingsumar ( 3 ) ka jingtyngkai ( 4 )ka rukom sumar ia ki symbai da kaba shu sdien ha jrong kum ia u riewhadem bad kiwei( 5 ) ki jingeh .Kumta lada ngi ong ka rep ka mut tang ia ki jhur bad tang shi samoi lait noh ki symbai,lada ngi ong ka “rep ka riang ”  ka mut na kane ka snem sha kawei pat bad ka rep ka riang ka kynthup ia ki jingthung bad ka ri mrad , ri sim ,ri doh bad ki jingeh ba ngi ia kynduh haba ngi leh ia kane ka kam.Ka kyntien riang ka lah lehse ban wan na ka kyntien english ” rearing ” hynrei ki longshwa jong ngi pat ki kynnoh ” riang ” kumba ngi ioh sngew ba ki kynnoh ia kiba bun ki kyntien english kum ” Christmas – krismat, rich men – ri men, bad kiwei “.Ki briew kiba im ja na ka rep ka riang ki dei ki bym ju kham ap ia ka jingkyrshan na kiwei , hynrei ki hun hala ka jong ka jingkot bor na lade hi bad kaba pynlong ia ki kumta ka dei na ka jingbym tip bad ka jingduna ki lad ai jingkyrshan na kiwei ne na bar.          Ka jingshit jingsyaid ka dei ka bynta ba kongsan eh na bynta ki jingthung.Ka jingshit  jingsyaid hapdeng ka Sohiong,Mairang ,Markasa bad Myriaw ki jan ia long kumjuh; lada ngi hiar na Mairang sha Nongkhlaw kan kham kiew bad ha Mawiong kan nang kham kiew shuh shuh da kumba 6 ne 7 dikri ban ia ka Mairang.U juh u symbai phulkubi,tyrso,kubi lada ngi thung ha Mairang bad Mawiong ; una ha Mawiong un khia ar shah ban ia uba ha Mairang.U tyrso bym ai sboh ei ei ha Mawiong,Dongki ingding u kham heh kham khia ban ia u tyrso ha Mairang ba da ai sboh.U symbai biskot,symbai kba uba long ha Mairang,lada rep ha ki jaka ba kham syaid kum ha Mawiong ne Dongki ingding um iahap satia.Dang don shi bun ki symbai ba ki nongrep ki donkam ia ka jingkyrshan na ka sorkar.Ka surok Nongkhlaw – Dongki ingding ba ju tip kum ka lawbah lawsan ,mynta ka kylla sanium, hynrei ynnai kynnoh ia ka sorkar namar kam dei ka khlaw sorkar.Tangba ngi dei pat ban pyrkhat ia ki briew kiba shong ha kito ki thain.Ka jingshit jingsyaid ka mariang ka iapher katkum ki jaka,kumta ruh ki lad ai jingiarap ka sorkar la dei ban pyrkhat kat kum ki jaka.Ka Mairang Civil Sub Division ka don tang kawei ka Sub Division Agriculture ha Mairang, la idonkam ban don sa kawei ha them Mawiong ka ban shakri ia ki paidbah ka thain shi liang Khri.Ka kper Sara diengsoh ha Umwiehsup (Pyndengumipng) ka I pynban kum ka kam kai ban shu pynlut ksan ia ka pisa sorkar.Lada long kaba lah, kan jin da la bha ia ka sorkar ban buh noh kawei ka Sub Division Office Agriculture ha Mawiong ryngkat ka jaka sara ia ki mar rep ba iadei bad ka thain shi liang Khri bad thain Kynrud.Ia ki ophis kam rep kam riang la I donkam ban peit bad pynbiang kat kum ki jaka.Ka shong pat sa ha ka sorkar la ka kloi ne em ban btin ne ialam lynti lem ia ki nongrep.
title: Ka Sorkar bad ki nongrep

content: Shillong: Hynnin ka sngi ruh ka don ka jinghap slap kaba jur shi katdei ha Sohra, ha kaba ka jinghap slap, ka la poi sha ka 243.6mm hapdeng ka por 8.30 mynstep haduh ka por 8.30 mynmiet.Ha katei kajuh ka por, ka jinghap slap ha Shillong, ka long 25.9mm, katba ha Umiam, ka long 28.8mm.Ka tnat peit mariang jong ka sorkar India, ka ai jingmaham ba lashai ka sngi ruh kan don ka jinghap slap kaba jur shi katdei ha ki bynta jong ka Jylla.
title: Dang ther jur hi slap ha Sohra, hynnin ka sngi

content: Shillong: U Symbud myntri rang bah ka jylla u bah Prestone Tynsong, u la iathuh ba ki ar tylli ki rel kyrpang ki ba ka jylla ka la pynkhreh ban wan buh ia ki briew kiba sah kut ha Nongbah Delhi bad Kerala ka la mih mynta ka sngi na kine ki jaka, kine ki rel kin wan buh ia palat 1000 ngut ki briew ki ban wan phai sha ka jylla. U bah Prestone u la iathuh ruh ba haduh mynta  10,000 ngut ki briew ki la dep wan phai sha ka jylla, ki artylli ki rel, kawei na Rajasthan bad kawei na Andra Pradesh ki la don ha lynti ban wan buh ia ki briew ki bas ah kut shabar ka jylla. Ka rel na Rajasthan kan wan buh ia ki 150 ngut ki briew, bad na Kerela kan wan buh ia ki 317 ngut ki briew.Ha ka ba iadei bad ki briew ki ba dang sah kut ha kiwei ki wei ki jylla na ka liang u Myntri rang bah ka jylla u Conrad K Sangma u la dang iakren bad ki myntri rang bah kine ki jylla ban lah ban pynpoi kham kloi ia ki baroh ki nongshong shnong ka jylla.
title: Na Delhi bad Kerala kin wan phai palat 1000 ngut sha ka jylla, iathuh u Symbud Myntri rangbah ka jylla

content: Shillong: Hadien ka jing bthah ka All India Congress Committee (AICC), ka Meghalaya Pradesh Congress Committee (MPCC) ruh ka la rai ban lum jingkhein lyngba ka ‘online’ ha ka 28 tarik Jymmang 2020 naduh 11 baje mynstep haduh 2 baje nohphaisngi na ka bynta ban tip halor ka jing duhnong ki paidbah namar ba don ka jingpakhnag shnong lane ka lockdown ha baroh ka ri India bad ka jylla Meghalaya baroh kawei.Lyngba kane ka jing lum jing khein ka MPCC kan phah ia ka kaipjhod sha ka sorkar kmie bad ban dawa ruh ba dei ban siew 10000 tyngka sha ki long ing kiba duna haba dei bad ka iohka kot.Ka MPCC ka la pynshai ruh ba bun ki nong bylla hapoh ka ri India kila shah ktah jur bha ha ka lockdown ha kaba ki hap iaid da ki spah kilometer ban poi sha ki long ing namar ka jing bym biang ka jing pynbiang kali ka sorkar. Ka MPCC kala pynpaw ruh ba bun ki nongrep, ki nong kwai dohkha, ki nong seng kam ha ki tnat bapher bapher ki shem jing jynjar bha namar ka sorkar kmie kam pynsngew iaka jing dawa ki paidbah haba dei bad ki lad jing iarap haka jing shah ktah haka lock down.Na ka liang ka MPCC ka la kyntu ia baroh ki MP, ki MLA, MDC bad ki nong kitkam ka MPCC ban ia shim bynta ha kane ka jing lum jingkhein ban ioh jign tip halor ka jign duhnong ki paidbah namar ka lockdown.
title: Rai ka MPCC ban lum jingkhein halor ka jing duhnong naka lockdown

content: Guwahati: Da ka jingdon ki 60 ngut kiba ioh pang COVID-19, kumta ka jingdon kiba ioh pang ha ka Jylla Assam, ka la poi sha ka  774 haduh mynta. Na kitei ki 60 ngut, la iathuh ba ki don 41 ngut na Kamrup Metro, 9 na Hojai, 5 na  Morigaon, 4 na Darrang bad 1 na Kamrup.Haduh mynta, ki don 92 ngut kiba ioh pang Coronavirus ha katei ka Jylla.  Nangta ki don sa 116 ngut kiba ioh pang ha ka  26tarik Jymmang 2020, nangta ha ka 25tarik Jymmang 2020, ki don 147, ha ka 24tarik, k don 46 ngut, ha ka 23tarik Jymmang ki don 67 ngut bad ha ka 22tarik Jymmang ki don 49 ngut.
title: Jan dap 800ngut kiba ioh pang coronavirus ha Assam

content: Shillong: U Myntri rangbah ka jylla u Conrad K Sangma mynta ka sngi u la iathuh ba ka sorkar jylla ka la shim ia ka rai ban ym bat shuh ia ka tulop jong ki nongtrei sorkar na ka bynta u bnai Jymmang2020, ia ka ne ka pisa kin sa ioh ha u bnai Jylliew.Ha ba iakren bad ki lad pathai khubor na ka liang u Myntri rangbah u la pynshai ba ka rai ka sorkar jylla ha u bnai ba ladep ban bat ia ka tulop jong ki nongtrei sorkar na ka bynta u bnai Iaiong bad Jymmang, ka long na ka jingwan lynshop ka khlam Covid -19 ha ka jylla.U la iathuh ruh ba ka jingioh lum ia ka khajna jong ka jylla  ha kine ki arbnai ka long ka ba duna na ka pakhang shnong ban ia leh pyrshah ia ka Khlam Covid -19 bad ka ladon ruh ka jingantad ba ka bhah ka ba wan na ka sorkar pdeng na ka bynta ka jylla ruh ka long ka ba duna, dei na kane ka daw ba ka sorkar ka la shim ia ka rai ban bat shipor ia ka tulop jong ki nongtrei na ka bynta u bnai Iaiong bad Jymmang.U myntri rangbah u la iathuh ruh ba,wat la ka jingioh bhah jong ka sorkar Jylla na ka sorkar Pdeng ka long ka ba duna, hynrei kam shem la duna pat kumba ki la pyrkhat, na ka liang u Myntri rang bah u la ai khublei ia ka sorkar pdeng ha kaba ia dei bad kane ka jingai ia ka bhah sha ka sorkar jylla.Haba ia dei bad ka jingioh lum khajna jong ka sorkar jylla u la iathuh ba ka la duna ka jingioh lum ha kine ki 2 bnai hynrei ka don ka jingkyrmen ba ha kine ki ar bnai ban sa wan kan sdang ban kiew biang namar la plie bun na ki kam ki jam ha ka jylla.Kumta na ka liang ka sorkar jylla ka la shim ia ka rai ba kan ym bat shuh ia ka tulop jong ki nongtrei sorkar na ka bynta u bnai Jymmang. U la ong ruh ba  na ka bynta ki bnai ki ban dang wan ka shong ha ka jingkylla jong ka por, ka shong ha ka jingioh ia ka bhah na ka sorkar pdeng.
title: Rai ka sorkar Jylla, ban ym bat shuh ia ka tulop jong ki nongtrei sorkar na ka bynta u Jymmang

content: Kum shi bynta ban ai lad ia ki nongshong shnong ka jylla ba kin ioh ban sdang noh ia la ki kam ki jam ka sorkar jylla, mynta ka sngi ka la shah ban plie ia ki katto katne ki dukan kiba don shabar ka iewduh ba kin plie noh.Haba ia kren bad ki lad pathai khubor na ka liang u Symbud Myntri rang bah ka jylla u Bah Prestone Tynsong, u la iathuh ban a ka liang ka sorkar jylla ka la shah ban plie noh ia ki dukan ki ba don shabar ka Iewduh kine ki dukan ki kynthup ia ki dukan Jain, dukan Die Shatri, ki dukan die tiar shet jingshet (kitchen shop), ki dukan die tiar light. Ka sorkar ka la shah ruh ban plie noh ia ki Travel Agency bad ki showroom jong ki kali.U bah Prestone u la iathuh ruh ba hadien ka jingialang ba la long mynta ka sngi bad u CEM ka KHADC, ka Deputy Commissionor, bad u syiem ka Hima Mylliem ki la shim ia ka rai ba ki dukan ki ba don hapoh Iewduh, yn ym pat shah ban plie haduh ban da pynbna pat da kumwei.Leh kumno ia ki dukan tim pat?Lah dei ban plie shijait shijait shi sngi, kum sngi nyngkong marbam mardih, sngi vaar jain bad juti, sngi balang, stationery bad kumta terter. Toite ym lah maintain social distancing.
title: Lait na ka Iewduh, la shah ka sorkar ban plie noh ia ki  dukan ha baroh kawei ka jylla

content: Na ka liang jongka All Meghalaya School’s Parents Association (AMSPA) ka pynpaw ka jingsngew lyngngoh kaba khraw halor ka jingkhot pynrung skul (Application Form) jong ka St. Anthony’s Higher Secondary School na bynta ki khynnah pule jong ka Class XI (Science, Commerce bad Arts) wat la pylleiñ la tip shai ba na k aliang jongka Sorkar Jylla kam pat ailad ban pynmih ia ka Result SSLC namar ba ngi dang don hapdeng ka jingiakhun pyrshah ban iada ia ka jingsaphriang jong u khñiang jingpang Covid-19 (Corona Virus).Bun na ki kmie ki kpa ki la phone ianga mynnin ka sngi ban pynpaw ka jingkhuslai halor kane ka bynta ha kaba nakaliang jongkatei ka Skul ki la leh. Ki la pynpaw ruh ka jingkhuslai kaba khraw ha kaba katei kajuh ka Skul ka la kyntu jur ia ki kmie ki kpa baroh ba ki dei ban siew lut noh ki bai skul (School Fees) hapoh jong ka 1 tarik jong u Bnai Jylliew (June). Ki la buh ki jingkylli kiba bun ba lada lah ban long kumtei kaei kaban jia ia ki paidbah kiba sah sha ki thaiñ nongkyndong ne wat kiba sah ruh hapoh Shillong lada ki kwah ban buh skul ia la ki jong ki khun hapoh katei ka skul haba kim iohlad ban wan sha katei ka jaka ne khlem da ioh ruh iaki jingtip kiba pura ne wat ban siew ruh ia ki bai skul haba kum kane ka jingjia ka dang don mynta. Mar mar mynne ka sngi nga la leit mih shapoh katei ka Skul ban sakhi da la kijong ki khmat ia kane ka jingjia bad pylleiñ nga la iohi ba ki la thoh hapoh ka Notice Board ban khot application ia ka Class XI wat hapdeng jong kane ka Covid-19 Lockdown ngi dang don.Bad la ong ruh ba yn ai form tang 50 tylli man la ka sngi ha manla kawei pa kawei ka kyrdan pule. Nga la kwah ban iakren bad ki nongpyniaid jongkatei ka Skul hynrei nga khlem iohlad pynban nga la ioh ban iakren bad ki katto katne ngut ki kmie ki kpa kiba don ha katei ka jaka bad kiba la pyrshang ban wan shim Form iala kijong ki Khun bad nakaliang jongki ruh ki la pynpaw kumjuh ka jingsngew lyngngoh bad buh ki jingkylli ba balei katei ka Skul ka la nud ban ialeh pyrshah ia ki rai kiba nakaliang jongka Sorkar ka la buh. Kumta hi mar mar nga la phone sha u Education Minister jongka Sorkar Jylla, Ma Lakmen Rymbui ban pyntip ia kaba kum katei ka jingjia bad nakaliang jong u ruh u la pynpaw ka jingkyndit bad sngewlyngngoh ban ioh sngew ia katei ka bynta bad u la ai khublei shikatdei eh ia kane ka jingpyntip jongnga bad u la kular ba nakaliang jongka Sorkar kan shimkhia ia kane ka bynta khamtam ha kaba iadei bad ki paidbah kiba donkam iaka pule puthi. Kumta ha kaba khatduh nga sngew ban pynpaw ba ka jingkhot application jongkatei ka skul kalong beit thik tang na ka bynta ki khynnah pule jong ka Class XI bad la ong ruh ba yn ai form beit tang 50 tylli manla ka sngi naduh ka Science, Commerce bad Arts streams.Lada kumne man la ka sngi 50 tylli yn ai form, katno shuh yn die ki form bad katno ruh yn pynmih noh ka pisa kaba la dep noh synniang (Donation) shapoh ka CMRF tad haduh ynda la pynmih ka result matrik (SSLC). Kane pylleiñ ka paw shai ba kadon ruh ka lad khaïi pateng ha kaba iadei bad ka pule puthi. Nakaliang jongka AMSPA ka pyrshah jur ia kane ka bynta bad kumta hi ruh ngi ban jur ia ki bor ba dei peit jong ka Sorkar Jylla ban sngaplem ia ka jingud jongki kmie ki kpa bad ruh ngi kyntu jur ban shimkhia mar mar ia kaba kum katei ka bynta bad lada ka Sorkar Jylla ka ailad ia katei ka Skul ban pyndep pura ia kane ka jingthmu jong ki, kumta hi ruh kaladei ban ailad ia baroh ki Skul ba kin khot noh ia ki Application Form jong ki Calss XI bad Class XII kumjuh hi ruh ba kin lum noh ia ki bai skul jong ki (School Fees) khnang ba kan ym pynsah umdum ia baroh kiba angnud ban ioh ia ka jingpule kaba pura. Ka AMSPA kam kwah da lei lei ruh em ba ki skul kin pyndonkam ia ka pule puthi kum ka lad khaii pateng.Ngi kyntu jur ia baroh ki kmie ki kpa kiba don ka jingthmu ban phah pule ia la kijong ki khun hapoh katei ka skul ne ha kiwei pat ki skul, ba kin ai lang ka jingkyrshan kaba pura iaka AMSPA na ka bynta ban ioh lad ha kaban wanrah ia ka jingkylla kaba paka ha kaba iadei bad ka pule puthi hapoh ka Jylla bad ruh ban ym ailad ia ka jingpyrshang ban shim kabu da mano re mano khamtam ha kaba iadei bad ka pule puthi khnang ba lada dei kiba duk ne kiba riewspah ruh kumjuh ngin iohlang ia ka pule puthi kaba paka hapoh la kajong ka Jylla.Khublei ShibunBa burom iaphiSd/-Bah Banshai MarbaniangPresidentAll Meghalaya School’s Parents Association (AMSPA)Meghalaya-India
title: Khot pynrung skul ka St Anthonys Higher Secondary, na bynta ki Class XI
