content: Shillong: Namar ka jing bym lah ka liang pyrshah ka United Democratic Forum (UDF) ban pynieng kyrtong naka bynta ka shuki Chairman, mynta ka sngi u MDC ka Sohryngkham u bah Pyniaid Sing Syiem na ka kynhun United Democratic Alliance (UDA) u la shah jied kum u Chairman ba thymmai ka Khasi Hills Autonomous District Council (KHADC) khlem ka jing ia tynjuh bor.Haba kren hadien ba u la shimti kum u Chairman ba thymmai ka KHADC, u bah Pyniaid Sing Syiem u la ong ba ka kamram jong u mynta kum u Chairman ka District Council kadei ban pyniaid beit ryntih iaka jing ia syllok hapoh ka KHADC naka bynta ban thaw iaki ain naka bynta ban iada iaka riti dustur ki paidbah ka jylla Meghalaya.“Nga ai khublei ia baroh 30 ngut ki MDC khamtam naka liang pyrshah kiba la shaniah ha nga ban shimti kum u Chairman ba thymmai ka KHADC bad nga ngeit skhem ba ngan shakri hok iaka District Council naka bynta ka jing myntoi ki paidbah ka jylla” la bynrap u bah Pyniaid Sing Syiem.Na ka liang u bah Pyniaid Sing Syiem u la kyntu ruh ia baroh ki MDC ban puson bha ia ka nongrim kaba ka District Council ka ieng bad ia ka nongrim ha kaba ki MDC ki ieng ban shakri iaki paidbah ka jylla.“Nga kyrpad ia baroh ki MDC ban iatreilang na ka bynta ban pynneh ia ki 3 tylli ki maw nongrim kata ka ‘Legislative’, ‘Executive’ bad ia ka ‘Judiciary’ jong ka District Council na ka bynta ban pynneh ia ka bor jong ka KHADC ban iada ia ka hok tynrai ki paidbah ka jylla” la bynrap u bah Pyniaid Sing Syiem.
title: Jop suk u bah Pyniaid Sing Syiem kum u Chairman ka KHADC khlem ka jing ia tynjuh bor

content: Shillong: Mynta ka sngi u myntri rangbah ka jylla u Conrad K Sangma, u la long u myntri rangbah ka jylla Meghalaya ba nyngkong eh ban wan sha poh ka Khasi Hills Autonomous District Council (KHADC) ban sakhi ia ka jing ia jied Chairman ka District Council.Naka liang ki dkhot ka KHADC, u Chairman ba thymmai ka KHADC u bah Pyniaid Sing Syiem, u la shim iaka lad ban ai khublei ia u Conrad K Sangma u ba la wan ban sakhi ha ka jing ia jied Chairman hapoh ka hapoh ka District Council.Ia u myntri rangbah ka jylla la leit ban pdiang sngewbha da u CEM jong ka KHADC ha phyllaw ryngkat bad ki EM bad la ialam ia u sha iing dorbar namar ka iing dorbar ka dang iaid ha kane ka por la pynshong ia u Myntri Rangbah ka jylla ha Official Gallery bad u mytnri rangbah u la shong kumba 15 minit ei ei hapoh ka ing dorbar ka district Council.
title: Ha ka sien ba nyngkong wanpoi u MR ka jylla hapoh ka KHADC

content: New Delhi: Ka sorkar India, ka lah ban dang pynjlan shuh ia ka pakhang shnong sa ar taiew, hadien jong kane ka 31tarik Jymmang, na ka bynta ban khanglad ia ka jing pur jong u khniang jingpang Coronavirus.Haduh mynta, la iathuh ba ka sorkar India, kan pyntrei kam ia ka pakhang shnong ba thymmai, ha ki 11 tylli ki nongbah, kiba jur bha katei ka jingpang bad kitei ki kynthup ia ka   Delhi, Mumbai, Bengaluru, Chennai, Ahmedabad bad ka Kolkata, nangta ka Pune, Thane, Jaipur, Surat bad ka Indore.Kiba ioh pang ha India, haduh mynta, ki la poi sha ka 1.5 lak bad kiba iap, ki la poi sha ka 4,337ngut.
title: Thmu ka sorkar India, ban nang pynjlan ia ka pakhang shnong, hadien ka 31 Jymmang

content: Shillong: Ka National Student Union India (NSUI) mynta ka sngi ka la leit ban ai iaka dorkhas sha u ‘Comptroller of Examination’ ka skulbah North Eastern Hill University (NEHU) ban pynshai halor ka jing pyrshah ka seng ban pynlong eksamin ‘Online’.Ka NSUI lyngba ka shithi ka la pynpaw bun ki jingeh iaki samla thoh eksamin khamtam haba dei bad ka ‘network’ bad ka jing bym lah ki samla ban pyndap pisa na ka bynta ban ‘recharge’ ha ki mobile phone jong ki bad ki komputer naka bynta ban thoh eksamin ‘Online’.Na ka liang ka NSUI ka kyntu ia ka skulbah NEHU ban da kiwei ki lad na ka bynta ban pynlong eksamin.
title: Pyrshah ka NSUI ban pynlong eksamin online

content: Guwahati: Kiba ioh pang  COVID-19 ha Assam, ki la nang kiew shuh shuh bad mynta ki la poi sha ka 714 ngut. Na kitei ki don 9 ngut na  Charaideo bad sa uwei na Sivasagar.Ki don shuh sa 62 ngut kiba la jem na katei ka jingpang bad 645 ngut kiba dang don ia katei ka jingpang, ong U Himanta Biswa Sarma, myntri ka koit ka khiah ka Assam.Ha shwa jong kata, ki don 18 ngut kiba ioh ia katei ka jingpang bad kitei ki dei kiba wan na  Ahmedabad sha Guwahati, jong ka Kamrup (Metro)  bad sa 14 ngut na  Golaghat, 2 na  Karbi Anglong bad uwei na  Lakhimpur.
title: Kiew kiba ioh pang Covid-19 sha ka 714 ngut ha Assam

content: Parari, kane ka khubor jong nga kan leit sha ki paidbah ha Meghalaya in general bad sha ki paidbah ka Ri Lyngngam in particular. Kiba don ki shkor to kin sngew bad kiba don jabieng to kyndit bynriew.Shuwa ba ngan ong eiei ia phi, to ngin ia phaidien khyndiat sha ka jingiathuhkhana shaphang u Masi lur bad ka Masi lyngki.Shisien, katba u masi lur u dang dem ngun ban lur lyngkha, ka masi lyngki kaba sngaid kum ban sa bthei noh ka dang bam phlang kynjai harud lyngkha, ka la kren beiñ ia u masi lur ba kat ka kyrdan jong u u dang shah teh mraw ha u khun bynriew ban lur lyngkha. Uta u masi lur ba um sngewphoida ban pynphai nia, u la sngap la ka sngap.Ha kawei ka sngi, u trai u la pyllait shuti ia u ba un leit bam phlang. Hangta u la iohi ba u briew u la ñiah ia ka masi lyngki sharud wah ryngkat bad ka wait shuri bad ka dabor ban ot doh noh ia ka masi. Te uta u masi lur u la ong ia ka masi lyngki ba ka kham lah kaba sohkhliang u ryndang ban ia kaba pynap da ka shuri ha u ryndang. Ka jingsneng na kane ka jingiathuhkhana ka ong, “Don ka ma haba la than eh ka suk.”Don bun ki briew ha kine ki sngi jong ka Lockdown kiba kmen bad kiba la sngaid la kum kata ka masi lyngki, namar ba ki shu shong ha ïing, shu bam, shu eit bad shu thiah khlem trei khlem ktah eiei ruh. Don kiba ong, “Aiu ngin khuslai, ngi shu shong khlem trei khlem ktah, pynban ia u khaw la wan ai ei ka sorkar ha ïing, ngi ioh ruh ia u dai, u phan, ka pisa ruh ioh. Kum kane ka jingsuk te naei shuh ngin ioh.” Don kiba kwah ba kane ka lockdown kan dang bteng sa 6 bnai, sa shi snem, sa ar snem.Hynrei ka jingkylli ka long – Hato u Modi bad u Conrad kin dang lah ban bsa ei ia ki paidbah kiba shu shong khlem trei khlem ktah? Kine ki dei tang ki briew. Te sa katno bnai keiñ ba kin dang lah ban bsa? Khlem artatien kine ki 2 ngut (Modi bad Conrad) kin sa sangeh noh ban bsa. Hato phi tharai lada ka khlam kan neh tang 2 snem, kine kin dang bsa ia ngi? Ynda kine kim lah shuh ban bsa, hangta ka jingkordit bah kan sa wan lap ia ngi.Kumta, nga don katto katne ki jingai jingmut kyrpang ia ki paidbah ka Ri Lyngngam bad kyllum ia ki paidbah ka Meghalaya kumne:1)Ban pynim biang ia ka rep ka riang:-Ko ki paidbah ka Ri Lyngngam bad jong ka jylla Meghalaya, balei ba ngin dang pynlehnohei ia ka khyndew kaba seisoh ba U Blei u la ai kyrpang ia ngi? Ka khyndew ha ka ri jong ngi ka biang lut ban rep bad thung la jan baroh ki jait jingthung. Ha ka jingsngew jong nga te kane ka khlam ka pynkyndit bynriew ia ngi ba ngin pynim biang ban thung ia u sohriew, u riewhadem, u kba, u raisoh, u raitruh, u pathaw, ka shriew, u phandieng bad kiwei kiwei khnangba lada ka khlam kan dang neh sa shi snem ne ar snem ngim khuslai shuh wat lada u Conrad bad u Modi kim lah shuh ban bsa ia ngi.2)Ban pynim biang ia ka ri jingri:-Bun na ngi ngi la shu shaniah beit ia ki syiar, ki dohkha bad ki masi ba wan nabar jylla ban bam. Ngi la pynduh noh ia ki jingri ba ki kpa tymmen jong ngi ki ju ri mynshuwa. Mynshuwa te ki ju ong, “U khaw na ïing, ki jhur na lyngkha bad ka doh na sem.” Hynrei mynta te la kylla ym shuh kum mynshuwa. Ïa kita baroh ngi la shu ap ia ka jingwan ai ki dkhar bar jylla. Ha Ri Lyngngam ia u ñiangryndia ba ai pisa jubor ia ki Lyngngam mynshuwa mynta bun kiba la pynduh.3)Pynim biang ia ki dawai kynbat:-Ha Ri Lyngngam jan man ki jaka kiba don ka khyndew ba biang bha ban thung ia ki dawai kynbat. Ha ki por mynshuwa lada don ba mynsaw, ba ioh khñiang bad ba ioh pang khlam ym donkam ban leit thied dawai na jngai, namar ki dawai ki don bun byllai ha jaka la jong. Hynrei mynta pat lada khlem ki dkhar ba wan supply dawai naei shuh ngin ioh?4)Pynim biang ia ka thaiñ jingthaiñ:-Ki tymmen jong ngi mynshwa ki kamai pisa ban pyndap ia ka ïing ka sem bad ban kyrshan skul ia ki khun da kaba thaiñ shylliah, thaiñ star, thaiñ jaiñ bad kiwei kiwei. Mynta pat ki longdien kim nang shuh ban thaiñ wat tang ia ka shang ne kriah. Ka la dei ka por ko parari ba ngin pynim biang ia ka thaiñ jingthaiñ khnang ba ngim donkam shuh ban ap ia ki jong ki dkhar.Ko para Khasi, khynriam, u pnar, u bhoi, u war, u maram bad u lyngngam, to ngin kyndit bynriew noh ha kane ka khlam ba ngim dei shuh ban dang ap ia ka jingbsa jong ki dkhar na Assam, na Bihar, na Punjab bad kiwei kiwei, la ia u khaw, ki jhur, ki shylliah,…Kane ka jaka jong ngi ka biang lut nadong shadong. Ngim ioh tang ia ka mluh, lait nangta ngi ioh lut kat kiba ngi donkam. Kane kaba ngi shu shaniah tylli tyllan ia kiwei ki jaitbynriew ka buh jingma ia ngi. Ma phi ki samla pule wat sngewpoh bad wat lehraiñ ho ban bah wait, ban puh khyndew, ban ri sniang, ri syiar…ban thaiñ jingthaiñ bad kiwei kiwei.Lada phin kyndit bynriew ha kane ka khlam, to leit tynruh noh ia ki ophisar Agriculture, Horticulture etc ba kin ym ioh shuh ban shong suk kynjai ha ki shuki jong ki ryngkat ka heh kpoh bad ka ksem. Hynrei lada ma phi baroh phi rai ban pynim biang ia kitei kiba nga la kdew, kita ki ophisar sorkar kin hap tur sha ki shnong ki thaw ban ai jinghikai ia phi. Ban sdang ia kita baroh ka shong ha phi ki nongshong shnong. Lada phim sdang ma phi, iano heit kin hikai?
title: KYNDIT BYNRIEW KO PARA RI! NAMAR, DON KA MA HABA LA THAN EH KA SUK

content: Guwahati: Ki la don sa 16 ngut kiba ioh pang thymmai ha Assam. Na kitei ki kynthup ia 6 ngut na Hojai, 6 ngut na  Golaghat, 2 na Darrang bad uwei na  Kamrup Metro bad Kamrup.Mynta ki la poi sha ka 682 ngut kiba ioh pang Covid 19 ha Assam bad kiba dang don ha ka jingpang, ki long 613 ngut.Ka Assam, ka don 116 ngut kiba ioh pang ha ka 26tarik Jymmang, nangta 147 ngut h aka 25tarik Jymmang, 46 ngut ha ka 24tarik Jymmang, 67 ngut ha ka 23tarik Jymmang bad 49 ngut ha ka 22tarik Jymmang 2020.Ha India, ki don 6,387 ngut kiba dang shu ioh pang thymmai ha ki 23 kynta ba ladep bad baroh kiba ioh pang mynta ki la poi sha ka  1,51,767 bad kito kiba dang don ia katei ka jingpang, ki long  83,004, katba kiba iap ki la poi sha ka  4,337ngut bad kiba la jem na ka jingpang, ki don  64,425.
title: Jan poi 700ngut kiba ioh pang Covid 19 ha Assam, kiew sha ka 1.5lak ha India

content: Shillong: Myn hynnin ka sngi ka briew jong ka Shillong Municipal Board ha ka por 1:00 Pm nohphai sngi ki la jynrat naphang ia ki dukan ba shu shna hi da ki briew ki ba die jingdie ha kine ki jaka ba don ka jaka pynieng ki kali arshaka ha Motphran.Ka jingshna dukan jong ki briew ka la pynlong ia kane ka jaka ban sahkut ki jaboh jabain, bad mih ruh ka jingsma iwtung kaba shyrkhei na ka jingsah kut ki jaboh ha kine ki jaka.
title: Pynkhuid ka SMB ia ki jaka ba shna dukan ha jaka pynieng bike Motphran

content: Nongpoh: Kawei ka iing kaba don hapoh ka shnong Lumdaitkhla Bhoirymbong, ka la ingkhong bad julor lut khoit, hadien ba ka la shah pom ha u pyrthad hynnin ka step ha ka por 7 baje eiei mynstep.La ioh jingtip ba katei ka iing kaba la shah pom ha u pyrthat ka dei ka iing ai wai jong u Bah Dikos Rani bad hapoh katei ka iing ki la don lai ngut ki nongshongwai, kiba kynthup ia u Bah Pynshailang Myktieh, ka Kong Iitbha Muktieh bad ka Kong Marlinna Lyngdoh.La iathuh ruh ba ha ka por ba jia katei ka pom Pyrthad, la don arngut ki khynnah ha kitei ki iing sah wai, hynrei donbok kitei ki khynnah ki la lait na ka jingshah tied ha u Pyrthad bad ki khlem mynsaw ei ei ruh em.Na katei ka jingtied u Pyrthad, ka la don tang ka jingjulor jong katei ka iing, lait nangta ym shem la don mano mano ba mynsaw. Haba iadei bad katei ka jingjia u George B. Lyngdoh, MLA ka Umroi tang mar ia tip u la leit ban jurip ia katei ka iing kaba la julor na ka jingshah pom ha u Pyrthat.
title: Ingkhong bad julor khait ka iing ba tied u pyrthad ha shnong Lumdaitkhla Bhoirymbong

content: Shillong:Ki pulit Home Guard, kiba rah lathi, la iathuh ba ki la leit poi sha ki katto katne ki shnong jong ka East Khasi Hills bad ka War Jaintia ruh kumjuh.Ha Pynursla Civil Sub Division, la iathuh ba ki la leit poi ha Nongtyngur, ha Umsyiem. La iathuh ba ki la leit ruh sha Muktapur jong ka War Jaintia.Ha kawei pat ka khubor, la iathuh ba kiba bun ki Rangbah Shnong, ki sngew pyrshah jur, halor katei ka rai jong ka sorkar, ban leit buh ia ki pulit Home Guard sha ki shnong, namar ba ka jingthmu, ka long ba kin leit ap sha khappud ban peit ia ka iaid ka ieng beain jong ki briew lane kiba rung ba mih na shiliang sha shiliang u pud.
title: Leit poi ki home guard sha shnong khappud

content: Shillong: U Chief Executive Member (CEM) ka Khasi Hills Autonomous District Council (KHADC) u bah Titosstarwell Chyne, u la ong ba ka sorkar haduh mynta ka sorkar kam pat phah sha ki District Council ia ka jingpynbna ka sorkar ba la ithuh ia u synsar sla tyrpad bad soh mrit kum ki mar rep, wat la ia ka hukum ban ithuh ia ki kum ki mar rep la pynmih naduh u snem 2019.Kumban shu pynkynmaw u CEM ka KHADC lem bad ki MDC na ki konstitwensi ba pynmih ia u synsar, u la lum ka jing ialang ha ka jing ia donlang ki ophisar jong ka tnat khlaw ha badei bad ka jing shah khniot dor ki nong rep ka jylla ban die ia u synsar, sohmrit bad kiwei de sha ki nongkhaii, khamtam ki Marwari ha iew dielang kaba don ha Mawiong.Na ka liang u bah Titosstawel Chyne u la ong ba namar ba ka sorkar kam shym la phah ia ka jingpynbna ban ithuh ia u synsar, sla tyrpad bad sohmarit kum ki mar rep, ka KHADC ka la aiwai ia ki khyrdop ha u bnai Lber bad ka KHADC ka la buh ia ka dor ‘Transit Pass’ (TP) haka dor 36 naia n aka bynta 1 kilo kum ba ju long ha ki snem ba la dep.“Watla ka KHADC ka buh tang 36 naia na ka bynta 1 kilo, na ka liang ki Marwari pat ki la shim ia ka kabu da kaba khniot bein iaka dor ki mar rep kumba 5 haduh 10 tyngka da kaba kynnoh ba ki hap siew khajna shaka sorkar bad sha ka KHADC” la bynrap u bah Titosstarwell Chyne.Na ka liang u CEM ka KHADC u la ong ruh baka KHADC kan hap ban ia shong jing ialang bad ka sorkar kynthup ia ka tnat ka rep bad ka tnat khlaw ha ka jing don ryngkat ka DC ka East Khasi Hills, na ka bynta ban ia kren shai halor ka jing eh ki nongrep ka jylla namar ka jing shah khniot dor beain ha ki nongkhaii.
title: Ka District Council, kam pat tip,  ba la pyn kylla mar rep ia u synsar

content: Nongpoh:Myn hynnin ka janmiet ka la don ka jingkhie ka eriong ba jur ha kiba bun ki bynta jong ha Ri Bhoi District bad halor katei ka jingkhie kynsan ka Eriong, ka la don ka jingshah ktah ia ka iaid ka ieng jong ki paidbah, namar lyngba katei ka jingkhie Eriong, ki la don ki diengbah kiba la khyllem noh bad ki jingjia kiba la sakhi shai, ka dei na ka jingkhyllem ki diengbah hapdeng ka Surokbah NH-6 ha Ri Bhoi.La ioh jingtip ba tang ha Ri Bhoi, ki la don ki jingkhyllem dien ha 17 bad 18Mer, ha kaba ka la wanrah ruh ia ka jingdkoh ha ka leit ka wan jong ki paidbah, kiba pyndonkam ban iaid lyngba katei ka surok.Tang mar ia tip halor katei ka jingkhyllem ki diengbah hapdeng ka surokbah NH-6, ki Pulit ka Ri Bhoi kata na Byrnihat Police Outpost, ki la leit mar mar sha katei ka jaka na ka bynta ban pynkhuid ia kitei ki dieng bad ban pynsuk ia ka leit ka wan ki paidbah.
title: Khyllem ki diengbah ha ar ki jaka jong ka surokbah NH-6 ha Ri Bhoi

content: Shillong:U symbud myntri rangbah ka jylla u bah Prestone Tynsong myn hynnin ka sngi u la iathuh ba 2 tylli ki Rel bala mang kyrpang ka sorkar Meghalaya ki la mih napoh ka jylla Andhra Pradesh bad Rajasthan kiba wankit iaki samla ka jylla.Naka liang u bah Prestone Tynsong u la iathuh ba ka rel kaba mih na Andhra Pradesh kan pynpoi 317 ngut ki samla katba ka rel na Rajasthan kan kit 150 ngut ki samla ka jylla.Nalor kane u Bah Prestone Tynsong u la iathuh ruh ba sa 2 tylli ki Rel na Delhi bad na Kerala kin mih haka 27 tarik jymmang 2020 bad la kyntu iaki samla ka jylla ba kin phone haki nomber 011-23014341, 011-23014451, 011-23015130 bad 9968262299 naka bynta ban ioh jing iarap ban wanphai sha Meghalaya.Kumban shu pynkynmaw kila don kumba 10,000 ngut ki samla kiba sahkut sha kiwei pat ki jylla ka ri India kiba la wanphai sha Meghalaya.U symbud myntri rangbah u bah Prestone Tynsong u la iathuh ruh ba haduh mynta kila don kumba 6553 ngut kiba la phah eksamin bad 5599 ngut kidei ‘Negative’ bad sa kumba 939 ngut ka kaiphod kam pat mih re.Naka liang u myntri rangbah ka jylla u Conrad K Sangma u la iathuh ba baroh ki samla ba wanphai sha Meghalaya kidei ban shah eksamin naduh ka ‘Thermal Testing’ ka ‘Rapid Test Kits’ bad lyngba ka ‘PCR Test’ naka bynta ban pynthikna iaka jing don ka jing pang’corona virus’hapoh ka met jong ki.
title: Yn wanpoi sa 2 tylli ki Rel ba kit briew na Andhra Pradesh bad Rajasthan

content: Shillong: Ka dorbar shnong Muktapur myn hynnin ka sngi ka la thoh sha u myntri rangbah ka jylla u Conrad K Sangma, ban pynioh biang ia ka jaka napoh ka shnong Muktapur kaba hap hapoh ka Adverse Possession Land (APL) sha u pud u sam ka jylla ne ka ri India.Ka shithi lyngba u general secretary ka dorbar shnong u bah Banediction Buam, na ka liang ka dorbar shnong Muktapur ka la pynpaw ba ka jaka ha (Muktapur APL) naduh u snem 1947 ka hap hi ha ka ri India ne hapoh u pud u sam ka jylla Meghalaya ha kaba ki nong shong shnong ki ju leit ban khwai dohkha ha ki wah ba don ha kane ka jaka, hynrei naduh u snem 2010 ki khar Bangladeshi ki la sdang ban tur sha APL Muktapur.Na ka liang u bah Benediction Buam lyngba ka shithi sha u myntri rangbah u la pynpaw ruh ba naduh ba sdang mynta u snem 2020 ki khar Bangladeshi, ki la sdang ban kam trai ia ka jaka bad ki la don ruh katto katne ngut ki khar Bangladeshi kiba la sdang rep, ruh sha kane ka jaka kaba la jan poi ruh sha jan ing briew jong ka shnong.Ka dorbar shnong ka la pynpaw ruh ba ki shipai ka BSF ki la pynpaw ba ia ka APL Muktapur kaba don kumba 55.3 acres la ai sngewbha ia ka ri Bangladesh khlem ka jing pyntip sha ki paidbah ka shnong Muktapur kiba ju pyndonkam ia kane ka jaka ban khwai bad ban thung iaki mar rep. Na ka liang u Secretary, ka Dorbar Shnong Muktapur, u la ong ruh ba ka sorkar ka dei ban pynioh biang ia kane ka jaka namar ka dei ka jaka ba don jing myntoi shibun bha iaki paidbah ka shnong Muktapur.
title: Dawa ka Muktapur, ia ka jaka ha khappud Bangladesh

content: Shillong: Hadien 48 snem, mynta ka sngi, la plie ia ka ophis jong ka Meghalaya Public Service Commission (MPSC) mynta ka sngi ka la ioh ia la ka jong ka ophis, na ka bynta ban treikam hapoh Lower Lachumiere, Shillong.Ia kane ka ophis thymmai la plie paidbah da u myntri rangbah u Conrad K. Sangma ha ka jing ia don lang u Chairman ka MPSC L.M. Sangma, u Chief Secretary M.S. Rao bad ka Additional Chief Secretary ka sorkar R.V. Suchiang lem bad kiwei kiwei de.Haba kren ha ka jing plie paidbah, naka liang u myntri rangbah u la ong ba ka thong jong ka sorkar ka dei na ka bynta ban kyntiew ia ka jing iajan hapdeng ki paidbah, khamtam ki samla ban thep kam ha ki tnat bapher ka sorkar Meghalaya naka bynta ban pynsuk bad ai jing iarap iaki paidbah.“Naka liang ka sorkar nga ai khublei ia baroh kiba don bynta ban pyndep ban tei ia ka Building thymmai jong ka MPSC bad nga kyntu ruh ia ki ophisar ka MPSC ban ai jing iarap iaki samla ka jylla ba kin ioh ban thep kam haki tnat ka sorkar” la bynrap u Conrad K Sangma.Naka liang u myntri rangbah u Conrad K Sangma, u la ong ruh ba shen ka MPSC kan sa pyntreikam noh ia ka IT Cell na ka bynta ban pynsuk iaka jing treikam bad ruh ban kham pynsting ia ka jing thep kam ki samla hapoh ki tnat ka jylla. Lah ban pynkynmaw ba ka sorkar Meghalaya ka dang iai pynkhreh ban kham pynbha shuh shuh ia ki tnat ka MPSC kiba la wanrah hapoh ki Disctrict ka jylla kynthup ha Tura, Jowai, Nongstoin, Nongpoh, Williamnagar bad ha Baghmara.
title: Plie U MR ia ka ophis thymmai ka MPSC

content: Ngi ki khasi sha Mumbai, ngi ia don lang ha kawei ka group whatsApp ha ka ba bun ngut na ngi, ngi ia share ki story bad kiwei ki jing jia, ne wat ki jingeh ruh. Bun na pdeng jong ngi ngi dang ap ia ka rai lane ia rel jong ka sorkar meghalaya ban wan shaw, man ka sngi ngi peit khubor hynrei ngim ju da kham ioh sngew ne iohi ba ka sorkar jong ngi kan jer kerteng lang iaka Mumbai, at least lada kim pat don shisha kita ki rel ruh la dei ban shu ai mynsiem lang iangi daka ba pynpaw lang ha ka meeting lane khubor.Hynrei kum ba iohi mynta don ki jaka ba ki train ki la iaid lyngba arsien, ne ar round kum sha Tamil nadu bad delhi lada ym bakla, ia kata ngim ong hynrei ka sorkar jong ngi kala dei ban shu kynmaw lang iangi.Ki train na Manipur, Nagaland, Assam ki la dep mih nangne na Mumbai.Hoid ngi sngewthuh ba lada ka sorkar ka don jingeh ne ka duna kita ki jaka quarantine hynrei ki khlem ong ei ei. Donbok ba ki briew na meghalaya ki ba trei bad pule habar ki duna.Ngi iohsngew ruh ba ka train ba mih na Goa kan kit tang 200 tam ki briew na Meghalaya, ka jin da la bha lada ka kan wan shaw lang sha Mumbai ruh, iakata ruh ngam lah ban ong ka shong ha ki nong pyniaid, hynrei ngi shu kwah ban pynpaw ba haka ba khatduh ngi hap ban wan hi dakano kano ka lynti ruh, bad ngim kwah ban leit rah ia u ta u khniang jingpang, namar kan sa ktah lang ia ka imlang sah lang ruh, hynrei ngim lah ban tikna lano lano bad mano, kumba nga ioh jingtip don bun ngut ki khasi jong ngi ruh ba sah ha kijaka ne building ba la dep seal dak saw. Bad ka sor Mumbai khamtam ka lah jan long kum ka sor NewYork haka jingbun bad jing kiew sted u khniang jingpang, hakine ki shi sngi ar sngi balah leit palat 7000 tam haka shi sngi man ka sngi ki kiew.Nga kyrpad  Iaka sorkar ba kan pyntip iakine baroh khnang ba ngi ngin tip, kumno ban leh, bad ban iaid hi nalajong ka lynti, ban Shu ap sah Kam long Kaba Bha eh OK thank-you
title: Khyndiat shaphang ki khasi jong ngi, ba sah ha Mumbai Maharashtra

content: Shillong: Sa san ngut ki don kiba ioh pang Coronavirus ha ka Jylla.Kitei ki dei kiba wan phai da ka rel na Delhi Haryana, ong U Conrad Sangma, myntri rangbah ka Jylla. Kitei ki don ha ki jaka shah sumar ha Shillong bad ki dei ruh ki bym shym la pyni dak satia, ba ki don ia katei ka jingpang.Baroh kiba don ia katei ka jingpang ha ka Jylla, ki long 7 ngut.
title: Sa san ngut kiba ioh pang coronavirus ha ka Jylla

content: 6.Kine kidei ki jait sha bala shna na u symbai syntiew. Kidei ki jait sha kynbat kiba khlain kiba treikam shibun bad ki iarap bha hapdeng ki aiom slap. Ki don kyrhai haki ka Beta-Carotene kaba kylla sha ka VitaminA ha u klongsnam kiba lah ban sumar ia shibun jait ki khniang jingpang kiba mih haka met bad ki kyntiew iaki jingkoit jingkhiah jongki bynta ba shapoh jongka met hapdeng kine ki aiom slap da kaba iada bad ialeh pyrshah bad bun ki jingpang iabit.Haba shit met haka por slap, kine ki jait sha ki pynaram bad pynpjah iaka jingshit met bad iarap pynduna iaka jingkiew ka temperature haka met. Kilah ruh ban pynkoit iaka jingtyrha ha u ryndang, ki jing at kuda haka met bad mih khniang haka durkhmat naka daw ki khniang jingpang kiba ktah iaka jingkoit jingkhiah jongphi. Bun ki briew ki don jingshitom ha ki khmat ha ka por slap, kine ki jait sha ki iarap bha ban pyllait naka jinglang um ki khmat, saw kyrang ha ki khmat, ka jing dait ki khmat bad ka jingtyrkhong ka khmat. Namar kata ban lait na kine ki jingshitom pyrshang ban dih da ka sha chrysanthemum ban ioh iaka met kaba koit ba khiah.Shet pynthnam iaka um bad ber khyndiat kine ki slasha haka jingkhluit kaba 90°C naka bynta 3 minit haduh ba ka umsha kan kylla rong stem malu mala. Ba kan kham bang, ber khyndiat ka shini ne ka ngap haki.Ka sha saw kadei kaba biang tam haba ka por slap ka wan. Ka jingshisha ruh kadei namar ki sha saw ki duna ka jinglut bad kiba lah ban pyndonkam da baroh. Ki don haki kyrhai ka antioxidants kum ki sha jyrngam (green tea) bad ki iarap bha ban pynsyaid iaki bynta ba shapoh jongka met hangto hangto hi. Bad ruh bun ki nongwad bniah ki ai jingmut ba ka sha saw ka lah ban pynbha bad pynkhuid iaka sniehdoh na ka jingmih ki khniang jingpang kum ki bacteria, UV Rays bad kiwei kiwei de.Shet pynthnam iaka um kumba 158°F haduh 167°F bad ber khyndiat ki slasha kat ban biang bad sa dih hadien katto katne por. Pyrshang ban dih khlem da khlehlang iaka shini haki bad kynmaw ban ym dih umpjah mar ia dep dih iaka sha saw namar kalah ban nang ktah iaka jingkoit jingkhiah jongka met jongphi.
title: KA SHA: Ki jait sha kiba bha ban dih ha kane ka aiom slap

content: Ka World Health Organization (WHO), ka la pynsangeh shwa ia ka jing pyndonkam ia ki dawai kiba la shna na India bad kitei ki kynthup ia u  hydroxychloriquine, uba ki sumar ia kiba pang  COVID-19.Ka rai jong ka WHO, ka dei hadien ka kaiphod, ba la pynmih ha ka taiew ba ladep, da ka  Lancet, kaba pyni ba ka jing pyndonkam ia utei u dawai, ka pyniap kloi iau briew, ong U  Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus, uba dei u khlieh duh jong ka WHO.U Tedros, u iathuh ba ia mynta, la rai shwa ban pynsangeh shipor, ia utei u dawai  hydroxychloroquine.La ong shuh shuh ba u dawai Hydroxychloroquine, u dei uba ju sumar ia ka jingpang kaba ju ktah bha ha ki mat, hynrei na ka liang jong U President ka America, ula ai jingmut ban pyndonkam ia katei ka dawai bad ka US, ka la thied shibun bha ia utei u dawai.Ka jingpule ka Lancet, ka iathuh ba ka jingdih ia utei u dawai, ka lah ruh ban pynmih ia kiwei pat ki jait jingpang bad katei ka kynthup ia ka jingpang kaba ktah ia u klongsnam.Ka Lancet, ka ong shuh shuh ba utei u dawai, um shym la iarap eiei satia ia ki nongpang bad katei ka long haba ki la wad jingtip, na ki  96,000 ngut ki nongpang ha ki bun spah tylli ki hospital.
title: Pyn sangeh shwa ka WHO, ia ka jing pyndonkam ia u dawai, uba na India, na bynta ka Corona

content: Guwahati: Sa 50 ngut ki don kiba ioh jingpang Covid 19 ha Assam bad mynta, kiba don ia katei ka jingpang, ki la poi sha ka 643 ngut.U Himanta Biswa Sarma, myntri ka koit ka khiah  ka Assam, u iathuh mynta ka miet, ba 27 ngut na kitei kiba ioh pang, ki dei na Golaghat District, katba sa 23 ngut ki dei na Kamrup Metro, Nagaon bad Darrang District bad 21 ngut na kitei ki dei na Kamrup Metro.Lyngba katei ka jinglap, ki don mynta 574 ngut kiba dang don ia katei ka jingpang ha ka Jylla.
title: Kiew sha ka 666 ngut kiba ioh pang Covid 19 ha Assam

content: Shillong: Ka jingther u slap ba jur ha ki bynta jong ka West Jaintia Hills District, ka la pynlong ia ka jing kiew jong ki wah kiba don ha ka thain.Mynta ka sngi 10 ngut ki briew kiba sah ha ki jaka rep ka ba don ha  Sahbesain West Jaintia Hills, ki la sahkut ha kane ka jaka hadien ba ka um kaba heh ka la kiew kynsan bad kerkut sawdong ha kane ka jaka.Na ka liang u  Deputy Commissioner jong ka West Jiantia Hills District u bah Garod LNS Dykes u la iathuh ba hadien ka jingioh jingtip, ia kane ka jingsah kut kine ki 10 ngut ki nongrep ha kane ka jaka u la phah ia ki pulit jong ka 3rd MLP Battalion ban pyllait ia kine ki briew.Na ka liang jong ki pulit ka 3rd MLP Battalion, ki la shna ia ki bull (Raft) da ki siej bad leit sha ka jaka ba sahkut kine ki 10 ngut ki briew bad da kaba pyndon kam ia ki bull(Raft) ki la ioh ban pyllait im ia kine ki briew baroh shiphew ngut.U Deputy Commissioner ka WJHD, u la iathuh ruh ba ha kane ka jingshah lynshop u slap mynta ka sngi haduh mynta ka  jan miet kam shym la don kano kano ka jingjia ba sngewsih.Mynta ka sngi ka West Jaintia Hills District, ka la mad ia ki ba bun ki jingjulor na ka jingther u slap ha ka ba ka la wanrah ia ka jingtwa ka khyndew bad ki maw ha ki surok bad ka jingjulor ki ing ki sem na ka jingtwa ka khyndew bad ka jingshlei ka um.
title: Pyllait im ki pulit ia ki 10 ngut, kiba sah kut ha jaka rep

content: Shillong: Ka Lympung ki Hynriew Shnong mynta ka sngi ki la pynpaw sha ka ophis treikam ka Deputy Commissioner (DC) ka East Khasi Hills ban ieng pyrshah jur ia ka jing thmu ka sorkar ban plie noh ia ka Iewduh bad Khyndai Lad.Kum ban shu pynkynmaw, dang shen u symbud myntri rangbah ka jylla u bah Prestone Tynsong, u la ong ba ka sorkar ka la aiti sha ka ophis treikam jong ka DC bad U Chief Secretary, na ka bynta ban wad ki lad lynti naka bynta ban plie noh ia ka Iewduh bad Khyndai Lad.Na ka liang u President ka Lympung ki Hynriew shnong u bah Paul Sawian u la ong ba ka Lympung ka shim ia ka rai ban pyrshah ia ka jing thmu ka sorkar ban pliew ia ka Iewduh bad Khyndai Lad ka dei ha ka nongrim ba ka jing pang corona virus hapoh ka ri ka dang kiew man ka por, bad ka Iewduh bad ka Khyndai Lad ka dei ka jaka ba jur bha ka jing iakhleh lang ki briew napoh ka jylla bad na bar bad kane kan buh ia ka jing ma halor ka jing khiew biang ka jing pang ‘Corona virus’ hapoh ka jylla bad namar kata la dawa na ka sorkar ba kam dei ban plie shwa ia ka Iewduh bad Khyndai Lad.“Ka Iewduh ka don 26 tylli ki jaka ban rung shapoh Iew bad haduh katno ka sorkar Meghalaya ka don kita ki ‘Magistrates’ ba kin lah ban long phikir iaka jing rung jing mih ki paidbah ha Iewduh” la bynrap u bah Paul SawianHaba dei bad ka rai jong ka ophis treikam ka DC, na ka liang u president ka Lympung ki Hynriew shnong u la iathuh ba hadien ka jing ia kynduh jong ki ia ka DC ka East Khasi hills ka la mynjur ban nym pat plie ia ka Iewduh bad Khyndai Lad.
title: Pyrshah jur ka Lympung ki Hynriew Shnong ban plie ia ka Iewduh

content: Shillong: Ha kine ki khyndiat sngi ka jylla baroh ka wei ka la sakhi ia ki ba bun ki jingjulor bad ka jingduh nong ha ka ba iadei na ka jingther u slap ha ka ba ka la ktah jur ia ka jylla baroh kawei,ka jingjulor ka ba shyrkhei ka long ia ki ing ki sem ki surok, ha kaba ka la wan rah ia ka jingeh ha ka leit ka wan bad kumjuh ia ki jaka rep ki ba la shah tap bad pynjulor ia ki jingthung jingtep ha une u slap u ba jur.Mynta ka sngi ka rilum Jaintia ka la shah ktah jur ha kane ka jinghap u slap u ba jur ha ryngkat ka eriong ha kine ki 24 kynta ka la wan rah ia ka jingjulor ki surok, kiba bun na ki ing briew ki la julor na ka jing twa ka kyndew bad kum juh ka jingshei ka um na ka wah Myntdu ka la ktah jur ia ki markhap shnong ki ba ka ne ka wah ka iaid lynti.Ki surok ki ba la shah ktah jur na ka jingtwa ka kyndew ka long ha ka surok Amlarem, Dawki, bad ka surok ha ka shnong  Moosyiem Shangpung ki ba don ha ka West Jaintia Hills District. Ka jingtwa ka khyndew ka ba khamjur ha ka ba ka la pynjulor ia ki ing ki sem ka long ha Riatdiengling ha jan jong ka Government Boys.Katba ka jingshlei jong ka wah myntdu ka la tap lut ia ka Syntu Ksiar bad Yalong, na ka ne ka jinghap jong u slap u bala neh 24 kynta ka la wan rah ia ki jing julor ki ba bun ki shnong ki ba hap ha ka West Jaintia Hills District ka ba kynthup ia ka Chilliangraij,ka Tympang, Iawmusiang,Caroline Colony, Riatsiatsim bad ka Khliehiongriang na ka jing shlei ka um bad ka jingtwa ki khyndew.Ha kane ka jing lynshop u slap bad ka eriong ym shem la don ka no kano ka jingmynsaw hynrei ka jingjulor ka long ka bakhraw ha ka Rilum jaintia.
title: Pyn julor jur u lapbah ia ka sor Jowai bad shawei ha Jaintia Hills

content: Shillong: Ka Deputy Commissioner jong ka East Khasi Hills District ka kong Matsiewdor W Nongbri, mynta ka sngi ka la khot ia ka jingialang ia ka KHADC, ka Hima Mylliem bad ka Superintendent of Police u ban iamir jingmut ha kaba iadei bad ka jingplie ia ki dukan ha Iewduh.Ha kane ka jingialang   la shim ia ka rai ba ia mynta ym pat long ban plie ia ka iewduh, kham tam  ha kum kane ka por ba ka jylla ka dang don hapdeng ka jingialeh ban teh lakam na ka jingsaphriang ka khlam Covid-19.   Mynta ka sngi ka  Deputy Commissioner ka la pyniaid ia ka jingialang, ha ka jingiadon ryngkat u CEM ka KHADC u bah Titostarwell Chyne, u majistor, ki myntri na ka Hima Mylliem bad ka  Superintendent of Police.U CEM jong ka KHADC, u la iathuh ba hadien ka jing iamir jingmut ha pdeng ka Deputy Commissioner, ka  Superintendent of Police, ki myntri  jong ka Hima Mylliem, la shim ia ka rai ba ia mynta hi kam pat long ban plie ia ka iewduh.Kum ban shu kynmaw u symbud myntri rang bah ka jylla hynnin ka sngi u la iathuh ba ka rai ban plie ia ki dukan badon ha  iewduh bad Khyndai lad long hadien ka  kaiphot ba la ioh na ka Deputy Commissioner.
title: Rai ka DC, KHADC, bym pat shah ban plie ia ka Iewduh

content: Guwahati: Ki don sa 19 ngut kiba dang ioh pang thymmai ha Assam bad baroh kiba ioh Covid 19, ki la poi sha ka 616 ngut ha katei ka Jylla.U Himanta Biswa Sarma, myntri ka koit ka khiah ka sorkar Assam, u iathuh ba kitei kiba ioh pang, ki dei na   Karimganj, Goalpara, Guwahati, Dhubri, Hailakandi, Udalguri bad Lakhimpur district.
title: Sa 19 ngut kiba ioh covid 19 ha Assam, kiew sha ka 616 ngut

content: Shillong: U slap uba jur, ula ther tyngeh mynta ka sngi ha Sohra, ha kaba ka jingkhein, ba la ioh, ka pyni ba naduh ka por 8.30 mynstep haduh ka por 5.30 mynta ka janmiet, u slap, ula poi sha ka 133.4mm, katba hynnin ka sngi, naduh ka por 8.30 mynstep haduh ka por 8.30 mynmiet, u slap ula hap 194.9mm.Mynta ka sngi, ka nongbah Shillong, ka duna slap, kaba long tang 1.0mm, katba ha Umiam, ka long tang 0.4mm.Ka tnat peit mariang, ka maham ruh ba lashai ka sngi, kan dei ka sngi, ba ka jinghap slap, kan jur bha ha ki bynta jong ka Jylla.
title: Ther jur u slap ha Sohra, yn jur bha u slap lashai ka sngi

content: Shillong: Ka Khasi Hills Autonomous District Council (KHADC) myn hynnin ka sngi ka la rai ban ai jing iarap pisa ia ki ‘Quarantine’ centre kiba la pyniaid da ki dorbar shnong.U Chief Executive Member (CEM) u bah Titosstarwell Chyne,   u la iathuh ba ka KHADC ka la rai ban ai jing iarap pisa sha ki ‘quarantine’ centre kum shi bynta ban pynshlur ia ki dorbar shnong ban ai jaka leh quarantine ha ki shnong na ka bynta ki samla ba wanphai na bar jylla.“Na ka liang ka KHADC kan ai bor ia ki Dorbar shnong ban phah ia ka kaiphod haba dei bad ki jaka ba leh quarantine hapoh ki shnong kiba pyniaid ruh da ka dorbar shnong na ka bynta ban ioh ka jing iarap pisa na ka KHADC” la bynrap u bah Titosstarwell Chyne.Na ka liang u CEM ka KHADC u la ong ruh ba ki dorbar shnong kin hap phah ia ka kaiphod sha ka KHADC lyngba u MDC jong ki.Haba jubab halor ka song pisa ba ka KHADC kan iarap pisa, na ka liang u CEM u la ong ba ka District Council kan hap ban eksamin bha ia ka kaiphod na ki dorbar shnong ha shwa ban ai jing iarap shaki Dorbar Shnong.Ha kawei pat ka khubor, ka Khasi District Council, ka dawa ia ka sorkar ban ai jingiada ia ki samla kiba wan phai sha ka Jylla bad katei ka jingkren, ka wan hadien ba la iohi ha ki kotkhubor bad ki ‘social media’, na ka liang ka Khasi Hills Autonomous District Council (KHADC) mynta ka sngi ka kyntu ia ka sorkar Meghalaya ban ai jing iada ia ki samla kiba thmu ban wanphai sha Meghalaya na kiwei pat ki jylla ka ri India.Lah ban pynkynmaw ha ka miet 23 tarik jymmang 2020 ki samla ka jylla kiba wanphai lyngba ka rel ba la mang kyrpang ka sorkar jylla ki la shah thombor haki staion rel jong ka jylla Bihar.Na ka liang u Chief Executive Member (CEM) u bah Titosstarwell Chyne Dkhar mynta ka sngi u la ong ba ka sorkar Meghalaya ka dei ban shim ka jing kitkhlieh ia ka jing shngain ki samla ka jylla kiba wanphai sha Meghalaya na kiwei pat ki jylla ka ri India.
title: Rai ka KHADC ban iarap ia ki ‘Quarantine’ centre, ba pyniaid da ki dorbar Shnong

content: Shillong: Ka kynhun jong ki nongkhaii, ki nongrep Khasi & Jaintia, hapoh ka jingialam jong u MDC ka Mawhati Constituency u bah Charles Marngar myn hynnin ka sngi ki la leit ban ia kynduh ia u CEM ka Khasi Hills Autonomous District Council  u bah Titostar well Chyne ban ia kren halor ka jingphah siew ia ka bai Transit Pass jong ka District Council ia ki mar rep, kiba ka sorkar jylla ka la dep ban ithuh kum u mar rep.Na ka liang ka sorkar jylla la 11 bnai mynta ka la pyllait ia u synsar, u latyrpad bad u sohmrit khlaw na ka jingsiew ia ka bai Transit Pass namar ba ki la ithuh ia kine  kum ki mar rep, katba na ka liang ka KHADC, ha kine ki 5 sngi, ka la shim biang ia ka bai Transit pass na ki nongkhaii ki ba wan thied ia kine ki marrep.Na ka liang u bah Charles Marngar bad ka kynhun ki Nongkhaii, ki nongrep Khasi & Jaintia mynta mynstep ki la leit ban jurip ia ka jaka ba ju pyniaid iaid iew ia u latyrpad bad u synsar kaba don ha Mawlai Mawiong MECOFED ban sngap ia ka daw ka jingbym treh jong ki nongkhaii ban thied  ia kine ki mar rep.La iathuh ba haduh 50 tylli ki trok ki dang sah kut ha MECOFED, Mawiong na ka jing bym treh ban siew  ki nongkhaii  ia ka bai Transit Pass kaba long 4500 tyngka shitrok bad kane ka wan rah ia ka jingeh ia ki nongrep ki ba rep ia kine ki marrep, khamtam ha kum kane ka por lockdown.Haba iakren bad u bah Charles Marngar, u la iathuh ba kane ka jingphah siew jong ka KHADC ia ka bai Transit Pass  ia ki mar ki ba kynthup ia u Synsar , u latyrpad bad u sohmrit khlaw, ka wan rah ia ka jing eh ia ki nongrep ki ba im jakpoh na kane ka kam, namar ba ki nongkhaii kiba wan thied ia kine ki mar rep kim treh shuh ban thied, na ka jing phah siew ia ka bai Transit Pass.Hadien ka jing ia kynduh, U CEM ula mynjur ban lum ia ka jingialang bad ki MDC jong kito ki jaka ki ba pynmih ia kine ki mar rep ban iakren halor kane ka phang.
title: Sahkut 50 tylli ki trok ha Mawiong, ba dawa bai TP ka KHADC na u synsar, sla tyrpad

content: Nongpoh:Hadien ba la iohbor na ka sorkar jylla bad ruh hadien ba la dep ban katkum ki kyndon bala bthah da ka sorkar, ki bor pyniaid ka Bethany Hospital Outreach Nongpoh, ki la plie noh mynta ka sngi, kata hadien 1 bnai tam ba ki la khangdam naduh ba la khlad noh u Dr. John Sailo Ryntathiang (Bam kwai ha dwar u Blei), uba la ngat ia ka jingpang khlam COVID-19, u Doctor ba Rangbah ha ka jylla bad uba dei ruh u trai katei ka Hospital.Ia katei ka Hospital kaba la plie myn hynnin ka sngi, kan treikam ha ryngkat ki kyndon bad katkum ka jingiathuh u Dr. CM Pohshna Deputy Medical Superintendent katei ka jaka sumar, u la ong ba katei ka Hospital kan plie naduh ka por 9 baje haduh 3 baje janmiet bad kumba ka long mynta kam pat treikam lut baroh, hynrei kan kan leh shwa tang ia ki katto katne ki jingsumar, kiba kynthup ia ki jaka test, ki jingai dawai, ki jingsumar ba kyrkieh (Emergency), ka jingsumar bad ai dawai khyllung (Paediatric), namar kumba ka long mynta wat ki nongtrei kiba kynthup ia ki Doctor bad Nurse kim pat wan ban bteng ia ki kamram.U la ong ruh ba ynda la biang ki Doctor, ki Nurse yn sa shnong pyrkhat biang, na ka bynta ban ai ka jingshakri ia ki paidbah bad ruh yn sa plie lut ia baroh ki jaka treikam kumba ju long ha ki por ba la dep.Kiba la donlang ha ka jingsdang ban plie biang ia katei ka jaka sumar, ki kynthup ia u Bah Mayral Born Syiem MLA ka Nongpoh, u Bah Balajied Ranee MDC, ka Kong RM Kurbah Deputy Commissioner ka Ri-Bhoi District, nangta ki bor pyniaid ka Bethany kiba kynthup ia u David Sailo Ryntathiang Chief Financial Officer, Peter Sailo Ryntathiang CEO, Dr. CM Pohshna ryngkat kiwei kiwei ki riew rangbah, ki Doctor, ki Nurse bad ki nongtrei katei ka Hospital.Na kiba la ai jingkren ha katei ka sngi, naduh u Bah Mayral Born Syiem, ka Kong RM Kurbah lem bad kiwei, kiba la pynpaw ka jingsngewsih halor ka jingjia ia u Dr, John Sailo Ryntathiang, uba la khlad noh hadien ba u la ioh ia u khning jingpang COVID-19 tad haduh ba un da khlad na pyrthei.
title: Yn treikam biang ka Bethany Hospital  Outreach Nongpoh ha ryngkat ki kyndon

content: Agartala: Sa saw ngut, ki don kiba dang shu ioh ia ka pang khlam Covid 19 ha Tripura. Kitei ki saw ngut, ki dei kiba wan phai na Mumbai, da ka rel, ong ka khubor.La pynthikna ia katei ka khubor, da U Biblab Deb, myntri rangbah ka Tripura mynta ka sngi.
title: Sa saw ngut kiba ioh pang Covid – 19 ha Tripura

content: Imphal: 3 ngut ki briew, ki la ioh jingpang  COVID-19 biang ha Manipur, hynnin ka miet, ong ka khubor.  Kitei ki lai ngut, ki dei rangbah suda.La iathuh ba kitei ki 3 ngut, ki dei kiba na Imphal West District suda.  Mynta kiba ioh ia katei ka jingpang, ki la poi sha ka 39 ngut.
title: Sa 3 ngut kiba ioh pang covid 19 ha Manipur

content: Guwahati: 47 ngut ki la don biang, kiba ioh pang thymmai ha Assam bad mynta ka Assam, ka la kiew sha ka 595 ngut. Na ki 47 ngut, ki don 21ngut na Golaghat, 4 ha Lakhimpur, 8 ha Morigaon, ha Goalpara 3, Hojai 1, ha MMCH 1, ha Karbi Anglong 2 bad Nagaon 5.Kiba ioh pang thymmai haduh mynta, ki don 47 ngut, nangta hynnin ka sngi, ki don 147 ngut, katba ha ka   24tarik Jymmang 2020, ki don 46 ngut bad ha ka 23tarik Jymmang ki don 67 ngut.  Ha ka 22tarik Jymmang 2020, ki don 49 ngut kiba ioh pang bad tang ha Sarusajai  Quarantine Centre, ki don 26ngut kiba ioh ia katei ka jingpang hynnin ka sngi.
title: Nang kiew ka coronavirus ha Assam, poi sha ka 595ngut

content: Guwahati: Ka jingpang coronavirus, ka la nang kiew ha Assam, ha kaba ki don 156 ngut kiba ioh pang thymmai, ha ki 24 kynta ba ladep bad baroh kiba ioh ia katei ka jingpang, ki la poi mynta sha ka  548 ngut bad hynnin ka sngi, ka dei ruh ka sngi, kaba ka jingpang ka jur bha. Na katei ka 156 nut, ki don 59 ngut ha Golaghat district.Ka jingioh pang coronavirus ha India, ka la poi sha ka 1.45 lak ngut, ha kaba kiba iap, ki la poi sha ka 4,167 ngut bad kiba iap ha ki 24 kynta ba ladep, ki long 146 ngut.Ka jingiap ha United States, ka long 532 ngut ha ki 24 kynta ba ladep, ong ka  Johns Hopkins University. Ka jingdon kiba iap ha US, haduh mynta ka long   98,218, ong ka  University na Baltimore bad kiba ioh pang haduh mynta ki don  1,662,375.Ha ka pyrthei baroh kawei, ki don  5.5million ngut kiba ioh pang coronavirus, ong ka  Johns Hopkins university bad kiba iap, ki long   3,46,232.Ka Nepal myn hynnin ka sngi, ka don ia 79ngut kiba dang ioh pang thymmai bad baroh kiba ioh pang ha katei ka ri, ki la kiew sha ka  682ngut. Ka Nepal, ka la pynlong ia ka pakhang shnong, haduh ka 2tarik Jylliew 2020.
title: Nang kiew ka khlam coronavirus ha Assam, poi 1.45 lak ngut ha India

content: Shillong: U bah  Prestone Tynsong, symbud myntri rangbah  ka Jylla, u kynthoh hynnin ka sngi, ba ka  Mawmluh Cherra Cement Limited (MCCL), ka dei ka tnat trei kam, ka bym larkam shuh satia.U bah Tynsong, u ong shuh shuh  “Ngi tip shai, ba ka MCCL, ka dei ka tnat, ka bym lerkam shuh bad nga tip shai, ba wat ki mashin ruh, ki don bun ki bym trei kam shuh satia” ong U bah Tynsong.  Ula ong shuh shuh, ba katei ka kompeni, ka la buh ia ka jingkit kaba khia shibun ia ka sorkar jylla. “Ngin sa shim ia ka rai, ia kaei kaba dei ban leh, ha kaba iadei bad ka MCCL” ong U bah Tynsong, wat la um pat mynjur, ba ka sorkar ka don jingthmu ban khang noh ia katei ka karkhana shna dewbilat.Ka MCCL, ka dei ka kompeni, kaba la ban khia shibun ia ka sorkar jylla bad kham mynshwa, ka sorkar ka la pynlut kumba T.22.3klur, na ka bynta ban bei pisa ia 145 ngut ki nongtrei, ba kin shongthait noh.Ka sorkar Jylla, ka la bei pisa ha u snem 2005, na ka bynta ban thied ia ki mashin khlem dewbilat, ba ki khot dry process bad ba katei ka kompeni, kan lah ban pynmih dewbilat haduh 600 ton ha ka shisngi.Lada I bah Prestone  kwah khang ia Ka company shna dewbilat ha sohra te ai in leh kumta namar I DEI TRAI tharai Jong katei Ka company..Mynshuwa haba dang dang Iaid bha Ka wet process kajingpynmih dewbilat Ka jubor bha bad ki  paidbah Ka shnong sohra Kim kwah pynduh ia katei Ka process.Hynrei mar syn ong ban bujli noh iaKa wet process da Ka dry process hangta la sngewthuh Shai BA kane Ka karkhana Kan SA troin namar tang Ka kyrteng dry ruh la sngewthuh Shai kdar BA Kan SA ‘dry'(tyrkhong ).haba kumne iano yn kynnoh .Hato ym DEI ki ba halor Kiba pyntroin ia kane Ka karkhana.hato ym lah mo ban phai dien sha Ka barim lane wet process.Lada ym lah kumta la khambha ba aiti noh ha ki private company khnang ba ki nongtrei Jong katei Ka company kin ym khuslai ne dukha mynsiem ioh Shah khang khyrdep.Shabas bah ka dei kaba phi ong maphi ngi ruh ngi ia mynjur lang namar ha kum Kane ka jaka Jong ngi kaba pawnam naka bynta u slap kaei ka jingmut ban wanrah pat iaka dry processKa dei ka failure jong ka government. Thung MD da u non technical  bad da ki politician te un poi shaei. Ka sorkar ka promote ia ki private factory balei mo.??. 25 years ago, it was the best cement factory in NE. Ki trok ki kit cement 20-25 truck man ka sngi.Lada ït bniah tang na ka office trei kam ruh,lah dei hi ban troiñ ka MCCL,ka factory sha ei ka office sha ei.U nongtrei ha office kmno un tip ia ka jingdonkam ka factory ka ba iajngai da ki phew kilometers.
title: Ka MCCL, ka kompeni, ka bym larkam shuh, ong u symbud myntri rangbah

content: Ka khlam corona, kaba la syngngeit jur ia ka jylla Maharashtra, ha ki bun bnai ba ladep; mynta ka kynti, ka la rung syndon hapoh Bank thaw pisa bad kata ka long ha ka Currency Note Press (CNP) kaba don ha Nashik jong ka Jylla Maharashtra.Katei ka jaka shon pisa, kan khang na ka bynta san sngi kynthih bad ka daw, ka long namar ba ki don 40 ngut ki nongtrei jongka, kiba ioh pang corona virus. Katei ka Bank, kan khang haduh ka Sngi Palei, hadien ba 2 percent na ki nongtrei jongka, ki la ioh ia katei ka khlam corona.Kitei ki nongtrei ki kynthup ruh ia ki katto katne ngut ki ophisar bad sa ki nongtrei kiba peit ia ki kam mashin.Ka Currency Note Press, Nashik (‘CNP Nashik’), ka shon ia ki kot tyngka kiba  bha tam ha India bad kumba 40 percent na ki kot tyngka jong ka India, la shon ha katei ka press ha Nashik bad sa ka shnat jongka, ha  Bank Note Press, Dewas.Ka CNP, ka shon haduh 4,872 million tylli ki kot tyngka, na ka bynta u snem 2016-17.
title: Trei ka khlam corona, sa ia ki nongtrei ka Bank shna pisa

content: Ki don sa  78,512 ngut kiba ioh pang khlam corona virus ha India bad mynta baroh kiba ioh pang corona, ki la poi sha ka  36,21,245. Kiba dang don ia ka jingpang haduh mynta, ki long  78,1975, kiba la jem ki long  27,74,801 bad kiba iap ki long  64,469ngut, katba kiba iap ha ki 24 kynta ba ladep, ki long 971 ngut.Ka health ministry jong ka sorkar India, ka iathuh ba kiba la jem na ka jingpang, ki poi sha ka 5 lak ngut ha ki phra sngi ba ladep.Ka jingdon kiba ioh pang corona ha ka pyrthei, ka la poi mynta sha ka 25 million ngut bad tang ha America, ka la poi sha ka 6 million ngut.
title: Sa 78 hajar ngut kiba ioh corona bad sa 971 ngut kiba iap ha India

content: Ka NASA, ka kulmar jingmut ha kine ki sngi bad ka daw ka long namar ba uwei u met bneng asteroid, uba don ia ka jingheh kaba ar shah ia u  Great Pyramid of Giza bad utei u asteroid, un her shajan ka pyrthei, ha ka jingstet kaba  31,400mer ha ka shi kynta.Utei u asteroid, u dei uba la tip da ka kyrteng  465824 (2010 FR),  u don ia ka jingheh kaba  270metre ka pyngkiang bad un wan shajan jong ka pyrthei, ha ka 6tarik Nailur 2020.La iathuh ba utei u met bneng, u dei uba la tip  Near-Earth Object, da ka  US National Aeronautics and Space Administration (NASA). Hynrei la iathuh ba utei u met bneng, um don jingma satia ia ki jingim briew, katba kum ka jingwad bniah jong ki saiantis jong ka   Center for Near-Earth Object Studies (CNEOS).Ki stad jong ka NASA, ki pynleit jingmut bha ha kine ki sngi, ban peit ia ka jingwan hap jong kine ki met bneng sha ka pyrthei bad dang khyndiat taiew mynshwa, kim shym la lap satia ia uwei u met bneng, uba wan her sha ka pyrthei, uba don ia ka jingheh jong ka kali rit uba la iathuh, ba ula wan tur bha hajan jong ka pyrthei, ha ka jingjngai kaba  kumba 1,830 mer (2,950km)  na ka pyrthei ba ngi shong.
title: Kulmar jingmut ka NASA, ban wad ia u asteroid, u ban wan her sha ka pyrthei ha ka 6tarik Nailur

content: Ka la don ka jingjia kaba ima hynnin ka sngi, ha kaba kawei ka khynnah kynthei, kaba dang lai snem ka rta, ka la shah rong noh sha suin ha ka kot kudi bad katei ka dei ha ka jing ialeh tamasa ha Taiwan.Katei ka khynnah, ka bym shym la tip kyrteng, ka la shah rong haduh shi spah phut sha suin, ha katei ka kot kudi.La iathuh ba hynnin, ka dei ka tamasa pynher kot kudi ha ka rud duriaw ha Nanliao jong ka nongbah Hsinchu bad katei ka la shah rong ha katei ka kot kudi, kaba radbah bad kaba don ia u tdong uba jrong bha.Kito ki nong peitkai pynher kot kudi, ki la ia kulmar jingmut shipor, katba ka nang shah tan sha suin, ha ka kot kudi kaba heh bha, hynrei namar ba ki ia bun briew, ki la lah ban tan biang ia ka kot kudi sha madan.Ka khynnah rit, kam shym la mynsaw eiei, lait noh ka jingmong kaba malu mala;tangba ka la khynniuh ka met, da ka jingtieng bad la leit ialam ia ka sha hospital, ba kan shah sumar.
title: Rong ka kot kudi, haduh shi spah phut sha suin, ia ka khynnah rit

content: Ka ktien u Blei (bible) ka iathuh shai ba haduh ki por shwa kaba kut (end times) ka jingtip jingstad kan roi (Knowledge/ education). Ka Jingroi ka jingstad ka dei kawei na ki dak (sign) jong ki sngi Bakhadduh. U Blei u la ai ha u briew ka jingstad kat kaba u dang dei ban ai, ban shem (discover) ban wad (research) bad kumta ter ter. Kane ka paw bha ha ka liang ka science lyngba ki saiantist, ka jingshem kaba bun eh dei ban pynshisha (proof) ia kaei kaba ka Bible ka la kren. Kumta bun ki jingshem lyngba ka jingstad dei kiei kiei kiba kiba ka ktien u Blei (bible) ka la kren lypa.Shaphang kata, ka Bible ka ong – “Haduh ka por jong kaba kut kein….. Ka jingtip kan roi”. (Until the time of the end …… knowledge shall be increase). Daniel 12:4. Ngi im ha ki sngi ki por ba kaba kut la hajan eh bad ka long mynta hi. Namar ba kita ki sngi ki long kiba rieh, kumta donkam ban pule ia ka Bible bad bishar kumno ka pyrthei ka long, dei hangta yn iohi ba kine ki long ki sngi ba khadduh. Ki long ki sngi ba ka jingstad jingtip ka roi shaba palat bad ymlah mutdur shuh, bad kita ki por ki long mynta hi.Balei ka jingtip ka roi? U Blei haba u ai ka jingtip (knowledge) ka don ka jingthmu jong u ban pyndep ia ki jingiathuh lypa baroh jong ka ktien u Blei. Namar na u, da u, sha u, long kiei kiei baroh. Rome 11:33-36. Ka Bor, ka jingstad, jingshem phang baroh ki long ki jong u.Ka jingstad ka long kaba donkam naka bynta ki sngi bakhadduh. Da ka jingstad, u briew u lah ban thoh ban pule, da ka jingstad u briew u shem iakiei kiei kiba phylla ia kiba u Blei u la dep kren. Ki jingshem (Invention/ discover) kila bun palat. Bad ka jingshem kaba mynta ba la pynjanai, dei ka jingshem ia u micro-chip.U chip u long u kynja tiar uba rit tam ia uba ki saiantist ki lashem ban thep ha ka met u briew. Ka jingshem jongki ka thaw ia kawei ka liang ba ki thmu ban iarap ia u briew ha ki liang ba donkam. Hynrei kim tip pat ba kata ka jingshem jongki ka long ban pyndep ia ka ktien u Blei. U riewstad saian u batai ba lyngba u chip te ym donkam Epic, Aadhaar, pancard bad kiwei kiwei. Hynrei u Blei pat u la dep tip lypa ia kine baroh baka jingshem ia u chip kan dei noh ia ka por kaba lajan ban pyntrei kam. Ki saiantist ki shem ba ka jaka ba biang ban buh ia u Chip haka met, dei ha ka kti ka mon ne shyllangmat, namar kine ki ar ki bynta ki biang ia u chip ban charging lyngba ka jingshit (Temperature) ka met u briew.Kaei kaba jia? ki saiantist ki kyndit ban tip ba la thoh ha ka Bible shaphang kane ka rukom ba la thoh haka ka kitab Jingpynpaw 13:16-18. “Bad u (mrad khlaw) u la pyllong ia ki baroh kiba rit barain ba khraw batri, riewspah baduk, ba laitluid bad ki mraw…… ba ynbuh haki ia ka DAK ha ka kti ka mon ne shyllangmat jong ki…….. kadei ka kyrteng uta u mrad khlaw kein. Ka jingkhein jong u ka long 666. Kumta, yn thep ia une u number 666 lyngba u chip hapoh ka kti ka mon ne shyllangmat, namar dei tang kine ki bynta dkhot met balah ban charge ia ka jingneh u micro-chip.Ka jingstad u Blei u la ai kein haduh kine kipor bad ka la long ka ia kaba kut, ka ia ba la jan ban pyntrei kam ia ka kane ka jingstad ba la shem. Ha shwa ia kane, kan don shwa ka jingiateh jutang u Mrad khlaw bad ka Israel, bad yn pynieng ia ka Temple (Third Temple) jong ki Jiw ha Jerusalem. Nangne un sdang pyntrei kam ia kane ia kane ka jingshem kaba mynta ban thep kia u micro –chip ha ka met.“NABA KATA KA IA KA LA LONG HAJAN” Jingpynpaw 13:16-18.
title: Ka Jingtip kan roi

content: Nongpoh: U Bah Sohthenes Sohtun, MLA ka Jirang Constituency, u la phah dorkhas sha u Bah AL Hek,Myntri ka koit ka khiah ha ka jylla, na ka bynta ban kyntu ia u ba u dei ban pynbiang ia ki jingduna hapoh ka Ranibari Sub Centre, kaba dei ruh kawei na ki jaka ai jingsumar ia ki paidbah kiba sah ha katei ka thain kaba don ha khappud ka Meghalaya bad Assam.Ha ka dorkhas kaba u la phah sha u Myntri ka koit ka khiah, u Bah Sosthenes Sohtun, u la kdew ba katei ka Sub Centre kaba don ha Ranibari, ka dei ka jaka sumar kaba la rim bha bad kaba la ai jingshakri ia ki palat phew hajar ngut ki riew paidbah, namarkata ka donkam ia ka sorkar jylla ba ka dei ban pyrkhat janai bad ruh ban iarap ha ka ban pynbiang ia ki jingduna hapoh katei ka jaka sumar.U la kdew ruh ba ka jingbym biang ki iing building ban ai jingsumar ia ki paidbah bad kiwei kiwei ki jingduna, ka la buh jingeh ia ki paidbah katei ka thain, namar dalade ruh u la leit ban jurip, ha kaba u la lap shisha ia shibun ki jingduna ha katei ka Sub centre bad kam lah ban ai jingshakri ia ki paidbah kiba sah katei ka thain khappud.Namarkata, haba iadei bad ki jingduna ha katei ka Sub Center, u MLA Jirang, u la kyntu ia u Myntri ka koit ka khiah, ba u dei ban pynioh noh ia ka building kaba paka lem bad kiwei de ki jingdonkam hapoh katei ka jaka sumar paidbah, khnang ban weng ia ka jingeh kaba la kynduh da ki paidbah ha katei ka thain.
title: Phah dorkhas u MLA Jirang, ba donkam jaka sumar ba biang ki paidbah ka thain Ranibari

content: Nongpoh: U Bah Charles Marngar, MDC ka Mawhati, hynnin ka sngi Saitjian, u la leit ban plie paidbah ia kawei ka VIP Gallery, kaba u la pynshna ha Madan ialehkai ka shnong Rtiang ha Ri Bhoi.Kiba ia donlang ha kaba plie ia katei ka VIP Gallery hapoh katei ka Madan, ki kynthup ia u Bah Amos Marngar, President ka Rtiang Sports & Cultural Club, u Bah B.Nongkseh, Rangbah Shnong ka Rtiang, u Bah B. Marshang, Secretary shnong, u Bah Kroswel Nongkseh, Secretary Club lem bad kiwei ki riew rangbah jong katei ka shnong.Haba ioh ban plie paidbah ia katei ka VIP gallery, ki nongialam ka Sports Club bad ruh ki nongialam shnong, ki la pynpaw ia ka jingkmen kaba khraw, namar ka dei ka sien kaba nyngkong eh ba katei ka Madan kan ioh ia ka VIP gallery.Ki la ong ruh ba ka jingioh ia katei ka VIP gallery, kan pynmyntoi shibun eh ia ka shnong, khamtam eh ia ki khun samla, namar mynta ki la lait na kaba shna beit da ki siej bad tap da ka tyrpal haba don sports ha katei ka madan.
title: Plie VIP Gallery u MDC Mawhati ha Madan ialehkai ka shnong Rtiang

content: Nongpoh: Hynnin ka sngi Saitjain, ki paidbah ka shnong Lumbyrhing, Pahamrioh ha Ri Bhoi, ki la iamih paidbah na ka bynta ban pynkhuid ia ki sawsong sawkun jong katei ka shnong, ia kaba ki la adang naduh mynstep bad kut haduh ka por janmiet.Haba iadei bad katei ka jingpynkhuid shnong, u Bah B. Khongdup, Asst. Rangbah shnong ka Lumbyrhing, la ong ba ka shnong ka ju pynkhuid shnong 2 sien ha ka shisnem, kata ha ka por tlang bad ha ka por Lyiur, khnang ban wanrah ia ka khuid ka suba ha shnong ha thaw.Lyngba jong katei ka sngi, u Bah B. Khongdup, u la pynpaw halor ka jingthmu ka shnong ban weng noh ialade na ka jingshah kynthup ha ka Nongpoh Town Committee lane ha ka Urban Area, namar kumba ka long mynta ki paidbah ka shnong ki kwah ban mih noh na ka Nongpoh Town Committee, namar ka katei ka shnong ka dang dei kaba sahdien ha baroh ki liang bad bun na ki briew kiba shnong hapoh katei ka shnong, ki dei ki nongrep bad ki nongbylla sngi.Namarkata, lada ka shnong ka la kham kiew shakhmat ha baroh ki kam pynroi bad bun na ki paidbah ki dei kiba la biang ka kam ka jam, ha kajuh ruh ka por ba ka shnong ka la kiew ha ki kam pynroi, ka por kan sa poi ba ka shnong kam don jingpyrshah ei ei ruh em ba kan shah pynhap hapoh ka thup Urban, u la bynrap.
title: Pynkhuid shnong ki paidbah ha shnong Lumbyrhing

content: Ka jingthoh ba dang shen da uwei u briew ha kawei ka artikil jong u kaba la mih ha kawei ka kot khubor ha ka 30 tarik u bnai Jylliew (June) 2020 ba ka Jingrwai Ri Khasi Ri Khasi ka dei kata ka jingrwai kaba pynjngem rngiew ia ka jaidbynriew jong ngi, kam dei satia kaei kaei ruh, hynrei ka dei tang ka jingsngew kuhiw jong u ia ki Sahep Mishoneri tang namar ka jinglah jong ki ban noh shibun u synniang ha kaba kyntiew bad pynroi ia kane ka Ri bad ka Jaidbynriew jong ngi kat haduh ba ngi sa lah mynta ban ia long kumne kumba ngi long mynta kaba lah ban ong ba ngim long poh shuh ban ianujor bad kiwei kiwei ki jaidbynriew jong kane ka pyrthei.Kum ki briew bad khamtam eh tang kum ki nongwei ki don shibun ki jingduna, hynrei kam dei pat ia ngi ban ia peit beit khliaw tang ia kita ki jingduna bad ban lapmiet tang ban woh daw woh dong. Ha ka jingshisha, tang ba ki la pruid dak bad btin lynti lem ruh ngi la dei ban sngewnguh sngew burom shi katdei eh ia ki, ym ba ngin kylla long pynban kita ki khlemrain ki ban haram ia kita kiba la leh bha ia ngi.Lada ngi shem, ngi lap ne ngi iohi kino kino ki jingduna bad jingbym biang ka dei sa ka kamram jong ngi em ban nang pynjanai? Balei ma ngi pat ha ka jaka ban pynbha shuh shuh ia kaei kaba ki la pruid dak bad ialam lynti ngi woh nia woh daw pynban ia ki da kaba shim kabu artad ia ka jingduna jong ki?Ka jingrwai ‘Ri Khasi Ri Khasi’ kaba don ha ka kot pule Third Khasi Reader kaba la thoh bad thaw hi da u Dr. John Robert kam dei satia ka jingrwai ieid ri jong ngi, bad kam dei satia kata kaba u John Robert u thoh khnang bad kwah ban pynlong ia ka kum kata ka Jingrwai Ieid Ri jong ngi. U John Robert u thoh ia ka tang kum ka jingsngew shimet jong u bad katkum ka jingsngew jong u kum u Khristan bad ha kajuh ka por kum u briew ba don ka jingsngew ieid jingsngew synei ia ki Khasi.Dei ki briew jong ngi hi (Khasi) kiba la shim bad la sot ia ki katto katne ki kyntien ne dkhot na katei ka jingrwai kaba u John Robert u la thaw bad pynlong kum ki kyntien jong ka jingrwai Ieid Ri. Kaba pynlong ia ki briew jong ngi ban leh kumne ka dei namar ba ka mynsiem jingsngew ieid ia la ka jong ka Ri ka la khih bad ktik ia ka jingmut jingpyrkhat jong ki briew jong ngi ha kito ki por, kumta ki sngew ba ki la donkam ban don ia la ka jong ka jingrwai ieid ri kumba ia don lem kiwei kiwei ki jaidbynriew ha ka pyrthei.Hapdeng ka jingsngew kyrkieh bad kwah dik dik ban don noh la ka jong ka jingrwai ieid ri ki la pyrshang ki lad ki lynti ban thaw ne shna ia ki kyntien jingrwai bad ka sur, hynrei namar ka jingsngew kyrkieh bad ka jingbym ioh satia ia kaba sngewbiang khatduh ki i ba ka jingrwai kaba u John Robert u la thaw ka don ia ki kyntien ba shoh jingmut bad shongkhia haduh katta katta watla ym dei satia baroh.Kumta da kawei ka jingmut ki la rai ban shim ne sot ia katto katne ki kyntien ne dkhot ba don ha katei ka jingrwai kat kiba kham sngew shongkhia bad sngew kit jingmut ba kin long kum ki kyntien jingrwai jong kata ka jingrwai ieid ri kaba ki angnud.Ka kyrteng ‘Ri Khasi Ri Khasi’ ba u John Robert u la ai ia katei ka jingrwai kaba u la thoh ruh ki sngew ba ka long kaba biang, kumta ki la rai ba nalor kaba shim ia ki katto katne ki kyntien ne dkhot na katei ka jingrwai kaba u John Robert u la thaw ia ka kyrteng ruh ki la rai ban ai da katei kajuh hi ka kyrteng kata ‘Ri Khasi Ri Khasi’ .Haba ki la ioh ia ki kyntien jong ka jingrwai ki donkam ruh ban ioh sa ia ka sur kumta ki la thaw lad ban ioh sa ia ka sur na ka bynta kane ka jingrwai, katba ki dang ia pyrshang ban wad ia ka sur na ka bynta kane ka jingrwai shu kumno re ki iohsngew ia ki Mishoneri kiba dei ki nong Wiel (Wales) ba ki ju ia rwai bad kynud ia ka jingrwai ieid ri jong ki. Haba iohsngew ia kata ka sur ka la pynlong ia ki briew jong ngi ha kito ki por ban sngew shoh jingmut bad sngew ieid ia kata ka sur jingrwai, kumta ki la rai ba kin shim da kata ka sur kaba ki Mishoneri ki ju ia rwai man ka por.Haba ki leh ia kane ym dei pat ba ki shu leh lyndet ne long kumba shu tuh ia ka jong kiwei hynrei ki da leit iasyllok bad pan jingmut ruh na ki Mishoneri ba kin shah sngewbha ia ki ban shim bad ban pyndonkam lem ia ka sur jong ka jingrwai ieid ri jong ki.Na ka liang ki Mishoneri ha kata ka por ruh ki la pynpaw ba na ka liang jong ki ruh ki la la shah mon sngewbha ia ki ban leh ia kata, kumta haba ym shym la don jingwit ei ei nangno nangno naduh katei ka por la shim bad pyndonkam da kata ka sur kaba ki nong Wiel ki ia rwai.Watla ia ka jingrwai ieid ri jong ngi ki briew jong ngi mynshuwa ki la shu shim ne sot na ka jingrwai ba u John Robert u la thaw bad kaba u la ai kyrteng hi ‘Ri Khasi Ri Khasi’ hynrei ym dei pat ba ki shu leh lyndet ne shu shim la ka shim khlem da pan jingbit na uta uba la thaw ne thoh ia kata. Ki la da leit iasyllok bad leit pan jingbit shwa na u ba un shah ne ai lad ia ki ban shim ia katto katne ki kyntien ne dkhot kiba don ha kata ka jingrwai ba u la thaw.Haba na ka liang jong u kum u nongthoh u la pynpaw ia ka jinglong ba la kloi jong u ban shah sngewbha ia ki na ka bynta kata kumta da ka mynsiem kaba kmen ki la leh ia kata bad pynurlong ia kaei kaba ki angnud.Kum ki khun ka ri ngi dei bad ngi donkam ban tip bad ngi donkam ban sngewthuh ba kane ka jingrwai ‘Ri Khasi Ri Khasi’ kaba ngi ia pyndonkam mynta kum ka jingrwai ieid ri jong ngi kam don jingiadei ei ei shuh bad kata ka jingrwai Ri Khasi Ri Khasi jong u John Robert.Kane ka jingrwai ka la dei lah ban ong ka jingrwai kaba la suh thied bad kylla longdoh longsnam ha uwei pa uwei u khun ka Ri, hynrei la katta ruh ngim lah pat ban ong ba ka la biang pura. Ha nga hi nga sngew ba ka dang i donkam ban pynbeit bha biang ia ki katto katne tylli ki kyntien kiba don mynta ha kane ka jingrwai ieid ri jong ngi bad ban pyndap shuh shuh lada i donkam. Ia ka kyrteng jong kane ka jingrwai ruh la dei ban ai noh ‘Ri Hynniewtrep Ri Hynniewtrep’ ym shuh ‘Ri Khasi Ri Khasi’ .Sngewdei ban ai jingiaroh shikatdei eh ia ki nongmih khmat jong ngi ha Distrik konsil kiba la lah ban pynrung ia kane ka jingrwai ieid ri jong ngi hapoh Iing Dorbar jong ka KHADC, lada ngi lah lei ban pynkylla noh ia kane ka jingrwai na ka ‘Ri Khasi Ri Khasi’ sha ka ‘Ri Hynniewtrep Ri Hynniewtrep’ khlem artatien nga ngeit kane ka jingrwai kan sa ioh rung wat ha JHADC ruh.
title: “Ba shu kuhiw i mynsiem lajong, kynnoh jem rngiew sa ia ka jingrwai

content: Ki kali Ambulance, ki la bun bah ha kine ki sngi bad kitei ki kynthup ia kiba la pyniaid da ki tnat sorkar kum ka 108, ka tnat ka koit ka khiah bad nangta da ki pulit bad kiba tam nangne, ki dei kiba la pyniaid da ki seng bapher.Kitei ki Ambulance, lada khein antad (imat) kin don da ki spah tylli, namar ba haba peit ha Ri Khasi Jaintia jongngi, la iohi, ba jan man kawei ka Constituency, ka don kawei ka Ambulance (hynrei ki don ruh kiba don 2,3 tylli, ha kaba U MLA ruh u ai, U MP ruh u ai bad wat U MDC ruh u ai).Ha kiba bun ki khep, ngi iohi, ba kitei ki ambulance, ki la ia tyngkhuh ia ki aksiden, ha ki rukom bapher bad kumta, haba ka kali kit nongpang, ka kylla, kumta ka mih ka jingma kaba khraw, namar ba u nongpang, uba shah kit, na ka jingtieng bad syier mynsiem, ula iap lypa, haba don kiba kum kitei ki jingjia ba kyndit.Kumta, ban lait na kum kine ki jingjia, ka la dei ia ka tnat ka koit ka khiah lane ia ka tnat pulit, ba kin pynmih noh da kawei ka kyndon bad kata ka long ba ki nongniah Ambulance, kim dei shuh da kiba dang pyrshang niah kali, hynrei ki dei ban long kiba la mlien ban niah kali bad kiba la skhem kti, ha kaba yn lah ban lait na kino kino ki jingjia ba kyndit. Ym tang katta, ka donkam ruh ba kin tip ia ki ain niah kali, namar ngi ju lap, ba kiba ju tynruh naphang ha surok, ki dei kine ki kali Ambulance bad kine ki buh jingeh shibun ia kiwei pat ki nongniah kali, khamtam ia kito kiba dang pyrshang ban niah kali.Kam dei tang kata, nangta sa ka jing pynpah horn jongki, ka long kaba sngewjli hi khait, ha kaba ka pynwit shi katdei ia ki nongleit nongwan bad kumta ki dei ban don ki kyndon kiba biang bad kiba thikna, ba kan nym mih ka jing shim kabu, tang namar ba ki niah ia ki Ambulance.Ki nongniah Ambulance, ki ju sngew tynnad ruh ban niah stet ia ki kali jongki, wat la ha ka jing shisha, u nongpang, um da donkam ban pynher stet ia ka kali kaba u shong, namar ba kaba donkam, ka long tang ba un nym sahkut ha shiteng lynti bad lyngba kine ki jingjia, kiba ngi ju iakynduh, ka la dei ban ong, ba ki nongniah Ambulance, ki dei ban long tang kiba la shah hikai ha ki pulit; tangba lada kam dei kumta ruh, ki dei ban long noh, kiba la ju mlien ban niah kali, la kiba la skhem kti bha, ba kin nang ban iada na ki jing mynsaw.
title: Ki kali Ambulance

content: U Samla Arles Rymbai, ula khlad lah shisnem tam mynta, hynrei ki sur jingrwai jongu, ki dang iai sawa ha ki shkor jong ki million ngut kiba ieid bad kiba sngew tynnad ia kitei ki jingrwai jongu.U Samla Arles, u dei U Tymmen Basan jong ka Balang Moobakhon bad ha shwa ba un khlad, ula rwai ia ki phew tylli ki jingrwai bad U bah Skilful Pohsnem, uwei na kiba kham tip shaphang jong utei u samla, u iathuh ba u don ia 34 tylli ki jingrwai jongu ha youtube. Ki jingrwai jongu, la jan baroh ki long kiba iaid iew shi katdei, ha kaba la iathuh da U bah Pohsnem, ba ki nongsngap ia ki jingrwai jongu, ki la poi sha ka 4million lane kiba la sngap ki la poi sha ka 40lak ngut.Ki jingrwai jong utei U Tymmen Basan, ba la khlad noh kiba ki riew ieid jingrwai ki sngap bha, ki long ka Ri Kanaan, kaba don palat 15 lak ki nongsngap, Khun Baieid 4.11lak bad nangta sha Ri Kanaan 5.16lak ki nongsngap. Kitei ki long khyndiat tylli ki jingrwai kiba paw bha jong utei U Tymmen Basan ba la khlad noh, dang ha ka rta kaba 34 snem.Na ka bynta ban tip shaphang ka jingim jong utei u nongrwai, u tymmen Basan, U Rupang, ula iakren bad U Tymmen Basan ba mynta jong ka Lumshnong, U Ma Wompher Kyndoh bad kine harum, ki dei ki jing batai, kiba la phah da utei u rangbah.U Lt. T.Bn. Arles Rymbai u la khlad noh na kane ka pyrthei ha ka 13tarik Jylliew 2019 ha ka por 1 PM ei ei ha ba u la dap 34 snem ka rta. Ka jingkhlad noh jong u na kane ka sla pyrthei ka long da kaba u la accident bad kawei ka Truck katba u dang leit phai shala shnong (Moobakhon) da la ka jong ka kali (Maruti Alto) ha ka surok NH 06 ha jan ka shnong Umtyra East Jaintia Hills District..Katkum ka jingtip jong ngi, U Lt. T.Bn. Arles Rymbai naduh ba u dang rit u long u khynnah uba bang bha ia ka rwai ka siaw bad ka put ka tem. U la kham bang eh ban rwai ia ki jingrwai niam naduh ba u dang rit ha ka jinghikai na la ing kaba u la ioh na la u kpa. U la ioh lad ruh ban shakri ia U Kynrad da ki sur jingrwai lyngba ki jingiaseng ba rit bad ba kham heh ruh naduh ka rta kaba u dang tang 10 snem duna ei ei. Hadien nangta u la nang ioh ban pynpaw pyrthei shuh shuh ia kane ka sap kyrpang ba U Blei U la ai ha u lyngba ka jingleit ban ialap iaka Ktien U Blei ha shibun ki bynta jong ka RI Khasi Jaintia bad wat shabar ruh ha ka jingialam jong ki shakri jong U Blei (Nongialap) kum u P. Pohtam (Kudeng thymmai, war jaintia) bad U T.Bn. I. Mynsong (Balang Khyndewsaw) haduh ba u la kynjoh sha ka rta ka jinglong samla.Kane ka sap ba kyrpang ba U Blei U la ia ha u, ka la nangkhraw katba u la nangsan ha ka rta. U la ioh ban pyntbit shuh shuh ialade na ka rukom thaw jingrwai da ka jingialong paralok bad shah hikai ruh na uwei u nongthaw jingrwai ba pawnam U Smiling Mylliemngap na ka shnong Iewpamtiah jong ka thain Nongkrem. Lyngba ka jingialam jong une u rangbah u la la ioh ban pynmih ia ka thup jingrwai ba nyngkong jong u kaba la ai kyrteng “Jeremaiah”. Kane ka sap kaba u la don ka la paw pyrthei bha ynda haba u la long kum u Nongialam Choir ia ka Jingiaseng Samla Balang Presbyterian Lumshnong, kaba ula sdang ha ka snem 2011 haduh ka snem 2019 ha kaba U Blei ula ibit ban khot noh shalade hi ia une u shakri barit jong U ha ka 13 tarik June 2019. Hapdeng kitei ki snem lyngba ka jingialam lynti jong une u shakri ba kyrpang jong U Blei, ki Jingiaseng Samla kum ka Jingiasengsamla Balang Presbyterian Lumshnong ka la ioh ban pynmih ia ka thup jingrwai ba nyngkong jong ka kaba la ai kyrteng “Ri Kanan”. Bud sa ka Jingiaseng Samla Balang Presbyterian Moobakhon ha ka thup jingrwai ba la ai kyrteng “D’wai ia ka Ri Lum Khasi Jaintia” bad ka thup jingrwai ba khatduh ha shwa ba in khlad noh nangne na sla pyrthei ka dei ka ba la pynmih da ka Jingiaseng Samla Balang Presbyterian Lumshnong kaba la ai kyrteng, “Isreal ki iam kthang”. Ki lyric bad sur jingrwai ha baroh lai tylli kine ki thup jingrwai ki dei kiba la thaw da U Lt. T.Bn. Arles Rymbai bad la rwai da ki khun samla jong kine ki ar tylli ki Balang ryngkat bad U kum U nongrwai uba tbit. Ki sur jingrwai jong u ki la pynum ia shibun ki mynsiem jong ki paid riewngeit khristan bad wat ki bympat long khristan ruh.Halor kane ka bynta ngim da ioh jingtip shibun iaka jinglong jingim jong u ha ka ing ka sem ha ka por ka jinglong khynnah jong u namar ngi ioh ban iakynduh bad u, ynda ula Samla. Hynrei tang khyndiat eh ngi tip ba u Lt. T.Bn. Arles Rymbai u dei u samla naka long ing khristan jong ka Balang Presbyterian Moobakhon bad ka shnong Moobakhon West Jaintia Hills District. U dei u khun ba ar jong u Ma Piar Dhar bad ka kong Momlis Rymbai. Ki don 6 ngut shipara, saw ki shynrang bad ar ki khynthei. U la leit skul bad pule tang mar shiteng jong ka klass II. Kat kum ka jingiathuh jong u u ong, ba haba u leit sha skul pule kot um juh sngewkhlain ka met bad u ioh pang ruh bunsien. Hynrei, haba u leit pat ban bud bad ki shakri jong U Blei ban leit ialap iaka Gospel U Trai u sngew shait sngewkhlain, sngew phuh mut phuh mat bad ka mynsiem jong u ruh ka sngewkmen. Kumta u la ieh noh iaka jingpule jong u bad u la jied ban shakri ia U Blei lyngba ka jingleit ialap bad jingrwai. U long uba smat ba sting ban iarap kam ha ing ha sem bad udei ruh u bym ju kyntait ia kano kano ka kam ba u dei ban leh da ka jingtrei shitom bad minot ban ioh iaka jingjop. Hynrei kham bun hi ha ka jingim jong u um ju kham don bad ka ing ka sem namar ba u bun kam ban leit kylleng sawdong ka Ri khasi Jaintia bad shabar ruh ban ialap iaka Gospel U Jisu khrist.Kane ka bynta ka long kaba maian bad jylliew haduh katta katta ban ai iaka jubab kaba iabiang thik kat kum ka mat ba la kdew haneng. Hynrei ngin iathuh tang katto katne ki bynta ki ba kham kongsan kiba ngi la iohsngew lyngba une u shakri jong U Blei da ka jingisynei jong U Trai bad Nongpynim jong ngi. Hooid shisha ka long kaba phylla bad bym sngew lah ngeit ba uno uno ne kano kano kin tip lypa ia kaei kaban sa wan ne jia shisha ha ka jingim jong ki khamtam eh ha kaba iadei bad ka jingiap ne jingleit noh jong ki na sla jong kane ka pyrthei. Bad ym pat ju bna hi ruh ba don mano mano ba la tip lypa ia ka sngi ba kin iap. Kumta ruh ka long ia une u shakri barit jong U Blei. Hynrei bunsien u shait iathuh bad hikai, ba ngi dei ban pynkhreh iala ka jingim ban ialeh kat ba lah ban pynsngewbha ia ia U Nongthaw katba ngi dang im ha kane ka pyrthei namar ngim tip ha kano ka sngi ba ngi dei ban leit noh na kane ka pyrthei. Bad ialade u la long u samla uba iai pynkhreh kat kumba ka paw ha ka jingim jong u kaba man la ka sngi. Bun bun sien haba u thaw iala ki jingrwai jong u ruh ki iathuh i aka jingthrang jong u ban leit noh sha kata ka Ri ka jingsuk ia kaba U Trai ula pynkhreh ia kita kiba ieit bad shaniah ha U. Kum ka jingthrang jong u, u la iathuh lypa ba um sngewkwah shuh ban iohi ne ban dang don ha kane ka pyrthei lyngba ka snem 2020 & 2021 namar ba u ong ba kine ki snem kin sa long ki snem kiba phylla bad ki jait jingjia kiba triem bad ba phylla kin jia ha ka pyrthei ha kine ki snem bad ki snem ki ban sa wan. Kumta kum ka jingpynkhreh ula thaw iaka jingrwai kaba ula ai kyrteng “Sha ka Ri Kanan”. U la ong ruh ia ki nongrwai choir jong ka Balang Lumshnong ba lada jia ba un leit noh nangne na sla pyrthei ba U Trai un khot noh ia u shalade, kin sngewbha ban rwai ia kane ka jingrwai ha ka sngi iap jong u bad ban phong ruh da ki sopti kiba lieh. Kine ki jingmaian ba la wan pasiaw ha ka jingim jong u ka sakhi ba ki long kum ki dak kiba la pynlong ia une u shakri jong U Trai ban pynkhreh noh ban leit shala U Nongthaw ha kano kano ka por baka dei ia u ban leit bad khyndiat sngi shwa ka jingiap u sngew tynnad ban iai rwai iaka Jingrwai “Ah jinghun sha Byneng”. Long ka jingsuk bad ka jingkmen bah ia kita kiba la pynkhreh ban iashem bad la U Nongpynim Amen.Sir khublei shibun halor ki khubor. nga tbn IClean mynsong lym ka iing (L)tbn A Rymbai. da ka wei ka jing mut ngi pynbeit ban thoh kot sah kynmaw ne history ia u kum u shakri u Trai u ba don sap.Sir la u la don ha lum shnong u pyllong hi u kpa mynsiem ia nga um ju klet ban wan da ka met ne phun.Sir ngan lum jing tip hi ban thoh ia ka ta ka kot u.Sir ngan sa wan sha ophis jong phi.khublei.no.9366077471
title: U Tymmen Basan Arles Rymbai: U la iathuh lypa ba um kwah shuh  ban dang don ha kane ka pyrthei lyngba ka snem 2020 & 2021, namar kin sa long ki snem  ba ki jait jingjia kiba triem kin jia ha ka pyrthei

content: Shillong: Kum shi bynta ban pynmih pisa(fund) rai ka Elaka Darrang ban shim bai khrong na ki nongkhwai bad nongwanjngohkai pyrthei.Ka executive committee jong ka dorbar elaka darrang hapoh ka jingialam jong u Dolloi ma Pyrwa Lymba la rai ban shim bai khrong pynmih pisa (fund) na ki nongwankhwai bad nongwanjngohkai pyrthei kum shi bynta ban ioh lad ban pyntyllun ia ki kam ka Elaka.Kum ki kam ophis, kam pynkhuid wah kam maramot  ia ki lynti iaid ha shilynter la wah bad kiwei kiwei. La aiti ha ki volunteer ban pyniaid ia ki kam ryngkat ki receipt ha ka kyrteng ka Elaka darrang Dolloiship. La kyrpad  ia baroh ki nongwankhwai bad nongwanjngohkai pyrthei ban iasnoh kti lang kum ka dak ban ai jingkyrshan lem ia ka Elaka. “Ngi sngewbha bad sngewnguh eh ia ka burom basbun jong phi” ong ka khubor.
title: Yn shim bai khrong ia ki  nongkhwai bad nongjngoh kai,ong ka Darrang

content: Shillong: Ka sorkar Assam mynta mynstep ha ka por 8 baje eiei lyngba ka tnad surok ryngkat da ka puh shi lum ki la ban wan rung jubor ban shna pynbha iaka surok ha Salpara Umsaitwait ki shnong kiba mar syndah bad ka Athiabari ha kaba la tam put haduh 600 metre eiei sha u pud ka Meghalaya ha ryngkat ka jingiasynran lang ki pulit na Assam ban pahara ia ki ban shna ia ka surok.Kum ban pynkynmaw ka surok na Boko sha khappud Meghalaya la shna na ka scheme NEC hynrei mynta pat la iohi ba ki lah tam sha u pud u sam jong ka jylla Meghalaya.Kumta ka FKJGP Aradonga Area Unit ka pynrem jur iaka jingleh riewkhlaw jongki police Assam ha kaba ki la shoh naphang iaki briew jongka Meghalaya kiba thmu ban leit sha Hahim mynta ka jan miet ha ka por 4.30pm.Na ka liang ka seng ka la pynrem ruh iaka jinglehbor jong ka sorkar Assam kaba wan ban tam pud haduh 600 metre eiei sha Meghalaya bad ka ju mlien ban leh kumne man ka por khamtam ha ka sngi u Blei, ong ka kyrwoh na U bah Trelling Shira, President FKJGP, Aradonga area unit.
title: Tur ka Assam da ki puh shi lum, ban shna surok sha Athiabari

content: Jowai: U Rangbah shnong jong ka shnong Lamin u ma Golden Gashnga u la pyntip ba ka dorbar shnong Lamin kaba dei trai bad kaba peit ba khmih ia ka Iew Dawki, ka la shim ia ka rai ban plie noh ia katei ka iew naduh ka 2 tarik une u bnai ban wan.U la iathuh ba kane ka rai ban plie ia katei ka iew dei ruh da ka jingmynjur lang ka bor pyniaid ia ka Amlarem Civil Sub-division lyngba ka Sub-Divisional Officer.U ma Gashnga u la ong ba na ka liang ka dorbar shnong ka la dep ban pynkhuid ia katei ka iew hynnin ka sngi Saitjain haba kaba ki paidbah nongshong shnong ki la ia mih paidbah ban ia shim bynta ha katei ka jingpynkhuid ia ka iew Dawki.Ka iew Dawki kadei kawei na ki iew baheh ha ka thain War Jaintia kaba dei ruh ka iew kaba don ha khappud bad ka ri Bangladesh.Na ka liang u Rangbah Shnong u la iathuh ruh ba la dep ruh ban thung ia ka Market Committee on Covid 19. Kane ka Committee kan peitngor ia ki nongshongdie dukan, die jingdie baroh bad ruh ia ki nongwan siew wan tda ba kin dei ban bud ryntih ia ki kyndon ba la buh da ka sorkar bad ka tnad jong ka koit ka khiah.U la kyntu ruh ia ki nongwan iew wan hat bad ia ki nongshong iew baroh ba ki dei ban bud ryntih ia ki kyndon kumba ki la tip hi ban ia jngai iwei na iwei pat, ban thet ka kti barabor bad ban pyndonkam ia ki jingiada khmut (Mask).
title: Naduh 2 tarik Nailur, yn plie ka iew Dawki: Dorbar Shnong Lamin

content: Nongpoh: Myn hynnin ka miet ha ka por 9: 30 baje ei ei mynmiet, ki Pulit Ri Bhoi, ki la ioh ban bat ia 2 ngut ki rangbah kiba dei shipara bad kiba la shah suba jur ba ki lah ban dei ki nongdih ne nongkhaii drok, namar ha katei ka por ba ki Pulit ki la bat ia ka kali kaba ki shong, kaba dei ka Maruti Car number ML 04-C-1538, ki la ioh ban kurup 12 Gram u drok Heroin.Ka jingiohbat ki Pulit ia kitei ki arngut, ka dei hadien ba ki la ioh ia ka jingtip kaba biang bad suba jur ba kitei ki arngut kiba wan na ka thain Nongpoh, ki rah rah drok da ka jingthmu ban pynpoi sha Jaintia Hills, kumta haba ki Pulit ki la pynapshrip ha Lad Umroi, ki la bat ia kitei ki arngut ki shipara na ka shnong Thadmuthlong, Jaintia Hills bad kiba la tip kyrteng kum u Moon Tang (43) bad u Pip Tang (41) snem ka rta.U Bah Moon Tang u ba dei u hynmen, u la phla ha ki Pulit ba u la wan shim ia utei u drok na shnong Iewmawlong, Nongpoh, ha kaba u siew haduh T. 35 hajar ban ioh ia utei u drok ba 12 gram, katba utei u Pip Tang u la kam ba u shu pynnih kali ia la u jong u hynmen bad uba la ong ba u khlem da tip ei ei ruh em halor katei ka jingrah drok u hymmen.Haba iadei bad katei ka jingiohbat ia kitei ki arngut ki briew kiba rah drok, ki Pulit Ri-Bhoi ki la rah noh sha Thanad Umiam na ka bynta ban pynlong ka jingtohkit, khnang ban nanglap shuh shuh ia kiba donkti ha katei ka kam khaii drok.
title: Ha shrip ki pulit, ngat ki arngut shipara, ba thmu pynpoi drok sha Jaintia Hills

content: Ka 14 tarik Nailar 2020 ka long ka sngi ba sah kynmaw ha ka histori jong ka Umroi Constituency. U Bah AL Hek, Myntri jong ka koit ka khiah, u la plie ïa ka AYUSH aspatal banyngkong tam jong ka Jylla jong ngi ha Bhoirymbong. Ïa kane ka aspatal la sdang shna ha ka 30 Nailar 2012 bad la pyndep pat ha ka 14 Kyllalyngkot 2014. Naduh u snem 2018, nga la pyrshang ban wanrah ïa ki lad jingïarap na ki bor Sorkar. Da ka jingïarap bad jingkyrshan jong kiba bun ki heh Sorkar na ka tnat jong ka Koit ka khiah, ngi la lah ban pynurlong ïa kane ka jingthmu ha ka 14 Nailar 2020.Ha ka ‘AYUSH’, don san tylli ki lad rukom ai dawai kiba kynthup ïa ka Ayurveda, ka rukom ai dawai kynbat da kaba pyndonkam ïa ki kynbat na ki lum Himalaya; ka jingkilan met Yoga; ka jingsumar dawai Unani, kaba la sdang na Ri Greece; ka jingsumar Siddha, kaba dei ka jingsumar kynbat na ki jylla shathie jong ka Ri India; bad ka jingsumar Homeopathy kaba la pynbit pynbiang u Doktor na Ri Germany, u Samuel Hahnemann.Ki paidbah kin myntoi shibun na kine ki lad jingsumar namar ki long kiba la pyrshang la bun bun snem. Ka jingdon jong ki doktor, ki nos, bad ki nongaidawai ha kane ka aspatal AYUSH kan long ka jingailad ai lynti ïa ki paidbah ban sumar ïa ki jingshitom bapher bapher.Ka jingsumar AYUSH kan sa dang saphriang ha kylleng ka Jylla lyngba kiwei pat ki aspatal ba la ai jingkyrshan da ka Ministry of Ayush jong ka Sorkar Pdeng. Hajan jong ka jaka sumar NEIGRIHMS, ka la don ruh ka North East Institute of Ayurveda and Homeopathy (NEIAH) kaba la don la katto katne snem, bad bun bah kiba la ïoh jingïarap na kane ka aspatal. Nga kyrmen ba ka aspatal AYUSH ha Bhoirymbong kan ïatreilang bad don ka jingïadei kaba jan bad ka NEIAH ban kham myntoi shuh shuh ki paidbah.             Kumta, ngi la sngewthuh ba ka ‘AYUSH’ ka dei ka jingsumar lyngba ki dawai kynbat, kilan met bad ka jingpynkhem da ka umphniang. Kine ki dei kiba hiar pateng naduh hyndai bad ngi ïohi ba mynta ka Sorkar Pdeng ka la pynmih syndon da ka tnat treikam (Ministry) kaba kyrpang ban pynsaphriang ïa ka rukom sumar AYUSH ha kylleng ka Ri. Kumba long mynta, ki nongsumar kynbat ki ïoh jingkyrshan bha na ki kompeni bapher bapher kiba pynmih ïa ki dawai shut bniat, umphniang ba pang met, bad ki dawai bapher bapher kiba la ïaid ha kylleng ka Ri, kum ka kompeni Gaia, Patanjali, Herb Pharm, Bio-Botanica, bad kiwei de.
