Ka jingkiew stet jong ka Pantanjali ha kine ki khyndiat snem ka pyni shai ba ki nongsumar trai ri, bad ki dawai ba ki ai, ki long kiba ïaid ïew bha.Kawei kaba ktik jingmut ïa nga ka long ba ha ka Jylla jong ngi, ngi don shibun bah ki nongsumar da ki dawai kynbat, ki nongsumar khñiang, sumar bniat, sumar kdiah shyieng bad pyrsad ding. Ka la don shisha ka jingstad ha kine ki nongsumar dawai Khasi ha ka Jylla. Hynrei, wat hapdeng ki jingpyrshang ba bun, ym pat don ba ithuh satia ïa kine ki sap ki phong ki jong ki.Ki don ki dawai umphniang bapher bapher kiba la shna da ki nongsumar Khasi jong ngi. Kawei na ki nuksa ka dei ka um soh kwit kaba ju pyndonkam ha ka por ba jur jingshit, ki phlang kynbat ban sumar bniat, bad kumta ter ter. Kaba ju kham ïoh jingïthuh na ki paidbah ruh ka dei ka jingsumar shyieng ne ba khem met haba laitdoh ne jrai ki thied. Kine ki dei ki sap bad ki jingstad kiba la don lypa bad kiba ngi lah ban kyntiew shakhmat.Ka jingaijingmut jong nga ïa u Bah AL Hek, Myntri ka Koit ka Khiah, bad ki nongpeit ia ka tnat AYUSH jong ka Jylla, ka long ba ngi dei ban thaw lad ïa ki nongsumar trai Ri jong ngi. Hato ka tnat AYUSH jong ka Sorkar Jylla kan plie lad ne em ïa ki nongsumar jong ngi?Ngi tip b aka skulbah NEHU bad kiwei ki la pyrshang bad wad bniah bha halor kane ka phang, hynrei ngi donkam ruh ban ïohi ba ki tnat sorkar kin trei ryngkat-ryngkat. Lada ngi lah ban ai jingïarap ïa ki skulbah bad ki kynhun stad saians ban peit bniah ia kine ki rukom sumar kan wan ka jingshaniah ba pura na kylleng jong ka pyrthei. Kane kan kyntiew ïa ki rukom sumar ba la don lypa ha ka Jylla ka jong ngi. Ym tang ba ka ngi lah ban ri kyndong bad pynjanai ïa ka jingstad jong ki longshuwa ki jong ngi, hynrei ngi lah ruh ban sdang ïa ka sobjek pule ha ki skul, kolej bad ha ki skulbah. Kane kan wanrah ïa ka jingïohkam ha ki rukom bapher bapher. Lada kyrshan borbah ïa ki nongsumar trai Ri jong ngi, kan khring ïa ki briew sha ka Jylla ym tang ban ban wan jngoh kai pyrthei hynrei ban wan phah sumar ïa ki jingshitom bapher bapher. Ngi donkam ban bteng ia ki jing dawa na ka Sorkar Jylla haduh ban da poi sha ki tyndong skhor jong ka tnat AYUSH ha Sorkar Pdeng. Ïa kane ka rukom khring ïa ki nongjngoh kai la khot ka ‘Medical Tourism’ bad la pyntreikam ïa ka la bun snem ha ka jylla Andhra Pradesh, Kerala, Karnataka bad kiwei de.Ka jingplie ïa ka aspatal AYUSH ha Bhoirymbong ka long ka jingsdang bathymmai. Lyngba kane ka jingsdang, nga kyrmen kin mih bun ki lad ki lynti nangne sha khmat. Ngi donkam ban pynsaphriang ïa ka jingmut ban ïoh ka jingkyrshan ba pura na ka sorkar khamtam na ka bynta ban kyntiew ïa ka nam jong ka Jylla lyngba ki rukom sumar ki jong ngi.
title: Ka rukom sumar AYUSH bad ki nongsumar trai ri

content: Shillong: Ka Seng Akhil Bharitiya Vidyarthi Parishad (ABVP) jong ka Meghalaya, ka la thoh mynta ka sngi sha U Conrad Sangma, myntri rangbah ka Jylla, ha kaba iadei bad ki eksamin  JEE bad NEET, kiba dei ban pynlong shen.La ong shuh shuh ba ka sorkar India, ka la pynbeit ban pynlong ia ar tylli ki eksamin lane ki Joint  Entrance Examination (JEE bad NEET) 2020, naduh ka 1tarik haduh ka 6tarik Nailur 2020.Halor kane ka phang, ka kong Darilin Tang, kaba dei ka  State secretary jong ka ABVP Meghalaya, ka kyrpad namarkata ia u myntri rangbah, ba un pynbiang ia ki kali iohei na bynta ki samla ki ban leit sha ki eksamin. Nangta la ai jingmut ruh ban pynbiang shuh shuh ia ki mask, ki  sanitizer bad ki tup pia iada ia ka dur khmat.
title: Ai da ki kali ioh ei, ba kin leit sha ki eksamin JEE bad NEET, ong ka ABVP

content: Shillong: Mynta ka sngi ki bor  District  jong ka East Khasi Hills, ryngkat ki nongshong shnong ha khyndai lad  bad ki trai dukan ki la pynkhuid ia katei ka jaka kaba bun ki dukan khyndai lad.Haba kren ha ki lad pathai khubor ka kong Martina Lyttan kaba dei ka incident commander bad Extra Assistant Commissioner, ka la iathuh ba ki briew mynta ki la sdang ban sngewthuh ia ka jingdon kam jong ka jingkhuid jingsuba bad ka jingdon kane ka khlam ha kaba kim lah ban shu leh klet khlem da bud ia ki jingbthah kiba ka sorkar ka la pynmih la ha ki iing ki sem ne ha ki jaka trei.Haba ia dei bad ka jingdon ki dukan hapoh kane ka iew Khyndailad bad GS Road ki don kumba 1300 haduh 1400 tylli bad ha kaba sdang ki shem jingeh, namar bun na ki dukan ki bym treh ban kohnguh da kaba pynkhein ia ki jingbthah ka sorkar bad ki la shim ia ki lad jingpynshitom da kaba khang ia ki dukan jong kito kiba ia leh pyrshah.Ha kane ka jingleh jong ki bor ba dei peit ia ka District Administration, ka la wanrah ia ka jingkylla ha ka jingmut jingpyrkhat jong ki briew ha kaba ki la deng ia ki mask, ki la bud ia ka jingpynia jngai iwei na iwei, ki la buh ia ki jingsait kti bad kaba kongsan eh ka long ba bun na ki dukan ki la synreit dawai ia ki dukan jong ki bad kyrmen ba kane kan bteng wat ha dien ha bud.Na ka liang u wei na ki nongshong dukan ha Khyndailad u la ong ba ka ri baroh kawei ka ia leh pyrshah ia kane ka khlam COVID-19, kum ki nongshong shnong jong ka jylla Meghalaya ka dei ka kam jong ki ruh ban pynkhuid ia ka dong kaba ki shnong ki sah ban pynkhuid ia ki sawdong sawkum jong ki, la pynpaw ia ka jingsngewnguh ia ki bor jong ka District kiba la ia kyrshan lang ha kane ka kam pynkhuid ia ka Khyndailad.
title: Pynkhuid ia ka Khyndailad bad GS Road mynta ka sngi

content: Shillong: Na ki 60 ngut kiba ioh pang covid thymmai mynta ka sngi, ki kynthup ia 31 ngut na East Khasi Hills. Na kitei ki 31 ngut, ki kynthup ia 26 ngut ki high risk contact, uwei uba wan phai na shabar, uba shah sumar ha NEIGHRIMS bad saw ngut ki shipai.Ha Ribhoi, 2 ngut kiba wan phai na shabar, 2 ngut ki high risk contact bad uwei uba pang baiong khlieh bad uwei u shipai. Ha East Garo hills, ki don 9ngut kiba la lap ba ki don jingpang, na kaba test naphang ha ka iew Rongjeng. Kiba la jem na ka jingpang mynta ka sngi, ki long baroh 14 ngut.COVID 19 DAILY UPDATE, MEGHALAYADATED: 30-08-2020NEW CASES –60EKH – 3126- High risk01- Returnee(NEIGRIHMS04- Armed forceSGH – 1 (High risk)Ri-Bhoi – 602- Returnees02- High Risk Contacts01- ILI Case01- Armed ForceEGH- 9 (Random Sampling at Rongjeng Bazar)EJH – 402- Returnees02 – High RiskWGH- 9(BSF)NEW RECOVERED: 14EJH : 0203- High Risk Contacts02 – ReturneesRBD: 0202- CMJ Breweries ClusterSWGH : 0101- ReturneeWGH: 8(BSF)EKH: 1 (Rilbong Cluster)
title: 9ngut kiba ioh corona, naba test naphang ha iew Rongjeng

content: Shillong: Mynta ka sngi, ki don sa 60 ngut kiba ioh pang khlam corona virus ha ka Jylla.Na kitei ki kynthup ia 31 ngut ha East Khasi Hills. Na kitei ki 31 ngut, ki long 4 ngut ki shipai bad 27 ngut ki riew paidbah.Ha Ribhoi, ki don sa 6ngut bad kitei ki kynthup ia uwei u shipai bad 5 ngut ki riew paidbah.Baroh kiba dang don jingpang corona ha ka Jylla, haduh mynta, ki long 1,284 ngut bad ha East Khasi Hills, ki don 920ngut, ha kaba ki riew paidbah, ki don 648 ngut.
title: 60 ngut kiba ioh khlam corona ha ka Jylla, 27 ngut ki riew paidbah ha East Khasi Hills

content: Shillong: Uwei u rangbah briew u la khlad noh hashen ha ka jingjia aksiden kaba la jia mynta dang step phyrngab ha Moomon, Mihmyntdu hajan ka ophis jong ka tnad Soil and Water Conservation ha Jowai.Haba iakren ba katto katne kiba sakhi ia kane ka jingjia, la iathuh ba kane ka jingjia aksiden kala jia ha ka por kumba 1:15 mynstep ha kaba kawei ka kali maruti Celerio kaba don ia u number ML 04 C 8413 kaba wan na ka thian Phramer kaba niah da uwei, uba la tip kyrteng kum u Pyrkhat Suchiang uba dei na ka shnong Thadmuthlong Pyrdi ha West Jaintia Hills ka la tynrah daiñ ia kawei ka trok na ka bynta ba shadien.Kane ka trok dei kaba don u number AS 10 C 2128 kaba la pynieng harud surok na kawei pat ka liang.Ha kane ka jingjia u nongniah jong kane ka maruti ula khladnoh ha shen katba u wei uba shong lang uba la tip kyrteng kum u David Phawa uba na Mihmyntdu ula mynsaw jur bad la pynkit mar mar ia u sha Dr. Norman Tunnel Hospital ban ioh ia ka jingsumar.
title: Khlad ha shen u rangbah bad mynsaw uwei ba leit tynrah nadien kawei ka trok

content: Baroh shi katto nga dang tieng ia ka jingshah ot balang. Mynta te ngam lah shah shuh. Lada ka balang Presbyterian ka ot balang ia nga, to ot, ngam salia shuh.Naduh ba la wan u Corona ia ki ïingmane la khang baroh. Ym don shuh napdeng ki pastor kiba wan peit wan jngoh ia ki ïing khristan bad ia ki balang shnong la ki dang im ne ki la iap. Hynrei ki shu ai da ka hukum la kat u Kaisar Augustus hyndai, ba baroh ki khun balang ki dei ban ai jingainguh, khnang ba kin ioh bam suk ma ki ryngkat bad ki khun ki tnga.Na ka liang jong nga te nga kren shai ba ngam lah ban ai jingainguh, namar ba ngam ioh bylla shuh, jingiaseng ruh la khang ki pastor bad ki pastor ruh ki khlem trei shuh. Ban ia kaban iap thngan ki khun la jong te bha ban iap ki pastor thiah thai.Ko ki pastor, balei phim ai da ka hukum ia ki balang shnong ba kin shna group ban pynlong jingiaseng ha la ki dong ki dong, khnang ban ioh lum jingainguh ban pynkdang ia ka kpoh jong phi. Hynrei haba phi don tang ka shynrong khlieh khlem jabieng te kumne kein, phi shu dawa pisa kulmar na u kup shiliang sem shiliang, uba shu im kyndoi jakpoh.Nga don sa kawei ka jingai jingmut ia phi ki pastor thiah thai. Kata ka long, sei noh da kato ka phon ba la lum ba la jan 200 snem kein. Sa iasam phin ioh mar katno hajar klur. Leit trei noh sha ki lyngkha, ki bri, ki kper… kumba leh ma ngi ki paitbah kein. Balei phi lehrain ban bah mohkhiew?Ban pynkut ia kane ka jingthoh, nga don ban ong sa kumne: Haba wan tang tiak uta u Corona phi ki pastor phi la sheptieng haduh katne, te lada wan sa uta u 666 leilei, phi baroh ki pastor phin ia kylla matlieh lut. Mano shuh ban peit ia ngi ki rit ki ria? Kam don jingmut shuh ia ngi ban ai jingainguh.Sngewtynnad da iohi ia Ki nongthoh  kiba nud ban pynpaw ia Ki jingshisha kumne,shu Ong Ba iadei Ki briew ban da dei kum Ki Blang Ki masi te tip shuh katno tylli kiba dang lap ne katno tylli kiba dang lait im na tyrsim Ki Khla Ki Sing,haba la shu pyllait lan ha lum ha khlaw.Ki Mrad te shisien la pyllait lan lah eh ban tehlakam ubriew te tip shuh u long kumno?Kyrmen Ki nongsharai balang kin ioh jinghikai nangne sha khmat.shisien pyrkhat ka dei ka ne ka jingkren hynrei haba bishar bniah bha kane ka jingkren ka ktah ia baroh ki pastor haba phi kren shaphang ka bsa khun ki pastor daka jingai jong ki para bangeit. haba bishar bha kane ka jingkren kadei tang na ka jingshem jongphi kam dei ka jong ki wei. haka jingshem jongnga ki don shibun ki pastor ki ba leit visit, te hangne mano ba dei mano bymdei?nakata kadaw hashwa ban kren pyrshah iano iano da bishar bha ha baroh ki saw liang ym dei ban bishar tang shi liang.Taka daw ngin bishar shuwa hala ing kumba long u ñi u kong wat pat kyrkieh ka leit rung hima kiwei namar ngim pat tip tikna..Kaba dei eh bah. Lada kim lah ban iada ban pynduwai ban pan jingiada na ka bynta u paidbah na kane ka nem sniew, kumno kein kin iada ia ngi na u soitan u ban wan ha ki longdur ba pher ba pher?Lada nga la shakri hok ha ka jaka ba nga dei ban  shakri, ka long bieit ia nga ban argue bad kane ka jingthoh. Lada nga pynksan ialade ruh kam don jingmut ha khmat u Blei. U Jisu u ong “U Kpa jongphi uba iohi ha kaba rieh un ainong ha kaba paw.”Ki don  pat ruh ki pastor kiba kwah banU nongkdew ia ka pop u dei u nongsait pop. Lada kdew da u briew uba shong ialade ha patok ruh lada u kdew ia kaba dei ngan pdiang ei ba ngan ioh ban pynbeit ban pynjanai ialade.Kam bha ban leit rung palat na kawei ka ing sha kawei pat ha kum kane ka por. Ngi lah ban nym tieng ialade hynrei ngi hap pyrkhat pat ia kiwei.Ka dei ka jing ong utei u rangbah
title: Tiak pyndei u Corona, kut ki jingiaseng. Da wan sa u 666 lei?

content: Ka jingpang corona ha India, ka la nang kiew da 78,760 ngut ha ki 24 kynta ba ladep, katba kiba iap ki long 948 ngut.Baroh kiba ioh pang khlam mynta ki la poi sha ka 35 lak ngut ha India bad kiba iap, ki long 63,498 ngut. Ka jingkhein ba la ai da ka health ministry jong ka sorkar India, ka long 35,42,733 ngut baroh kiba ioh pang ha India, katba kiba la jem na ka jingpang, ki long 27,13,933 ngut lane  76.47 per cent,  katba kiba dang shah sumar ia katei ka jingpang, ki long 7,65,302 ngut.
title: Sa 78 hajar ngut, kiba ioh pang khlam corona ha India

content: Shillong: Ka khubor “19 tylli ki shnong, kiba jur bha ka jingpang sniang” ka dei ka khubor kaba bun tam ki nongpule ha kane ka taiew ba ladep.Kiba share na urupang.com ki long 592 share, katba ha ka facebook kiba pule lane kiba reach ki long 76,538, katba ka engagements ka long 5,641.Kaba wan ba ar, ka dei ka khubor “Dei ka jingleh U Blei, ong ka myntri pla pisa, ba hiar ka jing kamai ha India”. Ki don 16,042 kiba reached bad sa 5,641 ki engagements.Ngi ai khublei ia baroh ki nongpule jong U Rupang.
title: Palat 76 hajar ngut, kiba pule ia ka khubor jingpang sniang

content: Shillong: Kum shi bynta ban iada ia lade na ka jingpang Covid 19, ka Dorbar Shnong Lumsohphoh, Nongthymmai, Shillong ka la pynlong ia Executive Meeting ha ka 29tarik Nailar 2020 da kaba pyndonkam ia ka “Cisco Webex Meeting App”.Lehse kane ka dei ka sien kaba nyngkong eh ba ka Dorbar Shnong ha kine ki thain ka pyndonkam ia kane ka online meeting app. Ka jing pyllait khubor ka long eh ban ia sam lem ia kane ka jingtip ba kiwei kiwei ki Dorbar Shnong ruh ki lah ban pynlong meeting da kaba pyndonkam ia kum kine ki online app ban lait na ka jingialum bun ngut ha kajuh ka jaka khnang ban iada na ka jingsaphriang jong une u khniang jingpang Covid 19.
title: Khot EC ka dorbar Shnong Lumsohphoh, da ka Webex App

content: Ki la ia mih paidbah hynnin ka sngi ha ka nongbah London na ka bynta ban kren pyrshah halor ki kyndon corona jong ka sorkar England. Kitei ki paidbah, ki ngeit ba ka khlam corona, ka dei tang ka kam pyntieng koh tympan suda lane ka kam shukor paidbah.Utei u paidlang, uba ia lum lymbung ha ka nongbah London, u dawa ban sangeh noh ka jingdeng face mask lane ka jingtap shyntur bad tap khmut, ban sangeh noh ka jing ia shong jngai para briew bad ban sangeh noh ruh ia ka jing pynlut por kai ban wad ia ka dawai ban pynjem ia ka khlam corona.Katei ka jing ia lum lang, ka dei kaba la tip kyrteng  ‘Unite For Freedom’  bad ha ka jingialang, la kren pyrshah da kiba bun, ha kaba ki ong ba ka la dei ka por ban sangeh noh shi syndon ia ki khana thok jong ka sorkar, halor kane ka khlam corona virus.La iohi ia ka jingialang kaba heh shibun ha  Trafalgar Square, ha kaba ki don bun ki jingthoh, kiba ong ba ka virus ka dei tang ka khana thok lane “hoax” bad nangta sa ka kam bam sap suda lane “scam”.Na kiba bun ki paidbah, kiba don ha katei ka jingialang, ki la kyntait ruh ban deng mask.U David Icke, u dei uwei na ki nongialam ha katei ka jingialang paidbah bad utei ula kynnoh ba kane ka khlam corona virus, ka dei kaba la mih na ka jing pyntreikam ia ka 5G technology bad ha U Jymmag ba ladep, U Icke, ula shah pynduh noh ia ka you tube account jongu, da kaba kynnoh, ba ula ialam bakla ia ki paidbah, halor kane ka khlam corona virus, lyngba ki jingthoh bad ki jingkren bapher jongu.Kane ka khlam, ka la pyniap ia 41 hajar ngut ki briew ha UK bad sa   331,644 ngut kiba ioh pang. Katei ka jing iakhih pyrshah ia ka khlam corona, ka la nang pur ha kiwei de ki bynta jong ka Europe.Ki pulit, ki la pynpra ia ka jing ia lum paidbah ha ka nongbah Berlin jong ka Germany bad nangta ha Paris jong ka France ruh ka la don ka jingialang paidbah ban pyrshah ia ka kyndon pyndeng mask jong ka sorkar.
title: Ka corona virus, dei ka khana thok: Mih paidbah ki phew hajar ngut ban pyrshah deng mask ha London

content: Guwahati: U Sum Ronghang, myntri jong ka sorkar Assam, uba peit ia ka  Hill Areas Development, u long u myntri ba nyngkong jong ka sorkar Assam, ban ioh ia ka khlam corona virus.Ym tang katta, ki don sa lai ngut ki MLA jong ka seng BJP, kiba ioh ia katei ka pang khlam corona hynnin ka sngi bad haduh mynta, ki la poi sha ka 20 ngut ki MLA ha Assam, kiba ioh ia katei ka jingpang corona virus.U Rohghang, ula leit shah sumar mardor ialade hynnin ka sngi, ha kawei ka hospital praibed bad sniew bok ba u nongniah kali jongu lem bad U PSO jongu ruh, ki ia ioh pang corona virus lang.Nalor U Rohang, ki lai ngut ki MLA, kiba kynthup ia U  Ganesh Kumar Limbo (Barchalla), U Sibu Misra (Lumding) bad U Bir Bhadra Hagjer (Haflong), ki la ioh lem ia katei ka jingpang khlam corona.Hynnin ka sngi, ki don 2,427 ngut kiba ioh pang thymmai ha Asam bad baroh kiba ioh pang, ki long mynta  1,03,794 ngut, katba ki don  82,510ngut kiba la jem na ka jingpang bad kiba iap ki long 289 ngut, katba kiba dang shah sumar ki long mynta  20,992, ong U Himanta Biswa Sarma, myntri ka koit ka khiah ka Assam.
title: Trei ka khlam corona ia u myntri ka sorkar Assam bad sa 3 ngut ki MLA

content: U Elon Musk, u dap billion jong ka America, ula pyni paidbah ha ka sngi thohdieng ia u Neuralink, uba dei u chip, uba la buh ha jabieng jong ki sniang.Ha katei ka jing pyni paidbah, U Musk, u pyni ia ka video, ba la ring ia kawei ka sniang, kaba la tip kyrteng Gertrude bad katei ka sniang, ka don ia utei u chip, uba kat ka pisa nar, ba la tynsat ha jabieng jongka, la ar bnai kynthih bad katei ka sniang, ka la stad bad ka sngewthuh ia ka jingbam, ka jingmut jing pyrkhat jongka bad ka jingkoit jingkhiah jongka ruh, kam iapher satia, hynrei ka long hi kumba long lem kiwei pat ki sniang.Ka jingpynmih ia utei u chip, ka dei kaba U Musk, u mut ban iarap ba ka jabieng kan trei kam, ia kito khamtam kiba don ia ka jingpang kaba ktah ia ka bor kynmaw bad ia ka bor jingmut jing pyrkhat lane kiba don ia ka jingpang budlum, ha kaba kim lah shuh ban trei ban ktah, hynrei kaba ki lah tang ban batai lyngba ka bor jabieng.Ha ka jing pyni video, U Musk, u pyni ia lai tylli ki sniang bad ka Gertrude, ka dei kaba la don ia utei u chip, la ar bnai eiei bad katei ka don ia ka bor sma kaba biang, nangta kam da kyrkieh than ban leit tur sha ka shyngoid bam jongka, hynrei ka da sma shwa, la ka sma bang ne em.La iathuh shuh shuh ba kawei pat ka sniang, ka dei kaba la buh ia utei u chip, hynrei, ula weng noh kham hadien bad katei ruh kam iohi dak eiei, ba ka don jingpang ne jingthut ha ka iaid ka ieng bad ka bam ka dih jongka bad nangta sa kawei pat ka sniang, ka dei ka bym shym la buh eiei, ha ka jabieng jongka, hynrei katei ka long lem hi kumba long kitei ki ar tylli kiwei pat ki sniang ha ka jingkoit jingkhiah bad ka jinglong ka met ka phad jongka.Kitei ki chips, ki dei kiba don ia ka jingeh, kaba tang 0.9 inchi bad kiba la buh ha ka jabieng jong u briew.
title: Ki sniang ki la stad, ba la thep da ki chips ha jabieng jongki

content: “…iathuh ha ki ba nga la wan jngoh ia ki, bad nga la iohi aiu ki nong Ijipt ki la leh ia ki….Nga la kular ban ialam noh ia ki na Ijipt ha kaba ki shah lehbein,sha kata…. ka ri jong ki Kanaan…”(Eksodos 3)Kaei ka Eksodos? Ki riewstad Bible ki ong, ka wei ka dei ka jinglaitim ne jinglaitluid jong ki mraw Hebru na Ijipt bad ka jingiaid lyngba ka Duriaw Basaw. Ka ba ar pat, ka dei ka jingmih ne jingphet noh ki mraw Hebru na Ijipt hadien ka jingiap jong ki khun nyngkong shynrang.Ki don ruh ki riewstad kiba ong ba kane ka kynhun ki mraw kam dei tang ki Hebru hynrei ka kynthup ruh ia kiwei de ki Jaidbynriew kiba long mraw ha Ijipt.Katkum ka Bible, ki pateng jong u Jakob ne ki khun Israel ki la long mraw ha Ri Ijipt, bad ki la shah leh bein tyngeh bad shah pyntrei mraw (Eksodos 1:11) Ka Bible kam shym iathuh mynno kata ka jia, katba ki sla histori kiba shabar ka Bible ki iathuh ba ka jingtei ia ki Nongbah bad kiwei ki jingtei bakhraw ka jia ha ka por jong U Pharo Seti I bad Ramases II. U Pharo Seti I (1305-1290 SK) u la pynkynriah ia ka Nongbah na Thebes sha Avaris bad u khun jong u, u Ramases II (1290-1224 SK) u la pynkylla ia ka kyrteng jong ka Nongbah Avaris sha ka “Iing jong u Ramases” bad dei ha ka por jong kine ki Pharo ba ka Ri Ijipt ka sakhi ia ki jingtei bakhraw bad ka jingpyntrei mraw ia ki Hebru bad ia ki nongshong shnong.Ka kynhun ki mraw Hebru ka la ieng pyrshah ia ki Pharo bad iakhun ban ioh jinglaitluid. Ia kane ka kynhun la tip ruh kum ka “Kynhun u Moses” bad ha ka jingiakhun ban ioh jinglaitluid ym dei tang u Moses marwei, hynrei ki samla, ki kynthei, ki rangbah bad ki tymmen ki san ki iadon bynta, ki iapyrkhat,ki iapynkhreh bad iatrei lang. Lah ban kdew kyrpang hangne ia ka bynta jong ki kynthei naduh ki nongpynkha khun kiba la ieng pyrshah ia ka hukum u Pharo ban pyniap noh ia ki khun shynrang haduh ka khun u Pharo kaba la pynlait im bad kaba la ri bad pynheh pynsan ia u Moses. (Eksodos 1:16; 2:10)Ka jingialeh kam dei tang ha Ijipt bad na Ijipt sha Kanaan ka dei ka jingiaid lynti kaba jlan. Kumno yn iaid? Kaei ka ban jia ynda poi ha Kanaan?Kumno yn sdang ia ka jingim bathymmai ha Kanaan? Ka Kanaan kam dei ka Ri kaba loi loi ne ka bym don briew, hynrei ka dei ka Ri kaba la don lypa kiwei pat ki Jaidbynriew kiba la shong shnong. Kine ki lah ban suba sniew bad khang pyrshah ia ka jingwan buhai shnong ka kynhun bathymmai jong ki mraw Hebru na Ijipt.Ha kito ki por ka Ri Kanaan ruh kam don ka jingshong suk, ka jingiakhih paidbah pyrshah ia ki Syiem bad ki Nongsynshar leh donbor kiba synshar ia ki Hima bad ki Nongbah bapher ka jur bha. Ka don ruh ka jingialeh thma hapdeng ki Nongsynshar jong ki Hima-ki Elaka bad kane ka ktah jur ia ki nongshong shnong kiba shah ban khia da ki khajna bad kiwei de ki jingshah thombor. Ha Kanaan ki kynhun kiba ieng pyrshah ia ki Syiem bad ki Khlieh Nongsynshar ki long ki nongrep, ki nongri jingri, ki kamar, ki nongbylla sngi bad ki don ruh ki lyngdoh niam kiba iakhun bad kiba phet rieh sha ki jaka Lum jong ka Ri Kanaan bad hangta ki iahsem lang bad ka kynhun ki mraw Hebru na Ijipt bad hangta ha ki ranab Lum ka Ri Kanaan ki iamir jingmut lang bad saindur ia ka imlang sahlang bad ka Ri bathymmai, kaba laitluid na ki kti jong ki Syiem bad ki Nongsynshar kiba leh bein bad thombor.Ha u Lum Sinai ka “kynhun u Moses” ka la iateh Jutang bad u Yaweh bad ruh ki iateh hapdeng jong ki. Kane ka Jutang ka long ka jingsdang jong ka jingsain dur thymmai bad da kane ka Jutang ki iateh-iasmai ban pyndem ialade, ym ha kiwei pat ki bor briew ne bor pyrthei, hynrei ha ka bor u Yaweh. Da kane ka Jutang, ka “kynhun u Moses” ka pyndam noh, wat na ki jingkynmaw, ia ka jingsynshar donbor bad ki jingban bein jong ki Pharo bad ia ka imlang sahlang ki nong Ijipt kaba phiah kyrdan bad ba pyniapher hapdeng u mraw bad nongshong shnong .Ka “kynhun u Moses” ka iamynjur lang ban wan hapoh ka Jutang bad ki ain, ki hukum bad ban pyniaid ia ka imlang ka sahlang bad ka synshar ka bishar bathymmai ha ka nongrim jong ka jingialong mar ryngkat hakhmat u Blei. Ia kane ka Jutang ki nam ka Shiphew Hukum bad ka Shiphew Hukum ka batai kumno ban im bad ban pyniaid ia ka jingim. Da kane ka Jutang ka “kynhun u Moses” ka phohsniew, ka mutdur bad shlur ban saindur ia ka imlang sahlang bathymmai.Ka Eksodos kam long tang ka nongmuna ia ka jingiakhun laitluid na ki bor synshar nongwei, pynban ha kane ka por ba lynsher ka khlam covid19 ka khana shaphang ka Eksodos ka ai mynsiem, ka ai jingkyrmen bad ka pynshlur ruh ia ngi ban phohsniew bad puson kumno ban saindur ne ban thaw ia ka imlang sahlang bathymmai. Ka Eksodos ka iathuh shaphang ka jinglaitluid bad jingiaid lynti ka kynhun ki mraw na Ijipt sha Kanaan. Ha kata ka jinglaitluid bad jingiaid lynti ka kynhun ki mraw ka phohsniew, ka saindur bad thaw ia ka imlang sahlang bathymmai. Lynter ka jingiaid lynti tad haduh ka Ri Kanaan, lyngba ki jingeh bad jingtynjuh ha ka Ri khlaw bad ha kiwei de ki bynta, kane ka kynhun ki mraw ka iai saindur bad pynthymmai ia lade.Ka jingpang covid19 bad ka jingkhang dam ka la pynjulor ia ka jingim bad ia ka ioh ka kot. Ka jingduh bad jingjulor kiba kham shyrkhei kin jialong ha ki bnai bad snem ki ban sa wan. Kata ka long ka jingktah jong ka khlam, ki jingduh bad jingjulor kiba kham khraw kin sa nang wan bad la lah ruh ban iohi lypa, kum ka nuksa ka jingkyrduh kam, kaba la don lypa, kan nang kiew, ka jingduh kam ne shah beh kam kan jur bad katkum ki khubor kumba lai spah ngut ki la duh kam ha ki jaka jngoh kai ha Sohra bad napdeng ki phew hajar ngut kiba la wan phai sha ka Jylla, katno spah ngut ki dei kiba la iehnoh ia ka kamai kajih ha kiwei pat ki Jylla? bad katno ngut na ki ki la lah ban trei da kiwei pat ki kam? ka die ka thied ha ki iew ki hat kan nang hiar bad namar ka jinghiran ka bor thied bor pet jong ki briew kan nang tlot. Ei ba tip ioh kan don sa ka jingshah khate tulop ha ki kam Sorkar bad kiwei de? Ka jingiap thngan ruh kane ka la tied jingkhang.Ha kane ka khlam ka paw shai kdar ba ki nongshong shnong ba rit ba ria bad ki rangli ki juki kim don jaka bad ym don ba niewkor ia ka jingim jong ki. La iohi kumba kim dei shuh ki trai shnong kiba don kajuh ka hok ban kamai bad ban im ka jingim ba dap kyrhai. Lah ban ong ki la kylla long tang kum ki briew kiba shu ap ia ka jingsngew synei ne jingleh isynei kiwei pat lane kiba shu ap ia ki jingbam kiba hap na ka miej bam jong ki bakhraw kyrdan, ki heh saipan bad la iohi ruh kumba kim don shuh ka hok ban im kum kiba iaryngkat ha khmat ka Riti Synshar bad ka Ain.Ki don ki khep ba ka paw ruh ka jingpeit shilliang khmat bad ka jingpeit ibein ia ki nongbylla sngi, ki nongkhaii ba rit bad ia ki nongdie madan. Namarkata ka daw, ka khlam ka dei ban kyrsiew thiah ia ngi ki nongshong shnong, khamtam eh ma ngi ki riewmadan ngi dei ban kyndit bynriew ban iawan bad iamir jingmut lang, ban puson, ban phohsniew, ban saindur bad ban thaw ia ka imlang sahlang kaba thymmai. Ka Eksodos bad ki mraw Hebru hyndai ki dei ban hikai ia ngi ha kane ka bynta.Ki riewstad Bible ki ong ba ka jingiathuh khana shaphang ka Eksodos ka iasnoh bad ka ‘tien tynrai Hebru, ka “anawim” bad kane ka kyntien ka mut, ban shah ban bor ne ban shah pynlwet. Ha kiwei pat ki kyntien lah ban ong ba kane ka thew ia ka jingshah ban bein bad jingshah pynlwet ka met ka phad, ka jingshah pynshitom ka jingmut jingpyrkhat kaba ktah jur ruh ia ka mynsiem. Ha ka jingiathuh khana shaphang ka Eksodos ngi iohi shai kdar ba u Yaweh ne u Blei u don ha ka liang jong kiba shah ban bein, kiba shah pynmong bad kiba shah pynlwet bad u Blei u ieng na ka bynta jong ki, u iada bad pynlaitluid ia ki. Kumta u Blei u pynbna, “Nga la iohi haduh katno la pynshitom bein ia ki briew jong nga ha Ijipt; nga la iohsngew ruh ba ki ud ban iohlait noh na ki nongpyntrei mraw…bad kumta nga la wan ban pyllait ia ki na ki nong Ijipt…” (Eksodos 3:7-8)Hapdeng ka Migdol bad ka Duriaw Basaw ka “kynhun u Moses” ka la shaiong bad kam tip shuh shano ban iaid? Hynrei ka hukum na u Yaweh ka long ba kin nang iaid shaphrang. Ka khlam ka la pynjulor bad pynshaiong hi ngit, hynrei kane kam pat dei kaba kut jong ka jingim jong ngi. To ngin iawan bad iamir jingmut lang, ngin ia phohsniew bad puson lang, ngin iateh Jutang hapdeng jong ngi bad ngin saindur ia ka imlang sahlang kaba thymmai.“…lada u Blei u long na ka bynta jong ngi, mano ba lah ban ialeh pyrshah ia ngi?” Amen
title: Ki kyntien jingkyrmen: Ka Eksodos bad ki mraw kiba saindur ia ka imlang sahlang bad ka Ri bathymmai

content: New Delhi: Ka tnat kam poh iing jong ka sorkar India, ka la rai ban nang pyn jynsur shuh ia ka leit ka wan, ha ka jing pyllait kyndon 4.0.La pyntip paidbah, ba naduh ka 21tarik Nailur 2020, yn ailad ia ki skul, ki jing ialehkai, ki jaka peit kai, ki jaka lehniam bad ki jingialang sain pyrthei, kin sdang ban plie noh, tangba ka jing don briew, kan long tang hapoh 100ngut. Ha kitei ki jing ia lum, la shah lem bad ki kyndon kiba dei ban bud, kum ka jingteh mask, ka jing ia jngai iwei ia iwei pat, ka jingsait kti thikna bad ka jingleh thermal scanning.Na bynta ki skul baroh, la kren shai ba yn dang khang haduh ka 30tarik Nailur 2020, hynrei la bthah ba ki khynnah Class 9 haduh 12, kin lah ban leit sha ki skul jongki, ha ki jaka, ki bym hap ha ka jingkhang sbak bad katei ka dei tangba kin ia kynduh ia ki nonghikai, tangba ki dei ban ioh jing mynjur na ki kmie ki kpa jongki.Kawei pat ka khubor, ka iathuh ba ki don sa  16,867 ngut kiba ioh pang thymmai mynta ka sngi bad sa  328 ngut kiba iap ha Maharashtra. Baroh kiba la ioh ia katei ka jingpang ha katei ka Jylla, ka long mynta sha ka  7,64,281 bad kiba iap, ki la poi sha ka  24,103. Kiba dang don ha ka jingshah sumar, ki long  1,85,131 bad sa  5,54,711 ngut kiba lah jem.
title: Naduh 21tarik Nailur, yn plie noh ia ki iingmane, ki jing ialehkai, ki jing ialang ki seng sain pyrthei

content: Shillong: U Pastor Kyrsoibor Pyrtuh, ula thoh mynta ka sngi sha U Deputy Commissioner, West Jaintia Hills District, Jowai, ha kaba ula dawa ba dei ban sangeh noh ia ka jingshon Aadhaar ha katei ka District.U Pastor, u la kdew halor ka jingdon ki briew, kiba leit ban ap lain bad sah miet haduh 2,3 miet, na ka bynta ban ioh pynrung kyrteng Aadhar ialade bad U Pastor, u ong ba kane ka dei ka jingleh ka bym iahap satia, ha kaba kum kane ka juk jong ka khlam.La pyn kynmaw ba kam pat slem, ba u paidlang ka Jylla, u pyrshah jur halor ka jingshon ia u aadhar bad nangta sa ka  Meghalaya Peoples Committee on Aadhaar (MPCA), ka la leit sha ka kashari ba heh duh jong ka ri, halor katei ka phang bad la pyni ruh ia ka jing bishar jong ka kashari, kaba kren shai ha ka para 373 ba ka la kren shai ba ka jingshon aadhar, ka dei beit lyngba ka jing mynjur jong u briew shimet bad ia kito ki bym mynjur, ki lah ban nym pynrung satia ialade ha ka skhim aadhar.La dawa namarkata, ba dei ban sangeh shwa ia ka jingshon aadhar bad la ai jingmut ba ka sorkar, ka dei ban ailad ba kin pyndonkam da   Epic Card, Ration Card, ka jing mynjur na U Rangbah Shnong lane ki sertiphiket jing baptis bad kiwei.
title: Sangeh shwa ia ka jingshon aadhar, thoh U Pastor sha U DC West Jaintia

content: Shillong: U Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla, u Conrad K. Sangma mynta ka sngi u la leit sha ka shnong Sohiong ha East Khasi Hills District ban leit khmih ia ka jingtreikam ka PHE department hapoh jong ka Jal Jeevan Mission (JJM).La synran ia u da u MLA kane ka thaiñ uba dei ruh u myntri badei khmih ia ka PHE, u Bah Samlin Malngiang bad ki heh jong ka tnad PHE department.Ha kane ka jingleit jurip u Myntri Rangbah, u la ioh ban iakren bad ki katto katne ki nongshong shnong jong ka shnong Sohiong. La pynbeit ruh ban wanrah ia ki kor um kiba biang sha ki longing jong kane ka shnong khnang ban pynsuk ia ki ban ia kaba ki leit tong na sha ki jaka pyllang um kaba jngai.U la iathuh ba kane ka jingpynpoi um haduh ki thliew ing ha ki jaka nongkyndong la buh thong ban pyndep haduh u snem 2022.‘Nga kwah ban ai khublei ia u Myntri Rangbahduh ka Ri, kata u Narendra Modi bad ia u myntri ka Jal Shakti kiba la noh jingiarap sha ngi ban ioh ban pyndep noh kloi ia kane ka kam ba ngi sdang. Ngi la buh thong haduh 2 lak tylli ki iing ba ngin pynpoi um haduh ha ki thliew iing mynta u snem. Ka PHE department hapoh ka jingialam jong u myntri ka PHE, ki la trei shitom ban pyndep noh kham kloi ia kane ka kam, wat hapdeng ka jingwan tyllep une u khñiang jingpang Covid-19” ong u Conrad K Sangma.Ka Jal Jeevan Mission kadei ka project kaba la bhah da ka Ministry of Jal Shakti, Government of India, kaba la thaw kyrpang na ka bynta ban pynpoi ia ka umbam umdih kiba biang sha baroh ki longiing ha nongkyndong kaban sa pyndep hapoh u snem 2024.Ha kajuh hi ka sngi, u Myntri Rangbah u la leit jngoh ia ka Greater Shillong Water Supply Scheme ha Mawphlang bad u la iakren bad ia phylliew jingmut bad ki ophisar kiba dei khmih ha kane ka jaka.
title: Leit jngoh u Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla ia ka shnong Sohiong, thmu ban pynpoi um haduh ha iing hapoh u snem 2022

content: Shillong: Ka Hynñiewtrep Youths’Council (HYC) Education Cell lyngba u Samla Enlang Sawian Secretary Education Cell CEC, ka la pynpaw ia ka jingpyrshah jur halor ka jingmih kyrteng bad ka jingioh bhah jong ki arngut ki khynnah pule kiba dei na ka jaitbynriew Muslim kiba la tip kyrteng kum u Iftikar Ali Mondal bad ka Ummay Habiba Begum. Ki dei ruh ki scheduled caste ban leit pule lyngba ka state Quota ha ka college of Agriculture ha Manipur lyngba ka tnad jong ka Department of Agriculture & Farmer’s Welfare Jong ka Sorkar Meghalaya.“Katkum ka jingpynbna jong kane ka tnad ba la pynmih ha ka 28-08-20 kum ka seng ngi pyrshah jur bad ka jingbym sngewiahap satia halor kane ka jingioh bhah kyrpang jong kine ki arngut ki khynnah pule kiba dei na ka jaitbynriew Muslim, ki bym dei ki riewlum jong ka Jylla Meghalaya ban leit pule lyngba ka bhah Jong ka Sorkar jylla. Ka seng ka dawa naka Director of Agriculture ban pynshai ba halor kano ka nongrim ba kine ki ar ngut ki khynnah pule ki ioh ia ka bhah kum ki scheduled caste ban leit pule lyngba ka state Quota kaba dei hok ban ioh tang ki scheduled tribe katkum ka jingtip kong ka Seng” ong u Samla Enlang Sawian.U la iathuh ruh ba ka seng ka dawa na ka sorkar Meghalaya ban pynshai mardor ba naduh mynno ki scheduled caste(SC) bad ki Other Backward Classes(OBC) ki la ioh ia kata ka bhah kyrpang ba kin leit pule ha ki laiñ jingpule lyngba ka State Quota ia kaba la mang kyrpang tang iaki samla riewlum jong ka Jylla.Ka seng HYC ka dawa ia ka tnad Directorate of Research and Training Technology ba ka dei ban pyndam mardor ia ka kyrteng jong ki arngut ki khynnah pule kiba la mih kyrteng katkum ka notification ba la pynmih da kane ka tnad.
title: Pyrshah ka HYC ba ioh bhah arngut ki khynnah pule, kiba dei na ka jaitbynriew Muslim

content: Shillong: U DHS(MI), Dr Aman War u la iathuh ba la don haduh 43 ngut kiba ioh ia u khñiang jingpang coronavirus ha ka jylla mynta ka sngi saitjaiñ.Ha East Khasi Hills ki don 26 ngut bad na kine ki 26 ngut, 23 ngut kidei ki high risk contact, 2 ngut ki dei kiba wanphai na shabar bad uwei u dei na armed forces. Ha South Garo Hills ki don 2 ngut ki high risk contact kiba dei na Jadi Bazar, ha West Garo Hills ki don 15 ngut bad na kine, 6 ngut ki dei kiba wanphai na shabar, 1  dei i high risk na Tikrikilla, 1 iba na Phulbari bad 7 ngut ki armed forces.Ki high risk kiba na South Garo Hills ki dei na Jadi Bazar; na East khasi hills kidei na Barapathar, Police Reserve, Garikhana, Lama Villa , Mawprem, Jhalupara, Nongkseh, Bishnapur, Mawbah, Bus Stand Bazar, Anjalee, Jail road, Iewduh bad Baniun.Ha kaba iadei bad ki containment area u la iathuh ba naduh ba sdang leh ia ka containment area, ki la don haduh 76 tylli bad ki jaka kiba dang pynlong kum ka containment area haduh mynta ki long 36 tylli.
title: Bun ki high risk contact na East Khasi  Hills, ki don haduh 36 tylli ki containment area kibym pat pyllait

content: Shillong: Ki la don haduh 43 ngut mynta ka sngi, kiba la ioh ia u COVID-19 ha ka jylla ha kaba 26 ngut ki dei na East Khasi Hills District kiba kynthup 25 ngut ki riewpaidbah bad 1 na Armed Forces, 2 ngut na South Garo Hills, 15 ngut na West Garo Hills kiba kynthup 7 ngut ki armed forces bad 8 ngut ki riew paidbah.Kiba la jem baroh mynta ka sngi ki long 77 ngut bad kine ki long 21 ngut na East Khasi Hills kiba kynthup 17 ngut ki armed forces bad 4 ngut ki riewpaidbah, 1 na North Garo Hills bad 18 ngut na Ri Bhoi kiba kynthup 2 ngut na Armed forces bad 16 ngut ki riewpaidbah, 37 ngut na West Garo Hills kiba kynthup 28 ngut ki armed forces bad 9 ngut ki riewpaidbah.Haba kheiñ kyllum lang baroh kiba ioh ia u khñiang jingpang COVID-19 ki long 1,238 ngut. Na kine baroh 890 ngut kidei na East Khasi Hills kiba kynthup 268 ngut ki armed forces bad 622 ngut ki riewpaidbah, ha West Khasi Hills 44 ngut, ha Ri Bhoi 52 ngut kiba kynthup 5 ngut ki armed forces bad 47 ngut ki riewpaidbah, ha West Jaitntis Hills 2 ngut, ha East Jaintia hills 15 ngut, ha West Garo Hills 136 ngut kiba kynthup 78 ngut ki armed forces bad 58 ngut ki riewpaidbah, ha South West Garo Hills 3 ngut, ha South Garo Hills 13 ngut kiba kynthup 11 ngut ki armed forces bad 2 ngut ki riewpaidbah.Kiba la jem baroh ki la kot sha ka 1,035 ngut bad kiba la khlad ki long 10 ngut.Ki sample kiba la leh haduh mynta ka sngi ki long 86,214 ngut bad kiba paw negetive ki long 83,499 ngut bad ki resol kiba dang ap ki long 432 ngut.La iathuh ruh ba kiba leh da ka antigen test ki long haduh 12,507 ngut bad kiba paw positive ki long 370 ngut.
title: Kiew kiba pang COVID-19 sha ka 43 ngut mynta ka sngi ha ka jylla

content: Shillong: Ka sorkar jylla ka la rai ban plie biang ia ki lai tylli ki jaka jngohkai pyrthei kiba la khang noh, naduh ba sdang ka khlam coronavirus ha ka kylla.Haba iakren bad ki pathai khubor, u myntri jong ka koit ka khiah, u Bah Alexander Laloo Hek, u la iathuh ba lai tylli ki jaka shangkai pyngngad jong ka jylla, kata ka Nanpalok, ka Elephant Falls bad ka Nehru Park ha Umiam, kin sa plie biang naduh ka 1 tarik u Nailur 2020.U la iathuh ba kane ka jaka kan plie kyrpang tang na ka bynta kiba leitkai sngewbha tang na ka jylla, ym ia kiba nabar ka jylla.U la iathuh ba ia ki COVID-19 protocols dei ban bud bad baroh ki jaka kidei ban khmih bha ba ki paidbah ki bud ia ki hukum ka sorkar.Ia kane ka rai la shim hadien ka jingiakren bad ka tourism committee ba kane ka jingplie kan long kum ka jingsdang ban peit thuh ia ka long ka man jong ka jingsaphraing u khñiang jingpang.
title: Naduh ka 1 tarik u Nailur yn plie biang ia lai tylli ki jaka jngohkai paidbah ha ka jylla

content: Ki dkhot jong ka seng BJP, ki la mih paidbah mynta ka sngi ha Thane District, ha Pahghar District bad ha ka nongbah Pune bad katei ka jing iakhih paidbah, ka dei ban dawa ia ka sorkar Maharashtra, ba kan plie noh ia baroh ki temple, kiba la shah khang sbak, na ka jingjia jong kane ka khlam covid 19.Shibun ki MLA jong ka seng BJP lem bad kiwei de ki nong kitkam, ki la ia iaid paidbah, ha ryngkat ka jingtied baje, ia tied pliang ha khmat jong ki temple.Ki MLA jong ka seng BJP, ki kynthup ia U  Sanjay Kelkar, Ravindra Chavan, U Ganpat Gaikwad ha ryngkat bad kiwei, ki dei kiba ialam ia katei ka jing iaid paidbah mynta ka sngi.Ym tang katta, hynrei mynta ka sngi, U Murlidhar Mohol, uba dei u mayor ka Pune, nanga ka Madhuri Misal, ki la pynlong ka jing iaid paidbah ha Pune, ban dawa hi ia katei ka jingplie noh ia ki temple, ha kaba ki pynsngew ba haba ka leit ka wan ka la plie, ki dukan heh ki la plie, kumta ki ki temple ruh ki dei ban plie noh mardor.
title: Iaid paidbah ki nongialam BJP ha Maharashtra, ban dawa ban plie mardor ia ki temple

content: Shillong: Uwei u tymmen basan jong ka Balang Presbyterian ha Khlieh Mawlieh u la khlad noh, katba u khun jong u, u la mynsaw hadien ba ka ambulance kaba ki shong ka la kylla ha shnong Sadew hynnin ka sngi ha ka por kumba 2 baje mynsngi.Une u tymmen basan jong ka Balang uba la tip kyrteng kum u Bah K. Wahlang u don ha lynti ban leit sha Bethany Hospital ha Shillong, ban ioh ia ka jingsumar kaba paka kumba la bthah da u doktor jong ka Nongstoiñ Civil Hospital, West Khasi Hills.U Bah K. Wahlang bad u khun jong u ki la shah pynkit noh nyngkong sha Pomlum Public Health Centre (PHC) hadien pat sa sha Dr HG Roberts Hospital ha Shillong hadien kane ka jingjia.La iathuh ruh ba une u tymmen basan u la khlad noh tang shiteng por katba u khun jong u, u dang don hapdeng ka jingsumar namar ki jingmynsaw.
title: Khlad u tymmen basan hadien ba kylla ka ambulance, mynsaw u khun ba synran ia u

content: Shillong: Ka Assembly Committee on Women Empowerment (CWE) ka la kyrpad ia ka tnad jong ka health department ban pynmih ki kaiphod jong ki longkmie ba armet, kiba donkam ia ka jingiarap na ki jaka kiba la pynhap kum ki containment zone namar ka jingsaphriang jong u khñiang jingpang COVID-19 ha ka jylla.Ia kane ka rai jong ka CWE, la shim khia hadien ka jingjia ba shah kyntait kawei ka longkmie kaba leit kha khun ha Ganesh Das Hospital namar ba ka wan na ka containment zone, bad hadien ba la khlad noh I khun jong ka tang hadien katto katne kynta por ba kha ia I.Haba iakren bad ki lad pathai khubor, ka shongknor jong ka CWE, ka Kong Mazel Ampareen Lyngdoh ka la iathuh ba ka jingbatai jong u Director of Health Services (MI), Dr Aman War ka long kaba biang ban sngewthuh ba kum kane ka jingjia kam dei ban jia.Ka la ong ba ia kaba hadien, ki COVID ward jong baroh ki hospital kidei ban shna bad ban buh jaka kyrpang ia ki longkmie ba armet kiba ladei ka por ba kin leit kha khyllung.“Ngi kyrpad ia ka health department ban shimkhia bha khnang ba ki longkmie kin ioh kham kloi ia ka jingsumar badonkam kiba wan na ki containment zone, bad dei ban pynbiang kham bun ki jingthiah khnang ba kum kine ki jingjia baladep kin nym wan jia shuh,” ong I Kong Ampareen.Ka kong Ampareen Lyngdoh ka la iathuh ba ka health department ka la ai jingtip sha ki ba ha Ganesh Das hospital, la pynkiew na ki 5 tylli sha ki 30 tylli ki jingthiah na ka bynta ki longkmie ba armet ba wan na ki containment area.“Ka health department kynthup ia I Superintendent jong ka Ganesh Das ki la long kiba la kloi ban sumar bha ia ki longkmie kiban kha khun khamtam ia kiba wan na containment zone,” ka la iathuh.Ha kawei pat ka liang, u dkhot jong ka CWE uba dei ruh u MLA ka Mawsynram, u Bah Himalaya Shangpliang u la ong ba ka committee ka la pynpaw ia ka jingsngewkhia halor ka jingduna ki tiar jingsumar na ki nongtrei ka koit na khiah ha ka por ba ki sumar ia ki nongpang khamtam ia kiba wan na ki nongkyndong.U la ong ba ka committee ka la ai jingmut ba ki donkam ban thaw ia ka kynhun ai jinghikai na ka bynta ki nongtrei ka koit ka khiah khnang ba ki paidbah na nongkyndong kin ioh jingsumar kaba paka khlem shah iehbeiñ.“Nga kyrpad ia baroh ki nongtrei jong ka koit ka khiah ban long kiba donburom bad ka jingpyni jong phi ia ka jingphuh samrkhie kan long kaba bha hakhmat ki jingpang jingshitom.” ong u Bah H. Shangpliang.
title: Pan ka CWE ia ki kaiphod jong ki longkmie ba armet kiba na ki containment area

content: Nga ka kong Dibilin Langrin, Nongdaju West Khasi Hills District, nga kwah ban pyntip bad pynshai paidbah ba katkum ka jingkynthoh haka ka kot khubor Rupang 20th August 2020 iaka shnong bad ki volunteers ka mih tang namar ka jingsngewthuh bakla jongnga kata ha ka 19th August 2020 hadien ba nga lah wan phai na Nongstion nga lah iohsngnew lyngba ka mait ba la pynbna da u Rangbah shnong ba katkum ka Random test ba lah pynlong da ka tnad ka koit ka khiah ha iew Riangdo lah lap ba arngut ki riew paidbah ki la paw positive, u wei u dei u driver bad u pat uba shong dukan ha iew Riangdo.Hadien ba ka shnong ka lah lap ba don u wei u driver tourist na Nongdaju u ba dei u primary contact bad uwei na kitei kiba lah paw positive, lah ioh jingtip ruh ba nga lah dei ka secondary contact namar ba nga lah shong haka kali jong une u driver na Nongdaju ban leit shim dawai na Nongstoin. Ka shnong ka lah pynbna ba nga dei ban shongkhop shuwa hala iing kumba shisngi arsngi tad haduh ban da ioh iaka result kaba shai la kitei ki argnut ki dei ki positive shisha ne em, kum shibynta ban lait na ka jingsaphriang u ne u khniang jingpang hapoh ka shnong ka thaw.Hynrei nga lah kum iohsngew bakla baka shnong ka lah phah shong quarantine ianga 14 sngi tang namar banga wanphai na Nongstoin kumba long iakito kiba wanphai na shabar jylla. Kumta nga lah kum ialeh pyrshah iaka shnong bad nga lah kyntait ruh ban shongkhop hala iing.Kane ka jingjia kala poi ruh shaduh ka office u D.C. bad na ka liang ka office u D.C. ka lah phah iaki pulit ka Shallang police station ban leit pynshisha, ki pulit ha ba kila poi ha iing jongnga kila kyntu ba nga dei ban kohnguh iaka jingpyniaid jongka shnong.Halor kane ka nongrim da ka mynsiem sngewrit nga panmap na phi ki nongpyniaid shnong naduh u Sordar, ki dkhot ka E.C., ki volunteers bad ka Covid-19 management committee Nongdaju namar ba nga lah kum kynthoh bakla.KhubleiShibun.Place- Nongdaju
title: Pynshai paidbah ka longkmie na Nongdaju halor ka jingkynthoh ia ka shnong bad ki volunteers

content: Khliehriat:Ka seng Meghalaya People United Front-East Jaintia Hills District (MPUF-EJHD), ha ka kyrwoh ba la phah da U President ka seng u Michal Chyr mang, ka seng ka pyrshah bad dawa na ka JHADC hapoh ka jingialam u Ma Thombor Shiwat, kum u CEM ban weng noh ia ka mynjur, kaba ka la ai sha ki 3tylli ki unique Industry coke plan, kawei kaba don ha Deinling kaba hap hapoh ka Elaka Rymbai  bad artylli pat kiba don ha thain soo kilo kiba hap hapoh ka Elaka Sutnga, namar ba lada kitei ki company ki ioh lad ban pynieng ia ki Factory kan long ka jingma ia ka jingkoit jingkhiah u paidbah lyngba ki pum pum bad ki tdem ba mih napoh kitei ki Factory ha ka por ba thang ia u Dewiong.Ka seng, ka ong ruh ba kaba i phylla shuh shuh, ba wat la hapoh East Jaintia, ki don haduh 9tylli ki karkhana dewbilat, kawei ka coke plant bad sa 3tylli ki coke plan kiba dang iaid sha khmat ka jingpyntrei, hynrei ka JHADC kam don kano kano ka bhah jong ka, na kitei ki Factory bad dei na kata ka daw ba ka JHADC ka don hapdeng ka jinghiran pisa bad ki nongtrei jong ka JHADC la 9 bnai kim shem la ioh ia ki tulop jong ki.La ong shuh shuh, ba ka seng shen kan sa phah da ka jingthoh sha ka JHADC bad sha ka State pollution control board ban dawa ba kan weng ia ka NOC jong ka JHADC bad ban pyrshah ia kitei ki coke plan.
title: Weng jing mynjur ia 3 ki Coke Plant, dawa ka MPUF na ka JHADC

content: Bitar ki paitbah nongshong shnong Nongsning mynkre Umrasong namar ba kim ioh light tikna la da kheiñ ha ka shi bnai ngi ioh light tang shiphew ne khadsan sngi ha ka shi bnai.Ka MeEcl substation ba don ha lumshnong ka khlem pyrkhat ia ki ba duk namar ia ka bill light ki hap siew beit man la u bnai nga kyrpat ia ki ba dei peit kat ba lah ba kin pyn biang light kat kum ka bill ba ngi siew.
title: Bitar ki nongshong shnong Nongsning, ba kim ioh light

content: Nongpoh: U Bah Mayrald Born Syiem, MLA ka Nongpoh, mynta ka sngi u la leit ban ai mynsiem ia ka longiing jong uwei u Samla uba la ioh COVID-19, kaba don hapoh ka shnong Sajer ha Nongpoh.Haba leit ban ai mynsiem ia katei ka longiing, utei u MLA ka Nongpoh, u la iarap ruh da ki song marbam sha katei ka longiing, kaba long ruh kum ka jingiarap sha katei ka longiing, khamtam haba u wei na kiba don ha katei ka iing u la ioh ia ka khlam COVID-19.U MLA ka Nong poh, u la kyntu ia kitei kiba haiing jong ba kim dei ban dik mynsiem eh, hynrei ki dei ban bud beit bud ryntih ia ki jingbthah ka sorkar, lyngba ka tnat ka koit ka khiah. Nalor ka jingkyntu ia kitei kiba haiing, utei u MLA ka Nongpoh, u la kyntu ruh ia ki paidbah ka thain Nongpoh, ba ki dei ban shongkhop ha la ki iing ki sem bad kim dei ban mih sha surok, laitnoh tang haba don ki kam ki bym lah kiar.
title: Leit ai mynsiem u MLA,  sha  ka longiing ba ioh COVID-19

content: Shillong: U Bah Sojol Kharrymba, Sordar ka Raid Lyngkhat, u iathuh ba hadien ka jingmih ha ki kotkhubor, ba ki don ki shipai BSF ha Lyng khat, kiba ioh jingpang khlam Covid 19, kumta ha ka 4tarik Naitung 2020, U Sordar lem bad U doktor na PHC Pongtung, ka nurse, lem bad katto katne ki rangbah ki la ia leit ban ia kynduh ia ki nongshongshnong ha Lyngkhat.Ha katei ka jing leit, la sngewthuh ba u don tang uwei u nong niah kali, uba ioh pang coronavirus bad utei u dei u draibar bad um dei satia u ba sah ha Lyng khat. Utei u poi ha Lyngkhat ha ka por 8 baje mynmiet bad bad ha ka sngi babud u mih ha ka por 6baje myn step bad la iathuh ba u company commander u khlem shah ba un rung hapoh BOPbad u thiah ha ka jaka sah ha surok bad um don satia ka jing iadei bad no bad no ruh.U Sordar, u iathuh shuh shuh ba ki BSF ha Lyngkhat ki bud pyrkhing kat kum ka protocol, ha kaba wat ia kitei kiba leit ha katei ka sngi ruh, kim shah satia ba kin rung shapoh ka BOP. Ia ki arngut ba don lang bad u ha kata ka camp ha surok la pynkit noh mar mar sha Umpling. “Nga kyntu ia ki para rangbah ba kin  pynshai ia ki briew jong ka thain ba kim dei ban  long panic, nanar ioh ki briew jingngi ki iap ym na u civid 19, hynrei na ka jingsyier bad jingrit mynsiem” ong U Sordar ka Raid Lyngkhat.
title: U BSF, uba ioh coronavirus, um dei uba na Lyngkhat

content: Shillong: Ka FKJGP War Jaintia Circle lyngba ka kyrwoh kaba la phah da U bah Reachingson Kongwang, Gen.Secretary FKJGP-War Jaintia, ka dap da ka jingsngew bitar ban iohsngew ba uwei u briew ia uba la tip kyrteng u T.Sinha u la wan poi kynsan na Silchar sha Amlarem khlem da iaid lyngba ki protocol ba la buh ka sorkar, kaba la buh ia ka jingma ia ki nongshongshnong ha kum kane ka por ba ka sorkar ka la khangdam ban iarung iamih na kawei ka jylla sha kawei pat.Katei ka seng, ka kylli, ba kumno une u briew u ioh ban rung sha ka jylla Meghalaya bad kumno u nud ban iaid lait na ki bor jong ka ain ha kum kane ka por ba ka sorkar ka pyrkhing bha ia ka rung ka mih ki briew shabar ka Jylla, la buh jingkylli ka seng.Lada ia ka khaii pateng hapdeng ka India bad Bangladesh dang khang ia mynta kan eh aiu, ban pyrkhing tyngeh ia ka jingiarung iamih hapdeng kawei ka jylla bad kawei pat, ong shuh ka seng.  Ka seng ka buh ia ka jingmaham kaba jur ia kino kino ki briew khamtam ki bar jylla kiba thmu ban iuhroit ia ka iktiar ki bor shnong lyngba ka VCMC kiba dei ki nongpeit ia kane ka kam iap kam im hapoh shnong pohthaw.Ka Seng ka buh ka jingkyrpad rit ia ki Village Covid 19 Management Committee ki bor shnong bapher bapher, kiba hap hapoh war jaintia ba kin trei shitom shuh shuh kumba ki lah trei ha kine ki por ba la dep, ban shim khia bha ia ka jingwan rung ki briew ba nabar khlem da pyntip shuwa, khnang ba kane ka jingialeh halor kane ka thma na kane ka jingpang khlam kan long kaba jop.
title: Bitar ka FKJGP WJC, ba wan poi u briew na Silchar sha Amlarem

content: Ka jingpang khlam corona virus, ka la nang pur stet mynta, ha ki dong bapher jong ka sor Shillong. Na kaei kaba shu ia bna harum haneng, ngi ioh sngew ba ki don kitei kiba pang ha Umpling, ha NEIGHRIMS, ha Keatinge Road, ha Mawprem bad ha kiwei ki jaka, hynrei kitei ki dei tang ki hamsaia suda,  katba ki jingshisha, kim paw satia haduh ha kine ki sngi.La ong shuh shuh, ba kitei kiba pang, ki la shang kylleng ka nongbah Shillong bad ki don kiba ju leit rung sha ki jaka bapher ha Lachumiere, sha Lawjynriew jong ka thain Nongthymmai bad kam kut tang katta, hynrei, ki lah ban don sa kiwei ki jaka, kiba ki riew paidbah kim tip bad haduh mynta ka shu sah tang ka jing antad ba ka jing mutdur suda.Ngim tip, balei ka sorkar Jylla, haduh mynta, kam pat ioh ia ka jingshai ban sei kyrteng shwa ia kito kiba la dep ejahar ha ki pulit bad na kano ka daw, ba ki pulit ki buhrieh, haba ia kiwei ki ju sei tyngkrein ha ka website jongki bad wat ia kiba ia shoh shi tnga ruh, ki ju thad madan bad nangta, balei shuh ba kim sei ia ki kyrteng jong kito kiba pang, ia ki jaka shong bad ki jaka sah jongki.Mynta u paidlang ka nongbah Shillong, u syier mynsiem shaba palat, namar um tip ia ka iaid ka ieng, ka leit ka wan jongu, la u don jingshngain ne em ban leit sha Iewduh, sha Police Bazaar, sha Lait umkhrah bad kumta ter ter bad ha kane ka dur, ka buh jingeh ruh, ba ngin nang ban husiar ialade, namar ba ngim tip, la ki briew, kiba ngi ia shong kai lang, kiba ngi ia shong lang ha kajuh ka bos, kiba ngi ia shong lang hapoh ophis bad kumta ter ter, ioh ki dei pynban, kiba la don khieshoh bad shitmet.Ka don tang kawei ka jing shisha bad kata ka long ba lada kane ka jingpang, kan nang pur shuh shuh, sha ki khambun ki briew, hangta kan sa mih ka jing ia khleh bad ia milai jaktung hapdeng uba koit bad uba la ngat ia ka khlam corona bad hangta, kan sa pur naphang ia u paidlang ka Ri Khasi bad tang shu la jia kumta, kan mih sa ka jing ia tieng koh tympan para   paralok para jor bad wat shi iing shi sem bad kin don bun bah ki bym kwah shuh ban mih tang ha phyllaw iing lajong bad  hangta, kan sa shim ksih sa ka tyrsim jong ka duk ksew, na ka jing rit mynsiem ia kane ka khlam corona, kaba ngin hap ban iakhun tyngeh, da ki bun bun bnai shakhmat.
title: Ngi syier mynsiem, haei ka don ka khlam?

content: Ka jing leh ki bor pyniaid ribhoi district kaba la bakla shi bun, naduh 11 tarik kiba leit interview jong ka post DEO dang pynmih order mynta ban shong quarantine, kiba wan interview ki la iapoi shala ki ing ki shnong lajong myntoi aiu shuh, da ioh pang kito ba wan interview la pur lut baroh shi state hi, ka jing dkoh trei kam.kasparliniawphniaw2Hooid ka bakla , tangba kam dei pat kaba suk ia ki bor sorkar ban lap lut shiaien lap, kum ha Neigrihm ka jia 4 tarik dang bthah 9 tarik. Namar ba ym shym la tip lut ia kaei kaba ki paidbah ki lehTakein hato ka sngi kein ka DC dei ban ong shaphang ka protocol kan shngain iaki paitbah mynta pat kito ba leit interview kila trei la ktah bad la iakynduh iaki baha ing ki lok ki jor bad kiwei ki briew ka jingeh kaba khraw shisha haba pyrkhat iakane??Kynthei ne shynrang ba ioh ia kata ka jingpang
title: Ka jingleh ki bor District, ka bakla shibun

content: Ki nongmihkhmat jong ki kynhun jingngeit bapher, ki la iakynduh ha ka Sngi Palei 9tarik u Naitung 2020 ha Bianchi Hall jong ka Balang Katholik, Laitumkhrah hapoh ka jinglamkhmat jong u Bishop P Lyngdoh, President ka Shillong Khasi Jaintia Church Leaders Forum.Ban ialeh pyrshah ia ka khlam Corona bad ban pynsangeh ia ka jingsaphriang ba sngewtriem jong ka sha baroh ki nongshong shnong, kane ka jingialang ka phah ia ka jingkyrpad kaba kyrpang sha baroh ki nongshong shnong ban bud pyrkhing ia ki jingpynbeit (protocol) ba la buh da ka Sorkar; bad ha kajuh ka por ruh ban don ka jingkitkhlieh shimet shimet ha ki jingpyrshang kiba bha kiba iadei bad ka koit ka khiah, ka jingkhuid jingsuba bad ka jingburom iwei ia iwei pat.Kane ka jingialang ka buh ha ki jingthoh bad jingkynmaw ia ka jingñiewburom bad jingsngewnguh na ka bynta ka Sorkar Jylla, ki nongtrei bad nongialeh kiba hakhmat eh, ki Rangbah Shnong bad ki nongialam ha Nongkyndong bad ha Sor, ki kynhun bad ki briew shimet ryngkat ruh ki nongtrei-mon-sngewbha kiba la ia kyrshan ha ki rukom ki bapher ban ialeh pyrshah ia kane ka khlam.Ha kaba iadei bad ki jingshahlehbeiñ ne shah kyntait beiñ kaba mih na ki jingsngew iapher jaidbynriew – ha ki imlang sahlang jong ngi, ha ri India bad ha ka pyrthei hi, kane ka jingialang ka pynrem jur ia kiba kum kita ki jingleh bad jingjia, bad ka khot ia ki paidbah baroh ban kiar na kine ki jingleh kiba sniew pyrshah ia kiwei pat.Kane ka jingiakynduh ruh ka la iakut ban don noh da ka kynhun ba thymmai ka ban kynthup ia ki nongialam ne nongmihkhmat na ki kynhun jingngeit bapher na ka bynta ban kyntiew ia ka jingshongsuk shongshngaiñ ha ka Jylla, bad ba kata ka kynhun kan ia shim bynta ruh bad ki bor kiba dei – ban iatreilang ha kino kino ki jingdonkam kiba ktah ia ki Paidbah bad nongshong shnong ha ka Jylla.Ha kaba iadei bad ka jingplie ia ki jaka mane Blei, hadien ka jingkiew jong kane ka jingpang ha ka Jylla bad ka jingbymlah kiba bun ban pynbiang ia ki jingdonkam bad jingpynbeit ka Sorkar, kane ka jingiakynduh ka sngew ba ym pat dei ban plie ia ki jaka mane Blei mynta, hynrei ban dang peit shuwa haduh kaba kut une u bnai, bad iakren biang pat hadien kata.Ka jingialang ka la buh ki jingduwai ba kyrpang na ka bynta ka jingshngaiñ bad jingiada ia ki imlang sahlang jong ngi bad ka jingshongsuk ha ka jylla Meghalaya bad ka ri baroh kawei; ha kajuh ka por ruh na ka bynta kito baroh kiba la shah ktah ha kane ka khlam Corona ha kylleng ki jaka.
title: Ong ka SKJCLF, bym pat dei ban plie ia ki jaka mane Blei ia mynta

content: Nongpoh: Ka Deputy Commissioner ka Ri Bhoi Distrik, ka la pyntip paidbah ba kito kiba la leit ka Walk-in-Interview na bynta ka Post DEO, kaba la long ha ka 11 tarik mynta u bnai ha ophis ka DC Nongpoh, la kyntu ia ki ba kin dei ban leh ia ka Home Quarantine kaba 14 sngi lynter.Ka nongrim kaba la pynlong ia ka DC Ri Bhoi ba kan kyntu ia kito baroh kiba la leit sha katei ka Interview, ba kin leh ia ka Home Quarantine, ka dei namar ba la don uwei napdeng kito kiba la leit sha katei ka Interview u la paw ba u la ioh COVID-19.Namarkata ka ka DC Ri Bhoi, ka la kyntu ia kitei kiba la leit sha katei ka Interview, ki dei ban deng ia ki Mask kat haba ki don, ba pynjngai na kiwei pat bad ruh ban saitkti manla ka por. Ha kajuh ruh ka por ka la kyntu ruh ia ki ba lada ki sngew ba ki don ia kino kino ki jingsngew shitom, kum ka Jyrhoh, khie shit bad jynjar ha ka ring ne pynhiar mynsiem, ki dei ban pyntip mar mar sha ki number 03638232028/1077 ne ban phun sha u Help Line Number 8787520449.
title: Kiba la leit Interview ha ka 11 tarik ha ophis DC Nongpoh, ki dei ban leh Home Quarantine

content: U Rajeev Chandrasekhar, MP jong ka seng BJP, u don mynta ha ka jaka shong kyrpang jongu, hadien ba uwei u nongtrei jong ka komiti secreteriat, ula ioh pang  coronavirus.U Chandrasekhar, u iathuh ha ka twitter, ba ula leit sha Delhi, ban don ha ka jingialang jong ka  parliamentary committee, ha ka 10tarik Naitung 2020, hynrei, ula shong kyrpang noh, na ka bynta hynniew sngi, hadien ba uwei u nongtrei, u ioh pang covid 19.La bthah ia kiwei de ki MP kiba la leit sha katei ka jingialang, ba kin ia shong kyrpang, na ka bynta hynniew sngi kynthih.La iathuh ba U Jitendra Singh, myntri khynnah ka sorkar India, u don mynta ha ka jingshong kyrpang, hadien ba U Ravinder Raina, u President ka seng BJP ha  Jammu and Kashmir, u ioh ia ka jingpang khlam covid 19. U Singh bad U Raina, ki ia leit jingleit lang ha ka 12tarik Naitung na  Srinagar sha Bandipora.Ha Nagaland, ki don sa 51 ngut kiba ioh pang khlam covid mynta ka sngi bad baroh kiba ioh pang, ki la poi sha ka 896 ngut, ong u myntri ka koit ka khiah ka sorkar Jylla, U S Pangnyu Phom.Mynta ka sngi, ka sorkar India, ka la pynbna ba kito ki dawai sait kti, kiba khleh kyiad, kin hap ha ka GST, kaba 18 percent. Ka Authority for Advance Ruling, ha ka jing pynmih hukum mynta ka sngi, ka iathuh ba namar ba ka jing sait kti, ka dei kaba pynmih na ka kyiad, kumta kan hap ha ka GST, kaba 18 percent. La iathuh ba wat la ka  Ministry of Consumer Affairs, ka pynhap ia katei ka dawai sait kti, kum ka tiar kaba donkam eh, hynrei ka ain GST, ka la pyn iaphiah noh ia katei ka dawai sait kti la ka jong.
title: Shong kyrpang U MP, ba ioh pang khlam u nongtrei, yn dain khajna 18 percent ia ka dawai sait kti

content: U symbud myntri rangbah ka jylla, u bah Prestone Tynsong, mynta ka sngi u la thalain tyngeh ia ki briew kiba ju mlien ban kynthoh ia kiwei ha ki social Media khlem da tip ba ka dei ka khubor kaba dei ne kaba lait. U bah Prestone, u la ong ba ha kine ki sngi, ha ki social Media la iohi ba bun na ki briew ki kynthoh ia ki MLA, ia ki Minister ia ki  Deputy Commissioner  ia ki ophisar jong ka tnad ka koit ka khiah, kaba long ka kam biej bad ka bym shongnia.U la ong ruh ba ki dei ban sngewthuh bad ban long ki ba kitkhlieh lang ha ka im lang sah lang, namar ba kane ka jingleh jong ki kan wan rah ia ka jingkulmar jingmut ia ki paidbah ka jylla. U la ong ruh ba ka jingshisha ka long beit ba ka sorkar, ka don ban peit bad ban shakri ia ki paidbah ban peit ia ka bha ka miat jong ki nongshong shnong kane ka jylla.U bah Prestone u la ong ba baroh ki dei ban kiar ban pynphriang ia ki khubor lamler, kiba lah ban wanrah ia ka jingkulmar jingmut ia ki paidbah.
title: Thalain u bah Prestone, ia kiba ju mlien ban kynthoh ha ki Social Media

content: Kawei na ki jingeh ba ki khynnah skul ki iakynduh ha kine ki por ka long ba namar ka jing nang jur u Khniang COVID-19 ki lah hap ban shong skul lynngba ki online.Kane ka jingpyrshang jong ka sorkar ban hikai skul online ka nang wan rah pynban sa kawei ka jing eh ia ki khynnah skul ki ba sah ha nyngkyndong, namar tang ki network ban iaphun ruh kam da long bha kumno pat ki lah ban ioh shong klass.Haba ngi peit ia ki shong ki ba hap sha ki thain nyngkong jong ka South West Khasi hill ki ia kynduh ia ki jing eh mynta lei namar ka jing bym biang ka network. Ki shnong ki ba shait ioh ia ka network napoh shnong Ngunraw mynta ki mad ha jing eh namar ka jing bym long shun u network.Haba nga ioh ban ia kren bad ki khynnah skul ki pynpaw ka mynsiem jing sngew diaw bad sngew sih namar ha ba ki mut ban shong klass ruh kim ioh namar ka jing bym biang ka networ.Ym tang na ka bynta ki khynnah skul, hynrei ka long ruh ka jingduh ka ba khraw na ka bynta ki paidbah ki ba lah ju shaniah beit ha ka mobile kum ki lad jing pyntip.Nga na ka liang u President jong ka HYC keinong bad Thiepdiengngan unit nga kwah ban buh ka jing kyrpad ka barit eh ia ka District Adminstration ba kan sngewbha ban leh ei ei halor kane ka bynta khnang ba ki khynnah skul kane ka dong ka thain kin nymduh noh ia ki online klass.
title: Jynjar ki nongkyndong ha ki online class, bym biang network

content: Shillong: U Director ka tnad ka koit ka khiah, u Dr Aman War, u iathuh ba mynta ka sngi la test Covid positive ia ki 3 ngut ki briew ha ka jylla kine baroh 3 ngut, ki dei ki briew ki ba la wan phai na shabar ka jylla bad haduh mynta 270 ngut ki nongpang Covid-19 ha ka jylla.U Dr War u la iathuh ba haduh mynta ki don 4 tylli ki jaka ki ba la mana ban iarung ia mih (Containment area) bad kitei ki long ka ktem shipai BSF ha Umpling,ka ktem shipai BSF ha Mawpat, Ka Nongmynsong Police Out Post bad ka Artho department jong ka NEIGRIMHS Hospital.Ha East Khasi Hills District, ki briew kiba don ia ka jingpang Covid-19 ki long 236 ngut na kine 179 ngut ki dei ki shipai BSF, 5 ngut ki kynhun shipai bad 52 ngut ki riewpaidbah.Ha Ribhoi District ki don 19 ngut, ha East Jaintia Hills ki don 2 ngut, ha South West Garo Hills District 2 ngut, ha East Garo Hills District uwei, ha West Garo Hills District 9 ngut,bad ha North Garo Hills District uwei, ki briew kiba la koit na ka ne ka jingpang ki long 46 ngut.   Ki sample kiba la dep ban phah test ki long 24,817 tylli, kiba long negative ki long 24,199 ki result kiba dang ap ki long 300 bad ki briew kiba la wan phai ha ka jylla ki long 21,837 ngut.Na ka liang u symbud myntri rangbah ka jylla, u bah Prestone Tynsong u iathuh ba hadien ka jingkiew jong ki briew kiba shah ktah ha ka khlam Covid -19, khamtam ha East Khasi Hills District ka sorkar jylla, kan tnaw lad shuh shuh ban pynbun  ia ki jaka sumar ia ki briew ba ioh ia ka jingpang Covid-19.
title: 270 ngut ki nongpang covid, 4 tylli ki jaka ba mana ban iarung ia mih, ong U DHS

content: : U Symbud myntri rangbah ka jylla, u bah Prestone Tynsong, u iathuh ba ha ka jingialang kaba la long mynta ka sngi, la shim ia ka rai ba ia ki kyrteng jong ki 198 ngut ki briew kiba dei ki highrisk contact jong ki briew kiba ioh ia ka jingpang Covid -19 yn ai ia ki kyrteng jong ki, ha ki nongialam shnong bad ha ki Covid-19 Commitee ban peitngor ba kine ki briew kim dei ban ia khleh paidbah.Ki 198 ngut ki briew ki dei ki High Risk Contact jong ki briew kiba la wan ban shim bynta ha ka jingkhawai iathoh shong kurim, kaba la long ha Greenwood Resort ,Guawahati bad ki briew kiba dei ki high risk contact jong u shipai BSF u ba la test positive ha NEIGRIMHS Hospital.Haba iakren bad ki lad pathai khubor u bah Prestone u la iathuh  ba  ki Covid-19 Commitee, kin khmih bad  pyntikna ba kine ki briew kiba dei ki high risk contact jong ki briew kiba ioh ia ka jingpang Covid-19 kim dei ban ia iaid sharum shaneng bad kim dei ban ia khleh paidbah, hynrei ki dei ban pyndep ia ka quarantine  kaba long 14 sngi kum ba la bthah da ka tnad ka koit ka khiah.U la ong ruh ba kine ki briew kiba dei ki high risk contact, ki dei ban leh ban pyndep  ia ka quarantine  wat la ha ba la dep ban test bad ki long negative, hynrei ki dei ban bud pyrkhing ia ki kyndon ka tnad ka koit ka khiah, ban pyndep ia ka jingleh quarantine bad ban pynthikna ia kane la aiti ha ki Covid-19 Commitee.
title: Ki kyrteng jong ki 198 ngut, kiba iajan bad kiba pang covid, yn ai ha ki covid committee, kim dei ban iakhleh paidbah

content: Ka jingwad bniah da ki nonglum jingtip shaphang u Syiem Tirot Sing u Syiem ka Hima Nongkhlaw kaba la rung ruh ha ki jaka pule kum kawei na ki lynnong ka iathuh ba u la long Syiem ha ki snem 1814 eiei haduh ba un da shah kem ha ki bor sorkar phareng ha u snem 1833 ba kumno utei u Syiem laitluid ba khatduh ki Khasi u kyntait mardor ia ki jingtyrwa kiba bun jait jong ka bor synshar ki phareng kiba lehse kiba tlot ka nongrim kin nym lah ban khlem jawdud ban kyntait ia ki jingmyntoi shimet kiba bun.Dei ha ka por ka jingsynshar jong u ba u agent ka sorkar phareng u David Scott ha Assam u la kwah ban pyniasoh ia ka rithor Assam bad rithor Sylhet da kaba pan jingbit na u Syiem Tirot Sing ban shna surok ka ban iaid lyngba ka Nongkhlaw. U Syiem Tirot Sing um shym la shim ia ka rai tang marwei hynrei u la khot ia ka dorbar kaba long ka nongmuna ba khraw ba ki nongsynshar jong ngi ha ki shnong ki thaw bad ki it ki hima ha kine ki sngi ruh ki dei ban bud ia katei ka sienjam haba shim ia kano kano ka rai ym ban rai tang marwei ne ar, lai ngut .Haba ka dorbar ka la mynjur , la shah ia ki phareng ban shna ia ka surok lyngba ka jingiateh kular bad u David Scott ha u snem 1826. Ki phareng ruh ki la trei bad haba la dep ban shna, tang katto katne por pat ki la iuhroit ia ka mon uba bun balang bad thombor ia ka hok ki kynthei. Dei halor katei ka jingjia ba la khih puk ka jingbitar u Syiem bad ka Hima wat hapdeng ka jingujor sha ki bor ba halor kam shym sangeh satia ba sa sdang ka jingiakhun pyrshah ia ki Phareng ha u snem 1829. Ha kane ka jingiakhun pyrshah ia ka sorkar phareng ym tang ki rangbah hynrei ki kynthei ruh kum ka Phan Nonglait ki la don ka bynta kaba khraw ban iarap ia ki rangbah. Ai ba ka Phan Nonglait kan long ka nuksa ia kiwei ruh ki kynthei ne longkmie ha kine ki sngi ba mynta.Ka jingiakhun ka la pynshaiong ia ki phareng kiba khein sting ia ka iktiar u paidbah ka jaidbynriew Khasi. Hadien ka jingkhlad noh u David Scott ha ka snem 1831 u Lord Robertson u la shimti ia ka kam jong u ha Assam bad kut jingmut ban pynkut noh ia kane ka jingialeh kaba suhsat.Ha kaba khatduh u Tirot Sing um lah ban iakhun pyrshah ia ka iktiar ba khlain bor ki phareng u la phet rieh sha ki jaka rieh bapher bapher. Hapdeng ki jingpyrshang kiba bun kiba ki phareng ki la tyrwa ia u Tirot Sing bad ki Myntri jong u da ki jingtyrwa kiba sngewbynnud ban kyntait kim jop satia, hynrei da ki buit shukor ban ia kren iasuk la kem ia u Tirot Sing ha ka 13tarik u Kyllalyngkot, 1833 haba u mih na jaka rieh bad rai ban pynryngkang ia u sha Tenasserim hynrei ka sorkar Bengal ka la pynkylla ia ka rai u political agent bad la phah sha Dhaka haduh ba un da khlad ha ka 17tarik u Naitung 1835.Haba u don hapoh iing byndi la tyrwa ia u Tirot Sing ban leit phai biang sha ka Hima ban shong ha ka khet Syiem hapoh ka jingpyniaid ka sorkar phareng la iathuh ba u la kyntait mardor ia kata ha ryngkat ki kyntien ba u ong: ” Kham lah kaba iap kum u paidkar ban ia ka ban im kum u Syiem mraw “.Kumjuh ha shuwa ba un iap u la ong ha uwei na ki koidi ba dei na ki thain Jaintia Hills :”Ynda phi leit phai sha la ka Ri iathuh ia ki para Ri jong nga ba u Tirot Sing u iap kum u Syiem “. Kane ka jingkyntait jong u Syiem Tirot Sing ia ka jingtyrwa jong ka sorkar phareng ka pyni ba um dei uba rhah bor ne sbai rupa hynrei uba ieng ha la ka nongrim khlem ngop satia ha ki jingshah pynthame.Haba phaidien ia ka jingiakhun u Syiem Tirot Sing, uwei na ki rangbah shipai ki phareng uba la ialeh ia u Tirot Sing u la ong, “Lada baroh ki Syiem Khasi ki la iasoh lang ha kane ka jingialeh kaba la long kylleng ka ri, kaba la sdang na ka jingpyniap ha Nongkhlaw, kan jin da la long kaba eh ia ka Ri lum Khasi “. Kane ka mat ka phalang lehse ia ka jingdonkam jong ka jingiatylli jong ka Jaidbynriew naduh ki nongialam bad ki dkhot ka jaidbynriew ha baroh ki liang da kaba ngi ioh jingsneng ia kaei kaba la jia ha ki por ba la leit noh khnang ba ngin ioh ban kheit ia ki jingthrang jong ngi kum ka jaidbynriew.Ai ba ka jingkynmaw burom ia ka lyngkhuh sngi iap ba 185 une u Syiem laitluid ba khatduh ki Khasi uba la pynsahnam ialade ha une u snem 2020 kan ai ha ngi ia ka jinghikai ba ngi dei ban rat dyngkhong ia ka mynsiem rhah bor ne sbai rupa ban myntoi shimet hynrei ban bud ia ka nuksa jong u Syiem Tirot Sing bad ki nongbud jong u ban ieng ha ka nongrim jong ka hok bad jingshisha khnang ba ki bor ba la laiphew jait kin nym ioh ban shim kabu ban pynngop ia ngi da ka jingpyrkhat myntoi shimet khnang ba ka lawei ki khun ki kti ki para pyrsa jong ngi kan long kaba shngain ha ki pateng ban wan.Ka long ruh kaba donkam ban pynbeit ia kino kino ki jingduna ne jingbakla ba lah ban don naduh ki spah snem ba la leit haduh kine ki sngi khlem da donkam ban kdew kti ne kynnoh pyrshah iano iano khnang ba ngin lait na ki jingtynjuh kiba bun jait ha ki por ban dang wan . Ai ba ki jingduna kiba lah ban don ha ki por ba la leit kin ai jingstad bad long ka jinghikai ia ngi baroh lang ban pynwandur ia kita khlem da don kano kano ka jingkwah burom hapdeng jong ngi.
title: U Tirot Sing u Syiem laitluid, bym rhah bor ne sbai rupa

content: Ka Sorkar Jylla ha ka jingialang ba la long mynta ka sngi, ka la shim ia ka rai ban weng noh ia ka jing pakhang shnong (total lockdown) ha ka nong bah Shillong, la iathuh da u Symbud Myntri rangbah ka jylla u bah Prestone Tynsong.Haba iakren bad ki lad pathai khubor, na ka liang u bah Prestone u la iathuh ba ka sorkar ka la shim ia ka rai ban weng noh ia ka jingpakhang shnong naduh lashai ka sngi ka 15 tarik u Naitung 2020.U la iathuh ruh ba ka jingrai jong ka sorkar jylla, ha ka 12 tarik u naitung 2020, ban pynjari ia ka jingpakhang shnong kaba 2 sngi, ha ka nongbah Shillong ka long tang ban ioh ban wad ia ki briew kiba iakynduh bad ki briew kiba la leit ban shim bynta ha ka jingiathoh shongkurim.Hadien ba ki tnad ka koit ka khiah, ki la dep ban lap lut ia ki briew kiba iakynduh ia kine ki briew kiba long Covid positive, yn weng noh ia ka jingpakhang shnong ha ka nongbah Shillong baroh kawei, u la ong.
title: Rai ka Sorkar Jylla ban weng noh, ia ka jingpakhang shnong ha ka nongbah Shillong

content: Ka por ka dei kaba kordor tam ha ka jingim jong ngi ki briew. Ka por kam ap iano iano pynban ka iaid beit kam don jingsangeh. Ía ka jingim jong ngi ki briew la pyniasyrngiem bad ki saw tylli ki por ne ki saw aiiom ha ka shisnem kata ka dei ka pyrem, synrai, lyuir bad tlang namar ha ka jingim jong ngi ki briew ruh ka don saw bynta ka por khunlung, khynnah, samla bad tymmen.Ka por khunlung ka dei ka por ha kaba ngi dang lui lui,shisur bad khuid mynsiem bad ngim pat tip eiei ha ka jingim. Ka por khynnah ka dei ka por kaba ngi dang shaniah nadong shadong ha ka jingpyniaid i mei bad i pa. Ka por samla ka dei ka por kaba ngi hap ban mat ia shibun ki jingeh, jingjynjar bad ki jingtynjuh ba har-rukom namar kane ka dei ka por ksiar por rupa ban pynkhreh ialade ban ieng ha la ki kjat. Bad ka por tymmen ka dei ka por ka ban tei ia la ka ing ka sem bad ka lok ryngkat ki khun ki kti kum ka longing longsem kaba dei ka nuksa ia kiwei ki marjan marpa.Napdeng kitei ki saw tylli ki por kiba donkam ha ka jingim jong ngi ki briew,ha kaba baroh saw ki por ngi hap ban iaid lyngba lut, ka por samla ka dei ka POR KSIAR NYLLA namar dei ha kane ka por ba ngin rai la ngi kwah ban suk, ban bha,ban jynjar lane ban long briew ne long mrad ha ka lawei jong ka jingim jong ngi iwei pa iwei.Ka por samla ka dei ka por kaba donkam tam ha ka jingim jong iwei pa iwei i briew namar kane ka por ka dei ka por ban pynkhreh bha ia lade,la ha ka pule dangle, wad kam wad jam, bylla sngi bad ban kunai la ka ioh ka kot, ban iarap ia kiba ha ing ha sem ki hymmen para, bad ban noh synniang da ka jingshemphang,ka jingnang jingtip bad wat da ka bor met ia ka imlang sahlang,ka ri bad ka Jaitbynriew.Ka por samla ka dei ka por kaba dang khlain bha ha ka pyrkhat pyrdaiñ, ha ka bor met por phad, ha ka jingiohi jngai bad ha ka jingshemphang lada ngi don ka mon bajwat ban leh ia kano kano ka kam naduh mynsiem kam don jingeh jingtynjuh kaba lah ban khanglad pynban ka shong pat ha ngi iwei pa iwei la ngi kwah ban leh sniew ne ban leh bha ban sah ka nam jong ngi shiarta.Ka por samla ka dei ka por kaba pynkynmaw sah bad um lah ban pynklet ia ngi iwei pa iwei namar ha kane ka por ngi mat ia shibun ki jingkmen jingsngewbha pahuh kyrhai.Ka por samla ka dei ka por kaba sakma ne bym thikna bad kynmaw than ia kiba ha ing ha sem,ia ki hymmen para bad ia i mei i pa namar kat shaba phai tang ki lok kyrhai pynban kane ka por ka dei ka por ban ai ia ka rai bapaka ia ngi iwei pa iwei ban sniew ne ban bha ha ka jingim.Ka por samla ka dei ka por kaba kwah tang ban pynsngewbha ialade ym da pyrkhat than ia kiwei. Kane ka por ka dap tang da ki jingpynshoi, jingtynjuh bad ki ktien jali jaum na ki paralok ban pynphlop bad pynngop ia ngi ha ki kam sniew ba laiphewjait bad lada ngi ngop ha kine ki jingriam kiba sniew ba laiphewjait lyngba ki lok kiba ngi thoin, kiba ngi shaniah tang kata hi la kut ka jingim ban pynsohsat bad pynjynjar ia ngi shi-arta. Dei na kane ka daw ba ngi dei ban da jied bha ia ki paralok ban ia iaid ia ieng ryngkat namar ka jingim jong ngi ka shong ha ki kti, ki kjat, ki jingmut jingpyrkhat jong ngi ban leh ban kam,ban iaid ban ieng ban pyrkhat pyrdaiñ bha ym ban taria ruma.Khatduh iawai, nga kwah ban kyntu sha baroh ki paradoh parasnam bad ki samla kynthei bad shynrang ka Bri u hynniewtrep ba ngim dei ban PYNLEHNOHEI ia ka por samla ne shah IALAM BAKLA la ha ki kam sniew ne kam shongkha ban tip bha tang ia i snam bapaka,ban nym iaid BAKLA ne iaid SAKMA bad ban nym tur RUMA khlem da PYRKHAT BHA ne PYNTHIKNA ha ka lynti bym dei hynrei ba ngin long ki samla kiba bha,kiba iaishah, kiba iohi jngai, kiba iaineh, kiba kyntiew ia ki paradoh parasnam bad ban ialeh khlem kynran dien ia kaba dei,ban shakri da ka jingieid ia ki paradoh parasnam,ka dong ka thain ka RI bad ka JAITBYNRIEW HYNNIEWTREP ban long ki nuksa ia ki longdien ki ban dang wan,ban tei ia ka lawei da ki nuksa kiba bha khnang ba ngim nym babe kylla.Kiei ki jnglong ba ngi mad haki por samla ??sumar ba ioh ka pulom ei jingim samla ha ka pyrthei.kiei ki jingmut ha lyndet kitei ki kyntienKi ei ki jingmut ha lyndet kitei ki laiñ
title: KA POR SAMLA KA POR KSIAR NYLLA

content: Shillong:U Director ka tnad ka koit ka khiah u Dr Aman War u la kyrpad ia ki paidbah bad ia ki bor pyniaid shnong ban ym pynthut  ia ki nong trei ha ki Hospital baroh.Haba iakren bad ki lad pathai khubor u Dr War u la ong ba ki don na ki Shnong ki bym shem la shah ia ki briew ki ba trei ha NEIGRIHMS hospital ban rung ha ki Shnong ba ki sah hadien ba ki la wan na jaka trei.U la ong ruh ba ka NEIGRIHMS hospital, ka dei ka hospital kaba kit khlieh bad  kim ju phah ia ki nongtrei jong ki khlem da pynthikna  bha ia ka koit ka khiah jong ki.U Dr War u la ong ba lada ki shnong ki thaw kin pynthut, ia ki nongtrei ha NEIGRIHMS hospital yn ym don ban sumar shuh ia ki nongpang, kumta u la kyntu ban ym pynthut ia ki nongtrei ka NEIGRIHMS hospital.U la ong ruh  ba ym tang ia ki nongtrei ka NEIGRIHMS hospital, hynrei  ia baroh ki nongtrei jong ki hospital ba don ha jylla, namar ba la phah leit ia ki sha ing ka mut ki long ki ba koit ba khiah.U la ong ruh ba mynta kaba donkam ka long ban burom ia ki nongtrei jong ka tnad ka koit ka khiah, ki ba ialeh pyrshah bad trei shitom na ka khlam Covid-19.U myntri ka tnad ka koit ka khiah, u bah Alexander L Hek, u la ong ba ka sorkar bad ki bor ba dei peit ia ka NEIGRIHMS ki ai khublei kyrpang ia ka shong Mawkasiang ka ba la kloi ban pdiang ia ki nongtrei ka NEIGRIHMS ba kin sah hapoh katei ka shnong.
title: Ki nongtrei kiba leit phai sha iing, ki dei kiba koit ba khiah

content: Kiba pang ha ka pyrthei baroh kawei, ki la poi mynta sha ka 13 million ngut bad kiba pang ha India, ki long 9lak ngut. Baroh kiba ioh pang, ha satlak pyrthei ki long 13,000,166 ngut bad baroh  kiba iap, ki la poi sha ka  569,990 ngut.Ha  United States, kiba pang, ki long  3,341,838 ngut bad kiba iap, ki la poi sha ka  135,425 ngut.Ka India, ka wan balai ha ka pyrthei, ha kaba kiba ioh pang baroh ki la poi sha ka 8.78lak ngut bad kiba iap, ki long 23,174 ngut ha ki 24 kynta ba ladep.Kiba ioh pang ha ki 24 kynta ba ladep, ki long  28,498 bad kiba iap ki long 553 ngut. Baroh kiba ioh pang, ki long 9,06,752 bad kiba dang shah sumar, ki long  3,11,565 bad sa  5,71,460 ngut kiba la mih na ki  jaka sumar bad kiba iap ki long  23,727 ngut.Ka jingpang covid 19, ka tam haduh shi lak, tang ha ki lai sngi kynthih, lane na ka 8lak sha ka 9lak ngut.
title: 28 hajar ngut tam, kiba ioh pang khlam covid 19 ha ka shi sngi ha India

content: Shillong:Ka HPF, ka dawa na ka Deputy Commissioner Ribhoi ka R.M.Kurbah ban buh jaka Coronavirus Check up Center ha Mawlasnai bad Umsyiang ki jaka ba ki ia rung ia mih ki briew kiba na Assam bad Meghalaya.Na ka liang ka seng ka la lap, ba ki briew kiba na Assam ki lah ioh ban wan sha ki iew ki hat ban rung ha ki ATM ha bhoirymbong, umroi bad kane ka ka buh jing ma kaba khraw tam ia ki briew kum ha kine ki por kaba une u khniang jing pang u lah khreh pur sted ha kylleng ka jylla.Kumta ka seng ka dawa ban buh noh da ka jaka check Point hangtei ki jaka khnang ki paidbah kin shngain ka leit ka wan bad ha kajuh ka por ka dawa ruh ba dei ban pynshitom ia ki briew katkum ki kyndon jong ka ain ki bym deng mask bad bym phikir ka leit ka wan khamtam ha ki iew ki hat.
title: Ki briew na Assam, ki wan rung sha ki ATM ha Bhoirymbong, Umroi, ong ka HPF

content: Nongpoh: Ka Metiap jong iwei I khunlung ba dang shu kha bad iba la shem jingeh ban iohtep ha u Lumjingtep ka Balang Presbyterian Umrandairy, la ioh ban tep bad pyndon burom noh mynta ka sngi, kata hadien ba kiba haiing hasem jong itei u khunlung, ki la hap ban iaid lyngba shibun ki jingeh, namar ka la don da kawei pat ka kynhun kaba dei na kajuh ka Balang, ki la kyntait ban ai jaka tep ia itei I khunlung hapoh utei u Lum Jingtep ka Balang.Haba wad jingtip halor katei ka jingjia, la ioh jingtip ba itei u khunlung I la khlad mynha ka sngi Saitjain hapoh ka Bethany Hospital Shillong bad I la khlad ha ka por 4 baje ei ei janmiet, ha kaba naduh katei ka por ba I la khlad, kiba ha iing ki la rah sha ka shnong, na ka bynta ban pyndep bad ban pynkhuid noh ia ka met jong I, hynrei la mih shibun ki jyrwit jyrwat ban pyndep don burom ia katei ka metiap itei I khunlung.Haba iadei bad katei ka jingjia, kiba ha iing jong itei i Khunlung ba dang shu kha, ki la pynpaw ia ka jingsngewkhia halor ki huri hura hapdeng ki para bangeit hapoh katei ka Balang Presbyterian Umrandairy bad kaba la poi syndon haduh u pud ba wat ia I khunlung ba dang shu kha, pynban la shah kyntait ban tep hapoh u Lum Jingtep ka Balang.Ka nongrim kaba la pynsngewkhia eh ia kitei kiba haiing jong itei u khunglung, ka la ba wat tang ban tep ia ka metiap jong itei I khunlung, la hap ban hiar da ki heh Magistrate bad pulit, kiba la iakren halor katei ka jingbym iohtep itei I khunlung bad dei haduh ban da kut katei ka jingiakren, ki sa pyntip pat sha katei ka longiing da kaba phah da ka jingthoh sha katei ka iing, na ka bynta ban ioh tep ia itei I khunlung.Haba pyrshang ban wad jingtip na u Rangbah shnong ka Umrandairy, u Bah L.M Bina, u la ong ba ka shnong, ki la pyrshang ban don ka jingsngew halor katei ka jingjia, hynrei katei ka longiing kaba la kynduh ia katei ka jingjia kaba sngewsih, hynrei ki la shu iohsngew ba katei kawei pat ka kynhun na kajuh ka balang, ka la khang ban tep ia itei khunlung bad namar katei ka jingkhang, la poi ka jingiakren shaduh ka thanad ha Umsning.U la ong ruh ba kum u rangbah shnong, u la ai jingmut ia katei ka longiing ba kin tep noh hapoh u Lum Jingtep ka shnong, hynrei halor katei ka jingai jingmut ka shnong, katei ka longiing kaba la kynduh ia katei ka apot, ki la kyntait ia katei ka jingtyrwa ka shnong, namar ki kwah ban tep hapoh u lum jingtep ka shnong.Namarkata, hadien katei ka jingkyntait da katei ka longiing, kum u rangbah shnong, nga la ai jingmut ia katei ka longiing ba lada ki kwah ban tep hapoh u Lum Jingtep balang, ba ki dei ban thoh da kawei ka shithi sha katei ka Balang, khnang ba ka shnong bad katei ka balang kin ioh ban iakren, u la bynrap.Kumta hadien katei ka jingiakren, ka la don ka jingiamynjur lang hapdeng ki bor distrik, ki nongialam shnong bad kiwei, kiba la ailad ban tep noh ia itei I khunlung hapoh u Lum Jingtep ka Balang Presbyterian Umrandairy.Wat pynmih khubor khlem datip bha ia kadaw ko Rupang.
