Man ki khubor jong phi nga iohi ba ki babun hi dei ki khubor ba shu pynmih khlem da tih bniah iaka jingshisha bad iaka daw bad kiba bun ki khubor jong u Rupang ki lah ban ialam bakla iaki nongpuleKaba nyngkong shwa ban kren phi hap ban da tohkit bniah phi ruh mano ba phah? Ia kane ka khubor. Khlem da tip ia jingshisha ioh don da kiba phah pat hap rm ban pynmih . Ka pap ka sah ha ki ba phahNa kane kein ka daw nga ong wat juh kylla niam kristan.Lada dei kane ka long iing ka long niam khasi kane ka jingjia kam ym jia kumne kaba sngewlehrain.Haka jingiap baroh u briew u long kumjuh hynrei phewse ka jia kumne pynbanKa long kaba bakla ban shu pynksan bad iaroh da lade ia lade. Ym don ba lah ban ai syrnod da lade ia lade. Bad ka shu long kumta hi u briew u don la ki jingeh ha ka long briew manbriew, namar ka jingeh bad ki jingbakla ka dei hi kaba ju ia jan bad ka longbriew man briew.
title: Ba huri hura hapdeng ki para bangeit ka Balang Presbyterian, shem jingeh  ban tep ia I khunlung ba dang shu kha

content: Nongpoh:Ki la don shibun ngut ki longkmie na ki shnong bapher bapher ka thain Umsning, ki la leit ban synran ia uwei u bar jylla, uba dei ruh u nongtrei ka Bandhan Company, uba la shah rah ha ki Pulit ka Umsning, kata hadien ba ki dkhot ka RBYF, ki la bat ia u ha ka por ba u la rung sha kawei ka iing, kaba don ha shnong Syad-Rit kaba don ha Umsning.Ka khana halor katei ka jingjia, la ong ba ha katei ka por ba ki dkhot ka RBYF lem bad ki nongialam ka shnong Syad-rit, ki la leit ban wad jingtip na katei ka iing halor ka jingleit utei u bar jylla sha katei ka iing, kynsan kynsan la mih kawei ka longkmie bad kaba la wan hakhmat hakhmat, kaba la iada ia utei u bar jylla, kaba la kren tohmet ia kitei ki dkhot ka RBYF bad Nongialan shnong bad kaba la ong ruh ba lada ki donkam eiei ban kylli na u, ha kaba lada ki don ia kino kino ki jingkylli, ki lah ban kylli na ka ym na utei u bar jylla bad katei ka jingleh da katei ka longkmie, ka la pynbitar eh ia ki dkhot ka RBYF bad ia ki nongialam shnong ka Syad-rit, namar kim iohlad wad tang ban kylli na utei u bar jylla.Haba ki iohlad shuh ban kylli na ei u wan bad shaei u leit, ki dkhot ka RBYF bad nongialam shnong ka Syad-rit, ki la pyntip noh mar mar sha ki Pulit ka Umsning Police Station bad kaba la pynlong ruh ia ki Pulit ka Umsning, ba ki leit sei ia itei u bar jylla na katei ka iing bad rah ia u sha Thanad.Hynrei haba utei u bar jylla, u la poi ha Thanad Umsning, ki la don shibun ngut ki longkmie na ka thain Umsning, ki la leit ban synran ia utei u bar jylla sha katei ka thanad bad kiba la byrngem ban ujor Ejahar kylla ia kitei ki dkhot ka RBYF.Tang mar ia tip halor katei ka jingbyrngem ki Longkmie, kitei ki RBYF ki la leit mar mar sha katei ka thanad ban leit wad jingtip bad ruh ban leit pan jingpynshai halor katei ka jingbyrngem ujor Ejahar da kitei ki Longkmie, hynrei haba kitei ki dkhot ka RBYF, ki la poi ha katei ka jaka, ki la leit ban rung sha ka kamra treikam u Offcer In-charge bad ka jingiakren kaba neh la kham slem, ka la poi noh sha u pud ka jingiasngewthuh jingmut bad ym shem la don shuh kata ka Ejahar pyrshah ia ki dkhot ka RBYF.Haba iadei bad katei ka jingjia, u Bah Phrangsngi Kylla, u la ong ba ka nongrim kaba la pynlong ia ka seng ba kan bat bad ban kylli pyrthew ia utei u bar jylla, ka dei namar ba kim tip ba u dei uba naei, ha kaba ka seng hi ka sngew ba kam long kaba bha, ba ki briew kiba nabar kin rung kin mih katba mon sha ki shnong ki thaw, katno tam ba utei u briew uba dei u bar jylla bad uba la wan ruh da kawei ka thuk thuk, kaba don ia u registration number na Assam.Haba iathuh halor ka jingiakren bad utei u Pulit ka Umsning, utei u nongialam ka RBYF, u la ong ba ka seng ka kyntu ia ki nongtrei ka Bandhan Company, ba kim dei ban leit rung sha kiwei kiwei ki shnong, namar ha kaba kum kane ka por, ka dei ka por ba ki briew ki tieng bha ban wan ki briew kiba nabar bad khamatam eh ia ki bar jylla.
title: Synran ki longkmie Umsning ia  u bar jylla,  ba pynher krad ka RBYF

content: Shillong: Myn shisngi mynmiet jong ka 12 tarik u Naitung, ka surok bah National Highway 127 B na Nongstoin sha Rongjeng ka la twa bad paid kynsan kynsan na ki bynta ba hapdeng jong ka surok kaba la buh jingma ruh ia ki paidbah kiba leit ba wan lyngba kane ka surok.Katkum ka jing iathuh jong u bah M. Dhar S.E PWD (R) Western Circle, u la ong ba katei ka jing orpait bad twa jong katei ka surok ka dei hapoh ka shnong Nongshram Ading ha shwa ban poi ha pdeng shnong Nongshram West Khasi Hills District.Shuh shuh u la iathuh ruh ba katei ka jingtwa ka la pynlong ruh ia katei ka bynta jong ka surok ba kan ngam noh kumba 1 phut shiteng bad ka jingshahktah ka la kot kumba 50 meter eiei, hynrei u la ong pat ba ki kali ki dang lah ban iaid ban ieng bad na ka liang jong ka tnad ka la pyrshang ban iarap ban maramot ia katei ka surok.Ha kaba iadei bad katei ka jiongjia u bah Dhar, u la ong ba ia ka daw jong ka jingpait bad jingtwa ym shym la lah ban tip bad u la iathuh ruh ba ka la don lypa ka dak jong ka jingpait ha katei ka surok kaba la jia mynta la kumba 1 taiew eiei bad lehse ka lah ban dei ruh namar ka jingjur u slap, kaba la pynlong ia katei ka jingpait jong ka surok.Ha kaba iadei bad kane ka bynta u la phah ia ka kaiphod sha u C.E ka National Highway ba kin leh ia kaba donkam.U la iathuh ruh ba nalor kane, ki la don ruh ki jingtwa khyndew ha kiba bun ki bynta jong katei ka surok bad na ka liang jong ka ophis kala pynkhuid noh khnang ba kan ym don kano kano ka jingthut ha ka leit ka wan jong ki paidbah.
title: Twa jur ka surok bah ban  leit Nongstoin sha Rongjeng

content: Nongpoh: Ka District Magistrate jong ka Ri Bhoi District, hynnin ka sngi ka la pynjari da ka (lockdown) bad ruh da ka kyndon 144 CrPC ha kiba bun tylli ki shnong khappud kiba don ha ki jaka bapher bapher hapdeng ka Meghalaya-Assam.Katei ka Lockdown, ka la naduh ka por 6 baje mynstep jong ka 13 tarik mynta u bnai bad kan kut haduh ka steo 6 baje mynstep jong ka 20 tarik mynta u Bnai.Ki shnong kiba shah kynthup ha katei ka Lockdown, ki kynthup ia ka thain Byrnihat, thain Khanapara, thain Jorabat- Baridua, Ampatama, Umshru, Sukhoinijira, Iewmawroh, Bakhlapara, Hawla, Jimbrigoan, Lyngkhung, Patgaon, Umsen, Jyrmang, Bernongsai Nongkhlaw, Bernongsai Nongspung, Umsaliang, Gunapati, Mairapur, Nongkyllang, Ranijirang, Umshalani, Ranibari, Balakhawa, New Balakhawa, Bilpara, Halher, Akhoinijira, Garobhanga bad ka shnong Ulubari.Nalor katei ka jingkhangdam, ka DM ka Ri Bhoi, ka la kyntu ruh ia ki paidbah ba kin kiar na ka jingialang briew kaba palat ia ka san ngut ha ki jaka paidbah lait noh ha ki ing ki sem shimet, la khang ruh ia ka jingmih bad jingiaid jingieng jong ki briew, ka jingiaid jong ki kali kamai bad kali shimet ruh kumjuh bad ruh la khang pyrshah ban plie ia ki iew ki hat bad ki jaka kamai kajih bad jingbiah pathar ha ki jaka paidbah. La buh ruh ki kyndon haba don kano kano ka jingiap briew, yn shah tang hapoh 20 ngut ki briew ban pyndep ia ka jingleh niam leh rukom bad leit ontep.Lada don kino kino ki jingdonkam kyrkieh kaba ki paidbah ki donkam khamtam ha ka pang ka shitom ki lah ban aplai ia ka car pass da kaba leit ha ka website jong ka Ri Bhoi District kaba dei www.ribhoi.gov.in.
title: Da ka ‘Lockdown’ pynjari  ha kiba  bun ki shnong khappud bad ka Assam

content: Nongpoh: Ki nongialam ka Dorbar Shnong Umniuh Khwan lem bad ki nongialam ka HANM Umiam Circle, myn hynnin ka sngi ki la leit ban ujor sha ka Deputy Commissioner Ri Bhoi, na ka bynta ban pyn paw ia ka jing pyrshah kaba jur, halor ka jingai jingbit ia ki ar tylli ki longiing ban pynlong ia ka jingkhawai kyntiew shongkurim hapoh ka Ri Kynjai Resort, ka Resort kaba don hapoh katei ka shnong.Kiba la donlang ha katei ka sngi ban ujor sha ka DC, ki kynthup ia u Bah u Bah Albert Lyngdoh, Secretary Shnong, ka Umniuh Khwan, nangta u Bah Biang Sad, President ka HANM Umiam Circle bad u Bah Pateng Myrsing President ka HANM, Ri Bhoi Unit, ha kaba ki la leit ban kynduh DC ha ryngkat ka jingthoh, kaba ki la pynpaw ia ka jingpyrshah kaba jur halor katei ka jingai jingbit ban pynlong ia katei ka jingkhawai shongkurim ha katei ka Resort.Haba iadei bad katei ka jingleit kynduh DC, u Bah Albert Lyngdoh, u la ong ba ka Dorbar Shnong hadien ka jingioh jingtip halor ka jingkyntiew kurim jong ki ar tylli ki longiing, ki la ioh jingbit ban pynlong hapoh ka Ri Kynjai Resort ha ka 16 bad 25 tarik mynta u bnai, kumta ka Dorbar shnong, ka la shim ia ka rai ban buh beit ia ka jingpyrshah, namar ki tieng ioh ba katei ka jingiathoh kan long kum kaei kaba la jia hapoh ka Greenwood Resort Khanapara, Assam.Ha kajuh ka sur, na ka liang kitei ki nongialam shnong bad kumjuh ruh na ki nongialam sengbhalang, ki la shim ia ka rai ba da lei lei kim ym ailad ia kiba kum kitei ki kam sngewbha ha kaba kum kane ka por bad ki la shim ruh ia rai ban ieng rangbah na ka bynta ban pyrshah beit, namar kim kwah ba sa shisien ki paidbah kin iakynduh jingeh biang sha shisien, kumba la ka jia ha katei ka jingiathoh shongkurim ha Greenwood Resort.
title: Kynduh DC ki HANM bad ki  Umniuh  Khwan ban  iathoh  ha Ri Kynjai Resort

content: Shillong:Ka Synjuk ki Nongsynshar Shnong ka Bri U Hynniewtrep (SNSBH), ka la phah da ka jingthoh mynta ka sngi, sha U Director, NEIGHRIMS, Shillong bad ha katei ka jingthoh la pynsngew halor ka jing donkam ban ai ia ka jaka sah kyrpang ia kito ki nongtrei kiba sumar ia ki shipai bad kiba don mynta ha ka orthopaedic ward lane ha kiwei kiwei ki jaka kiba sumar ia kiba pang covid 19.La pynsngew ba katei ka long kaba donkam, namar ba ki don ki nongtrei kiba sah ha ki iing wai ba ki hap ban ia leit shabar lang lane ba kim don ki jaka shong jaka sah kiba biang.La ong shuh shuh, ba lada jia ba ka don ka jingdawa jong ka kam, ha ki sngi ki ban sa wan, kumta kan donkam ia ka jaka kaba biang, ba ki nongtrei kin ioh ban sah kyrpang bad lada jia ba ka jingpang ka nang kiew, kumta ka leit ka wan jongki sha la iing, kan buh ia ka jingma kaba khraw.La ai jingmut shuh shuh, ba lada don ki nongpang, kiba dang leit shah sumar thymmai, kumta ki bor hospital, ki dei ban pynsah kyrpang shwa ia kitei ki nongpang, ba kan nym mih kano kano ka jing ia bit jingpang sha kiwei pat.Ka SNSBH, ka ai ruh ia ka jing ai khublei ia ka dorbar Shnong Mawkasiang, ha kaba la shim wai ia ki lai tylli ki iing sah miet, na ka bynta ban pynsah ia ki 47 ngut ki nongtrei jong ka NEIGHRIMS, kiba la dep pyllait da ka hospital, ba kin leit sah kyrpang sha la iing bad kiba dei ruh ki nong shong shnong hi jong ka Mawkasiang, pynkut ka kyrwoh na U bah RL Blah, General Secretary, SNSBH.
title: 47 ngut ki nongtrei ka NEIGHRIMS, sumar ei ka  Mawkasiang

content: Nongpoh: Ha ka rta kaba 50 snem, kawei ka Longkmie kaba la tip kyrteng kum ka Kong Lakyntiew Syiemlieh na ka shnong Lumumpih Umsning, Ri Bhoi, ka la lah ban pyndep ia ka Klas XII Arts, na Balawan Kolej haka result bala pynbna daka MBOSE myn hynnin ka sngi.Khyndiat sha phang katei ka Long kmie, la ong ba ka la pep skul naduh u snem 1988 ha ka Klas X na ka Laitumkhrah Presbyterian School, hynrei namar ka jingangnud ban pyndep ia ka jingpule, katei ka Longkmie ka la sdang biang ka jingpule da kaba bteng ia ka Klas X ha ka skul NIOS ha Umsning, kaba dei ka skul miet tad haduh ba ka la lah ban pyndep ia ka Klas X lyngba ka NIOS bad mynta ka la lah ban pyndep ia ka Klas XII Arts ha ka 3rd Position na ka Balawan Kolej, Umsning.Katei ka Longkmie, kaba la don 4 ngut ki khun bad 2 ngut ki ksiew, ka dei ruh ka nonghikai ha ka Persara UP School, Umsning Lumumpih, ha kaba la ong ruh ba ka daw kaba hakhmat eh ba ka la hap ban pyndep ia ka jingpule, ka long ban iohlong kum kawei na ki nonghikai kaba biang, khnang ba kan nanglah shuh shuh ban ai ka jinghikai kaba biang ia ki khynnah ha katei ka skul.Katei ka Longkmie, ka don ruh ka thong ban pyndep haduh ka kyrdan BA bad ban shim ia ka sobjek Khasi kum ka Honour, khnang ba yn nanglah shuh shuh ban nangkyntiew ia ka ktien Khasi bad khamtam eh ba katei ka Longkmie, ka sei kaba sngewtynnad eh ha ka kam thoh poitri.Haba iadei bad ka jinglah katei ka Longkmie ban pyndep ia ka jingpule ba 12, ka la phah ruh ia ka khubor sha kiwei pat ki khun samla ha ka Distrik bad jylla, ba kim dei ban duh mynsiem, hynrei ki dei ban don ia ka mynsiem trei shitom ha ki jingpule ne ha kano kano ka kam kaba ki trei bad ka jingtrei shitom bad ka jinglen lade ka dei kawei na ka kam kaba ki lah ban kiew shaphrang ne ban poi sha ka thong jong ka jingjop.
title: Ha ka rta kaba 50 snem pyndep Class 12, kawei ka Longkmie na Lumumpih Umsning

content: Ban wad ia ka jingstad kam shong eh ha ka jingheh/jingrit karta, hynrei ka shong ha ka jingtrei shitom bad ha ka mon ba jwat. Ka long ka khubor ba phylla bad kaba pynkyndit shisha ia nga kumjuh ruh ia kiba bun ba lang bad ka long ruh ka khubor kaba ngam pat ju ioh sngew koit mynno mynno naduh ba nga dang khynnah haduh mynta ba nga la heh la san hangne ha pyrthei ban ioh sngew ba pass klas 12 i longkmie ba 50 snem karta bad i ba la don khun la ki khun ki kti bad kumjuh ia ki khun ksiew.Kane ka lah ban long ba i kong Lakyntiew Syiemlieh i dei i wei na ki longkmie ba nyngkong eh ha ri Khasi wat ha ka pyrthei baroh kawei i ban thaw ia kane rekod ban pynsah jingkynmaw ia kiba bun ba lang khamtam eh ia u paid ka ri Khasi. Haba nga pyrshang ban puson ia ka rukom leit pule i kong Lakyntiew Syiemlieh ngam lah shemphang satia, kumno i lap ban leit sha college haba la don la ki khun ki kti, baroh baroh ki longkmie wat kiba dang kham lung ka karta ki ju ong haba la don la ki khun ki kti ka la eh ban bteng ia ka jingpule. Hynrei kumno pat i kong Syiemlieh i lah ban pyndep kat ia kane ka kam? Nga pyrkhat sa ka shet ka tiew ka kam iing kam sem katkum ka kamram kmie katno kaba khia, hynrei i dang lah ban pyndep hok ia kane ka jingpule. Nga la shu sah ha jinglyngngoh shisha ban puson shaphang kane ka rukom long jong i. Khamtam ba ka khlieh jong i kam ia dei shuh ba in pynlut por ha ka jingpule lada ia kren kat kum karta namar ba la sdang sa ka noh sha ka jinglong tymmen.Hooid watla im lah ban pass ha ki kyrdan ba kham sha khmat hynrei ka la long pat ka burom bah bakhraw shisha ia i bad ia ka iing ka sem jong i ia ka shnong ka thaw ruh kumjuh, haba ia nujor bad kiwei kiwei ki samla. Tengteng don bun ki Samla ba dang iohlad ban shu pule bad pynlut por beit ha ki jingpule ruh ki dang sah klas hynrei ma i pat i ioh ban kheit ia u soh bakmen wat hapdeng ka jingialeh ba hap iaid ia ki jingeh. Dei hangne ba ong ka ktien, ki ba jop ki ju sngewtynnad ban ong ka long kaba eh ban ialeh, hynrei kiba rem ki ju sngewtynnad ban ong ka long kaba suk.Ka jinglong shlur bad ka jingtrei shitom i Kong Syiemlieh ka la long kum ki khlur kiba tyngshaiñ khrik khrik ha sahit bneng mynmiet ba pynshai sha ka pyrthei, haba kiwei ki peit ki ioh ia ka nuksa ka jingshai thaba jong phi ba phi la pyni. Namar phi la long kum u Mawlynnai u bym lip ki rong wat haba u la sah slem, bad kumta bun kin ikwah ia u tangba ka dor jong u ka long kaba rem pat ban thied. Kumta na ka liang ka shnong, ka College ka la dei ban pynkup burom kyrpang ia ka jinglong shlur jong i bad ia ka nuksa ba bha tam jong i ba ki Samla kin ioh lem ia ka dienjat ka jingtrei shitom jong i.Kumta na ka liang jong nga ruh nga phah lem ia kane ka jingkhublei kyrkhu kyrdoh ia phi Kong kum ka dak ka jingiakyrshan lem ia ki jingtrei minot jong phi. To U Blei ka jingsuk un longryngkat bad phi Kong Lakyntiew Syiemlieh, ba phin nang ioh ka met ba koit ba khiah kumjuh ia ka iing ka sem jong phi baroh. Ba phin nanglah ruh ban nangiai trei shitom shuh shuh ha ka jingpule jong phi bad ha ki kam ki jam jong phi baroh bad ba phin nang kynmaw ruh ia la U Nongthaw.Khublei shibun
title: La dei ban pynkup da ka khusnam RIEWSHLUR ia i Kong LAKYNTIEW SYIEMLIEH

content: Ka sorkar Jylla mynta la bun taiew, ka la dep pyllait ia ka pakhang shnong bad ka la bthah ia ki nongtrei ophis, ba kin sdang ia leit sha la ki jong ki jong ki kam, hynrei kaba sngewsih, ka long ba ki nongtrei ophis, ki don kiba leit trei shisngi, ki pep noh 4 sngi, (nalor ba ki trei tang san sngi ha ka shi taiew) bad haba ki leh kumne, ka jingleit trei, ka long noh, kaba shu leit trei myllen bad ki kam ki duk, kim iaid satia.Bun kiba leit donkam ha baroh ki ophis sorkar, ki la shu leit kai ha kine ki sngi. Nalor ba ban ioh rung ruh ka eh tasam, ba hab shah siat shwa na shyllang, nangta hap sait kti, da ki phew sien, haduh ba la sma jyreh ban sma ruh, hynrei kaba sngew jlep hi shoin, ba kiba bun ki miej ki thylli bad haba thylli ki miej, kiwei lei kiba don, ki shu jubab pynstet bad kyrngah khlieh, da kaba ong ban sa wan ha kawei pat ka sngi bad haba ka long ha kane ka dur, ka pyni, ba mynta u snem, ki kam jong ki paidbah, kin shu sahkut lut khoit ha ki ophis.Ka sorkar Jylla, ka la dei ban pynlong noh mardor, namarkata ia ka training covid ba kyrpang, ia ki nongtrei ophis baroh bad kata ka long, ba uno uno uba don ha ka ophis treikam, u dei ban leh lut khoit ia ki kam jong kito kiba pep bad u dei ban leit trei dangstep bad ban mih ruh ynda miet bad lada ka long kumta, ki kam kin iaid beit kumba iaid ki Bank, ha kaba lada u pep, uwei ne ar, hynrei kiba sei bad kiba thep pisa, kim wit satia.Kata ka dei kaba ngi iakren ia ki ophis sor, hynrei lada iakren lei ia ki ophis ha ki District lane ki nongkyndong, ka la shu long beit, ba mynta la lai bnai tam ne duna, ki la shu khang dam beit bad lada don briew eh, u lah ban don tang u chowkidar bad katei ka dei ka phang, kaba ka sorkar Jylla, kan hap ban pynbeit noh mardor.Katba ka jia, ngi hap ban sngewthuh ba kine ki dei ki sngi kiba slem bha, ba ngin iakhun ia kane ka jingma jong kane ka khlam corona bad kumta, lada ki nongtrei ophis, ki ialehkai ha kane ka dur, da kaba leit trei shi sngi bad pep saw sngi, kumta katei ka la pynsuk shi katdei ia ki, hynrei kan pyni noh pynban, ba kitei kim dei ki ophis paidbah, hynrei kin dei tang ki jaka ai kam ia ki riew khlem kam bad hangta ki paidbah, kiba don shibun ki kam ban pyndep, ha kitei ki ophis sorkar, kin hap ban shah shitom, haduh ban da wan syndon u snem thymmai 2021.
title: Thylli ki ophis sorkar, ki iap ki paidbah

content: Shillong: Na ki shiphew ngut, kiba leit sha ka jing iathoh ha Greenwood Resort, ha Guwahati, ki ioh jingpang khlam covid 19, hynnin ka sngi.U Dr Aman War, Director Health Services (MI), u iathuh ba ki don 104 ngut kiba iajan bad kitei ki nongleit iathoh bad haba la test, la lap ia kitei ki 10ngut kiba don ia ka khlam covid 19.La iathuh ruh ba kitei kiba wan iathoh, ynda ki la wan phai na Guwahati, ki la shang kylleng kylleng ki bynta jong ka nongbah Shillong.Ki lad khubor, ki iathuh shuh ba ha ka jing test jong ki doktor, hynnin ka sngi, ki don 78 ngut kiba don jingpang covid 19 bad ia kitei yn sa test biang, mynta ka sngi hat majai, ban nang pyn thikna, la ki don ne em ia katei ka jingpang khlam.Ki doktor, ki dang wad ia kito kiba lah ban don jingpang, ha ka thain Lady Keane, Laban, Pynthorbah, Bishnupur, Demseiniong bad Mawprem.Baroh kiba ioh pang Covid 19, haduh mynta ka sngi, ki long 324 ngut bad kiba la jem ki long 46 ngut bad kumta kiba dang don ha ka jingshah sumar, ki long 276 ngut bad ha East Khasi Hills, ki don 242 ngut.
title: Shiphew ngut na kiba wan iathoh ha Guwahati, ki ioh pang khlam covid 19

content: U KP Sharma Oli, myntri rangbahduh ka Nepal, ula pynmih ia ka jing kynthoh kaba kham pher, haba u kam mynta ka sngi, ba ka Ayodhya, kam don satia ha India, hynrei ka don ha Nepal.“U Lord Ram u dei U Nepali, um dei u nong India” ong ka ANI, haba shim halor ka jingthoh kaba mih mynta ka sngi ha ki kotkhubor ha Nepal.U Oli, u iathuh ba ka jaka ba la kha ia U Ram, kam dei ha Aydohya, hynrei ka dei hajan Balmiki Ashram ha Nepal.“Haduh mynta, ngi dang don ha ka jingngeit ia U Ram, uba la ia poi kha bad ka Sita, kaba dei na India, hynrei u, u dei u Nepali” ong U Oli.Ngeit ne phim ngeit ba ki khasi ki dei kiba l ah kha na kawei ka syiem kaba na middle east. Jubab ka dei ne kam dei. Nga te nga lah ioh pule ia kawei ka kot kaba iathuh naei ki khasi ki wan bad kaei ka ba lah kha ia ki.Nga ruh nga la bna kumta kein. Nga dang kwah ban ioh jngtip kaba shisha te lada ka don ka kot ba thoh ia kata sa iathuh lem mo.
title: U blei Ram, um dei u nong India, dei u Nepali

content: : U Director jong ka NEIGRIHMS hospital, u Dr P. Battacharya u iathuh ba ka nurse kaba shah ktah ha ka jingpang Covid-19 kam dei kaba ia bit na u shipai BSF u ba la test Covid ha NEIGRIHMS hospital.Haba iakren bad ki lad pathai khubor u Dr Battacharya, u la pynshai ba ka jingioh covid jong kawei ka nurse ha NEIGRIHMS hospital, yn ym lah ban ong ba dei na kane ka Hospital, namar ba ka khlem trei ne iajan bad ka kamra ba thiah pang u shipai BSF.U la ong ruh ba ka jingioh Covid jong kane ka nurse ka lah ban long na ka jaka ba ka sah ha Demseiniong bad na ka liang ka NEIGRIHMS hospital kin dang wad ia ka thymmei ba kane ka nurse ka bit ia ka jingpang.U la iathuh ruh ba ha NEIGRIHMS hospital, mynta ki don 13 ngut kiba pang Covid -19 kynthup ia ki 2 ngut kiba la test positive mynta ka sngi.Na kine ki 13 ngut kiba la test positive, ki  hynriew ngut ki dei ki High Risk contact jong u shipai BSF, 4 ngut ki dei ki nongap pang bad 2 ngut ki dei kiba thiah pang ha kajuh ka kamra bad u Shipai BSF.Katba 2 ngut ki dei kiba wan ban thiah pang kynthup ia u shipai BSF, 4 ngut ki dei ki ba la lap lyngba ka screening bad kawei ka dei ka nurse.U la iathuh ba ki High risk Contact jong u ne u shipai ki don 30 ngut bad na kine 24 ngut ki long negative bad 6 ngut, ki long positive mynta ka Sngi.
title: Ka nurse ba test covid na NEIGRIHMS kam dei kaba bit na u BSF, lah ban dei na Demseiniong

content: Shillong: Na ka jinglong jingman ha kine ki sngi, ha ka Jylla baroh kawei, namar ka khlam Covid 19, kumta ka Meghalaya State Commission for Women, ka pyntip paidbah ba kito kiba la shah khot hajir ha ka 16 bad 23tarik Naitung 2020, kin shim ba la pynkynriah noh ha kitei ki ar sngi, haduh ban da pynbeit da kumwei pat kham hadien.
title: Buhteng ka Women Commission, ia ka jingkhot hajir

content: Shillong: U myntri ba dei peit ia ka tnad ka koit ka khiah, ka sorkar Jylla, u bah Alexander L Hek u la iathuh ba mynta ka sngi, ki don 12 ngut ki briew kiba la test Covid -19 bad na kine 10 ngut ki dei ki Shipai BSF bad 2 ngut ha NEIGRIHMS hospital. Haduh mynta, ha ka jylla ki briew kiba don ia ka jingpang Covid-19 ki long 271ngut.Ha East Khasi Hills District na ki 236 ngut, 182 ki dei ki Shipai BSF 2 ngut ki Shipai Air Force bad ki riew paidbah 52 ngut. Ha Ri-Bhoi District ki don 20 ngut, ha East Jaintia Hills District 2 ngut,ha west Garo Hills District 9 ngut,South Garo Hills District 2 ngut ha East Garo Hills District uwei bad ha North Garo Hills District uwei. Ki briew kiba la koit ki long 46 ngut.U la iathuh ruh na ki 52 ngut ki riew paidbah ha East Khasi Hills District kiba don ia ka jingpang Covid -19; ki 8 ngut kiba la test positive ki dei ki high risk Contact jong ki 2 ngut ki briew, kiba leit ban shim bynta ha ka jingkhawai iathoh shongkurim ha Greenwood resort khanapara, Assam.U iathuh ruh ba ki don sa 104 ngut ki briew kiba iakynduh bad ki 2 ngut kiba long positive, hadien ba ki la wan shim bynta ha ka jingkhawai iathoh shong kurim ha Assam bad ia kitei la dep ban leh test, ha kaba baroh ki long negative.
title: Kiew kiba ioh pang Covid 19 ha ka Jylla, sha ka 271 ngut

content: Shillong: Ka Deputy Commissioner jong ka East Khasi Hills, Shillong, ka la ujor da ka ejahar pyrshah ia ki 41 ngut kiba leit sha ka jing ia thoh shong kurim, ha Greenwood Resort, ha Guwahati.La ujor ejahar ia kitei ki 41 ngut ha Sardar Police station, ha ki kyndon jong ka Disaster Management Act, Epidemic Diseases Act bad Meghalaya Epidemic Diseases Covid Regulation 2020.Lah ban pynkynmaw, ba katei ka jing iathoh, ka la long ha ka 27tarik Naitung 2020 ha Greenwood Resort bad hadien kata, ka la don biang kajuh katei ka jing khawai iathoh sa ha ka 2tarik Naitung 2020 ha Shillong.
title: Ujor ejahar ka DC, ia 41 ngut kiba leit iathoh sha Guwahati

content: Shillong: Mynta ka sngi, ka la don ka jing orpait kaba heh bha ha ka surok, National Highway 44 E,  kaba leit na Nongstoin sha Tura.Katei ka jingjia, ka dei hajan Nongchram, jong ka thain Shallang. La khmih lynti ba katei ka jing orpait jong katei ka surok, ka dei na ka jingslap kaba jur shi katdei ha kine ki sngi, ha katei ka thain.
title: Or pait ka surok, kaba leit na Nongstoin sha Tura

content: 80 ngut ki  dap million, ki pynsngew sha ki sorkar ha satlak pyrthei, ba kin dain kuna kaba heh na ki, na ka bynta ban wan rah biang ia ka ioh ka kot jong u paidlang ha ka pyrthei hi baroh kawei, na ka daw jong kane ka khlam  coronavirus.Ha ka shithi kaba la pynmih paidbah mynta ka sngi, kitei ki dap million jong ka pyrthei, ki thaw ia ka kynhun, kaba ong  “Millionaires for Humanity”, lane ki dap million ban iarap ia ki paidbah, ki la ai jingmut sha ki sorkar ha satlak pyrthei, ban dain na ki, ia ka khajna kaba heh, ha kaba ki ong  “immediately, substantially, permanently”.Kiba soi ia katei ka shithi, ki long U Jerry Greenfield, u nongthaw ia ka kompeni Ben and Jerry’s ice cream, U Richard Curtis, uwei na ki nongthoh khana bad U Abigail Disney, u nongthaw phlim bad nangta sa u Stephen Tindall, uba dei u trai jong ka  Sidney Topol and New Zealand, ha kaba katei ka jingthoh ka ong “Na kane ka khlam covid 19 ha ka pyrthei, ki dap million, ki don ia ka bynta kaba kongsan bha ban pynkhiah ia ki jingeh jong ka pyrthei”.Ki ong shuh shuh “Em, ngim dei ma ngi, kiba peit ia ki nongpang ha ki kamra thiah jongki, ngim leit niah ia ki ambulance, ban kit nongpang sha ki hospital, ngim lum ngim lang ia ki tiar biang tiar dih ban leit ai sha man la ki iing briew, hynrei ngi don shibun ka spah. Ka pisa, ka dei kaba donkam bha ha kane ka por bad kan dang iai bteng ban donkam ha ki sem ki ban sa wan, katba ka jing pynkhreh ka long ban weng na kane ka jingpang khlam”.Katei ka dei ka shithi, kaba la pynmih ha shwa ka jingialang jong ki myntri pla pisa jong ki G20 lane ki 20 tylli ki ri ba la kiew ha ka ioh ka kot.
title: Covid:Ngi don kyrhai ka tyngka, dain kuna bun na ngi, ong 80 ngut ki dap million ia ki sorkar ha satlak pyrthei

content: U doktor jong ka  Guwahati Medical College Hospital (GMCH) ha Guwahati, ula khlad noh mynta ka sngi, na ka jingpang khlam  COVID-19.La iathuh ba U  Dr Jahan Iqbal Ahmed, uba dei u associate professor jong ka tnat ophthalmology ha GMCH, ula khlad na katei ka jingpang mynta ka sngi.Utei u dei u doktor, uba 50 snem bad u dei uba shah sumar ha iing lajong bad la iathuh ba ka jingiap jongu, ka dei namar ba um lah shuh ban ring bad pynhiar mynsiem.
title: Trei ka khlam covid, khlad u doktor, ka GMCH ha Guwahati

content: Jowai: Kawei ka long kmie ka la shah pyniap bad la suba jur ba donkti hi u lok uba la bret ruh ia u khun ba dang 7 snem sha wah.Kane ka la jia ha ka shnong Mihmyntdu West Jaintia Hills ha kaba la lap ba katei ka longkmie ba la shah pyndei dei hynne ka step lah Sngi U Blei.Katei ka longkmie kaba la shah pyniap la tip kyrteng kum ka Nimai Phawa bad u lok pat u dei uba la tip kyrteng kum u Fortunate Pala. Katei ka longkmie kadei ruh kaba dang ar bnai i khyllung. Ka don saw ngut ki khun.La iathuh ba hadien ba la bom la shoh ia katei ka longkmie utei u lok u la sdein phasi pat ia ka ban buhrieh ia ka pop kaba u la leh.Hadien kane u la kit pat sa ia la u khun ban leit bret ia u sha kawei ka wah kadon kam pajih na shnong ha khappud Mihmyntdu Khliehtyrshi Jowai Bypass. Hynrei utei u khynnah u la lait im ban iathuh lut kaei kaba la jia ia ka kmie jong u. U la wan poi sha shnong ha ka por 5 baje mynstep hadien ba u la lait im na ka jingiap jyllop.La iathuh shuh shuh ba na ka liang ka bor shnong ka Mihmyntdu ha kine ki khyndiat sngi ka la ujor ejahar pyrshah ia utei u lol jong katei ka longkmie namar ba u la bom la shoh ia ka hynrei hadien la pynbeit bad baroh arngut ki la iapoi biang sha ka jingiasuk.Hynrei mynta ka step pat u la shoh la bom ia ka haduh ba kan da khlad noh.Na ka liang ki pulit ka West Jaintia Hills ki la ujor mukotduma halor kane ka jingjia bad ka jingtohkit ruh ka dang iaid shakhmat.
title: Shah pyniap ka longkmie, suba jur ba donkti u lok, bret ia u khun 7 snem sha wah

content: “Phi mut ban ong kumno?” bniah ka kong Rep.“Em, ka long kumne kein. Da ioh kam hi ka kynthei ka pher sha phi namar ban shu ap na u rangbah kam long kaba suk” pynshai ka khun ka Santa.“Ka da pher bun hi phi. Nga ka kmie ruh nga nud ban pan lada donkam ei ei” ong ka kong Rep.Ka jingiashongkai ka la kham bun khana shuh haba don lang ka khun ka kong Santa. Ka briew kaba lah nang lah stad ka pher na ki bym nang bym stad. Ka khana ka tyllun nawei shawei ha ryngkat hateng hateng ka jingsamrkhie sammut. Teng teng ki ia nang pyndait katkum ka rukom khana. Ka kong Santa lei ka kham nang.“Wat pynslem shuh ma phi ruh la ka khun” dain dain kren ka kong Santa.“Da don te hap ia peit” jubab ka kong Rep.“Oh! kumno kumta kam pat don seh?” bniah biang ka kong Santa.“Da dei ba don te la ithuh ne lah paw hi kein” jubab donakor ka kmie ka Banrilang.“Ong ia ka Thei da poi donburom ho ban wan shad ma ngi” kren biria ka kong Santa bad ka rkhie.“Da kumta lei lei katno kan shongshit bad ka present na phi ruh tharai kaba kat ka present” kren biria kylla ka kong Rep.“Tang ban shu ioh rkhie phi kmie ka Thei” ong ka khun ka Santa.“Hooid, nga sngewthuh. Ha ka jingiakren kwah hi ban ioh rkhie mo” pynphai ktien ka kmie ka Ban.“Ban poi ne ban ioh iathoh kam dei phi kaba suk. Donkam ban iit bha na baroh arliang. Kane ka kam kam dei ka kam leh khunjakai hynrei ban da peit jngai bha” ong ka kmie ka Banrilang.“Ka dei ka dei” mynjur ka Santa ha ka rukom kaba i khiathew.“Khoh biang uto u kwai seh khun” bthah ka Santa ia la ka khun.“Hooid kein nga dang khoh” ong ka khun.“Kum ban shu bteng biang ia kaba la ia kren, mynta ka juk mobai bad internet ym ju slem kano kano ka kam wat ka kam poikha poiman ruh” ong ka kong Santa.“Hooid ha kiba nang hynrei kum ma ngi jakla kumne te ym ia poi pyrthei re” ong ka kong Rep bad ka kner ban shim ia u kwai.“Kine ki khynnah trei jong nga te phi kiba shu ibunkam beit bad kane ka mobai. Ka kam ki trei ha ryngkat ka pyntem jingrwai. Nga ruh ngam ju pynthut tang teng teng ba nga sngewdom nga byrngem. Tang shu lah dep kam lei, kine ha jingthiah ne ne kamra ne ha baranda la ka jinglehkai ‘lodu game’ bad peit youtube. Ia ka mon jong ki briew ym lah ban pynwit ne khang” iathuh ka kong Santa.“Phin ong tang shaei mynta haba la ha sor ne ha nongkyndong ruh lah long kumjuh hi mar ia bat ‘Smart phones’” ong ka khun ka Santa.“Haba la iabeh lut baroh baroh te. Teng-teng ka paw ruh kum ka jingtynneng jubor khamtam ha ki khynnah samla lud. Imat, lada ym don mobai lah sngew kumba duna kaei re kaei ha ka jingim briew mynta” ong ka kong Rep.
title: LA I SHAIONG

content: Ha ka juk bunkam mynta ki por bun ki longkpa kim ju ioh ban pyllait por naka bynta ki khun bad kane ka wanrah iaka jingpra ka iing ka sem bad ka jing iajngai shikpa shikhun.Kum u kpa uba dei u khliehduh jong ka iing, uba peit iaka khia ka shon ha iing bad u ba lah ban kit ia u lumbah ha tyrpeng naka bynta ki khun, phi dei namar kata ban sumar bha iaki bad pyllait kham bun ka por ban ieid bad sngewthuh iaki jingmut jong ki ban lait naki jingkhuslai bad banbor haki jingmut jingpyrkhat jongki khun.Ka jingiadei shikpa shikhun ka iapher bha bak lybak nakiwei pat ki jingiadei ha iing ha sem, ka iapher bha wat bad ka jingiadei bad la u jong u kpa ruh. Ka jinglong kpa ka kham jur ban don ka jingkitkhlieh haba ia nujor bad kiwei pat ki jingkitkhlieh ha ka jingim jongu. U lah ban hikai iaki khun ban long shlur bad burom ialade, u ri bad sumar bha iaki ha kata ka rukom kaba ymlah batai da ki ktien. Hynrei naka jingbunkam palat khamtam ha kane ka juk mynta, teng teng u duh noh iakane ka lad ban sumar bad pyllut por bad ki. Hynrei na ka bynta ka jingbha ka lawei jongki khun phi donkam ban pyrshang da kine ki jing ai jingmut kiba lah ban iarap iaphi ban ioh pyllut por bad ki khun bad ban don ka jingkitkhlieh na ka bynta jongki.Long ne ban shna video ia kane ka khana jong phi…??lada long te ngn shna story da ka video..Ng pan permission na phi.ka long sa shna mo, phin ai ha ngi, ba ngin pynmih ha youtube jongngi?
title: U KPA:Kumno ban long u kpa uba don ka jingkitkhlieh naka bynta ki khun?

content: Shillong: Ha ka result jong ka Higher Secondary School Leaving Certificate Examination, 2020, ha ka sobject Arts, ki don 74.34 percent kiba pass lane 18,039 ngut na ki 24,267 ngut kiba ialeh eksamin.Kiba ialeh regular, na ki 20323 ngut, ki don 16,650 ngut kiba pass lane 81.93 percent.
title: 74.34 percent kiba pass ha ka HSSLC Arts 2020

content: Ha India, kiba ioh pang khlam coronavirus, ki la kiew sa  28,701ngut ha ki 24 kynta ba ladep bad kiba iap, ki don 500ngut.Kumta baroh kiba ioh pang, ki la poi sha ka  8,78,254 bad kiba dang shah sumar ki long  3,01,609 ngut, katba kiba la jem na katei ka jingpang, ki long 5.5lak ngut, katba kiba iap baroh ki la poi sha ka  23,000 ngut.Hynnin ka sngi, ka  World Health Organisation (WHO), ka iathuh ba kito kiba ioh pang ha ki 24 kynta ba ladep, ki long 2,30,370 bad ka jingkiew jong kiba pang, ka dei ha  US, Brazil, India bad ha South Africa.  Kham mynshwa, ka jingkiew ka jur bha, ha ka 10tarik Naitung 2020, ha kaba ki don  2.28 lak ngut, kiba ioh pang ha ka shisngi. Ka jingiap, pat ka long antad 5hajar ngut ha ka shisngi.Mynta baroh kiba ioh pang khlam ha ka pyrthei baroh kawei, ki la pooi sha ka 13 million ngut bad sa 5.7 lak ngut kiba iap bad ka India, ka wan ha ka kyrdan ba lai, ha kaba ki don 8.5 lak ngut kiba ioh pang bad sa 22,000 ngut kiba iap.Ha United States, ka Florida, ka kiew bha, ha ka jingdon kiba ioh pang bad la iathuh ba ha ki 24 kynta ba ladep, ki don 15,000 ngut kiba ioh pang thymmai. Lyngba katei ka jingkhein, ka Florida, ka la tam ia ka New York, kaba kiew haduh 13hajar ngut kiba ioh pang, kaba dei ka sngi, kaba bun tam, kaba la jia ha ka 10tarik Iaiong 2020 bad kaba dei ruh ka por, ba katei ka jingpang khlam ka jubor bha ha katei ka nongbah.
title: Sa 28hajar ngut, kiba ioh pang khlam ha India, baroh ki la poi 9lak duna
Kiba wan ha khmat tam ha ka result jong ka HSSLC Arts 2020

content: Nongpoh: Shi bynta ban pynsngewthuh ia ki paidbah bad khamtam eh ia ki nongshong dukan ha shilynter ka surokbah NH-6 ka thain Nongpoh, ba kumno kin nang ban iada ialade na ka jingpur stet u khniang jingpang COVID-19, hynnin ka sngi Saitjain, ki nongialam ka HYC Nongpoh Circle, ki la mih madan ban leit sngewthuh sha kitei ki nongshong dukan, ba kim dei ban iajan palat bad kito ki briew nabar bad kiba wan thied jingthied na ki dukan jong ki.Haba leit ban pynsngewthuh ia kitei ki nongshong dukan harud surok, ia ka HYC ia ialam da u samla Tony Shylla, General Secretary ka HYC Nongpoh, nangta u Samla Mission Tron, Vice-President ka HYC Nongpoh lem bad kiwei de ki dkhot ka seng.Kitei ki HYC, ki la sdang na shnong Dulongnar, ka jaka kaba bun ki briew kiba nabar ki shait sangeh, nangta sha Mawtnum, Nongpoh, Pahamrioh bad sha Shangbangla, ha kaba ki la pynshai sha kitei ki nongshong dukan ba kim dei ban iajan palat bad ki briew kiba nabar, namar kitei ki dukan kaba ki shong, ki don bun ki nongleit nongwan na kiwei ki jylla kiba sangeh ha kitei ki dukan jong ki.Haba iadei bad katei ka jingleit jurip, u Samla Tony Shylla, u la ong ba ka seng nalor ba ka la dep ban kyntu ha ki lad pathaikhubor, hynrei ka long pat kaba donkam ban leit sha kito kiba shong dukan harud surokbah, ban pynshai sha ki ba kin long kiba husiar, na kaba pynjan palat bad kito ki briew kiba wan na shabar jylla.Namarkata ka seng ka kyntu ia ki paidbah bad ia kitei kiba shong dukan, ba ki dei ban ai ka jingiatreilang bad ka sorkar bad ki dei ban kohnguh ia ki jingbthah ka sorkar, khnang ba ka jingthmu ka sorkar ban khanglad halor ka jingsaphriang u COVID-19, kan long kaba jop.
title: Leit pynsngewthuh ki HYC ia ki nongshong dukan ha shilynter ka surokbah ka thain Nongpoh

content: Shillong: Ka Kong Amethyst Lynda Blah, kaba dei ka trai jong ka Kot khubor U Peitngor ha ka sngi Saitjaiñ ka la pyllait paidbah ïa ka website ha ophis treikam jong ka ha Lachumiere, Shillong.Ha katei ka sngi plie la don ryngkat u editor jong kot khubor U Peitngor u Bah Lamphrangbor Nongspung, katto katne ki dkhot na ka liang ka management bad ki nongtrei.Ka Kong Amethyst kaba dei ruh ka trai jong katei ka website, haba pyllait ka la pynbna ruh ba naduh ka sngi Saitjaiñ ba la pyllait paidbah ïa katei ki paidbah nongpule ki lah ruh ban pule ïa ki khubor na kane ka website, kaba ki lah ban shu type beit www.peitngor.com.Ka jingthmu ba kongsan jong ka jingplie ïa katei ka website ka long ban nang pynïar ïa ka rukom treikam jong U Peitngor, kaba donkam katkum ka jingdawa jong ka por bad ka juk ba mynta.Katei ka long ruh shi bynta ban nang pynphriang shuh shuh ïa ki khubor jong U Peitngor lyngba kane ka juk stad kaba mynta sha kylleng ka satlak ka pyrthei, kaba long ruh ka jingpyrshang ban nang pynkhlaiñ, pynbha bad pynjanai ïa ka jingtreikam na ka bynta ka jingpynkhreh ïa ka lyngkhuh jong ka jingdap 50 snem ne ka Jubili Ksiar jong ka kot khubor ka ban sa rakhe ha u snem 2022.Ha shwa ban plie, uwei napdeng ki nongtrei ba la rim bha jong U Peitngor, ka kot khubor kaba mih manla ka sngi, u Bah Gershom Hat u la pynpaw ba ki la plie teng ïa kum kane ka website ha ki snem ba la leit, hynrei namar bun ki daw bym lah kiar ki khlem lah ban bteng ïa ka.U la pynpaw ruh ïa ka jingkmen kaba khraw ba ki la ïoh ban plie pat ïa katei ka website ka ban ïarap kyntiew bha ïa ka kam Lad Pathai Khubor shwa ba kin ïoh ban rakhe ïa ka jingdap sanphew snem.
title: Pyllait paidbah ka Kong Amethyst ïa ka website jong U Peitngor

content: Khliehriat:Ki ar tylli ki seng ka Southern Border Youth Welfare Association (SBYWA) bad ka Jaintia Youth Federation (JYF-EJHDU) ka la pynpaw ia ka jingsngew diaw halor ka jiingpyllait NOC ka Jaintia Hills Automous District Council (JHADC) ia kawei Coke kaba tip kum ka Unique Industry Coke Factory ha ka 03tarik u bnai Lber 2020 wat ha pdeng ka jingpyrshah jur ki paitbah ia kane ka Coke plant kaba sdang ban tei ha wah Deiñling kaba hap  hapoh u pud u sam jong ki saw shnong kynthup ka chnong Umsatai, Deinsatlang, Ladwahwapung bad ka shnong Pynurkba haba ki paidbah ki la pyrchah jur na ka daw ki waheh shnong jong ki, ki la ai jing mynjur sop sop khlem tip ka Dorbar chnong  haba ki la pynkheiñ ia ka Sanad treikam jong ki.Halor  kane ka rukom pyllait jing mynjur, da ka EC jong u Ma Thambor Shiwat lyngba u Chief Forest Officer, JHADC te kine ki ar seng ki la ong wat  hadien ba ngi la buh ia ka jingujor  ha ka 24-02-20 lyngba ka dorkhas, tangba kane ka EC jong u Ma Thombor ka la ai pynban ia ka NOC ha ka 03-03-20 khlem da ap shuh ia ka sur jong u paidbah khamtam kim kheiñ shuh ia  ka shithi ujor kaba la dep buh ha katei ka tarik, la ong u Samla S. Shadap, President SBYWA.U Bah J. Pala, President JYF-EJHDU u la ong ka seng hadien ba ka la ioh ia ka ujor na ki paitbah haba ka wei ka Coke ka la thmu ban tei  ha wah Deiñling; te na ka liang jong ki,ki la ujor sha u Chief Forest Officer da ka jingthmu ka JHADC kan pyndam noh ban ai  jing mynjur, ia katei ka Coke.Ki paitbah ki la pynpaw ruh  lada kane ka Coke  plant ka don kan  ktah jur  ia ka rep ka riang, ka um bam um dih, ka koit khiah , daw ktah ruh ia ki khynnah skur kiba don shaneng kitei ki shnong bad kiwei de ki kam im jong ki briew ka thaiñ, da ong u S. Dkhar, GS Umsatai Village.Ki ar seng ki la pynrem jur ia ka rukom ai jing mynjur, ka EC hapoh ka jingialam jong u Thombor Shiwat u long u CEM JHADC lyngba ka Forest Department khlem da ap shuh ia ka sur jong u paidbah bad ngi la dawa ban  pyndam  noh ia katei ka NOC jong katei ka Coke bad lada kim ap te yn ia mih paidbah na ka bynta ka iap ka im jong ka jaidbynriew bad ka thain.Hadien ba la dep iakren bad u MDC jong ka Bataw Lakadong Constituency, u la pynpaw ba um shym la ioh jingtip hashwa ban pyllait ia kato ka jing mynjur bad u la ong te un don beit bad ka sur jong u paidbah, lada long ha kano kano dur ruh wat ban mih madan lada pyrshah jur ia ka.
title: Mynjur ka JHADC ia  ka Coke  Factory, wat la pyrshah ki paitbah

content: Nongpoh: Ban sngewthuh ia ka jingeh kaba la iakynduh da ki paidbah kiba sah ha ki shnong khappud (Block-02), u Bah N. Lamare, Superintendent of Police ka Ri Bhoi, u la lum ia bun ngut ki rangbah shnong jong katei ka thain, na ka bynta ban iakren bad ban tip ia ka jingeh jong ki briew kiba sah ha katei ka thain.Lyngba katei ka sngi, utei u heh Pulit ka Ri Bhoi, u la lum da ka jingialang ha Mawlasnai bad lyngba katei ka jingialang kaba la khot da utei u heh Pulit, ki lal don shibun ki rangbah shnong katei ka thain, kiba la wan ban iashim bynta bad ruh kiba la ioh ban pynsngew ia la ki jong ki jingeh, kaba ki paidbah ki iakynduh.Nalor ka jingiakren na ka bynta ban tem ia ki kam runar ruser, utei u Heh Pulit ka Ri Bhoi, u la ai ruh ka jingpynshai sha kitei ki rangbah shnong halor ban wad ia ki lad ki lynti ban iada na ka jingpur stet ka Khlam COVID-19, namar da kaba pynshai sha ki nongialam shnong, kitei nongialam shnong kin sa hikai pat sha ki paidbah ha la ki jong ki jong ki shnong.
title: Ha Mawlasnai lum u SP, ia ki rangbah  shnong ban sngewthuh jingeh ki paidbah

content: Nongpoh: Ki nongialam bad ki dkhot ka FKJGP Sohkhwai Unit lem bad ki RBYF 20Mer Circle, ha ryngkat ka jing iasnohktilang ki Dorbar Shnong na katei ka thain, hynnin ka sngi Saitjain, ki la iamih paidbah na ka bynta ban maramot ia ka surok sniew na surok bah Paham mawlein sha Sohkhwai, kaba don ia ka jingjrong kumba 5 kilometer.Ha katei ka jingmaramot surok, kitei ki sengbhalang ha ryngkat bad ki nongialam shnong, ki la pyndap da ki maw bad khyndew ha ki bynta ba la sniew palat jong katei ka surok, namar ka jingsniew katei ka surok, ka la wanrah jingeh shikatdei eh ia ki paidbah jong kiba bun tylli ki shnong kiba pyndonkam ia katei ka surok.Ki nongialam jong kitei ki ar-seng, kiba kynthup ia u samla Banroy Wahlang na ka FKJGP Umdu Sohkhwai Unit bad u Lan Syngkli na ka RBYF, ki la pynpaw ba kim banse ban mih paidbah na ka bynta ban maramot ia ki bynta ban sniew jong katei ka surok, namar kim lah shuh ban peit ia ka jingshem sohsat da ki paidbah kiba pyndonkam ia katei ka surok, khamtam eh haba iadei bad ka kit ka bah ki mar rep mar riang, ne haba ki don kiba pang ban shitom.
title: Maramot ka FKJGP, RBYF ia ka surok Sohkhwai sha Pahammawlein 20Mer

content: Shillong: Ki lad khubor, ki iathuh ba ka Deputy Commissioner, East Khasi Hills, ka kong Matsiewdor War, ka don mynta ha ka jingshong kyrpang marwei.La iathuh ba ka longkmie, ka sah ha kajuh ka phyllaw, ha kaba u don uwei uba ioh jingpang Covid 19, u sah lang bad utei u dei uba ioh jingpang corona, da kaba u iakynduh bad uwei uba wan sha ka jing iathoh shong kurim ha Khanapara.
title: Shong kyrpang ka DC East Khasi Hills

content: Guwahati: Ki don sa 735 ngut kiba ioh pang khlam coronavirus hynnin ka sngi ha Assam, kumta baroh kiba ioh pang, ki la poi sha ka  16,806 ngut.U Himanta Biswa Sarma, myntri ka koit ka khiah ka sorkar Assam, u thoh ha ka tweet jongu, hynnin ka miet, ba na kitei ki 735 ngut, ki don 400ngut tang ha ka sor bah Guwahati.Kiba dang don ia katei ka jingpang ha Assam, ki la poi mynta sha ka 5,873 ngut bad 10,894 ngut ki la mih na ki jaka sumar bapher ha ka Jylla.
title: Sa 735 ngut kiba ioh pang covid, hynnin ka sngi ha Assam

content: Shillong: Ki riew paidbah ki la phone ban pyntip ba u don u ksai uba la saphriang kylleng ka shnong.Mano ba pynpur lane mano ba pynhap, ki nong shongshnong kim lah ban batai. Hynrei ki ngeit ba dei ka kam ba phylla ba la wan hap na bneng.I nonghikai skul sorkar iba dei shnong trai na katei ka shnong I la phone bad phah ruh ia kine ki dur ha kaba I la iathuh ruh ba ki paidbah jong katei ka shnong ki dap da ka jinglyngngoh kaba khraw.Ia kane ka jingjia kaba phylla, la lap mynta ka step sngi U Blei.Une u ksai u syriem ia u ksai suh juti, hynrei u don da ka rong iong. Une u ksai ia la pur lut ia ka shnong bad ia ki lum ki wah, la iathuh itei I nonghikai skul I bym kwah ban pynpaw kyrteng satia.Ki paidbah baroh ki la dei ban phong Noh Da ki PPE personal protective equipment haba leit jingleit ne shong dukan namar kum ngi tip ba une u khniang jngpang u dei ba ia bit na ka lyer.. kumta Lada dei ba ngi phong Da ka PPE . Kan kham iada na ka jingpur une u khniang. Ki briew khamtam kiba shong Dukan, ki dei ban Suh Ruh Da ka plastic beg ba long kum musari khnang ha ka por dih Sha ne bam ja. Ki lah ban sei bad tap ialade.
title: Wan hap u ksai ba phylla ha baroh kawei ka shnong Suchen, East Jaintia Hills

content: Shillong: Ki don sa 16 ngut kiba ioh pang Covid 19 mynta ka sngi ha ka Jylla,  ong U Dr A War, DHS (MI) ka sorkar Jylla.Haduh mynta ka sngi, kiba ioh pang, ki long baroh 259 bad kitei ki kynthup ia 224 ngut ha East Khasi hills bad ki shipai BSF, ki long 172 ngut, ki shipai Air Force 2 ngut, kiwei pat 50ngut.Ha Ri Bhoi ki don 20 ngut, East Jaintia hills 2 ngut, West Garo Hills 9 ngut, South Garo Hills 2, East Garo Hills 1, North Garo Hills 1 bad kiba la jem ki long 45 ngut.Kiba wan rung sha ka Jylla mynta ka sngi, ki long 152 ngut.
title: Sa 16 ngut kiba ioh pang Covid mynta ka sngi ha ka Jylla

content: Shillong: Ka Sohra hynnin ka sngi, ka la ioh slap uba 265.8mm. Hynnin ka sngi, ka Shillong, ka ioh 49.8mm, katba ka Umiam, ka ioh 27.6mm.Mynta ka sngi, ka Sohra, ka ioh slap 92.4mm, katba ka Shillong, ka ioh 26.4mm bad ka Umiam, ka ioh 15.8mm.Ka tnat peit mariang jong ka sorkar India, ka ai jing maham ba lashai ka sngi, kan don ka jinghap slap kaba jur bha ha ki bynta jong ka Jylla.
title: Ther jur u slap ha Sohra, hynnin ka sngi

content: : U myntri ba dei peit ia ka tnad ka koit ka khiah, u bah Alexander L Hek u la iathuh ba mynta ka sngi  4 ngut ki briew la test COVID-19 Positive bad da ka jingtest covid jong ki 4 ngut ka jylla, ka la kot sha ki  259 ngut ki briew kiba don ia ka jingpang Covid-19 bad ki briew kiba la ioh jingkoit ba pura ki long 45 ngut.U bah AL Hek, u la iathuh ba 4 ngut ki briew ki ba 4 ngut ki briew ki ba la test positive mynta ka sngi, 2 ngut ki dei na Chokpot jong ka South Garo Hills District, uwei na East Garo Hills District bad uwei na North Garo Hills District. Ki briew kiba dang don ia kane ka jingpang ha ka jylla ki long haduh mynta ka sngi ki long 259, ki Shipai BSF 172, ki Shipai Air Force 2 bad ki riewpaidbah  50 ngut.Ha East Khasi Hills District 224, ha Ri Bhoi District 20, ha East Jaintia Hills District 2, ha West Garo Hills District 9, ha East Garo Hills District 1 bad ha North Garo Hills District 1.
title: 4ngut kiba ioh pang khlam corona mynta ka sngi ha ka Jylla

content: U Jisu u kyntu ba kadei ban iai duwai. Shisien u Jisu u la kren ha ki Pharshi ba kadei ia ki briew ban iai duwai. Namar u Jisu ialade ruh u hap ban duwai barabor ha u kpa uba ha Bneng. Ha ka jingduwai ymdei ban man thait shuh, namar ka long ka jing pan, jingkyrpad, jingtip, jingiasaid ha khmat u Blei.Dei halor kane ka nongrim ba u Jisu u la iathuh ha ki pharshi u da ong – “Lada uwei  u nongbishar (Judge) ha kawei ka shnong, u bym ju shepting ia u Blei bad um burom ia u Briew. Ha kata ka shnong ladon kawei ka riew kynthei, bad ka la wan bunsien ha uta u Nongbishar kada ong – to leh hok ia nga (iarap ia nga) halor uta uba ialeh pyrshah ia nga. Kane ka kynthei kala kyrpad bunsien bunsien hynreiu Nongbishar um sngap. Hynrei na kadaw ba kata ka kynthei ka iai kyrpad, khadduh eh uta u nongbishar u la pyrkhat halade dakaba ong – la ngam burom iau Briew ne sheptieng ia u Blei ruh, hynrei ioh ba kata ka kynthei ka wan shiwan pynsngew ia nga, ieh ngan bishar hok noh ia ka, namar nga la sngew kyllut ba ka wan shi wan.U Jisu u ong- sngap kaei kaba u ta u Nongbishar bymhok ula leh !. Hato u Blei un ym bishar hok ia kita kiba la jied jong u? hato u Blei un ym sngew ia kiba lynniar bad kyrpad ia u mynsngi bad mynmiet nalor kata da kaba u iai shah slem bad ki ?. Nga ong ba un bishar hok ia ki kumne kumne ruh. Loukas 18:1-8.Nakata ka daw ka don kam ban duwai bad iai duwai kum ha kine kip or jong kane ka khlam (Corona virus), ngeit ba u Blei un sngew bad un jubab beit kumba ula ong ha ka kitab Khronikl 7:14. “Lada ki briew jong nga kiba la khot da ka kyrteng jong u kin pynrit ialade bad kin duwai, kin wad ia ka khmat jong nga kinphai na ki lynti bymman jong ki: kumta te Ngan sngew na bneng, bad ngan map ia ki pop jong ki NGAN PYNKHIAH IA KA RI JONGKI,,,, 2 Khronikl 7:14.Kumta dei ban duwai jur bad phai noh ia ki lynti bymman, kata kadei ka jingkwah jong u Blei. Aiu de u ong? “Te ki khmat jong nga kin peit, ki shkor jong nga kin sngap ha ka jingduwai”. 2 Khronikl 7:15.To ngin duwai daka jingngeit ba u Blei un pynkhiah ia ka Ri na une u khlam Corona. Ai ba shisien baka Ri jong ngi kan long ka Ri kaba sheptieng burom ia u Blei bad ba u Blei un jied ia kane ka Ri kum ka jong u Blei. Ai ba ki khmat baroh kin phai sha u khun u Blei.“Ka dei ban iai duwai” Amen.
title: Ka dei ban iai duwai

content: Shillong: Ka Deputy Commissioner, jong ka East Khasi Hills District, ha ka jing pynbna kaba hynnin ka sngi, ka la pynjari ia ka korphiw ha ka nongbah Shillong bad ki shnong ba marjan, kaba sdang naduh ka por 6baje mynstep jong ka Lah Sngi U Blei, lane ka 13tarik Naitung 2020, haduh ka por 6 baje mynstep jong ka 15tarik Naitung 2020.Ki jaka, ki ban hap ha ka korphiw, ki long kiba hap ha Municipal, ha Cantonment, ki jaka jong ka Mawlai bad ka Mawpat Block, ki jaka jong ka Mylliem Block, naduh Umshyrpi haduh Hynniewmer.Nangta sa ki shnong kiba kynthup ia ka Mawblei, Madanryting, Laitkor, Nongkseh, Umlyngka, Lawsohtun bad Mawdiangdiang.Ha kawei pat ka khubor, ka Deputy Commissioner, East Khasi Hills, ka la pynjari ia ka korphiw miet, kaba sdang treikam naduh ka por 10baje mynmiet, haduh ka por 5baje mynstep, kaba sdang naduh ka 13tarik haduh ka 20tarik Naitung 2020 bad katei ka dei ha ki jaka nongkyndong jong ka East Khasi Hills District, kiba kynthup ruh ia ka Sohra bad ka Pynursla Civil Sub Division.
title: Pynjari korphiw ha nongbah Shillong, naduh 6baje lashai ka sngi

content: Khliehriat: U Deputy Commissioner ka East Jaintia HIlls u la pynbna paidbah kham tam eh sha ki trai par dewiong kiba don ha East Jaintia Hills ba katkum ki kyndon ba la pynmih da ka Iing Bishar ba ha Khlieh duh ka ri ba ia u Dewiong uba la dep tih bad ban die lilam da ka Coal India Limited sha ki jaka ba dei ban leit buh, na ka liang ka Ophis u Deputy Commissioner u la pynbna ba la dep ban buh ryntih ia ka dorbar bai kali haba kit ia u Dewiong na ki jaka ba la buh stock.Ka dor bai kali ban shalan ia u Dewiong na East Jaintia HIlls kiba kynthup ia ki shnong Pynthorsale, Kongong, Rymbai Road, 3 Kilo and DeinshynrumNa ka bynta ki kali heh diesel ka dor ka bai kit ka long 9 Tyngka shi ton ha ka shi Kilometer bad haba iaid ha ki surok rong bad 10/- shi ton ha ka shi Kilometer na ka bynta ki surok khyndew.Na ka bynta ban ioh ia ki jingtip ba kham bniah, ki trai par dewiong ki lah ban leit mih sha ka Ophis u DC ban wad jingtip ba bniah.
title: Pynmih u DC EJH ia ka dor bai kali ban shalan dewiong

content: Nongpoh:Myn hynnin ka sngi Saitjain ka Kynthuplang Village Organization (VO) na Mawlong Nongtluh, ka la rakhe kyrpang ban pynsah jingkyn maw halor ka jingdap kaba shi snem halor ki kam sakhi paidbah hapoh katei ka shnong.Ha katei ka jingrakhe dap shisnem ka Kynthuplang VO, la sakhi da ka jingdonlang u Bah Mayrald Born Syiem, MLA Nongpoh, u Bah Balajied Rani, MDC, Bah Hobar Langi, Rangbah Shnong Mawlong Nongtluh lem bad ki nongkitkam katei ka Kynhun, kaba kynthup ia ka Kong Ridian Syiem, President ka Kynthuplang VO lem bad ki nongkitkam jong ki 13 tylli ki SHG’s kiba don ha katei ka thup jong ka VO.Haba rakhe ia katei ka sngi dap Shi snem, ka Kynthuplang VO, ka la pynkup burom ia ki nongtrei mon sngewbha, kiba kynthup naduh ki Cadre, ki nongtrei ASHA bad ki nongtrei Aganwadi, halor ka nongrim ka jingtrei shitom ka jong ki, na ka bynta ban pynbit pynbiang ia ki jingdonkam ki paidbah nongshong shnong.Ha katei hi kajuh ka sngi, ka Nala Rympei Village Organization na Shnong Mawlein Mawkhan Pyllun, kaba kdup ia ki 16 tylli ki SHG’s, ka la pynlong lem ia katei ka jingrakhe das hi snem halor ki kam shakri sha ki paidbah ka shnong.
title: Rakhe ka Kynthuplang VO, halor ka jingdap shisnem

content: Nongpoh: Tang ha kine ki khyndiat Taiew ba u Dasakhiatbha Lamare MLA Mawhati Constituency, u la long kum u Myntri ha kane ka sorkar MDA kaba mynta, ki NPP ha Ri Bhoi, ki la pynkup burom ia u la arsien kynthih, kata ha kine ki khyndiat bala dep u la shah pynkup burom ha ki NPP District bad hynnin ka sngi Saitjain, la pynkup burom da ka NPP Mawhati Block Committee.Kiba la donlang ha kaba pynkup burom ia utei u MLA Mawhati uba la long Myntri Sorkat mynta, ki kynthup ia u Bah Sosthenes Sohtun, MLA Jirang, u Ma Ngaitlang Dhar, Adviser ka NPP ha Ri Bhoi, u Bah Victor Ranee, MDC Jirang, u Bah Rangkynsai Kharbuki, MDC Umroi lem bad kiwei de ki heh Nongialam ka NPP ha Ri Bhoi lem bad ki Nongkitkam ka NPP Mawhati Block.Lyngba katei ka jingpynkup burom, kitei ki NPP ka Mawhati Block Committee, ki la ong ba ki kmen eh ba u MLA jong ki na katei ka Constituency, ba un ioh ban long kum u Myntri Sorkar bad uba deipeit ia ka tnat Fishery, PWD Building lem bad kiwei.Ha katei ka jingpynkup burom ki NPP Mawhati, ki la ai ia u da ki Syntiew ki skut, ka Jain ba remdor, ki tiar pynsah jingkynmaw lem bad ka Sati Ksiar, kaba ki la pynshna kyrpang na bynta jong u.
title: La arsien shah pynkup burom U Dasakhiatbha Lamare ha ki NPP

content: Shillong: Ka longïing jong I Meirad Thaneh Warjri ki la poi shong shnong sha Kyrdemkulai la bun snem mynshwa, hynrei ka lanot ka lawan hap shop ha ka ba ka kmie ka la kem byrïe lah palat phew snem haduh banda matlah syndon. Nalor kata, dang kumba katto katne bnai mynta lah khlad marbud u pyrsa kurim bad ka khun khatduh ka ba dei ban sumar ïa la ka kmie ka ba lah matlah jynduh.Kiwei kiwei ki khun ruh ki lah ïa poikha bad shong shnong sha ba kham pajih bad ki shem shitom ban kit ïa la ka kmie namar ba ïalade ruh ki logki ba duk ba kyrduh bad hap beh bylla kylleng kylleng. Kumta ka jingkitkhlieh ka la ban khia ha I tymmen matlah bapli. Ka khun khatduh ba dang shu khlad shen, ka la iehnoh khunswet ïa lai ngut ki khun, ka Aidalin Warjri bad la ki ar ngut ki para shyrang ba dang rit. Kumta ka Aidalin ba dang khathynñiew snem ka ryta ka la hap ban shimti ïa ka lyngkor ban bsa la ka kmierad ba matlah bad ki arngut ki para shynrang da ka ba trei bylla ha marjan shnong.Ka lanot jong kane ka longïing ka long ka ba la palat liam namar ba ka ïing ka ba kishong ki sah ruh ka ba lah tor bad kim don lad ban maramot, nalor ba ki shu ïoh jaka riehtngen ha ka khyndew jong ka Meghalaya Electricity Corporation Limited.Kane ka khubor shemlanot ka la poi sha ka jingtip jong ki rangbah kur Warjri ha nongbah Shillong. Kumta mar mar ki la hiar sha shnong Kyrdemkulai ban leit khmih bad jurip ïa ka longïing jong I meirad Thaneh Warjri bad ha ba ki la shem ïa ka jingshisha, la pynkhreh mar mar ki lad jingïarap.Ha ka sien ba nyngkong lyngba ka kyrpad kyrpon jong u Saiñpynïar (Secretary) ka Seng Kur Warjri, Bah Sunshine Warjri la noh jingïarap da ki marbam mardih kat ban dap bam bnai bad shisong ki jaiñphong ryngkat bad ka pisa ba la synñiang da katto katne ki rangbah kur bad ka India Every Home Crusade. Hadien kata ka Seng Kur Warjri ka la mang tyngka ban noh synñiang na ka bynta ban shna bha ïa ka ïing ka ba lah jot.Ha ka sngi nyngkong 19tarik Risaw, 2020 saw ngut ki rangbah kur ba kynthup ïa u Khliehduh (President) Bah D L Warjri, Saiñpynïar , Sunshine Warjri ha ryngkat ki dkhot rangbah, Bah Rudy Warjri bad Bah Raphael Warjri ki la leit ban sakhi ïa ki kam ba lah bynshet na ka bynta ban khmih ïa ka ka bha ka miat jong ka longïing ha ryngkat u synñiang, ka kyntu kynpham bad kyrkhu kyrdoh ba kin ïa bit ïa biang.Na ka liang ki khlieh nongkitkam jong ka Seng Kur Warjri ki la pynpaw ba wat la ki la ïohlad ban shimkhia bad pyndep la ka kamram ïa la ki parakur parajait, phewse ka khlam Covid 19 ka la ktah jur ïa ym tang ïa kane ka longïing, hynrei ïa ka imlang sahlang baroh kawei.Na kata ka daw ka Dorbar Kur ba shisien shisnem ka ba la thmu ban pynlong ha Sohryngkham ruh la rai ban sangeh noh shwa ha kane ka snem ba jur than ka hiran bad ba pyrkhing ki adong ha satlak ka jylla. Ka Seng Kur Warjri ka la kyntu ïa ki shnat ha kylleng ka Ri Khasi Jaintia ban long ki ba peitngor ïa ka imlang sahlang khamtam eh ïa la ki parakur parajait ba kin lait na kano kano ka shitom ka jynjar. Kumjuh ruh la pynpaw ba ha kawei ka liang pat don ki parakur ki ba la wanrah burom ba dei ban pyrto ïa ki kam ki ba la rasong ha ka imlang sahlang.Ka long ka ba sngewphieng ban tip ba ha Ri Argentina, ha ka ba ka sorkar jylla ka la ainam ïa ka shilynter ka surok ha ka kyrteng jong u Sohblei Patrick Warjri na ka daw ki kam babha ha ka imlang sahlang. Ha ka jingïakren bad u Bah Rudy Warjri la sngewthuh ba ki kam radbah jong u Sohblei Patrick Warjri ka dei namar ba u la jop ban rat dyngkhong ïa ki kam sniew kam smeh na ka ba kyrni dih aphin (drugs) bad ki kam awria ha shnong ha thaw.
title: Shna bha ka Kur Warjri, ia ka iing ka kur, kaba lah jot; ha Argentina, ai nam ia ka surok ha U Sohblei Patrick Warjri

content: Shillong: U myntri rangbah ka jylla u Conrad K Sangma mynta ka sngi u la iathuh ba ka sorkar jylla kam pat rai kano kano ka rai ha ka ba ia dei bad ka jingplie noh ia ka skul ha ka jylla, namar ba mynta ka jingpang ka dang kiew sted bad ka long ka ba buh jingma lada plie noh ia ki skul.U la ong ruh ba lada plie ia ki skul, ka don jingma ia  ka ing ka sem ia ki khynnah bad kumjuh ia ki briew ba la noh ka rta  ha ka ing ka sem namar ba ka ju long hi ba ki khynnah ki juh ban shong bad ban pynlut ia ka por bad la ki mei ieid paieid (grand parent  ha ing ynda ki la wan na ki skul bad ka ne kan buh ia ki ha ka jingma.Na ka liang jong ka Sorkar MDA ka kamram, kaba ha khmat eh ka long ban pynthikna ba kan don ka jingshngain bad ka jingiada ia ki nongshong shnong ka jylla bad yn ym lah ban buh ia ki nongshong shnong ha ka jing ma.
title: Ym pat rai ban plie ia ki skul, ong u myntri rangbah

content: Shillong: Ka Deputy Commissioner, East Khasi hills, ka la pynmih ia ka jing pynbna mynta ka sngi, ba  kito kiba ioh pang khlam corona bad kiba sah ha ki jaka sumar, ba la pyniaid da ka sorkar jylla, kin hap ban siew ha ka dor T.380 shisngi ka bai sah bad katei kan sdang trei kam, naduh ka 15tarik Risaw 2020.Ki jaka sah kiba la pyniaid da ka sorkar Jylla, ki long ha  (i) IIM, Shillong, Umsawli, (ii) MIIT, Shillong (Moreau Institute of Institute of Integral Training), (iii) MATI, Shillong, (iv) NIFT, Mawdiangdiang, (v) TB Hospital, Umsawli.La iathuh ba kito kiba ioh ia katei ka jingpang bad kiba don ha ka kyrdan A lane B bad ki bym donkam ban leit shah sumar sha hospital bad ki bym don jaka sah ha la ki jong ki iing, ki lah ban leit sha kitei ki   Corona Care Centre. La iathuh shuh shuh ba kito kiba shah test ha ki jaka test ha  Polo Sample Collection Centre/ Civil Hospital bad ha kiwei ki jaka bad kiba dei ban sah ha kitei ki Corona Care Centre, kin hap ban siew ia ka bai bam, ha kitei ki sngi  ba ki sah.Kito kiba don ha ka kyrdan BPL, kim donkam ban siew pisa, tangba ki dei ban  pyni ia ki Yellow (AYY) lane ki  Pink (PHH) NFSA Ration Card. Kitei ki hap ban pyni ia ki  original NFSA card ha ki Corona Care Centre ha ka por ba ki leit sah lane ia ki kot ki sla dei ban leit pyni hapoh san sngi ban leit shim na iing jong uba pang.Kiba sah ha ki centre, ki lah ruh ban bam da kaba wan rah na iing, katba ki dang sah ha kitei ki jaka sah bad ka Centre, kan buh ia ki nongtrei, kiba lah ban pynbeit ia ka rukom leit ai bam, ia kitei kiba sah ha kitei ki jaka sumar.Kiwei ki jingdonkam jong u nongpang, kum kiba donkam ha jaka leit painkhana, yn khein da ka dor ha ki Corona Care Centre. Hynrei kiba leit sah ki lah ruh ban leit rah hi ia la ki jong ki tiar jing donkam kiba ki pyndonkam haba leit painkhana. La iathuh ba katei ka hukum, kan trei kam naduh ka 16tarik Risaw 2020, ong ka kong  Miss Isawanda Laloo, Deputy Commissioner, East Khasi Hills District, Shillong.
title: Ioh pang corona, leit sah ha ki corona centre, ka shongdor T.380 shi sngi, hap siew bai bam ruh

content: U la iathuh ia la ka kyrteng ba ka kyrteng jong u ka dei Ferdinan bad kumjuh ruh ka Ri ka la iathuh ia la ka kyrteng.U Nai Jymmang u la mih. Dei ha ka taiew ba nyngkong kaba dei ka sngi palei, u Ferdinan u la kylli ia ka. Hadien kumba shitaiew tam, ka Ri ka la jubab bad ka jubab ka long – Hooid. Kane ka la pynkmen ia u bad kumjuh ruh ia ka Ri watla kam da pynpaw eh, ka ri ia la ka akor kum ka samla donburom.Hadien kumba shi bnai ei ei, ka Banrilang ka iathuh nyngkong ha la ka kmie. Ka kmie pat ka iathuh ha u menkpa. Haba la tip baroh ha iing, ka kmie ka ong ia ka khun ba ka dei ban phah wankai ha iing ban long kum ka jingpynithuh.“Ap in da wan peit jingtrei ngan sa ong” ong ka Banrilang.“Kane ka mobai shisha ka dei kawei phi. Lyngba jong ka, ka pynsuk ia kiei kiei baroh. Ngim lah ban khein troin ia ka hynrei ngim dei pat ban lapmiet bad ban pyndonkam bakla ia ka. Peit nga ruh tang ioh number phun khlem da iakynduh mar met lait noh tang ha kato ka sngi ba i wan thew iingskul lah shu biang bad ka kam ka iaid shaid shaid” ong ka khun ia la ka kmie.“Ka dei kata ruh. Hynrei ban kum u Rangsan la i lamwir shisha, pha te pha lah ban pyndonkam ha ki kam kiba dei ym kum u para jong pha uba la shu kdup beit ia ka” ong ka kmie.“I Hep pat i dang khie bad artat ruh ka dei ka bud tynneng” ong ka Ban.“ Hei Ban! ngan ong ia pha kane kawei wat pynslem than ho” ong ka kmie.“Ngan ap na ka sur u Rangbah phi Mei. Da ong ma nga nga sngew kumno re” pynphai ktien ka khun.“Hooid, tangba pha hap sngewthuh” ban ktien biang ka kmie.Ka dei ha u bnai Jylliew ha ka taiew kaba ar ba kita ki briew kin wan peit ia ka jingtrei u Ferdinan u la phun ia ka Ban ban pyntip ia kane. Hadien lai sngi ka Ban ka ong ia u ba un wan shongkai ha iing kum ka jingpynithuh ha iing. U ruh u la mynjur. U samla rangbah uba la khlain tyrpeng bad uba donburom um da don jingsngew lehrain ia ka jingong ka Ban hynrei u sngewiahap ba katno ka jingsngew donburom ban leit sha iing ka kynthei ban iakynduh ia u kpa, ka kmie jong ka.Ki sngi ki leit ki sngi ki wan. Ka por wan peit jingtrei u Ferdinan ka dei ha ka sngi Balang. U kpa u la don lang ha iing ban iashongkai. Ha kata ka sngi wan u Ferdinan u wan tang marwei namar uba dei wan lang um wan ba khlad u Kni jong u. Da lah dep peit jingtrei u Ferdinan u la wan sha iing ka Banrilang.“Phi lah wan slem?” kylli u kpa bad u khublei.“Lah bit hi” u jubab.“Khublei” la wan ai khublei sa ka kmie.Ki la ia shongkai katto katne por bad ka Ban ka la pynkhreh ja step ia u. Katba ka Ban ka dang pynkhreh ka kmie bad u kpa ki nang iashongkai hangta bad la mih shibun ka jingiakylli pyrthew kumba ju dei ka rukom. Ka jingiakren ka kham thew eh ia ka longiing longsem jong u da ka jingkylli kum ka kur aiu, katno ngut shi para, ki jingtrei bad kumta ter ter. Ka kmie bad u kpa ka Ban ki la ihun jrut ia u briew watla kim da tip than hynrei tang shu peit ia u briew ka batai shibun.
title: LA I SHAIONG

content: Babu Kular KhongjiremHa kine ki khyndiat sngi ba la dep pat,ka thma ktien(war of words) bad ka jingiakawang ktien hapdeng ki nongialam ka NPP bad ki nongialam ka BJP ka nang lynguh hi pum katba nangmih ki sngi ki taiew.Ka daw ba kongsan kalong halor ka jingkwah ka BJP ban shai halor ka bamsap ha GHADC bad JHADC bad ban ai ka jingtokit(enquiry) ba laitluid ha ka CBI.Ka jingrai ka sorkar MDA ban pyntreikam ia ka Central Bonded Ware House ka la pyning khong shuh shuh ia ka BJP namar kane ka rukom kan ialam pynban ia ka Meghalaya sha ka Mafia state bad ka jingbam sap ba shyrkhei ia ki political leader kiba pyniaid ia kane ka sorkar MDA namar ha Rajasthan bad Uttar Pradesh kin hap pynduh noh ba ka ialam pynban sha ka mafia state katba hangne ha Meghalaya pat, ka state kaba la niew bad tip ia ka kum ka Ri tip briew tip Blei ka sorkar ka kwah pynban ia kum kine ki jaitkam shyrkhei.Ka jingai ding shuh shuh u Deputy Chief Minister ban ai Yellow Card ia ka BJP na ka sorkar MDA ka la nang meh ding shuh shuh ia ka thma ktien hapdeng kine ki ar tylli ki party.Hynrei,lada shah weng noh ka BJP na kane ka sorkar MDA,kan wan rah ka jingeh, kynrum kynram bad ka jingktah(impact) kaba shyrkhei bha ha Meghalaya jongngi.U Chief Minister bad u Deputy Chief Minister kin kham lehrain lehsuin bha ban leit rah bolw man ka por na Meghalaya sha Delhi na ki Minister bapher bapher jong ka Delhi.Wat lada ki leit khrong ruh,ka Delhi kan nym satia ne patiaw eh shuh ia ki.Ym tang katta,u Governor udei u jong ka Sorkar BJP na Delhi.Ka lah ban mih ka jingia pyni bor hapdeng u Chief Minister kane ka sorkar MDA bad u Governor kumba ka la jia ha ka sorkar AAP ha Delhi,ka party TMC ha Kolkatta bad ha Rajasthan ruh.Ka President’s Rule ruh ka kloi bha lada don tang i jingjia ba malu mala hangne ha Meghalaya.Tang shu don ka BJP sharud ka sorkar MDA,ka jingiadei ka NPP bad ka sorkar NDA ha Delhi ruh kan ktah lang.Bad tang shu bakla tiak,kane ka sorkar MDA ka lah ban kyllem noh pynban namar ka Delhi kan sa thaw lad hi sia ban pynkhyllem noh kumba long ha kiwei kiwei ki state ki bym synshar ka BJP.Ka bor u Chief Minister bad ka jingkop u Deputy Chief Minister ka Meghalaya kin nym lah satia ban shan ha ki bor u Modi,u Rajnath Sing bad u Amit Shah na Delhi.
title: BJP  Vrs  NPP

content: Ki pulit, ki la ioh kem ia uwei u briew, uba leit tuh dieng phna, na kawei ka iingmane ha ka nongbah London.Ha ka dur, la iohi, ba uwei u briew, ula leit kiew ha tnum ka iing mane bad u la tan bunsien ia katei ka iingmane, kaba la shna da ka dieng ha ka iingmane  Chadwell Heath Baptist Church ha Romford.Ha ka jingthait ban tan ia ka dieng phna, la iohi, ba utei u briew, ula law ia ka coat jongu bad u tawah ha jrong ka diengphna, katba u dang pyrshang ban tan naduh na tynrai, ba la pynieng ia ka diengphna.Ki pulit hadien ba ki la ioh jingtip, ia katei ka jingjia, ki la shimti ia ka jing tohkit, ha kaba ki la ioh kem ia utei u nongtuh bad ki la ioh biang ruh ia ka diengphna kaba la shah tuh.
title: Shah kem u nongtuh diengphna, ha ki pulit ha London

content: Shillong: Ha ka 17tarik Risaw  2020 ka Khatarshnong Area Sports Club, ka la pynlong ia ka General Meeting hapoh ka iingdorbar jong ka shnong Khrang ban jied bad ban pynthymmai ia ki nongkitkam ha ka Seng.Ha kane ka sngi ia ka jingialang la pyniaid da U Vice President Bah Khambit Sing Khongshei uba shah jied syndon kum u President, Vice President ba thymmai bah Lamkupar Sohkhlet, ia ka kam Genl Secretary dang bat hi da u Samla Iamangstone Mawkhiew, Ast Genl Secretary Samla Laitphas Shabong, Sports Secretary Samla Iengskhem Mawkhiew uba dei u Ast Genl Secretary barim,  Ast Sports Secretary Samla Tishu Khongsit, Finance Secretary Samla Rahmaniam Mawkhiew bad u Adviser bah Stogen Lynrah. Ki member ki long u Samla Ktawbinson Mawkhiew, samla Sto Dohling, samla Tenlang  Diengdoh, samla Khlainborlang Majaw, bad Henry Diengdoh. Kine ki nongkitkam kin neh ha ki 3snem kata naduh u snem 2021 haduh 2023.Ha kane ka General Meeting la shim ruh ia ki rai ban kham pynbha shuh shuh ia ia ka rukom trei kam bad ruh ban thaw lad thaw lynti ban lah ban kyntiew ia ki samla ha ka liang ki sports khnang kan long ka jingmyntoi ia ki samla kiba don ka sap ha kane ka liang.Ha kane ka sngi lah ioh ka report na u General Secretary uba batai ia ka jingiaid lynti jong ka Seng naduh u snem 2011, ba la thaw ia ka bad ia ki jinglut jingsep baroh haba iadei bad ki jingpynlong ia ki program bapher bapher  bad ia ki tournament ha ka thain.
title: Pynthymmai bad jied nongkitkam thymmai ka Khatarshnong Area Sports Club

content: Kan don ka jing ia kynduh ba kyrkieh mynta ka sngi, hapdeng ki Chief Secretary jong ka Assam bad ka Mizoram, ban iakren halor ka jing ia kynad kam pud jong kitei ki ar tylli ki Jylla. Ia katei ka jingialang, yn lam khmat da U Secretary, kam poh iing ka sorkar India, ong u myntri kam poh iing ka Mizoram, U   Lalchamliana hynnin ka sngi.U Lalchamliana, myntri kam poh iing u iathuh ba ka Assam, ka la thaw jing kulmar ha ki khyndiat taiew ba ladep, ha ki lai jaka bad kitei ki long ha   Thinghlun ha Mamit district, Saihapui ‘V’ bad ha  Vairengte, kiba dei ha  Kolasib district.“Ngi la iakren bad ka sorkar India halor kane ka jing ia kynad bad U Secretary ka sorkar India, U  Ajay Bhalla, un pyniaid ia katei ka jingialang mynta ka sngi” ong shuh u myntri.
title: Mynta ka sngi, khot iakren U Secretary ka sorkar India ia ka Assam, Mizoram

content: U Joe Biden, u dei u dkhot ba shitrhem jong ka Balang Catholic bad kat shaba u leit u deng ia u rosary, ha ki kti jongu bad u da sngewnguh shi katdei, ba ka Balang Catholic, ka la btin lynti ia u, ha ka jingim kaba ula iaid baroh shi katta.Kumta ha ka 3tarik Naiwieng 2020, kaba dei ka sngi ban jied ia U President ka America, U Biden, u khmih lynti ba ki para ba ngeit katholik, kin kyrshan rad bah ia u, wat la ki la kyrshan ia U Donald Trump, ha u snem 2016.U Biden, u dei uba smat bha ban leit mass, ha kaba u ju leit man ka Sngi U Blei ha  St. Joseph kaba ha Brandywine bad ka dei ruh hajan jong katei ka iingmane, ha kaba ka don ka jaka tep jong ki kmie ki kpa jongu, u khun jongu, uba la khlad noh ha u snem 2015, ka tnga ba nyngkong jongu, ka Neilia bad ka khun kynthei jongu, ka  Naomi, kiba la iap noh ha ka jing tyngkhuh kali ha u snem 1972, ha ka por ba ka Neilia lem bad ki lai ngut ki khun, ki leit ban thied dieng Kristmas. Ha katei ka jingjia, ki arngut ki khun shynrang jongu, U  Beau bad u  Hunter, ki la iap lang ha ka jing tyngkhuh kali.Hynnin ka step, U Biden bad ka Jill, kaba dei ka kurim ba ar jongu, ki la leit sha katei ka jaka tep. U Biden, u dei uba shit rhem bha, ha ka jingngeit jongu, kum u dkhot ka balang Katholik bad um ju lehrain ban kren ia ka jingngeit niam jongu. Kumta, lada jia ba U Biden, un jop ha kane ka kynti, un dei uba ar na ka kynhun jong ka balang Katholik, ba un long U President jong ka Ri America, hadien jong U  John F. Kennedy.Kiwei ki khubor, ki iathuh ba kat haduh mynta, ki la don  27.7 million ngut ki nong America, kiba la dep thep vote, da ka email lane da kaba leit hi sha ki jaka thep vote jongki, ong ka  khubor jong ka US Elections Project jong ka University of Florida.Baroh arngut ki dei ki Kristan ba shitrhem U Wei U dei U Presbyterian bad U Wei U dei katholik Mano ban jop ki nong American ki sa bishar ia kane ngin sa ia peit.
title: U Joe Biden, u dei u dkhot ba shitrhem ka Balang Katholik

content: Guwahati: Ka jing ia kynad khappud hapdeng ka Assam bad ka Mizoram, ka la poi mynta sha ka shkor jong u myntri rangbahduh bad kumjuh sha ka tnat kam poh iing jong ka sorkar India, ha kaba U  Sarbananda Sonowal, myntri rangbah ka Assam, ula pyntip mar mar, da ka phone; hynnin ka sngi sha kitei ki nongialam ha Delhi.U Sonowal, ula wad ruh ia u myntri rangbah ka Mizoram, U Zoramthanga, ha kaba ki la iakren, halor ka jingjia, kaba la jia ha khappud jong kitei ki ar jylla, ha ka sngi saitjain ba ladep.Ha ka jingiakren, U Sonowal, ula pynsngew halor ka jingdon kam ban iakren ia sngewthuh jingmut hapdeng ka Assam bad ka Mizoram, ban poi sha ka jing iabeit halor u pud u sam bad u pynsngew ruh halor ka jingdonkam ban teh lakam ia ka shongsuk shongsain ha ki khappud jong ki ar tylli ki jylla.U Sonowal, ula kren iaroh jur, ba U Narendra Modi, myntri rangbahduh ka Ri, ula plie ia shibun ki kam pynroi jong ka thain shatei lam mihngi bad kumjuh, u pynsngew ruh ba ki jing iapher jingmut halor u pud u sam, hynrei ka donkam ban don ka jing iakren ia sngewthuh jingmut jong ki arliang mamla.U Zoramthanga, ula kren shai sha U Sonowal, ba un pynthikna ba kan wan biang ka suk ka sain hapdeng ki khappud jong kitei ki ar jylla.Ha ka sngi saitjain, ki don bun bah ki iing trep ba la shna ha khappud jong ka Assam bad ka Mizoram, kiba la shah thang ingkhong lut plain bad katei ka jingjia ka dei ha ka jing ia kynad hapdeng ki nongshong shnong ka Lailapur jong ka Assam bad ki nongshong shnong ka Vairengte, kaba don ha Kolasib District jong ka Mizoram.
title: Mar ia shah thang iing ha khappud bad ka Mizoram, ujor U MR ka Assam sha U Myntri rangbahduh

content: Shillong: Namar ba u don uba ioh pang covid 19, na ka  State Bank of India, Main Branch, Shillong; kumta kaDeputy Commissioner, East Khasi Hills District, mynta ka sngi, ka la pynmih ia ka hukum ban khang ia ka SBI, Main Branch baroh kawei lashai ka sngi, ka 19tarik Risaw 2020, na ka bynta ban pynkhuid ia katei ka ophis baroh kawei.Ha ka 20 bad 21tarik Risaw 2020, yn plie tang ia ki jingdonkam kiba kongsan eh ka Bank, hynrei, yn nym pat plie satia ia ki kam paidbah.
title: Lashai yn khang ka State Bank of India ha Main Branch

content: Shillong: Namar ka jingthrang jong ki Nongrep ka thain Sonidan ka ba kynthup ia ki 14 tylli ki shnong, myn ha ka sngi saitjain u General Secretary jong ka Hills Farmers Union u bah Allfondbirth Kharsyntiew u la hiar hi dalade ha ryngkat ka jingsynran ki Nongialam na Bhoirymbong Block bad Umsning Block, ha kaba la ioh ruh ban  pynskhem ia ki nongkitkam jong ka HFU Sonidan Circle.Ha katei ka jingialang haba la ioh ban iamir jingmut shibun ia ki jingeh jong ki nongrep khamtam ha ka jingshah ktah ha kane ka khlam Covid-19. Ki nongrep ki la pynpaw ruh ia ka jingsngewsih kaba khraw ba wat hapdeng kane ka jingeh kaba ki mad, tangba ki ong ba ka jingshah khniot bein ha ki nongkhaii ki ba wan thied ia ki mar jong ki nongrep, ka la long shaba palat.Ka jingshah khniot ha ka dor ka mur, nangta sa ka jingshah ot kilo bein kaba ktah shisha ia ka ioh ka kot jong ki nongrep.U president jong ka Sonidan Circle u bah Roswell shadap u la ong ba kum ki nongrep bunsien ki duh jingkyrmen bad haba ki mad jingeh bad ba kim lah ban ksaid shano shano ruh.U bah Kharsyntiew haba ai ia ki jingkren ha ka tei ka sngi u la ong ba katba u nongrep u dang iaid marwei marwei un shah khniot kat sha u leit. Kumta donkam ia u nongrep ban pyrkhat thymmai bad dei tang da ka jingiatylli kaba lah ban weng ia u shah uba thar ia u Nongrep. U la pynsngew ruh sha ki para nongrep ba ka Seng ka la iakhun ban pynduh ia ka jingot kilo, hynrei dei namar ka jingtlot palt jong ki ain kiba dei ban teh lakam ia ka jingot kilo kumta kane ka shah ban bein jong u nongrep ka dang bteng haduh mynta mynne.U la pyn kynmaw ruh ba ki nongrep ki dei ban form ia ki Cooperative Society khnang ba ki nongrep kin ioh shibun ki jingiarap khamtam kum ka Piggery Mission kaba ka sorkar ka la pynkhreh shait shait, na ka bynta kane ka project ka ban long ka jingmyntoi ban kyntiew ia ka ioh ka kot jong ki nongrep .Hadien katei ka jingialang laioh ruh ban leit jurip ia ka wei ka processing unit kaba khlem lah ban pyntreikam shuh naduh u snem 2012. Kane ka dei ha ka shnong Mawpat ribhoi Dist. Kane ka dei ka project jong ka MRDS(Meghalaya Rural Develoment society) . Ki nongshong shnong jong katei ka shnong ki la pynpaw ka jingsngewsih kaba khraw halor ka jingkut noh jong ka project MRDS naduh U snem 2012 . Kumta kitei ki machine kiba la wan buh ha katei ka jaka, khlem da lah ban pynbiang pura ia ki tiar ki tar ban pyniaid ia katei ka machine, kumta kine ki machine ki la shu sah khongreng khlem da lah ban pyntreikam ia kam haduh mynta.
title: Ba ia kynduh jingeh, ki nongrep ka Ribhoi, hiar ka HFU

content: Shillong: Ka jingpynslem jong ki bor pyniaid ka west khasi hills district ban ai jingbit ban plie noh iaka iew Langpih hadien bala khang dam namar ka pandemic halor ka jingkhie u  Covid – 19 bad ka jing suki u BDO jong ka Mawshynrut C&RD  block ban pyndep iaka kamram bala bynshet ha u ban  plie noh iaka iew Langpih kaba don tang kane ka iew kaba don haka thain kala pynjynjar iaki paidbah haka liang ka thied ka pet ha kaba ki hap ban leit iew shaduh iew Nonglang bad shaduh iew Nongstoin.Haba phai bun kiwei ki iew kila plie naduh baka sorkar kala shah ban plie ia ki iew hynrei ha iew Langpih la shah tang katno katne ki dukan ban plie.             Halor kane ka jingbym pat plie laitluid iaka iew Langpih ka pyn long iaki khar nepali ban nang pynheh shuh shuh iaka iew ia die ia thied hajan camp jong ki pulit Assam katba nang mih ki taiew.Kane ka iew ka nangheh nangheh katba Dang mih ki sngi bad man ka taiew da ka jingkyrshan ki nongkhaii na Assam, kane kan sa buh jingma iaka jaitbynriew jong ngi lada ia ka khaiï ka pateng ka ioh ka kot la sha knieh haki briew ba na bar, shaei ka lawei jong ka jaitbynriew jong ngi kan poi,kane ka iew jong ki khar Nepali ha langpih  ka la nangheh nangheh bad ki pyn long iew ha man la ka sngi thohdieng.Ka FKJGP Langpih area unit ha kine ki sngi ba la dep ka la kren pyrshah haki lad patai khubor halor ka jingthmu ki khar Nepali  ban seng iew thymmai laka jong kabu jingma iaka jaitbynriew jong ngi bad ngin sa shah knieh noh  iaka khaiï ka pateng.Kum ban khanglad noh ia katei ka iew ba thymmai ki khar Nepali bad kaba la sdang heh mynta kum ka seng ngi kyrpad ia u Deputy Commisioner jong ka West khasi hills ba un shah noh ban pli noh iaka iew Langpih bad haka juh ka por la kyrpad ia u BDO jong ka Mawshynrut block ba un pyndep noh iaka kam bala pyn  shet ha u khnang ba ki paitbah kin suk haka juh ka por kum ka seng ngi kyrpad iaki paitbah jong ka thain Langpih kin ym leit thied leit tda na katei ka iew jong ki Nepali, ong ka khubor na ka seng.
title: Nang heh ka iew Nepali, bym shah ban plie iaka iew Langpih

content: Khliehriat: Hynnin ka janmeit sngi saitjain, ar tylli ki trok kiba dang thmu ban leit buh mar sha Assam ki la iaid lait ia u surok bad hap shapoh synrang kaba jylliew kumba 200 phut eiei kaba don hajan ka Mandir ha Sunapur, East Jaintia HIlls.Mar synjia kane ka jingjia, ki riew paidbah bad ki pulit na Umkiang ki la pyrshang ban wad ia ki nongniah hynrei kim shym la lap satia ia ki hynnin hynrei hadien pat ka khubor na ki pulit ka la iathuh ba baroh kiba don ha kitei ki ar tylli ki trok ki la lait im wat lada ka trok ka la hap shapoh riat kaba jylliew, hynrei la iathuh namar ba ki la sahkut noh ha ki dieng ha jrong suin ki la ioh ban lait im na katei ka jingjia.
title: Noh ar tylli ki trok sha riat ha Sunapur,  sahkut ki nongniah ha jrong dieng

content: Shillong: Na ki 104 ngut kiba ioh pang thymmai, ki don 61 ngut na East Khasi Hills bad kitei ki kynthup ia 46 ngut ki high risk contact bad na kitei ki don 7ngut kiba ioh pang thymmai ha Jail Road Cluster, sa saw ngut na Rynjah Cluster bad 2ngut na Golflink Cluster.Ha Ribhoi District ki don 7ngut ki high risk contact bad uwei uba wan phai na shabar.MEGHALAYA COVID 19 DAILY UPDATEDATED: 18th October 2020, 2PM.NEW CASES: 104EKH: 61High Risk- 46Jail Road Cluster- 07Rynjah Cluster- 04Golflink Clister- 02Madanryting Cluster -01Mawprem Cluster- 01EGH: 18High Risk- 18Health Worker- 01Police Personnel- 01WGH: 13High Risk- 08Returnee- 01Screening Purpose- 04RBD: 08High Risk- 07Returnee- 01SWGH: 02Mahendraganj Cluster- 02EJH: 01High Risk- 01NGH: 01High Risk- 01
title: Kiew kiba ioh pang covid ha Jail Road, Rynjah na 61 ngut na East Khasi Hills
