content: Nongpoh: Mynha ka miet Sngi Thohdieng, ha ka por 9 baje ei ei mynmiet, ki dkhot ka HYC, ki la ioh ban bat haduh Phra ngut ki bar jylla, kiba don ia ka Tiket ban leit sha Silchar, hynrei ki la hiar pat ha Umiam, Ri Bhoi District.Haba pyntip sha ki Nongthohkhubor, u Bah Hercules Suting, President ka HYC ha Ri Bhoi, u la iathuh ba ki dkhot ka seng, hadien ba ki la ioh jingtip halor ka jingdon kitei ki bar jylla kiba hiar ha Umiam, ki la bat noh ia ki bad haba ki la pyrshang ban wad jingtip na kitei ki bar jylla, ki la lap ba ki don ia ki Tiket ban leit sha Silchar, pynban ki hiar noh pat ha katei ka jaka.Utei u Nongialam ka HYC, u la ong ba katei ka jingleh da kitei ki bar jylla bad kiba la pyndonkam da ka Tiket leit Silchar bad hiar ha katei ka jaka, ka long tang ban lait na ka jingshah bat ha Infiltration kaba don ha Byrnihat.Shuh shuh, u la iathuh ruh ba katkum ka jingiathuh da kitei ki bar jylla, la ong ba don ki briew kiba phah hiar ia ki ha katei ka jaka, na ka bynta ban phah trei ha ki bynta jong katei ka thain, hynrei haba ki dkhot ka seng ki la bat ia kitei ki bar jylla, kitei ki nongphah wan, kim shym la nud ban mih shakhmat na ka bynta ban iakren.Ka seng kan ym shong klikti, hynrei kan iai peit pyrman halor ka jingioh wan rung beain ki briew nabar, khamtam eh ia kito kiba shu rung tuh ne khlem ki kot ki sla kiba biang, u la bynrap.
title: Ka Tiket sha Silchar, ki hiar ha Umiam; bat ka HYC ia  8ngut ki bar Jylla

content: Shillong: Kiba ioh pang corona thymmai mynta ka sngi, ki long 104. Na kitei ki kynthup ia 61 ngut na East Khasi Hills, 18 ngut ha East Garo hills, 13 ngut na West Garo Hills, 8 ngut na Ribhoi District.Kiba la jem na ka jingpang, ki long 248 ngut mynta ka sngi bad kitei ki kynthup ia 191 ngut na East Khasi Hills, ha kaba kitei ki long 187 ngut ki riew paidbah. Ha Ribhoi District, kiba la jem ki long 18 ngut, ha South West Garo Hills, ki long 13 ngut bad na kitei ki riew paidbah, ki long 12 ngut.Kiba dang don ia katei ka jingpang khlam haduh mynta, ki long 2,151 ngut bad kitei ki kynthup ia 1,424 ngut ha East Khasi Hills bad 1,395 ngut ki riew paidbah.Ha Ribhoi ki don 266ngut bad na kitei ki kynthup ia 216 ngut ki riew paidbah. Ha West Jaintia Hills 79 ngut, ha East Jaintia Hills 17 ngut, ha West Khasi Hills 49 ngut bad ha South West Khasi Hills 15 ngut.Baroh kiba la jem na ka jingpang, ki long 6,282 ngut bad kiba iap ki long 75 ngut baroh.
title: 104 ngut kiba pang corona, 61 ngut ha East Khasi Hills

content: Ka la mih ka jing ia shoh ia dat ha khappud jong ka Mizoram bad ka Assam bad katei ka dei ka jing ia shoh jong ki riew paidbah, kiba don ha kitei ki khappud jong ki ar jylla, kaba la jia hynnin ka sngi, ha Vairengte, jong ka Mizoram bad ka Lailapur jong ka Assam, kiba don ha ki khappud jong kitei ki ar tylli ki Jylla.Ka Vairengte, ka hap ha Kolasib District jong ka Mizoram, kaba pyn iasoh ruh ia ka Assam, lyngba ka  National Highway 306.U H Lalthlangliana, Deputy Commissioner, ka Kolasib, u iathuh ba ki nongshong shnong ka Vairengte, ki la leit tur sha ki jaka ba ki ialum ki riew paidbah na Assam, kiba rah da ki wati bad ki dieng bad hangta, ka la don ka jing ia lum maw mar kylliang. Hangta ki nongshong shnong ka Vairengte, ki la thang ingkhong ia 20 tylli ki iing trep kiba shah ha ka jaka ba don jing ia kynad, ba la thaw da ki nongshong shnong ka  Lailapur. La iathuh ba ki la don bun ngut kiba mynsw, ha kaba ki don saw ngut na Mizoram, kiba la mynsaw ha katei ka jingjia bad uwei na kitei, u dei uba shah ot na ryndang, uba shah sumar ha  Kolasib district hospital bad u dei uba shitom jur.U MLA jong ka Mizoram, uba dei na ka liang synshar, ka  Mizo National Front (MNF), U Lalrintluanga Sailo, ula leit jngoh mar mar ia katei ka jaka bad u iathuh ba ka Mizoram, ka iada ia la u jong u pud u sam bad ka iada ruh na ka jing buhai shnong ki khar Bangladesh, kiba don ha kitei ki khappud bad u iathuh ba 80 percent na kitei kiba shong ha khappud jong ka Assam – Mizoram, ki dei ki poiei kiba na Bangladesh. La iathuh ba halor katei ka jingjia, ki don mynta 11ngut ki MLA, kiba la mareh mar mar sha katei ka jaka ban peit hi, ia ka jinglong jingman jong ka thain  Vairengte hi baroh kawei.
title: Mih ka jing ia shoh ia dat bad ia thang iing ha khappud ka Assam, Mizoram

content: Na ka bynta kito ki nongpule kotkhubor ki bym smat lane ki bym pat shang kylleng kylleng ban iohi, ban tip bad ban mad ia ka jinglong jingman jong ki briew bad jingitynnat ka mariang ha ki shnong ki thaw jong ka Ri Khasi, Jaintia bad Garo, sngewdei ban ai jingmut ia phi ban leit sha ki shnong jong ka thain War Jaintia, War Hima Khyrim, War Hima Sohra, War Hima Mawsynram, War Hima Maharam, War Hima Langrin bad ka thain Nongtrai jong ka Hima Langrin bad ka thain Nongtrai jong ka Hima Nongstoin, ha ka por Synrai. Ki shnong jong ka thain Mawrok ha Hima Rambrai ruh ki long ki jaka kiba bitdor bad kiba itynnat bha ban leitjngoh kai, bam lyer bad ban tip ia ki jinglong jingman jong ki briew.Ha kaba iadei bad kane ka bynta, une u Nongthoh u khubor u la leit jurip ia ka shnong Mawpon ha ka 16 tarik u Risaw, 2020. Kane ka shnong ka don kumba 15 km shathie na Nongstoin bad ka hap hapoh ka Hima Nongstoin Syiemship, West Khasi Hills District. Lada leit sha kane ka shnong (Mawpon) na Nongstoin hab ban leit da ka Kali Bolero Pick-up na Nongstoin sha Nongpyndeng, sha lad Nongsba, sha Risiang, kam ia ka Wah Umiang sha kadiang ban poi ha Nongmynraw, nangta sa poi ha Mawpon.Ki pud sawdong jong Kane ka shnong jong kane ka shnong ki long; Shatei iakhap bad ka shnong Nongmynraw, shathie iakhap bad ka wah Kynshi, Mihngi iakhap bad ka wah Kynshi bad ka shnong Sangriang, Sepngi iakhap bad ka shnong Maweitksar. Ki shnong kiba iajan bad ka shnong Mawpon ki dei ka Maweitksar, Mawlangriang, Nongmynraw, Nongriangpoit, Nongthymmai, Mawpharduh, Mawkynjoin bad Sangriang.Kane ka shnong Mawpon, kaba la kynjoh 100 snem, ka don 70 tylli ki tnum iing bad ki khlieh briew ki don240 ngut ki shynrang bad 280 ngut ki kynthei, baroh ki don 520 ngut. Ha shnong ki don ar tylli ki Balangj (niam), ka Balang Presbyterian 29 tnum iing bad ka Balang Katholik 41 tnum iing. Ki skul ki don ar tylli, ka L.P deficit bad ka SSA U.P, ha baroh ar ki don 59 ngut ki khynnah skul bad ki nonghikai ki don 6 ngut. Kiba la pass B.A ki don 2 ngut bad kiba la pyndep ia ka Matrik ki don 35 ngut.La seng ia kane ka shnong da ki lai kynthei, ka Niawni Puwein, ka Riwir Puwein bad ka Laipyrdi Puwein kiba la kam ia ka khyndew bah ba la khot ka Khyndew Puwein. Hadien la wan mih pateng sa ka Niewshong Marshra, ka Pahshong Puwein, ka Liarksan Sohphoh, ka Monpah Puwein, ka Laipyrdi Puwein bad ka pharmuit Marshra bad hadien shuh shuh la wan hiar pateng sa ka Perimai Puwein, ka Helina Puwein bad ka Iawni Puwein, kiba dang im haduh mynta mynne, lait non ka Niawni Puwein kaba la khlad noh ha ka snem 2011.Lait noh tang 2 tnum iing kiba kamai ha ki kam khaii bad trei sorkar, kiwei ki 68 tnum iing ki dei ki BPL lane kiba duk bad kyrduh bha. Ka kam jong kiba bun ki long iing ka dei ka kam rep. Ki rep riewhadem, Phanmungor, Phankaro, Phandieng, Shriew, Sying, Sohngang, Sohkhia, Pathaw, Nei, bun jait ki Sohmynken, Tyrso, Sohjew, Sohniamtra, Sohpriam, Sohiong, Kait, Sohkynphor bad kiwei, tangba ki jait soh kim da man bha ba bam khniang bad iaptram ki diengsoh. La kham bun tylli ki snem ki mar rep kim da long namar ba la ktah ka mangriang bad mynta ka snem lei lei ba jur u slap ki jingkheit ki la julor palat.Nalor ba rep ia ki mar rep, ki don kumba, 5 ngut ki nongri masi, khyndiat ruh kiba ri blang, Jan baroh ki ri syiar khasi mar mar 9-12 tylli shi tnum iing ban bamdoh bad ban die, ki don kumba 4 ngut kiba nang ban ai kynbat puh bsein, dait ksew, dait miaw bad kiwei ki mrad lane lada don ka proi, mynsaw, kem prum, ur bad khein shyieng, don 2 ngut ki nongpynkha khun, don ruh 3 ngut kiba tbit ban thain khoh, star, kriah, shang, ruh, shylliah thri ban shoh kba, thain knub, prah, mula, shylliah siej, shylliah tyra, shylliah thiar kiba bad kiwei kiwei, suh jain tang 1, shnong dukan ha Nongstoin kumba 10 ngut bad ki nongkhwai dohkha ha Wah Kynshi kiba ioh dohkha shibun ban bam bad ban die ha iew Nongstoin. Ki riew rangbah jong ka shnong ki la iathuh ha une u nongthoh khubor ba ha ki khlaw ba kham pajih na shnong, kynthup ha ki khlaw ha ranab bad ki riat jong ka Wahkynshi, ki dang don ki sniang khlaw, ki syiar khlaw, ki Niuhrei, ki Sim babun jait bad ha ki katto katne ki jaka dang don ki Khiat ruh. Ki la iathuh ruh ba ha ka snem 2009 ka la don ka jingphuh syntiew ki siej bad la wan mih shibun ki khnai kiba bam ia ki syntiew siej bad ki la pynjot ruh ia ki jingthung jingtep ba la wanrah ia ka jingduh ka ba jur ha ki nongrep.Haba kren halor ki jingiarap jong ka sorkar ki rangbah bad ki longkmie jong ka shnong ki la iathuh ba ka don kawei ka Anganwadi bad ka Anganwadi Helper kiba iarap ia ki khynnah ha shnong ban pynkmen bad pynsngewthuh katba lah halor bun kiei kiei bad ban sam ia jingbam tei met. Halor ka koit ka khiah jong ki khynnah bad ki kynthei ba dang armet bad dang aibuin ym don Asha ha shnong ban iakhmih lem. Ki khynnah ba 6 bai haduh, 3 snem ki don 35 ngut bad kiba 3 snem haduh 6 snem ki don 45 ngut. Lajar katta ruh ki don tengkhat ki ANM ki wan ban ai injek ha shnong, la iathuh ki rangbah bad ki longkmie. Ki la iathuh ruh ba ka Sub-Centre ka don ha Mawkadiang kaba jngai kumba 15 km da ka kjat na shnong bad kumba 18 km da ka kjat sha Civil Hospital kaba ha Mawiaban.Haba phai biang sha ka jingkner ne khlem kner ka sorkar, ki la iathuh ba ka PWD kam pat ai surok ia ki, ka PHE ruh kam pat leh ei ei ia ka shnong, ka Agriculture, Horticulture, Soil bad Water Conservation, Water Resources, Forest, Veterinary, Sericulture, Fishery bad kiwei kiwei ki tnat sorkar kim pat pynjaw ei ei ia ka shnong. Tang ka Education, Social Welfare, ka ICDS bad ka C& RD ki la kham kner da ki skhim bapher bapher.Kaba sngew sangsot ia ki nongshongshnong hangne ka long ba shiteng na ki, kim don khyndew lajong hynrei ki dei ki Nongshongsap lane ki nongshongthap. Kine ki dei na ka kur Marshra, Marshillong, Iawlar bad Sohphoh. Tang ka kur Puwein kaba long ka trai khyndew ha Mawpon. Kaba sngewsih jur ka long ba hapoh kane ka Kur, ka don hapdeng ka Mokutduma ba iaknieh ia ka jinglongtrai halor kane ka khyndew kur. Ki nongshongshnong ki la iathuh ba kane ka la sdang naduh 1992- 1993 bad ka dang bteng haduh mynta , kaba la wanrah ia ka jingiakynat ka ba jur ha shnong ha thaw bad ka la ktah ruh wat ia ka jingpalei mynsiem jong kiwei ki kur.Ki jingeh kiba ka shnong Mawpon ka dang iakynduh haduh mynta ki long halor ka kam Sordar lane ka kam Rangbahshnong. La kynnoh ba u Sordar shnong u na mynta um kit satia ia ka khia ka shon jong ka shnong bad bun ki jingmyntoi kiba ka shnong ka dei ban ioh, ka la duh non bad bun ki kam shnong ki la pulom noh namar um ju don ha shnong hynrei u sah lynter ha Nongstoin ba u hab ban korbar ia ka business lajong. Bun bah ki kam kiba iadei bad ki bor sorkar ha ki kam pynroi pynsan jong ka shnong, ka shnong la shu duh ei. Bun ki briew jong ka shnong ki la ofng ba ka la bha shibun ia u ban resign non na ka kam ban ym long ka diengpyngkiang ia ki kam shnong.Ki jingeh kiba kham kongsan jong ka shnong ki long ka jingbym don surok PWD. Mynta ka don tang ka surok jong ki trok four-wheel ba kit dieng supply bad rnga ha ki snem kiba mynshuwa. Mynta tang ki Bolero Pick-up (four-wheel) kiba lah ban poi sha shnong lyngba Kane ka surok khlaw, kata ruh ba la iarap da ka skhim 100 sngi (NERGS) hangne hangtai. Ka skhim umbam uhdih na ka PHE ruh kam don satia ha shnong katta ruh la 48 snem naduh ba ioh jylla lajong. Ia mynta ki nongshongshnong ki ioh um na ki katto katne ki wahduid kiba tyrkhong noh ha ki bnai tlang. Don ruh ki tnum iing kiba shu ioh um madei mata na ki tyllong um na ki lawbniap kiba pajih bha. Ha ki bnai slap pat (April – September) ka shnong ka ioh umslap. Sa kawei pat ka jingeh ha shnong ka dei ka ding ilektrik. Ki Post ilektrik ki la don, ki sainar ki la dep teh pynpur ka Transformer ruh la dep pyndait hynrei ka ding ilektrik kam don namar la sniew ka Mashin (Transformer). Ki paidbah jong ka shnong ki kyntu ia ka MeECL ban wan ai noh ia ka ding ilektrik ban lait na ka jingshong dum. Na ka liang jong ka koit ka khiah ruh ki paidbah nongshong ki la ud bha namar kim don ki lad jingiarap kiba jan ban ioh ia ka jingkoit jingkhiah. Kumta ki kyrpad jur ia ki bor sorkar ban buh noh ia ka PHC ha Risiang lane ha thain ba kham jan ban ioh jingmyntoi lem kiba ha ka thain Nongtrai. Ki jingpang kiba kynrei ha shnong jong ki dei ka Flu, prie-pynhiar, Suhot, Malaria, ka bampong ha ki khyndiat ngut. La iathuh ruh ba bun ba bun ba la khakhun ha hospital.Na ka liang ki nongmihkhmat ki MP, MLA, MDC, ki rangbah bad longkmie ki la iathuh ba baroh ki MP Kim shym la iarap skhim ei ei ruh. U MLA u la iarap 5 kg u khaw shi iing bad u MDC 2 kg. Ha ka jingai rashon la ai khaw AAY tang shi iing, khaw PHH 42 iing bad u khaw non-NFSA 29 iing. Ka shnong ka khlem ioh ei ei shuh lait noh tang u khaw. Ki la kynnoh ruh ba wat ha ka jingai khaw ruh ki nongmihkhmat ki leh politics. Ki la iathuh ruh ba u MLA ba mynta um pat wanjngoh ia ka shnong jong ki wat hadien 3 snem ruh.Ha ka liang ki Mobile service pat kane ka shnong Mawpon ka ioh network na ka Jio Tower ha Mawlangriang bad ha Sangriang bad nangta na ka Cell One Tower ha Mawnar, Nongpyndeng bad Umdohlun.Ki kur kiba don ha kane ka shnong ki dei ka Puwein, Marshra, Iawlar, Sohphoh bad ka Marshillong.Kane ka shnong ka long kawei na ki shnong Nongtrai ( a geographical area having a moderate type of climate and semi green vegetation). Ka long kawei na ki shnong Nongtrai kaba itynnat bha ha ka mariang. Ka shnong ka don hajan tmier jong ka riatbah kaba noh sha Wah Kynshi ha kaba la mut ban den ia ka Kynshi Stage-I Hydel Project jong ka kompeni Athena bad kaba khlem seisoh ei ei. Ka area naduh shnong shaduh phang sepngi bad shaduh phang shatei ka long ka pyntha phlang ba ka pynitynnat shuh sbuh da ka jingdon ki wahduid kiba don dohthli bad shalynnai bad hateng hateng ki lawlynnong bad ki lawbniap. Namar ba ka long padun kum ka jin kulai bad kaba kynjang, nangne lah ban iohi ia bun ki bynta jong ka Ri Lyngngam, ki syntai lum jong ka South West Khasi Hills kum u Kohtyllaw, u Kubuit, Kubah, u Niangram, syntai lum Wahkaji-Umjarain, u Kyllailyngsngun bad u syntai lum Ngundilang. Lah ruh ban iohi ia u lum Mawthadraishan bad bun ki bynta jong ka West Khasi Hills. Oh ka dei ka jaka kaba paka tam ban wangkai ki nongshang pyrthei (a perfect tourist spot) lane ka jaka ba shnong ki blei.
title: Ka Shnong Mawpon, Nongstoin Syiemship

content: Shillong: Ki nongialam jong ki saw seng bhalang, ba kynthup ia U bah L Marngar, na ka KSU, Bah W Rani, na ka FKJGP, Bah BP Thangkhiew na ka RBYF bad U bah SK Blah, na ka HNYF, ki la pynpaw ia ka jingsngew khia jongki, halor ka jingleit ujor jong ki lai ngut kiba kyrteng U  Prantush Sarkar, Mridul Das bad U Vinayak Roy, sha U Lat ka Jylla, ha ka 15tarik mynta u bnai, ha kaba ki la pyni ba ka Meghalaya, ka dei ka jylla, kaba iaid ha ka jingsngew pher jaitbynriew.Kitei ki la  ujor ba ki Hindu ha Meghalaya, kim ioh EPIC, EPIC, PAN card, Birth certificate bad kiwei de ki kot ki sla, kiba pyni ia ka jinglong nong India jong ki. Kitei ki sengbhalang, ki ong ba katei ka jing ujor, ka pyni, ba ka don ka jingsngew niam ha ka Jylla bad ka bym don jingshisha satia, ha kaba ki don bun bah, kiba ioh ia ka  EPIC, Birth certificate, Ration card bad ba ki sengbhalang, kim donkti eiei satia halor katei ka kam, lada jia ba kito kiba wan ki pyni ialade ba ki don ki nong India.La ong shuh shuh ba kitei ki lai ngut, ki dei kiba trei mawshun ha Ichamati bad ki dei ruh kiba im ha ka kam benami bad kitei ki la khanglad ia ka kamai kajih jong ka jylla bad kim shym la bud kyndon satia ia ka jingai laisen bar jylla bad mynta ki kynnoh ia ki sengbhalang, ba ki pyn iapher jaitbynriew.Kitei ki shitniam Hindu, ki pynbudnam ruh ba ki jingtrei kam ha ka jylla, ki dei kiba pyniaid ha ka jingsngew niam khristan bad ban khanglad ia kito kiba dei na ka niam Hindu bad ki kynnoh ruh ba wat ki pulit, ki don bynta, ha kaba khanglad ha ka jingsngew niam bad la dawa ba ki pulit, ki de ban shim khia bad leh tyngeh ia kitei ki briew.Kitei ki kynnoh ruh ba wat ki kashari ha Meghalaya, ki don bynta lem ha kaba pyn kylla niam ia ki briew, da ka jingdon bynta lang bad ki District Council bad ki pulit bad ki kashari, ki dei ban shim khia ia kum kitei ki jing kynnoh, la ong shuh shuh, da kitei ki sengbhalang.Kitei ki sengbhalang, ki kren shai ba ka thong jongki, ka long ban pynneh ia ka jinglong kyrpang ki trai jylla, ban iada ia la ki jong ki hok bad ia la ka jinglong kyrpang bad ba kim shym la niew tang satia, halor ka jing iapher niam, ong shuh ki sengbhalang. Kumta la dawa ba ka sorkar Jylla, ki District Council, ki dei ban leh tyngeh ia kitei ki briew, ha shwa ba kiei kiei kin iaid shaba palat pud.
title: Ki 3 ngut, kiba ujor sha U Lat, dei kiba trei mawshun bad leh benami ha Ichamati, ong ki saw seng

content: U bah Spiton Kharakor, u dei uwei na ki nongthoh uba don ia u khulom, uba nep bad u dei ruh u nongthoh artikel, uba rim duh bad uba iai neh ha kane ka kam thoh, la 52 snem eiei.Ha ka jing iakren bad U Rupang, U bah Spiton, u iathuh ba ula sdang ban thoh naduh u snem 1968, ha kaba ula ju long tang kum u nongthoh shithi sha U Editor, ha ka kotkhubor Ka Pyrta U Riewlum, kaba dei ka kotkhubor, kaba iaid iew bha ha kitei ki por. Hadien kata, u iai bteng bad ula thoh ia kumba 600, 700 tylli ki artikel haduh ha kine ki sngi.Haba la kylli, ba balei u shait thoh bha ia ki jingthoh tang ha ki kotkhubor Khasi, utei u rangbah, u ong ba u kwah ban thoh da ka Khasi, khamtam, ia ki kam iing jong ka jaitbynriew.Namar ba utei u rangbah, u shait thoh bha ruh ia u pud u sam hapdeng ka Assam bad ka Meghalaya, kumta utei u rangbah, ula kynthoh, ha ka jing iakren, da kaba ong “Ki nong synshar Meghalaya, naduh ba ioh hill state kim shym phikir ia u pud u sam” bad hangta, u ai nuksa da kaba ong “Ha ka jaka jongngi hapoh Killing, kam jngai satia na Khanapara bad ka Assam ka wan tur ka wan shwa lyngba ka Assam State Electricity Board bad ka thaw ia ki electric post hapoh Meghalaya, hynrei ka Meghalaya, kam shym la leh eiei”.La pyn kynmaw biang U Bah Spiton, ba ha u snem 1976, ha ka por jong ka jing ialang jong ka seng Congress ha Guwahati, ka Assam, ka la thaw ia ar tylli ki iing sem pyngngad jong ka Indira Gandhi, kiba la tip, kum ka Indira Guest House No.1 and No.2. Kitei ki iing, ki dei kiba ieng halor ka khyndew ka shyiap jong ka hima Mylliem bad hadien kata, katei ka jaka, ka iai neh bad ka Assam, ha kaba mynta kitei ki iing, ki dei ki jaka sah jong u myntri rangbah ka Assam.U bah Spiton, ula kren biang, da kaba ong ba ka jing ia kajia pud, kam don satia hapdeng ka sorkar Assam bad ka Meghalaya, namar ba kam don hi ruh ka jing ialeh mukotduma ha Supreme Court, ha kaba ka Assam ruh kam ai ju ai mukotduma bad ka Meghalaya ruh kajuh hi.Utei u rangbah, u pynkynmaw ba ha u snem 1968, ka Beltola bad ka Basistha, ki hap hapoh ka Hima Mylliem, ha kaba ha u snem 1960, u myntri Lebanon Kharkongngor, u ju leit lum khajna na Beltola, ha kaba kiba don ha katei ka jaka, ki ju siew ia ka khajna sha ka Hima Mylliem. [sngewbha ban peit ruh ia ka youtube jong u rupang].
title: Ha u snem 1960, u myntri ka hima Mylliem, u ju leit lum khajna na Beltola, ong U Bah Spiton Kharakor

content: “Bad ka jingim bymjukut ka long ban ithuh ia me, u Blei…bad kaba ithuh ia u Jisu Khrist, ia uba me la phah.”Lehse ki nongsngap bad nongpule ki lah ban lyngngoh ia u dak jingkylli uba don ha ba kut ki kyntien “Ka Jingim bymjukut”. Hato u nongkren u artatien mo ia ka jingim bymjukut? Em kam dei kumta, pynban u dak jingkylli u pynpaw ia ka jingiaksaid kaba jur ban sngewthuh ia ka jingjylliew jong kane ka sobjek bad kumno ban pynmynta ia ka jingim bymjukut.Ha ka jingngeit bad jinghikai Khristan, wat ha ka niam tynrai ki khun ki ksiew ki hynniewtrep ruh, la bynta ia ka jingim ha ki ar bynta, kawei ka jingim ha pneh pyrthei bad kawei pat ka jingim sha lyndet ka pyrthei ne ha bneng ne ha dwar u Blei. Ki paidbah salonsar ki sngewthuh ba ka jingim bymjukut ka dei kata ba u ne ka briew ki leit ban shongneh bad shongthait junom ha bneng ne ha dwar u Blei hadien ba ki la iehnoh ia ka jingim ha pyrthei.Lada shu shim beit ia ka jingmut ki kyntien, ka jingim bymjukut ka thew ia ka jingim ka bym mad shuh ia ka jingiap. Niuma, ka jingim bymjukut kam dei ka sain pyrkhat tynrai jong ki Jiw bad ki Jiw kim ngeit ha ka jingim bymjukut. Ki riewstad Baibl ki batai ba ka khanatang shaphang ka jingkhie im biang ki shyieng kiba tyrkhong ha ka kitab U Ezekiel kam thew ia ka jingim bymjukut, hynrei kane ka shat phalang ia ka jinglaitluid ki khun Israel na Babilon. Ka jinghikai shaphang ka jingim bymjukut ka ioh ban bsut ha ka jingim jong ki Jiw hadien ba ki la laitluid na Babilon. Ka jingngeit ha ka jingim bymjukut hapdeng ki Jiw ka kha bad san na ka jingiatyngkhuh jong ki bad kiwei pat ki jaidbynriew bad khamtam eh bad ki nongpersia.Katkum ki riewstad, ka kitab u Daniel 12:1-2 ka dei ka jingthoh kaba nyngkong eh ha ka Baibl shaphang ka jingim bymjukut bad kane ka kitab ka iathuh shaphang ka jingshah pynshitom bein ki Jiw ha u Syiem Antiochos IV uba la pynbor ia ki ban iehnoh ia ka niam tynrai jong ki bad kito ki bym pdiang ki shah pynshitom bad shah pyniap. Ha kane ka jingpynbor bad jingpynshitom ki don ki Jiw kiba laitim bad kumta ia kane ka jingjia la thoh bad pynwandur ha ka kitab u Daniel kum ka jingiada u Blei bad ka jingmihpat . Ha ka kitab Jingstad U Solomon 2:23 la iathuh ba u Blei uba la thaw ia u khun bynriew ha ka dur ka jong U hi, U don ruh ka jingthmu ba u khun bynriew un im junom bad un ym iap. Ki nongthoh komentari pat ki artatien la kane kan dei ka sain pyrkhat tynrai ki Jiw.Ki riewstad Baibl ki batai shuh shuh ba ki Jiw ki ngeit ba ka Bneng ka dei ka jaka shong jong U Blei bad ki briew kim lah ban leit shata wat ynda ki la khlad na ka pyrthei, pynban ki leit sha ka jaka ba ki khot ka Shoel ha ka ktien hebru bad ka shoel kam dei ka jaka shongneh kaba junom. Hoid ki don ki jingthoh shaphang ka jingim hadien ka jingiap ha ka Baibl bad ha kiwei de ki jingthoh, hynrei kane kam dei ka sobjek ba ki Jiw ki pynleit jingmut haduh katta katta.U Josephus u nongthoh histori ba hyndai tam u pynpaw ia ka jingiapher jingmut hapdeng ki sadusi bad ki pharisi halor kane ka sobjek. Katkum u Josephus, ki sadusi kim ngeit ha ka jingim bymjukut , kim ngeit ha ka jingim hadien ka jingiap bad kim ngeit ruh ba u Blei un ai nong ne pynrem iano iano ha kata ka jingim bymjukut. Katba ki pharisi pat ki ngeit ba ka mynsiem ka iai im junom, bad u Blei u ai ka nong ha u ba hok bad u pynrem ia u bymman ha kata ka jingim bymjukut.Kawei na ki jinghikai shong tynrai jong ka Balang Khristan ka dei ka Jingim Bymjukut bad man la ka por ngi phla ia kane, “…nga ngeit ha ka jingmihpat bad jingim bymjukut”. Hapdeng ki khristan ka Bneng, kaba u ne ka briew kin shong neh junom, ka dei ka jaka kaba dap da ka jingsuk bad jingkmen. Ki don ruh ki jingrwai ba ki nongthaw jingrwai ki pynwandur ia ka Bneng da ki rong ki rup. Kum ka nuksa, ki kyntien jingrwai kiba pynpaw ba ha bneng “ia ka lynti iaid la siang da ka ksiar nylla”.Hato ka jingim bymjukut ka thew tang ia kata ka jingim ka ban sa wan ynda u ne ka briew ki la leit nangne na pyrthei? Hato ngim lah mo ban mad bad iohi ia ka jingim bymjukut naduh mynta? Lane naduh ka jingim hangne ha pyrthei?Ka jingim bymjukut ka dei ka jingngeit kaba iasnoh bad ka jingim, ka jingshah shitom, ka jingiap bad jingmihpat u Jisu Khrist. Ka thong jong u Blei lyngba u Jisu Khrist ha ka pyrthei ka long ban ai ha ki khun bynriew ia ka jingim bymjukut. Ki nongthoh komentari ki kren shai ba ka jingim bymjukut ka dei ka jong u briew bad ka sdang naduh kane ka sla pyrthei. Ka khubor ba bha ba u Jisu u ialap ka kynthup ia ka jingim bymjukut .Hynrei ka juk ne ka por ba u Jisu u im bad treikam ka dei ka juk kaba ki briew ki kham pynleit jingmut bad khein kor ia ka jingim ha pyrthei lane kumno ban im bad kumno ban ia imlang ne ban iadei para briew bad ruh bad u Blei. Kane ka juk ka la saindur ia u Jisu, ia ki jinghikai bad jingialap jong U bad ruh ka la saindur ia ki briew kiba iashem bad U.Ym lah ban len ba u Jisu u kren shaphang ka jingim bymjukut, ka hima u Blei bad ki hima ki Bneng. Don ki por ba kine ki paw ba ki iasnoh kawei ha kawei pat, hynrei don pat ki por ba i kumba ki kit la ka jong ka jingmut. Ar hajar snem mynshuwa u Jisu u la wan sha ka pyrthei ban pynjia long ia ka Hima u Blei ne ka Hima ki bneng hangne ha khyndew bad ha ka Gospel u Ioanis 10:10, u Jisu u la ong “… nga nga la wan ba phin ioh ia ka jingim bad ioh kyrhai ruh ia ka” . Ki nongthoh komentari ki batai ba ka kyntien jingim ba dap kyrhai ha ka ktien tynrai Grik ka mut “ka jingim ka ba khiah krat, ka jingim ba tngen ba palei, ka jingim ha kaba ka rep ka riang ka bha, u slap u hap dei por bad ki saw aiom ki bud ryngkhi khlem thut bad ka kamai kajih bad ka ioh ka kot ki briew ka biang na dong shadong.” Ka jingim ka pura khlem tam khlem duna.Balei ba ka jingim u Jisu ka iasnoh bad ka jingim bymjukut? Ki kam ba u Jisu u leh ki dei ki kam ba radbah, kiba ai jingkyrmen bad jinglaitluid. U Jisu u wanlam ia ka hima u Blei sha ka pyrthei. Ha kiwei pat ki kyntien lah ban ong ba u Blei bad ka bneng ki hiar khyndew ha ka longrynnieng u Jisu ban ai jingkyrmen ia ki briew. Ka jingngeit ha ki kam u Jisu ka dei ka jingim bymjukut bad ka jingim bymjukut ka sdang naduh nangne na sla pyrthei.Ka jingkren shaphang ka jingim bymjukut ha ka Gospel u Ioanis 17:1-11 kam dei ka jingkren shaphang aiu kan jia ia ngi hadien ba la iap. Hynrei ka jingim bymjukut ka mut ka jingtip ia u Blei bad ka jingiadei bad U.Ka jingtip ia u Blei ka dei ka jingiashim bynta lang bad u Blei ha kaba pynjia long ia ka Hima u Blei hangne ha pyrthei. Ka hima jong ka hok bad ka jingshisha- ka hima jong ka jingieid- ka hima jong ka jingiaburom kylliang bad jingiabhah -ia bynta lang ia ka spah bad jingkyrkhu ba u Blei u la theh. Ka jingtip ia u Blei ka dei ka jingim bymjukut bad ka jingim bymjukut kam mut tang ka jingim hadien ka jingiap. Ka jingtip ia u Blei kam dei ruh kata ka jingtip kum ba tip ki riewstad. Hynrei ka dei ka jingshemphang bad jingiadei bad u Blei kaba man la ka sngi.Ka jingim bymjukut kam thew tang ia kaei ka ban sa jia ia u ne ka briew hadien ba ki la iap, kam dei ruh ka jingkylli mano ban ioh rung sha bneng bad mano ba shah kyntait. Hynrei ka jingim bymjukut ka dei kata ka jingshem mynsiem, ka jingshemphang, ka jingtip bad ka jingiadei bad u Blei man la ka khyllipmat, bad man la ka por ba ngi jam ha ka jingim bad sha ba palat ka jingim .Kane ka dei ka jingim bymjukut bad ka dei ka bneng. Kam dei ka kam jong u Blei ban kyntait ia ki briew sharud na U. U Blei u dap da ka jingieid, u kdup bad kynthup ia baroh ha ka sem jong u. U Blei u kwah ia ngi ba ngin ithuh bad tip ia u bad kumta u la wan khnang sha ka pyrthei ba ngin ioh ka jingiadei bad U bad ruh bad ki para briew lem bad ki para jingthaw. U Blei un ithuh ia ngi bad ma ngi ngin ithuh ia u.Ban ithuh, ban tip bad shemphang ia u Blei ka mut ba dei ban ioh ia ka jingpynkylla na u Blei hi. Ban ithuh ia u Blei ka mut ban ieid bad burom ia u para marjan, ban iatiplem bad sngewlem para marjan bad para shnong.Khatduh eh, nga la sot bad pynwan sha ka ktein khasi na ka jingthoh jong ka Rev Elizabeth Rawlings bad kata ka long “ Moments of Eternity” lane ki Khyllipmat Jong Ka Jingim Bymjukut.“Ki don ki khyllipmat ba ngi mad ia ka jingim bymjukut hangne ha pyrthei.Ki khyllipmat ba ngi dap bad shlei da ka jingieid bad ngim sngewkwah shuh ba kata ka por kan kut. Ngi kwah ba kan neh sah bad ngi.Ki khyllipmat kiba ngi iohi ia ka jingithiang bad jingitynnat jong ka jingthaw jingpynlong bad ka mariang, bad ba ngi iam lung mynisem.Ki khyllipmat ba ngi lah ban map bad iamap mar kylliang, bad katno tam ban map ia kiba ngim shym la lah ban map. Ki khyllipmat ba ngi iehnoh ia ki kam ki jam ne ki jingpyrkhat tang ia ka malade bad ia ki jingbukam jong ngi. Bad ngi kner ia ki kti ban iarap bad kyrshan ia kiwei kiba donkam eh ia ka jingiarap.Ki khyllipmat kiba ngi mad ia ka bneng bad jingim bymjukut.Ki khyllipmat ba ngi ithuh bad tip ia u Blei.Ki khyllipmat ba ka jingieid ka shlei.Ki khyllipmat ba ka hok, ka bishar hok bad jingshisha ki tuid kum ka wah khlem sangeh.Ai ba ngin tip bad mad ia u Blei.Ai ba ngin mad ia ki khyllipmat ka jingim bymjukut ha ka jingim ba man la ka sngi”.Amen
title: Ki kyntien jingkyrmen: Ka jingim bymjukut?

content: Khlem poi pyrkhat kyndit kynsanJingsngewsih sha pyrthei ka wan;Jingiam briew kaba sngew shyrkheiKa jia haki ri ka pyrthei.Nangiaid ki por nangiaid ki sngi;Kala wan jia ha ri jongngiN’duh ba nga dangrit h’duh myntaKum kane keiñ ym pat ju jia.Jingpang kynsha bad ba phyllaBun ki mynsiem kila shah ktahNgam lah khlem da jaw ki ummat,Jingkthang jong ki h’ba nga pyrkhat.Lada long ka mon jong MeKynrad Sha Me ngi wan ud ngi kyrpad;Jingkhiah na Me ngin shem ia kaU Nongpyllait, U Nongiada.
title: ‘Poitri shaphang ka jingpang Covid19’

content: Shillong: Katkum ka kyrwoh ba la wan na u Bernard N Marak, u State Vice President, jong ka BJP Meghalaya Pradesh la ong ba ka seng NPP kan ym lah ban ong ia ka Party BJP, ban ieh noh ia ka Meghalaya Democratic Alliance (MDA) namar ba ka MDA ka ieng namar ba ka don ka BJP. U la ong ruh ba ka MDA kam dei ka party tang jong ka NPP namar ba lathaw ia ka Meghalaya Democratic Alliance (MDA) ha ryngkat ka jingia synrop lang bad ka party BJP.Ka jingkren U Bernard, ka long ba ha ka 16 tarik u Risaw 2020, na ka liang jong u Symbud myntri Rangbah u la ong ia ka Party BJP ban mih noh na ka Sorkar MDA lada kam hun ban ia trei lang ha ka Sorkar bad u Bernard N Marak u la pynpaw ba ka long kaba sngewsih ba na ka liang u bah Prestone u khlem pyrkhat ba khlem ka party BJP, ia ka MDA yn ym lah ban thaw.U la ong ruh ba ha ka Sorkar pdeng  ia ka  National Democratic Alliance (NDA) la pynlong da ka jingiasynrop lang bad ka party NPP. Ha  ka jylla,ka Party  NPP ka dei kaba  la jop bun ki seat ha ryngkat ka jingiasynrop lang ka Party BJP na kata ka daw ba la ai kyrteng ka Meghalaya Democratic Alliance (MDA) bad ha  Garo Hills ka Party  NPP ka dei kaba iasynrop bad ka Party  BJP ha GHADC ka ba ki la ai kyrteng ka Garo Hills Democratic Alliance (GHDA) kumta ka party NPP ka dei kaei khlem ka party BJP?Ka jingkynthoh jong u bah Prestone Tynsong ka ba la ong ia ka BJP ban ieh noh ia ka MDA, ka dei ka jingkynthoh kaba ym don jingkitkhlieh bad kane ka jingkynthoh jong ka jingphah ieh jong ka NPP ia ka BJP, ka dei ka buit ban pynphai ia ka phang bam sap jong ki nongïalam jong ka NPP.Ka NPP ka dei ka party kaba iasynrop  lang bad ka BJP ha ka MDA, ka  NPP kam dei trai   jong ka MDA  bad ka jingong jong ka NPP ia ka  BJP ban iehnoh ia ka MDA kalong kum ba shu kren biria, bad lada lada ka  NPP ka kwah ban donkti ha ka kam bamsap, ki dei ban rai ba ki kwah ban dang don ha ka MDA ne kin ieh noh namar ba na ka liang ka  BJP kan ym ia snoh kti lang ha ka jingdonkti ban ia tuh na u paidbah jong ka jylla.Ki briew ki la thait ia ka jingjur jong ka jingbam sap ha ka jylla bad kim don jingshaniah shuh ha ka MDA, namar ba ka  NPP ka kyntait ban ia kren bad ka khlem ai lad ruh ban ia kren halor ka jingbam sap ha GHADC, halor ka jingjyllei ka jingkhaii beain ia u dewiong bad kiwei kiwei.Ka jingleh jong ka party NPP ka long ba kam khein ia ka party BJP bad dei na kane ka daw ba ka seng BJP ka la shim ia ka rai ban pynpaw paidbah ia ka jingjyllei ka jingbamsap ha kane ka Sorkar synrop MDA.U Bernard, ula ong ruh ba khlem ka BJP, ka MDA kan ym lah ban ban neh, u bah Prestone u dei ban sngewthuh shai ia kane. Ka BJP ka la thung ia u Conrad Sangma kum u Myntri Rangbah, wat la ha shuwa ka jingshah jied jong u kum u National President bad halor kane ka jingkren jong u bah Prestone ki donkam ban pynshai ba ka wan tang lyngba ka jingkren jong u Conrad ne ka dei ka ba kren tang da u bah Prestone marwei?U bah Prestone u la pheil ban sngewthuh ba ka  Democratic Alliance ka mut ka ka jingsynrop lang jong ka party BJP, te  ka dei kaei ka ta ka  NPP ka ban ong ia ka  BJP ba kan ieh noh ia ka NPP? Ka BJP ka kwah ia ka jingsynshar kaba bha  “Good Governance” bad ka la kdang ban shah ia ka jingjur jong ka jingbam sap  ha ka jylla.La ong shuh ba lada ka  NPP ka kwah tang ban ioh ia ka jingiarap pisa na ka Sorkar pdeng bad la ong shuh ba ka  BJP kan rah ia kane ka bynta sha ki bor ba kham halor  bad sha ka CBI, lane kan leit ruh sha ka Court bad la ong ruh ba kin sa ujor ia ka ne ka case sha ka Lokayukta court ruh pyrshah ia ki nongïalam bad ia ki ophisar jong ka.Ka NPP ka la shet kylla ia ka BJP naduh ba la thaw ia ka NPP u Conrad Sangma u jop bun bah na Tura seat, namar ka jingkyrshan ka BJP hynrei ka jingkyrmen ba un jop ka long tang 50%. Ia u Conrad la iada da ka BJP ha ki jingkynnoh da ka liang pyrshah ha ka “Reservation policy” bad ka “Work permit for Bangladeshis”. Ia u Conrad la thung kum u Myntri rangbah ba un ialam ia ka MDA ban pynbiang ia ka jingsynshar ka ba khuid ia ki paidbah dei na kane ka daw ba ka BJP ka la kyrshan ia u.Mynta ka NPP ka la klet ia ka tynrai ba la ai da ka BJP? Ai ba u Conrad Sangma un pynshai paidbah ba ka NPP kam donkam ia ka BJP bad yn sa shim khia ia kane ka phang sha ka Sorkar pdeng.
title: Ba phah mih ia ka BJP, dei ka jingkwah U Conrad ne dei ba kren hi U Bah Prestone?

content: Shillong: Na ki 101 ngut kiba ioh pang corona thymmai ha ka Jylla, ki kynthup ia 56 ngut ki high risk na East Khasi Hills.Ka West Khasi hilla, ka don 30ngut kiba ioh pang thymmai bad kitei ki kynthup ia 29 ngut ki pulit bad uwei u high risk lane uba don jing iajan bad uba la ioh pang lypa.Ka West Garo Hills, ka don 11 ngut kiba ioh pang bad kitei ki kynthup ia 8 ngut ki high risk, uwei uba wan phai na shabar bad nangta sa uwei u nongtrei ka tnat ka koit ka khiah bad uwei uba lap ha ka jaka leh screening.Ka Ribhoi District, ka don ar ngut kiba ioh pang kiba la tip kum ki high risk contact lane kiba iajan bad kiba la don jingpang lypa.
title: 56 ngut kiba iajan bad kiba don covid, ki ioh pang ha East Khasi Hills, 29 ngut ki pulit ha West Khasi Hills

content: Shillong: Kiba ioh pang corona virus mynta ka sngi, ki long 101 ngut bad ka East Khasi Hills, ka don 56 ngut ki riew paidbah, kiba ioh pang thymmai.Ka West Khasi Hills, ka kiew bha, da ka jingdon ki 30ngut ki riew paidbah, kiba ioh pang thymmai. Ka West Garo Hills, ka don 11 ngut bad ka Ribhoi District, ka don arngut ki riew paidbah.Kiba la jem na ka jingpang, ki long 298 ngut bad kitei ki kynthup ia 223 ngut na East Khasi hills, ha kaba ki riew paidbah, ki don 217 ngut kiba la jem na ka jingpang; nangta ka Ribhoi District, ka don 55 ngut bad ka West Garo Hills, ka don 18 ngut ki riew paidbah kiba la jem na ka jingpang.Baroh kiba dang don ia ka jingpang, ki long 2,295 ngut bad kitei ki kynthup ia 1554 ngut ha East Khasi Hills, ha kaba na kitei ki kynthup  ia 1521 ngut ki riew paidbah.Kiba la jem na ka jingpang, ki long 6,034 ngut bad nangta kiba iap, ki don 75 ngut.
title: Sa 101 ngut kiba ioh pang corona, kiew ka East Khasi hills

content: Shillong: 5 ngut ki briew, kiba kynthup ia 4 ngut ki longkmie bad uwei u Rangbah ki la duh ei ia la ka jingim, hadien ba ka trok ka la leit ban rat ia ki dukan die jhur ha ka jingkieng Umkhen kaba don ha ka shnong Thangshalai, Mawryngkneng East Khasi Hills District .La iathuh ba kane ka jingjia ka la jia ha ka por 8 baje mynstep ha ka ba  ka trok ka ba don ia u number kali  UP 51 AT 2949 ka ba dang wan na Jowai bad thmu ban leit sha Guwahati lyngba ka surok By-pass, ka la rat ia kine ki dukan.Ha kane ka jingjia ki 4 ngut ki longkmie ki ba la khlad hashen ki kynthup ia ka kong Balarihun Kharkongor, ka kong  Gracefully Nongbri, ka kong Banteibha Bina, ka kong Shantilang Nongbri katba u bah Korbar sing Kharumnuid u la khlad noh ha lynti ban leit rah sa CHC.Na ka liang ki pulit  ki dang pynlong ia jingthwet ia u nongniah jong kane ka trok u ba la phet noh mar sien jia, kane ka jingjia.
title: Khlad san ngut, ba jynrat ka trok, ia ki dukan die jhur

content: Shillong: Ha kawei ka jingjia ba sngewsih kaba la jia mynta ka step ha ka por kumba 8 :00 baje eiei kawei ka trok ka ba wan na Jowai bad thmu ban leit sha Guwahati lyngba ka surok Shillong bypass ka la leit ban rat ia ki dukan ki ba don ha rud surok ha ka shnong Thangshalai, Mawryngkneng Eat Khasi Hills.Ha kane ka jingjia haduh 4 ngut ki briew kiba dei ki nongdie jingdie harud surok ki la duh ei ia la ka jingim.
title: Rat ka Trok ia ki dukan, khlad 4 ngut ha shen ha ka shnong Thangshalai

content: Shillong:Ka President jong ka All India Mahila Congress (AIMC) ka Sushmita Dey mynta ka sngi ka la thoh daka dorkhas sha u myntri rangbah duh ka Ri u Narendra Modi halor ka jing shah niew bein jong ki jaitbynriew Bengali kiba sah ha Ichamati bad ha Bholaganj jong ka jylla.Ha kane ka shithi ka Sushmita Dey ka la thoh ha ka shithi ba “Nga lah phah bunsien ka dorkhas sha u myntri rangbah ka jylla u Conrad K Sangma hynrei haduh mynta u khlem leh ei ei, namar kane nga thoh sha phi namar baka NPP kadei ruh ka sorkar synroplang ka NDA ban ai jing iarap iaki jaitbynriew Bengali kiba sah ha Ichamati bad ha Bholaganj jong ka jylla Meghalaya”.Ka Sushmita Dey kala pynpaw sha u myntri rangbah duh ka ri ba ki jaitbynriew Bengali kiba sah ha Ichamati bad ha Bholaganj jong ka jylla Meghalaya ki im hapdeng ka jing shah niew bein bad ki donkam ka jing iada kyrkieh mynta ka kynti.ha ka ne ka dorkhas ka la pynpaw ruh ba naduh ba mih ka jing iakhih hapdeng ki samla Khasi ha u bnai Jymmang 2019 ki jaitbynriew Bengali kiba sah ha Ichamati bad ha Bholaganj jong ka jylla ki don hapdeng ka jing ma naka jing shah leh bein bad ki shah kyntiat ruh bun ki lad iarap na ki bor peit bad nong pyniaid shnong.
title: Sha U Modi phah dorkhas ka President jong ka AIMC, ba shah niew bein ki Bengali ha Meghalaya

content: Ka Rida marsien iohsngew ia kata ka ktien ka la nang khuslai mynsiem.“Ani! Balei ia nga kumne..?” La mih kynsan ka jingong na ka shyntur ka Rida.Ka dem ngun bad ka leh sngewsih bha.Ha kata ka por wan mih i Kmie jong ka.“Kine te ar ngut ar ngut kumne, Rida khie leit thiah noh..” La kynhed ka Kmie.Ka Rida ka sngap man man. U Panah u phai ktien“Balei pha ruh..? Khie leit thiah ngi ba dang ia syaid ding. Long ngi pynwit seh ia pha..” U la ong“La i salia, ban kumne te bha ba men mih noh nangne na iing. Peit mo ioh poi sha ba eh..” La phai ktien sa ka Kmie ka Rida“Long balei..?” La buh jingkylli u Panah“Katta ka miet ban ia shong ar ngut ar ngut kumne te… Kam long ho..” La ong ka Kmie“Ngi la sngewthuh hi… Khie Kmie nang thiah noh … Nga lei nga dang mut ban dihsha ruh..” La kham kren jem u PanahHadien kata ka Kmie ka Rida ruh khlem phai ktien shuh ka shu leit bsut noh sha la jingthiah. Katba ka Rida bad u Panah ki dang bteng ka shong pasiaw hangta. Ka Rida ka la pynpaw hangta“Lada jia kumba phi ong, ngan leh kumno kein?” Ka la peit sha u“Rida wat khuslai ia kata. Ha nga lei nga kmen namar nga la shong bad i Mei jong phi hynrei khlem sei soh mynta pat bad phi la mih soh..” La jubab u Panah“Kata ka bym lah ban long ia nga… Kumno ngan leh pat..?” La kylli biang ka RidaU Panah u sngewthuh ba kane ka jingjia ka la sdang ban wanrah ia ka jingeh kaba lah ban buh jingma ia ka jingim jong u. U ruh mynta u la khuslai hynrei watla katta ruh u pyrshang hi ban pyntngen ia ka.“Rida wat khuslai ngan tip ma nga ia phi…” U la ong“Hu, tip tip…” La thnum ka Rida.U Panah u la sngew rem ia lade namar kaei kaba jia. U tip ruh ba kata ka dei khlem pep ka dak jong ka jingarmet.“To Rida ia noh leit thiah noh…” U la werKa Rida kaba la kah da u lyoh ka jingsngewsih ka la pyrkhat ha lade kumno ban leh.“Ia nang leit thiah phi…” Ka la ongU Panah u la leit thiah noh marwei.Kham shiphang hadien kata ka Rida ka sngewthuh ba mynta ka la poi ha ka jingjah burom bakhraw ha ka jingim. Ka mutdur ba lada tip ki Niakha jong ka, lada tip ki nonghikai jong ka, lada tip ki paralok jong ka, khlem pep ki la kyndit bad kynshish ia ka. Kane ka rukom pyrkhat ka la dung kura ha ka mynsiem jong ka bad ka la pyrkhat ban shu leit pynhab noh ia ita i khun ba la don hapoh kpoh. Hynrei ynda ka la pyrkhat bha kam sngew dei. Ynda haba kam lah pyrkhat shuh ia kata ka la iengjoit nangta ban leit thiah noh.Mynmiet ka la shu thiah khuslai. Hapdeng ka jingthiah ka la phohsniew.“Ba wan mih u Kpa jong ka ha iing. U la khot ia ka ban leit jingleit bad u. Da ka jingkmen ka Rida ruh ka la khreh la khrum da ki riam baitynnat. U Kpa uba la ap ha phalor u la pyrta wan shi wan noh. Mar iadep riam dep beit ka ruh ka la mih noh nangta ban leit bad u”.Hamar kata ka por ka shu kyndit noh na ba iohthiah. Hadien kata kam nang shuh ban thiah ka la pyrkhat bad iai pyrkhat ” Hato nga la armet shisha..?” Ka la kylli bad iai kylli wei briew.Haduh ban da riew u syiar ruh ka khlem ioh thiah haduh ban da shai ka bneng blait. Kumta ruh kam sngew myntoi shuh ban thiah ka khie noh nangta. Ha kata ka jingkhia jingmut ka don tang kawei ka rai bad kata ka long“Ban wer la u Panah ban leit shim dawai doctor ia ka”.Kumba ju trei ka trei ka beng bad haba la khie u Panah ha bym don ka Kmie ka la pynpaw ha u ia kata ka jingkwah jong ka. U Panah ruh da kaba kmen u la kohnguh.” Hooid, wat khuslai ngin leit noh mynta ka sngi hi mo” la phai ktien u Panah.
title: BALEI IA NGA

content: Nongpoh:Ki nongialam ka Nongpoh Town Committee (NTC), ki la pynbna ba ki la pyllait da kaba suk mynsiem ia 8 tylli ki shnong kiba la don baroh shikatta ha ka thup jong ka Urban bad ha ka jingpeit jingkhmih ka NTC, ki la pyllait noh ia kitei ki 8 tylli ki shnong na ka thup kum ki shnong ba la long Sor bad kiba hap hapoh ka Nongpoh Town Committee.Kitei ki phra tylli ki shnong, ki kynthup ia ka shnong Umskun, Shangbangla, Pahamriohlum, Pahamriohthem, Umshangling, Umrangksai, Umlyngkdait bad Lumbyrhing, kiba la iai dawa na ka por sha ka por, ba ki la kwah ban noh na ka thup kum ki shnong ba hap ha ka Urban. Kumta halor katei ka nongrim kaba la pynlong syndon ia ka Nongpoh Town Committee, ba kin shim ia ka rai ba kin pyllait noh ia kitei ki shnong na ka thup hapoh ka Nongpoh Tiwn Committee bad ban ai ha ka mon kaba laitluid jong kitei ki shnong.U Bah Rayonald Kharkamni, General Secretary ka NTC, u la ong ba ka Nongpoh Town Committee ka la shim ia katei ka rai ban ai laitluid noh ia kitei ki shnong ba kin mih noh na ka Town, ka dei hadien ba la iohi ba ki nongialam shnong na kitei ki 8 tylli ki shnong, ki la iai dawa ban mih noh na ka thup kum ki shnong kiba hap hapoh ka Town bad Urban.Utei u nongialam ka NTC, u la ong ba ki la iashong pyrkhat la bunsien bad ki bor District bad khamtam ruh la pynsngew sha ka Khasi Hills Autonomous District Council, da kaba kynduh ia u EM ka KHADC, u Bah Paul Lyngdoh, na ka bynta ban iakren halor katei ka phang, hynrei watla ka NTC ka la pyllait ka la pyllait suk ia kitei ki shnong ba kin lait na ka thup Urban, pynban na ka liang u EM u la ong, ba halor katei katei ka jingdawa da kitei ki shnong, un sa rah sha ka EC bad un sa pyntip ruh sha ka iing Dorbar ka KHADC, khnang ba kin ioh shim ia ka rai kaba biang.U la ong ruh ha ka jingshisha ka NTC, kam shym la shong kli kti ha kaba iadei bad ki kam pynroi bad kat ki kam pynroi ba wan na ka sorkar ka pyntrei hok na ka bynta ka jingmyntoi ki shnong halor ki kam pynroi ha ki shnong ki thaw.
title: Pyllait  ka NTC ia ki Phra shnong kiba  mih na Urban ha Ri Bhoi

content: Shillong:U myntri ka sorkar pdeng u ba dei peit ia ka tnad ialeh kai, u kiren Rijiju, ha ka sngi nyngkong u la kyntait ban iakren ne kynthoh halor ka jingdawa ia ka Inner line permit ha ka jylla Meghalaya.Haba ia kren bad ki lad pathai khubor, u Rijiju u la ong ba ka mat Inner Line Permit ka dei ka mat jong ka sorkar bad ka shong ha ka rai jong ka sorkar pdeng.U la ong ruh ba ka sorkar NDA hapoh ka jingialam jong u Myntri rangbah duh ka Ri u Narendra Modi,u shimkhia bad pyrkhat kyrpang ia ki jingdonkam ban pynneh pynsah ia ki riti dustur jong ki ritpaid na ki dong shatei lammihngi.U la ong ba ka jingiakhih bad ki jingbuh ia ki jingdawa ka dei ka bynta jong ka synshar paidbah, hynrei ka ba donkam ka dei ban pynneh pynsah ia ka shongsuk shong sain ha ka Ri baroh kawei.Ha kawei ka liang, kum shi bynta ban pynpaw ia ka jing pyrshah CAA bad ban dawa ia ka jingpyntreikam ia ka ILP ha ka jylla, mynta ka sngi ka KSU ka la rah ia ki placard ha khmat ka skul bah North Eastern Hills University, kaba dei ka jaka ba u leit plie U Rijiju ia ka jaka ialehkai.
title: Ka rai halor ka ILP, ka shong ha ka sorkar pdeng, ong U Rijiju

content: Shillong:U myntri ba dei peit ia ka tnad PHE u bah Renikton Tongkhar, ha ka sngi nyngkong, u la iathuh ba hapoh ka Jal Jeevan Mission, ka sorkar pdeng ka la pdiang ia ka jingmang pisa ka ba long T.415 klur, ha ki 300 tylli ki skim na ka bynta ki 500 tylli ki shnong ki ban kynthup ia ki palat 46,000 ki longing.Haba iakren bad ki lad pathai khubor, na ka liang u bah Tongkhar u la iathuh ba ka skim jong ka sorkar pdeng ka JJM kaba la buh jingthmu ban pynpoi ia ka um ha man ki thliew ing ha u Nohprah 2022.U la iathuh ruh ba 90% ka jingmang pisa ka wan na ka sorkar pdeng bad 10 % ka dei ka ba la bei pisa na ka sorkar jylla. Ka sorkar jylla ka don ka jingthmu ba haduh u bnai lber mynta u snem kan pynioh um ia ki 2 lak tylli ki long ing.U bah Tongkhar u la pynpaw ba ha u snem 2021 ka sorkar MDA (Meghalaya Democratic Alliance) kan trei shitom ban pyndep ia baroh ki kam ki ba dang sah teng.
title: 500 tylli ki shnong, kin ioh skhim um na ka Jal Jeevan

content: Shillong:La don ki khubor ba ki riew paidbah/ briew batrei kam lajong ki lah ngat ha ki jingthok jong ki riew shim kabu lyngba ki kor komputor/ Mobile apps da kaba kular ban ioh ram da ka suk ba khlem da donkam kino kino ki sla babiang. Lah ong ruh ba ka sut ba ki nongshim ram ki hap ban siew ka long kaba heh, hap ban siew sa kiwei kiwei de ki jing siew ki bym shongnia, ka rukom khein ia ka sut kam long kaba shai bad ka jing pyndonkam bakla ia ka jingiateh soskular ka bymkhuid, hynrei tang ban ioh shim kabu lyngba ki kor mobile.Ka jingai ram kaba shaniah bad kaba suba lah ban ioh tang na ki bank bad NBFCs kiba lah register bad ka RBI bad ki kynhun kiba lah pyniaid da ka sorkar jylla hapoh ki kyndon jong ka money lending acts.Kumta, la kyntu iaki paidbah ba nym ngat ne shah thok ha kum kine ki riew shim kabu bad kidei ruh ban da wad bniah la kidei kiba shisha ne em. La kyrpad iaki paidbah ruh ba kim dei ban ai ki personal details kum kikot KYC iano iano khlem da tip tikna la ki long ba shisha bad ba lah ban shaniah. Lada lap baki don ki briew ba shim kabu kumba lah batai halor, phi lah ban ujor sha ka ain lane thoh ka jing ujor sha ka website https://sac het.rbi.org.in.Ka RBI ka lah pyntip ruh ba kino kino ka ram lyngba kikor Komputor/ mobile apps kiba hap hapoh ka jing peit jong ki banks bad NBFCs kidei ban pynpaw ia ka kyrteng jong kita ki bank lane NBFCs sha ki paidbah. Ka kyrteng bad address jong ki NBFCs kiba lah register bad ka RBI, lah ban ioh hangne https://www. rbi.org.in/Scripts/BS_NBFCList.aspx bad lada phi don kano kano ka jingujor pyr shah ia kine ki NBFCs, lah ban ujor ha https://cms.rbi.org.in.
title: Phikir ia ki nongairam lyngba ki Komputor/mobile apps ba beain, ong ka RBI

content: Shillong:U Symbud myntri rangbah ka jylla, u ba long ruh u chairman jong ka High level Commitee u bah Prestone Tynsong, u la ong ba halor ka mat Themmetor na ka liang ka sorkar jylla ka wad ia ki lad ki lynti ki ban weng ia ki jingeh shirta.Haba ia kren bad ki lad pathai khu bor, u bah Prestone, u la ong ba halor ka mat Themmetor ka sorkar ka wad ia ki lad ban weng ia ka jingeh shirta bad dei na kane ka daw ba ka sorkar ka la thaw ia ka High Level Commitee.U la ong ruh ba ka HLC ka dang iakren halor ka mat Themmetor bad haduh mynta kane ka mat ka dang im; ka HLC ka khlem iohthiah bad ka khlem ieh, hynrei ka dang wad ia ki lad ki lynti ban weng ia ka ne ka jingeh.U la ong ruh ba ki bun ki mat kiba dang hap ban bishar bha ha kaba iadei bad ka Themmetor bad kawei na kine ka long halor ka jinglong trai ia katei ka jaka. U la ong ba na ka liang ka sorkar ka kyrpad ia ki synjuk ki rangbah shnong, ki paidbah bad ki seng bhalang ba kin iai shah bad ka jingpyniaid jong ka sorkar jylla.U la iathuh ruh ba hadien ka jingsoi ia ka jingiateh hapdeng u Syiem ka Hima Mylliem, ka KHADC bad ka sorkar jylla; ka HLC kan sa shong biang ia ka jingialang bad kan sa aiti noh ia ka kaiphot sha ka sorkar jylla, halor ka rai ia ka Them metor.
title: Ka mat Themmetor ka dang im,ngi khlem iohthiah, ong u Chairman ka HLC

content: Shillong: U Symbud myntri rang bah ka jylla u bah Prestone Tynsong u la ong ba ha ka 31 tarik u kyllalyngkot 2021, yn sa lah  ban pyndonkam noh ia ka jingkieng nar ha Dwar ksuid.Haba iakren bad ki lad pathai khubor, na ka liang u bah Prestone, u la ong ba na ka liang ka BRO, ki la sdang ia ka jingshna bad ha ka 31 tarik mynta u bnai yn lah ban pyndep noh ia kane ka jingkieng.  U bah Prestone u la iathuh ba na ka liang u Incharge jong ka PWD, u bah DP Wahlang u la leit ban jurip hynnin ka sngi bad ha ka 31 tarik yn lah ban pyndonkam noh ia kane ka jingkieng nar.Kata ka Jingkieng Nar ba Thymmai, kaba kin shah ban kit ia ki Truck haduh katno Ton. Ne dang don adong (Limited Load permission) kat haduh ban da dep repair ia kata kaba rim kaba la don jingthut.
title: Ha ka 31tarik, la ioh pyn donkam ia ka jingkieng Dwarksuid

content: Shillong: U Symbud myntri rangbah ka jylla, u bah Prestone Tynsong, mynta ka sngi, u la kyntu ia ka seng kaikhlaw ka Hynniewtrep National Liberation Council (HNLC ) ba kan pyni ia ka kam, ba ka don ka jingkwah ba kan wan noh sha ka miej ban ia kren ia suk.Haba iakren bad ki lad pathai khubor na ka liang u bah Prestone Tynsong, u la ong ba ka Sorkar jylla ka kyntu ia ka seng HNLC ba kan pyni da ka kam ba ka kwah ban iakren ia suk da kaba kan sangeh noh ia ki kam pyntriem baroh.U la ong ruh ba wat la sha ka sorkar jylla, ka seng HNLC kam shem ka ai kano kano ka jingthoh ba ka kwah ban iakren iasuk noh bad ia kane ka seng ka ju pynpaw tang ha ki lad pathai khubor, hynrei ka sorkar jylla ka long ka ba kloi ban rah ia kane ka mat sha ka sorkar pdeng.U la ong ruh ba ka seng HNLC ka donkam ban iakren iasuk ha ka sorkar pdeng lyngba ka sorkar jylla, namar ba ia ka seng HNLC, la niew beain da ka sorkar pdeng ym ka sorkar jylla.U la ong ruh ba lada kane ka mat ia kren ia suk ka dei ha kti ka sorkar jylla, kane ka jingiakren ia suk la dei ban dep iakren, hynrei ki dei ban pynpaw ia ka kam ba ki kwah ban iakren iasuk noh khnang ba na ka liang jong ka sorkar jylla kan lah ban leit rah ia kane ka mat sha ka sorkar pdeng.Halor ka jingshah byrngem ia ka ing ka sem jong u bah Prestone, u la ong “Ngam don eiei ban ong halor kane ka jingbyrngem jong ki, kam long ka ba suk ia kino kino ki nongshong shong jong ka jylla kiba don ka jingkitkhlieh ba kin byrngem iano iano bad ngam dei ban shim kyrpang ia ka jingbyrngem jong ki.”U la ong ruh “Ki briew ki ba byrngem ia nga ngam tip balei ki byrngem hynrei nga dei u briew ba la jied da u paidbah na Pynursla bad nga don hangne ban ai ka jingshakri ba pura ia u paidbah ka jylla.”Halor ka jingkynnoh ba donkti ia ka kam khaii beain ia u dewiong, u la ong ba lada ki don ia ki sabut sakhi ban pynshisha ia ka jingdonkti u long u ba kloi ban hiar shuki noh.
title: Ngam don eiei ban ong, halor ka jing byrngem jongki; kynthoh U bah Prestone, halor ka jingkren ka HNLC

content: Shillong: Kiba ioh pang corona virus, ki don 22ngut mynta ka sngi bad kitei ki kynthup ia 18 ngut ki riew paidbah ha East Khasi hills, 2 ngut ha West Jaintia Hills bad sa 2ngut ha East Jaintia Hills.Kiba jem na ka jingpang, ki long 18 ngut bad kitei ki dei tang na East Khasi hills, ha kaba ki riew paidbah, ki long 17 ngut.Kiba dang don ha ka jingpang, ki long  baroh 139 ngut bad ka East Khasi Hills, ka don 98 ngut, ka West Khasi hills 3 ngut, ka Ribhoi 13 ngut, ka West Jaintia Hills 4 ngut, East Jaintia Hills 2 ngut West Garo Hills 15  ngut, South West Garo Hills 2 ngut, East Garo hills bad North Garo hills mar iwei.Kiba la jem baroh ki long 13,204 ngut bad kiba iap, ki long 139 ngut.
title: 22 ngut kiba ioh pang corona thymmai, bun tam ha East Khasi Hills

content: Shillong: Kiba ioh pang corona ha East Khasi hills, ki kynthup ia 6 ngut ki nongtrei ka koit ka khiah, 4 ngut ki high risk contact, iwei ILI Case, iwei na Laitumkhrah, iwei na Mawprem, 4 ngut kiba wan shabar, iwei na Rilbong.Ha East Jaintia Hills, ki don 2 ngut kiba dei ki high risk contact bad ka West Jaintia hills, ka don 2 ngut, ha kaba iwei dei i high risk bad iwei na Dongmihsngi.Kiba la jem na East Khasi hills, ki kynthup ia uwei u shipai, uwei u nongtrei ka koit ka khiah, 4 ngut ki high risk contact,  6 ngut na Laitumkhrah, iwei na Madanryting, 3 ngut na Nongrim hills bad 2 ngut na Rynjah.
title: 6 ngut ki nongtrei ka koit ka khiah, kiba ioh corona, 4ngut kiba wan na shabar

content: Shillong:Ha ka 30 tarik u bnai ba la dep, u Rupang u lah pynkup burom ia lai ngut ki nongniah kali kita ki long u bah Robertson Nengnong, na ka Pynursla Shillong Tourist Maxi Owners Association, U bah Kenson Marbaniang na ka Pynursla Shillong Indica Tourist Taxi Owners and Drivers Association bad U bah Manbha Sohkhlet, na ka All Local and Tourist Taxi Association, Pynursla.Ha kane ka jingpynkupburom, la don lang u bah N Khongkhlad uba dei u Secretary jong ka Covid 19 Team na bynta ka Border Trade Riwar Mihngi, nangta u Sirdar ka Elaka Nongjri, u Bah Napoleon Siej.Ha ka jingpynkupburom, u bah N Khongkhlad u la ai khublei shi katdei ia ki drivers’ association bad u la ong ba ki draibar ki dei kiba don ka kam kaba khraw, kata ki long ki dei kiba bat ia ka mynsiem jong kawei pa kawei ka longing, khamtam haba dei bad kane ka thain, namar u la ong ba kiba bun ha ka thain Pynursla hi, ki dang ia shong kali kamai.Na ka liang ka jong u Bah Khongkhlad, u la iai ban ba lada don kino kino ki jingeh haba iadei bad ki nongniah truck u la kyrpad ban pyntip lem sha ka truck Association khnang ban lah ban pynbeit iaki jingduna bad ki jingdkoh. U la ai khublei shikatdei eh iaka JAC kaba la lah ban pynsngewthuh jingmut ia ki association jong ki kali kamai bapher, kiba don ha kane ka thain.Na ka liang u Sirdar Nongjri, u la kren shaphang kata ka jingmut jong ka jingpynkupburom, ha kaba u ong ba uno uno uba trei shitom u don ka jingkhymih lynti bad kane kam thew tang iaka pisa lane kata kaba ai jakpoh, hynrei ia kum kane ka jingpynkupburom. U la ong shaphang ka jingkordor jong ka kam draibar, namar lada ki draibar kim don ka jingkit khlieh kam don ka jingsngew suk sngew shngain, hynrei lada ki draibar ki don ka jingkit khlieh ka don ka jingsngew suk sngew shngain wat ban thiah ha ka kali ba ki niah ruh kam don kano kano ka jingsngewrit mynsiem te ka long kaba donkam shi katdei eh ban ai burom ia ki dribar. U la kyrpad ia ki draibar ba kin long kiba iaishah namar ki passenger ki don la ka jong ka jong ka jinglong ka jong ki. U la iai ban da kaba burom markylliang haba ia kamai lang bad ban burom iaka kali kaba ai jakpoh, da ka jingkhuid jingsuba.La pyniaid ia ka jingialang, da U bah Diamondstone Lyngdoh, uba dei U President ka Joint Action Committee jong ki seng ki nongniah kali bapher ha ka thain Pynursla, ha kaba la don lang U bah RM Shabong, Editor bad u trai jong U Rupang.com.Kane ka dei ka sien, kaba lai jong ka jingsam khusnam jong U Rupang.com ia ki nongniah kali jong katei ka thain.
title: Pynkup burom u Rupang ia ki nongniah kali kamai, ka thain Pynursla

content: Shillong:Ki shipai BSF jong ka Meghalaya, ki iai bteng ban teh lakam ia ka kam khaii masi tuh ha ka Jylla.La iathuh ba hynnin ka miet, haduh mynta ka step, la ioh kem ia 60 tylli ki masi, kiba shongdor T.21lak, ha kaba la ioh kurup na ki khappud bapher jong ka Jylla.Ha kawei ka jingjia, la ioh kurup ia kawei ka trok na jingkieng Sonapur, kaba don hajan Umkiang, kaba kit masi khlem ki kot ki sla kiba biang. La ioh kem ia uwei na katei ka trok, katba uwei ula ioh lad ban phet bak na ka jaka jong ka jingjia.
title: Kurup masi ki BSF 60 tylli, kiba shongdor T.21lak na khappud

content: Shillong:Ka Darrang Tourism Promotion and Development Society ryngkat ka jing iatreilang bad ka Tour Operators Association of Meghalaya, da ka jingiarap lyngba ka sorkar jylla, ka la ioh ia ka training na ka bynta ki nongking lieng bad ki nongtrei kum ki guide ha Darrang Tourist Spot. Ki nongwan ai jinghikai ki dei na ka LifeSaving Mumbai kiba la tbit bha ha kane ka kam.Kane ka jingai jinghikai ka dei na ka bynta ki laiphew saw ngut kiba la jied kyrpang na ka shnong Darrang, ban pyntbit kumno ban ai jingiarap ia ki nongwan jngohkai ha ka por ba ki ngam um lane ha kino kino ki jingjia mynsaw kiba donkam jingiarap ba kyrkieh. Kine ki la shah ai jinghikai ki la ioh shibun ki jingtip bad jingstad ban iarap ia ki briew kum haba ngam jyllop, ur lane hap, kyllon kynsan, kiba accident bad kiwei kiwei. Ki lah ioh ruh ka jinghikai kyrpang na ka bynta ka CPR (Cardio Pulmonary Resuscitation) haba don ba shitom.Naduh mynta, ha Darrang Tourist Spot la don ki nongtrei ba kyrpang ban ai jingiarap haba don jingjia ba kyrkieh, kiba ki khot kum ki Lifeguard bad ki paitbah ki lah ban wad ia kine ki nongtrei lada donkam haba ki wan sha Darrang.U bah Reachingson Kongwang chairman ka Darrang Tourism Promotion and Development Society, u la ong ba ka long ka jingkmen kaba khraw ba ka tnat Tourism ka sorkar jylla, ka la sngap ia ka jingkyrpad ka Society ban ai kum kine ki jait jinghikai ia ki khun samla ka shnong kiba trei ha ki kam iahlieng bad ki guide ha Darrang Tourist Spot khamtam eh ban ioh jinghikai ha shnong lajong bad kawei ka jingkyrpad na ka liang ka Society ia ka sorkar lyngba ka tnat Tourism ba kan iarap ban ai ki tiar ki tar (Life Saving materials) kum ki life jackets, spine board, wheel chair, ki tyllai, ki saving bag bad kiwei kiwei kiba donkam ha kaba iadei bad kane ka jingai jinghikai , khnang ba yn lah shisha ban iarap ia ki paitbah ha ka por ba don ki jingjia mynsaw lane ngam um.
title: Hikai ia ki nongtrei ka Darrang Tourism, ban iarap ia ki paidbah ha wah Umngot

content: Ka jingkylli ba kongsan ia ngi iwei ia iwei ha kane ka juk kaba mynta ka long hato ka mynsiem ban ai ne iarap ia kito kiba donkam ka jingiarap ha kano kano ka bynta ka la hiar dor ha ka imlang sahlang jong ngi kum ka jaidbynriew bad mih bujli da ka mynsiem khwan ban pan ne ioh pdiang eiei tang ialade. Hato ka mynsiem sngewnguh ia kiba leh bha bad ialam ia ka imlang sahlang ka la duh noh bad jur pynban sa tang ka jinglong ban iatan tyllai hapdeng jong ngi ha jaka ban long ki rishot ba khlain ia kiba don ka jingkitkhlieh ia ka imlang sahlang. Ia kine ki kyntien la pynpaw ruh da u Bah Paul Lyngdoh MDC ka Jaiaw uba long ruh u E. M ka Khasi Hills Autonomous District Council dang shen ha ka jingplie ia ka W. I. R. R Kharkamni Sports Complex ha Mawroh ha ka thain Nongpoh.Balei kane ka rukom pyrkhat ka kylla khongpong ia kaei kaba ki longshuwa manshuwa jong ngi ki la saindur ban don ka mynsiem ban ai ne  iarap markylliang para ma ngi haba ngi donkam kano kano ka jingiarap ym ban shu khmih lynti tang  ia kiwei ba kin leh eiei. Ka jubab halor katei ka bynta ka shong ha ka jingsngewthuh jong ngi shimet shimet.Ha kine ki sngi ngi sakhi ia ka jingmih ki kynhun bapher bapher bad ruh ki riew shimet ban ia don bynta ha ka imlang sahlang kum ka jingpynshna ia ki iing ki sem jong kiba duk ba jynjar bad kito ki longiing kiba mad ia ki jingjia ba sngewsih kum ka jingpluh ding  bad shah pynjulor ki iing ki sem jong ki ha ki bor ka mariang ne ha kiwei kiwei ki jingeh ba ki ia kynduh . Niuma ngi sakhi ba tang khyndiat ngut napdeng ki nongshong shnong  kiba kloi ban noh synniang ha kum kita ki kam leh isynei .Lada baroh kiba bun balang ki don ia ka mynsiem noh synniang ha ka imlang sahlang, shibun kiei kiei ngi lah ban leh khlem da khmih lynti than tang ia ki nongmihkhmat ne bor sorkar . Hooid ki don ki shnong kiba dang don ka mynsiem sngewlem ban ia don bynta lang ha kino kino ki jingeh ba ki nongshong shnong ki ia kynduh kum ka jingiarap ban pynshna ia ki iing ki sem ki para nongshong shnong  lada ki ia tyngkhuh na ka jingshah pynjulor ha ki bor ka mariang ne kiwei ki daw hynrei wat la katta ruh dang donkam shuh shuh  ban pynkhlain ia ka mynsiem iatreilang bad iarap markylliang para ma ngi  .Bunsien ki nongialam ne riew  shimet  kiba ju don bynta ha ka imlang sahlang ki ju shah kynnoh ne shah kynthoh laiphew rukom da ki jingshah kynthoh ki bym don nongrim haei haei ruh em hynrei  kito kiba ju mlien ban kynthoh ne  ban teh umpjah ia kiwei ialade pat  kim mih satia  shakhmat  ban trei .  Kane kein ka dei ka jinglong kaba bakla ban tan tyllai para ma ngi ha jaka ba ngin ia kyrshan bad ai mynsiem bad ruh ban don ka mynsiem sngewnguh.Ka por ka dawa ba sa shisien kum ka jaidbynriew kaba ngi khot kaba tipbriew tipblei ngi dei ban wanrah biang ia ka mynsiem iatreilang ban ai bad iarap markylliang para ma ngi ha kano kano ka por ba donkam kumba la saindur da ki longshuwa manshuwa jong ngi da kaba bret shisyndon sharud ia ka mynsiem pyrkhat ba ngi dei ban pan ne ioh pdiang eiei tang  ialade .Kumjuh ruh ngi dei ban weng  shisyndon ia ka mynsiem iatan tyllai para ma ngi bad ruh ban don ia ka mynsiem ban burom ne niewkor ia ki nongialam jong ngi ha kano kano ka bynta khnang ba kiba na bar kin burom  ia ngi lada ngi don ka jingiaburom markylliang shuwa para ma ngi.
title: “Hato ka mynsiem ban ai ka la hiar dor bad bujli da ka mynsiem tang ban pdiang?”

content: Da ki phew hajar tylli ki syiar, ki la iap ha ki jaka ri syiar ha  Barwala jong ka jylla Haryana, na ki daw, kiba ym shym la tip satia.Ki doktor jong ka  Animal Husbandry Department, ki la leit jngoh dalade ia kitei ki jaka ri syiar bad ki la shim ia ki nuksa ban phah beit ia kitei ki jingiap syiar ha katei ka Jylla.U Dr Anil Banwala, Deputy Director, Animal Husbandry and Dairying, Haryana, ula leit peit hynnin ka sngi, ia ki jaka ri jingri bapher bad ula pyn thikna, ba ka don ka jingiap kaba bun bah jong ki syiar ha Barwala, na ka daw jong ka jingpang, ka bym pat tip satia.La iathuh ba ki don 15 tylli ki jaka ri jingri, kiba heh bha ha katei ka thain, kiba mad ia katei ka jingiap kaba bun bah jong ki syiar.
title: Trei ka pang khyllah, iap da ki phew hajar ki syiar ha Haryana

content: Saw ngut ki nongrep, ki la iap ha ki 24 kynta ba ladep, ha Tikri bad ha Singhu, kiba don ha khappud jong ka Jylla Delhi.Ki nongrep, kiba iap baroh ki la poi mynta sha ka 50 ngut baroh, naduh ba ka sdang kane ka jing iakhih jong ki nongrep sha Delhi, kaba la iaid la 40 sngi kynthih.
title: Sa saw ngut, ki nongrep ki la iap, baroh ki la poi 50ngut

content: “Ban haduh katta eh te phi kynum lah khambha pynban ban sah ha nongkyndong, dang sngew laitluid ha baroh ki liang” la ong u kpa u Ksan.“Tangba don ki briew kiba sngewrem lada ong ba ki dei ki nongkyndong. Imat ki sngewthuh beit ba la khein ia ki kum ki ‘riewkhlaw’ bad ki bym nang bym stad” la pyni nia shuh shuh u bah Sokon.“Ngi ki briew pat ngi don la ka jong ka jong ka jingsngew. Lada ngii shah synshar pat ha ka jingsngew ngi lah ban jot ne bha ne da kumwei pat” la pynphai ktien u kpa u Ksan.“Syrpai ale khun lum noh khun kine ki pela bad sa pynkhoh kwai de” la ong u kpa.“Sa ong ia i mei ba in nang pynai ja noh ia kito ki khynnah, phi ruh lada phi sngewthngan sa nang ia bam noh, nga ngan sa bam ryngkat pat bad i mama” la bthah bad ong u kpa.U bah Sokon u la bteng biang, “nga nga la sah ha sor ym duna ia ka 9 snem. Hapoh kine ki snem nga la mad bad shem shibun kiei kiei kiba thymmai ha ka jingim. Sha sor ki briew ki kham shalak bad sian shibun ban ia ngi ki nongkyndong ha ki bun ki liang. Na kata ka daw kito ki nongkyndong kiba wan bylla, sah iingbriew, leit skul ne leit treikam kim lah lait na ka syrngiew ba kah ki nongsor. Na ka rukom kren jong ki, phi lah ban sngewthuh ba ki la sdang ban pyrthuh nongsor.Katba kine ki arngut ki dang ia heh khana shi kynum, ka kmie ka la wan sha ita i kamta rit ban ia shongkai myllen lang bad ki. Hadien ba ki la shongkai katto katne por, ka kmie ka la leit sha kamra shetja ban pynkhreh bam ia ki. Kat ban dep bam ja ka por ka la dap 11 baje. Baroh ki la iathiah lut, lait sa tang ma ki lai ngut.“Ba lah miet kumne te ka bha ba ngin ia shongkai pat lashai na ka bynta ka kam u Bhalang. I Hep ruh i lah sngewthait sngewjrem ka met namar ba i la shong kali jngai. Ka biang kumta em Hep?” la kylli ka hynmen.Kata ruh ka biang hi kong, phi lei bad kine ki khunrit ioh ki kyndit te la thnam ka jabieng” la ong bad mynjur u para.Ka hynmen ka la pynsiang jaka thiah ha kawei ka kyndong. Ka la pynlip noh ia ka lait bad leit noh sha la ka kamra thiah.Katba ym pat ioh thiah, u bah Sokon u la kynmaw ha ki por mynshwa mynba u dang sah ha la shnong. Katno ka long ka jingkynmaw bathiang ia ki por ba la leit noh. Ka wan lut ka jingkynmaw ha u ba dangstep dangstep u la leit thohdieng sha khlaw bad mynsngi pat u leit sha jaka rep. Ha ka por ba kham duna jingtrei katno ka jingmuja ka leit shanglum shangwah ha ryngkat bad ki paralok ba ia ryngkat rta lang bad u. Hynrei haba mynta pat u la sah ha sor, ka jingiapher ka long sha bneng sha khyndew. Suki suki ki khmat jong ki ki shoh ngai ngai bad tang shiphang u la iohthiah jar.Tang hynriew baje ruh ym pat dap, u la iohsngew kita ki pyrsa rit jong u ki la kyndit thiah bad ka pan sha. La jan baroh ki khynnah ki dei kiba kyndit step. Haba u la iohsngew ba ki la ia khie lut baroh u ruh u khie lang noh ban ioh ia dihsha lang.Sngap jar baroh ban duwai i mama” la hukum ka kmie ia la ki khun.Ki la tah sha da u kek, u biskit bang ba wanrah u mama. Kita lei lei kiba kham rit ki la kmen bha ia u plein kek rongstem. Ynda la dep dihsha, u bah Sokon u la iengkai noh ha phyllaw bad jngoh artat ia ka kper ba la dap da ki jingthung ym duna ia ka hynriew jait.Haba u Ksan, u Bhalang bad la u Kpa ki la kit ia ka ratap ban leit kit dieng sha khlaw ……..
title: LANO PAT ???

content: Jowai: Hadien ka jingjah rngai u Dolloi ka Elaka Nartiang u ma Hepsing Dhar na ka jingthwet ki Pulit halor ka jingkynnoh ba ula leh ïa ka kam khlem akor ïa kawei ka longkmie na ka shnong ïonglwit Nongjngi kaba la jia ha ka 30.11.2012, hynrei mynta ka sngi U Blei la lap ïa ka met jong utei u Dolloi ba la sdien ha u tyllai phasi ha kawei ka jaka ba long lum ba don ki diengkseh kaba ki khot ka Pdeiñ Mukhim ka jaka khappud hapdeng ka shnong Wahiajer bad ka Mupliang West Jaiñtia Hills District.Ka kynhun ka Crime Scene Unit (CSU) lem bad ki Magistrate ki la hiar mar mar sha katei ka jaka na ka bynta ban leh ïa ka jingtohkit halor kane ka jingjia, ha kaba na ka liang u Superintendent of Police ka West Jaiñtia Hills District u Bikram D. Marak u la ïathuh ba ïa kaiphot kaba ïadei bad kane ka jingjia yn sa lah ban pyntikna tad haduh ban da dep leh ïa ka Postmortem lyngba ki Doctor hashwa ban aiti noh sha kiba haïing hasem.Halor kane ka jingjia na ka liang ki Rangbah shnong ka Nartiang u ma Mom Phalangki ula ïathuh ba hadien ka jingjah rngai u Dolloi ka Elaka naduh ka 3 tarik u Nohprah mynshem snem, na ka liang kiba haïing jong u ruh ki la leit pyntip ïa kane sha ki nongïalam shnong ha kaba ka shnong naduh ka 14 tarik u Nohprah, 2020 ki la pynlong ïa ka jingwad shong ïa utei u Dolloi hynrei ym shem la lap ïa u.Dei tad hynnin ka sngi Saitjaiñ 2 tarik uwei u khynnah uba don 16 snem ka rta ba ka shnong Mupliang uba la thmu ban leit kheit ïa ki kynja ‘Tit dieng’ na ki dieng kseh ha ka por janmiet, hamar kumta hi u la lap ïa katei ka met ïap ha u tyllai phasi. Hadien ba kitei ki nongïalam na ka shnong Nartiang ki la ïoh jingtip ïa kane ki la leit pyntip noh sha ki pulit ka Nartiang PS bad sha ka Ummulong PS na ka bynta ban leh ïa kaba donkam.Halor kane ka jingduh ïa u Dolloi ka Elaka Nartiang uba dang bat ïa ka kam Dolloi tang kumba ar snem duna, u Waheh Shnong ka Nartiang u pynpaw ba kane ka long ka jingduh kaba khraw eh ïa ka Elaka baroh kawei bad ïa ki shnong ki thaw namar u Dolloi u long u khlieh jong ka Elaka uba peit naduh ki kam Pata, ki kam ñiam rukom bad kiwei kiwei de bad kane ka long ruh ka jingduh nong kumjuh ïa ka District Council ban pynïakhun biang ïa ka kam Dolloi.
title: Lap ia ka met U Dolloi, Elaka Nartiang, ba sdien phasi

content: “Ong ia ki Israel… ban sher dara ha khmat ka Pi Hahiroth, hapdeng ka Migdol bad ka Duriaw Basaw…” (Eksodus 14:2)Ka Kitab Eksodus bad ki khana kiba don ha ka kim dei shuh kiba dang thymmai, la ïai ïathuh-ïai pynshai shynna ia ki na kawei ka por sha kawei pat bad yn sa nang ïai pule bad ïai ïathuhkhana ha ki juk ki ban sa wan. Ka Kitab Eksodus ka don ka khubor kaba khlaiῆ bad khraw ym tang ia ka jingim briew shimet, hynrei khamtam eh ia ki kynhun jaitbynriew ne ki kynhun briew kiba ïaid lyngba ka lawar ding jong ka jingshah khῆoit beiῆ. Ka kitab Eksodus ka long ka nongmuna ia ki jaitbynriew ne ki kynhun briew kiba ïeng ban ïakhun pyrshah ia ka jingthombor, jingleh shilliang bad jingleh bymhok jong kiba donbor. Kiba bun ki jaitbynriew ne ki kynhun briew ha ka pyrthei ki la pyndonkam ia ka khubor bad ki khana jong ka kitab Exodus na ka bynta ban ïakhun bad ïaleh ban ioh ka jinglaitluid.Ka kitab Eksodus ka ïathuhkhana shaphang ka jinglaitluid bad ka jingïaidlynti sha ka jinglaitluid jong ka kynhun ki jaitbynriew, kaba kynthup ruh ia ki khun Israel, na Ri Ijipt sha Kanan. Kane ka jinglaitluid ka la jialong hadein ka jingïakhun pyrshah ia ka jingsynshar donbor jong ki Pharaoh.Ka kitab Eksodus ka ïathuh ruh shaphang ka jingsdang thymmai hadien ka jinglaitluid bad ka lynti sha ka jinglaitluid kam dei kaba jem. Tang hadien khyndiat por ba ki la mih noh na Ijipt ki khun Israel ki la poi ha ka khim khait bad ka jingshaïong kaba khraw namar ba kata ka jingïaid lynti jong ki sha ka jinglaitluid i kumba kan kut noh. Ki khun Israel ynda ki la poi ha Pi Hahiroth dheng ki la lyngngoh bad dum dngiem, ki la dum ka buit ka stad bad ki la shaïong ban ïohi ia ka Duriaw Basaw kaba don hakhmat bad kaba khang lynti ia ki. Haba ki la mih noh na Ijipt hadien ka jinglaitluid, hato ki khun Israel ki la shu mih kyrkieh bad ïaid ruma khlem pyrkhat bad khlem plan shano bad nangno kin iaid? Ka Baibl ka ïathuh ba ki khun Israel ki la sher dara ha Pi Hahiroth ka shnong kaba don hapdeng ka Migdol bad ka Duriaw Basaw.To ngin ïaphai khyndiat sha ka geography, ka Migdol ka dei ka sorbah kaba don shaphang shatei jong ka Ri Ijipt, katba ka Pi Hahiroth pat ka dei ka shnong rit kaba don ha ki phang mihngi jong ka wah Nile. Na kane ngi sngewthuh shai ba ki khun Israel ki dang don hapoh Ijipt bad kim pat ïaid palat ia u pud u sam ka Ri Ijipt ha ka jingïaid lynti jong ki sha ka jinglaitluid bad kumta ka dang long kaba suk ia u Pharaoh bad ki shipai jong u ban kem bad ringmraw biang ia ki sa shisien.Ha Pi Hahiroth, ka Duriaw Basaw ka khang lynti ia ki khun Israel ban ïaid sha ka jinglaitluid bad na shadien ki shipai u Pharaoh ki beh ban kem mraw biang ia ki. Ha khmat ka don ka Duriaw Basaw bad na shadien pat ki kulai ïapom bad ki shipai u Pharaoh kiba beh thong ban pynïap bad ban kem mraw biang ia ki khun Israel.Ki Khun Israel ki la poi ha ka khim khait, Shano kin ïaid? Shano kata ka lynti sha ka jinglaitluid? Ka Pi Hahiroth ka la dei ka shnong jong ka jingshaïong, ka jingdukha mynsiem, ka jingartatien bad ka la dei ruh ka shnong jong ka jingkhynwin. Ki khun Israel ki la ïasher dara hangta bad ki ïing dara jong ki ki la khynwin da ka jingïam bad jinglynῆiar kaba shyrkhei. Kiba bun ki la suba bad tharai sniew ia u Moses bad ia kiwei de ki nongïalam, ki la ïakylli para ma ki bad ki la kylli ruh na u Moses, ko Moses! Nangne shano ngin ïaid? Sha ka jinglaitluid ne sha ka jingïap?Ki khun Israel ki la dom bad bitar ia u Moses- “Ki la ong ha u Moses, “Hato ym don jingtep mo ha Ijipt? Hato phin hap ban wan ïalam ia ngi hangne ha ri shyiap ban ïap? … Ngi la ong ia phi ban ym pynsalia ia ngi bad ban shah ia ngi ban ïailong ki mraw jong ki nong Ijipt. Kan jin da la kham bha ban long ki mraw hangta ban ia kaba ïap hangne ha ri shyiap” Haduh katne ka jingduh jingkyrmen bad ka jingkren kutlad- Ha Pi Hahiroth ki khun Israel kim lah shuh ban pyrkhat ba kin dang lah ban ïaid shaphrang sha ka jinglaitluid.Palat sanphew (50) snem mynshuwa, u Rev Dr. Martin Luther King Jr. u la kylli ia kane ka juh ka jingkylli “Where do we go from here? Chaos or Community”? Nangne shano ngin ïaid sha ka jingkhynwin, ka jingkulmar ne sha ka jingïalong kawei bad jingïakyrshan lem iwei ia iwei hapdeng ki jingeh? Sha ka jingkhwan myntoi shimet ne sha ka pyrkhat lang bad ka jingïabit-ïabiang lang? Sha ka jingbymhok, jingthok, jingshukor, jingbamsap, jingïapynïap bad jingshohnoh briew ne sha ka jinghok, jingkhuid, jingbeit bad jingai jingkheiῆ ha ka treikam treijam bad ka khaïi-pateng?Ngi pdiang ia u snem thymmai da ka jingkyrmen ryngkat bad ka duwai ka phirat ba un long u snem uba khiah krat bad uba roi. Hynrei ngi la kit lypa ruh ia ki jingeh na ki snem kiba rim- ka khlam Ar Hajar Arphew (2020) ka la pynjulor bad ngi hap ban khyllie pat. Ka jingduk-jingkyrduh ka tied jingkhang ha man la ki thliew ïing. Ka jinglah shilliang ha ka ïoh ka kot bad mynta tyngkreiῆ ngi sakhi ba uba duk u nang duk tasam bad uba riewspah u nang riewspah khlem akor bad ka lhuh kaba shyrkhei ka pynïakhlad, pynïapait pynïapra hapdeng ki para kur ki para kha bad ka pynphiah kyrdan ha ka imlang sahlang, wat ha ki Balang ruh. Nalor ka jingduk ban sa ki jingpang kiba lai phew rukom bad la nang ban khia shuh shuh da ka sumar pang kaba rem dor haduh katta katta bad bun bah ki briew ki kit ram haduh ῆiuhmat bad ki hap ban bynda ia ki jingdon jingem tang na ka bynta ban ïoh ia ka jingkoit jingkhiah. Ki jingshah ban beiῆ jong ki kynthei kam pat kut, shi ban ka kynthei ka shah lehbeiῆ bad shah leh be ijot, ar ban ka shah tah matïong shi rta ka jingim, lai ban ka shah bishar bad shah lorni, saw ban ka shah kynnoh bad san ban ka shah pynïap shi syndon.Hooid, ka Jaidbynriew bad ka Jylla ka don shibun ki mat ki jura bad ki kynrum kynram kiba dang hap ban ïatai bad ïapynbeit. Ki don pat ki mat kiba i kumba ym lah shuh ban ïapynbeit, ngi shu ïakyllaiῆ hajuh shi hajuh bad don ruh ki khep kiba wat la ngi kyang jam ban dawa, pynban ngim mon ban weng ia kita ki jingeh bad ban pynurlong ia ka jingdawa namar ba ka pynïohnong shimet iano re iano lada kata ka mat jingdawa ka ïai neh bad ïai im sah kum ka mat jingdawa. Kumta ngi donkam ban pyrkhat- ban puson thikna, ban pyrkhat thymmai bad shim khia kumno ngin leh. Ka bym lah ban long bad ka bym lah ban pdiang ban ïa pyrta shla ban “im bad ïap namar ka Ri” katba ha kajuh ka por pat ngi dang ia kmen toh hoh ha ka ïohei, ka bam ei bad ka bam arliang maloi. Kynmaw ba ka thok, ka shukor, ka khwan, ka shohnoh- ka pynïap briew bad ka politik jyllud khohwah kin khynῆiat ia ka Ri bad Jylla sha niamra.Ha Pi Hahiroth, hapdeng ka jingshaïong, jinglyngngoh bad jingkhynwin u Moses u ud bad ïam hakhmat u Blei, pynban u Blei u jubab- ko Moses, “Balei ba me kyang jam ban ïoh jingïarap? Ong ia ki paidbah ba kin nang ïaid shaphrang”. Lada ha Pi Hahiroth ka mih ka sur blei bad ka kular blei kaba ong ia ki paidbah ba kin ïaid shaphrang sha ka jinglaitluid. Kumta ka jingduwai jong ngi ruh kan long ba u Blei un pyrsad mynsiem thymmai ha ngi bad hapdeng ka jingshaïong bad jingdum dngiem, ai ngin ïohsngew ia kajuh ka sur blei kaba ong, To Nang ïaid Shaphrang.“Mynsiem jong nga, nang leit,Ki lum kiba dang sah;Kim long kham eh, kim long kham khraw,Ia kiwei ba la lah” (KHB 399)Amen
title: Ki kyntien jingkyrmen: Nangne shano ngin ïaid?

content: Shillong: Ki don 12 ngut kiba ioh pang covid thymmai ha ka Jylla mynta ka sngi. Na East Khasi Hills, ki don 10ngut bad ka Ribhoi District lem bad ka West Jaintia Hills, ki don mar iwei i nongpang.Kiba jem na ka jingpang, ki long mynta 13 ngut, ha kaba ha East Khasi Hills, ki don 10ngut, ha kaba ki riew paidbah, ki long 8 ngut, nangta ha Ribhoi, South West Garo Hills bad South Garo Hills, don mar iwei kiba jem ia katei ka jingpang khlam.Baroh kiba don ia ka jingpang, ki long 135 ngut haduh mynta ka sngi bad ka East Khasi hills, ka don 98 ngut, West Khasi Hills 3 ngut, Ribhoi 13 ngut, West Jaintia Hills 2 ngut, West Garo hills 15 ngut, South West Garo Hills 2 ngut, East Garo hills bad North Garo hills mar iwei.Baroh kiba jem na ka jingpang, ki long 13,186 ngut bad kiba iap, ki long 139 ngut.
title: 12 ngut kiba ioh pang covid thymmai ha ka Jylla

content: Shillong: Kiba ioh pang corona thymmai myn hynnin ka sngi, ki long 3 ngut. Kitei ki kynthup ia ar ngut na East Khasi Hills, ha kaba uwei na kitei u dei u riew paidbah  bad uwei pat u shipai.Ka West Garo Hills, ka don uwei uba ioh pang thymmai.Kiba jem na ka jingpang, ki long 31 ngut,  kynthup ia 30ngut na East Khasi Hills, iwei na Ribhoi District. Kiba jem ki kynthup ia 4 ngut ki shipai, uwei u health worker, iwei i high risk contact,  2 ngut ki ILI, 2 ngut kiba wan na shabar, iwei na Lumparing,  iwei na Mawlai Mawiong, 1 ngut na Nongkseh (Upper Shillong), 3 ngut na Nongmynsong, iwe na  Nongthymmai, 2 naPynthorbah bad sa ar ngut na Umpling.Kiba dang don ha ka jingpang, ki long 136 ngut, ha kaba ka East Khasi Hills, ka don 98 ngut, West Khasi Hills 3ngut, Ribhoi District 13 ngut, West Jaintia Hills iwei, West Garo Hills 16  ngut, South  West Garo  Hills 3ngut, East Garo Hills bad North Garo Hills mar iwei.Kiba la jem  baroh ki long 13173 ngut  bad kiba iap ki long 139 ngut.Kiba la dep test, haduh ka 2tarik Kyllalyngkot 2021, ki long 2,95,776 ngut bad ki bym don jingpang, ki long 2,82,328 ngut. Ki jaka sumar ka sorkar, haduh ka 2tarik mynta u bnai, ki long 46  tylli,  ki jaka ba ki sah ki nongpang ha la iing ki long 67 tylli bad ki jaka ba dang khang dam ki long 16 tylli  bad kiba iap ha ka jylla, ki long 1.06 percent na ka jingdon baroh ki nongpang.
title: 3ngut kiba ioh pang corona thymmai ha ka Jylla

content: Shillong: La pyllait paidbah ia ka Almanak 2021 da U Samla Lambokstarwell Marngar President ka KSU Sengkmie ha ka jingdon ryngkat u Samla Pynskhemlang W. Uriah General Secretary ka KSU Jaiaw Circle, Samla Wallam Nongsiej Vice-President ka Delhi Unit bad ki dkhot ka Jaiaw Circle.Ka Khasi Students’ Union (KSU) Jaiaw Circle, ka la pynlong ia ka jingsdang ia ka campaign “kyntiew ia la ki jong” da kaba sdang shwa ban pyllait paidbah ia ka Almanak 2021 ha ophis treikam ka KSU Sengkmie, ha ka 31 tarik Nohprah 2020.Ha katei ka sngi la pyllait paidbah ia katei ka Almanak 2021 da U Samla Lambokstarwell Marngar President ka KSU Sengkmie ha ka jingdon ryngkat u Samla Pynskhemlang W. Uriah General Secretary ka KSU Jaiaw Circle, Samla Wallam Nongsiej Vice-President ka Delhi Unit bad ki dkhot ka Jaiaw Circle.Ha ka jingpyllait ia kane ka Almanak 2021 kaba ka KSU Jaiaw Circle ka sam sngewbha sha ki paidbah, la ia ia ki kyntien shongsbai na u nongialam rangbah jong ka seng, u Samla Lambokstarwell Marngar bad kitei ki jingkren jong u ki long kiba ai mynsiem shitrhem bad kyrkhu kyrdoh na bynta ka jingsdang ka KSU Jaiaw Circle ia katei ka Campaign “Kyntiew iala ki jong” bad khamtam eh ka jinglah ka KSU Jaiaw Circle ban pynmih ia katei ka Almanak ka ban iaraplang bad ban kyntiew iala ki long ki paradoh ki parasnam bad kan long ruh ka jingkyrkhu kaba khraw ia ka jaidbynriew.
