Shuh shuh na ka liang utei u nongialam rangbah u la pynpaw ba ka seng KSU kan iai wad shibun ki lad ki lynti na bynta ban ai mynsiem bad ban kyntiew ia ki paradoh parasnam, khamtam eh ban pynbor ia ka sorkar Jylla bad ka sorkar pdeng ban pyntreikam ia ki aiñ ki ban iada ia ka Ri bad ka jaidbynriew.Haba kylli pat na ka daw aiu ba la pynlong ia ka KSU Jaiaw Circle ban shim ia ka sien jam ban pyniaid ia kane ka campaign “kyntiew ia la ki jong” na ka liang u General Secretary, u la ong ba hadien ka jingiamir jingmut bad pyrkhat sani bha para dkhot ba la shim ia ka rai ban pyniaid ia kane ka campaign kum shi bynta ban iarap bad ban kyntiew lang ia ki paradoh parasnam kiba trei ha ki kam bapher bapher, u la bynrap ruh ba ka don ka jingong ba ia u dkhar lada phi kren tla ne thlia katno katno ruh u sngap wat lada phi rah kti ruh u sngap, hynrei lada phi ktah ia ka kamai kajih u khih phaloh da kaba pynkynmaw ruh ia ka jingjia kaba la jia ha ki bnai ba la dep hangtei ha Ichamati.Shuh shuh na ka liangka KSU Jaiaw Circle ha katei ka sngi ka 31tarik Nohprah 2020 ka pynbna ba ka jingialeh ha ka ioh ka kot bad ka khaïi ka pateng ka la sdang. Ka seng ka kyrpad sngewrit ruh sha ki paidbah ba kin phone sha kine ki kyrteng bad ki number bala buh shapoh kane ka Almanak lada ki donkam bad ha ka juh kapor kan long ruh kawei na ki lad ban ai mynsiem bad ban iarap ban kyntiew iaki paradoh parasnam kiba trei ha ki kam bapher bapher bad ka seng ka ai Khublei Snem Thymmai basuk bakmen bad pahuh pahai ia ki paidbah ka bri u Hynniew Trep, ong ka kyrwoh na u  samla Ostarnic Marbaniang President ka KSU Jaiaw Circle bad kumjuh ki nongialam bad ki dkhot ka KSU Jaiaw Circle.
title: Kyntiew ia la ki jong, da ka jing sam almanak 2021 ka KSU

content: Chandigarh: Ki la don kiba leit bret da ka eit masi, ha khmat iing jong u heh BJP ha Hoshiarpur jong ka Jylla Punjab, hynnin ka sngi bad katei ka la pynlong ia  U Amarinder Singh, myntri rangbah ka Punjab, ba un ai jing maham ia kito kiba shim ia ka ain ha la ka kti.La shim ba ki dei hi ki nongrep, kiba leit bret da ka eit masi, ha iing jong U Tikshan Sud ha Hoshiapur, uba dei u myntri barim ka sorkar Punjab.Katei ka la pynbitar ia U Sud, ha kaba ula pynlong da ka dharna ha   Rai ka surok bah Bahadur Jodhamal, ha Hoshiarpur bad dawa ba dei ban pyn shitom ia kitei kiba donkti ia katei ka kam beain.U Amarinder Singh, myntri rangbah ka Punjab, u ong ba katei ka jingleit rung sha ka iing jong u briew shimet, kan wan rah ia ka nam kaba sniew, halor ka jing iakhih jong ki nongrep.
title: Da ka eit masi, leit bret ki nongrep ha khmat iing u heh BJP

content: Shillong: Mynta ka sngi saitjaiñ, ka 02 tarik Kyllalyngkot 2020 ka Rama Krishna Mission Sohra Ashram ka la wan ban pynlong ia ka jingsam jingïarap ei da ki jaiñ ki nep ia ki 210 ngut ki nongshongshnong kiba wan na ki longïng ba duk ba kyrduh ha ka shnong Kyndongtuber West Jaintia Hills District.Ïa kane ka jingwan sam jingïarap la ialam da U Babu Manbha Lyngdoh Lecturer ryngkat ka jingïasynran lang u Maharaj bad ki nongtrei jong ka Rama Krishna Mission Sohra Ashram.Na ka liang u Waheh Shnong Kyndongtuber haba ai ka jingkren lyngkot shwa ban sdang ka jingsam iaki jaiñ ki nep, ula pdiang sngewbha iaki nongtrei jong kane ka Ashram bad pynpaw ka jingsngewnguh ia u Secretary Maharaj, ia i babu Manbha Lyngdoh bad kiwei kiwei ki nongtrei jong ka Ashram namar kane ka long ka sien ba ar ba kila wan ban kner iaki kti aijingïarap synei sha ki longïng ba duk hakane ka shnong. U la pynkynmaw ba kham mynshwa kane ka juh ka Mission kala wan ban sam iaki marbam haka por lockdown bad hakane ka kynti pat ki la wan biang ban ai da ki jaiñ ki nep. U la ai ka jingkhublei sngewnguh bad kyrkhu kyrdoh ba U Blei un Kyrkhu iakane ka Ashram bad ruh ia u Secretary Maharaj ba kin nang iaid shakhmat ha ka jingshakri ia ka imlang sahlang bad ba kin ïoh ïaka met kaba shait ba khlaiñ.Na ka liang ka Ashram, la ai jingkren lyngkot da U Babu Manbha Lyngdoh, ha kaba u la pynpaw ia ka jingsngewkmen ba ki la ïoh kum kane ka lad ban wan ai jingïarap kyrpang ïa ki longïng baduk ha kane ka shnong. Nalor kata u la pynpaw ruh iaka jingthmu jong ki kaba long ban shakri ïaki para briew daki jinglehbha ka mut ban shakri ïa U Blei. La pynsngew ba ia kane ka program la sponsor da ka ITC lyngba ka RKM Sohra Ashram.La sdang ban sam ia ki jingïarap da ki jaiñ ki nep haka por 12 baje bad la ïarap lang da ki nongtrei ka Ashram, Secretary Shnong, Secretary VEC, ki Waheh Dong, bad kiwei de ki volunteer, ong ka  kyrwoh ba la phah da u Waheh Shnong Kyndongtuber, ma S.E. Siangshai.
title: Sam jing iarap ka Rama Krishna Mission, Sohra ha Kyndong Tuber

content: Ka ‘Samyukt Kisan Morcha’ mynta ka sngi, ka la ai por ia ka sorkar India, ha shwa ka 26tarik Kyllalyngkot 2021, ban rai halor ki mat jing dawa jong ki nongrep bad lada kitei ki jing dawa kim urlong satia, kumta ki nongrep, kin pynlong da ka jing ia mareh tractor ha Delhi, ha ka 26tarik Kyllalyngkot 2021, kaba dei ka sngi rakhe Republic Day.Katei ka rai jong ki nongrep, ka dei ar sngi, ha shwa ba kin ia kynduh biang ia ka sorkar, na ka bynta ban iakren bad ba kin weng ia ka ain nongrep bad katei ka dei ka rai, kaba la shim, ha ka jingialang jong ki hynniew ngut ki dkot jong ka  Coordination Committee jong ka  morcha.La iathuh ba katei ka jing iaid paidbah ki nongrep lem bad ki tractor, kan long hapdeng jong ka republic day parade, ha katei ka sngi 26tarik Kyllalyngkot 2021.Ki nongrep, kin sdang ban iakren bad ki nongrep ha kylleng ka Ri, naduh ka 6tarik Kyllalyngkot haduh ka 20tarik Kyllalyngkot 2021, ban wer ia u paidlang ka Ri, ban mih paidbah, sha ka jing iaid paidbah, ha ka 26tarik Kyllalyngkot 2021.“Ngi kwah ban long kiba jai jai bad ngi la kren shai ia ka sorkar India, ba ki don tang ar tylli ki lynti, kawei ban weng ia ka ain nongrep, lane sa kawei pat ka lad, ka long ban shu bom iangi, ba ngin phet noh na katei ka jaka a ngi ia lum lang” ong ki dkhot jong ka komiti. La ong ruh ba la jied ia ka 26tarik Kyllalyngkot, kum ka sngi paidbah, namar ba ka dei ka sngi ba u paidbah, u dei uba donbor tam ha ka synshar paidbah ka India.
title: 26tarik Kyllalyngkot, yn pynher traktor ki nongrep ha Delhi

content: Ha kiba bun hi, kata ka ktien ‘Happy Kristmas, Happy New Year’, ka la shu long noh tang ka rukom ia khublei kaba hangto-hangto, ka kut noh ruh hangto-hangto hi. Ha ki por ba dang kham samla mynshuwa, ngi ruh ngi long kumjuh.Don ki jingjia ha kiba ialeit shi paralok, ia sngewbha lang, tang mar iadei kiad, kiew ka jingkhluid khlieh, ban sa ka jingsarong, shiparalok ruh poi noh sha ia iashoh-iadat, iamynsaw uba hap ka bniat ruh uto, uba blu ki khmat ruh uto hi, don ruh ki jingiap hateng-hateng.Hynrei, dang ia ong lang pat ‘Happy New Year’. Ha ka jingshisha, ka jingmut tynrai hi ka long ban ia khublei kitbok ban iadonbok lang ban nang iakoit, iakhiah ban nang iabha-iamiat ha ka trei-ka kthah, ka shong- ka sah bad kum kine ki jingiakit bok markylliang, kiban ioh jing khyrkhu lang sa na u Nongbuh-Nongthaw.Ka jingkylli kaba donkam ban iajubab hi halade-lade ka long, haba man la u snem bad da ki bun-bun snem la ia khublei kitbok kumne, kumno ka la long ka imlang-sahlang jong ngi?Nga shem ba don kiba ong, ‘ka long kumba ju long’. Don pat kiba ong, ‘la kham bit khyndiat ha ka liang ka jngoh-kai pyrthei, Tourism’. Don pat kiba ong, ‘ka tulop ba ju ioh ruh ym ioh, sa ka hap tap-op ia ka khmut ka khmat, ba trei sa ka korona’, bad kum kine ki jingsngew bapher-bapher.Imat bun hi ki longing-longsem kiba kham jynjar, khyndiat kiba shu long pdeng, katto-katne eh kiba biang.Hynrei hapdeng kat kine ruh, baroh-baroh pat ki dang ia ong hi ‘Happy New Year, same to you’, namar ka la long ka rukom.Kumno tharai lada hadien ka shi tarik-artarik sdang iapyrkhat thymmai lang noh ha ka rukom kaba kham don jingmut, khnang ba ha utai u snem thymmai uban wan ter-ter…, ngin iohi noh ia ki dak ki shin kiba kham pher, kham bha, kaban da don jingmut shisha bad kata ka jingiakynjrut kti – ‘Snem Thymmai Basuk?’Kaei kaba lah ban long? Ka long, lada iarai jingmut lang, ba kum ki nongshong shnong, ngin shim ia ka jingkit khlieh ban iarap ai kti lang, ne tang da ka sur ruh ka biang ia kibym lah ai kti, ban ym iatur lang matlah khlem sngewthuh, hynrei tur kham jur haba sngewthuh ia ka phang, kumno ban ioh kloi noh ia ktien Khasi, ba kan ithuh da ki bor Sorkar hapoh ka Bynrap-8 (Eight Schedule), ban pynkynriah noh ia ki Sohmoh kiba shong hapoh jaka Sorkar ha Iew Mulong, khnang ban pynheh- pyniar ia ka leit ka wan bad ka die ka thied, ban pyntrei kam ryntih noh ia ka ain MRSSA, katbym pat ioh ia ka ILP kaba la kyntait mardor da u Dr. Mukul Sangma, Chief Minister ha u snem 2013 ban dawa na ka Sorkar Congress ha Delhi ha katei ka por. Nangta ban pynphai kylla noh ia ki 300 tylli tam ki-shnong ki thaw kiba dei jong ka Jaintia Hills District, kiba tip kim ki Block I & II, kiba la shu pynrung tang da ka hukum Sorkar Assam ha u snem 1951 shapoh ka District Karbi Anglong, Assam, ia kaba ki Lai Sorkar Congress Assam, Meghalaya bad Delhi ki shu ieh lyngkrang haba ki dang synshar ma ki.Ban pynbeit syndon ia u pud u sam ha Langpih bad kiwei ki thain West Khasi Hills. Kamrup, kumjuh ruh sha kiwei-kiwei ki bynta ka Ri-Bhoi, Jaintia Hills, ba la tur jubor ka Assam mynta.Ki samla pule bun kiba la pulom ki kyrdan pule bym ioh kam, hynrei bun bah ki khyllah jait ki ioh kam Sorkar, khamtam ha ki kam rit ha baroh ki tnat Sorkar. Shano kata ka bhah kam, employment policy, haba ki officer ki engineer ki thung hi katba ki mon. Ki ing Sorkar ha kylleng ba biang ka um, ka ding, dap da ki khyllah jait.Ki paidbah kiba ud lynter, ki samla kiba hap beh kam wat shabar ka jylla, hapdeng bun ki jingeh bad jingjynjar, hynrei haba dei ka por ban wanrah ia ki nongsynshar babit ban pynbeit ia kine ki kynrum-kynram, baroh-baroh ha kata ka myntoi rwing (tyngka jied briew), jied kylla ia kiba leh ia kitei ki kam bad kiba wanrah ia kitei ki jingeh.Yn ialeh shuh kumno haba kumne? Ia mynta, long katba long, ‘Happy New Year, Tangba………!!’
title: Ka Happy New Year, pyndep rukom

content: Guwahati: Ka dor jong ka test corona, ka la hiar dor shi katdei ha Assam.Mynta ka dor jong ka RT PCR, ka long tang T.1,200 bad ka dor jong ka Rapid Antigen Test ka long T.500.Ha ki khyndiat sngi mynshwa, ka dor jong kitei ki test, ka long hapdeng T.3,500 haduh T.4,500 bad don ruh kiba shim haduh T.6,500 na bynta kawei ka test.Ka jing pyntip, kaba la pynmih da U Samir K Sinha, Secretary Health Department ka Sorkar Assam, la pyntip ba ka dor jong ka RT PCR test, kan long T.1,000 bad yn siew tam sa T.200, lada yn leit ban shim ia kitei ki test ha ki iing jong ki briew.
title: Hiar dor jur, ka test corona ha Assam

content: Sakhi  ki mawbynna, b’la kupbor ka ‘lei synshar;Ka rngiew ki syiem Sutnga, ieng rasong te ha Ri Pnar.Khlawait Ri Pnar wakhroo, Ïei jingim ïong ki da pha;Jaitbru wow sah kynmoo, Ïow ehrngu waroh chi ryta.Kyntu te ka kynteit, juk mynta ba kin tipthuh;Ka nam ka ba lah leit, sa shisien keiñ ba kan phuh.Ka long ka ba sngew sangsot ba kiei kiei ki ba lymbiang ki la wan jia ha ka bri Hynñiewtrep Ynñiawwasa ba ka la hiar raibi ha ka pateng mynta bad kan jia aiu ia ka lawei lada ki paidbynriew ka juk mynta kin dang thiah thai lyngngai bad thame ha ka snap rongphong jong ka pyrthei ba shu thaba khlek ber. Ka la dei ka pali jong ka juk mynta ban kyndit bynriew noh na ka ba thiah lnger khlem peitmat shuh. Kumta donkam ym tang ban kyrsiew, hynrei ban kynteit tyngeh ia la ki paidbynriew Khasi ba kin tipthuh la ka mynnor ban tyngshaiñ ka lawei. Ñiuma, la sngewdei ban kham tyngkan ha ka ba kdew kti ia ka mala ka lymbiang ha ka imlang sahlang; hynrei shwa ban babe dei ban sah beit ia u juloi bad ai na shata dar, nangta ban tangon daiñ daiñ katba dang saw u nar.Shwa ban ai plak na mationg, la sngew dei ban panmab lypa ba ioh lehse lah ban phloit ne lah ban pynmong ia kiwei. Hynrei da ka akor la ai ka juban sngur mynsiem ba ka jingthmu ka long ban tei la ka imlang sahlang khnang ban ehrngiew ki paidbynriew ka bri Hynñiewtrep Ynñiawwasa. Haba ki phareng ki synshar donbor ha ka bri Hynñiewtrep Ynñiawwasa bad shwa ba kin phet iamrem noh, ki la buhti ka pyrkhat ba ki paidbynriew Khasi kin ñiewkor kham tam ia kito kiei kiei ki ba la shah iuhroit ha ki phareng. Ki la iuhroit ia ka hok longbriew manbriew jong ki longsan mansan ha ki hima Khasi khamtam ia ka longrynñieng jong u Syiem Tirot Sing jong ka Hima Nongkhlaw bad u khynroo rangbah Kiang Nangbah jong ka Jowai ha ka Hima na Ri Pnar, ha ka ba ki la pynduhjait syndon ia ki longbteng jong ka khet Syiem Pnar bad ban sin ban rngop da ka hima Jaintia. Namar ba ha ka pateng jong kita ki syiem Hima Jaintia ki la pynkjeh jyndei ia ki pandit jong ka niam Hindu na Bengal haduh ba la tei mandir ha Nartiang ban byrshem bad ki riti tynrai jong ki paidbynriew Pnar, ka ba la parpaiñ sha kiwei kiwei ki thaiñ haduh nongbah Jowai; kumta ka nam ka kyrteng Jaintia ka la shongneh haduh mynta mynne.Ki don ruh ki jingtip ki ba kdew ba kawei na ki sanphew-ar tylli ki dkhot met jong ka bleithaw Durga ka la hap ha Nartiang bad la kam nongkynti kum ka jaka kyntang jong ka niam Hindu bad ba la tei ka trep mane blei (Mandir) ka ba la neh haduh mynta mynne. Katkum ka jingtip ba la sot na ki rangbah mynshwa ba la iathuh I Ma Spiton Kharakor, ka la don ka jingkynthoh ba ki paidbynriew Pnar ki la lmun ban jer ia lade da ka nam jong ki mraw jong u Syiem, kata ka Jaintiapur. Kane ruh ka dei ka ba la pynkoh ki phareng ka ba la shongneh haduh ban mih syndon ka United Khasi & Jaintia Hills District ha ka jyllabah Assam ba mynshwa. Kane ka la neh sah haduh mynta mynne ha jylla Meghalaya, haduh ba ia ki War Lamin, Sohkha, Nongtalang bad kiwei kiwei ki War na thaiñ shathie lammihngi la nam da ki War Jaintia. Lada kaei ka ba kdew hangne ka long ka ba bakla, ki woh rangbah ki waheh jong ki paidbynriew Khasi na thaiñ Pnar ki dei ban pynshai ba ka kyrteng Jaintia ka dei ka ba nylla ne ka dei ka ba la sot bad shu iapan na ki mraw na Bengal, kumba kam kita ki longshwa manshwa bad kumba ka paw ruh na ka trep mane ha Nartiang.Kumta ka paw ba ka nam jong u Syiem Tirot Sing bad Kiang Nangbah ka kham shynna ban ia u Syiem Bormanik ka Hima Shyllong, u Syiem Sngap Sing ka Hima Maharam kumjuh ruh kiwei kiwei ki syiem ki khlawait bashlur na kylleng kim da paw than ha ka imlang sahlang namar ba ki phareng ki khlem ioh pyndem ia ki haduh ban da iap. Ha kajuh ka rukom ka Jaintia ka kham shynna ban ia ka Pnar ha ba nam ia ki paidbynriew Hynñiewtrep Ynñiawwasa.Ki em ki waheh kynthai wa chynrang ki wa kyntait wa toh ki Jaintia ha wa dei ki Pnar bad ia kane la kren mardor da u Ma Shngaiñlang Bamon (Bam kwai ha dwar ki blei) na Sutnga, u ba la buddien sani ia ki pateng longsyiem jong ka Hima Sutnga. Katkum ki khana pateng ka Hima Sutnga ka long ka ba iar ba donbor bad pawnam bha shwa ban wan thombor ki phareng, hynrei ka la poi shaduh u pud ban pynduh pyndam syndon ia ka longsyiem mansyiem da ki mynder. Kumta ki paidbynriew Pnar ki dei ba sa chisien pat kin pynim bad pyneh rngiew ia ki pateng na ka kpoh syiem blei jong ka Li Dakha. Katkum ka jingshem jong u Bah Mankular Gashnga Lamin, ka Pahsyntiew, ka Li Dakha bad ka Saia Nongum ki dei shipara ki puriblei ki ba ju leit sum ha Wah Kupli haduh ba kin da ioh hok ban wan longbriew bad kha pateng ki syiemblei ha ka bri Hynñiewtrep Ynñiawwasa.Ka khep ka la dawa ba ka dorbar hima syiem Sutnga ne hima Jaiñtia kat ka ba dei hok ba kan rasong biang sa shisien ban ksan rngiew ia ki paidbynriew Khasi shityllup ha ka bri Hynñiewtrep Ynñiawwasa.Dei na Hima Sutnga ba la kyrsoi bad phriang ka seng hima sha kylleng ka Ri Khasi na ki saw ngut ki khun syiem jong ka Li Dakha, ba kynthup ¿a ka Pung, ka Lieh, ka Teng bad ka Lang. Na ka Pung la mih ki syiem Nongspung, na ka Lieh la mih u Syiem Shahjer ba longsyiem nyngkong ha Hima Nongkhlaw; na ka Teng la mih ki basan bakhraw ha Raij Nongsteng jong ka Hima Sohra, na ka Lang la mih ki basan bakhraw Kurkalang ka Raij Mylliem jong ka Hima Shyllong. Nalor kata, dei ki paid byllien u Sajar Nangli ki ba la buhai shnong ha shilynter ka thaiñ Ri Bhoi. Kumta shitylli la dei hok ban khieim biang ki Syiem Hima Sutnga ne Syiem Jaintia kat ki ba shong hok, ban ehdaw ehrngiew ki paidbynriew Hynñiewtrep Ynñiawwasa.Kynmaw dngong ba ka kyntien ‘Laiphew Syiem Khatar Doloi’ ka dei ka ba dang mih hadien ba wan synshar donbor ki phareng, namar ba ka la kyrsoi hadien ba la pynduh syiem ia kata ka hima bakhraw jong ki Pnar ba la kam kum ka Jaintia Hills District bad pynkup bor ia ki doloi ki ba long tang kum ki rangbah shnong.Ka kyntien laiphew bad khatar ka dei tang ka tienjer bad kam da mut thik laiphew ne khatar tylli; kum ha ba la ju ong ki laiphew jait laiphew skit lane khatar snem lynti bad kumta ter ter. Ha ka nam u Sajar Nangli, u Kiang Nangbah bad ka Syiem Latympang, ai ba ka Hima bakhraw jong ki Pnar kan ieng rasong biang sa shisien. Hoi kiw, hoi kiw, hoi kiw.
title: Ksan la ka Rngiew

content: Shillong: Kiba ioh pang corona thymmai, ki don 19 ngut bad na kitei ki kynthup ia 18 ngut na East Khasi hills.Kitei ki kynthup ia 4 ngut ki high risk contact, 8 ngut kiba wan phai na shabar jylla, iwei i SARI, iwei na Mawlai Mawroh, iwei na Nongrah, 3 ngut na Rynjah.
title: 8 ngut kiba wan na shabar, 3 na Rynjah kiba ioh covid thymmai

content: Shillong: Kiba ioh pang covid mynta ka sngi, ki don 19 ngut bad kitei ki kynthup ia 18ngut ki riew paidbah na East Khasi Hills.Kiba jem na ka jingpang, ki long 54 ngut bad kitei ki kynthup ia 40 ngut na East Khasi Hills, ha kaba ki riew paidbah, ki don 37 ngut. Ha Ribhoi District ki don 11ngut, West Khasi hills 2 bad West Garo Hills iwei.Kiba dang don ha ka jingpang, ki long 149 ngut bad na East Khasi Hills ki don 113 ngut, West Khasi Hills 3 ngut, Ribhoi 13ngut, West Jaintia Hills iwei, West Garo Hills 14 ngut, South West Garo hills 3 ngut, East Garo hills bad North Garo hills mar iwei.Baroh kiba la jem na ka jingpang, ki long 13,139 ngut bad kiba iap, ki long 139 ngut.
title: 18 ngut kiba ioh pang corona thymmai ha East Khasi hills

content: Shillong: Ka Dorbar Shnong Shnongpdeng, ka la shim ia ka rai ba naduh ka 5tarik Kyllalyngkot(January) 2021, kan pdiang sngewbha ia ki nongjngohkai pyrthei, kiba ju sngewtynnad ban wan jngohkai bad sahmiet, kumba ju long baroh shikatto, ha wah Umngot Shnongpdeng.Kane ka rai la shim ban plie biang iaka kam pyniaid Tourists spot, hadien ba ka la don ka jingkhang ba shipor ha kine ki bnai ba ladep na ka daw ka jingpang Covid-19.Ka Dorbar Shnong, ha kane ka kynti, ka la buh ruh ia ki kyndon bad katto katne, bad kiba kham kongsan ki long ba ka jingpdiang ia ki nongwanjngohkai kan long hapoh ka 500ngut haka shi sngi.La khang shwa shipor ia kito ki nongwan bamkhana (picnic) kiba pynkhreh ban shet ban tiew hi harud ki wah ki um.Kumjuh, ia mynta ka kynti, Ka Dorbar Shnong Shnongpdeng, ka kyrpad ia ki nongwanjngohkai, ban iatreilang bad ki bor pyniaid shnong, namar kin don shibun ki jingkylla haka rukom pyniaid kam. Kynthup ban bud ryntih iaki protocols bala kdew da ki bor Sorkar khnang ban iada na ka jingsaphriang jong U Khniang jingpang Covid-19, ong ka kyrwoh na  U Bah Lurman B. Talang, General Secretary, Dorbar Shnong Shnongpdeng.
title: Pdiang nong jngoh kai, ka Shnongpdeng, naduh ka 5tarik

content: Shillong: Kiba ioh pang covid thymmai, hynnin ka sngi, ki long 21 ngut bad ka East Khasi Hills, ka don 16ngut.Na kitei ki kynthup ia 6 ngut ki high risk contact, 3 ngut kiba wan phai na shabar jylla, iwei na   Happy Valley, 2 ngut na  Laban, 3 ngut na Madanrting, iwei na Malki.Ka West Garo Hills, ka don 3  ngut kiba ioh pang bad ki kynthup ia 2 ngut ki high risk contact, iwei iba leit  Screening.Ka South West Garo Hills, ka don iwei iba dei i high risk bad ka West Jaintia hills, ka don iwei iba dei i high risk.
title: 3 na Madanryting, 2 na Laban, kiba ioh covid 19

content: Shillong: Ka Dorbar Shnong Cham Cham ka pdiang sngewbha ia kiba wan jngohkai pyrthei sha Sahksaw Fish Sanctuary,Skha Thwai Marang Beach,Rynji Falls kiba don ha shong Cham Cham.Ka Dorbar Shnong Cham Cham kaba hap hapoh ka Elaka Jwai East Jaintia Hills District, Khliehriat kum shi bynta ban pdiang sngewbha ia u snem thymmai ka la pdiang ia ki nongwan peit kai pyngad na kylleng ki Ri-lum Khasi Jaintia ryngkat ka jingbud ryntih ia ki kyndon jong ka Sorkar khnang ban lah ban iada na ka jingiabit na u khniang Covid-19.Ka Dorbar shnong ka la mana ruh ia ki nongwan peitkai ba kin sngewbha ban bud ryntih ia ki kyndon jong ka Dorbar Shnong ba ym bit ban bret niut pathar, ne pynmih ki jingkulmar hapoh kane ka jaka peitkai bad kumjuh hapoh u pud u sam jong ka Shnong Cham Cham.Na ka liang jong ka Dorbar Shnong Cham Cham, ka ai khublei Snem thymmai basuk bakmen ia baroh ba une u snem thymmai un long u snem uba wanrah ia ki jingkyrkhu kyrdoh, kyrmen ba ngin ioh ka met ka phad ka ba koit kaba khiah bha ban bit ban biang ki kam ki jam baroh, ong ka  kyrwoh na u Waheh Shnong Cham Cham East Jaintia Hills, Khliehriat.
title: Pdiang sngewbha ka Cham Cham, ia kiba wan jngoh kai pyrthei

content: Shillong: Ka kong  Anita Blah 74 snem, na  Nongshilliang, Malki, Shillong, East Khasi Hills, ka leit shah sumar ha Woodland Hospital, ha ka 24tarik Nohprah bad ka ioh ia ka jingpang khlam covid 19. Ka la khlad noh ha ka 29tarik Nohprah 2020. Ki daw jong ka jingpang:  Carcinoma Lung with Covid 19.
title: Khlad ka meirad na Malki, na u covid 19

content: Shillong: Ka Tourism Promoter Trekking Society,Wahkhen shen kan sa pynlong shwa da ka jingpynkhuid lynti bad pynkhuid wah (cleaning drive) ha ka 2nd Jan 2021 ia ka lynti(trekking route) ban leit sha Mawryngkhang Trekking Tourist spot hadien ba la dep pynbha ia ka mynta kumba 2 bnai tam ei ei.Kane ka jaka ka long shisha kaba phylla bad kaba itynnad shibun eh ia ki Tourist kiba ju wan jngoh ban peitkai ia ka jinglong kyrpang(uniqueness) jong kane ka jaka.Ki tourist ki hap ban iaid kjat lyngba ia shibun ki jingkieng siej(bamboo bridges) baroh shi lynter ka lynti haduh ban da poi ha Mawryngkhang.Ia u Mawryngkang la ju tip ia u kum u Syiem ki mawbah mawsan.La ju khot ruh ia kane ka jaka kum ka jingkieng China ne Chinese bridge namar ka ia syriem ia ka jingkieng China.Ki Tourist kiba ju wan sha katei ka jaka ki ju ai nam ruh ia ka kum ka ‘ Queen ne Paradise Trekking Tourist Spot’ jong ka North East India’.Hadien katei ka jingpynkhuid ha ka 2nd Jan 2021,ka Society kan ai lad biang ia ki Tourist ba kin leit jngoh ia katei ka jaka da kaba kyrpad ia baroh kiban leit ba kin maintain ia ki protocol baroh katkum ka jingbthah jong ka sorkar.Ki Tourist kim dei ruh ban bret pathar ne leh khlem akor sha katei ka jaka hynrei ki dei ban burom ia ka mei mariang bad bat ruh ia ka akor ka burom briew na ka bynta ban pynneh pynsah ia ka jinglong ba kyntang jong ka mariang ha katei ka jaka, ong ka khubor na U  Secretary, Tourism Promoter Trekking Society,Wahkhen.
title: Naduh 3tarik, yn plie noh ia ka Mawryngkhang Tourist Trekking Spot ha Wahkhen

content: Shillong: U Bah Pynïaid Sing Syiem, MDC ka Sohryngkham Constituency uba dei ruh u Chairman ka Khasi Hills Autonomous District Council (KHADC) ha ka Sngi Balang, u la aiti mar kawei ka Ambulance sha ka Khasi Students’ Union (KSU) Mawryngkneng Circle, Hynniewtrep Achik National Movement (HANM) New Shillong Circle bad sha ka Nongrah Pyllun Multi-purpose Co-operative Society Ltd.Ha ka jingialang aiti ia kine ki Ambulance ha shnong Nongrah, u Bah Pyniaid lyngba ka Council, u la pynkup burom ruh ia ki nongialam shnong na ki shnong bapher bapher kiba hap ha ka Sohryngkham MDC Constituency kiba la ai ka jingïatreilang bad shim khia khamtam eh ha ka por ka khlam COVID-19 ha ki bnai kiba la dep.Kiwei kiba la ia donlang ha kane ka sngi ki kynthup ia u Bah Titos W Chyne, Chief Executive Member ka KHADC, u Paiem Ainam Manik Syiem, Acting Syiem ka Hima Mylliem, u Dr Jemino Mawthoh, MLA barim ka Nongthymmai Constituency, u Bah B. Pyngrope, Rangbah Shnong Nongrah, ki nongialam shnong.Nalor kine la ia donlang ruh da ki dkhot nongialam na ka HANM New Shillong Circle ryngkat ba kynthup ia u Bah Lamphrang Kharbani uba dei u President, ki dkhot ka KSU Mawryngkneng Circle ba kynthup u samla Shiningstar Kharbihkhew uba dei u President bad kumjuh na ka Nongrah Pyllun Multi-purpose Co-operative Society Ltd ba kynthup ia u Bah Edwin Pyngrope, President lem bad kiwei pat.Ia kine ki Ambulance, kawei ka dei kaba u Bah Pyniaid u la pynioh na skhim CMSRDF bad ar tylli pat kiba u la sei lyngba ka tulop bad skhim MDC. “Nga khmih lynti ba ka jingïatreilang khnang ba ngin lah ban iarap lem ia ki nongshong shnong kiba donkam ka jingïarap haba ia kynduh ia ki jingeh ha ka pang ka shitom bad ka iap ka im”, u la ong.U Bah Pyniaid haba ai jingkren u la ong ba kum u nongmihkhmat u lap ba bun ki longïing ym tang ha ka Constituency jong u ki shem jingeh haba jia ka pang ka shitom ne ki jingjia ba sngewsih namar kim ïoh Ambulance ban pynkit sha ki jaka ai jingsumar.U la pynpaw ka jingkhmih lynti ba ki seng treimon sngewbha kiba shimti da ka jingïatreilang ryngkat lem ki nongialam shnong kin lah ban ai ka jingshakri ia ki paidbah lyngba kine ki Ambulance.Na ka liang ki nongialam seng treimon sngewbha haba ai jingkren ki la pynpaw ka jingsngewnguh ia u Bah Pynïaid uba la noh synñiang da kine ki Ambulance kum shi bynta ban ia kit ia bah lang ha ki kam kyrkieh bad ka pang ka iap ha ka thaiñ Mawryngkneng, Nongrah, Mawkasiang bad Sohryngkham hi baroh kawei.U Paiem Ainam ha kane ka sngi u la noh synñiang da ka pisa kaba long mar 10 hajar tyngka sha ki nongialam kine ki seng treimon sngewbha.Na ka liang u Bah Titos Chyne kum u Special Guest,  u la ong ba ka thaiñ Sohryngkham bad Mawryngkneng, hi ka long kaba donbok ban ïoh ia u Bah Pyniaid kum u nongialam bad kyntu ia ki ba ïoh shimti ia ki Ambulance ban ai ka jingshakri kaba bha tam kaba ki lah ban leh na ka bynta ki paidbah.
title: Pyllait u Chairman KHADC, lai tylli ki ambulance sha ki seng treimon sngewbha

content: Shillong: Hynnin ka sngi, ki don 21 ngut kiba ioh pang corona thymmai bad kitei ki kynthup ia 16 ngut na East Khasi Hills, ha kaba kitei ki dei ki riew paidbah suda.Ka West Garo Hills, ka don 3 ngut ki riew paidbah, kiba ioh pang, ka South West Garo Hills, ka don iwei bad ka West Jaintia Hills ruh ka don iwei.Kiba jem hynnin ka sngi, ki long 19 ngut, ha kaba ki don 10 ngut na East Khasi Hills, 4 ngut na Ribhoi District, 3 ngut na West Garo Hills, iwei na North bad iwei na South Garo Hills.Don ruh iwei iba iap, hynnin ka sngi.Kiba don ha ka jingpang, ki long baroh 184 ngut bad kitei ki kynthup ia 135 ngut na East Khasi Hills, 5 ngut na West Khasi Hills, 24 ngut na Ribhoi District, wei na West Jaintia Hills, 14 ngut na West Garo Hills, 3ngut na South West Garo Hills, wei na East bad iwei na North Garo Hills.Baroh kiba la jem ki long 13,085 ngut  bad kiba iap, ki la poi sha ka 139 ngut.
title: 21 ngut kiba ioh pang corona thymmai, ha ka Jylla

content: Shillong: U President ka Khasi Student Union u bah Lambokstarwell Marngar, ha ka sngi balang, u la ong ba ka jaitbynriew Hynniewtrep ka khlem dawa na ka Sorkar India ia ka lama la ka jong, ne ka khlem dawa ia ka Constitution la la jong, hynrei ka dawa ia ka ain ban iada ia ka jaitbynriew.U bah Marngar u la ong ba lada ka ri u Hynniewtrep ka dang hap hapoh ka synshar jong ka sorkar India, ka sorkar India ka la dei ban ai mardor ia ka Innerlne permit ia ka jylla Meghalaya. U la ong ruh ba ka jingsngap mynthi jong ka sorkar India kadei ka jingniew bein ia ka ri u Hynniewtrep bad kan sa wan  ka por ban khyllie biang ia ka daw ba ka ri u Hynniewtrep ka iasoh bad ka ri India.  U la ong ruh ba lada ka sorkar India bad ka sorkar jylla ka dang kheinsting ia ki jingdawa ka jaitbynriew kadei ruh nan shim ia ka jingkitkhlieh lada ka jylla ka don hapdeng ka jing bym shongsuk shong sain.  U la kyntu ruh ia baroh ki sengbhalang ba kin ialong kawei na ka bynta ka daw bah ban iada  ia  ka ri bad ka jaitbynriew.
title: Ngi khlem dawa la ka jong ka lama, ngi khlem dawa la ka jong ka constitution ngi dawa ia ka ain ban iada jaitbynriew, ong U President KSU

content: Shillong: Ha ka jingialang ka ba la pynlong ha Motphran,ha ka sngi balang, ka  Confederation of Meghalaya Social Organisation, ka la byrngem  ba ha u snem 2021; lada ka sorkar kam lah ban pynurlong ia ka jingdawa kaba kynthup ia ka jingpyntreikam ia ka  Meghalaya Resident Safety and Security Act Amendment Bill 2020 bad ia ka Inner Line Permit, ka jylla kan don hapdeng ka jingiakhih ka ba jur.Haba kren ha kane ka jingialang, na ka liang u General Secretary ka CoMSO u bah Roykupar Synrem u la ong ba ha u snem thymmai ka sorkar ka la dei ban pynurlong  ia ki jingdawa ia ka MRSSA bad ia ka ILP, hynrei lada katei kam urlong,  na ka liang ka CoMSO kan mih madan bad  ka jylla kan don hapdeng ka jingiakhih ka ba jur.  U la ong ruh ba  lada ki 60 ngut ki MLA kim lah ban pynurlong ia ka jingdawa ILP ha ka jylla ka la dei ka por ia ki nongshong shnong ha ka jylla ba kin mih shakhmat ban iasnoh kti lang ban iakhun ban pynioh ILP ha ka jylla.U la ong ruh ba ka jingdawa ILP ha ka jylla Meghalaya, ka dei ka ba la slem, hynrei mynta ka kynti ka CoMSO kan ym kynran dien ban ialeh haduh ban da lah ban pynioh ia ka ILP ha ka jylla.
title: Ka MRSSA, ka ILP ki dei ban urlong ha u snem thymmai lem kumta, ka ap ka jingiakhih kaba jur:CoMSO

content: Kane ruh ka donkam ia ka khmat u briew uba sngewthuh bha shaphang ki jingthung. Da kaba leh kumne ki riewstad ha ka rep ki la lah ban pynmih shibun ki jaid jingthung kiba kham bha ban ia kiwei pat ki para jingtung. U briew uba la leh shibun eh ia kane ka kam ha ka ri India jong ngi u long u Sir Albert Howard. La iarap ia u ha kane ka kam da ka tnga jong u, ka Gabrielle L.C. Howard. Mynta ha ri India don bun ki jaid kew, bad kiwei -kiwei ki jaid jingthung kiba kine arngut ki la pynmih (evolve) da kaba shu jied kumne.Ha ka jylla United Provinces pat, u riewstad ha ka rep uba la pynmih shibun ki jaid jingthung da kane ka rukom u long u Rai Sahio Ram Prasad Singh. Une u riewstad um shym da shong skul shibun eh. Lehse ia ka matrik (matriculation) ruh um pat pass. Hynrei u l;a nang ia kane ka kam da kaba iatrei bad uwei u Saheb uba kyrteng u Dr. Leake; bad hadien kata u la pynmih uwei u jaid kynphad uba bha (Cawnbore 520), uwei u kew uba bha (Cawnpore 13), bad uwe u barli (barley) ruh uba bha shibun (Cawnpore 251). Ia kine mynta la thung ha kylleng ka jylla United Provinces.Ngi ngeit kane ka jingpyni kan pynpyrkhat bad pynshlur ia ki katto katne ki nongrep ha ri Khasi-Jaintia. Ki lah l ehse ban pynmih u riewhadem uba phylla da kaba shu jied kumne na kito ki riewhadem kiba ha ki lyngkha jong ki. Kumjuh ruh lehse uno ma uno u nongrep u lah ban shem ia u phan uba lah ban ialeh pyrshah ia ka iap iong. Lada phi shem uba kum uta, bad lada phi pynroi ia u phi lah lehse ban pynmih u jaid phan uba lait na ka iap iong. Katno kan long ka jingkyrkhu ia ka ri Khasi-Jaintia lada lah ban ioh ia uba kum uta u phan.Hooid kan long ka jingkyrkhu ia ka pyrthei baroh kawei, namar ka iap iong ka don kylleng satlak ka pyrthei. Shisien ha kawei ka snem, kane ka iap iong ka la jur katta katta ha ka ri Ireland ba kumba shi millian ki briew ki la iap ha kata ka snem. Phi i, ha ka ri Ireland ki bam ia u phan kumba bamja ma ngi ha ri Khasi-Jaintia. La kumta ruh wat leit pyrkhat ba kane ka kam ban jied ia u jingthung uba bha ka long kaba jem, kaba u luk u lak baroh u lah ban leh. Kan da bha shibun lada u nongrep un sngewthuh katto-katne ka jingstad kaba ki khot ka saians (science) ka jingiapoikha hapdeng ki jingthung (plant breeding), lada u mut ban leh ia kane.Kaba lai pat ka rukom kaba ki ju pyndonkam khnang ban pynmih ki jingthung kiba kham bha ka long da kaba iapynpoikha artylli ki jingthung lada kita ki artylli ki jingthung ki long kiba don kano-kano ka jingbha kaba u nongrep u kwah ban don ha ki khun jong ki. Tharai mynta u don uwei u jaid kba uba seisoh bha, hynrei uba ju ioh ka kynja jingpang kaba pyntlot bor ia u, bad don uwei pat u jaid kba uba ym ju ioh satia ia kata ka jingpang. Ki riewstad shisyndon kin pyrshang ban ia pynpoikha ia kitei ki ar jaid ki kba, bad na ki khun jong ki kin jied uno-uno u jaid kba uba iabit ia kitei ki jinglong baroh ar jong ki kmie ki kpa. Kane ka long kaei-kaei kaba lah ban long. Mynta ha ka jylla United Province don uwei u jaid kba uba kawei ka khniang kaba ki khot ka ‘rice bug’ kam lah ban da pynjulor eh ia u namar ba u syntiew kba (inflorescence) baroh uwei um ju mih napoh ka kop sla (leaf sheath). Don pat kiwei kiba seisoh shibun, bad kiba rit symboh itynnad; hynrei kiba u syntiew kba u mih shabar, bad kumta kata ka khniang ka pynjulor ia u. Ki riewstad ha katei ka jylla namarkata ki la pyrshang mynta la khad-ar snem tam ban pynmih u kba uba lah ban lait na katei ka khniang bad ban long uba itynnad bad seisoh bha, da k kaba iapynpoikha ia kitei ki ar jaid ki kba. Ia kane ka jingleh ki khot ha ka ktien phareng “hybridization”. Kane ka donkam shibun ka jingsngewthuh ia kata ka saians (Science) kaba thymmai kaba ki khot ka “genetics”, kaba long ka jingstad shaphang ka jingiapoikha hapdeng ki jingthung lane ki mrad.LYNNONG – VKI JAID KHYNDEW HA RI KHASI-JAINTIAHa ka lynnong kaba mynshuwa nga la thoh kham bun shaphang ka khyndew bad ki sboh, bad lehse yn don ka jingsngewthuh ba ka jingseisoh jong ka khyndew ka shong eh tang ha ka jingdon jong kata ka khyndew ia kito ki met tynrai kiba nga la kdew haneng. Hynrei kane kam long kaba da dei eh, namar ka jingseisoh jong ka khyndew ka shong ruh ha kiwei pat ki jinglong jong ka khyndew nalor ka jingdon jong ka ia kita ki met tynrai kiba u jingthung u donkam. Wat ka jingdon lane ka jingbymdon jong kitei ki met tynrai ka shong ha kiwei pat kiei-kiei kiba ngi kwah ban batai hangne harum.Kaba nyngkong ka jingdon jong kitei ki met tynrai bad ka jingseisoh jong ka khyndew ka shong eh ha ka jingsdang bad ha ka jingpynlong ia kata ka khyndew. Kumta na ka liang ka jingsdang bad ka jingpynlong ia ki don bun jaid ki khyndew.Don katto-katne ki khyndew kiba la kylla na ki mawsiang kiba don hapoh jong ki. Kum ia kita ki khyndew ki khot ha ka ktien phareng ki “residual soils”. Ha ki hajar ki phew hajar, bad ki millian ki snem ba kane ka pyrthei ka la long, ki mawsiang ki la kylla khyndew da ka jingtrei ba phylla jong ka mariang, ka jingtrei kaba ngim lah ban batai ha kane ka kot. Bad haba kane ka khyndew ka shu sah hajuh ha ka jaka kaba ka la long, ia kiba kum kita ki khyndew ki khot ki “residual soils”. Ka jingdon ne ka jingbymdon kitei ki met tynrai kiba nga la pyni haneng ha ki jaid khyndew kiba kum kine, ka shong eh ha ka jingdon ne jingbymdon kitei ki met tynrai ha u mawsiang na kaba kata ka khyndew ka la man long. Lada u mawsiang u long uba bun ka nar, ka khyndew kaba mih na u bunsien ka dei ban long kaba bun ka nar. Ka long kumuuh ruh shaphang kiwei pat ki met tynrai. Kum kine ki jaid khyndew ki bun eh ha ki ri lum Khasi Jaintia jong ngi. Ki long ki khyndew ki bym da bha eh na ka bynta ka jingrep, hynrei la kumta ruh ki lah ban pynmih shibun lada ngi nang ban pyndonkam ia ka.
title: KA KOT REP

content: Shillong: Ka Confederation of Meghalaya social Organisation (CoMSO) ha ka sngi balang, kum ka dak ban kynmaw burom ia ka lyngkhuh sngi iap kaba 158 snem jong u Woh Kiang Nongbah; ka la pynlong ia ka jingiaid pyneh rngiew ia ka jaitbynriew kaba la sdang naduh ka Polytechnic Mawlai bad pynkut haduh Motphran.Kane ka jingiaid pyneh rngiew ia ka jaitbynriew ka long ruh kum shibynta ban pynrhem ia ka mynsiem ban dawa na ka sorkar pdeng ban ai jingmynjur noh ia ka Inner Line Permit (ILP) ha ka jylla Meghalaya.Haba kren ha ka ne ka sngi na ka liang u bah Roykupar Synrem, u General Secretary ka CoMSO u la ong ba na ka liang ka CoMSO ka long kaba shai ba kan iakhun shakhmat khlem da kynran dien haduh  ba ka jylla Meghalaya kan ioh ia ka ILP.   U la ong ba kane ka jingiaid pyneh rngiew ka long ruh na ka bynta ki 60 ngut ki MLA ki ba la shah pynjem rngiew ha ka sorkar pdeng namar ba ka la leh bym suidniew ia ka rai jong ki, kaba ki la pdiang ia ka resolution hapoh ka ingdorbar thawain jong ka jylla.
title: Iaid pyneh rngiew ka CoMSO, ha ka sngi iap U Kiang Nangbah

content: Nongpoh:Ha ka sien kaba khyndai, ka Shlem iarap ia kiba duk u Rupang ka la ioh sam jingiarap da ki tiar, ia ki 8 ngut ki longing kiba kham duk, myn hynnin ka sngi, ka 29tarik u Nohprah 2020, kiba don kylleng ka Ri Khasi-Jaintia.Ki tiar ba ki ioh ki kynthup ia ki jain pynsyaid kum ki blanket,ki tusok,ki nep rajai,etc bad ki tiar shet tier tiew kum ki khiew,ki pliang bad kiwei, khnang ba kin ioh pyndonkam ha ing ha sem jongki.Ia kane la sam ha Mawkhar Christian Hr.Sec. School,Shillong bad u Pa ‘iem Ainam Sing Syiem ka Hima Mylliem u la long u kongsan ha katei ka sngi. Na ka kaiphot U secre tary jong ka Shlem iarap ia kiba duk u Rupang,u Babu Kular Khingjirem, mynta u snem ki don ruh bun ngut ki bym dei ki para doh para snam(Non-tribal) ki la noh synniang lang sha kane ka Shlem.Na ka pisa kaba mih mynta u snem kaba long Rs 40,001/,ki bym dei khasi(Non-Khasi) ki la noh synniang Rs 18,051/, katba na ki para doh para snam jongngi pat ka mih Rs 21,950/.Kane ka pyni ba wat ki bym dei Khasi ruh ki don ka jingsngewlem ia ki para Khasi kiba duk jongngi.U Secretary u iathuh ba la mang T.5, 000/ iwei i nongioh jingiarap(beneficiary) bad na katei ka pisa,T.4,500/ la thied da ki tiar katba T.500/ tyngka pat la mang ban ai ban kali noh ia iwei na iwei i nongioh jingiarap khampher lada ki wan na jan ne na jngai.Ki nongioh jingiarap mynta u snem ki long U Bah Sis-Willfall Dkhar na shnong Musniang, po/ps Ladrymbai,E.J Hills uba duh noh ka kjat ka mon bad ki khunrit 3 ngut ban bsa ha ka ing dara ba la tap da ka plastic typerlyne, ka kong Sej Khongsni na Nongblai, kaba la pluh noh ka ing bad dang don ha ka jingpdung ding mynta nalor ba ka hap bsa hi ia la ki khun, ka Kong Tarina L.Lyngkhoi na Umlyngka Upper Shillong, kaba hap bsa hi 7 ngut ki khun khlem don shuh u kpa, ka Kong B.Morida Kurbah na shngi Mawlein,P.o Umsning Ri Bhoi District kaba shu kamai dukan waidong ban bsa ia ki khun bym don shuh u lok, ka Kong Brigidia Mukhim na Mawblei kaba ia shitom lang baroh 2 ngut shi lok khlem lah kamai shuh ban bsa ia ka ing ka sem, ka Kong Yer Kurbah na Weilyngkut West Khasi Hills kaba duh noh shiliang ia la ka kti ban bsa ia la ki khun, ka Kong Phima Chyrmang na Kyndong Tuber kaba duk bym don shuh u nongbsa bad ka Kong Nokila Dkhar na Lyting Lyngdoh, Pynursla Block kaba shu bylla nong sngi ban bsa bad ri khunrei 4 ngut khlem don shuh u nongbsa ka ing.U pa ‘Yiem Ainam Sing Syiem, Syiem ka Hima Mylliem ha ka jingkren jongu kum u Kongsan u la pynpaw ka jingnoh mynsiem bha ia kum kine ki program ba kyrpang ban ioh iarap shisha ia kiba duk hok kiba don kylleng ka Ri jongngi.U la pyntikna ba ka Hima jongu ruh kan iarap lem katba lah ban pynmyntoi lem ia kiba duk.U la noh synniang lem T.10, 000 sha ka Shlem kum ka dak ban ia don bynta lem ha kaba iarap ia kiba duk ha katei ka sngi.Shwa jong kane,u Myntri Kharlukhi ka Hima Mylliem u la iarap bai kali lem mar mar T.1,000 ia ki 8 ngut ki longing ba duk ha katei ka sngi.Na ka liang u Bah Sis-Willfall Dkhar pat uba la kren na ka liang ki nongioh jingiarap u la ong ba u pdiang hun ia ka jingpyniaid U Blei.U kyntu ia kito kiba duk ban duwai bad pdiang ia ka jingpyniaid U Blei.U pynpaw ruh ka jingsngewnguh sngew burom ym tang ia ka Shlem jingiarap ia kiba duk uRupang, hynrei khamtan eh ia ki nong ai jingiarap ba ka Shlem kan ioh ai jingiarap sha u bad kiwei pat.Ia ka jingialang la pyniaid da u Babu D.Rngat ha ka jingiadon lang U Bah Jied Kurbah, kong Belbora Wankhar bad u Bah R M Shabong uba dei u Editor bad Publisher jong ka kot khubor u Rupang.
title: Sam jingiarap sha 8 ngut, da ka Shlem iarap ia kiba duk u Rupang

content: New Delhi:U Anna Hazare, ula rai ban sdang ia ka jing iakhih ha New Delhi, ha u kylla lyngkot, halor ki mat jong ki nongrep.Ha ka shithi sha U Narendra Singh Tomar, myntri ka tnat rep ka sorkar India, U Hazare, u pyntip, ba ula rai ban pynlong ia ka jing iakhih ha Delhi, naduh u bnai u ban wan.Kham myn shwa, ha ka 15 tarik Nohprah, U Hazare, ula thoh sha U Tomar, ha kaba ula maham, ba un sdang biang ia ka jingshah thngan jongu, lada jia ba kam don ka jing pyntrei kam ia ka jing mynjur, ba la ai da ka MS Swaminathan Commission. La ong shuh shuh da U Hazare, ba lada ka sorkar, ka pyntrei kam ia katei ka jingmynjur jong ka komishon, kumta ka jing pyniap lade jong ki nongrep, kan sangeh shi syndon. Ula ong shuh shuh ba ka dor kyrshan jong ka sorkar, ka dei ban long ia ki jhur, ia ki soh bad ia ka dud ruh kumjuh.U Hazare, um shym la buh tarik satia, ia katei ka jing iakhih jongu, kaba un pynlong shen ha Delhi.
title: Byrthen sa U Anna, ban kyrshan ia ki nongrep ha Delhi

content: Guwahati:Ka Ajanta Neog, ka nongialam jong ka seng Congress, ka la pyn iasoh ialade sha ka seng BJP, mynta ka sngi ha Guwahati.La pdiang sngewbha ia katei ka nongialam Congress, da U Ranjeet Kumar Dass, President ka seng BJP, U Himanta Biswa Sarma, myntri pla pisa ka sorkar Assam, nalor kiwei pat.Hadien ba la pyn iasoh ialade sha ka seng BJP, katei ka MLA, kaba na Golaghat, ka ong “Nga la iaid ha ka surok thymmai mynta ka sngi”.Ka Neog, ka ong “Ka don ka jingjngai hapdeng ka seng bad ki riew paidbah bad nga sngew diaw shi katdei bad nga la duh noh ia ka jing sngew shaniah ia ka parti, kaba nga la don la 20 snem kynthih”.Nalor ka Neog, U Rajdeep Goala, MLA na Lakhipur, ula pyn iasoh ialade sha ka seng BJP mynta ka sngi.La beh noh na ka seng Congress, ia ka Neog, ha ka 25tarik Nohprah, namar ki kam pyrshah seng bad U Goala, ula shah beh, ha U Risaw 2020, namar ki kam pyrshah seng jongu.Ka Neog bad U Goala, ki la ia kynduh ia u Amit Shah, ha Guwahati, ha ka sngi saitjain ba ladep.
title: Pyn iasoh BJP, ka MLA Congress

content: Nongpoh:Watla ki don shibun kiba pynlong khana kamkai halor ka jinglap ba thymmai u Samla Aristone M. Ryndongsngi, ia uwei u jait Dohthli bym pat tip ha ka pyrthei, hynrei ha ka jing shisha hi ka long, ba utei u Dohthli uba la lap thymmai da utei u Samla, un sa rung ha ka thup jong ki Jait Dohthli ha ka pyrthei, namar baroh shikatta ym pat don ki Saiantis ha ka pyrthei, kiba la lap ne ban ioh kyrteng ia utei u Dohthli.Kum uwei na ki samla, uba la biang ka kyrdan jingpule bad uba la pule kyrpang halor ki jait Dohkha, u Samla Aristone M. Ryndongsngi, na ka shnong Iewmawlong, u dei ruh u nongialam ka RBYF, Nongpoh.Halor ka jinglap ia utei u Dohthli, haba kren bad utei u Samla, u la iathuh ba kumba ka long mynta ki don tang 48 ki jait Dohthli ha ka pyrthei, hynrei mynta kan sa kiew 49 jait, kata lyngba utei u Dohthli uba ma u hi, u la lap na kawei ka Wah kaba don ha Puriang, West Jaintia Hills District.Utei u samla, u la iathuh ruh ba utei u Dohthli ba dang lap thymmai ha ka Pyrthei, la jer kyrteng ia u kum u Channa Aristonei bad katei ka nam ban ioh ia katei ka kyrteng kam dei kaba la shu leh tang dep, hynrei la hap ban leit ban pynshisha ha kiba bun ki jaka ka Pyrthei bad ka jingpynshisha ka ban pynthikna ka dei ha Port Blair, kaba la pynshisha ba utei u Dohthli u dei uba dang thymmai bad u bym pat lap da mano mano ruh.Haba batai halor ka jinglap ia utei u Dohthli, u Samla Aristone M. Ryndongsngi, u la iathuh ba tang mar ia lap, ha kaba nyngkong u la ishankhmat bha halor ka jinglong jingman, kumta ban pynshisha ia kata pat, u la pyrshang ban phah jingtip sha kiwei pat ki Saiantis hapoh ka Ri ban pynshisha halor utei u Dohthli. Ka nam bad ka burom kaba u la ioh ka long namar ba baroh ki Saiantis ki la pynshisha ba utei u Dohthli ym pat don mano mano ruh kiba lap bad uba la iapher na kiwei pat ki jait Dohthli, kaba la pynlong syndon ia ki briew ba deipeit halor ki dohthli ba kin ainam da ka kyrteng ia utei u Dohthli.Halor katei ka nam ka burom kaba u la ioh, u samla Aristone M. Ryndongsngi, u la ai ka jingkhublei sha ki kmie ki kpa, kiba la kyrshan bad pynheh pynsan ia u bad u la ai ruh ka jingkhublei sha ki Nonghikai kiba la hikai ia u lem bad ia baroh ki paralok, kiba la kyrshan met bad mynsiem ia u.
title: Ha thup ka pyrthei yn rung U Aristone M. Ryndongsngi, kum u nonglap dohthli  thymmai

content: Nongpoh:Ka jaidbynriew jongngi (Khasi) ka dei ka jaidbynriew kaba im tang ha ka iatan tyllai hapdeng jongngi bad kaba dei ruh ka jaidbynriew kaba ngim ju don ia ka jingsngewnguh, hynrei ngi kloi ban pan bad ngim ju don kata kaba ngin ai ne ban iarap ia kiwei, ong u Bah Paul Lyngdoh, ha ka sngi kaba u la leit ban plie paidbah ia ka Sports Complex ha shnong Mawroh.Nalorkata, u Bah Paul Lyngdoh, u la ong ruh ba katba nangmih ki sngi, ka jaidbynriew Khasi ka la nanghiar eh ha ka burom akor, ha kaba ka sakhi kaba shai eh halor kata, ka long mynta ka jaidbynriew kam nang ban burom ia kino kino ki briew kiba la leh ia ki kambah na ka bynta ka jaidbynriew, hynrei kin burom ia ki tad ynda haba ki la khlad noh na sla pyrthei bad ha kata ka por kin sa kynmaw burom lane ban leit pyndeng syntiew ia ki.“Wat ia u Bah Bull N. Lyngdoh, u nongialam ba radbah ka KSU ha ki por kiba u dang im, ki paidbah kim burom lane ban sngewnguh ia ki kam kiba u la leh na bynta ka jaidbynriew, hynrei bun kiba bein ki khoh ia u, pynban haba u la khlad na sla Pyrthei, baroh ki kynmaw burom bad leit pyndeng syntiew ia u” kren diaw u Bah Paul Lyngdoh.U Bah Paul Lyngdoh, u la ong ba ka long kaba donkam eh ia ka jaidbynriew ba kan kyndit bynriew noh bad kata ka long ba ka dei ban nang ban burom ia kito ki briew ba dang im bad kiba la trei bha ha ka imlang sahlang bad kam myntoi ban burom ia ki haba ki la kyllut ne ym iohi shuh ki khmat bad ynda ki la khlad noh na sla pyrthei.Im slem Bah Paul
title: Ka jaidbynriew ka im tang ha ka jingiatan, ban pynhiar uwei ia uwei pat, wat u Bah Bull  Lyngdoh, u im ha ka jingshah kren tohmet

content: Guwahati:Don 56 sien, ka jing kurup jaka da ki jylla ba marjan sha Assam bad kitei ki kynthup ia ka Aruna chal Pradesh, Megha laya, Nagaland bad Mizoram ha u snem 2020, ong u myntri ka tnat Parliamentary affairs ka sorkar Assam, U Chandra Mohan Patowary ha iing dorbar, hynnin ka sngi.Kine ki 56 tylli ki jing tuh jaka, ki dei ha ki 11 tylli ki District bad ki dei naduh ka 1tarik Kyllalyngkot mynta u snem.La iathuh ba ki don 17 tylli ki jingjia, kiba don ruh ka jing ia pyni bor bad kitei ki dei ha Cachar, ha kaba ka don ka jing ia kynad hapdeng ka Assam bad ka Mizoram. La iathuh ba u dn uwei uba iap, ha ka jing ia kynad hapdeng ka Mizoram bad ka Assam ha Cachar.Hadien ka Cachar, ka don ka jing ia kynad ha West Karbi Anglong bad ha Kamrup district, ha kaba ki don hynniew sien, ki jingtuh jaka. Kiwei pat ki jaka, ha kaba la shah tuh jaka ha Assam, ki long ha Lakhimpur (hynriew sien), Dhemaji bad Karbi Anglong (san sien), Jorhat (saw sien), Karimganj (ar sien), ha Sadiya, Tinsukia bad Siva sagar (shisien). La iathuh ba ka Assam, ka iai dawa ia kitei ki jaka na ki sorkar Jylla bad na ka sor kar India ruh kum juh, ong U Pato wary.
title: 56 sien, don ka jingshah tuh jaka ka Assam, ha ka Meghalaya bad kiwei

content: Nongpoh:U Bah Paul Lyngdoh, EM ka KHADC hynnin ka sngi, u la leit ban plie paidbah noh ia ka W.I.R.R Kharkamni Memorial Sports Complex ha Mawroh, Ri Bhoi, ka jaka ialehkai kaba la tei kyrpang da ka Kur Kharkamni na Mawroh, na ka bynta ban pynsah jingkynmaw ia Saw ngut ki Knie Rangbah, ba la khlad noh jong ka Kur Kharkamni ha shnong Mawroh bad ia katei ka Sports Complex, ka Kur Kharkamni, kan sa aiti ha ki nongpyniaid ka Maw roh Sports Social & Cultural Club.Hapoh katei ka Sports Complex kaba la tei da ka Kur Kharkamni, la don ka jaka ialehkai Basketball, Badminton bad kumjuh ruh ka jaka iakilan na bynta kiba ialehkai Kriket, ha kaba ka la tei khnang ia katei ka Sports Complex, ka long ban kynmaw burom ia Saw ngut ki Knie Rangbah, kiba la khlad noh kiba la tip kyrteng kum u Wisroy, u Isroy, Rojes bad u Roming, kiba dei ki knie Rangba ka Kur bad kiba la khlad noh.Kiba la iadon bynta lang ha ka ban tei ia katei ka Sports Complex kaba ka Kur Kharkamni ka la tei,  ka Kong Rona Khymdeit, ka Meghalaya Cricket Association lem bad kiwei.Nalor u Bah Paul Lyngdoh, kiba la donlang ha katei ka sngi, ki kynthup ia ka u Bah C.B Syiem bad ka Kong Rona Khymdeit, kiba dei ki MDC barim ka Nongpoh Constituency, nangta u Bah Rayonald Kharkamni bad u Samla Ferdynald Kharkamni, kiba dei ki khun rangbah ka Kur lem bad shibun ngut ki heh ki hain na ka Meghalaya Cricket Association lem bad kiwei pat ki heh na ka dong Ri Bhoi.Kiba la ai jingkren ha katei ka sngi, ki la ai jingiaroh kaba khraw eh ia ka Kur Kharkamni na Mawroh, kaba la ialeh shitom ban tei ia katei ka Sports Complex, namar ka jinglah jong ki ban tei ia katei ka jaka ialehkai, kan da long ka jingmyntoi eh ia ki khun samla, ba kin ioh leit kilan met ha katei ka jaka.
title: Plie u Bah Paul Lyngdoh ia ka Sports Complex ka Kur Kharkamni ha shnong Mawroh

content: Shillong:Ka shnong Mawpud ka ba hap hapoh ka Ranikor Block, South West Khasi Hills District, kan sa ioh surok rong, hadien 42 snem, ban pyniasoh na ka shnong Umpung sha ka sh nong Mawpud lyngba ka skim PMGSY.Haba iakren bad ki katto katne ki riew rangbah ka shnong Mawpud, ki la iathuh ba kim lah ban pynthikna ia ka snem jong ka shnong, hynrei ka shnong Mawpud ka dei kaba la rim bha hapoh kane ka thain bad ka la lah ban kynjoh sha ka jing dap palat spah snem. Ki la iathuh ba ki nong shong shnong ka Mawpud ki im lyngba ka jing rep ka riang kynthup ia u synsar,u kwai u tympew, u sohmarit bam bad sohmarit khlaw, ka sla tyrpad bad kiwei kiwei ki mar rep nalor ki jait soh.Haba iakren bad ki nongkitkam ka shnong Mawpud, ba kynthup ia u bah M. Thongni bad u bah Well, ki la iathuh ba ki don kumba 350 tam tylli ki longïng hapoh ka shnong bad da khein ia ka jing don ki nong shong shnong ka shnong ka don kumba 1824 ngut tam.U la iathuh ban poi sha ka shnong Mawpud donkam ban iaid lyngba surok bah (NH106) shaduh ka shnong Umpung bad na Umpung donkam ban iaid lyngba ka shnong Pyndengwar bad na ka Lad Dommawlein kaba don kumba 13 km ban poi beit sha Mawpud.U bah M. Thongni u la iathuh ba wat la ka shnong Mawpud ka la dei ka shnong kaba heh bad kaba la rim bha hapoh ka thain South West Khasi District jong ka Ranikor Block bad kaba dei ruh ka shnong kaba markhap bad ka ri Bangladesh, hynrei ia ka surok rong dang ioh tang ha u snem 2019 naduh Umpung sha neng Pyndengwar kumba 7 km.Ka shnong Mawpud kaba don ha kliar jong ki lum bad ka dei ruh ka shnong kaba ju mat khah khah iaka jing dap um ha ki por slap bad kane ka pynjynjar bha ia ka leit ka wan jong ki paidbah ha ka por slap, namar dang don katto katne ki bynta ba khlem pat pyndep ia ki jingkieng rit.Haba dei bad ka surok ba dang sah kumba 5.7 km sha neng ka Pyndengwar sha Mawpud, haba hiar sha kane ka shnong, la iohi ba haduh mynta ia kane ka surok dang pynkhreh ban siang rong ba haduh mynta ka la don ka jing siang maw ha ki katto katne ki bynta jong ka surok.Naka liang u bah W. Wanniang u la iathuh ba ia ka bynta ban siang surok rong sha neng ka Pyndengwar shaduh Mawpud la mang na ka skim sorkar kmie ka Pradhan Mantri Gram Sadak Yojana (PMGSY) haka jing iatreilang bad ka tnat PWD ha ka jing lut kumba T.384.942 lak.“Ngi lah ban ong ba naduh ba la tih ia ka surok ban pynpoi sha shnong Mawpud kane ka jing ioh da ka surok rong kadei ka jing angnud ki paidbah nong shong shnong mynta la kumba 42 snem tam” la ong u bah W. Wanniang.
title: Hadien 42 snem, yn ioh surok rong na Umpung  sha Mawpud, na ka PMGSY

content: Subject: ka jingpyn jingshai ha kaba iadei bad ka Advertise No. DHS/MCH&FW/NHM/HWC/BP/80/2020/5415 Dated Shillong the 01.12.2020Kat kum katei ka subject kaba la kdew haneng nga sngewbha ban pan jingshai na phi ki bor ba pyniaid ha kaba ia dei ba katei ka advertise haneng.Ngi iohi ba katei ka advertise na ka bynta ka 6-Months Certificate Programme in Community Health for Nurses under Meghalaya National Health Mission kaba pynlait paitbah tang 14 sngi ba kin tip bad la buh ruh ia ka tarik kaba khatduh ba kin thep ha ka 14-12- 2020 shwa ka 4. Pm.Ka jingkylli kaba Nyngkong. Hato phi la ai jingtip ne pynlait paitbah ha ki Print newspaper kiba mih man ka sngi ne kino kino ki lad ba ki paitbah kin tip shaphang kane ka program?? Ha ka jinglap ka jong nga nga khlem iohi eiei ia kane bad lada phi la leh pyni ki sabut lait noh tang ha ka website jong phi. Kaba ar Ka program kan sdang ha u bnai January bad July 2021 bad balei kane ka advertise ka la mih slem palat bad bun ki bym tip eiei shaphang kane ka program?Hato don eiei sha lyndet ne phi kwah ban pynrung bad thep tang ia ki briew lajong.???Kynmaw tang 14 sngi ban advertise ia kano kano ka kam ne program ka wanrah artatien ia kiba iohi bad iohsngew.Nga kwah ba phin ai jingshai bad nga kyrpad ruh ba phi dei ban pynjrong biang ia ka sngi thep kaba khatduh khnang ba ki samla kiba wad kam kin ioh jingmyntoi na kane ka program.Khublei ShibunDated 29-12- 2020.
title: Ha U/ka, Mission Director, NHM, Shillong

content: Shillong: Mynta ka sngi, ki don phra ngut kiba ioh pang corona ha ka Jylla. Kitei ki kynthup ia 6 ngut ha East Khasi Hills, ha kaba 5 ngut na kitei, ki dei ki riew paidbah.Kiba jem na ka jingpang, ki long 24 ngut bad kitei ki kynthup ia 16ngut na East Khasi hills. Kiba jem na West Jaintia Hills, ki long 4 ngut bad na Ribhoi District ki long 2 ngut.Na kitei ki 6ngut ha East Khasi Hills, ki kynthup ia iwei na Happy Valley, uwei u shipai, ar ngut ki high risk contact, uwei na Rynjah, iwei SARI Case, iwei iba wan phai na shabar ha North Garo Hills, nangta sa iwei high risk ha West Garo Hills.
title: 8 ngut, kiba ioh covid thymmai,  6 ngut ha East Khasi Hills

content: Nongpoh: Shi bynta na ka jingpynkhreh ban rakhe ia u snem thymmai, ki nongialam ka Seng Samla Shnong Iewmawlong, hynnin ka sngi ki la pyn long ia ki prokram kiba kyrpang hapoh katei ka shnong bad kaba ka long ba ki la pynlong ia ka jingialehkai phutbol Inter Dong bad ruh ban sam Blanket sha kiba bun ki Longiing baduk hapoh katei ka shnong.Ha katei ka sngi kaba kitei ki nongialam ka SSS Iew mawlong, ki la pynlong ia kitei ki pro kram kyrpang, la sakhi da ka jingdon u Bah Bipul Thangkhiew, President ka RBYF, Sengkmie, u Bah Anthony Kharkongngor, Rangbah Shnong ka Iewmawlong, u Bah Wanpher S. Wahlang, Publicity Secretary ka RBYF, Sengkmie, u Bah Balawan Marwein, Sport Secretary ka RBYF Sengkmie, u Samla Aristone M. Ryndongsngi, President ka SSS Iewmawlong lem bad kiwei.Ha katei ka Inter Dong ha shnong Iew mawlong, ka jing iakhun kaba la long hynne ka sngi ka long hapdeng ka ML-10 Football Club pyrshah ia ka RBYF Iewmawlong Football Team, ka la kut noh da ka jingiakhaid kaba 1-1.Haba iadei bad katei ka prokram kaba la pynlong da ka Seng Samla Shnong Iewmawlong, u Bah Bipul Thangkhiew, u la ai ka jingkhublei kaba kyrpang, namar ba ki la leh ia kaba dei eh bad ka ban pynmyntoi ia ki khun samla hapoh katei ka shnong bad nalorkata, Utei u nongialam ka RBYF, u la kyntu ia ki samla hapoh ka shnong ba kin iatrei ryngkat ryngkat bad ki bor shnong, khnang ba ka shnong kan kiew shakhmat shaphrang.
title: Da kaba sam Blanket sha kiba duk bad Inter Dong FT, sdang ka rakhe pdiang snem thymmai ka SSS Iewmawlong

content: Shillong: Ka Meghalaya Association of Kickboxing Organization (MAKO) ka la lah ban pynlong ia ka XXIII Meghalaya State Level Kickboxing Musical Form Championship, 2020 ha Laitkor Shillong.Kane ka Musical form ka dei ka jing pyni ia ka sap ka phong bad ki buit jong ki nong kilanmet ba tang marwei ha pdeng madan ryngkat bad ka jingtem, kaba ia hap bad ka kam kaba ki leh.Ki Nongiakhun ba tbit duh ha katei ka lympung ki long:Senior Men
title: Ka buit kilan met ha madan ryngkat bad ka jingtem

content: Nongpoh:Ha kine ki khyndiat sngi ba la leit noh ki nongialam ka Hynniewtrep Achik National Movement (HANM), Ri Bhoi District, ki la leit ban kynduh ia u Ken Syiem, Syiem ka Raid Marwet, na ka bynta ban dawa na u ba u dei ban pynlong noh ia ka jingialang ban jied rangbah shnong hapoh ka shnong Umsen, kawei na ki shnong khappud ha Ri Bhoi bad kaba la mih huri hura, namar hapoh katei ka shnong dang ha kine ki khyndiat bnai ba la dep, la don kawei pat ka kynhun kaba la kwah ban thung rangbah shnong jubor da u briew bym dei Khasi bad kaba la wanrah ia ka huri hura hapoh katei ka shnong.Lah ruh ban pynkynmaw hangne, ba ka iing Durbar shnong Umsen, ka la hap ban khang tala, hadien ba la don ka jingkynnoh ba ki Khar Nepali kiba sah ha katei ka shnong, ki la sdang ban pynibor ia ki Khasi, da kaba shimkabu halor ka jingbunpaid ka jong ki, ha kaba ki la sdang ban knieh wat ia ka kam ban synshar khaddar hapoh katei ka shnong bad kaba la pynbitar eh ia ki paidbah ka shnong Umsen.Haba iadei bad ka huri hura hapoh katei ka shnong, u Bah Pateng Myrsing, President ka HANM, Ri Bhoi, u la iathuh, ba seng hi tang mar ia tip halor kitei ki kynrum kynram, ki la leit ban jurip hapoh katei ka shnong bad ki la lap ia ki jingshisha, kaba la pynlong ba wat ia Iing dorbar la hap ban khang tala, tang namar ka jingiapynibor hapdeng ki Nepali pyrshah ia ki Khasi kiba sah ha katei ka shnong.Haba batai hadien ka jingkynduh ia u Syiem ka Raid Marwet, u Bah Pateng Myrsing, u la ong ba ka seng ka la ioh ban kylli bniah na u Syiem ka Raid Marwet, ha kaba utei u Syiem, u la phla ba u la phah khang hi ia katei ka iing dorbar, namar ka huri hura lane ka jingbym ia beit hapdeng ki khasi bad kitei ki Nepali kiba sah ha katei ka shnong.Ha kawei pat ka liang, u Syiem ka Raid Marwet, u la kyntait halor ka jingkynnoh ai Sanad sha uwei u briew bym dei Khasi, hynrei u la kam bad u la phla ba u la phah ia ka jingthoh sha ka Hima Mylliem, tang ban ioh ia ka jingithuh ia utei u briew ba un long kum u nongialam shnong, ym ban pynskhem ia utei u briew ba un long kum u Rangbah shnong Umsen, bynrap u Bah P. Marsing.Namarkata, haba iadei bad ki huri hura hapoh katei ka shnong khappud, ka HANM, ka la dawa mardor ia u Syiem ka Raid Marwet ba un khot noh ia ka jingialang paidbah ha ka shnong Umsen bad ruh ban pynlong ia ka jingjied rangbah shnong thymmai bad ruh ba dei ban ioh nongialam shnong da u khasi khara ym da ki bar jylla, u la bynrap.
title: Kynduh ki HANM ia u Syiem ka Raid Marwet, halor ki kynrum kynram ha shnong Umsen

content: Nongpoh:U Bah Jebes Suphai, Rangbah shnong ka Ingsaw, ka shnong kaba don ha ki thain Mawhati ha Ri Bhoi, u la ujor da ka Ejahar ha Umsohlait Police Station pyrshah ia ka Kong Volenda Nongpoh, ka Longkmie na katei hi ka shnong, kaba dei ka Nongtrei ASHA bad ruh ka Nonghikai jong ka SSA Ingsaw U.P School.Ka nongrim kaba la pynlong ia utei u Rangbah shnong Insaw ban ujor Ejahar pyrshah ia katei ka Longkmie, ka dei halor ki nongrim ba ka la ktah kti bad kren bein ym tang ia u, hynrei ia ki dkhot Executive Committee jong katei ka shnong bad katei ka la jia tang namar ba utei u Rangbah shnong lem bad ki dkhot ka Executive Committee ka shnong, ki la leit ban kren sngewthuh ia ka ba kam bit ban saitjain ha kawei ka kor um kaba don hapoh katei ka shnong, hynrei ha kaba kum katei ka por katei ka Longkmie, ka la ktah kti ia utei u rangbah shnong bad kren bein ruh ia u da ki ktien kiba laiphewjait.Haba batei halor katei ka jingjia, u Bah Jebes Suphai, u la ong ba ma u lem bad ka Executive Committee, ki la pynlong ia ka jingleit jurip ia ki kor um hapoh shnong kiba la tyrkhong um ha shnong, hynrei ka don tang kawei ka kor um hapoh shnong kaba mih um bad katei ka Kong Volenda Nongpoh, ka la saitjain ha kor um, katba ki nongtong um kim ioh lad shuh ban tong um namar ka Kong Volenda Nongpoh ka saitjain hapoh katei ka Kor um.Kumta haba utei u rangbah shnong lem bad ki dkhot ka EC, ki la pyrshang ban kren pynsngewthuh ba ym bit ban saitjain ha kor um, namar ba la tyrkhong um palat ha shnong, hynrei katei ka Kong Volenda Nongpoh, ka la kren bein kren poh ia u Rangbah shnong lem ia ka EC, kumta haba la lap ba katei ka Longkmie ka la kren tohmet palat pud, u Rangbah shnong u la sei ia ka mobile phone ban Record ia ka jingkren jong ka katei ka Longkmie, pynban ha kaba kum kata ka por, ka la knieh kynthet ia ka mobile phone u Rangbah shnong bad patan ruh ia ka sopti haduh ba kan da jot.Haba iadei bad katei ka jingleh khlem akor da katei ka Longkmie, na ka loang ka Dorbar Shnong lem bad ka Village organization, ki la pynrem jur ia katei ka Longkmie, kaba dei ruh ka Nongtrei Asha bad Nonghikai hapoh ka SSA Ingsaw U.P School.
title: Shah Ejahar ka longkmie ba ktahkti bad kren tohmet ia u Rangbah shnong ha Ingsaw

content: Khliehriat: Ka East Jaintia National Council ka la dawa na ka sorkar jylla ban pynlong ia ka jingtohkit kaba bniah ban lap ia ka jingkylla rong ka wah Lukha kaba la pyniap ruh da ki spah tylli ki dohkha bad kiba im hapoh um ha katei ka wah.Mynta ka sngi ka EJNC hapoh ka Jingialam jong u President jong ka, u Sambormi Lyngdoh, bad u Allmiki Ryngkhlem uba dei u Vice President nalor kiwei pat ki la hiar ban jurip shaduh ka Wah Lunar kaba tuid shaduh sha Wah Lukha.Na ka liang ka EJNC ka la pynpaw ia ka jingsngewdiaw ban iohi ba kane ka wah ka kylla tang mar synpoi ki bnai tlang.“Kane ka jingkylla rong kane ka wah ka la buh ia ki paidbah ha ka jingdum bad kito kiba myntoi na kane ka wah ki la shah ktah bad wat haba la pyrshang ban pynlong ia kane ka wah kum ka jaka jngohkai namar ka long kaba itynnad, hynrei haba ka kylla rong bad pyniap ia ki dohkha ka wanrah ka jingsngewdiaw bad ka jingduhnong ia ki padibah ka thain”, la ong u President ka seng.Utei u nongialam ka EJNC u la ong ruh ba ka seng ka dawa na ka sorkar bad kumjuh na ka JHADC kaba dei ka nongkhmih nongpeit ia kane ka wah ba thung ia ka kynhun tohkit ba laitluid ban tip ia ki jingshisha halor kane ka jingkylla rong kane ka wah.“Ngin shong pyrkhat ha u Snem thymmai bad ngi lah ruh ban phah da ka jingthoh shaduh ka NGT ban pyntip bad ban ujor halor kane ka jing kylla rong jong ka wah Lunar bad Lukha”, la pynkut utei u nongialam ka EJNC.
title: Dawa ka EJNC ban tohkit bniah, ba kylla rong ka Wah Lukha

content: Shillong:U Commissioner and Secretary jong ka Health and Family Welfare u Sampath Kumar, u la iathuh ba haduh myn hynnin ka sngi, ki la don 12 ngut ki briew kiba dei ki nongshong shong ka jylla Meghalaya ki ba la wan phai na United Kingdom.Haba iakren bad ki lad pathai khubor u Sampath Kumar u la iathuh ba kine ki briew ki ba la wan phai na United Kingdom ki long negative ha ka jingtest ia ka jingpang Covid-19 bad mynta ki dang don hapdeng ka Quarantine.Kum ban shu pynkynmaw ba ka Ri baroh kawei ka don ha ka jingpeitngor hadien ka jingmih khubor ia ka jingmih da uwei u coronavirus u ba khlain bor na ka Ri United Kingdom.U Kumar u la iathuh ruh ba ki 12 ngut ki briew ki ba la wan phai sha ka nongbah Shillong, kim shym la don kano kano ka symptoms, hynrei ki briew ka tnad ka koit ka khiah ki long ki ba peitngor ia ka jinglong jingman koit ka khiah jong ki.Ha ka ba iadei bad u khniang jingpang CoronaVirus u ba kham khlain bor, u ba ki lap ha United Kingdom, ka sorkar Meghalaya ka la khang ia ka jingwan rung jong ki briew ki ba dei na ki Ri European.Ka sorkar jylla ka la bthah ia ki khyrdop iarung sha ka jylla ba ia ki briew ki ba wan iaid lyngba lane ki ba wan rung na ka Ri United Kingdom ha kine ki saw taiew ki dei ban leh shuwa ia ka RT-PCR test shuwa ban rung sha ka jylla.Kat kum ka tnad ka koit ka khiah ki la pynmih ia ka jingpynbna lyngba ki lad pathai khubor, “Baroh ki ba la test positive ki dei ban isolate ia lade ha ki institutional isolation facility hapdeng ka jingiatrei lang bad ka tnad ka koit ka khiah jong ka jylla.”Ka la bthah ruh ba kito ki briew kiba la test negative ha ka jingleh test lyngba ka RT-PCR ki dei ban shong Quarantine 7 sngi ha ki institutional quarantine bad bud sa 7 sngi ka jingleh quarantine ha ing, ha ryngkat ka jingpeit ngor da ki IDSP/District Surveillance Officers.
title: 12ngut na jylla, kiba wan na UK

content: Shillong:Ki nong shong shnong ka Elaka Laitlyngkot, ha ka sngi nyngkong ki la mih sha khmat ban pynpaw ia ka jing pyrshah ia ka jingthmu ban shna surok by-pass na jaka thymmai, namar ba kane kan sa pynduh nong ia ki nongshong shnong ka shnong Laitlyngkot kum ba la jia ha shnong Umsning,Ribhoi District.Haba iakren bad ki lad pathai khubor, na ka liang u nongshong shong ka shnong Laitlyngkot, u bah Richard N Pomtiah u la ong ba bun na ki briew kane ka thain ki im jakpoh da ka ba die jingdie ha surok bad ka jingthmu ban shna ia ka surok Byepass, na ka jaka thymmai kan pynduh nong ia ki nongshong shnong kane ka thain kumba long ha ka shnong Umsning,Ri Bhoi District.U la pynpaw ruh ba lada ki shna ia kane ka surok na ka jaka thymmai kan ktah ia ki wah ba don ha kine ki thain kaba kynthup ia ka wah Ummawsew,ka wah Wiehlir, ka wah Kilon, ka wah Pomblang bad ka wah Monoshah da kaba ong ba kine ki wah ki dei ki ba ai ka lad ia ki longkmie ban im jakpoh ha kaba ki ioh ban saitjain nong.U la ong ruh ba lada ki shna ia kane ka surok thymmai kan pynduh ia ka jakpoh ia ki nongot doh ki ba im jakpoh na ki nong leit nongwan kiba iaid lyngba kane ka shnong bad kan ktah ruh ia ka rep ka riang ha ka ba ka jaka ka ba ki thmu ban shna surok tymmai kan kynthup ruh ia ki jaka rep.U bah Pomtiah u la iathuh ba ki nongshong shnong kane ka thain ki kwah ban shna ia kane ka surok Bypass na ka surok kaba don mynta bad ki pyrshah ia ka sorkar ba kan shna ia ka surok Bypass na ka jaka thymmai kum ba la thmu da ki nong pyniaid shnong ka Elaka Laitlyngkot hapoh ka jingialam jong u Sordar u bah Allanson Shabong.U bah Pomtiah u la kynnoh ba u sordar jong ka Elaka Laitlyngkot, u la iathuh ia ki nongshong shong ka Laitlyngkot ba ka jingthmu ban shna ia ka surok By-pass na ka jaka ba thymmai ka dei kat kum ka jingkwah jong ka sorkar jylla, hynrei kat kum ka jingpynbna na ka sorkar kaba la mih ha ka 8/2 /19 ka paw shai ba ka sorkar ka ai jingbit ban pynbha bad pynheh ia ka surok kaba rim ym ban shna surok na ka jaka ba thymmai.U la iathuh ruh ba u Sordar shnong u la shu thombor bad leh kat ka mon jong u, ha kaba u la pynlong ia ka jingpynbna paidbah, ha ka 20/12/18 bad ha kane ka jingpynbna paidbah na ki 4000 ngut ki nong shong shnong ka Laitlyngkot, u khot tang ia ki 17 ngut ki briew ki ba iajan bad u, ban ioh ia ka jingiamynjur lang ban shna surok bypass na ka jaka ba thymmai.U bah Richard u la buh ruh ia ka jingkylli ba mano ba aibor ia u sordar ban pynlong ia kane ka jingpynbna paidbah ha ka 20.12.18, namar ba kat kum ka RTI ka ba ki la ioh ka paw shai ba ka sorkar ka dang pynmih ia ka jingpyntip ban pynlong ia ka jingpynbna paidbah ha u bnai Rymphang 2019.U la kynnoh ruh ba kane ka jingleh donbor ban shna surok bypass na ka jaka thymmai, lyngba ka jingia syllok lang jong ki nong pyniaid shnong ka Elaka Laitlyngkot ka dei namar ba baroh ki ioh ia ka jing myntoi ia lade.Na ka liang u Rangbah shnong barim u Bah Pillar Nongkhlaw, u la iathuh ba kum u briew ba la bat teng ia ka kam shnong naduh ki por mynshuwa, haba don kano kano ka mat kaba iadei bad ka shnong ki ju rah ha ki dorbar shnong, hynrei ha ba iadei bad kane ka jingshna ia kane ka surok bypass kam shem la don kano kano ka jingwanrah ha ka dorbar shnong. La ong ruh ba lada ka sorkar kan shna surok na jaka ba thymmai, kin ym kynran dien ban iaid da ka lynti ka ain.
title: Pyrshah ki nong Laitlyngkot, ban shna by pass, na jaka thymmai

content: U Om Birla, lamphang ka dorbar Lok Sabha, ula ioh ia ka jingpang iabit jong ka  Covid-19 bad mynta, u don ha ka jingshah sumar ha  ka AIIMS Covid Centre ha Delhi.Ka khubor jong ka AIIMS, ka iathuh ba U Birla, ula ioh ia ka pang khlam covid 19, ha ka 19tarik Lber 2021 bad ula shah sumar ha ka sngi kaba bud. “U shait u khlain ia mynta bad baroh ki jingthew ki biang lut”  ong ka khubor.Da ka jingioh pang covid jong U Birla, kumta kan long kaba eh, ban iakren, la kan ktah ha kano ka dur, ia ka dorbar Lok Sabbha, kaba dang iaid mynta sha khmat.Ha u snem ba ladep, la dei ban pynkut kyrkieh ia ka dorbar jong ka Parliament, haba ki don 30ngut ki MP, kiba ioh pang khlam corona bad kitei ki kynthup ia U Nitin Gadkari, Prahlad Patel bad shibun ki myntri ka sorkar India, ki ioh pang covid 19.
title: Khyrwit ka khlam corona, sa ia u lamphang ka Lok Sabbha

content: U Imran Khan, myntri rangbahduh ka Pakistan bad ka kurim jongu, ka Bushra Bibi, ki la ioh ia ka jingpang corona virus, hynnin ka sngi. Katei ka jingjia, ka dei tang hadien ar sngi, ba ki la ioh ia ka tika jong ka jing iada na ka khlam corona.U Narendra Modi, myntri rangbahduh ka India, ula phah ia ka khubor kitbok sha U Khan, uba do 68 snem ka rta; ba un jem noh na katei ka jingpang khlam corona.
title: Trei ka khlam corona ia U Imran Khan bad ka tnga jongu

content: Ki saiantis jong ka NASA, ki la lap ia ki sur ba phylla, kiba don ha u met bneng Mars bad katei ka dei, hadien ba ki la phah da ki tiar ring sur, kiba khlain  bor bha ha ki khyndiat bnai ba ladep.U met bneng Mars, lane ba la tip u red planet, u pynmih ia ka sur, kaba ot, kumba ot tari, lane ot da ka wait bad nangta, ka don ka sur kaba tylliat jingshoh, nangta ka don ka sur kaba tied kumba tied tyrnem bad nangta, ka don sa ka sur kaba tied pliang bad kitei ki dei ki sur, kiba ai jingmut ia ki saiantis ka NASA, ba kin wad jingshai shuh nangne shakhmat halor kitei ki sur bapher, kiba mih na utei u metbneng Mars.La iathuh ba ka sur ot tari, lane kumba pom da ka wait, ka long ka sur, kaba kham sawa bha, ha ka jinglap jong ka NASA bad mynta ka shong ha kitei ki stad ba kin wad jingtip, la katei ka sur, ka dei kaba wan na kaei ka thymmei  jongka.
title: Lap ka NASA, ia ki sur ba pher, kiba don ha u met bneng Mars

content: Nongpoh: Ha ka Joint Committee ki Ar-tylli ki dorbar shnong kiba kynthup ia ka shnong Umryngksai bad Lumbyrhing, kiba dei ruh ki shnong kiba don hajan ka sor Nongpoh, kaba ki la pynlong hynnin ka sngi, ki la shim ia ka rai ban pyrshah halor ka jingthmu buh dukan kyiad (Wine Shop) ha kawei ka jaka khappud kitei ki ar-shnong, kumta ban pyrshah halor katei, hynnin ka sngi ki nongialam shnong na kitei ki ar-shnong, ki la phah jingthoh sha ka Deputy Commissioner, Superintendent of Police bad Superintendent of Excise ha Ri Bhoi, khnang ba katei ka dukan kyiad kan ym urlong.Ha ka dorkhas kaba ki nongialam na kitei ki ar-shnong ki la phah sha ki bor pyniaid Distrik ka Ri Bhoi, ki la pynpaw ba na ka liang kitei ki ar-shnong, da lei lei kim pdiang ban don kino kino ki dukan die Kyiad ha katei ka jaka, da kaba khein ba kan sa ktah ia ka burom ka ijot jong kitei ki shnong.Ha katei ka dorkhas, kaba ki la phah sha ki bor pyniaid Distrik ha Ri Bhoi, la iohi ba la jan baroh ki nongialam shnong na kitei ki ar-shnong, ki la iasoi iasain na ka bynta ban pyrshah ia katei ka dukan die kyiad, kiba la pynpaw ruh ba kitei ki shnong ki kwah ban don ka shongsuk shongsain ha shnong ha thaw, ha kajuh ruh ka por ki la kyntu ia ki bor ba deipeit ba kim dei ban ailad ia katei ka dukan kyiad ba kan don ha katei ka jaka.
title: Pyrshah ki ar-shnong mar ia bna, ban buh dukan die Kyiad

content: Da kaba burom bad ῆiewkor ia I Bah Beriwell Kyndiah (bam kwai ha dwar u Blei), ka jingrwai kaba I la thaw bad rwai lyngba ka Shillong steshon jong ka All India Radio ka їai pynkynmaw ba ka hok ka long kaba khraw bad kaba kongsan tam ha ka pyrthei- Ka spah ka hajar, ka nam ne ka kyrdan kim long ei ei.Ngi im pat ha ka juk ha kaba ka jingim ne ka mynsiem briew kam don dor shuh. Ki briew kim salia ban shim im im peit peit ia ka mynsiem briew tang ban biang їalade. Kane ka dei ka juk kaba rhah, kaba lalot, kaba buaid bor, kaba hangamei, kaba khwan, kaba lah shilliang bad leh shilliang khmat. Ka pyrthei ka bym kheiῆ shuh ia ka pap, kaba shlan ban pyndonkam da ki lynti bym hok bad khlem pyrkhat shuh ia ka ma, ka raiῆ ka rem tang ban biang shimet bad ban biang kiba don ka jingїadei. Kumta ha kane ka juk, ka Hok ka Shi Kyntien ka shah ha ka jingtynjuh kaba shyrkhei bad la tynjuh ruh їa ka synshar, ka bishar bad ia ka trei ka ktah, ka kamai kajih. Hato ka dang don mo ka synshar hok ne ka bishar hok ha kane ka juk? Hato ka Hok ka dang lah ban їeng ha kane ka spah snem ba arphew wei?Hato ka Hok ka dang don jaka ha kane ka juk? Naduh ka spah snem kaba la leit noh, ka Їew (free market economy) ka batai bad pynїaid ia ka pyrthei-mariang nadong shadong. Ka Їew ka batai bad pynїaid ia ka synshar-ka bishar, ka trei ka ktah, ka niam bad ia ka jingim ba jar jar shimet jong u briew bad ka briew. Ha kane ka Їew ne ka juk jong ka Їew, kano kano kaba phuh, kaba thaba, kaba pynїohnong bad kaba їaid їew, wat la ka long ka bym hok, ka bym beit ne kaba bakla, ngi ῆiewkor-ῆiewburom bad hateng hateng ngi pynlong Blei ia ka.Ka Hok kaba ngi їakren bad puson hangne mynta ka dei shaphang ka synshar hok bad ka bishar hok (Justice) ha baroh ki bynta jong ka jingim. Ka Hok ka lah ban їapher na ka Jingshisha (Truth) bad ha ka jylli niam ne theoliji ka Jingshisha kham bunsien ka thew ia ka jingshisha jong u Blei bad ka jingthaw jingpynlong. Ha ka jylli niam ki don shibun ki kynhun bad ki saiῆpyrkhat theoliji kiba batai ne hikai shaphang ka jingshisha. Man la ka niam ne kynhun Balang ki don la ki jong ki nia, ki nongrim, ki saiῆpyrkhat bad ki khana niam ban pynksan ia ka jingshisha kaba ki shemphang bad ngeit.Ka tynrai jong ka Hok ka long ba baroh ngi long mar ryngkat hakhmat u Blei, hakhmat u briew. Ha ka juk synshar paidbah u mawkhrum ba kongsan jong ka synshar khadar ka dei ki hok tynrai (fundamental right) jong ki trai nongshong shnong bad ha ki Ri kiba laitluid ka jingpynneh bad jingїada ia ki hok tynrai ka dei ka kamram bad jingkitkhlieh ba hakhmat duh jong ki nongsynshar bad nongbishar.Katkum ka thymmei saiῆpyrkhat jong u Khasi, u ne ka briew ki wan sha ka pyrthei da ka hukum Blei bad ki im sngi ban kamai ia ka hok. I bah H.O Mawrie I ong ba ki kyntien “ban kamai ia ka hok” kim dei ki kyntien kiba thylli bad kiba shu sawa thiang tang ha ki tyndong skhor jong ngi, hynrei ki kit ia ka jingmut kaba khia, ki kdew ruh ia ka dor jong ka hok bad ka lynti ba ngin їaid ha ka jingim. Ka hok hi ka dei ka borbah kaba kyrshan ia kano kano ka jingїaleh bad ki briew kiba їeng ha ka nongrim jong ka hok kim sheptieng їano їano ruh, wat ia ka jingїap, bad ka history jong ka pyrthei ka shlei da ki khana shaphang ki riewїakhun kiba pha ia ka jingim. Ha kajuh ka por, ka bishar hok ka wanrah ia ka jingtngen bad jingkyrmen, bad U Nongrwai Salm u dawa ia ka hok bad ia ka bishar hok ha ka juk kaba u im – “Phi dei ban sangeh noh na kaba bishar bymhok…kyrshan ia ki hok jong kiba duk bad ki khunswet; lehhok ia kiba kyrduh bad ki bymdon jingiarap…” (Salm 82:2-3).Ha ka kot Tipbriew Tipblei, I Rev Dr Iarington Kharkongngor (bam kwai ha dwar u Blei) I kynthoh kumne- “ka hok ka dei kaei kaei ba la buh da u Blei, ka long kaba khuid, kaba bha bad kaba shisha. Ka hok ka dei ka dei ka kmie jong ka jingim tipbriew tipblei…” Ka synshar hok bad ka bishar hok ki long halor kiei kiei baroh bad ka hok kam ju їashahliang lymne leh shilliang lymne ῆiewbeiῆ ne ῆiewpoh ia ki para briew ne para jingthaw. Ka hok kam dei tang ka jingtip ia ki hukum ne ki aiῆ bad U Archbishop jong ka Canterbury, u William Temple haba kren ha ka jingїalang jong ki riewstad aiῆ u ong kumne, “ngam don ka jingtip shaphang ki aiῆ, hynrei kaba nga tip bad sngewthuh ka dei ka hok”.Ka khubor babha kaba u Jisu u їalap ka nang pynkhlaiῆ shuh shuh ia ka bor bad ka dor jong ka synshar hok bad ka bishar hok. U Jisu u ai nam ia ka khubor babha da ka Jingieit. Ka Jingieit ka khring bad thaw thymmai ia kiba bun, naduh u Sakhaїos haduh u Nikodemos bad ia kiba bun ki paidbah. Ka Gospel ka Jingieit kaba u Jisu u їalap ka dawa ia ka synshar hok bad ka bishar hok, katba ki Sadusi, ki Pharisi, ki Rangbah niam bad ki Nongthoh pat ki їasylla bad ki khlieh nongsynshar ka Hima Rom ban khῆiot beiῆ bad shim kabu ia ki nongshong shnong kiba lui lui. Da ki kyntien kiba tyngeh u Jisu u dumok ia ki Pharisi bad ki nonghikai aiῆ namar ka jingmutlop bad jingbym don jong ki ia ka mynsiem ka jingieit bad jingїatiplem na ka bynta kiwei pat- “…hynrei phi leh klet ia ka jinglehhok bad ka jingieit ia u Blei…” (Lukas 11:42).Ha ka kot the Idea of Justice, U Amartya Sen u kdew ia ki artylli ki kyntien Sanskrit, ka “niti” bad “nyay” bad kine baroh ar ki thew ia ka Hok ne ka synshar hok bad bishar hok. Ka “niti” ka thew ia ka jingdon jong ki seng ne ki tnat kiba peit bad khmih ba ka hok ne ka synshar hok, ka bishar hok ki treikam. Katba ka “nyay” pat ka dei ka jingїakhun ban pynїoh ha ki paid nongshong shnong ia ka synshar hok bad ka bishar hok. Ka khubor babha kaba u Jisu u їalap bad ka hok kaba u Jisu u kren bad їakhun ka kham don ka jingїadei bad ka “nyay”. Ka khubor babha kaba u Jisu u їalap kam dei ban thaw ia ka tnat treikam ka ban khmih ne pynїaid ia ka jingsynshar ne jingbishar hok, hynrei u Jisu u їeng bad їakhun pyrshah ia ki jingleh bymhok, ki jingleh shilliang khmat bad ka jingban beiῆ ia ki nongshong shnong. U Jisu u їakhun bad shah pynїap halor ka diengphna na ka bynta ban pynїoh ha ki paid nongshong shnong ia ka synshar hok bad ka bishar hok.Ka arphew saw tarik u Lber ka dei ka sngi kaba kyrpang kaba la tip kum ka International Day for the Right to Truth bad ka dei ruh ka lyngkhuh sngi їap jong u Bishop Oscar Romero. Kumta ngan pynkut ia kane ka puson da ki kyntien jong u Bishop Romero kiba ong- “Їa U Blei ngi lah ban shem ha ki jaka bad ki khep ba don ka jingsynshar bad jingbishar hok bad ngi lah ruh ban їashem ia U ha ka lynti ka jingshisha” – Amen
title: Ki kyntien jingkyrmen: Ka hok kaba tam

content: “Ngin leit noh tang bad me mo lih.. Ka dei me khun kata..” La mynjur ka Kmie“Ngin tohkit bha jai… Ngin khroh ia i Bakha bad lada i treh lei ngin wan ialam noh shane…” La ban ktien biang u Khun heh.“Ka dei kata khun… Nga lei nga isynei palat ka bapli … Katto ka jingstad hynrei mynta haba kumne shu lehnohei…” La phai ktien sa ka KmieKa jingiasyllok shaphang ka jingbha ka Rida ka la nang pyndom riang ia ka mynsiem jong ki shi Kmie shi khun. Ki la kut jingmut ban leit mih beit ha ka sngi babud mynmiet.Haba phai pat sha ka Rida, ka jingkular jong ka ia la ka Niakha ban sa iathuh, ka la pynlynga bad pynpisa mynsiem jur. Ka jingsheptieng, ka jingsngew lem bad ka jingsngew jahburom kine ki la pynpang mynsiem ia ka Rida. Hynrei watla katta, ka la kut jingmut ban iathuh beit kumba ka long.Haba ka sngi bathymmai ka la wan. Ka jingiakut nia ka Niakha bad la ki khun shaphang la ka khunkha, ki la rai ban pynurlong ha kata hi ka sngi. Mynmiet ka Niakha jar jar ki la leit thiaw sha Jaiaw Shyiap tang bad la u khun heh ar ngut hi. Haba ki la poi ha iing ka Rida. Tok tok, ki la tied, jingkhang bad pyrta de“Rida, Rida…”Ka Rida ka la kyndit kumba iuh tdong bsein haba iohsngew ia ka sur ka Niakha.“Oi, mano ?” Ka la leh myn kylli“Ma nga plie ka iing..” La jubab ka surKa Rida ka plie wak ia ka jingkhang bad ka shu ong kynsan“Wa i Niakha phi la wan?” Ka kdup bad doh“Hooid khun…” La ong ka NiakhaBaroh ar ngut ki la rung shapoh bad ka Rida ka la phah shong ia ki ha kamra shongkai.“Mei, i Niakha i la wan…” La leit iathuh ka RidaKham shiphang wan mih sa ka Kmie ka Rida.“O Niakha phi wan shane..” Ka la kren bad ka la shongkai lem hangta.“Hooid, nga da sahnud bad bynnud eh ia ka Khun bad nga la kut jingmut ban wan iasyllok bad ka shaphang kane kaba la jia.” La pynpaw ka NiakhaKa Rida ka shong mar pyrshah bad la ka Niakha bad ka sdang ban pynkhih la ka shyntur, ka da nguid um biah ka shu peit sah namar kam lait ban ang.“Nangta Rida to sdang noh…” La kyntu ka Niakha
title: BALEI IA NGA

content: Nongpoh:Ka jingthmu ki nongialam bad dkhot ka Confederation of Ri Bhoi People (CoRP) ha ryngkat ki paidbah ban leit rah plakad bad lama iong ha phyllaw treikam ka ophis MeCCL Umiam kaba myn hynnin ka sngi, ka la pulom noh, kata hadien ba ki la shah khanglad noh ha ki Magistrate bad pulit ka Umiam Police Station.Ka khana halor kane ka sngi, ka long ba ki la don ki nongialam bad dkhot ka CoRP lem bad ki katto katne ngut ki paidbah, ha kaba ki la pynbiang lypa ia ki Plakad bad lama iong, da ka jingthmu ban leit rah ha ophis MeECL Umiam, hynrei ha kaba kum katei ka por, la wan mih noh
