ki Magistrate na Ri Bhoi bad Pulit Umiam, kiba la lah ban khanglad noh ia kitei ki nongiakhih bad ha kaba kum katei ka por, ki la shu khot noh da ka jingiakren tang ia ki katto katne ngut ki nongialam na katei ka kynhun khih pyrshah.Lah ruh ban kdew hangne, ba ka nongrim kaba la pynbitar ia ki nongialam ka CoRP bad kiba la shim syndon da katei ka sienjam ban leit iakhih ha ophis MeECL Umiam, ka dei hadien ba ki la ioh shibun ki jingujor na ki paidbah, halor ki kam leh thurmur da ki nongtrei ka MeECL, kata ka long naduh ka rukom pynpoi ia ki Bill Light, ka jingkiew kaba kynsan kynsan ka bai bording lem bad shibun kiwei pat ki daw.Halor katei ka jingiakhih pyrshah ia ka MeECL, u Bah Bandary Ryntathiang, President ka CoRP, u la ong ba katei ka jingiakhih ka seng ka dei kaba jai jai, ha kaba watla ki la shah pakhang lynti noh ha ki Magistrate bad Pulit, kum ka seng kam sngew eiei ruh em, hynrei lada ka MeECL ka iai bteng ia ki kam thurmur, ka seng kam banse ban shim da kiwei pat ki lynti kiba kham tyngeh.U la ong ruh, ba ka seng kam lah ban shu shongkli kti haba ka la ioh ia shibun ki jingujor na ki paidbah nongpyndomkam bording, kiba la ujor sha ka seng na ka por sha ka por, kata ka long naduh haba iadei bad ka jingtorti ha ka rukom pynpoi ia ki bai bording, ka jingkiew ha ka bai bording bad khamtam eh ia kito ki longiing kiba duna ka pyndonkam bording, pynban ka bai bording pat ka kiew katba nangmih ki sngi bad kaba la pynshem jingeh wat ia ki nongpyndonkam bording ban siew ia ka.Hadien katei ka jingiakhih ki CoRP lem bad kiwei, ka la don ka jingshah khot iakren na bynta ki nongialam ha katei ka jingiakhih, hynrei ka seng ka ieng beit ha kajuh ka nongrim bad kata ka long ban pynbeit noh ia ki kam ba kynriang ha MeECL, namar lada ym lah ban pynbeit, kan sa wanrah ia ki nongpyndonkam bording bad khamtam eh ia kito ki longiing baduk, bynrap u Bah Bandary Ryntathiang.Kane kan dei tang ka sienjam jingiakhih kaba sdang bad kaba jai jai kaba ka seng ka mih madan ban pyrshah halor ki kam thurmur ka MeECL, hynrei lada ka MeECL kam lah ban pynbeit noh mardor, ka seng kam banse ban shim da kiwei pat ki lad ki lynti kiba kham tyngeh, u la bynrap.
title: Shah khang lynti ki CoRP, ban leit rah plakad ha ophis MeECL Umiam

content: Jowai:Ka Khliehriat Block Congress Committee (KBCC) ha ka jingialang kyrkieh kaba la long mynta ka sngi ha Ophis treikam jong ka Party ka la shim ia ka rai ban pynlong ia ka jingshong kyllain myngngor ha phyllaw ka Ophis treikam u Deputy Commissioner ka East Jaintia HIlls.Ia kane ka rai ban shong kyllain myngngor hadien ba la sakhi ia ka jingtlot ka bor jong ka ain ban thwet ban ban pynshitom ia ki runar kiba donkti ha ki kam sniew pyrshah ia ki kynthei ki khynnah khatam eh halor ka jingshah leh be-ijot bad shah pyniap ki ar ngut ki khynnah skul ha ka District kaba la jia ha u Nohprah 2020 bad ha ka une u bnai.Ia kane ka jingiakhih pyrshah la rai ban pynlong ha ka 23 tarik une u bnai kaban sdang naduh ka por 2:30 baje janmiet haduh 5 baje janmiet.“Ka jingtlot palat ki briew jong ka aiñ hangne ha East jaintia Hills District ka la long ka jingpynshlur ia ki riew bymman ban thombor ia ki kynthei ki khynnah haduh ba kum kine kam bymman kila roi sted bad dei halor kane ka nongrim, kum ka party ka sngew ba dei ban pyrshah jur halor kane ka jingtlot ki bor bad dei peit ia ka jingiaid beit ka ain ka kanoon hapoh ka District bad kum ka party ka la rai ban pynlong ia ka jingiakhih ba jai jai da kaba shong kyllain myngngor”, la ong u Working President ka KBCC, u ma Piwel Shylla.
title: 23tarik, yn iakhih ki Congress ha Khliehriat

content: Nongpoh:Ki nongialam shnong lem bad ki riew rangbah na ki shnong bapher bapher, kiba hap hapoh ka Raid Marwet, hynnin ka sngi ki la iamih paidbah, da kaba pynlong jing ialang ha ophis u Syiem ka Raid Marwet, na ka bynta ban pyn paw ia ka jingpyrshah kaba khraw, halor ka jingwan kyntur pud da ka Shnat Hima Nong wah Mawtamur, Hima Sohiong Lyng dohship.Ha katei ka jingialang ban pyr shah halor katei ka jingwan kyntur pud ka Shnong Hima Nong wah Mawtamur, la sakhi da ka jingdon u Paiem Ken Syiem, Syiem ka Raid Marwet, nangta arngut ki Basan na Hima Mylliem, ki Longsan Mansan na ka Raid Marwet, ki rangbah shnong lem bad shibun kiwei pat.Lyngba katei ka jingialang, la jan baroh kiba la ai jingkren ha katei ka jingialang, ki la pynrem jur halor katei ka kam kyntur pud da ka Shnat Hima Nongwah Mawtamur, bad nalorkata halor ka jingpynlong jingialang ha Umtyrnga, namar ha katei ka sngi ki la pynbna paidbah, ba ki la don shibun ki shnong kiba hap baroh shikatta ha ka Raid Marwet, Hima Mylliem, hynrei mynta ki la hap hapoh ka Shnat Hima Nongwah Mawtamur, Sohiong Lyngdohship bad kiba la kop ruh ba ki don ia ki kot ki sla kiba biang.Lah ruh ban kdew hangne, ba ha ka jingialang kaba dangshen ha Umtyrnga, ki Longsan Mansan ka Shnat Hima Nongwah Mawtamur Sohiong Lyngdohship, ki la kam ba ia katei ka Shnat Hima, la seng naduh ki por u barim bajah, kata ha ka 21 kyllalyngkot 1851, hynrei hadien katto katne por ka la jah noh, pynban la sdang ban pynkhieim biang ia ka ha ka 14 Sept 2019 bad ha u 18 Feb 2021.Haba ther tyngeh ia ki nongialam ka Shnat Hima Nongwah Mawtamur, Hima Sohiong Lyngdohship, kiba la ai jingkren ha katei ka sngi, ki la ong ba shaei jah katei ka Shnat Hima Nongwah Mawtamur ha kine ki phew phew snem ba la dep bad ki la buh ruh ia u dak jingkylli, balei ki wan mih tad haduh kine ki sngi, kata hadien ba ki la ieh khunswet da ki spah snem ia ki khun ki hajar ha katei ka Raid.Ki la don ruh kiba la ong, ba ia katei ka kam la leh sop sop da ki katto katne ngut ki briew bad ki la don ruh kiba ong ba ka jingthmu ka Shnat Hima Nongwah Mawtamur ban kyntur ia u pud ka Raid Marwet, ka long tang na ka bynta ka jingmyntoi ia ki katto katne ngut bad kiba don ia ka jingthmu ban die pat ia ki khyndew ki shyiap.Lada tam pud ka Assam ym don ba pyrshah
title: Mih paidbah ki rangbah shnong ban pyrshah halor ka jingshah tam pud ka Raid Marwet

content: Shillong: U Symbud Myntri Rangbah ka jylla u bah Prestone Tynsong, haba jubab ia ka jingkylli ba la wanrah da u bah Mohendro Rapsang Congress, ha kaba ia dei bad ka kaiphot jong ka High Level Committe ha kaba ia dei bad ka Harijan Colony, u la iathuh ba ka High Level Commitee kam pat phah ia ka kaiphot sha ka sorkar jylla.Haba jubab ia ki jingkylli bynrap, u bah Prestone u la ong ba ka jingslem jong ka Commitee ban pyndep ia ka kaiphot jong ka, ka long ba ki bun ki daw. Ia ka HLC, la thaw, ha ka 4 tarik u jylliew 2018 bad hadien ba la thaw,la shem ba ki ba bun kiei kiei kiba i donkam ban leh bad ban pynbeit.U la iathuh ruh ba kawei na ki jingeh ka long ba halor ka jingiasoi soskular jong u Syiem ka Hima Mylliem bad ka Municipal Board kam long kaba shai bad dei na kane ka daw ba ki hap ban bishar bniah halor ka jinglong trai ia kane ka jaka bad ha kane ka jaka don kam ruh ia ka District Council ban ia kren lang namar ka hap ha ka jaka jong ka District Council.U la ong ruh ba ha u snem 2019 ka sorkar pdeng ka la ithuh ia ka Shillong kum kawei na ki smart city ha kaba ka la ai lad ia ka sorkar ba kan pyn itynnad ia ki katto katne ki jaka bad ka sorkar ka kwah ban weng ia kine ki jingeh ka ban long shijunom dei na kane ka daw ba ka la shim por.U Symbud myntri rangbah u la iathuh ruh ba ka HLC, shen kan sa shong biang ia ka jingialang ka ba khadduh ha kaba ia ka kaiphot yn sa phah sha ka sorkar jylla.U myntri u la ong ba katkum ka rule 132 ba pyniaid ia ka iing dorbar ka kren shai ruh ba ympat dei ban ia kren ia kane, hynrei ka sorkar ka don ka jingthmu ban pynbeit ia kane ka jingeh kaba la sohkyrdot la bun bun snem mynta.
title: Ym pat phah ka HLC, ka kaiphod sha ka sorkar

content: Shillong: Ka Meghalaya Cricket Association’s U-14 Inter District Tournament 2021 kaba la sdang myn hynnin ka sngi ha Mendipathar ha kaba la ioh ban sakhi ia ka jingjop kaba nyngkong jong ka North Garo Hills bad ka West Khasi Hills ha kane ka sngi.Ki Association kiba la iashim bynta, la phiah ia ki ha ki ar tylli ki zones – ka Shillong, Ri-Bhoi, East Khasi Hills, East Jaintia Hills bad ka All Jaintia Hills ha ka Zone 1 ba la shim na Nongpoh. Nangta ka Tura, West Khasi Hills, East Garo Hills, North Garo Hills bad ka South Garo Hills. Ki jingialehkai kiba na ka Zone 1 yn sdang ha kane ka sngi nyngkong ban wan.Ha ka jinglehkai kaba nyngkong myn hynnin ka sngi u Chukam Matsram Shira uba la ioh ia ka nam ‘Rang Kynsai’ na ka jinglah lut jong u ban ialeh ha baroh ki rukom ialehkai, u la ioh ban tied 26 run bad shim 5/8 ha ka jingkawang bol kaba la pynlah ia ka North Garo Hills ban ioh ia ka jingjop. Ka kynhun jong u ka la lah ban kamai 119 run da ka jingkhyllem lut baroh ki wicket bad ha ka liang jong ka jingkawang bol ki la lah ban pynliem ia ka South Garo Hills tang da 51 bol ban ioh ia ka jingjop da 68 run.Ha kawei pat ka jingiakhun ha kaba ka West Khasi Hills ka la ioh ban pynliem ia ka Tura da 65 run, u Rang Kynsai jong kane ka jingiakhun u dei u Aibanjop Nongsiang uba la ioh kamai 56 ha kaba ka West Khasi Hills la la ioh ban tied 208/8 ha ki 20 over da kaba u Abirim K Marak u ioh 3/35.Na ka liang jong ka Tura u Harshit Prasad u la ioh kamai palat ia ka half century da kaba ioh kamai 72 na ka 35 bol hynrei ka kynhun baroh kawei pat ka la lah ban kamai tang 143/8 na ki 20 over. U nongshim wicket na ka West Hills u dei u I. Dkhar uba la ioh 2/19.
title: Sdang ka U-14 Meghalaya Cricket Association Inter District Tournament 2021

content: Ka Seng Longkmie, Nongmensong Women’s Welfare Association ka dap da ka jingsngewkhia kaba khraw halor ki khubor kiba la mih ha ki lad pathai khubor ia ka jingdon jong ka Association kaba la tip kyrteng kum ka Rot Association of Meghalaya (RAM), kumba la kam da ki katto katne ki kynthei ba ka Headquarter jong kane ka Association ka don ha Nongmensong.Ka Seng ka dap da ka jingsngew kyndit kaba khraw, ba kumno kane ka Association ka lah ban don hapoh u pud u sam jong ka shnong Nongmensong khlem ka jingtip jong ka shnong ka thaw. Kane ka la long ka jingjah burom bad ka jingthad burom kaba la ktah ia ki paid nongshongshnong jong ka Nongmensong hi baroh kawei.Ka Seng ka ai ruh ka jingkyrshan kaba pura ia ka Seng Samla Shnong kaba la dawa ia ka jingpynshai na ka RAM hapoh shi taiew kata ha shuwa ka 25.03.2021.(Mrs M. Mawkhiew) (Mrs A. Nongrum)Genl. Secretary, NWWA President, NWWA
title: Hapoh 25tarik, pan jingshai ka Seng Longkmie Nongmensong, na ki Rot Association

content: Shillong: Ha ka jing iakhun ka Women’s Senior One Day Trophy hapdeng ka Meghalaya bad ka Tamil Nadu mynnin ka sngi ha Chennai, ka Meghalaya watla ka la leh kat lah kat iai ha la ka bor hynrei ka dang shah pynliem noh da hynriew wicket.Haba ka Meghalaya ka la jop ia ka toss bad jied ban tied bol ka la shah pynkut noh tang 101 run ha ka 40.3 over, bad wat lada ka dang dei ka jingkamai kaba rit hynrei ki la leh shitom katba lah ban kot sha ka shispah run pyrshah ia ka Tamil Nadu kaba dei ka kynhun kaba ha khlieh duh na ka jylli jong ki.Hadien ka jingbym lah jong ka Meghalaya ban kamai bun ha ki lai tylli ki inning jong ki match kiba la dep, ka player ba nabar ka Saee Purandare ka la ioh ban mih madan sa shisien ha kaba ka la lah ban kamai 53 kaba kynthup ia shiphew tylli ki boun daries.Haba ka Meghalaya ka la sdang ia ka inning kaba ar ka la lah ban pynduna ia ka liang pyrshah da 36/3, hynrei da ka jingiaineh ki wicket kiba saw kiba la ia kamai lang haduh 64 run ka la buh ia ka Tamil Nadu ha ka lynti ka jingjop da ka jingduh tang saw wicket ha ki 16 over.Ka Captain Debasmita Dutta ka la ioh pynliem 2/26, katba ka player ba nabar ka Ahireeta Mukherjee ka la ioh 1/17. Ka Daiaka Warjri kaba la lehkai bha ka la ioh pynliem 3 ngut ki wicket da kaba ioh kem ia ar ngut bad ioh pynkhyllem stump ha ka shi run.Ka Meghalaya kan ioh ban iakhun khatduh sa bad ka Himachal Pradesh lashai ka sngi u Blei
title: Rem biang ka Meghalaya, yn ia kynduh khatduh bad ka Himachal Pradesh

content: Shillong: U Myntri Rangbah ka jylla u Conrad K Sangma, u la iathuh ba ka sorkar ka la dep ban pynbeit bad ka NEEPCO ha ki kato katne ki bynta bad kyrmen ba kan ym don shuh ka jingpynlip light.Haba kren ha ki lad pathai khubor, hadien ka jingialang jong ka cabinet, u mytnri rangbah u la ong ba khlem ia kren ia kane ka jingeh hapoh ka jingialang jong ki kynhun myntri, namar ba u la khot ia ka jingialang bad ki nongialam ka NEEPCO bad u kyrmen ba kan ym don shuh ka jingshah pynlip light.U Conrad u la ong ruh ba bun na ki jingeh kiba ia kynduh la lah ban ia pynbeit bad thikna ba kan nym don kata ka jingpynlip light, kan nym jia kumba jia bad ka NTPC ha kine kiba la dep namar ka NTPC ka la shu ot khlem pyntip. Ula iathuh ruh ba ha kaba ia dei bad ka jingsiew sha ka NEEPCO, la lah ban ia pynbeit namar ka jingeh ka dei bad ka REC bad PFC bad ia kane la lah ban ia pynbeit bad ka pisa kaba dei ban siew sha ka NEEPCO bad kiwei kwei ka long T.360 klur tam ne duna.Ka rai kaba ka sorkar ka la shim ia ka rai ka long ban pynkhuid ia ka bai light kaba sah sha ki kompeni pynmih light bad kane ka sorkar ka la shim ia kane ka jingshim ram bad don kam ruh ba ka MeECL kan hap ban wanrah ia ka jingpynkylla ha ka jingtrei kam.
title: Ka sorkar, ka la iakren  bad ka NEEPCO, halor ka jing pynlip ding

content: Shillong: Uwei u rangbah u ba la tip kyrteng kum u bah Bokstar Khongstid 35 snem ka rta u la ngat ha ka jingmynsaw jur hadien ba hap u maw na khlieh jong u, ha ka jaka ba pyntrei ia ka surok Shillong -Dawki.Kat kum ka jingiathuh jong u bah  Benus Sungoh u BRO ARSS infratructure project LMT, kaba pyntrei ia ka surok, u la iathuh ba kane ka jingjia ka la jia ha ka por 9baje eiei ha kaba u bah Bokstar u ba dei u labour instructor ha ryngkat u bah Sungoh ki la leit ban jurip ia ki nongtrei ha katei ka jaka.U bah Sungoh u la iathuh ba kane ka jingjia ka la jia ha kaba ka kali puh shilum ka ba dang trei ha katei ka jaka ka dang khat ia ki maw bad ka khyndew ban thepha ka truck.   U la iathuh ruh ba dei ba na ka liang u wei u nongniah truck u ba ieng hajan ka kali puh shilum bad thep, ia u khyndew ba tih u la khot ia u bah Bokstar ban shongkai lang ha truck bad  na ka liang u bah Bokstar khlem da pyntip sha u nongniah ka puh shilum u la leit sha kane ka truck ha kaba ka kali puh shilum ka dang thep, ia ki maw bad ka khyndew ba tih na kane ka jaka ha kane ka truck kaba u bah Bokstar u thmu ban kiew la kum hap uwei u maw ba heh na ka khlieh jong u.La iathuh ruh ba u bah Bokstar um shem la don shuh ha ka jingtipbriew naduh kane ka kynta ba jia kane ka jingjia bad la rah noh ia u sha civil hospital da ki nongtrei jong kane ka company kynthup ia u Supervisor.   Ha kaba na ka liang ka Civil Hospital namar ba duna ki tiar sumar ki la phah rah noh sha NEIGRIHMS Hospital katba na ka liang ki kur u bah Bokstar ji la rai ban rah ia u sha Super Care Hospital. La iathuh ba u bah Bokstar mynta u dang don ha ICU bad u don hapdeng ka jingbymtipbriew .Na ka liang jong kane ka company, ka la shim ia ka jingkitkhlieh ban bei ia ka bai sumar ia u bah Bokstar Khongstid.
title: Mynsaw jur, u rangbah, ba hap u maw ha ka jingtrei surok Shillong Dawki

content: Nongpoh: Ha ka Joint Committee ki Ar-tylli ki dorbar shnong kiba kynthup ia ka shnong Umryngksai bad Lumbyrhing, kiba dei ruh ki shnong kiba don hajan ka sor Nongpoh, kaba ki la pynlong hynnin ka sngi, ki la shim ia ka rai ban pyrshah halor ka jingthmu buh dukan kyiad (Wine Shop) ha kawei ka jaka khappud kitei ki ar-shnong, kumta ban pyrshah halor katei, hynne ka sngi ki nongialam shnong na kitei ki ar-shnong, ki la phah jingthoh sha ka Deputy Commissioner, Superintendent of Police bad Superintendent of Excise ha Ri Bhoi, khnang ba katei ka dukan kyiad kan ym urlong.Ha ka dorkhas kaba ki nongialam na kitei ki ar-shnong ki la phah sha ki bor pyniaid Distrik ka Ri Bhoi, ki la pynpaw ba na ka liang kitei ki ar-shnong, da lei lei kim pdiang ban don kino kino ki dukan die Kyiad ha katei ka jaka, da kaba khein ba kan sa ktah ia ka burom ka ijot jong kitei ki shnong.Ha katei ka dorkhas, kaba ki la phah sha ki bor pyniaid Distrik ha Ri Bhoi, la iohi ba la jan baroh ki nongialam shnong na kitei ki ar-shnong, ki la iasoi iasain na ka bynta ban pyrshah ia katei ka dukan die kyiad, kiba la pynpaw ruh ba kitei ki shnong ki kwah ban don ka shongsuk shongsain ha shnong ha thaw, ha kajuh ruh ka por ki la kyntu ia ki bor ba deipeit ba kim dei ban ailad ia katei ka dukan kyiad ba kan don ha katei ka jaka.
title: Pyrshah ki ar-shnong, ba buh dukan die Kyiad

content: Shillong: Mynta ka sngi ka 19 tarik u Lber 2021, ka Meghalaya Pradesh Congress Committee(MPCC) ka la pynlong da ka jingiathang mombati ha Khyndailad kum shi bynta ban pynpaw ia ka sngewsih kaba khraw halor ka jingshah thombor bad ka jingshah pyniap jong ki kynthei naduh ki khyllung ki khynnah, ki samla lud bad ki longkmie ha ki runar kiba la duh noh ia ka mynsiem ia tiplem.Haba iakren bad ki lad pathai khubor, ka Kong Joplin Shylla kaba dei ka President jong ka Meghalaya Pradesh Congress Committee(MPCC), ka la ong ba ka Sorkar Jylla ka dei ban shim khia bha halor kane bad ba ka dei ban hukum ruh ia ki tnad pulit ba kam dei satia ban shongthait na ka bynta ban thwet ia ki runar kiba leh ia ka kam bymman bad ha kajuh ka por ka la ong ruh ba ka Sorkar ka dei ban pynshitom da kaba shu sdien phasi noh kine runar khnang ba kiwei ruh kin nym shlan ban leh ia kane ka kam kiba long kum ki jingpyntieng pynsmiej ia ka shnong ka thaw bad ka imlang ka sahlang hi baroh kawei.Ka Kong Joplin Shylla, ka la ong ruh ba la jan man ka por bad man ka sngi ka jingshah batbor jong ki kynthei ka don bad kumta ka Sorkar haba ka iohi kum kine ka dei ban shim khia da kaba leh da kaba tyngeh ia ki runar kiba donkti ha kine ki kam batbor.
title: Pynlong ka MPCC da ka jingthang mombati ban kynmaw ia ki kynthei kiba la shah pyniap ha ki runar

content: Shillong:U MLA ka North Shillong u bah Adelbert Nongrum, mynta ka sngi u la wanrah ia ka phang ia kren halor ka Khyndailad, kum ka jaka kit ia ki kynthei die met, ha kaba u la ong ba ha ka 10 tarik u lber 21 ha ba u wanrah ia kane ka jingkylli bun ki ia rkhie bad kaba pynsngewsih ia u, ka long halor ka jingkyntait jong ka sorkar, ia ka jingjyllei ka kam khaiimet ha khyndailad.U la ong ruh “Na ka liang jong nga ha kato ka sngi ba u la wanrah ia kane ka jingkylli u la iawer ruh ia u myntri kampohing ba yn leit jurip ia ka Khyndailad. U la ong ruh ba kat kum ki kaiphot na ki Social media ka pawshai ba ki tnad pulit ki tip bha ia kane ka kam khaii met ha khyndailad.” U bah Adelbert, u la ong ruh ba na ka liang jong u, um shem la pyrshah ia ka sorkar lane ia ki kynthei kiba don ha kane ka kam beain, hynrei u la kyntu ia ka sorkar ba kan shimkhia ia kane ka bynta bad ban wad ia ki lad ki lynti ban iarap ia ki briew kiba la ngop ha kane ka kam khaii met.U bah Adelbert u la iathuh ba katkum ka jingkhein ba la ioh na ka National AIDS Control Organization ha u snem 2018-19 ki don haduh 15,153 ngut ki kynthei ki dei kiba khaii met bad katkum ka Meghalaya AIDS Control Society ki don haduh 4525 ki briew ki ba don ia ka jingpang HIV na kine 2198 ngut ki dei ki kynthei, 223 ki khynnah kiba kynthup ia ki 104 ki khynnah shynrang bad 119 ki khynnah kynthei.U bah Adelbert u la ong ba kane ka jingkhein ka pynpaw shai ba ka ka jylla ka don hapdeng ka jingma lada ka sorkar kam shimkhia ban khanglad ia kane ka kam khaii met.Haba jubab ia ka Half hour discussion u myntri ka tnad kampohing u bah Lahkmen, u la ong ba ban iada ia ki hotel na ka jingpyndonkam ha ka khaiimet ka tnad ka la pynmih ia ki SOP, ha ka ba ki hotel kin hap ban phah ia ka dur bad ki video jong ki CCTV sha ki pulit. U la iathuh ruh ba la bthah ruh ia ki hotel ban buh ia ki pulit, kiba la tbit bad ruh ban ym ai jaka sah ia ki briew bym lah ban ai ka jingpyn ithuh ialade bad ban ym shah ia ki khynnah rit khlem da don lang ki kmie ki kpa. U la iathuh ruh ba la phah ruh ka jingbthah ia ki pulit ba ki dei ban iaid pahara bha ha khyndailad bad na ka liang ka Anti Human trafficking unit ki ju leit ban jurip ia ki hotel ki ba suba ba ka don ka jing iakhaii met. U bah Lahkmen, u la iathuh ba na ka liang ki pulit ki la thaw ruh ia ka special cell ha sardar police station ban iada bad iarap ia ki kynthei.U bah Lahkmen, u la iathuh ruh ba kat kum ka hukum jong ka supreme court ka la bthah ia ka sorkar jylla ban iarap ia ki kynthei kiba don ha kum kine ki kam ban kyntiew ia ki ha ka pule puthi ban pynrung kam ia ki ha ki kam ba donburom bad ban ai jinghikai bad ban khanglad ia ki kynthei samla ba kum dei ban pyniasoh ia lade ha kum ka ne ka kam.
title: Wan rah biang, U Bah Adelbert ia ka mat ki thei die met ha 9lad

content: Shillong: Ha ka 16tarik Lber 2021, ka North Eastern Electric Power Corporation Ltd. (NEEPCO), ka la pynmih ia ki kyndon, kiba iadei bad ka  jingsam bor ding sha ka  Meghalaya Power Distribution Corporation Ltd (MePDCL).Ka sorkar jylla, ka la thawlad tyngeh ban pynbeit ia katei ka kam bad ka sorkar jylla, ka la phah pisa ban siew sha ka NEEPCO, hynrei, namar ba ki don ki rukom pyniaid jongka, ka NEEPCO, kam lah shuh ban weng ia katei ka jingbthah jongka ban pynduh bor ding.“Ngi sngewthuh ia ka jingeh jong ki samla pule, kiba pynkhreh ia ki eksamin jongki bad ngi sngewsih, ia ka jingthut ia ki riew paidbah. Ngi pyn thikna ba ka jing pynlip ding, kan kut hapoh ka 48 kynta” ong ka kyrwoh na U James K Sangma, myntri bor ding ka sorkar Jylla.tip keiñ mynhakane lei tang 36 kynta hana
title: Hapoh 48 kynta, yn pynkut ia ka jing lip ding ha ka jylla, ong U James Sangma

content: Ka khlam covid 19, ka la nang kiew stet bha ha India, ha kaba ki don palat 40hajar ngut kiba ioh pang ha ka sngi thohdieng.Haduh mynta, kiba ioh pang, ki la poi sha ka  1,15,14,331 ngut bad kiba jem, na ka jingpang, ki long  1,10,83,679. Kiba dang don ha ka jingshah sumar, ki long  2,71,282 bad kiba iap, ki long baroh 1,59,370 ngut.Kiba ioh pang thymmai, ki long  39,726 ngut bad kiba iap na katei ka jingpang, ki long  154 ngut, ha ki 24 kynta ba ladep, nangta ki don sa kiba jem na ka jingpang, kiba long 20,654 ngut, ong ka kyrwoh na ka tnat ka koit ka khiah ka sorkar India.
title: Kiew biang ka corona ha India; 40 hajar ngut kiba ioh pang ha ka shisngi

content: Shillong: Ka jing pynlip ding, ka la sdang biang ha ka jylla bad katei kan trei kam ha Garo hills bad ha Shillong, naduh ka por shiteng synnia, haduh hynriew baje mynstep.Ha Jaintia Hills bad Ribhoi (Public), naduh 6 baje haduh 9baje mynstep. Ha Khasi Hills, Jaintia Industries bad Shillong, naduh ka por 9baje mynstep haduh shiteng sngi, ha Jaintia Hills & Jaintia Industries & Ribhoi (Public) bad Garo Hills, naduh 12 baje haduh 2baje nohsngi. Ka Khasi Hills bad Jaintia Industries, ba kynthup ia ka Shillong & Garo Hills, naduh ka por 2baje nohsngi, haduh 4baje nohsngi.Ha Jaintia & Jaintia Industries bad Byrnihat Industries, naduh ka por 4 baje haduh 6baje janmiet. Ha Byrnihat Industries & Ribhoi Public, naduh 6baje janmiet haduh 8baje janmiet bad nangta sa ka Byrnihat Industries, naduh  baje haduh 12baje.
title: Sdang biang ka jing pynlip ding ha ka jylla

content: Shillong:Ha ka 18 tarik u Lber 2021, u Myntri Rangbah jong ka Sorkar jylla, u Conrad K Sangma u la kyrpad ia baroh ki paidbah kiba long ki nong shong shnong jong ka jylla, ba kin ia mih shakhmat ban ai ia ka dawai tika injekshon Covidshield khnang ba kin ioh ia ka jingiada na ka jingiabit jong u khniang Covid 19 hadien ba kane ka khlam ka la wan ban lynshop ha kane ka jylla ha u snem 2020 bad kaba dang iai bteng sah haduh kine ki sngi.Ha kajuh ka por u Myntri Rangbah, u la kyntu ia ki nongleit jingleit bad ia ki nongwan jngoh kai pyrthei ba ki dei ba ki dei ban pyntip sha ka sorkar jylla lada ki la ioh ia kane ka dawai tika khnang ba ka sorkar kan dup ioh lad ban buh jingkheiñ bad jingthoh thik pa thik.U Conrad Sangma u la ong,”Katkum ka jing mad kaba ngi mad mynshem snem, ngi shem ba ka jingshlur ban mih shakhmat bad ka jingphikir ialade ka long kaei kaei kaba lah ban tehlakam.Ia mynta ngim pat sngew iahap ban don ki jingteh pyrkhing hynrei ngim lah pat ban ong ba une u khniang un nym wan shuh bad baroh ka shong lut ha ka jinglong jingman jong ka pyrthei. Watla ngi la don ia u dawai bad ki nongpang ruh ki la kham duna hynrei ngim lah pat shu kheiñ sting noh kumto. Nga kwah ban ong lyngba ki lad pathai khubor ia ki paidbah nongshong shnong jong ka jylla ba ki dei ban shim lut baroh ki lad jingiada kumba ngi la shim ha ki sngi bad ki bnai kiba la leit bad ban iai bteng beit ia kine”.Shuh shuh u lah ong ruh ba ka sorkar hi kan dang iai bteng ban peit bniah ia ki nongleit nongwan sha kane ka jylla khnang ban lah ban teh lakam ia une u khniang ha kane ka jylla bad kiba wan na sha ki jaka kiba shabar ki hap ban leh shwa ia ka test RTPCR hashwa ba kin ioh ban rung ha ka jylla.
title: Kyrpad u MR ban mih shakhmat, ban ai tika iada  Covid 19

content: Ka Border Road Organisation (BRO), ka la trei pyndep ia ka jingkieng ha Dwarksuid, kaba pyn iasoh ia ka Shillong Bye pass na Guwahati sha Jowai.La iathuh da ka BRO, ba katei ka jingtrei, ka sdang ha ka 11tarik Lber bad la pyndep, ha ka 15tarik Lber 2021, kaba long tang hapoh san sngi, ha ka jaka, kaba dei ban pyndep hapoh 15 sngi, ong ka khubor kaba la pynmih ha ka India Today.
title: 5 sngi, trei pyndep ka BRO ia ka jingkieng Dwarksuid

content: Jowai:U District Magistrate ka West Jaintia HIlls District, u la pynmih ia ka hukum mynta ka sngi ban khang pyrshah ia ka jingkhlong maw, sh yiap bad tih par maw ha wah bad ha rud shilynter ka wah Myntdu. Ia kane ka hukum la pynmih hapoh ka kyndon 144 CrPC.Katkum katei ka hukum la khang pyrshah ruh ia ka jingsait kali, sait jain bad bret pathar ia ki niut lane kino kino kiba lah ban pynjot bad pynjakhlia ia katei ka wah.La pynmih ia kane ka hukum dei hadien ba la lap ba ka jinglong jingman katei ka wah bad ka um kaba tuid ka la kylla jakhlia, na ka sngi sha ka sngi.Shuh shuh la khang pyrshah ruh ban pom ia ki dieng ki siej kiba don ha ki rud jong katei ka wah katkum ka hukum jong ka NGT.
title: Khang pyrshah ban khlong maw bad shyiap na bad rud wah Myntdu

content: Shillong:U Myntri ba dei peit ia ka tnad bor ding, U James K Sangma, haba jubab ia ka jingkylli u Zenith M Sangma (Congress), u la iathuh ba ki chief Engineer ha Garo Hills hapoh ka MePDCL ki don 2 ngut. U la iathuh ba ka dei ka jingshisha ba la thaw ia ki ar tylli ki post hapoh jong ka MePDCL kawei ka dei jong u Chief Engineer (Distribution) West Zone, Tura bad kawei ka dei ka post jong u “Officer on Special Duty” (Revenue Monitor) Western Zone ha ka kyrdan Chief Engineer (Electrical ).U myntri u la iathuh ruh ba mynta ki don ar ngut ki Chief Engineer ha Western Zone bad ka jingthaw ia kane ka post kaba thymmai, ha ka kyrdan Chief Engineer ka long tang ban peit kyrpang ia ka jinglum bai thang ding, na ka bynta ka Garo Hills District.Haba jubab ia ka jingkylli bynrap, na ka liang jong u myntri tnad bor ding, u la iathuh hapoh ka ingdorbar ba ha Garo Hills District ki don shibun ki jingeh ha kaba ia dei bad ka jingsam ia ka bor ding electric bad kane ka jingeh ka dei kaba la slem bha bad ka dei na kane ka daw ba ka sorkar ka ialeh ban pynbeit ia kane ka jingeh.U la iathuh ruh ba ka jing wan pisa na ka bai light, na ka ophis ba dei ka thain Chokpot ka long tang 12.86%, na Baghmara 12.12% bad Mendipathar ka long tang 22.64%,katba haba ia nujor bad ka Sohiong ka jingiohlum bai light ka long haduh 82.09%, East Khasi Hills 89.60%.Halor ka jingduh nong jong ka lad kamai, la iathuh ba ha East garo hills, ka long 83.9 pc, ha West garo hills, ka long 61.50 pc, katba ha Shillong, ka long 12.50 pc.
title: Jingmih bai light: 12.12pc ha Baghmara & 82.09 pc ha Sohiong

content: Shillong:U Myntri Rangbah ka jylla u Conrad K Sangma, haba jubab ia ka mat ia kren ban shim rai ban pynbeit ryntih ia ka jingspel dak ia ka ktien Khasi bad Garo ia kaba la wanrah da u bah George B Lyngdoh MLA kum ka jingpynkhlain ia ka jingdawa ban ioh ia ka jing ithuh ia ka ktien khasi ha ka khyrnit kaba phra jong ka riti synshar jong ka Ri India,u la ong ba ka sorkar kan sa peit lada donkam ban don ia ka committee ban peit halor kane ka mat.Haba iadei bad kane ka mat ia kren, u myntri rangbah u la ong ba ka sorkar ka la shim khia ban ioh ia ka jing ithuh ia ka ktien khasi bad Garo ha ka khyrngit kaba phra jong ka riti synshar jong ka Ri India dei na kane ka daw ba ka iing dorbar ha ka 27 Naiwieng 2018, ka la shim ia ka rai ban dawa na ka sorkar pdeng ban ioh ia ka jingithuh ia ka ktien khasi bad Garo hapoh ka khyrnit kaba phra jong ka riti synshar ka Ri India.U Myntri rangbah u la ong ba kumba ka long mynta ka ktien khasi bad Garo ka la dang kiew bad ia kane ka ktien la pule haduh ka kyrdan P.hd bad ka sorkar ka la pynrung ha ka polisi ka tnad pule puthi ban pynkhlain ia ka jingpule ia ka ktien khasi bad Garo ha ki skul bad wat ha kaba thoh ia ka eksam MPSC.Naduh ba la ioh ia ka dak thoh ha ka ktien khasi naduh u snem 1842 bad ktien Garo ha u snem 1860, ka tnad pynneh pynsah ia ka riti dustur ruh kala juh pynmih shibun ki kot ha ka ktien khasi bad Garo, dei ha dien 46 snem ba la ioh ia ka jylla ka sorkar kala shim ia ka rai ban dawa ban ioh ia ka jingithuh ia ka ktien khasi hapoh ka khyrnit kaba phra jong ka riti synshar ka Ri India.U Myntri Rangbah u la ong ba dei ha dien ba ka sorkar Meghalaya kala shim ia ka rai ka sorkar pdeng kala phah ia ka jingthoh ban ong ba ka sorkar pdeng ka sngewthuh ia ka jingangnud jong ki paidbah ban pynneh pynsah ia ka ktien, ka sorkar jylla kan dang iai bteng ban ia kren bad ka sorkar pdeng halor kane ka bynta.Haba ia dei bad ka jingai jingmut ban don ia ka Kommittee ban peit ia kane, na ka liang jong u myntri rangbah u la ba ka sorkar kan peit lada don kam ia ka kommitte, halor ka Spel dak ktien Khasi bad Garo ka sorkar kala shim khia ia kane ka phang, ha dien ba la pynshai u myntri rangbah u la kyprad ban weng noh ia kane ka mat ia kren hapoh ka iing dorbar.U George B Lyngdoh (Congress), ha dien ba la ioh sngew ia ka jingjubab jong u myntri rangbah ka jylla ba ka sorkar kan sa shim khia lada don kam ban don ia ka Kommittee u ong ba don kam ban pynbeit ia ka jingspel dak ia ktien khasi bad Garo, bad ha dien ba la kren ban ioh ia ka jingpynshai la weng noh ia kane ka mat ia kren.Kiwei ki MLA kiba la kyrshan ia kane ka mat ia kren ban shim ia ka rai ki long u bah Kimfa S Marbaniang, bah PT Sawkmie, bah Mayralborne Syiem, Kong Dr Ampareen Lyngdoh, u Zenith M Sangma kien baroh ki la ban jur ba don kam ban pynbeit ia ka jingspel dak bad ki la ai jingmut ba dei ban don ia ka committee ban peit ia kane ka kam.
title: Ban thoh eksamin MPSC da ka ktien Khasi, Garo, ong U MR

content: Shillong: Ka Khasi Students’ Union Mawlai Circle haka 18 tarik Lber 2021, ka la ïoh ban pynhap pyrda noh ïa ka Open To All Knock Out Basketball Tournament 2021.Na ka liang ki kynthei kiba ïa knieh ïa ka nam lahduh ka long hapdeng ka Tyllilang ‘A’ pyrshah ïa ka Shillong Labet ha kaba ka Shillong Labet, ka la jop da 25 Basket shiteng 8 Basket shiteng pyrshah ïa ka Tyllilang ‘A’ katba ha ka liang ki Shynrang ka Ïaineh ‘B’ ka la ïakhun pyrshah ïa ka TES ha katei ka Final ki Shynrang ka Ïaineh ‘B’ k ala jop da 31 Basket la 21 Basket.Ha ka bynta ba nyngkong shwa ban sdang ka jing ïalehkai ki kynthei la don shwa ka jingïalang ba la pynïaid da u Samla Rapborlang Nongrum General Secretary KSU Mawlai bad uba dei ruh ha kajuh ka por u Assistant Finance Secretary. La ai jingkren da U Bah Joe Marbañiang, uba dei u nongïalam barim jong ka KSU Sengkmie kumjuh ruh jong ka Mawlai Circle, hadien katei sa ïoh ïaka jingleit ai khublei ïaki players bad ban sdang ïaka jing ïalehkai ba nyngkong jong ki kynthei.Ha ka bynta ba ar hashwa ban sdang ka jingïalehkai ki Shynrang kala don ka jingïalang ba la pynïaid hi da u Samla Rapborlang Nongrum,la ïoh ïa ka jingkren pdiang sngewbha na u Samla Biangbor L.Paliar President jong ka KSU Mawlai Circle bad uba dei ruh ha kajuh ka por u Vice – President KSU Seng kmie,hadien kata la ïoh jingkren na u Samla Manly J.Nongpluh Finance Secretary jong ka KSU Sengkmie uba long kum u symbud kongsan ha katei ka Sngi.Khatduh laïoh jingkren na u Samla Lambokstarwell Marngar President Rangbahduh jong ka Seng bad hadien katei ka jingkren laïoh ban leit ai khublei lang ïa ki Player da u Kongsan, Symbud Kongsan,ki Nongïalam ka KSU Sengkmie ki nongshah khot Sngewbha bad ki Nongïalam ka KSU Mawlai Circle bad la aiti syndon ha ki Referee ban pynïaid bad sdang ïaka jingïalehkai.Ha katei ka sngi ki lahduh kata ka Ïaineh ‘B’ bad ka Shillong Labet ki la ïohrah ïaka Song Pisa ba mar 20Hajar tyngka katba kiba wan ar kata ka TES bad ka Tyllilang ‘A’ ki la ïohrah ïa ka song pisa ba mar 10Hajar tyngka.Ïa ka Most Valuable Player ( MVP ) naka liang ki kynthei la ïoh da ka Samla Larihun Warjri na ka Shillong Labet bad ka la ïohrah ïaka Song Pisa ba 3Hajar tyngka bad naka liang ki Shynrang uba la ïohrah ïa katei ka song Pisa ba 3Hajar tyngka da u Samla Peter Kharshandi naka kynhun Ïaineh ‘B’.Kum ban shu pyn kynmaw ba ïa katei ka Tournament la plie pyrda haka 8tarik Lber 2021 bad baroh ki kynhun kiba la wan ïashim bynta ki long 26tylli naka liang ki Shynrang bad 10tylli naka liang ki kynthei, ong ka kyrwoh na u Samla Badonbok Malngiang Sports Secretary KSU Mawlai Circle.
title: Pynhap pyrda ka KSU  Mawlai, ïa ka Open to all Knock Out Basketball Tournament

content: Shillong: Ha ka 17 tarik u Lber 2021, ka Dorbar shnong jong ka shnong Pahamrioh kaba don ha ka them Ribhoi ki la pynpaw ia ka jingsngewkhia kaba jur halor ka jingbym lah jong ka Meghalaya Energy Corporation Limited(MeECL) ban pynpoi ia ka bill jong ka jingthang bording haduh ba ka la wanrah jingeh shikatdei eh ia ki longiing longsem kiba duk ba jynjar ban siew ia ka bai bording ka jong ki kaba la kot da ki hajar tyngka.Na ka liang jong ka Dorbar Shnong Pahamrioh, ba la lamkhmat da u Rangbah shnong jong kane ka shnong, u Bah K Suting ryngkat bad ki longkmie jong kane ka shnong ki la pynlong da ka jingiakynduh lang haiing dorbar ban iashong pyrkhat ba kumno ban weng ia kane ka jingeh ba pynslem da ka MeECL ban pynpoi ia ka bill thang bording ka jong ki kaba ki pyndon ha la iing la sem.Haba kren sha ki lad pathai khubor, u Bah K Suting u la ong ba kane ka jingleh jong ka MeECL ka la ktah shikat dei ia ki nongshong shnong jong kane ka thaiñ kiba shu im sngi ha ka kam bylla sngi kyndoi jakpoh ban bsa ban btiah ia la ka iing ka sem.Na ka liang une u rangbah shnong u la kyntu ia ki bor ba dei peit ia kane kata ia ka tnad MeECL ba ka dei ban pyrkhat lem ha kaba iadei bad kane ka bynta ba kan pynpoi ia ki bill light man la u bnai khnang ba kan pynsuk bad jingsting ia ki nongshong shnong jong kane ka thaiñ da kaba kin ioh ban siew noh man la u bnai bad ba kan nym don kata ka ram ka shah.Shuh shuh une rangbah shnong u la ong wat la ka long kaei kaei ka jingkmen ia ka shnong ka thaw hadien ba ka Sorkar ka la wanrah ia ka skhim Saubhagya na ka bynta u paidbah nongshong shnong kaba long ka skhim kaba ai ia ka bor elektrik ha man la kawei pa kawei ka thliew iing hynrei ka long pat kaei kaei kaba sngewdiaw mynsiem hadien ba la ioh ia kane ka skhim ka jingpynpoi ia ka bill light pat ka long kaba slem bad kaba shim por ruh da ki snem, kane ka wanrah ia ka jingsiew ia ka bill light shisien shisnem bad kane ka buh jingeh shikat dei eh ia u paidbah jong kane ka shnong.Balei buh syntiew tang ha ki thain police bazaar?? Hato buh da ka sorkar ne ki trai dukan?
title: Mad jingeh ki nongshong shnong ka Pahamrioh naba slem pynpoi bill ka MeECL

content: Shillong: Ha ka 18 tarik u bnai Lber 2020, ka seng Hynniewtrep Achik National Movement(HANM) Central Body ryngkat bad ki dkhot ka seng na Ri Bhoi District ki la leit ban pynlong ia ka jingtohkit ha ka khyrdop khrong pisa jong ka National Highway Authority of India kaba don ha ka shnong Diengpasoh East Khasi Hills District hadien ba ki la ioh ban pdiang ia ka jingujor halor ka jingshah ktah kti jong uwei u nongniah trok u ba dei u trai jylla na Jowai West Jaintia Hills District kaba la jia ha ka 16 tarik u bnai Lber 2021 ha ka por kumba 12 baje shiteng synnia ha ki nongtrei kiba ju khrong pisa ha kane ka khyrdop man la ka sngi.Hadien ba ka seng ka la dep ban pynlong ia ka jingtohkit ka la dawa na ka pulit ba ka dei ban kem noh mar mar ia ki briew kiba donkti ban shoh ban dat haduh ban da mynsaw ia une u nongniah trok bad ban beh noh syndon na kane ka jaka kaba ki trei ki ktah.Shuh shuh ka seng ka la maham ruh ia baroh ia ki barjylla kiba trei kiba ktah ha ki toll gate jong ka National Highway Authority of India ba kim bit ban leh baheh bad pyni bor ia ki trai jyll bad ka seng ka la maham ruh ba lada kine ki barjylla kim sngap ia kane ka jingmaham, ka seng ka la byrngem ba kan leh da kaba tyngeh.U nongialam jong kane ka seng u la ong, “Ngi kyntu sha baroh ki toll gate kiba don hapoh Meghalaya ia ki non-tribal, sngewbha wat nym pyni da ka bor ia ki paradohki parasnam ki jong ngi. Lada ka nang iai jia na ka por sha ka por, ngi na ka liang ka HANM, ngim banse ban pyni da ka bor. Haduh mynta ngi dang burom ia ki non tribal hynrei lada kumne shi kumne ki pyni bor, kan sa poi ka por ba na ka liang ka HANM, ngin sa dat ngin sa shoh ia kine ki non tribal kiba shong ha kane ka Ri baieid ka jong ngi. Nangne shakhmat lada ngi lap ba kum kane ka jingjia kan jia, na ka liang ka seng ngin leh ia kaba donkam bad ngin nym ailad ia kine ki khyllah jait ba kin leh donbor ha kane ka Ri baieid eh ka jong ngi”.Shuh shuh ka seng ka la ong ruh ba na ka por sha ka por la ju iohi ba lada u non tribal u shah ktah kti bad shoh ia u paradoh parasnam u jong ngi, u lait ban shah kem, hynrei lada u Khasi,  u shoh ia u dkhar tang hapoh shiteng kynta ne shikynta la ioh ban kem noh ia u namar ba ka aiñ, ka  iashah ia ki non tribal bad dei na kata ka daw ba sa jyllei ka jingleh heh jong kine ki non tribal, hynrei ka aiñ ka dei ban iada iangi u trai ri u trai muluk ym ban iada ia u non tribal uba shu wan nangno nangno.
title: Hiar tohkit ka HANM, ba shah ktah kti u nongniah trok ha khyrdop lum pisa Diengpasoh

content: Ka Dorbar Federation of Khasi State ka pynpaw ia ka jingkyndit bad ka jingsngewsih kaba khraw halor ka jingduh noh ia u paia bad u nongbuh bad nongsei kot u Late Bah Peter David Rynjah, 84snem ka rta iba la khlad noh ha ka 18-3-2021.Ngi dang iai kynmaw ba dang shen I la wan rah ia ki kot ki sla kiba ia dei bad ka khyndew ka shiap ki kur ka thain ri war.Ngim lah ban klet ia ki jingiaid lang ha baroh shi lynter u pud ka Ri Khasi Jaintia naduh ki snem 1999 bad khamtam ki jingnoh synniang bad ka jingtrei shitom jong i halor kumno ban pyntip sha ngi halor kiba bun ki jingeh jong ka thain Ri War kumjuh ha ka por ba wan thombor ki khar bangla sha ka thain pyrdiwah.La kha haka 23/12/1936 ha lyngkyrdem,bad ila khlad haka 18/3/2021bd yn pndep haka 20/3/2021,bd ila iehnh shadn ia i kurim bd 11ngut ki khunI trei ha PWD, bad ila shongthait ha u snem 1997 kum u junior engineer, i la bat teng kum u rangbah shnong Lyngkyrdem la bunsien, bad i la bat teng kum u secretary shnong, bad i long ruh u General Secretary jong ka Federation of Ri-War Mihngi Local Dorbar (FORMLD), bad kum u secretary jong ka CCIB, bad Secretary, JAC for demanding pynursla civil sub division.Ha kum kane ka por ngi pynpaw ka jingsngewlem na ka liang ka Dorbar ki khlieh Nongsynshar, na ka FKS bad na ka FORMLD sha phi baroh kawei ka iing ki kur ki kha jong I (late) Bah Peter D Rynjah.Ngi sngew dei ban kyntu ia ki bor Raid Mawlieh ki bor Hima Khyrim ba la donkam shisha ban buh ia u mot sah kynmaw na ka bynta une u Rangbah kynthup ia kiwei ki Nongsynshar kiba la khlad dangshen kiba la noh synniang kyrpang ia ka jingiada ia u pud hapdeng ka Ri Khasi Jaintia bad ka Bangladesh.Khublei,Bah John F Kharshiing,Chairman, Ka Dorbar Ki Khlieh Nongsynshar Ka Ri Hynniewtrep,Adviser Spokesperson, Federation of Khasi States,Spokesperson, FORMLD,
title: Duh ka FKS ia u paia ka border India Bangla

content: Ki lad pathai khubor mynta ka sngi ki la sei madan ia ka bamsap kaba 450.75 Klur kaba iadei bad ka Scheme thang light/Kam bording jong ka Saubhagya & Smart Metter bad ka sorkar ba la ialam da ka NPP ha ki Cash Memo ka la pyni ba wat ka Cement ba iathied paitbah Rs. 360/- tyngka hynrei la thied ha ka dor Rs. 857/- tyngka ynnai ia khein ia kiwei kiwei bad ngi ai khublei ia ka TUR lyngba ka Kong Angela Rangad kiba sei madan ia kane ka bamsap ba shyrkhei hapoh ka jingialam jong ka NPP.Kumta lyngba kane ka khubor kum uwei na ki riew paitbah nga dawa ia ka jinghiar shuki mardor jong u Conrad Sangma kum u Chief Minister jong ka Meghalaya kumjuh ruh u James Sangma kum u myntri bording bad ha ka juh ka por ban thung mardor ia ka kynhun tohkit CBI bad lada kiwei ki nongialam ki don ha ka bor ka jingtohkit kam da long laitluit bad yn da kyrpad ia ki seng synro ha ki dei ban shlon/ther tyngeh ia kane ka bamsap bad lada kin sngap ki dei ban ai da ka Case shapoh Supreme Court la pynkut ka kyrwoh na u Bah Hopestandard Myrthong Sr. Member BJP.
title: KA SENG NPP KA HAP BAN BAHKHLIEH IA KA BAMSAP SAUBHAGYA & SMART MEETER

content: Shillong: Ka Dorbar Shnong Jaiaw Pyllun kala dawa ia ka Sorkar Jylla bad ia ka Meghalaya Energy Corporation Limited (MeECL) ba kan pynsangeh shisyndon ia ka jingthmu pynlip bording biang (load Shedding) bad ka jingpyn treikam ia ka Smart Meter ha Jylla.Ka Dorbar Shnong Jaiaw Pyllun kaba kynthup ia ki San tylli ki Dobar, ki la shim ia kane ka rai ha ka jingialang ba kyrkieh jong ka Executive Committee ba long hynne ka sngi palei, kaba iatai halor ka jingthmu pynlip bording biang naduh ka 20 tarik Lber namar ka jingshah otbording ha ka NEEPCO.“Ka Dorbar Shnong Jaiaw Pyllun ka pyrshah jur ia ka jingthmu pynlip bording biang jong ka MeECL bad ngi dawa ia ka Sorkar Jylla ba kan tuklar kloi ia kane” ong u Chairman Bah PD Nongrum bad Secretary Bah S Pariat ha ka kyrwoh.Kat kum ka jingong jong ki, ka jingthmu pynlip bording biang ha kum kine ki por, kan sa ktah jur bha ia ki samla pule kiban sa iakhun ia ki eksamin bapher bapher naduh ki eksamin SSLC, HSSLC bad kiwei kiwei ki ban sa sdang shen. Ban iaid lait na ka jingpynlip bording, ka Dorbar Shnong kala ai jingmut ia ka MeECL ba kan sangeh noh ia ka jingpynlut ne pynsyrwa kai ia ka pisa ba ioh lum na ki bill bording jong u paidbah kaba kot da ki phew klur tyngka shibnai.Ha kajuh ka por, kala kyntu ruh ba ka MeECL ba kan pynsangeh shuwa ia ka jingpyntreikam ia ka Smart Meter ne ki project thymmai ba da ki spah klur ha Jylla ia kiba dang lah ban ap, katba kam pat lah ban pynkhuid ia ka ram ba ka pynsah na ka jing thied bording elektrik na ki kompani bapher bapher.Ka Dorbar Shnong ka la kyntu ruh ba kan pyndonkam hok ia ka song pisa ba ka ioh na ka Sorkar Pdeng nalor ka ram ka shah ba ka shim na ki Bank ha ka ban siew ia ka ram baroh khnang ba ki Nongshongshnong ka Jylla kin lait noh na kum kine ki jingeh ba mynta.
title: Dawa ka Jaiaw Pyllun, ban sangeh pynlip ding bad Smart Meter

content: Shillong: U Myntri ba dei peit ia ka tnad bording, haba jubab ia ka mat, ba la wanrah da u Nujorki Sungoh (UDP), halor ka jingkhlad jong ki arngut shipara ha Umsalait West Jaintia Hill, u la ong ba dang ap ia ka kaiphot ba pura na ki pulit bad ka kaiphot post-mortem jong kine ki shipara ki ba khlad na ka jingjia shah bat ha ka bording electric.Kat kum ka kaiphot na  ka ophis  jong ka Inspectorate of Electricity ka la pynmih ia ka hukum ban pynlong ia kane ka jingjia ha ka 24 tarik u lber 2021, hapoh ka Section 161 jong ka  Indian Electricity Act, 2003. Ki la iathuh ba ha ka 10 tarik u lber 2021, ki ophisar jong ka Inspectorate of Electricity ki la ioh ia ka khubor ba ar ngut ki heprit ki ba tip kyrteng kum u Ardaban Papeng 10 snem ka rta bad u Pynskhem Papeng 1 snem ka rta ki la khlad noh na ka jingshah bat bording electric.Ki ophisar jong kane ka tnad ki la hiar mardor  ban jurip ia kane ka jaka ba jia kane ka jingjia bad la lap ba u pin insulator 11 k V u ba la pra, u dei  u ba la pyndait ia u channel jong u post bad shiliang ha ka khyndew.Namar ka jing pra u pin insulator ka la wanrah ia ka jingtyngkhuh jong ki sainar bording bad u post kaba la wanrah ia ka jing par ka bording electric kaba khlain  ha u post.La iathuh ruh ba u 11 kV line ha kaba kane ka jingjia ka la jia  ka line ka dei  jong ka 25 kV A Substation  jong ka Summit Digital Infrastructure PVT. La iathuh ruh ha shuwa kane ka jingjia ha ka 9 tarik ka don ka jinghap slap kaba jur ha ryngkat ka jingtied u pyrthat ha ka ba ka lah ban long na kane ka daw ba ka wanrah ka jingpait jong u  pin insulator na ka jingtied u pyrthat .
title: Ba pra u pin insulator, shah bat ilektrik ki shi para ha Umsalait

content: Nga kum u nong shong Shnong bad u nong kit kam jong ka Shnong Pdeintaloo nga don hangne ban pynshai halor ka jing kynnoh jong kawei ka longkmie haka 18/3/2021, ki ba bun rukom kata naduh ka kam Balang, ka kam Shnong bad ka jingkynnoh ba nga knieh jubor iaka kper jong ka, nga kwh ban pynshai kumne ba haka kam Balang nga ngam dei u nongkit kam ne Rangbah Balang bad ngam don bynta ban ai jaka ia ki khun ka Balang bad ngam dei ma nga ba dei ban ai, bad lada ka kwh ban ioh nongrim iing ka dei ban ia syllok bad ki Rangbah Balang bad ki nongialam jongka Balang,haba iadei bad ka khlaw Balang, ka khlaw Balang ka don naduh ki por mynshuwa bad ka Roimon Siangshai pat ka dang shu dep thied ia ka lyngkha Hali kaba don ha poh u pud u sam jong ka khlaw Balang,kumta haba iadei bad kane katba ka Roimon Siangshai kam pat thied ia kane ka jaka kam pat don hi ruh ka jingiakajia hapdeng ka Balang bad ki trai lyngkha Hali kiba mynshuwa bad iaka pisa kaba ka la kynnoh ba dei ka jingia pynbeit daki nongbat jobcard ba kin kynshew na ki shaka balang dei tad ynda la mih ka jingia kajia kala kylla ktien pat bad kala pan iaka pisa kaba la dep thep sha account balang bad iaka pisa ba ka la pan ki nongkit kam jong ka Balang ki la Siew noh sha ka,bad teng teng namar ba slem pisa ban poi bad khlem update passbook ruh katei ka longkmie ka la kynnoh bun jait bun rukom,haba iadei pat bad u khaw rashon nga ngam dei u nongsam rashon bad ha Shnong jong ngi ymdon Fair Price shop dealer haduh mynta ngi baroh shi Shnong ngi dang ia bam khaw rashon na Lapangap-A Fair Price Shop dealer bad ngam ju sam khaw rashon lait noh tang haka por ba sam khaw u MLA haka por Lockdown haka ba ngi kum ki nongshong Shnong ngi la pyrta ha shuwa ban sam ia u khaw, haba iadei bad ka job card nga thep application ia kiba la don iing don sem ngi thep thymmai khnang ba kin ioh bylla sngi lem lyngba ka ne ka scheme bad ia ki jing don job card don kawei kaba duna dkhot met bad don ki iing kiba iaphet lok ki leit sah pat sa iingkmie.haba iadei pat bad ka certificate nongshong Shnong u Rangbah Shnong u ju sign bad phah pyndap pat ha nga lada ki rah Voter ID ngan pyndap bad lada kim don ID ngam ju pyndap hi ruh, ka jingbakla hangne ka long ba maka ka Xerox ia kawei kaba la dep seal bad sign u Rangbah Shnong bad ka pyndap hi pat ia bun tylli ki kyrteng bad ka seal bad sign u Rangbah Shnong ka paw zerox kumba la kam katei ka longkmie.Ia ka BPL pat kala kynnoh ba ngam ai iaka, kaba bakla ka long ngam pat long u nong kitkam Shnong ha kitei ki snem, kumta ha phi kiba iadon bynta ban thad bad kynnoh khlem nongrim ia nga bad ia ka Balang kalong ka bym lah ban pdiang.Haka juh ka por ngi pynrem jur ia katei ka longkmie bad ngi kum ka Balang ruh ngim lah ban pdiang kumba la kynnoh.Kata Ka shnong te dei Ka balang shnong nga sngew ba pyniaid hi Ka balang
title: Ka jingpynshai halor ka jing kynnoh na kawei ka longkmie

content: Shillong: Kiba ioh pang thymmai, ki don 441 ngut ha ka jylla, kiba jem na ka jingpang, ki long 264ngut bad kiba iap, ki don 5ngut.Kiba dang don ha ka jingpang, ki long 4,166ngut bad kiba iap, baroh ki la poi sha ka 931ngut.Ha East Khasi hills, ki don 152ngut kiba ioh pang thymmai bad ha West Garo hills, ki don 126ngut.
title: Kiew ha East Khasi hills, West Garo hills, na kiba pang corona

content: Jowai: U riewpaw khmat ka ri lum Jaintia bad ka jylla ha kaba iadei bad ka kam sain hima sima, u ma Obil Kyndait u la khlad kyndit noh sha la u nongbuh nongthaw hynnin shiteng synnia bad haba la la kit mar mar ia u sha jaka ai jingsumar, ki doctor ki pynbna ba um don shuh.U la kot ia ka rta kaba 76 snem, u dei shnong trai na ka shnong Mukhaialong bad shong sah bad ki khun ki kti jong u ha Salini Colony, Mihmyntdu bad u la iehnoh shadien ia ka lok bad 9 ngut ki khun kynthup ia 7 ngut ki kynthei bad 2 ngut ki shynrang.U Jopmiki Shylla, uba khun u khun jong u, u la iathuh ba um shym la thiah pang satia wat lada don ki shitom ha ka met khamtam ka jingpang shini bad kiwei kiwei ki jingpang kiba malu mala namar tad haduh 12 baje hynnin ka meit u dang khie hi bad ha ka por jan miet ruh u dang sum hi.U ma Obil Kyndait uba dei u MDC barim uba la jop haduh 6 sien na 4-Tuber Constituency bad ruh uba la ioh ban bat ruh bunsien kum u CEM ka JHADC bad ruh kum u Chairman ha u snem 2009-14 bad uba la jop ruh u MLA ka Rymbai Constituency (mynta ka Khliehriat) ha u snem 1978.U ma Obil kyndait u la iakhun ia ka Election sha ka iing dorbar thaw ain ka jylla naduh u snem 1978 ha kaba u la jop ia u (L) Nihon Ksih, ha u snem 1983, 1998, 2003, 2008 bad ha u snem 2013 ha kaba ha baroh kine ki jingiakhun u la shah rem, hynrei ha JHADC u la shakri ia ka Disrtrict haduh 5 sien kynthih kum u MDC ha kaba u la bat ia ka post CEM bun bun sien, Dy.CEM bad Chairman bad kiwei kiwei ki post hapoh ka District Council.U la shah jied nyngkong eh ha u snem 1973 haduh 1978 bad u la shah rem ha u Saron Ksoo ha u snem ha u snem 1978 bad jop biang pat ha u snem 1983 bad bteng haduh u snem 2004 kaba mut u la jop 4 sien kynthih hadien ba u la shah rem shisien ha u snem 1978 – 83 haduh sien kynthih.U la shah rem sa ar sien ha u snem 2004-09 bad u la jop biang ha u snem 2009 bad trei kum u MDC tad haduh 2014.
title: Khlad kyndit u ma Obil Kyndait, u CEM barim ka JHADC, u  la long MLA shisien bad MDC 6 sien

content: Nongpoh:Ka long ka jingshisha ba ka Ri Bhoi District, ka dei kawei na ki Distrik kaba khlain eh ha ka jingpynsoh ia u Sohtrun bad kaba la wanrah jingmyntoi shikatdei eh ia kito ki nongrep, kiba la lah ban rep shibun u Sohtrun.Pynban haba la wan kane ka khlam COVID-19, ka la wanrah jingeh shikatdei ia ki nongrep Sohtrun, namar kim ioh ia ka iew ka hat kaba biang ba kin pyniaid iew ia kitei ki Soh kaba ki la rep bad trei shitom baroh shisnem shisnem.Haba iadei bad ka iew u Sohtrun, la ioh ban iakren bad iwei na ki Longkmie ba rep Sohtrun na ka shnong Shangbangla, bad katkum ka jingiathuh jong i, la pynpaw ba naduh ba la wan ka khlam COVID-19, ka la pynduhnong eh ia ki, namar ba jynjar ka iew ba kin pyniaid ia u Sohtrun bad lada pyniaid jubor ruh, la hap ban die ha ka dor kaba tad eh.Katkum ka jingiathuh da itei u Longkmie, i la pynpaw ba ka iew die Sohtrun mynta la hiar shaba palat, ha kaba ki la hap ban shu die tad bad don ki khep kaba ki hap ban die tang ha ka dor ba T. 200 shi-kuri, kaba mut ba u Sohtrun u shongdor tang 10 tyngka uwei.Haba kylli balei ki die ha kata ka dor kaba tad eh, ka jubab na itei i Longkmie ka long, ba shisien ba la don ki briew kiba thmu ban thied da ki bun bun kuri, kumta la hap ban shu die tad beit, namar lada ym die ha ka dor kaba ki pan, kan shem jingeh pat ia ki ba kumno kin leit buh ne ban die shawei, namar ba ym don ki jaka buh kiba biang bad lada ap ha kata ka dor ba biang, kaba mut ba u Sohtrun u la pyut bad la shu hap ban bret.Na ka jingkren itei u Longkmie, la sngewthuh ba kiba bun eh na ki nongthied ia u Sohtrun ba die harud surok ha Ri Bhoi, la ju wan thied da ki nongkhaii kiba dei na ka jylla Assam, namar haba ki wanthied ki da rah da ki kali bad kiba wan ban thied da ki phew phew kuri.Haba sngap ia ka sur jingkren itei i Longkmie, la sngewthuh ba i kwah eh ban pyniaid iew ia u Sohtrun jong i ha kata ka dor kaba biang, kata da kaba hap ban ap katto katne sngi, hynrei namar bym don ki jaka buh ba biang, kaba mut ym nud ban buh slem bad lada ap ha ka dor ba biang ne ban die hadien, u Sohtrun un sa pyut bad kan sa wanrah ia ka jingduhnong kaba khraw palat.
title: Hiar ka dor u Sohtrun ha Ri Bhoi,  bun ki khep ba ki nongrep  ki die ha ka dor kaba tad eh

content: Shillong: U President ka Hill State People’s Democratic Party (HSPDP) u bah P.K Pangniang myn hynnin ka sngi u la thoh sha u Lamphang jong ka ïng dorbar thaw ain ka jylla u bah Metbah Lyngdoh ban ai jingmut ban ai kyrteng da ka North West Khasi Hills District ia ka Mairang ka ban sa kyntiew District ha u bnai u ban wan.U bah Pangniang lyngba ka shithi u la ai khublei ia u bah Metbah u ba long ruh u MLA ka Mairang halor ka jing lah jong u ban pynurlong iaka jing dawa kyntiew kyrdan iaka Mairang Civil Sub-Division shaka District kaba 12 jong ka jylla Meghalaya.U la pynpaw ruh ba kane ka jing kyntiew District ia ka Mairang kan pyniajan iaka jing synshar bad ki paidbah bad kane kan kyntiew iaka roi ka par hapoh ka District thymmai namar kan iarap iaki samla ka thain ban ioh kam ioh jam.Nalor kane u President ka HSPDP u la dawa ruh badei ban pynlong iaka Mairang kum ka nongbah jong kane ka District ba khad ar jong ka jylla Meghalaya kata ka North West Khasi Hills District.
title: North West Khasi hills, ia ka Mairang District, ong ka HSPDP

content: Shillong:Ka Directorate of Information and Public Relations ha ryngkat ka jingiatreilang bad ka tnad ka koit ka khiah jong ka Sorkar Meghalaya ki la pynlong ia ka prokram kaba shisngi kata ka Sensitization Programme bad ki dkhot jong ka Press Fraternity halor u Covid-19 kaba la long ha ka 15 tarik u bnai Naitung 2021 ha Anton Hall,Laitumkhrah.Ha kane ka jingialang la wan ruh ki Editor,ki Producer,ki Journalist,ki Correspondent bad kiwei kiwei na ki shlem jong ki lad pathai khubor ki bapher bapher ha ryngkat ruh ki Ophisar na ka tnad ka koit ka khiah bad na ka Directorate of Information and Public Relations.Haba pyntip ia ki nongiashim bynta, ka Kong M. War Nongbri,IAS, Secretary jong ka Sorkar Meghalaya, Information and Public Relations Department, ka la pyntip shaphang kiba bun ki lad pynsngewthuh paidbah ba la shim da ka Sorkar lyngba ka State Covid-19 Communication Coordination Unit kaba pyntip bad hikai ia ki paidbah ha kaba iadei bad ki jingtip kiba bun kiba iadei bad ka khlam Covid-19. Shuh shuh ka Kong M War Nongbri ka la pyntip ia ki nongiashim bynta ha katei ka prokram ba ka daw kaba kongsan tam ba la pynlong ia katei ka prokram ka long ban ia iakren bad ban shim ia ki rai ha kaba iadei bad ki lad ki lynti kiba pher ba pher ba kumno ka Sorkar bad ki kynhun Press kin lah ban iatreilang na ka bynta ka bit ka biang bad ban sam ia ki jingtip sha ki paidbah.Ha kajuh ka por ka la sngewnguh ruh ia ki kynhun lad pathai khubor ia ka jingtrei shitom bad ka jingtrei bym shongthait jong ki ha ka kam bad kiba la iatrei khlem sangeh ha ki por ba don ka khlam Covid-19 ba kynthup naduh mynshem snem, ka la iai kyntu ruh ia ki ba kin dang iai trei bad ban nang iai treilang bad ka Sorkar ban pynkhlaiñ shuh shuh ia ka jinglah ban dang iai pynsaphriang ia ki jingtip ba donkam bad ki khubor sha ki paidbah.Ha katei ka jingialang, ki dkhot jong ka Press Fraternity ki la kdew ia ki jingeh kiba bun kiba iadei bad ki lad pathai khubor ha kaba iadei bad ka khlam Covid-19. Ki mat kiba iadei bad ka jingtehlakam ban pynsaphriang ia ki khubor thok bad ki khubor lamler khamtam ha kaba iadei bad ka jingai ia ka tika kaba long ruh ka jingiakren kaba neh slem bha, ha kaba ka Secretary ka la iai ban shuh shuh halor ki kamram ba ki lad pathai khubor ki dei ban pynmih ia ki khubor kiba dei bad ki jingtip kiba dei ha ka por ba ki thoh ne pynmih ia ki news bad ki jingjia ha kaba iadei bad u Covid-19. Ka la kyntu ruh ia ki dkhot kiba la don bynta ha katei ka jingialang ba ki dei ban iatreilang bad ka Sorkar ban kyntiew ia ka jingai tika khnang ba ka Jylla kan lah ban poi sha ka thong ban pyndep ia ka jingai tika sha ki briew ki bym dep ai.“Tang lada ngi lah ban kot sha kane ka thong, ba ngi kum ka jylla bad ki nongshong shnong ngi lah ban leit phai biang sha ka jinglong jingman ba bha kaba ju long man la ka por”.Ha katei ka prokram, la ioh ruh ia ka jingbatai halor u Covid-19 ha kaba iadei bad ka jinglong jingman jong ka Jylla ba la ai da ki doktor na ka tnad ka koit ka khiah. Kiwei kiwei kiba ai jingkren ha katei ka prokram ki long u Bah B.S Sohliya, MCS, Director of Information and Public Relations, Dr A Dkhar, Surgeon Superintendent, Shillong Civil Hospital, Dr F.V Kharshiing, Joint Director DHS MI, Dr P Manners, Joint Director DHS MCH cum State Immunisation Officer, Dr B. Decruse, Nodal Officer IEC Covid-19 bad u Bah R Nongkhlaw, Deputy Director,DIPR, Shillong.
title: La pynlong ia ka Sensitization Programme ha ryngkat ka jingdonlang ki lad pathai khubor ha kaba iadei bad ka khlam Covid-19

content: Guwahati:Ka Manipur High Court, ka la pynmih hukum mynta ka sngi, ba ka jingkhanglad ia ki briew, ba kin trei kin ktah, tang namar ba kim pat dep injek iada corona, ka long kaba beain.“Ka jingkhang lad ia ki briew, ki bym pat dep injek, ba kin plie ia ki skul, ki kam seng, ki karkhana, ki dukan bad kiwei lane ban khanglad ia ka ioh kam ioh jam, lada dei ha ka jingtrei ka NREGA bad kiwei de ki kam sorkar ne ki kam shimet, ka long kaba be riti” ong ka kashari jong U Sanjay Kumar, Chief Justice bad U Justice Kh. Nobin Singh.Kaba kum katei ka jingleh, kan dei ka jingleh jubor ia ka jing laitluid jong u briew lane ka jing pynbor, ba un shah injek, ong ka kashari.Ka kashari, ka shim bishar, halor ka mukotduma, kaba la ujor pyrshah, halor ka hukum jong ka tnat kam poh iing, ha kaba ka la pynbna ban plie ia ki dukan, ki ophis, kiba trei ia ki skhim NREGA bad ki kam jong ki riew shimet, tangba tang kito kiba la dep shah injek ialade.Ka kashari, ka ong shuh shuh ba ki dang don shibun bah, kiba dang artatien, halor ki jingjia ki ban mih, halor kane ka jing ai dawai iada corona bad la ong ba ka dei ka kamram jong ka sorkar jylla, ban hikai ia ki paidbah, halor ka jing myntoi jong katei ka injekshon bad ban weng noh ia ka jingsngew thuh bakla, halor ka jingma jong katei ka injekshon corona.“Khlem da shim khia ia katei ka mat, ka sorkar jylla, kan nym lah satia ban teh kyndon ia ki nongshong shnong lane ban pynbor ia ki paidbah, ba kin shah injek iada corona ialade, lane ban byrngem ia ki, tang na ka daw ba kim shym la shah injek”.U Additional Advocate General, uba mih khmat ia ka sorkar jylla, u iathuh ha ka kashari, ba katei ka hukum, ka dei kaba pynpaw, ia ka jingthmu jong ka sorkar, halor kaei kaba ka dei ban leh, ynda yn pynmih ia ki kyndon pyn jynsur ia ka jing khang dam.
title: Haba bun kiba artatien, hikai ia ki paidbah, halor u covid; hukum ka High Court ia ka Manipur, ban nym pynbor

content: Shillong:U President ka jong ka party People Democratic Front u bah Banteidor Lyngdoh u la iathuh ba lashai ka sngi ka party kan pynlong ia ka jingialang CEC ban ia tai halor ki mat ba kongsan ba kin leit rah ha khmat u myntri kam pohing ka sorkar pdeng ha ka sngi ba un wan ha nongbah Shillong.“Na ka liang ka party la shai ka sngi ngin sa shong jingialang CEC bad baroh ki nongmih khmat ban iatai ha lor ki mat ba kongsan ba ngin rah ha khmat u Myntri kampohing ka Sorkar Pdeng u Amit Shah u ban sa wan ha ka 24 tarik mynta u bnai sha nongbah Shillong” la ong u bah Lyngdoh ia ki lad pathai khubor.U bah Banteidor u la ong ruh ba ka mat Inner line Permit (ILP), ruh kan dei kawei na ki mat ba na ka liang ka party PDF kan rah ha khmat u myntri kam pohing ka sorkar pdeng bad kiwei kiwei ki mat yn dang ia tai la shai ka sngi ha ka jingialang CEC.U la pynpaw ruh ba ym kwah ban ong eiei la ka sorkar pdeng ka dei ban kren shai noh la kan ai ne em ia ka ILP na ka bynta ka jylla Meghalaya hynrei halor kane yn hap ban ap haduh ba u Myntri kam pohing ka sorkar Pdeng un wan sha nongbah Shillong.“Ngan ym lah ban ong eiei hynrei kan shong beit ha ka jingiakren ha pdeng ki kynhun myntri jong ka sorkar jylla ,ki nongialam bad ki seng bhalang ba kin ia kren halor kane ka mat “u la bynrap.
title: Mynta ka jing ialang PDF, ban dawa ILP na U Amit Shah

content: Shillong:Kiba ioh pang covid mynta ka sngi, ki don 412 ngut bad kiba jem, ki long 338ngut, katba kiba iap, ki long 5ngut.Kiba dang don ha ka jingpang, ki long 3,994 ngut, kiba iap baroh, ki la poi sha ka 926ngut.Ka East Khasi hills, ka don 101 ngut kiba pang bad ka bud sa ka West Garo hills, ha kaba ki don 90ngut.Ha East Garo Hills ki don 28ngut kiba ioh pang, ha East Jaintia Hills 9ngut, ha East Khasi Hills 101ngut. Kitei ki kynthup ha Boyce Road Cluster 5, Forest Colony Cluster 3, Mawlai Cluster 10, Mawngap Stand Cluster 3, Nongmynsong Cluster 10, Nongrah Cluster 3, Nongthymmai Cluster 5, Oakland Road Cluster 3, Thembasuk Bl E Cluster 4, Umpling Dongshaneng Cluster 4, Upper Shillong Cluster 3.Ha North Garo Hills, ki don 12ngut, ha Ri -Bhoi 72ngut, ha kaba ki High Risk Contact 5, ILI Case 12, Mawser Cluster 4, Midc Cluster 5, Nonglum Cluster 8, Nongrim Jyrmi Cluster 14, Syadheh Cluster 11.Ha South Garo Hills ki don 7ngut, South West Khasi Hills 25ngut, ha kaba ki ILI Case, ki don 8ngut, Jakrem Cluster 3, Mawten Cluster 4, Nonglang Cluster 3, Ranikor Cluster 5.Ha West Garo Hills, ki don 90, ha West Jaintia Hills 36ngut, ha kaba ha Dulong Cluster 3, Health Worker 4, Sohkha Cluster 4. Ha West Khasi Hills 16ngut, ha kaba ha Mairang Mission Cluster ki don 4ngut, ha Wahrit Cluster 4.a
title: Bun kiba pang covid 19, ha East Khasi Hills bad West Garo hills

content: Shillong: Kiba iap covid mynta ka sngi palei, ki long ka kong Mino Nongkhlaw, (50) na Pomlum, Upper Shillong, East Khasi Hills, U Keshab Prasad Sharma, (66), na Raj Bhawan, Shillong, East Khasi Hills, U bah Noah Mawlong, (96) na Weimynsier, West Khasi, uba khlad ha iing, ha ka 14tarik Naitung 2021, ka kong Iameralin Mylliem, (30) na Pomblang, Balat, East Khasi Hills, nangta ka kong Santila Kapew, (32) na Mawmih Diengiei, East Khasi Hills.
title: Khlad U Noah bad ki 4ngut na ka corona

content: Guwahati: Ka jing ia kynad, ka jur bha mynta ha u pud jong ka Assam bad ka Mizoram bad ka jing pahara jong ki pulit na baroh arliang, ka khlain bha bad la iathuh, ba ka lah ban mih kano kano ka jing ia siat ha kano kano ka por.U Deputy Inspector General of Police (Northern Range), jong ka Mizoram, U Lalbiakthanga Khiangte, u iathuh ba ka jinglong jingman ka long kaba i syier shibun eh bad ka ban poi sha ka jing ia pyni bor ha kano ma kano ka minit, lada don mano mano ba tur kham shakhmat. U iathuh ba baroh ar tylli ki jylla, ki la pynkhlain ia la ki jong ki pulit pahara jongki. “Ki pulit jongngi, ki long kiba la khreh ban siat naphang, ha kano kano ka por, lada ka Assam, ka dang iai tur sha u pud jong ka Mizoram” ong U Khiangte, uba don mynta ha  Vairengte bad u kyntait ba ki Mizo, ki la kurup ia hynriew kilometre ka jaka jong ka Assam.“Ka dei ka Assam, kaba kurup ia ki jaka jong ka Mizoram, ha  Phainuam Buarchep, kaba don hajan ka  Vairengte, da kaba ki sdang ban tei surok bad katei ka dei ka jaka, kaba la bat da ki Mizo, da ki bun pateng bynriew. Utei u heh pulit, u kyntait ruh ba ki pulit ka Mizoram ki kawang bom sha ki pulit jong ka Assam.Ka tnat kam poh iing jong ka Mizoram, ka kyntait war, halor ka jing kynnoh ba katei ka jylla, ka don bynta ha ka jing tuh jaka sha u pud jong ka Assam bad ka Mizoram, ka shim ba ka jaka kaba 509 square mile, kaba dei ka khlaw kaba heh bha, ka dei kaba la ithuh naduh u snem 1875, lyngba ka ain jong ka  Bengal Eastern Frontier Regulation jong u snem 1873, katba ka Assam, ka ithuh ia ka map, kaba dro ha u snem 1933.
title: Jubor ka jing ia kynad khappud, “Ngi kloi ban siat naphang, lada ka Assam, ka tam pud” ong u heh pulit ka Mizoram

content: Ka jingsah umdum khlem ka jingtip kan wanrah shibun ki jingeh ha ka jingim jong u briew. Haba ngi phai bad peit kumno ba ki briew kiba sah ha ka umdum kim tip ia kiei kiei kiba jia sawdong kylleng ka pyrthei. Hooid, ha ka pyrthei Science bad Technology kaba ngi im mynta, ki briew wat kiba sah sha ki kyndong kynshrot ruh ki tip lut ia ki jingjia kiba pher bapher namar ba ki Mobile bad ki Internet ki don ha ki kti jong ki. Ka jingtip ne jingpurstet ka long kaba shyrkhei bad wat ia ki jingjia kiba jia tang hapoh 5 minit ne shi kynta, ki la lah ban ioh ia ki jingtip (information).Te kumta haba iakren halor kane ka mat, ka long kaba donkam haduh katta ia ki jingtip namar haba ngi ioh jingtip, kan iarap shibun ia ngi. Kine ki jingtip ki long kum ka jinghikai ia ngi ban long sian (alert) namar teng teng ngi shah ialam bakla ruh haba ngim tip ia ki jingshisha. Lada ngi iakren ia ka jingiaid lynti jong ngi kum ki Khristian bad haba ngi peit na ka Ktien U Blei, ka batai bad pynsngewthuh kham shai ia ngi ba kumno ba lada ngi kyrduh ia ki jinghikai ngi lah ban shah shukor. Ki jinghikai ne ki Bible Study ki long ki lad ban iarap ia ngi ha ka jinglong kaba kynja mynsiem. Ki briew kiba thrang ia ki jinghikai khamtam na ka Ktien U Blei, kim ju sakma ne kulmar ha ka jingmut jingpyrkhat ne ha ka jingim jong ki. Ki shkem namar ba ki don ka nongrim haei ki ieng bad hangno ki shaniah.Shuh shuh, yn nym lah ruh ban pynjot ia ka jingim jong ngi namar ngi don ka jingtip katkum ka Ktien U Blei bad pynshong nongrim ruh ha ka. Haba ngi don ia ki jinghikai, kaba mut ngim don ka jingkyrduh bad ngin nym shah hano hano ban pynsakma ia ka jingim jong ngi bad ka skhem ka nongrim (foundation). Kum kiba ngeit, U Blei u khot ia ngi ba ngin iai sliang ia ki jinghikai, ym ban sah umdum khnang ban nym shah pynjot ne pynsakma kaba ka Ktien jong U Blei ka don ban kren sha ngi lyngba ka jingsot harum:“Un iap noh ba u kyrduh jinghikai; bad ha ka jingkhraw ka jingbieit jong u un leit sakma noh” (Proverb 5:23)“Ia u paidlang jong nga la pynjot namar bymdon jingtip… (Hosia 4:6)U Blei Un kyrkhu ia phi baroh.
title: “HATO NGIN SHU SAH UMDUM”

content: Shillong: Kiba ioh pang covid mynta ka sngi, ki don 412 ngut bad kiba jem, ki long 338ngut, katba kiba iap, ki long 5ngut.Kiba dang don ha ka jingpang, ki long 3,994 ngut, kiba iap baroh, ki la poi sha ka 926ngut.Ka East Khasi hills, ka don 101 ngut kiba pang bad ka bud sa ka West Garo hills, ha kaba ki don 90ngut.
title: 412 ngut kiba ioh pang, 338 kiba jem bad 5ngut kiba iap covid

content: Ki jingjia ba ju jia ha Israel, ki jia ha ka pythei baroh ter shiter. Kaei kaba ki Jiw ne Israel ki la mad ha ki por jong ki prophets’ ka jia ruh ha kine ki sngi ba khadduh. Ki nongsynshar hima pyrthei kim tip ia kata hynrei tang kita kiba ngeit bad pule naka ktien u Blei ki lah ban iohi ia kita ki jingmaian.Ngi tip ha ki por barim ha ka test tament Barim, u Blei u phah ia ki Nongiathuhlypa (Prophets) ha Israel ban iathuh ia ki halor kiei kiei baroh , ki Prophet kum u Amos, Usaiah, Jeremaiah bad kiwei kiwei ki ju kren bad iathuhlypa pyrshah ia ki khun Israel. Bad iakaba ki Israel hyndai ki mad, ka pyrthei kaba mynta ruh ka mad ia kine ki rukom jingjia kiba pynlyngngoh ia u briew baroh shi pyrthei. Namar kiei kiei kim ju jia klumar khlem ka jingtip jong u Blei.        Kaei kaba   jia ha kine ki sngi ka pynshaiong ngain iaki  briew shityllup ia ka pyrthei (Globally) bad kata ka dei ka jingwan ka khlam ia kaba ki riewstad scientist ki ong Corona virus ne u jingpang ba don khlieh . U corona ula pynkylla khongpong ia kane ka pyrthei haduh ba la mih shibun ki ain kiba dei ban hap kohnguh bad kine ki ain ki long kum kito kiba la thoh haka Bible ki ba lajia iaki khun Israel hyndai haki hajar hajar snem.U wei naki prophet, u Amos u la thoh pyrshah iaka pop ki Israel bad ia ka jingpynshitom haqlor jong ki bad halor sawdong ki jaidbynriew kiba don marjan bad ki Israel. Amos 2:6- 16. Naka daw ka jingbymkohnguh ki Israel kila jied iaka jingtim (cursing). Deuteronomi 28: 15- 68.Ka jingtim kala ngat haki Israel hakata ka por. Ym don nongrwai shuh haka temple. Ki met iap ki long shibun la bret jar jar iaki. Amos 8:3.Ka ri Israel ka sheptieng ka khynniuh .Amos 8:8. Ki jingkhawai niam, ki jingrwai ba ju rwai la pynkylla sha ka jingiam briew Amos 8:10. Kala long ka sngi kaba kthang. Amos 8: 10. Kala long ka jingkyrduh ia kaba sngew ia ka ktien u Trai .Amos 8: 11- 12.                    U prophet Jeremaiah pat u ong – kin iap da ka jingiap ba shitom (ki Israel),yn ym tep iaki . Jeremaiah 16: 4. Kane ka jingjia ha por ka jingsynshar u Adolf Hitler haki snem 1939- 1945 A.D haka ba la pyniap haduh 60lakh ngut ki Israel.Ka rukom pyniap ka long kaba shitom shisha . Hakata ka por ym don nongtep shuh hapdeng ki Jiw , kala long ka them ki shyieng ba shyrkhei .             Kata ka por ymdon briew shuh u ban leit sngewlem ha ing iap briew namar ka long ka jingiap ba kynsha salonsar. Yn ym tep iaki lymne ki briew kin ym iam briew iaki. Jeremaiah 16:5 -6. Ki paramarjan kim lah bam ia leit rung ne mih namar kala don ka jingpang iap khlam haka ri Jeremaiah 16: 8. Kane ka dei naka daw ka jingbitar u Blei kein halor ki Israel baroh.U prophet Isaiah pat u pynbna ia ka ktien u Blei ban buh ka jingshaniah ha u Blei hapoh ka por ka jingbitar jong u mynba u la phah ia u angel jingiap,u khot iaki ban bsut haki kamraban buhrieh shipor ialade  ban wad iaka khmat u Blei tad haduh ban da kut ka por ka  jingbitar jong u halor ki Israel. Isaiah  26: 20.                Shibun kiwei pat ki ain kiba ki Israel ki dei ban leh naka daw ka jingtam sneng jong ki.                        Te halor kine ki jingjia bala jia halor ki khun Israel, kala don ka jingjia kaba mynta kaba la pynlyngngoh iaki briew ka pyrthei kat haduh baki hap ruh ban khang iaki temple ki jaka mane Blei hakine ki sngi naka daw ka khlam Corona. Shisha kala jia ruh ia ki khun Israel ba ki ba duh noh ban mane ia u Blei haka Temple ha Jerusalem haduh mynta namar ia kane la kren da u Jisu haka Nongsamaria u ong – “Ko briew to ngeit ia nga baka por ka jia ba phin ym mane ia u kpa (Blei) ha une u lum lymne ha Jerusalem …..Te ka dei ia kiba mane kin mane haka mynsiem bad kaba shisha.” Ioanis 4: 20 – 24.                Kane ka juh ka jia mynta haba la khang noh ia ki Temple, namar u Blei um damon baki briew kin mane ia u tang haki kynta ne haka shisngi ban pyndep niam, pyndep rukom, hynrei dei namar u kwah ba ki briew kin mane ia u HAKA MYNSIEM BAD HA KABA SHISHA NABA U KPA (BLEI) U WAD IA KI BA KUM KI TA BAN MANE IA U .Ioanis 4:23.Hooid ki Israel kim pat ioh Temple ban mane Blei haduh mynta namar kim mane ia u Blei haka mynsiem bad haka ba shisha. Bad ka por ia kaba kin saioh Temple ka shong haka por jong u Blei namar kala long haduh mynta kumba 1950snem ba ki Jiw ne Israel kim ioh Temple shuh kata naduh u 70AD .                     Ngi iohi kiei kiei kiba lajia iaki khun Israel, ka pynphalang sha ka pyrthei baroh kawei mynta ba kin sngewthuh ia kaei kaba la jia ha Jerusalem ne ha Israel hyndai. Imat namar ka dei ka ri jong u Trai Jisu, u Blei u kwah ban leh eiei ha kine ki sngi khadduh ba kin sngwthuh kaei bala jia ha Israel hyndai.                  Kumta kaba la jia iaki Israel, ka jia ruh haka pyrthei baroh mynta.
title: Kaba jia ia ki Israel, ka jia ruh ha ka pyrthei baroh

content: Kabul: Ki ehrang Taliban, ki nang ioh bor shi katdei ha kine ki sngi ha  Afghanistan bad la iathuh ba ki la ioh sei ia kawei ka nongbah, kaba don ha khappud jong ka Pakistan, ha ka sngi balang ba ladep.Mynta ki heh sorkar jong ka Afghanistan, ki dang thawlad ban iakren ia sngewthuh bad ki ehrang Taliban, ha Doha, Qatar, ban wan rah sha ka jing iasuk jong kitei ki ar liang mamla.U nongialam ka Taliban, U  Zabihullah Mujahid, ula pyni paidbah ia ka video, ba ki ehrang Taliban, ki la shimti ia ka  Spin Boldak, kaba dei ka nongbah, kaba don ha khappud ka Afghanistan-Pakistan.Ki nongshong shnong ka Chaman, ha Pakistan, ki kam ba ki la iohi ia ka lama lieh jong ki ehrang Taliban, ba la pynher ha u pud jong ki ar tylli ki Ri bad la iathuh ba ki don bun ki kali, kiba iaid ha katei ka jaka, kiba pynher ia kitei ki lama lieh, kiba dei ki lama jong ki ehrang Taliban.
title: Kurup ki ehrang Taliban, ia ka nongbah, kaba ha khappud bad ka Pakistan

content: Shillong: Hadien ka jingbthei bom IED ha Khliehriat Police Reserve kaba don ha East Jaintia Hills kaba la jia ha ka shiteng synnia jong ka sngi Balang kumba 1:45 eiei, na ka liang jong ka seng kieng atiar, ka Hynniewtrep National Liberation Council (HNLC) ka la kam ba ia kane ka kam pynbthei bomb ha katei ka jaka la leh da kane ka seng.  U Superintendent of police, u Jagpal Singh Dhanoa, u la ong ba ia mynta hi la ioh ban kem tang ia uwei u briew u ba la suba ba donkti ha kane ka jingjia.
title: La ioh ban kem ia uwei u ba la suba donkti ban pynbthei bom IED ha Khliehriat Police Reserve

content: Nongpoh:”Haba la dawa na bynta kano kano ka kam kaba dei na bynta ka jingmyntoi bad ka bha ka miat ki paidbah, ka dei ban urlong beit bad ngim ju pynlong ia ki jingiakynduh kai khlem da don kano kano ka jingseisoh” jubab u Dr. D.D Lapang, ha ka jubab jong u halor ka Patharkhmah Civil Sub-Division.Khlem da ioh ban kren jrong halor kata, hynrei na ka sur kaba la kren da u Dr. D.D Lapang, la sngewthuh ba ka Patharkhmah Civil Sub-Division kan urlong beit, bad uba la ong ruh ba ka Patharkhmah Administrative Unit, ka la dei hok ban kyntiew noh ia ka sha ka Civil Sub-Division, namar ka la dei kawei na ki thain kaba la hap ban peit ia shibun tylli ki shnong nongkyndong bad kaba don ruh ha ki thain khappud bad ka Assam.U Dr. D.D Lapang, u la pynkynmaw ruh da kaba ong, ba wat na ka bynta ban pynioh ia ka Ri Bhoi District, dei ki nongkitkam ka Ri Bhoi Durbar hi, kiba la tur shakhmat bad ban pynurlong ia katei ka jingdawa pynioh Distrik bad uba la pynpaw ia ka jingsngewkmen ba kajuh ka Synjuk, ka la mih madan biang na ka bynta ban dawa kyntiew Civil Sub-Division ia ka Patharkhmah Administrative Unit.Na kaei kaba nga la lap, nga la iohi ba ki nongmihkhmat ha Ri Bhoi, ki long kiba iatylli watla ki iapher Party hadien ba la kut ka Ilekshong, kata ka long na ka bynta ban dawa na ka bynta ka jingmyntoi ki paidbah hapoh ka Distrik hi baroh kawei, bynrap u Dr. D.D Lapang.Namarkata, nga kyntu ia ki nongmihkhmat hapoh ka Distrik ba kin iaineh ha ka jinglong iatylli jong ki, khnang ba ka Ri Bhoi kan dang iai kiew shakhmat shaphrang bad ka ban sa wanrah ia ka jingmyntoi ia ki paidbah ha ka Distrik hi baroh kawei, u la bynrap.
title: ‘Patharkhmah Sub-Division’ shisien ba ngi la dawa, ngi don ka hok ban ioh, ong U Dr. DD Lapang

content: Kasaragod: Da ki spah ngut, ki nongshong dukan ha  Badiadka, kaba dei ka nongbah kaba rit jong ka  Kasaragod district, ki la mih paidbah ban bat da ki bowl ne ki borti ban shu ia khrong noh bad ka daw, ka long namar ba ka sorkar jylla, ka la rai ban khang ia ki dukan jongki, na ka bynta lai taiew kynthih.Ka nongbah, ka don 350 tylli ki dukan, hynrei haduh mynta, la plie tang ia ki 12 tylli, ba kynthup ia 3 tylli ki super market, kiba die jingbam, die jhur, kiba die dud. Katei ka jingleh, ka la pyn bitar ia U President jong ka seng ki nongdie dukan, U Kunjar Mohammed, ha kaba u ong “Kiwei ruh, ki don la ki jong ki iing, ba kin hap ban bsa” ong U Kunjar, uba dei U President ka  Kerala Vyapari Vyavasayi Ekopana Samithi’s Badiadka unit.Ka sorkar jylla, ka pyntrei kam ia katei ka pakhang shnong, halor ka jingdon kiba ioh pang covid, lane kaba ki ong  test positivity rate (TPR), kaba la pynlong na ki spah tylli ki test. Shibun ki doktor, ki pynsngew ba tang ka jingdon katei ka jingpang, lane ka TPR, kam lah ban long ka daw, ban khang noh ia ka shnong.
title: Sei ki nongdie dukan, da ki bowl, ban ia khrong, na ka jingkhang dukan corona

content: Shillong: Kiba ioh pang covid  hynnin ka sngi, ki don 422ngut bad kiba jem, ki don 458ngut bad kiba iap, ki don 3ngut.Kiba dang don ha ka jingpang, haduh mynta, ki long 3,925ngut bad kiba iap, ki la poi sha ka 921ngut.Ka East Khasi hills, ka hiar jur mynta ka sngi, ha kaba ki don 121 ngut kiba ioh pang, ka West Garo hills, ka kiew bha, da ka jingdon ki 131 ngut kiba ioh pang bad ka Ribhoi, ka don 86ngut.Kiba pang covid ha East Garo Hills, ki don 18ngut, ha East Jaintia Hills, ki don 6ngut, ha East Khasi Hills 121ngut, ha kaba ha Don Bosco Cluster 3, Golflink Cluster 5, Health Worker 10, Jaiaw Cluster 3, Laitumkhrah Cluster 4, Lumbasuk Cluster 11, Lyngngar Cluster 6, Madanrting Cluster 7, Maraikaphon Sohra Cluster 4, Mawdiangdiang Cluster 3, Mawlai Cluster 8, Mawpat Cluster 3, Mawryngkneng Cluster 4, Nongthymmai Cluster 10, Umpling Cluster 3.Ha North Garo Hills, ki don 11ngut, ha Ri -Bhoi 86ngut bad ki High Risk Contact 21, ILI Case 6, Nongrim Jyrmi Cluster 5, Nongsangu Cluster 30, Umran Dairy Cluster 13, Umsaw Nongbri Cluster 4.Ha South Garo Hills ki don 8ngut, ha South West Garo Hills, ki don 8ngut, ha South West Khasi Hills ki don 12ngut, ha kaba ha Nongsynrieh Cluster, ki don 5ngut nalor kiwei pat, ha West Garo Hills 131ngut, ha West Jaintia Hills 16ngut, ha West Khasi Hills 5ngut.
title: 30ngut ha Nongsangu, 13ngut ha Umran dairy, kiba ioh pang covid 19

content: Nongpoh:Ha ka jingialang kaba la pynlong da ki Nongkitkam ka Ri Bhoi Durbar, kaba la long hynnin ka sngi ha shnong Nongthymmai Umsning, ki la don Lai ngut ki MLA bad 2 ngut ki MDC na Ri Bhoi, kiba la leit ban iashim bynta lang ha katei ka jingialang, kaba dei ruh ka jingialang kaba la pynlong kyrpang, na ka bynta ban iai buh ia ka jingdawa na ka sorkar jylla, ba ki dei ban kyntiew kyrdan noh ia ka Patharkhmah sha ka Civil Sub-Division.Ha katei ka jingialang, nalor ka jingdon ki nongkitkam ka Ri Bhoi Durbar kiba kynthup ia u Bah RR Kynsai Makdoh, President ka Synjuk, la donlang u Bah RB Shadap, Secretary, nangta u Dr. D.D Lapang, Nongaibuit ka sorkar jylla. Sa nangta pat ki lai ngut ki MLA na Ri Bhoi, kiba kynthup ia u Bah Mayrald Born Syiem, MLA Nongpoh, u Bah Jasan S. Mawlong, MLA Umsning bad u Bah George B. Lyngdoh, MLA Umroi, katba na ki MDC la wan mihkhmat tang u Bah Charles Marngar, MDC Mawhati bad u Bah Balajied Rani, MDC Nongpoh.Khlem da iohsngew ia kaei ka jingiakren hapdeng kitei ki nongkitkam ka Ri Bhoi Durbar bad ki MLA, MDC ha Ri Bhoi, lyngba katei ka jingialang kaba ki la pynlong ha Nongthymmai Umsning, hynrei lyngba ka jingkren u Bah RB. Shadap, la sngewthuh ba ka mat kaba hakhmat eh jong katei ka jingialang, ka long ban iai dawa na ka sorkar jylla ba ka dei ban kyntiew noh ia ka Patharkhmah Administrative Unit sha ka Civil Sub-Division.Katkum ka jingkren utei u nongialam ka Ri Bhoi Durbar, la ong ba kitei ki MLA kiba la leit sha katei ka jingialang, ki la pynsngew ia kata ka jingdonkam ki paidbah ha la ki Konstitwensi kaba ki mihkhmat. U Bah George B. Lyngdoh, u kwah ba ka thain Ri Bhoi kan ioh ia ka Civil Sub-Division, u Bah Jason S. Mawlong, u kwah ba ka Umsning ruh kan ioh ia ka Civil Sub-Division, u Bah Mayrald Born Syiem, kum u MLA Nongpoh, u kwah bad u dawa na ka sorkar ba ka dei ban wanrah ia ka Umden C&RD Block, katba u MDC Mawhati u kren beit ha ka nongrim ba u dawa ia ka Mawhati C&RD Block.Na ka jingkren u Bah RB Shadap bad u Bah RR Kynsai Makdoh, kiba dei ki nongkitkam, ki la pynpaw ia ka jingkmen eh ban iohi ba ki Nongmihkhmat ha Ri Bhoi, ki iatylli ban mih shakhmat, na ka bynta ban dawa na ka sorkar ia ki jingdonkam u paidbah hapoh ka Distrik, la ka long ha ka roi ka par bad ha ki kam ban tehlakam ia ka jingkharoi ki kam sniew ruh kumjuh.
title: 3 Sub-Division, 2 C&RD Block, ka jingdawa ha ka jingialang ki MLA, MDC, Ri Bhoi Durbar
