content: Shillong:Ka Deputy Commissioner jong ka East Khasi Hills ka kong Isawanda Laloo, ka iathuh ba haduh mynta ki la don palat 100 tylli ki long ing ha East khasi District, ki la ioh ia ka jing iarap pisa (ex-cratia) ba la mang kyrpang da ka sorkar jylla na ka bynta ki briew ki ba khlad na ka jingpang COVID -19 .Kum ban shu pynkynmaw ba na ka liang ka sorkar jylla ha ka 27 tarik jong u bnai Jymmang ka la shim iaka rai ban iarap pisa (Excratia) na ka bynta ki to ki longing ki ba duh ia la ki ba ieid bathoiñ na ka daw ka jing pang Covid-19 ,ka ban long T.50,000 bad jane kan long ia kiba la khlad naduh ka 1 tarik u bnai Iaiong 2021.Ka Deputy Commissioner ka la ong “Haduh mynta palat 100 tylli ki longing jong ki briew kiba la khlad na ka jing pang COVID hapoh East Khasi Hills ki la ioh iaka jingiarap pisa ka ba ka sorkar ka la kular ban ai bad ia kane ka pisa la pynpoi beit ha ki Bank Account”.Ka kong Isawanda ka la iathuh ba ka ophis jong ka Deputy Commissioner ka la bthah ia ki BDO ban phah iaki kyrteng jong kito kiba khlad na ka jing pang COVID ryngkat bad ki kyrteng jong ki baha ïng bad ka Bank Account jong ki, na ka bynta ban pynshisha ba ki dei ki ba khlad na kane ka jingpang.Na ka liang ka ophis jong ka Deputy Commissioner ha ka juh ka por ka la nang phah ia ka song pisa kat ba ka sorkar ka dang pyllait, sha ki Bank Account jong kito kiba dei hok ban ioh.
title: 100 tylli ki longing, ki la ioh iarap covid

content: Mumbai: Ka kynhun ki Khristan ka la pynrem ia ka kyrteng jong ka kot ba la thoh da ka Kareena Kapoor bad ki la mudui ruh sha ki pulit hapoh ka Sor Beed jong ka Jylla Maharashtra pyrshah ia ka Kareena Kapoor bad ki arngut ha ka sngi Balang ha kaba ki la kynnoh ba kane ka jingleh jong kine ka la ktah shikatdei eh ia ka jingngeit bad ka jingsngew jong ki riewniam khristan, la ong ki tyllong khubor.U President jong ka Alpha Omega Christian Mahasangh,u Ashish Shinde u la phah ia kane ka jingujor ha Shivaji Nagar Police Station ha Beed pyrshah ia kane ka kot kaba don ruh sa uwei u nongthoh kot u ba ar jong kane kajuh hi ka kot.Ha katei ka jingujor, u Shinde u la pynmih ia ka kyrteng jong katei ka kot ba la tip kum ka Pregnancy Bible ba la thoh da ka Kareena Kapoor bad u Aditi Shah Bhimjani bad ba la pynmih da ka Juggernaut Books.Ka kyntien khuid “Bible” la pyndonkam ban ai ia ka kyrteng jong katei ka kot bad kane ka la ktah shikat dei eh ia ka jingsngew jong ki khristan, la ong u Shinde.U Shinde u la ujor pyrshah ia kane ka jingleh hapoh ka IPC section 295-A pyrshah ia katei ka aktress bollywood bad ki arngut. Katei ka aiñ ka thew ia ka jingleh khnang kaba lah ban ktah ia ka jingngeit ki riew niam jong kano kano ka kynhun niam da kaba kren pharshi ia ka jingngeit bad ka niam jong kiwei. Ki pulit ki la pyntip ruh ba ki la ioh ia ka jingujor halor kane ka jingjia hynrei ki la ong pat ba ym pat shym la ioh satia ia ka jing mudui ejahar pyrshah ha kaba iadei bad kane.
title: Shah mudui ka Kareena Kapoor, na ka kot Pregnancy Bible

content: Shillong:U Saleng Sangma, President jong ka National Congress Party (NCP), jong ka Meghalaya, myn hynnin ka sngi u la buh ia ka jingkylli ba balei ki paidbah bad ki seng sain pyrthei ki bud dien tang ia ka tnad kaba u James PK Sangma u bat da ka ba ong ruh ba ha ka jingshisha baroh ki tnad ki don hapdeng ka jingjyrsieh bam sap ka ba shyrkhei.U Sangma u la buh ka jingkylli ba ki dei ban kren ruh halor ka jing jyrsieh ka ba don ha tnad pule puthi (Education Scam) ne kiwei kiwei ki tnad sorkar, wat la ka sorkar ka la dep ban sloit ia u James na ka shuki kum u myntri kam pohïng, hynrei haduh mynta man ka sngi ka don beit ka jing kren pyrshah.U Saleng u la ong ruh ba ki dang don bun ki mat ba ki paidbah ne ki seng sain pyrthei ki dei ban pynsngew sha ka sorkar kum ka jing thut ka jingkieng dwar ksuid (Baily bridge), ki jing kynnoh pyrshah ka FCI, ka tnad Industry bad halor ka khlam COVID.U nongialam ka NCP u la ong ba ki paidbah ki dei ban buh jingkylli, balei ka jing kieng nar ha Dwar Ksuid Ri-bhoi District ka shu thut beit man ka por mano ba donkti ne kaei ka daw ban pynlong ia kane ka jingkieng ban thut man ka por.U la pynpaw ruh ba ki don bun ki kynrum kynram ne ki jyrsieh bamsap hapoh ki tnad treikam sorkar bad ki paidbah ki dei ban kren ne buh jing kylli halor kine bad ka sorkar ruh kadei ban bishar bniah bad kadei ban weng kam iaki ophisar ba donkti, ym ban shu thew ne sloit shuki tang ia kino kino ki myntri sorkar.
title: Baroh ki tnat, ki don ha ka jingbam sap kaba shyrkhei, ong U Saleng

content: Nongpoh:Ka jingsniew kaba palat pud ka surok na Pahammawlein sha Umdap, bad khamtam eh ha kito ki bynta mar ia lait na ka shnong Pahammawlein 20mer, ka la wanrah jingeh shikatdei ia ki paidbah kiba sah ha kiba bun tylli ki shnong, kiba pyndonkam ban iaid lyngba katei ka surok.Haba iadei bad ka jingsniew kaba palat eh katei ka surok, hynnin ka sngi, ki nongialam ka RBYF 20mer Circle, kaba la ialam da u Samla Lan Syngkli, President ka RBYF, 20mer Circle ha ryngkat ki dkhot, ki la leit ban jurip ia katei ka surok bad hadien ka jingleit jurip, ki la dawa jur na ka sorkar jylla bad khamtam ia ka tnat PWD ba ki dei ban pynmang tyngka, na ka bynta ban maramot ia katei ka surok, khnang ba kan pynsuk ia ka leit ka wan ki paidbah ha katei ka thain bad kiba pyndonkam ia katei ka surok.Halor ka jingsniew katei ka surok, u Samla Lan Syngkli, u la ong ba ka seng ka dawa na ka sorkar bad khamtam eh ia ka tnat PWD bad ki dei ban shimkhia ha ka ban pynbha noh mardor ia katei ka surok. Ha kajuh ruh ka por ki la kyntu ia u nongmihkhmat ka thain ba un kren lem sha ka sorkar, na ka bynta ban pynbha ia katei ka surok, kaba dei kawei na ki surok kaba donkam eh da ki paidbah kiba sah ha katei ka thain.
title: Syrtok ka leit ka wan, ba sniew palat ka surok Pahammawlein sha Umdap

content: Shillong: Kiba iap covid ha ka Sngi Balang, ki long ka kong Lucia Susngi, (60) na Nangbah, Mulang, West Jaintia Hills, nangta ka kong Veronica Pyngrope, (63) na Umtyngar, East Khasi Hills bad U bah Drewstarly Nongsiej, (61) na Nongspung, East Khasi Hills, ha kaba la leit rah ia ka met, kaba la dep iap lypa, ha ka 13-07-2021 sha Civil Hospital, Shillong.
title: Kiba iap covid ha ka jylla

content: Shillong: Ha ka 13tarik Naitung, ha ka por 11baje mynmiet, ka la don ka jing kynnoh, ba ka don ka jingshoh briew jong ki bar jylla ha Nongmynsong, Shillong. La iathuh ba ki don 2ngut ki briew, kiba la buaid jaw sheh bad kumta, la ialam ia ki sha thana, ban phah eksamin ha ki doktor.Kham hadien, ki la don bun kiba wan ialam ha khmat jong ka Nongmensong OP bad ki la sdang ktah kti ruh ia uwei na kiba shah kem bad ki la kren khor ruh ia ki pulit bad ki CRP, kiba don ha katei ka jaka bad ki ia kawang maw ruh, ha kaba ka la pynjot ia ar tylli ki kali jong ki pulit, 3 tylli ki kali jong ki riew shimet bad lai tylli ki kali ar shaka bad ki pulit CRP ruh ki don 3ngut kiba mynsaw, na ka jingshah kawang maw.U bah S Nongtnger, Superintendent of Police, East Khasi hills, ula ai jingmut ia ki padibah, ba kim dei ban pyn saphriang ia ki khubor lamler, halor katei ka jingjia bad ka jingtohkit, ka dang iaid halor katei ka jing kynnoh ba ka don ka jingshah shoh jong ki briew.Mynta ka sngi, la pynlong ia ka jing ialang ha Nongmynsong Out Post, ha kaba ki kynhun jait bynriew bapher, ki la ia shim bynta ha ka jingialang.
title: Ba kynnoh shah shoh ha Nongmynsong, shah ther maw ki pulit, julor bun ki kali

content: U MP jong ka seng Congress, na Barpeta constituency, U Abdul Khaleque, ula ther tyngeh ia ka sorkar Assam, halor ka jing pyntrei kam jongka, ia ka ain khang bam doh masi.U MP Khaleque, u ong ba lada ka jingkhang ban shoh doh masi, kan trei kam haduh 5 kilometre, na ka jaka ba ki don ki temple, kumta ka jingkhang ban shoh doh sniang, ka dei ruh ban jngai kumba 500metre, na ki jaka ba ki don ki iing maen Muslim.U Khaleque, u ong ba katei ka ain, kan iahap shibun, lada pyntrei kam lang ia ka jingkhang ia ka doh masi bad ia ka doh sniang ruh kumjuh, ha kaba ym dei ban die hajan ki mosque.“Ka dohsniang, ka dei kaba la mane ia ki Muslim bad kumta, kan iahap bha, lada yn khang ruh ia ka jingdie ia ka doh sniang, ha ka jingjngai kaba 500 metre, na shajan ki iing mane Muslim” ong U MP jong ka seng Congress.
title: Khang ia ka jingdie doh sniang ruh, hajan ki iing mane Muslim, ong U MP

content: Ki riew kieng atiar, kiba kieng da ki rifle, ki iaid ba heh ha ki surok bah ha  South Africa bad kitei ki iada na ka jing jubor than, ki kam lute bad ki kam pynjot dukan bad ki iing ki sem, ha katei ka Ri, kaba la iap haduh 75 ngut ki briew, na ki jing ia kynad ha kine ki sngi.Kitei ki riew kieng atiar, ki mih ban pahara, namar ba ki pulit, dalade hi, kim lah shuh ban iada, na ka jing jubor than ki kam runar ba har rukom, ha kaba ki la mih ki jing ia thyngngian para briew bad haba ia ka hospital ruh, la thang da ki riew runar.Katei ka jing ia kulmar, ka la jia, na ka jingshah set phatok U Jacob Zuma, President barim ka South Africa, na ka jingshah kynnoh bam sap jongu.La iathuh ba 10ngut ki briew, ki la iap, na ka jingia thyngngian para briew, ha kawei ka dukan heh ha  Soweto, Johannesburg, nangta la pyni ba ka  Lenmed Hospital ha Durban, ka la klang da ka ding bad la iohi ruh ba ki nongdie dukan, ki la ia bat da ki suloi mynta, ban siat ia kito kiba leit rung bad lute sha ki dukan.
title: Nang jur ka jing ia umsnam, ha South Africa, thang ia ka hospital, kiew kiba iap sha ka 75ngut

content: Guwahati: Ka sorkar Assam, ka la pynmih ia ka jingkhein, kaba pyni ba ka jingshah tuh jaka jong ka Assam, ka la kot sha ka  69,010.82 hectare, ha kaba ia katei ka jaka, la tuh da ki jylla ba marjan.Ha ka jubab, ha iing dorbar jong ka Assam, U Atul Bora, myntri ka tnat Border Area Development, u iathuh ia ka Nandita Das, MLA ka seng Congress na Boko, U Bora, u iathuh ba ka Arunachal Pradesh, ka la tuh jaka ha ki bynta jong ka Sonitpur (1.0849), Biswanath (4751.00), Lakhimpur (1975.41), Dhemaji (1055.7479), Dibrugarh (10.00) bad Charaideo (602.0117), kaba long baroh  8395.2545 hectare.Ka Nagaland, ka la tuh jaka ha  Jorhat (18807.72), Sivasagar (23.9039), Golaghat (36294.07) bad Charaideo (270.4357) district, kaba long 55396.1296 hectare.Ka Meghalaya, ka la tuh jaka  ia  3441.8601 hectare ha ka district Goalpara (33.8156), Cachar (602. 0117), Kamrup (802.6823), Salmara South-Mankachar (3.3505) bad West Karbi Anglong (2000.00), nangta ka Mizoram, ka la tuh jaka ia  1777.58 hectare ha ka district Hailakandi (1000.00), Karimganj (377.58) bad Cachar (400.00).La iathuh ba ka jing iakren, ka dang iaid hapdeng ka Meghalaya bad ka Mizoram, ba kin mih noh na kitei ki jaka, ba ki la shim tuh bad ki don sa ar tylli ki mukotduma, kiba dang iadi ha Supreme Court pyrshah ia ka  Nagaland bad ka Arunachal Pradesh, ong U Bora.Ka jylla assam ka lah ban ai jingkhein ia ki jaka ba shah tuh  ha ka jylla meghalaya, .. hato ka meghalaya ka lah mo ban ai jingkhein katno kala shah tuh haka jylla assam ,kum bala la kam na ka por Sha ka por ba ngi shah tuh ha ka jylla assam .
title: 60 hajar hectare, ki jaka ka Assam, ba tuh da ki jylla marjan, kynthup ia ka Meghalaya, ong u myntri

content: Shillong: Ka HNLC ka shim ia ka jingkitkhlieh halor ka jingpynbthei IED ha Police reserve,Khliehriat ha ka por 2 duna mynta ka sngi dangstep.Ka jinghiarthma jong ka seng ia ki jaka sah ne jaka trei jong ki Pulit kam dei shuh kaba dang thymmai. Ka Jingleh jong ka seng ia kum kine ki kam pyntriem ka long halor ban kput iaka tnad pulit kaba donkti ban pyniap dusmon iaki dkhot ka seng. Kum ban shu pynkynmaw ba ia u Bah tiewiong ki pulit ki kem bad nangta kin sa shu thangim ia u, kumjuh ruh ka jingshah pynshitom jong u hepkhoit bad kiba bun kiwei ki dkhot ka seng shuwa ba ki pulit kin pyniap, ka dang pyn ingkhong ha ka jingiaid lynti jongngi.“Ka thma bad ki seng kiengatiar ha rilum Garo ka tnad pulit ka lah ban jop da kaba suk hynrei ka thma pyrshah iangi kam long kumba ki mutdur” ong ka kyrwoh jong ka seng. Kane ka Police reserve ka dei kaba ki Pulit Jaiñiong ki shong ki sah, mano ban mutdur ba katto ka jingjrong ka kynroh,katto ka jingpyrkhing ki nongpahara, ki shipai ka HNLC kin dang ioh ban rung hapoh ban leh iaka kam. Kane ka pyni iaka jingtbit ki shipai jongngi haka kam kumba ngi lah dep thmu.“Kane ka dei ka jingmaham khamtam ia ki katto katne ki riewshimet,ki hehspah, ki MLA,ki Minister ba kim dei ban pyni bor ia ka seng ioh ba lada ngi pynibor kylla ka iing ka sem ba phi shong phi sah kan kylla dpei artad”.Ka seng ka maham ruh iaka Star cement ba lada kam sangeh ban tih ia u mawshun na brishyrnot, ka HNLC kam banse ban hiarthma biang ia katei ka karkhana.Kane ka jingjia kan long ruh ka khubor sha ka tnad kampohiing ba lada U Amit shah u dang kuman ban weng ia ki jingeh ka Jaidbynriew kumba lah angnud daki paid Hynñiewtrep,ka HNLC kan dang iaibteng shuh shuh ia ki kam pyntriem ki jong ka,  ong ka kyrwoh na U bah Saińkupar Nongtraw, General secretary cum Publicity secretary,HNLC.
title: Kit khlieh ka HNLC, halor ka jing pynbthei bom ha Khliehriat

content: Shillong: Ki runar ki bym pat lah ban tip ki dei kiei ki la pynbthei da uwei u bom IED ha ka ktem pulit lane ka Police Reserve kaba don ha Khliehriat, East Jaiñtia Hills.Kane ka jingjia ka la Jia ha ka step jong ka Sngi Balang ha ka por 1:30 eiei. Wat la utei u bom u la bthei, hynrei ym shym la don ba ïap ne mynsaw.Na ka Liang u SP ka East Jaiñtia Hills, u la ïathuh ba la phah wan da ki kynhun pulit na Shillong ban peit bniah ïa katei ka jaka bad ka jingtohkit ka la sdang ban lap ïa kiba donkti.
title: Da u bom IED, pynbthei ha Police Reserve Khliehriat

content: Ha la ‘weibriew nga ïam pangnud,Namar jong pha ko Ri;Lawei ka Ri, pateng ba bud,Shano kin lam lynti?Ki lum kj them, ki riat ki lhuh,Kumjuh ki ki kshaid ki krem;Ki kyang ki ud, ki khih ki kyiuh,Ah! Mano ban sngew lem?Ki khun ka Ri ki sdang leh klet,Ïa la jjnglong kyrpang;Dustur nongwei ka sdang kiew khet,Ïa tynrai ka pyntroiñ.Riti dustur, kolshor tynrai,U khun Khasi Khara;Suki suki ka nang ring swai,Bym don b’ñiewkor ïa ka.Ka ktien thylliej jong u Khasi,B’la ai kyrpang d’u Blei;Ka swai katba nang mih ki sngi,B’la bang ka ktien nongwei.Ki khwan myntoi, ki khwan shimet,Ïa pha ki die tat-dor;Namar ki sbai ïa pha ki khñiot,‘La Ri khlem da ñiewkor.Poiwir poihap, u dkhar – lyngkien,Na ki hima bapher;U sdang thombor, u nangroi byllien,Bym don ba ker ba da.Jaka puta jong u Khasi,La nang shah klun shah shah khñiot;Ah! Sangsot ïa pha ko Ri,Mano ban thung ï’u pud?Ki ‘lei san snem, ki nongmihkhmat,B’la jied ban khmih ka Ri;Kim shlan ban mih ban tur shakhmat,Ba kham kor ka shuki.Ki aiñ khyllah – aiñ ïakjakor,Jong ka meinah India;Ki kjiap, ki khñiot bad ki thombor,Ïa pha ko Ri jong nga.La slem la jngai jingsuk ngi thrang,Ha ka ka jong ka Ri;Ngi khih ngi ksar, ngi ïam ngi kyang,Ban lait n’u mynder ri.Marwei haba nga ju puson,Namar lawei ka Ri;Kat bym pat lait na u ‘dohïong’,Jingsuk ka jngai lynti.Ko khun ka ri Tipbriew – Tipblei,Sa shisien to ngin ïeng;Namar ka Ri ngin len lade,Ba ka suk ka pateng.Ki mangkariang to ngor to khet,Ba Ri kan roi kan bha;Ï’u ingkhongshyllangmat to beh,Sha trai, shapoh ñiamra.Ko Ri jong nga, ko Ri jong nga,Nga kitbok nga kitrwiang;Ba phan nang roi, ba phan nang bha,Kyrhai ha man ki liang.Nga ruh kumjuh sa shibit shen,Ngan sa leit noh nangne!Katba dang im lade ngan len,Ngan ïap namar jong pha.
title: KO RI JONG NGA

content: Shillong: Kiba ioh pang covid mynta ka sngi, ki don 422ngut bad kiba jem, ki don 458ngut  bad kiba iap, ki don 3ngut.Kiba dang don ha ka jingpang, haduh mynta, ki long 3,925ngut bad kiba iap, ki la poi sha ka 921ngut.Ka East Khasi hills, ka hiar jur mynta ka sngi, ha kaba ki don 121 ngut kiba ioh pang, ka West Garo hills, ka kiew bha, da ka jingdon ki 131 ngut kiba ioh pang bad ka Ribhoi, ka don 86ngut.
title: Kiew ka West Garo hills, ha ka jingdon kiba ih pang covid 19

content: Nongpoh:Ki la don da ki spah ngut ki riew paidbah ha ryngkat ka jingdon ki trai bad nongniah Mahindra Pick-up, hynnin ka sngi ki la mih paidbah, na ka bynta ban maramot ia ki bynta ba la sniew palat ka surok iaid kali kaba don ha shnong Umtrai, Ri Bhoi District.Haba maramot ia katei ka surok, la iohi ba ki nongniah kali bad ki riew paidbah, ki la trei shitom shaba palat ban shna pynbha ia katei ka surok, khnang ba katei ka surok kan long ban iaid kali, namar lada ieh kumno hi kumba ka ju long, kaba mut ba katei ka surok kam long shuh ban iaid kali bad kaba la pynjynjar eh ia ki paidbah, kiba pyndonkam ia katei ka surok.Katei ka surok kaba la mih ban maramot hi da ki nongniah kali bad u MDC, ka dei ka surok kaba pyniasoh na shnong Umjari sha Umtrai ter ter shaduh Umsiang khappud bad ka Assam. Ka jingsniew katei ka surok ka la wanrah jingeh ia ki paidbah kiba sah ha katei ka thain, namar ka dei ka surok kaba donkam tam bad kaba pyniasoh ia kiba bun tylli ki shnong kiba don ha katei ka thain.Haba iadei bad katei ka jingmaramot surok, u Bah Charles Marngar, kum uwei na kiba la don bynta lang ha katei ka jingmaramot ia katei ka surok, u la ai ka jingkhublei kaba kyrpang eh ia kitei ki nongniah kali, kiba la longkloi ban mih hi na ka bynta ban maramot ia katei ka surok, kaba la shah iehbein ha ka sorkar mynta la bun bun snem.Khlem da kren ne kynthoh iano iano ruh, u Bah Charles Marngar, u la ong ba ka sorkar ka la dei ban pyrkhat kyrpang na bynta ka jingdonkam ki paidbah ha katei ka thain, kaba lah ruh ban ong ba ka dei kawei na ki thain kaba la long kum ka thain khappud bad kaba long kaba donkam eh ia ka sorkar ba kan pynbiang ia ka jingdonkam ki paidbah ha katei ka thain bad khamtam eh haba iadei bad ki lynti syngkien.
title: Ba sniew palat ka surok, mih ki nongniah kali bad u MDC ban maramot surok Umtrai

content: Jowai:Ki ar tylli ki sengbhalang ki la wan ban dawa na u DC ka WJH ban plie noh ia ki iing Mane ha ki shnong bapher bapher ka District.Kitei ki ar tylli ki seng kiba kynthup ia ka All Hynñiewtrep People United Front (AHPUF) bad ka Khasi Jaiñtia National Union (KJNU) mynta ka sngi kila leit buh da ka dorkhas ha u Deputy Commissioner ka West Jaiñtia Hills District u bah Garod L.S.N Dykes (IAS) ban iathuh ha u ba ki iew ki hat mynta la plie kumba 50 percent bad dawa ruh ban plie noh sa ia ki iing mane.U President ka AHPUF, u J. Phawa bad u President ka KJNU u N. Shadap ki la pynsngew ha utei u khlieduh ka District ba un ailad ban plie noh ïa ki jaka mane Blei ne ki ïing mane hapoh ka District bad bad ban phah jingtip ruh sha ka sorkar jylla bad kitei ki ar seng ki dawa ia kane ka juh ha baroh kawei ka jylla ha ryngkat ki SOPs jong ka tnad ka koit ka khiah ne ka sorkar jylla.
title: Dawa plie jaka mane Blei, ki ar seng

content: Jowai:Na ka bynta ban pynneh ia ka shnongsuk shongsain ha khappud ka West Jaintia Hills bad Karbi-Anglong mynta ka sngi, ka kynhun jong ka Ka Hynñiewtrep Border Disputed Redressal Forum (HBDRF) ha ryngkat ka Hynñiewtrep Women Welfare Development Organisation (HWWDO) ki la buh ka dorkhas ha u Deputy Commissioner ka West Jaintia hills, na ka bynta ban pynlong iaka jingïakren bad ki bor District ka Karbi Anglong Assam kumba la ju leh na ka por sha ka por.Katkum ki rangbah nongialam ki ka HBDRF ki la iathuh ba ka seng kala pynkhreh ban lum ia ki kot ki sla ha ka jingiadei bad u pud u sam, na ka bynta kitei ki jaka kiba dang don hapdeng ka jingiakhajia pud bad ka Block-1, la pyntip ruh ba ladon ka jingialang ha ka 10.07.2021 ha ka shnong Mukroh bad ha ka 12.07.2021 ha ka shnong Khanduli haka jingiadei bad kane ka kam.“Na ka por sha ka por ka la don beit ka jingshah pyndik lane shah thombor ki briew jong ka jylla kumban shu pynkynmaw ba ha ka snem 1971-72 ruh kala don ka jingphetwir ki briew jong ka jylla sha ka shnong Barato Mukroh tang na ka daw ba ki ïakhih ban iasoh sha Meghalaya haka por ba ioh state ka jylla bad bud pat sa ka jingphet wir kaba la jia ha u snem 2003 sha Sahkwe Sahsniang.Kitei ki nongialam ki la pynkynmaw ruh, ba ha ki bnai 10 bad 11 jong u 2003 hadien ka jingiakren hapdeng u Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla u bah (L) E.K Mawlong bad u Myntri Rangbah ka Assam u P.K Mahanta halor ki kam pud kam sam.La pynsngew ruh ha u DC ba ka jingiakhih jong ki na ka bynta u pud u sam kam dei ka kam be-ain bad ka seng ka sheptieng ba ha kane ka sien kaba mynta ruh ioh ba kum kine ki jingjia ba sngewsih kin jia biang ia ki paradoh parasnam sha kitei ki thaiñ la pynkut u ma C. Sungoh Chairman ka HBDRF.
title: Halor ka shongsuk shongsain; dawa jingialang ka HBDRF na U DC

content: Jowai:U Deputy Commissioner ka West Jaintia Hills u la pyntip paidbah ba yn ai jingsumar khlem jingsiew eiei kynthup ia ki dawai bad ka bam ka dih ha baroh ki Corona Care Centre. Kane ka jing myntoi kan long tang ia kito ki nongpang Covid-19 kiba don ha ka thup A bad B.Ia kane yn pyntreikam mardor katkum ka jingbthah ka sorkar jylla tad haduh ban da pyn bna da kumwei pat.
title: Yn sumar ei ia ki nongpang Covid-19

content: Nongpoh:Lehse kan long kaba sngewphylla, hynrei ka long pat ka jingshisha ba uno uno u nongniah kali rit ha ki thain Umtrai, u hap ban ialam bun briew ha ryngkat ki Mohkhiew ha kali, lada u kwah ban leit na kawei ka shnong sha kawei pat bad haba ki dei iaid na ki surok iaid kali kiba don ha katei ka thain.Ka sakhi kaba shai eh halor katei ka jingeh ki nongniah kali bad ki riew paidbah ha katei ka thain, ka dei hadien ba la lap ia uwei na ki nongniah kali, uba leit ban shim dawai ia kawei ka khynnah bad uba dei ban iaid lyngba ka surok na Umjari sha Umtrai, ha kaba u la iohi ba u la hap ban ialam bun briew ha ryngkat ki Mohkhiew, khnang ba katei ka kali kaba u niah kan ioh ban iaid lyngba katei ka surok, kaba dei ruh kawei na ki surok kaba donkam tam na bynta ki paidbah ha katei ka thain.Haba iakren bad utei u nongniah kali uba dei na ka shnong Umpathaw, u la iathuh ba katei ka jaka kaba u mut ban leit (Umtrai), kaba don ia ka jingjngai kaba tang kumba katto katne Kilometer ei ei, hynrei tang namar ka jingsniew surok, ka la pynlong ia ki ba kim shim ia ka por da ki bun bun kynta.“Ngi la shimpor kumba 5 kynta ei ei ban poi sha ka jaka kaba ngi mut bad kaba don ia ka jingjngai tang kumba 20 Km eiei, nalor ba ngi hap ban iaid lyngba ka surok sniew, hynrei nalorkata ngi hap ruh ban ialam katto katne ngut ki briew ba rah Mohkhiew, khnang ba kin ioh ban niad ia ka kali bad ruh ba kin pynbha ha ki bynta ba ym lait ba iaid kali” ong utei u rangbah.Ka sur kaba la iohsngew na utei u rangbah bad ruh na ki briew kiba la leit ban iarap ia u ban pynpoi ia katei ka khynnah ba pang sha jaka sumar, ka long ba u kwah ba katei ka surok ba kan bha bad ba kan pynsuk ha ka leit ka wan ki paidbah ha katei ka thain, namar ba ki paidbah ha katei ka thain, ki la mad ia ka jingsohsat kaba shyrkhei eh na ka jingsniew ka surok ha katei ka thain, kaba dei ruh ka thain kaba iajan eh bad ka khappud Assam.
title: Hap ialam bun briew ha ryngkat ki mohkhiew bad lyngka, haba iaid lynti ha ki surok ka thain Umtrai, Ri Bhoi

content: Shillong:Ki Dkhot jong ka Sur u Paidbah ka Bri U Hynniewtrep, myn hynnin ka sngi ki la ia kynduh ia u myntri rangbah ka jylla u Conrad K Sangma, ban iakren halor ki jingeh kaba ngat ha ki nongshong shnong ha ki thain khappud na daw ba ym pat lah ban pynbeit ia u pud u sam ha pdeng ka jylla Assam bad ka Jylla Meghalaya.Haba iakren bad ki lad pathai khubor na ka liang u Eugenestar Kurkalang General Secretary ka KSUP7T, u la iathuh ba ki nongshong shong kiba sah ha ka thain khappud ki don ha ka jingeh kaba khraw, namar ba kim ioh ia u khaw ration, kim don ia ka jingbylla 100 sngi, kim don skul bad surok ba bha, ha kaba ki don hapdeng ka jingeh ka ba khraw.U la iathuh ba ha kane ka jingiakynduh la iakren halor ka jingeh jong ki nongshong shnong ha Block I,II,ha Khanapara, ha Nongwah Mawtamur,ka Nongkhlaw bad Langpih.U la iathuh ruh ba don ki jaka ki ba la jah noh na ka jylla Meghalaya kum ka elaka Labang nong phyllut kaba haduh u snem 2000 ka dang don bad ka jylla, ynrei mynta kane ka elaka ka la jah noh bad mynta ka sngi la ioh ban ia kren ban wad ka lad ka lynti ban wanrah biang ia kane ka elaka sha ka jylla.Ha kaba ia dei bad ka Nongwah Mawtamur, kaba hap hapoh ka Hima Sohiong, hynrei bun na kine ki jaka ha kane ka thain ki la jah lut na ka jylla Meghalaya.Ki la iakren ruh halor ka Langpih bad Ratacherra.U bah Rasting Thabah Chairman ka KSUP7T u la iathuh ba ha kane ka jingia kynduh ka seng ka la ai jingmut ia ka sorkar ba ka dei ban buh ia ki kyrteng jong ka shnong ki ba don ka jingia ka jia ha ka website jong ka sorkar jylla.U la ong “Kumba la pynpaw da ka sorkar ba ka ki 12 tylli ki shong ki dei ki ba don ka jingiakajia kumta ngi la ai jingmut ia ka sorkar ba ka dei ban buh ia kine ki kyrteng ha ki website namar ba tang ha poh block 1 ruh ki don haduh 31 tylli ki shnong ki ba hap hapoh ka Labang Nongpynlut Daloiship. Ki la ai jingmut ruh halor ban pynlong ia ka dorbar kyrpang ban thaw da ka Meghalaya Boundary Commitee bad kyntu ruh na ka sorkar ban pyllait pisa T1 klur na ka bynta ban wanrah kam pynroi ha ki thain khappud.
title: Ki nong shong khappud, kim ioh khaw reshon, kim ioh bylla 100 sngi, ong ka KSUP7T

content: Shillong:Ki dkhot jong ka Joint Action Commitee against Umngot Hydro Power Project, myn hynnin ka sngi ki la iakynduh ia u myntri rangbah ka sorkar jylla u Conrad K Sangma ban dawa na ka sorkar ba ka dei ban pynduh noh ia ka jingthmu ban den ia ka Wah Umngot.Haba iakren bad ki lad pathai khubor na ka liang ka kong Merisha Nongrum ka dkhot jong ka JAC ka la iathuh ba lada ka sorkar ka iaid shakhmat ban den ia ka wah Umngot ki nongrep naduh ka shnong Nongjrong terter sha duh Dawki kin shah ktah jur.La iathuh ruh ba kumba 20 haduh 25 tylli ki shnong ki ba im jakpoh na ka kam jngohkai pyrthei ki shah ktah jur ha ki thain West Jaintia Hills bad kumba 12 tylli ki shnong ha ki ba shaniah ia ka rep kariang ha East Khasi Hills kin shah ktah jur.Na ka liang u K.M Ryngksai u General Secretary ka JAC u la iathuh ba ha kane ka jingiakynduh na ka liang u Myntri rangbah u la pynpaw ba ka sorkar kan dang bishar bniah halor kane ka project bad kin dang donkam ban jurip shuwa bad lada lap ba kane ka project kan don jingktah ka sorkar ka lah ban pynduh noh ia kane ka jingthmu ban den ia la wah Umngot.U la pynpaw ruh ba ka JAC ka dawa ban pynduh noh ia ka Umngot Hydro Power Project hynrei kan kyrshan pat ia kiwei ki mini Hydro Project ki ba ka sorkar ka thmu ban shna kum ha Leshka,Amshar bad kiwei kiwei.
title: Sangeh noh, ia ka jingthmu ban den ia ka Wah Umngot, ong ka JAC

content: Ki shipai jong ka  South Africa, ki la mih ban pahara ha ki surok bah, hadien ba ka la don ka jing ia kynad kaba jur ha katei ka Ri, na ka jingshah set phatok U President barim jong katei ka ri, U Jacob Zuma. Haduh ba thoh ia kane ka khubor, la iathuh ba ki don 45 ngut kiba iap, ha katei ka jing ia thang iing thang sem bad ka jing kulmar, kaba la jia ha ki bynta bapher jong ka Ri.Ka jing ia kynduh, ka dei hadien ba la leit ialam ia U Zuma (79), ba un shong patok, halor ka kam bam sap jongu, ha ka por, ba u don ha ka sorkar 9 snem kynthih, kaba kut haduh u snem 2018 bad U Zuma, u dei ban shong phatok 15 bnai kynthih.Halor katei ka rai, ka la mih ka jing ia kynad kaba jur, ha kaba ki don 10ngut kiba shah siat iap ha Gauteng bad 26ngut ha  KwaZulu-Natal bad la iathuh ba ka jingiap, ka dei ruh na ka jing ia knieh bam bad nangta ki don sa kiba leit khynra ia ki dukan, ban tuh ia ki tiar ki tar bad ki jingbam jingdih.Ki don mynta 800ngut ki briew, kiba la shah kem, ha ki bynta bapher jong katei ka Ri, hadien ba ka jing ia kynad, ka la iai bteng naduh ka sngi palei ba ladep.Ki don shibun ki iing, kiba la shah thang ha Pietermaritsburg, kaba don ka shnong trai jong U Zuma, ha ka jylla  KwaZulu-Natal (KZN). Ka jingbun ki riew paidbah, kiba pyn kulmar, ka la buh jingeh ia ki pulit, ba kin teh lakam bad pynher krad ia ki paidbah, ha ki bynta jong ka  KwaZulu-Natal bad ka jyla Gauteng, ha kaba ka don ka nongbah jong ka South Africa, ka  Johannesburg.
title: Kulmar ha South Africa, ba shah set phatok U President barim, iap 45ngut

content: Shillong: Ha ka jingialeh ban iai bteng ban kyntiew ia ka rukom synshar ba don bynta lem bad kiba don jingmyntoi ia u paidlang baroh, u Myntri ka Tnad Forests & Envrironment, u James K. Sangma ha ka 13 tarik u Naitung 2021 u la iakynduh ia u Naba Bhattacharjee, Morningstar Khongthaw bad Nicholas J Kharnami ha kaban iatai bniah na ka bynta ka jingroi bad jingsan ba thymmai ha ka mei mariang, ki khlaw ki btap bad ka jingkylla ha ka mariang ha ka Jylla Meghalaya hi baroh kawei. Ka jingthmu ha lyndet jong kane ka long ban kner bad ban kynjoh jingmut sha ki paidbah byllien kiba ieid ia ka mei mariang bad kiba don ka jingthrang ha kaban sumar bad ri ia ka katkum ka jinglah jong ki.U Sangma u la ong, “Nga don ka jingthrang ban thaw ia ka rukom ialam lane nuksa haba ngi peit ia ka mariang lyngba ka jingiashimbynta lang ha ka rukom synshar ha kaba ngin pdiang sngewbha ia ki jingai jingmut bad ki jingiohi jong ki briew ka Jylla na ka bynta ka lawei kaba bha. Ka jinglyngshop jong ka khlam COVID ka la khyrnait ia ngi baroh bad ka la pynkyndit bynriew ba ngi dei ban shim ia ki sienjam kiba mardor ban ialeh pyrshah bad khanglad ia ki jingjulor ban dang jia nangne shakhmat”.U Naba Bhattacharjee, uba dei u Ophisar ba la shongthait jong ka Tnad Forest u la ai jingmut, “Ngi donkam ban bud nuksa ia ki dienjat jong ki longshuwa manshuwa bad ia ki jingpynshongdor tynrai ki jong ki ha ka Jylla khnang ban ri bad sumar ia ka khlaw ka btap, ki dieng ki siej, u syntiew u skud. Donkam shikatdei eh ban wallam pat ia kine ki jingpynshongdor tynrai jong ki thawlang bad iawbei, ki meitymmen patymmen khasi, Jaintia bad Garo jong ngi lada ngi thrang ban ri bad sumar ia ka mei mariang.”U Bah Morningstar Khongthaw, uba dei u nongseng jong ka Living Bridge Foundation iba la bna nam shibun ha kaban sumar ia ki jingkieng ba thaw da ki thied dieng ha Rangthylliang, Pynursla u la iathuh, “Ka jingdonkam ba mardor ha kane ka juk ka ia kaba mynta ka long ba ki dei ban pynshlur ia ki khynnah samla ha ki skul bad ki kolej ba kin ioh ia ki jinghikai shaphang ka mariang bad ym tang ban shu kut tang ha ki kot ki sla hynrei ba kin iohlad ruh ban thung bad ban ri ban sumar ia ki. Ka jingai jinghikai sha ki paidbah ka Jylla shaphang ki jingkieng da ki thied dieng bad kumno ban thaw ia ki lyngba ki jingstad bad rukom ba ju pyndonkam ki patymmen jong ngi ka long kaba donkam shikatdei eh khnang ban sumar ia ka nongkynti bad ban iarap ruh ban sumar ia ka riti ka dustur.U bah Nicholas J Kharnami, uba dei u RJ bad u nongseng jong ka Pla Iew u la bynrap, ”Ngi la duh ia ki jinghikai bad ki jingpynshongdor tynrai namar ka jingpdiang ka jong ngi ia ki riti ki dustur jong kiwei pat ki jaitbynriew haduh ba ngi la klet ia la ki jong. Lada ngi kwah ba ngin ri bad sumar ia ka mei mariang ngi donkam ban phaidien bad ban bud biang ia ki rukom bad ki jinghikai jong u thawlang ka Iawbei. Ha kajuh ka por, u la ai jingmut ba ngi dei ban khmih thuh ia ka kamai ka kajih jong u paidbah khnang ban pynthikna ia ka jingroi jingpar khlem da wanrah ia ka jingduhnong lane jingjulor ia ka mariang.”U James Sangma u la iathuh ba ka Sorkar kan shimkhia na ka bynta ban iai bteng ia ka jingsumar ia ki jingkieng da ki thied dieng ha ka Jylla lyngba ka jingstad technology ba jer kyrteng “Baubotanik”. U la bynrap ruh da kaba iathuh ba u la tyrwa kum ka jingpyrkhat sha ka Sorkar ban wanrah ia ki kitab jingpule ha ki skul ban ai jinghikai shaphang ka jingkylla ha ka mariang (climate change curriculum) namar ka jingkylla sted jong ka pyrthei ban wanrah ia kata ka roi ka par kaban nym ktah ia ka mariang bad nangne shakhmat ki rukom ba lah ban kyrshan kin dei ki rukom ba hap ban long ki sienjam.“Ka Jylla ka jong ngi ka long kaba dang lung bha bad nga khmih lynti ia kane ba kan long kata ka kabu ksiar kaban pynkylla dur khnang ban wanrah ia ka jingduna ha ka jingpom dieng pathar pynban yn pynkylla ia kane sha kata ka jingroi jingpar kaban pynmih thymmai,” u la kdew.
title: U nongseng ka Pla iew bad u nong sumar diengjri, ia kynduh u myntri khlaw

content: Shillong:Ha ka sngi ba ar jong ka 13 tarik u Naitung 2021, ki Bishop jong ka ñiam Catholic kiba don hapoh ka North East India, ki la pynrem ia ka jingshah pynjot pynpra ka iingmane kaba don ha Chattarpur da ka South Delhi district ha ka sngi Nyngkong kata ha ka 12 tarik u Naitung 2021.U Archbishop jong ka Guwahati, u John Moolachira bad u President jong ka North East India Regional Bishops’ Council (NEIRBC) ki la ong ba kane ka khubor ka la pynkyndit shikat dei eh bad ka la pynsngewsih ruh haduh katta katta.Ka iingmane Little Flower kaba don ha Lado Sarai ka la shah pynjot pynpra ha ka South Delhi Municipal Corporation ha kaba ki la ong ba katei ka ingmane ka la tei ha ka jaka thung jingthung jong ka Sorkar da ki katto katne ngut ki briew .Haba kren lyngba ka NEIRBC, ki Archbishop ki la ong ba kane ka jingpynpra pynjot ia ka iingmane kaba don ha Delhi ka la ktah shikatdei eh ia ka jingsngew ki riewngeit Khristan ym tang ha Delhi hynrei ha kylleng kylleng ka ri, bad shuh shuh ki la ong ba kum kine ki jingjia ki la jia la bunsien ha kine ki por ba la leit noh kiba kynthup ha kiba bun ki jaka jong ka North East India.U President jong ka NEIRBC President u la ong, “Balei ban leh kyrkieh ban pynjot pynpra ia ka jaka mane kaba la don hangto la kumba palat 10 snem tam? Ka Municipal Corporation ka dei ban ai por ia ka iingmane ban shim da kiwei ki lad ki lynti ban iakren hashwa ban pynjot pynpra ia ka iingmane.”Shuh shuh utei u President u la ong,”Katei ka jingleh kyrkieh kam shym la ktah tang ia ka jingsngew ki riewngeit khristan hynrei ka la shet kylla ruh ia ki rukom treikam kiba rieh jong ki nongtrei sorkar”.Ka jaka ba la pynieng ia katei ka iingmane ka dei ba la ai sngewbha sha ka Diocese jong ka Faridabad Syro-Malabar Diocese 12 snem mynshwa ban ia mane bad pynlong jingiaseng na ka bynta ki 1500 ngut ki nongshong shnong ka Katholic.Haba pynkynmaw ruh ia ka jingkhang ban tei ia ka iingmane kaba don ha Arunachal Pradesh bad ka hukum ban pynpra pynjot ruh ia ki iingmane hapoh Manipur kaba ialam sha ka jingiakhih pyrshah bad ka jingbym shongthait ha ki bynta jong ka Northeast, ki Archbishop ki la ong ba ka jingpynpra pynjot ia ka iingmane kaba don ha Delhi ka lah pynlong ka jingialam bakla bad ka jingai mynsiem ia ki jaka kiba don ki kynhun nongtuh”.“Ngi kyrpad ia ka sorkar bad ka municipal corporation ba kim dei ban pynjot ia ki jaka mane jong ki paidbah bad ba kim dei ban pyndik ia ka jingshongsuk shongsaiñ jong ki riewngeit kiba don hapoh ka Ri,” la kyrpad ki Archbishop.“Ngi duwai ba ka jingsuk, ka jingioh hok bad ka jingshongsuk ba kan don ha ka ri jong ngi,” la ong ki Archbishop.
title: Pynrem jur ki Bishop jong ka North East ia ka jingshah pynpra pynjot ka iingmane ha Delhi

content: Shillong: U Director ka tnad ka koit ka khiah, u Dr Aman War u la kyntu ia ki nongshong shnong ba ka long kaba donkam ban mih sha khmat ban ai dawai iada corona, ia lade, namar ba lyngba ka jingai dawai iada, kan iada ym tang ia ki, hynrei kan iada ruh ia ki khyllung khynnah ki ba ym pat lah ban ai vaccine ban iada na kane ka khlam.La iathuh ba haduh mynta ka don ka jingkynran dien lane ka jingsheptieng jong kiba bun ban ai injek, ym tang ha ki thain nongkyndong, hynrei wat ha ki thain sor ruh. Ha Shillong kumba 70 % ki briew ki la ioh vaccine, hynrei ha ki thain nongkyndong kum ha ki District jong ka South Garo Hills,North Garo Hills bad East Garo Hills ka jingai vaccine ka dang duna palat, katba ka East Khasi Hills, ka West Garo Hills bad ka South West Garo Hills ki la kiew bha ha ka jingioh Vaccine.U Dr War u la ong “Katba dang bun ki briew ki ba mih sha khmat ban shim Vaccine katta kan dang lah ban iada ia ki khyllung khynnah ki ba ym pat long ban ai vaccine bad ia ki tymmen na ka jingiabit kane ka jingpang Covid bad ka dei ruh ka jingkitkhlieh jong uwei pa uwei u nongshong shnong”.U Dr War u la iathuh ba kum ki doctor ki la ioh i ia ki briew ki ba khlem pat ioh vaccine ki ba ngat ha ka jingpang Covid ki shah ktah jur ha kane ka jingpang bad duh ruh wat la ka jingim ba kordor hynrei ki don ki briew ki ba la ioh vaccine, wat la ki ngat ha ka jingpang Covid hynrei ki ioh jingkoit ba pura.Na ka liang u Dr War, u la kyntu ia ki nongshong shnong ha ka jylla ba kim dei ban sheptieng bad ki dei ban shim ka jingkitkhlieh ban iada ia lade bad ia kiwei da ka ba kin wan sha khmat ban shim ia ka vaccine.
title: Duna palat, kiba injek iada corona ha South Garo, North Garo bad East Garo hills

content: Shillong: Kiba iap corona mynta ka sngi, ki long ka kong Ibashisha Tariang, (41) na Nongrah Nonglum, East Khasi Hills, kaba iap ha iing.U Madan Mohan Das, (66) na Mawbah, Shillong, East Khasi, ka Vishnu Maya Chetri, (62) na Pynthorumkhrah, East Khasi, U Bikram Thapa, (45) na Umpling, Lumdiengmet, East Khasi, uba la leit rah sha NEIGHRIMS, Shillong, ynda ula dep iap, ha ka 10tarik Naitung 2021.U Bah Anthony Bareh, (48) na Saphai, West Jaintia Hills.
title: Kiba iap corona mynta ka sngi

content: Shillong: Ka tnat kam poh iing jong ka Sorkar Pdeng ka la kyntu ia ka Central Bureau of Investigation (CBI) ba kan tohkit ia ka rukom khlad ka Rosy Sangma bad u Samuel Sangma.Kane ka iadei bad ka jingkhlad jong ka Rosy Sangma ha kawei ka hospital ha Gurgaon ha ka 4 tarik u Jylliew mynta u snem hadien ba ka la leit phah sumar ha katei ka jaka. Hadien kane, u Samuel Sangma, uba dei u bahaiing jong ka Rosy Sangma, u la suba ba ka don ka jingleh torti ha ka rukom ai jingsumar ia ka Rosy, u la ia kajia bad ki doctor bad ki nongtrei jong katei ka hospital. Ha ka sngi kaba bud, kata ha ka 25 tarik u Jylliew, ki pulit jong ka nongbah Delhi ki la ioh jingtip shaphang ka jingkhlad jong u Samuel Sangma ha New Delhi.Kiba haiing jong kine arngut ki samla ki la kynnoh ba ka Rosy Sangma ka la khlad namar ka jingleh torti ha kane ka hospital. Ki la kynnoh ruh ba ki nongtrei jong kane ka hospital ki la donkti ha ka jingkhlad jong u Samuel Sangma.
title: Kyntu ka tnat kam pohiing ia ka CBI ba kan tohkit ia ka rukom khlad ka Rosy Sangma bad u Samuel Sangma

content: Shillong: Kiba ioh pang covid mynta ka sngi, ki don 365 ngut bad kiba jem na ka jingpang, ki don 506 ngut, katba kiba iap, ki don 5ngut.Kiba dang don ha ka jingpang, ki long 3,964ngut bad kiba iap, ki la poi sha ka 918ngut baroh.Ka East Khasi hills, ka don 80ngut kiba ioh pang thymmai bad ka West Garo hills, ka don 61ngut.
title: 365 kiba ioh pang, 5ngut kiba iap corona ha ka jylla

content: Ka Nagaland Congress, ka pynsngew ba ka ain khang doh masi jong ka Assam, lane ka  Assam Cattle Preservation Bill 2021, kaba la leit rah ha ka iing dorbar jong ka Assam, hynnin ka sngi, kan long ka jingma kaba khraw, ka ban khanglad ia ka jingmlien  bam doh, kaba ki briew jong kane ka thain, ki la ju mlien.“Ka dei ka jingma kaba khraw ia ka jinglong jingman jong ki briew” ong U K Therie, President jong ka  Nagaland Congress, mynta ka sngi. Ula ong ba ka long kaba donkam, namarkata ban husiar bha, ha kaba pynlong ain, ia katei ka jingkhang bam doh, namar ba ka dei ka jingmlien jong u paidlang ka thain shatei lam mihngi.“Ka jing khaii masi sha ka thain shatei lam mihngi, ka iaid sha Bangladesh bad sha Myanmar ruh bad ka dei kaba ki briew, ki la ju trei shi lynter jingim bad ha kylleng ka jylla” ong U  Therie.U nongialam ka seng Congress, u ong ba ka jingma kaba kham jur, ka long ba ia katei ka ain, yn pyn donkam bakla, da kaba kynnoh kulmar ia ki briew bad u ong ruh ba katei ka ain, ka dei tang ka jing pynbud ia ka jingeh ki briew sha ri thor, katba kum ka jingkwah jong ka seng BJP.“Ngim lah ban pyn kylla ia ka rukom bam jongngi, kumba ki long sha ri thor bad kumta ngi dei ban long kiba adkhar, lem bad jinglong jong ka jaka kaba phi don” ong u heh Congress.
title: Ka ain khang doh masi, kan khanglad ia ka jingmlien bam doh sha ka dong mihngi, ong ka Congress Nagaland

content: Shillong: Ka  Seng kur lamin bakur-dawki unit, ka la leh burom  ia ki ASHA hapoh shnong bakur-dawki.Ha shwa ban sdang la leh shwa ia ka jingsngapjar kaba 2 minit, ban kynmaw ia ki rangbah jong ka kur kiba la khlad kum u Riangdoh Lamin, bu lamin, Rosiwel lamin kiba lah khlad na u covid19 bad kumjuh ruh ia baroh ki para shnong para thaw kiba lah khlad ha kum kine ki por namar ba ym shym la ioh lad ban ia leit sngewlem lang namar ka jingpynthut ka ne ka khlam.La ioh ruh ia ki kyntien sneng kyntien kraw na ki rangbah jong ka kur lamin war jaintia, ba kynthup ia  u wansuk lamin(secretary) bad chui lamin pohlynjar ( president). Ha katei ka prokram, la iadonlang ruh u waheh chnong bakur, ong ka kyrwoh na u secretary kur lamin bakur-dawki, Bah Jinesh lamin.
title: Pynkup burom ka Seng Kur Lamin Bakur Unit, ia ki ASHA

content: Shillong:Ka Deputy Commissioner jong ka East Khasi Hills distrik, ka Kong Isawanda Laloo, lyngba ka shithi ba la phah sha u Rev. Fr. Joby Joseph Manja kattil, St. Anthony’s College Shillong, ka la pynpaw ïa ka jingai khublei kaba kyrpang ïa u halor ka ka jingpyndonkam bad pynkylla ïa ka Mama Margret Hostel kum ka Post Covid 19 Facility.Ha ka shithi ka DC EKHD ka la ong, “Nga pynpaw ïa ka jingsngewnguh ïaphi bad ïa u Rector bad ïa ka kynhun baroh kawei halor ka jingai jingmynjur sngewbha ban pynkylla ïa ka shibynta jong ka Mama Margret Hostel, Laitumkhrah sha ka Post Covid 19 Facility na ka bynta jong ki nongtrei ka Nazareth hospital bad nga kyrpad ba phi donkam ban ïatreilang bad ka Hospital halor kane ka bynta,” ong ka Kong Laloo.Ha ka shithi ka la bynrap ruh da kaba ong, “Nga shim kane ka lad bad kabu ïa u Rector bad ïa ka kynhun baroh kawei halor kane ka jingsbun mynsiem halor ka jingim jong ki longbriew manbriew halor ka jingtyrwa ban pyndonkam ïa katei ka jaka.”Shuh shuh ka DC ka la pynpaw ba ka jingïatreilang bad ka jingkyrshan halor ka jingpyrshang ban ïakhun pyrshah ïa ka thma jong ka jingpang khlam Covid 19 kan ïarap ïa ka jingïaid lynti ka jylla ban ïakhun ïa kane ka thma, pynkut ka jingthoh na ka DC EKHD kaba long ruh ka Chairperson DDMA.Ha kawei pat ka liang, ka tyllong khubor ka ïathuh ruh ba na ka liang ka Balang Katholik ka la buh ruh ïa kumba 30 tylli ki jingthiah hapoh ka Don Bosco Hall, Laitumkhrah Shillong, ha ka sngi Saitjaiñ kum ka Covid 19 Care centre.
title: Ar tylli ki jaka, pynkylla ka Balang Katholik sha ki Covid care centre

content: Nongpoh:Ki Pulit ka Pilangkata Out post, ki la ioh ban bat haduh 9 tylli ki thuk thuk (Bike) kiba dei na ka jylla Assamtuh bad na ki katto katne ki shnong khappud kiba dei na Ri Bhoi, kaba la wan buhrieh da ki nongtuh ha ki ar jaka, kiba don ha ka thain Umtyrnga ha Ri Bhoi.Ka khana halor ka jingiohbat ki Pulit ia kitei ki Thuk thuk, ka dei hadien ba ki la shimkhia ia ka jingujor na ki paidbah kiba sah ha katei ka thain, ha kaba ki la ujor sha ki Pulit, ba ka la don ka jingjia shah tuh bike kaba na ka por sha ka por ha katei ka thain.Halor katei ka jingujor da ki riew paidbah, ki Pulit ki la kem shwa ia uwei u briew ba shah suba jur ba u donkti ha katei ka kam tuh thuk thuk bad haba ki la tohkit ia u, utei u briew u la leit ialam sha ka jaka kaba la buhrieh ia kitei ki Bike, kaba kitei ki nongtuh ki la buhrieh ha shnong Umsen bad ka shnong Nagrabil, ki shnong khappud ka Meghalaya-Assam, kiba don ha ka thain Umtyrnga.Ia ka kyrteng jong utei u suba donkti ha katei ka kam tuh, ki Pulit ki dang buhrieh, namar ki dang kwah ban iohkem shuh shuh ia kiwei pat kiba donkti ha katei ka kam tuh.Kitei ki Bike kaba la iohkem da ki Pulit ka Pilangkata OP, ki dei na ka jylla Assam bad Ri Bhoi, halor katei ka jingjia ki Pulit kin dang pynlong shuh shuh ia ka jingtohkit khnang ban lap ia ki jingshisha baroh bad khamtam eh halor ka jingpyniaid iew ia kitei ki Bike tuh.
title: 9 tylli ki thuk thuk shu tuh, lap ki Pulit na thain Umtyrnga

content: Shillong: Ka khlam corona, ka la trei tyngeh, ha kane ka kynti, ha kaba ki don 125 ngut ki nongtrei jong ka NEIGHRIMS, ba kynthup ia ki doktor, ki nos, ki ward attendant bad ki nongtrei hospital, kiba ioh ia katei ka khlam lane kiba don ha ka jingshong kyrpang ialade.Ka kyrwoh khubor, na U Dr Cornerstone Wann, Public relations office ka NEIGHRIMS, ka iathuh ba ka hospital, ka dang iai kit khia ban sumar ia kito kiba don ia katei ka jingpang, kiba shah sumar ha katei ka hospital ha NEIGHRIMS. La ong ruh ba ka NEIGHRIMS, kan iai bteng ban peit ia ki nongpang, kiba wan shah sumar na shabar ruh, na bynta ka jing myntoi jong u paidlang ka thain shatei lam mihngi.La pynsngew sha ki paidbah bad khamtam sha ki nongtrei ka  NEIGRIHMS, ba kin bud pyrkhing ia ki kyndon jing batai, ban iada na katei ka khlam, lada ki don ha hospital ne ha ki jaka paidbah ne ha iing ruh kumjuh.
title: 125ngut ki nongtrei ka NEIGHRIMS, ki la ioh ia ka khlam corona

content: Shillong: Katta nang mih ki sngi ki ia ka jingshyrkhei jong ki briew kiba ioh thymmai ia u Covid-19 ha ka jylla Meghalaya ki la nang bun nang bun ha kaba mynta ka sngi ka 24 tarik u Jymmang 2021 haduh 811 ngut ki briew ki la ioh thymmai ia u ne u jingpang ha kaba napdeng kine 559 ngut ki dei napoh East Khasi Hills, 5 ngut ki dei napoh East Garo Hills, 22 ki dei napoh East Jaiñtia Hills, 103 ki dei napoh Ri Bhoi, 10 ngut ki dei napoh North Garo Hills, 4 ngut ki dei napoh South West Garo, 4 ngut ki dei napoh South West Khasi, 77 ngut ki dei napoh West Jaiñtia Hills, 4 ngut ki dei napoh West Khasi Hills, k21 ngut ki dei napoh West Garo Hills.Kiba la khlad noh kane ka jingpang ha kine ki 24 kynta ki long 24 ngut ha kaba napdeng kine 17 ngut ki dei napoh East Khasi Hills, 3 ngut ki dei napoh West Jaiñtia Hills, 1 napoh West Garo Hills, 1 napoh East Jaiñtia Hills, 2 ngut napoh West Khasi Hills.Kiba la koit la khiah na kane ka jingpang myn ta ka sngi ki don haduh 679 ngut ha kaba 425 ngut ki dei napoh East Khasi Hill, 6 ngut ki dei napoh East Garo Hills, 21 ngut ki dei napoh East Jaiñtia Hills, 98 ngut ki dei napoh Ri Bhoi, 19 ngut ki dei napoh South West Garo, 44 ngut ki dei napoh West Garo Hills, 39 ngut ki dei napoh West Jaiñtia Hills, 23 ngut ki dei napoh West Khasi Hills, 3 ngut ki dei napoh South West Khasi, 1 napoh North Garo Hills.Kiba dang don mynta hapdeng kane ka jingpang ki la poi haduh 7,788 ngut, kiba iap baroh tad haduh mynta ka sngi ki don haduh 483 bad kiba la koit na kane ka jingpang tad haduh mynta ka sngi ki la don haduh 22,221 ngut.
title: Nang iai syllad tyngeh ka khlam Covid 19 ha kaba 811 ngut kiba ioh thymmai, 24 ngut kiba iap

content: “Ka dei ka burom kaba khraw lada ngi trei la ka kam lajong khamtam lei lei lada ngi lah ban pynroi ia ka man la ka por. Te ka jingkylli ka long hato ngi lah ban ieng marwei? Ka jubab ka long ‘em’ ia kiba bun bad hoid tang iwei ne arngut eh. Phim lah lait na ka Bank, Agency, lada phi kwah ban kyntiew ia la ka kam. Hynrei kawei kaba nga kwah ban pashat jingmut ha phi ka long ba phi dei ban seng da ka kynja sosaiti (Society). Kane ka dei ka lynti kaba bha eh. Tangba ban seng ia kane ka sosaiti ka donkam eh ia ka jingsngewthuh jingmut, ka jingiatylli bad ka jingthikna ka rukom treikam. Lymda kumta kan khyllem kumba khyllem ka kynroh Jerikho.Kumba kren noh khyndiat ia kane ka jaitbynriew jong ngi, ka pynshitom jingmut shibun eh ban kyrsiew thiah ia kane ka jaitbynriew jong ngi. Ngi phong bun jait ki uniphom na kata ka daw ka kylla bun rong la kum uto u chameleon. Ka jingbymia sngewthuh, ka jingiapait bad ka jingkwah laitluid palat ki dei ki daw tynrai. Dei ban pynkhiah naduh tynrai shwa. Lada ai da ka bih kin shu iap lut hynrei dei ban shu riam ba lada ngat iwei kiwei kin ithuh ne pei shkor. Kane ka jinglong mangkariang ka pyntieng wat ia kito kiba heh spah kiba don jingmut ne mynsiem ia kane ka jaitbynriew tham.Ka jingdon ka sosaiti ka pyllait na ka jingshim kabu ki bank, ki nongairam. Ka sosaiti ka airam ia ki nongrep, nongdie dukan rit, nongtrei kam lajong ha ka sut kaba jem shibun. Haba ki siew hok bad ki pyndonkam hok ka long kum ka tanki (tankey) um kaba lah ban ai um sha kiba bun ki longiing kiba treikam lajong. Ka ri Germany ka dei ka ri kaba bet ia une u symbai bad la pynbud da kiwei pat ter ter haduh kine ki por jong ngi mynta” khublei shibun u la pynkut.Ka dei ka pali sa u nongkren uba lai ban ieng. Une ruh u dei uba deng iitkhmat iong tangba uba lieh bad lyngkhot.“Nga ai khublei ia u shongknor bad kumjuh ruh ia phi ki paidbah jong ka shnong. La pynbeit ia ngi ba ngin kren ha la ka jong ka jong ka bynta. Ka Ri Khasi-Jaintia jong ngi ka dei kaba la kyrkhu kyrpang da u Blei. Phai kat shaba phai iohi tang ia ka lynti jingkyrkhu – peit u dewiong, u mawshun, u shyiap, ki kynbat dawai, u mawshynrut, ka rep ka riang kaba bha ha la ki thain ki thain – Bhoi, War, Khynriam, Pnar. Ki wahbah wahrit byllai byllien, ki jaka jngohkai kiba pynjem thait ki don kyrhai khamtam ha ki thain Sohra. Sha thain War Pynursla ruh ki don tangba yn leh kumno khlem pat poi surok. Khlem sngewlah ngeit ba tang namar ka jingdon ki kshaid, ki wah, ki riat, ki pung, umshit, kan long kum ka jingkyrkhu ba na sha lyndet. Kine ki dei ki jaka kiba ngi lah ban thaw pisa ha ryngkat lang ka jingtreilang ki bor sorkar. Ka ri jong ngi ka don sha kyndong eh ka India hynrei baroh ka pyrthei ka tip lut ia ka jingitynnad jong kane ka jaka. Shim ia kane ka kabu lada don kano kano ka jaka itynnad ha shnong ne ha thain jong phi. Iasyllok bad ia mir jingmut ban shna ia kata kaba ki ong ka ‘Tourist spot’. Ka jingmih na ka jylla jong ngi ka long kaba rit kam da dei eh kaba palat kumba long sha Ri-thor. Ki jingmih barit kum u phan, sohniamtra, sohkwit, sohmanir, shynrai bad kiwei kiwei de la shu pynsepei da kaba die tad dor ha u dkhar. Baroh ki ia bam chip, hynrei kim ju pyrkhat ba tang uwei u phan la die T5 tyngka ne T10 tyngka. Jin da dei ba thaw noh da ka karkhana rit ban shna hi ka la long ka jingkyrkhu ia ngi. Peit shuh shuh ia kito ki kha-lyer kiba die uto u dkhar ha ka dor T30 ne T50 tyngka. Tang shu ai tiak da u pin la shu sep ei ka lut T30 ne T50. Ha kaba pynkut, ngi dei ban long kum ki dkhiew – ka jingiatreilang ka wanrah ka jingjop. Khublei shibun.
title: LANO PAT???

content: BARABANKI: Ki dang don shibun ki briew, kiba artatien ia kane ka jing leh injek corona bad katei ka la jia ruh ha ka shnong Sirauhha jong ka  Barabanki, ha Uttar Pradesh.La iathuh ba haba ki briew jong ka tnat ka koit ka khiah, ki la leit sha katei ka shnong, ban ai injekshon ia kitei ki nongshong shnong, hynrei, ki don shi kynhun kiba tieng bad ki la kynthih ialade sha ka Wah Saryu.U Rajiv Kumar Shukla, Sub-Divisional Magistrate ka Ramnagar, u iathuh ba katei ka jingjia, ka la jia ha ka sngi saitjain ba ladep.La iathuh ba la pyn sngewthuh ia ki nongshong shnong, ba kin shah injek bad hadien ka jing batai kaba sani bha, ki don 18ngut kiba la mynjur ban shah injek. Ki nongshong shnong, ki iathuh ba kitei kiba kynthih shapoh um, ki sngewthuh bakla, ha kaba la don ba pynshoi ia ki, da kaba ki ong, ba katei kam dei ka injek iada corona, hynrei, ka dei ka injekshon, kaba long bih shi katdei.
title: Naba sheptieng, ia ka injek corona, kynthih ki shi kynhun shapoh wah

content: New Delhi: Ka India, ka don sa  2.22 lak ngut kiba ioh pang covid 19 ha ki 24 kynta ba ladep. Baroh kiba ioh pang, ki la poi mynta sha ka  2.67 klur ngut.Ha ki 24 kynta ba ladep, ki don  4,454 ngut kiba iap bad baroh kiba iap, ki la poi mynta sha ka  3,03,720 na ka khlam covid.Ka jing trei tyngeh kane ka kylla kaba ar, ha ka Ri, ka la pynlong ia ka India, ba kan duh ia bun bah ki jingim briew bad ka dei ka Ri, kaba lai ha ka pyrthei, ha ka jingbun kiba iap, lait noh ka Brazil bad ka United States. Tang mynta u bnai Jymmang, ki don 90 hajar ngut kiba iap bad sa 80lak ngut kiba ioh pang ha ka Ri baroh kawei.Ha ki 24 kynta ba ladep, ka  Tamil Nadu, ka don 35,483 ngut, ka   Maharashtra, da  26,672 ngut, ka Karnataka da 25,979 infections, ka Kerala da 25,820 ngut bad ka  Andhra Pradesh da 18,767 bad ka bud sa ka  Uttar Pradesh, kaba dei ka jylla, kaba don bun bah kiba pang haduh mynta.
title: 2.22lak ngut kiba ioh pang bad 4,454 kiba iap covid ha India

content: Nongpoh: Na ka bynta ban pynsuk ia ki nongtrei ka koit ka khiah, ki bor pyniaid District ka Ri Bhoi lem bad ka tnat Urban Affairs hapoh ka Distrik, ki la rai ban pynkylla ia ka Housing for Urban Poor, ki iing baduk kiba don hapoh ka shnong Umbuda ha Nongpoh, kum ka jaka sah ba shipor da ki briew kiba trei ha ka koit ka khiah.Kitei ki iing baduk ka sorkar ha Umbuda, ki don kumba 44 tylli ki iing, ha kaba kane ka tnat ka dang thmu ban pyndep ruh sa katto katne ki iing hashwa ban aiti pat sha ka Nongpoh Town Committee ban jied ia ki longiing kiba donhok ban sah ha kitei ki iing.Ka Kong RM Kurbah, DC Ri Bhoi, ka la iathuh ruh, ba ka nongrim kaba la pynlong ia ki Bor District ka Ri Bhoi, ban pynlong jaka sah ba shipor da ki briew ka koit ka khiah, ka dei halor ka nongrim, ba don napdeng ki doctor ne ki nurse kiba sumar ïa kito kiba pang COVID-19 kim don ia ki jaka sah ba biang ne ba kyrpang hynrei ki ia sahlang beit bad ki bahaiing hasem jong ki bad kane ka lah ban buh jingma shikatdei ia ki bahaiing jong ki nongtrei ka tnat ka koit ka khiah.Watla kitei ki iing baduk dang don ki jingduna kiba hangne hangtai, hynrei ka DC ka la ong ba kan sa shimkhia ban pynbiang lut baroh ki jingdonkam, khnang ba kan iarap ia ki nongtrei ka koit ka khiah.
title: Ki iing baduk ha Umbuda, kum ki jaka sah ba shipor ki briew ka koit ka khiah

content: New Delhi: Hynnin ka sngi, ki 12 tylli ki seng liang pyrshah, ki ai ia ka jing kyrshan ia ka jing iakhih ki nongrep, ha ka 26tarik Jymmang bad na kitei ki 12 tylli ki liang pyrshah, ki don 5ngut ki myntri rangbah jong ki jylla bapher.Ka SKM, kaba dei ka kynhun synrop, jong ki 40 tylli ki seng nongrep, ka la khot ia ka sngi jong ka jingsngew sih lane ka black day bad katei ka long ban rakhe ia ka jingdap ba hynriew bnai jong ka jing iakhih pyrshah, ki nongrep ia ka ain nongrep jong ka sorkar India.“Ngi ai ka jing kyrshan, ia katei ka jingkhot jong ka  Samyukta Kisan Morcha (SKM), ha ka  26tarik Jymmang, ban kynmaw ia ka jing iakhih ba jai jai jong ki nongrep” ong ka kyrwoh na ki seng liang pyrshah.La soi ia ka kyrwoh, da  Sonia Gandhi, nongialam ka Congress, U  HD Deve Gowda, myntri rangbahduh ba rim ka India,  U Sharad Pawar, nongialam ka NCP, ka Mamata Banerjee (TMC), myntri rangbah ka West Bengal,  Uddhav Thackeray (Shiv Sena), myntri rangbah ka Maharashtra, U MK Stalin (DMK), myntri rangbah ka Tamil Nadu bad U CM Hemant Soren (JMM), myntri rangbah ka Jharkhand.Kiwei pat kiba soi, ki long U Farooq Abdullah, nongialam ka NC bad myntri rangbah barim ka Jammu and Kashmir,  U Akhilesh Yadav, nongialam ka SP bad myntri rangbah barim ka UP, U  Tejashwi Yadav, nongialam ka RJD, U D Raja jong ka CPI bad U Sitaram Yechury jong ka CPI-M.Kitei ki liang pyrshah, ki dawa ruh ban weng noh mador ia katei ka ain nongrep bad ban pynthikna ia ka dor iarap jong ka sorkar lane ka MSP bad katei ka dei halor ka shithi, kaba la dep thoh, da ki liang pyrshah, ha ka 12tarik Jymmang 2021.Ka jingkhot, ha ka 26tarik, ka dei ban rakhe kum ka sngi jong ka jingsngew sih bad la khot ia katei ka jing iakhih, da ka  Samyukta Kisan Morcha, ba la khlieh da U Balbir Singh Rajewal.La khot ia ki paidbah ha kylleng ka Ri, ban pynher ia ki lama iong ha ki iing jongki, ha ki kali bad ha ki dukan ruh kumjuh.Ki 40 tylli ki seng, ha ka jing ialam ka  Samyukta Kisan Morcha, ki don mynta ha u pud jong ka jylla Delhi bad ki la bteng ia kane ka jing iakhih, la  hynriew bnai kynthih.
title: 26tarik, yn pynher lama iong, ki nongrep ha kylleng ka India

content: Ka jingai jubab jong u Symbud Myntri, u Bah Prestone Tynsong “Ai ki mat bamja jhur”ka pynkynmaw ianga ia ki ktien ka Marie-Antoinette, ka Syiem ka France kaba la kren beiñ bad pynkheiñ burom ia ki raiot (ki khun ki hajar) da ki kyntien ba sngewjli bad bymman “Ai ki mat bam da u Kpu” shwa ba kan shah pynngat ha ka Kor Khrai Khlieh.Ka jingong jong u “Ai ki mat bam tang da u jhur khlem doh” kam dei tang ka jingpynkheiñ burom ia ki paidbah hynrei ka pynpaw ia ka jinglong khaweit bad hangamei jong une u briew. U Bah Tynsong, uba ha kine ki khyndiat sngi ba la leit u la pynpaw kata ka jingieid jong u ia ka Jaidbynriew ha kawei ka jingiakynduh lang, hynrei mynta pat u la kylla khongpong kynsan mar ia wan ka Khlam ha ka sien ba ar.Ha ka snem ba la leit, u la pyntip ba ka Tnat Labour kan thep mar 2100 tyngka ha man la ki bank account jong ki nongioh jingmyntoi. Hynrei kaba sngewsih ka long ba la don arngut napdeng kita ki nongioh jingiarap kim shym la ioh satia ia kata ka song pisa kumba la kular.Namar kita ki kam tohkit bad pynhiar shuki ki heh iew bha ha kine ki sngi, u Myntri Rangbah badonburom u la dei ban shim kata ka sienjam ban weng shi syndon ia u Bah Tynsong bad ban pynlong kata ka jingtohkit kaba laitluid ban lap ia kita ki kam buitpoh ba shyrkhei.Kane ka pynpaw ba ka la don kaei kaei kaba rieh sha lyndet ha kaba iadei bad ki kam pisa pilaiñ jong ka Tnat bad ka song pisa jong ki nongtrei sngi ha ka por ka Khangdam ha ka snem ba la leit. Mynta ka la sdang paw pyrthei namar ba kito ki ba dei hok ban ioh ka jingiarap ba 2100 shi bnai kim shym la ioh satia bad kito ba la ioh ruh kim shym la ioh lut kum ba dei hok.Ka dei tang ha ka snem ba la leit hi ba ka Sorkar Jylla lyngba ka ophis jong ka Labour Commissioner ka la sdang ia ka Chief Minister’s Relief Against Wage Loss Scheme (CRAWL) khnang ban noh jingiarap ia ki nongtrei, ki nongbylla sngi bad kiwei kiwei kiba im kyndoi jakpoh ha ka por ka khangdam.Ha ki khyndiat sngi ba la leit, la bun na ki briew kiba dei hok ban ioh ia kata ka song pisa iarap ki la wan shakhmat ban pynpaw bad ujor ba ka Tnat Labour kam shym la pyniaid beit pyniaid ryntih ia kane ka Skhim kaba la pynjynjar shikatdei eh ia u babun balang. Lymda i Kong Angela Rangad i wan shakhmat bad wanrah ia kane ka ishu, ngi baroh ngin jin la sah beit ha ka umdum.Kawei pat ka Skhim ban siew bai lut ksan ia ka jingduh bylla ki nongtrei misteri ki ba la pynrung kyrteng bad ka Meghalaya Building and other Construction Workers Welfare Board na ka daw ka Jingkhangdam, ka long ba ki dei ban ioh mar 1000 tyngka shi taiew khnang ban lah ban pynim ia ki kat ba lah. Kane ka Skhim ruh la pynmih ha kajuh ka por bad ka Skhim CRAWL ba la kdew haneng. Katkum ki rekod ba don sha ki paidbah, don kumba 25, 684 ki misteri ba la iasoi bad ka Board. Nga shu kyrmen ba kane ka Skhim ruh kan hap ha kajuh ka apot kum kiwei.Katba ki paidbah khamtam ki baduk, ki nongrep bad ki nongbylla sngi ki lynniar bad pyrta shla khamtam ha kum kine ki por ka jingjynjar bad jingdukha namar ka jingshah tuh bad jingbym biang ka jakpoh jong ki na ka daw ka Khlam COVID-19, hynrei kaba i saidmet bad pynduh jingkyrmen ka long kata ka jingjah jngai ka pisa ka Tnat kaba la mang khnang na ka bynta jong ki baa ngat lanot.I think it is but proper for the Labour Dept to come clean with facts and figures to clear the air and set to rest the feeling that crores and crores of public money has been misappropriated by the Labour Dept. giving weightage to the proverb “making hay while the sun shines”.Nga sngew ba ka la dei ka por ia ka Tnat Labour ban pynbiang ia kita ki jingpynshisha ha ka rukom pynlut pisa pilaiñ jong ka khnang ba kan wanrah kata ka jingsngew shngaiñ ha ki paidbah ba ka Tnat kam shym la pynlut kulmar ne knieh jubor ia kata ka Hok jong ki.Uba burom iaphi,Dr. Khrawpyrkhat BasaiawmoitAndheri East, Mumbai.Mobile: +91 8135830873.
title: Shaei ka tnat Labour ka la rong lut ka Pisa?
