title: Ki 24 ngut kiba iap, na ka corona ha ka Sngi U Blei

content: Ka ktien U Blei ka ong “Ba ngi don u Riew Said ne u Pleader uban ia said ia ngi ha khmat u Blei u kpa ba ha bneng. “Te lada uno uno ruh u leh pop, ngi don u Riewsaid bad u kpa, u Jisu Khrist uba hok. Ioanis 2:1.Mynba U Blei um pat phah ia une u Riewsaid sha kane ka pyrthei , ka Pyrthei ka long ka badum latap ia ka da ka jingdum la tap ia ki briew daka jingdum tliew tliew ha ka jingiadei bad u Blei ne bad u Mynsiem jong u Blei. U briew u dang sah haka dum ka lyngngoh, bad ha ka pop namar ymdon u Nongpyllait bad u Nongiasaid.Hynrei ai nguh ia u Blei u kpa uba ha bneng ba ha ka ia kaba biang u la phah noh ia la u khun uba long u nong pynim, u nongpyllait, u Nongsiewspah bad ruh u Nongiasaid. Haba la jia ka ia kaba biang, u Blei u la phah ia la u khun (Jisu) ia uba la kha na ka briew, ia u ba la kha hapoh ka Hukum. Galatia 4:4-5. Kamut mynba ka dangtrei kam ki hukum u Moses. U Blei u ladep thmu na bymjukut ba kata ka Hukum kan kut noh tad ynda u Jisu un wan sha ka pyrthei haka doh. La ai ia ka hukum dei namar ki jingpalat jong u Briew, haduh ba un dawan uta u symbai (Jisu). Galatia 3:19. Kumta ka hukum ka long ka Nonghikai jong ngi ban ialam iangi sha u Khrist khnang ba ynpynksan iangi da ka jingngeit (Kaba ha u Jisu). Galatia 3:24. Kumta haba U Jisu u la wan sha kane ka pyrthei, la kha ia u hapoh ka hukum (Mynba dang trei kam ki ain u Moses) bad u im ruh hapoh kata ka hukum. Galatia 4:4.Ngi kynmaw ia kawei na ki kam ba u Jisu u la leh mynba ka dang trei kam kata ka hukum u Moses ka long ba u Jisu u la map ia kawei ka briew kaba klim. Ki Nongthoh bad ki pharisi ki la kem bad ki la wallam ia kata ka briew sha u Jisu ki da ong – ko Nonghikai, la lap ia kane ka briew ba ka klim. Ki ong – U Moses u la hukum ia ngi da ka hukum ban lynthem, maw ia kiba kum kita; te me ong kumno Jisu? Dakaba ki tynjuh ia u Jisu khnang ba kin ioh mudui kylla ia u.Kumno u Jisu u la leh? U la dem ha khyndew bad thoh da la ki shynriahti; haba u la ieng, u la ong haki – “Uta u ba khlem pop hapdeng jong phi to un lynthem nyngkong ia u maw ha ka. U la dem bad thoh biang ha khyndew. Kita ki Nongthoh bad ki Pharisi ki la sngew kynduh ki la mih noh (phet) uwei hadien uwei te la ieh noh marwei ia u Jisu bad ia kata ka briew kaba dang ieng hapdeng. Haba u Jisu u la ieng pat, um iohi shuh iano iano ruh hynrei tang kata ka briew kaba klim.Kumno u Jisu u la ong ia kata ka briew? U ong – ko briew hangno kito ki nong mudui jong pha where are your accusers? Ymdon ba la pynrem ia pha? Ka la ong – ymdon Ah Trai. U Jisu u la ong pat ia ka – NGA RUH NGAM PYNREM IA PHA: TO KHIE LEIT NOH BAD TO WAT LEH POP SHUH. Ioanis 8:1-11.Tang shi kyntien ba u Jisu u la kren ha kita ki Nongthoh bad ki Pharisi ki nongmudui (accusers) kiba la pynrem ia kata ka riew kynthei baklim, ka la lait im nakaba shah lynthem maw ha ban da iap.Ngi iohi shisha ba u Jisu u Nongiasaid ne u Pleader uba ia said ymtang ia kato ka kynthei hynrei u ia said naka bynta ia baroh ha khmat u Blei u kpa uba ha bneng ban pyllait ia u briew naka pop na ki ksuid bad u soitan.Nakata ka daw U Jisu u ong ha u kpa uba ha bneng – Ha khmih nga la wan ia kaban leh ia ka mon jongme. U PYNDAM NOH IA KATA KABA NYNGKONG (Ka hukum) KHNANG BAN PYNNEH IA KATA KABA AR. Hebru 10:9-10.U Jisu u hap ban iasaid ha khmat u kpa kat haduh ba u hap ban shah halor diengphna. U Blei u la map noh ia ki pop jong phi baroh haba ula lah pyndam noh ia ka ain ba la thoh lem bad ki kyndon jongka (having Cancelled the Written code, with its Regulations). Ki ain kiba long pyrshah ia ngi kiba ieng pyrshah iangi (that was against us and stood opposed to us). U la shim iaka (He took it away) bad sahprek ia ka ha Diengphna (Nailing it to the Cross). La sloit noh ia ki Bor bad kiba donbor (having disarmed powers and Authorities). U la pynpaw paidbah iaki (He made a public spectacles of them) bad leh risa halor jong ki DA KA DIENGPHNA (Triumphing over them by the Cross). Kolossai 2:13-15.U Jisu u la map iaka kynthei kaba klim da kaba iasaid ha u kpa. Kumjuh ruh u map ia kito baroh kiba wan sha u da ka jingngeit lyngba ka Diengphna.Ngi don u Riewsaid (Pleader) u ba iasaid naka bynta jong ngi ha khmat u Blei u kpa uba ha bneng, lyngba da ka snam jong u halor Diengphna. Ioanis 2:1/ Kolossai 2:13-15. Amen.
title: NGI DON U RIEW SAID

content: Ka jingkiew sted bad ka jingsaphriang jong ka khlam COVID – 19 ha ka Jylla jong ngi ka lah nang i shyrkhei bad par suhkhriat kat nang mih ki sngi. Ngi iohi ba ngi lah kot sha ka 1000 (tam ne duna) ngut kiba iohpang man la ka sngi ha kane ka taiew bad ka jingiap haduh une u bnai Jymmang ka la kot sha ka 457 ngut kat haduh ka 23 tarik mynta u bnai. Nalor kine ki dangdon sa ki khubor hamsaia kiba pyntieng bad pynsmiej ha kaba iadei bad ka jingshim nongmuna COVID – 19 ha Umling Screening Center.Kane ka khubor hamsaia kaba la mih ha ki social media ba ka don ka jingkynnoh ba la die tuh ïaki kaiphod negative (negative report) sha ki paidbah haka dor 200 tyngka ha Umling Screening Centre. Haba ia kren bad u Symbud Myntri Rangbah, u bah Prestone Tynsong u la iathuh ba ki la don ka jingtip shaphang kane naduh ki sngi ba ki sdang. Hynrei na ka liang jongka DC, Ri Bhoi District, ka Kong RM Kurbah, ka la kyntait ia kane ka jingkynnoh kiba lamler bad ka la ong ruh ba ym don kum kine kiei kiei hynrei kine baroh ki dei tang ki khubor bym don nongrim satia.Nangta pat sa ki kali jong ki bar Jylla ba ioh rung suk lymda dei ba ki shah bat ha ki dkhot jong ka Khasi Students’ Union, Shillong bad Khasi Students’ Union, Eastern Border Area. Kaei ka jingmut ban pynjari da ka korphiw ia u nongshong shnong hynrei kine pat ki ioh rung suk.Shano kita ki Infiltration check gate bad ka Entry Point ha Umling ban tehlakam ia ka jingwanrung beain ki bar Jylla sha ka Jylla jong ngi? Hato kine kim lah mo ban long kita ki nongwanrah ia une u khniang jingpang?Ki nongtrei nongbylla sngi ha la ka Jylla ki jynjar ba kim ioh ban mih na la iing la sem ban leit wad jingbylla ban bsa ia la ka iing ka sem, kim don shuh wat tang ka bam ruh, ki hap ban thiah thylli kpoh, hynrei kine ki bar Jylla pat ki ioh rung suk ban wan kamai jakpoh shane. Haba ki bapli tang shisien bam ka ja ruh kim don bad ynda ki phai khmat sha ka Sorkar ban wadjingiarap, ngi iohi ia ka jingshah kren tohmet ba pynmong ia ki ha kaba don ka jingianujor ia kiba duk bad kiba riewspah bad ka jingong ba ki dei ban pynduna noh ka bam doh, bam tang da ka ja bad u jhur.Lada u Symbud Myntri Rangbah ynda haba u ioh jingtip ba don kum kita ki kam buit tuh hangthie ba die thok ia ki kaiphod naduh ki sngi ba sdang, balei ba u sngap jar? Balei bym don ka jingkhynra ia kine kiba shim kabu ha kum kane ka ia hynrei dang ailad ban bteng? Balei bym ai bylla ia la u trai Ri trai Muluk ha ka jaka ban wanrah da kita ki bar Jylla? Ngi kinongshong shnong ban ioh pass na ka Sorkar ruh ngi jynjar, bun ba shah kyntait, kine ki bym dei trai shnong pat ki ioh rung khlem da don kino kino kiban ujor ia ki.Ngi ki paidbah paidbhur, ngi ialeh katba lah ban bud ia ki kyndon ba la bthah da ka Sorkar, hynrei lada ka Sorkar pat ka leh bym suidniew kumne, shaei kein ngin poi? Nga sngewiahap bha ia ka jingkren jong I Kong Kurbah, DC, Ri Bhoi District, ha kaba I ong ba lada kine ki nongshong shnong kiba wanphai ki sngew sarong ba ki ioh kum kine ki kaiphod ba shu thok bad ki leit phai sha la ki iing ki sem, kata ka long ba ki shet kylla hi ia ki baieid bathoin jong ki. Lada ka Sorkar ruh ka pyrkhat ia la ka Ri bad Jaitbynriew, ka dei ban tehlakam shisyndon ia kine ki jingwanrung beain jong ki Bar Jylla. Ngim dei ban khein sting ia kane ka khlam COVID – 19 namar ka Jylla ka jong ngi ka long kaba rit bad lada ngi ki nongshong shnong ngim phikir, kan sa wanrah ia ka jingduhnong ha ka Jylla hi baroh kawei bad duh ei ia shibun ki mynsiem bakordor tang namar ba ngi shu khein sting bad ngim don ka jingkitkhlieh.
title: RAP! IOH NGI LONG KI NONGPYNSAPHRIANG NAMAR KA JINGKHEIN STING

content: KOLKATA: Hadien ka jingjop don burom jong ka TMC, ha ka elekshon MLA, ba dang shu dep, ki don shibun ki nong ialam barim jong katei ka seng, kiba la leit sha ka seng BJP, kiba kwah ban leit phai biang sha ka seng TMC.Kawei na kitei, ka dei ka Sarala Murmu, kaba da thrang hir hir, ban leit phai biang sha ka seng synshar, ha West Bengal.Nangta sa ka Sonali Guha, kaba dei ka MLA barim jong ka TMC, katei ruh ka la pynpaw ia ka jingthrang hir hir ban leit phai biang sha ka TMC.Ka Sonali, ka la thoh hynnin ka sngi, ia ka shithi sha ka Banerjee bad pan map, halor ka jingmih noh jongka, na katei ka seng TMC.Katei ka MLA, kaba la jop la saw sien kynthih, na  Satgachhia ha South 24 Parganas district, ha ka shithi sha ka Mamata, ka la ong “Kumba ka dohkha, kam lah satia ban im khlem ka um, kumta ma nga ruh, ngan nym lah satia ban im khem maphi Didi”.“Nga pan map na phi, namarkata, namar lada phim map, ngan nym lah satia ban im. Sngewbha shah, ba ngan wan phai bad ba ngan pynlut ia ka jingim jongnga, ha ki kti jong ka jingieid jongphi”.
title: Lada ka dohkha, kam lah im khlem um, nga ruh, ngam lah im khlem maphi, ong ka Sonali ia ka Didi

content: Shillong: Ka Sur Ki Nong Mawlai,  kaba la lamkhmat da ka KSU Mawlai Circle, FKJGP Mawlai Circle bad HNYF Mawlai Circle kum ban sdang noh ban pynjur ïa ka jing ïakhih pyrshah ïaka jing kuman jong ka sorkar ban sospon, ïa ki 3ngut ki Heh Pulit bar jylla kiba donkti ban siat ïap ïa u Bah Cheristerfield Thangkhiew bam kwai ha dwar u Blei ha ka step 13tarik Nailar 2021.Kumta ban pynïoh ïa ka ka hok ïa utei u Rangbah naka liang jong kane ka Sur kan pynlong ïa ka jingshong kyllaiñ myngngor (Sit in Demonstration), hangtei ha Addittional Secretariat ha ka 20tarik Nailur 2021, ka ban sdang naduh ka por 11baje mynstep, kumta na ka liang jong ngi ka ‘Sur Ki Nong Mawlai’ ka khot ka wer ïa ki nongshong shnong jong ka Shnong Mawlai ba kin ïamih ryntih lang ha katei ka jing ïakhih bad ha kajuh ka por ka khot ka wer ruh ïa ki Dorbar Shnong,Seng Longkmie bapher bapher bad ki Seng Samla baroh kiba don ha Sor Shillong bad khapsor ruh ba kin wan ban mih shakhmat ha katei ka jingsdang jong ngi kum ki Samla ban dawa ïa ka hok bad ba kum kitei ki jingjia kin ym wan jia wan hap shuh haka pateng jong ka Jaidbynriew khamtam pyrshah ia ki khun samla kiba ju mih shakhmat ban ïakhun ïaleh ïaki mat ki jura kiba ktah matïong ïaka Jaidbynriew Hynñiewtrep hi baroh kawei.Ka jingmih shakhmat jong ki Dorbar Shnong, Seng Longkmie Shnong bad ki Seng Samla Shnong jong ka Shnong Mawlai bad kumjuh ruh ïaki Shnong kiba don ha Shillong bad kiba ha khapsor ba kin wan ban ai mynsiem bad ban dang pynrhem ïaka mynsiem ïaleh jong ki Samla nangne shakhmat na bynta kiba bun ki dawbah jong ka Jaidbynriew, ong ka  kyrwoh na ‘Ka Sur Ki Nong Mawlai’ lyngba u Samla Rapborlang Nongrum, Samla Khrawkupar Nongsiej bad u Samla Sanbor Rapsang kiba long ki Convener.
title: Da ka Sit in Demonstration, yn sdang ‘Ka Sur Ki Nong Mawlai’ kum ka jingsdang ban pynjur ïa ka jing ïakhih

content: Shillong: Ka Rot Association of Meghalaya (RAM), ka seng jong ki ‘thei nuti mynta ka sngi ka la phah ïa u kyrwoh jingpynshai sha ka Kur Nongrum halor ka jingsaphriang jong ki kot rejistreshon thok ha ka kyrteng jong ka Seng ha kylleng ka Ri Khasi – Jaiñtia kaba pynpaw ïa ka D. Nongrum kaba shong ba sah ha Mawlai Nongmali kum ka Joint Secretary jong ka RAM.Ka Rot Association of Meghalaya ka la pynrem jur halor kane ka jingpynsaphriang jong kine ki kot rejistreshon thok ha rynsan jong ka social media, bad ha kajuh ka por ka buh ka jingpynshai ruh hakhmat ka Kur Nongrum, ka Dorbar Shnong Mawlai Nongmali bad ka Dorbar Shnong Mawlai Pyllun ba ka RAM kam don satia kano kano ka dkhot kaba bat ïa ka kam Joint Secretary.Ha kajuh ka por, ka RAM ka la pyntip ruh ba ha u snem 2016, la don kawei ka briew kaba kyrteng ka D. Nongrum kaba la rung dkhot hapoh ka seng kum ka General Member, hynrei kane ka briew ka la phet seng noh ha ujuh hi u snem.Shuh shuh halor kane, ka RAM lyngba ka ejahar ba ka la buh hakhmat u SP ka East Khasi Hills, ka kyrpad ruh na ki bor ka aiñ ban lapdien bad pynshitom ïa kawei ka briew tip kum ka Bonnie kaba donkti ban pynsaphriang nyngkong eh ïa kine ki kot rejistreshon thok ha WhatsApp.
title: Ai jingpynshai ka RAM ïa ka Kur Nongrum halor ka dkhot

content: Shillong: Ka kynhun jong ka Thomas Jones Celebration Committee ka APSTA ka la lah ban pynlong ia ka jingrakhe ia ka lyngkhuh snem ba 172 ka sngi jingiap U Sahep Thomas Jones I, uba baroh la tip kum “U Kpa ki dak pule bad thoh Khasi” bad ha kajuh ka por ia ka lyngkhuh snem ba 179 ka jingsdang ia ki Lower Primary skul ha kine ki Lum Khasi bad Jaiñtia.Ia ka jingrakhe la pynlong ha ka 16.9.2021,  ha ka por 9.00. baje mynstep ha īing dorbar Shnong Nongpyndeng New Nongstoiñ.Ia ka jingrakhe la pyniaid da U Babu S.Nongrang President bad Chairman ka TJMCC 2021. La sdang da ka jingrwai APSTA Anthem.La pule bad duwai sdang da U Babu E.L.Mawlong.La ioh ia ka jingpdiang sngewbha na ka Kong Juliet Shangrit nonghikai ka Rev.S.Wollington Childrens’ Home.La ioh ban sam ia ki jingai sngewbha ia ki nonghikai bad sha ki khynnah pat ki tiar ialehkai bad ki tiar pyndonkam ha skul. La noh synñiang sha kane ka Home T.50,000/- . bad ruh ha kajuh ka por la noh synñiang sha ka Christmas Make Over 2021 T.50,000/-, ka Kong C.Daribha Synrem Cultural Secretary ka la aiti ia kine ki jingnoh synñiang ka APSTA. La ioh ia ka jingkren na U Babu T.Lyngdoh President APSTA Nongstoiñ, na U Bah.Valentine Sohlang Myntri ka Nongpyndeng na U Tbn.P.S.Mawlieh uba la wan mih khmat na ka bynta ka Home bad U Bah Powell Sohkhlet na ka bynta ka Christmas Make Over 2021.La ioh ia ka jingkren na U General Secretary ka APSTA babu F.C.Shullai. uba la kren shaphang ka APSTA ki kam babha ba ka la lah ban pyndep bad ruh ki kam kiba don ki khep kiba pynsngewsih ia ki dkhot na ka daw bym lah ban pynhun katkum ka jingangnud jong ki katto katne ngut ki dkhot.Hynrei tang kawei kaba u pynkynmaw bad pynshlur ia ki para nongkitkam ka long wat hapdeng ki jingsuk bad jingeh kiba ia kynduh ban ialam ia ka seng mynta la 39 tylli ki snem, dei ban klet ia ki jingeh bad maw jynthut,hynrei yn aiti beit ban trei na ka bynta ka burom ka seng APSTA, da ka jingiarap bad ka Bor U Blei najrong. La ioh ia ka jingaikhublei kylliang na ka APSTA da I Babu Tonyford War u ban shimti ia ka kam President naduh ka 1.11.2021. Na ka liang ka Home la ai khublei da ka Kong.S.Paliar Superintendent ka Home.La ioh ia ka jingduwai pynwai bad kyrkhu ia ki jingbam na U Tbn.P.S.Mawlieh.Hadien ba la wai ka jingialang la ia bam sngewbha bad ka kynhun TJMCC ka APSTA ka la mih ban wan beh pat sha St.Ferrando Transit Shelter Home Mawlai Mawroh por 3.00. janmiet.Hangne la pyniaid da U Babu Tonyford War, Senior Vice President APSTA bad ban sa kiew President shen. La rwai ia ka APSTA Anthem.La pule bad duwai da ka Kong Brilin Warjri. Secy ka Nongthymmai Unit.La kren pdiang da ka Sister Incharge ka Shelter Home. La ai sngewbha sha ki 5 ngut ki sister kiba trei shitom bad ruh sha ki khynnah da ki tiar ialehkai bad ki tiar pyndonkam ha skul.Ia kine ki jingai bad synñiang ba T.50,000/- la aiti da ka Kong Liertimai Lyngdoh Treasurer ka APSTA. La ioh ia ka jingkren na U Sir S.P.Adhikari, na ka Sister na U General Secretary. La ai khublei mar kylliang na ka Sister bad na U Babu.S.D.Kharumnuid. Chairman ka Mawlai Unit APSTA. La kyrkhu pynwai da U Babu B.Shabong.
title: Rakhe Thomas Jones ka APSTA

content: Shillong: Ka Moopynieiñ Socio cultural & Sports Organization (MSCSO) ka la plie ia ka lympung ialehkai football kaba juh tip kum ka 11th cash prize knock-out football tournament 2021 ha u bnai Nailur 16tarik ha ka por 1.00 pm noh phai sngi.Ia katei ka lympung la wan plie da u Ma Rilamki Dkhar kum u kongsan bad u Ma Kyrshan Blah kum u symbud kongsan.Ha kane ka jing plie ia kane ka lympung na ka liang u Kongsan ula iaroh ia MSCSO ba ka la lah ban pynlong kum kane ka lympung ka ba iarap shi katdei eh ia ki khun samla jong ka thaiñ. U kongsan ula iaroh ia ki samla kiba ia shim bynta ha kane ka lympung kum shibynta ban pyni ia ka sap ka phong sha kiwei ki para samla. Ula kyntu ruh ia ki samla ban kin kiar raieh raidam na kino kino ki kynja jingdih pynbuiad kiba pyntroiñ ia ka met ka phad, ia ka bor pyrkhat bad ia ka imlang sahlang.Ha kane jingplie ia kane ka lympung ka la don ka jingialehkai hapdeng ka AB FC pyrshah ia SK United XI, ha kaba ka SK United XI ka la pynliem ia ka AB FC da 2- 1. Ha kane ka sngi la pyniaid ia kane ka lympung da shri Shaniahskhem Dkhar bad da jingdon lang ki rangbah dong bad u rangbah shnong jong ka wapungskur bad kiwei kiwei de.
title: Sdang ka phutbol jong ka Moopyniein

content: Shillong: U MDC ka Pynthorumkhrah Constituency u bah P N Syiem u la ong ba ka jingiakhun election na ka bynta u snem 2023 hapdeng u bah Alexander L Hek, u ba long u MLA kane ka Constituency bad u kan long ka ba itynnad bha namar ba u sngewtynnad hi ban ialehkai ia ka game kaba eh.“Ka jingdon u bah Alexander L Hek kum u MLA kan pyn sngewtynnad ban iakhun ia ka election ha u snem 2023 namar ba ka game hi ka sngewtynnad ban ia khun lada ka eh khnang ba ki nongpeit kai ruh kin sngewtynnad ban peit kai”la ong u bah Syiem.Ha kane ka sngi kaba na ka liang u bah P N Syiem u la pyniasoh biang ia lade bad ka party Congress, u la ong ba ka party hi ka ba lah ban wanrah ia ka jingkylla ha u snem 2023 kan dei ka party Congress.Na ka ling u bah P N Syiem u la pynskhem ba ha u snem 2023 ka jingia khun election jong u kan long na ka Pynthor umkhrah Constituency ym dei na Mawsynram.“Namar ba nga la sah ha pynthor te ka party kan pynphai sha pynthor hi ,bad na Mawsynram ngam don jingmut shuh ban ia khun namar ba hadien ba nga la jop MDC na Pynthorumkhrah nga sngew ba nga la long jan ia ka ne ka Constituency.Halor ka jingshimti u bah V.H Pala kum u nongialam rang bah ka Seng u la ong ba kala don ka jingpyrshang jong ki ba bun ki MLA ka Congress ban mih noh na ka party hynrei hadien ba la don ka jingshimti jong u bah Pala kum u President ka la long skhem shuh shuh.Haba kylli halor ka jingdon ki ba bun ki ban wan phai ha ka Congress u bah Syiem u la ong ba ki ba bun hi ki dang peit ia ka rukom pyniaid bad ka rukom iasyllok jong ki nongialam ha ka ba iadei bad ka jingrah ia ki mat ki ba donkamjong u paidbah.“Ngi kyrmen ba ka jingtrei bha jong ka party Congress ha ka jylla bad ka jinglah jong ka ban rah ia ki mat ki ba donkam kan pynlong ia ki ba bun ba kin wan phai biang sha ka party”u la ong.U la bynrap ruh da ka ba ong ba ki party kiba rit hi haka jylla kim lah ban leh eiei namar ba kum ba long mynta baroh ki party ki ba ia synrop lang ha ka sorkar MDA ki la phail ha baroh ka bynta kumta nga tharai ba ka party hi ka ban wanrah ia ka jingkylla kan dei tang ka party Congress”.
title: Ka jing iakhun, kaba itynnad bad U bah AL Hek, ong U bah Pynshngain

content: Shillong:Kum shi bynta ban pynthikna ba ka Congress party kan ioh ban wan ha ka bor ha u snem 2023, na ka liang ka Congress party, mynta ka sngi ka la ioh ban pdiang sngewbha ia ki 5 ngut ki dkhot, ki ba la wan ban pyniasoh ia lade bad ka ne ka party, kiba kynthup ia ki arngut ki dkhot ba rim u bah R.G Lyngdoh bad u bah P.N Syiem.Myn hynnin ka sngi, na ka liang jong ka party Congress ka la pynlong ia ka jingialang ban pdiang sngewbha ia u bah R.G Lyngdoh u bah PN Syiem, u bah Mosjo R.Wanswet, U bah Andrian Lambert C Mylliem bad ka kong Fenela Lyngdoh Nonglait, kia la wan ban pyniasoh ha ka party Congress.Haba kren ha kane ka sngi na ka liang u Bah Vincent H Pala u la pdiang sngewbha ia kine ki dkhot ki ba la pyniasoh ia lade bad ka party Congress ha ka ba u la pynpaw ia ka jingshaniah skhem ba ka jingwan pyniasoh jong ki ne san ngut ki ba kynthup ia u bah RG Lyngdoh bad u bah PN Syiem kan pynkhlain ia ka party Congress ha ka jylla hi baroh kawei.Na ka liang President ka MPCC Ribhoi District, u bah Mayralborn Syiem u la ong ba ka jingpyniasoh jong kine ki san ngut ki nongialam kan pynkhlain shuh ia ka party Congress ha ka jylla ha ka ba u bah R G Lyngdoh bad u Bah PN Syiem ki la dei lupa ki nongialam kiba la ai ka jingshakri shibun ia ki paidbah bad ka jingwan phai biang jong ki kan wanrah ia ka jingmyntoi kaba khraw ia ka party.Na ka liang u bah Syiem, u la ong ba kum ka party kin lah ban trei kam bha bad ki ngeit skhem ba ha u snem 2023 ka Congress kan wan biang ha ka bor ha ka ba kane ka sngi kan long ka sngi ka ban sdang bad da ka jingiasoh jong ki yn lah ban khring shuh shuh sa ia kiwei de.Na ka liang u bah H.M Shangpliang u la ong ba ha kine ki lai snem shiteng naduh ba la dep ka election 2018, ha ki snem ba la leit nga la sngew duh jingkyrmen namar ba ka party Congress ka la dang hiar shi hiar bad i kumba kan pra ha shuwa u snem 2023, hynrei haba na ka liang ki nongialam ba ha khliehduh ki la pynbna ba la thung ia u bah Vincent H Pala kum u nongialam ka la don ka jingkylla ia ka jinglong jingman ha ka jylla.U la ong ruh ba ha ka por ba u bah Pala, un sa shimti kum u nongialm rangbah ka MPCC, hynrei u la trei shitom lupa ha ka ba u la sdang ban lum ia ki nongialam kiba ieh ia ka party ha kaba mynta ka sngi ki la ioh ban pdiang sngewbha ia ki bad kane ka long ka jingkyrmen kaba khraw na ka bynta ka Congress party bad kan ai ia u paidbah ia ka sorkar ka ban synshar bad ka ban ai jingshakri hok ia u paidbah.
title: Rung Congress, U bah RG Lyngdoh, bah PN Syiem & 3 ngut kiwei pat

content: Shillong: U President jong ka Meghalaya Pradesh Congress Committee (MPCC) u bah Vincent H Pala, myn hynnin ka sngi u la ong ba na ka liang jong ka party Congress, kan ia khun da ki buit thymmai ha ka ilekshion ka ban wan da ka ba pynpoi sha ki paidbah ka jylla lyngba ki ‘Social Media’ khnang ba ki paidbah kin tip lut ia ki kam ba ka Congress ka la leh.“Haba ia kren bad ki lad pathai khubor na ka liang u bah Pala u la ong ba ki dkhot ka Congress ki dei ban wad da ki buit thymmai kumno ban lah khring iaki nongmih khmat ne ki paidbah sha ka party bad namar ka ta ka Congress kan wad da ki buit thymmai lyngba ki teknologi ka juk mynta naka bynta ban khring ia ki MLA/MDC ne ki nongkyshan jong kiwei ki party sha ka Congress.Na ka liang u bah Vincent u la pynpaw ia ka jingshaniah jong u ba ha kine ki sngi ban wan kin dang bun ki nongialam ki ban wan pyniasnoh bad ka Congress party hynrei mynta kam pat biang ka por ban iakren halor ka ne ka phang.U bah Vincent u la ong ba ka Congress kan hap ban trei shitom naka bynta ban pynthikna ba ki ba wan pyniasnoh bad ka Party kim duh nong bad dei namar kane ka Congress ka kwah ban shu iawer ia ki MLA/MDC khlem da lah ban pynthikna ba kin ioh iaka jing jop. Haba kylli sa katno ngut ki MLA/MDC na kiwei ki party kin wan pyniasoh bad ka Congress, u bah Vincent u la ong ba ka por kam pat long ban iakren ia kane ka phang bad hadien katto katne bnai ba un shimti iaka shuki president un sa pynbna paidbah halor ka jing wan rung thmmmai ki  nongmihkhmat ne ki nong kyrshan sha ka Congress.  “Ngi la pynkhreh bad ngi la buh lypa ia ka kynhun ban wad bniah bad ngi la sdang ban iaid shakhmat ban pynbiang ia la ki jong ki jingdonkam ha ka Congress bad la khmih lynti bad ha u bnai Nohrah yn lah ban pynbiang” la ban biang u bah Palar.  Haba kylli halor ka jing bym don bynta u Dr. Mukul Sangma bad ki MLA na Garo Hills, u president ka MPCC u bah Vincent H Pala u la ong ba ka jing bym lah u Dr. Mukul ban wan shim bynta ha kane ka prokram kadei namar ba u dang bunkam ban pyrkheh ia ki jing donkam namar ba dang long dorbar.U bah Vincent u la ong ba ki MLA na Garo Hills kim lah ban don bynta ha kane ka prokram namar kane ka prokram kadei tang ban pdiang burom ia ki 5 ngut ki ba wan pyniasnoh biang bad ka Congress.“Kane ka jing ialang ka long ka ba rit namar ngi hap bud iaki kyndon ka tnat ka koit ka khiah bad ka jing ialang ba kham heh kan long ha ka 18 tarik mynta u bnai ha ka ba baroh ki nongialam rangbah ka Congress kin ia don bynta kynthup u Dr. Mukul” ula ong .U bah Vincent u la ong ba kam don kano kano ka jing iapra ha ka seng Congress hynrei kane ka jing bym lah kiwei ban don bynta ha kane ka prokram kadei namar ka jing pyrkhing naka tnat ka koit ka khiah bad namar ba kane kadei tang ban pdiang burom ia ki 5 ngut ki ba wan pyniasnoh bad ka Congress
title: U Dr Mukul u khlem wan, namar ba u bunkam ha ing dorbar, ong U Ma Pala

content: Shillong: U bah RG Lyngdoh, u ba la wan phai biang sha ka party Congress, myn hynnin ka sngi, u la ong ba naduh nyngkong hi na ka liang jong u wat la u la weng noh ia la de na ka ne ka party hynrei u dang dei u nongkyrshan u ba jar jar jong ka party.“Nga khlem weng ia ka jingkyrshan jong nga na ka party Congress, hynrei nga dei u nongkyrshan u ba jar jar bad mynta da ka jingpyniasoh ka ba pura nga la long biang u dkhot u ba lah ban pynsawa jam” la ong u bah Lyngdoh.u bah RG u la ong ruh ba ka jingwan phai jong u sha ka kam sainpyrtthei lyngba ka party Congress ka long hi hadien ka jingioh i ia ka jinglong jingman ha ka jylla namar ba ka la don ka jingbym shynshar hok bad ka jingpynjynjar ia u paidbah.“Nga sngew ba mynta ka sngi ka long ka jingmyntoi ka ba klhraw na ka bynta ka party Congress na ka bynta u snem 2023 bad ia ka ne ka por kan shong ha ngi ban ngin shim ia ka ne ka jingioh jing myntoi lane ngin pynleh nohei ia ka ne don kam ban hap ia puson bha “u la ong.U la ong ruh ba kawei na ka daw bah ba kum ka party ka tlod ha kine ki snem ba la dep ka long namar ba kam don ki nongialam ki ba biang namar ba don na ki nongialam ki ba shu lap mied tang ban tan ia ki dkhot lade ym ban iarap ban pynkiew ia ki.“Hynrei ha ba la jied ia u bah Vicent H Pala ba un long kum u nongialm kan pynkhlain ia ka party namar ba u long u briew u ba ju ia syllok u ba ju iarap ban kyntiew ia ki para dkhot bad na ka liang ka party Congress hi ka donkam ia u nongialm kum u bah Pala khnang ba ngin lah ban wan ha ka bor ha u snem 2023 “u la ong.u la kyntu ruh ia baroh ki dkhot jong ka Congress party ba kim dei ban ia tan tyllai iwei ia iwei hynrei ki dei ban iatrei lang ia kyrshan bad ban sngewthuh ba kim dei ba ki don hangne na ka bynta ia la de hynrei na ka bynta u paidbah.“Ngi dei ban long ki nongshna jingkieng ia ki paidbah ym ki nongtei kynroh bad lada ngi la lah ban leh ia kane yn ym don shuh mano mano ruh ki ba lah ban pynrem ia ka Congress”la ong u bah Lyngdoh.“Nga ngeit ba mynta ka sngi, ka jingiadon lang hangne da ka mynsiem ban leh eiei na ka bynta ka party ngi ngeit ba ngin sa lah ban pynkhlain ia ka party ha ka ba na ka liang jong nga ngan trei na ka bynta uwei pa uwei u dkhot ka party ban kyntiew ia ki” u la bynrap .
title: Nga khlem weng ka jingkyrshan na ka party Congress, hynrei nga dei u nongkyrshan u ba jar jar, ong U Bah RG Lyngdoh

content: Shillong:U Bah HM Shangpliang (Congress), ula leit rah myn hynnin ka sngi ha iing dorbar jylla, halor ka jingeh jong ki nongrep, ha kaba ula ong ba na kane ka jingpang khlam, ka la ktah jur ia ka ioh ka kot bad ka kamai kajih jong ki nongrep.Ha u snem ba ladep, kaba dei ka snem sdang jong kane ka khlam; ki nongrep, ki la pyrshang kat lah kat iai ban iai shah, halor ka jingeh, kaba iadei bad ka jingduh jongki ha ka rep ka riang, hynrei mynta u snem, na ka jingjia biang jong kane ka khlam, ki nongrep, ki mad ia ka jingeh kaba khraw, na ka jing ia tyngkhuh jongki, ia ka pakhang shnong, ka korphiw bad kiwei de ki jingnang trei jubor jong ka khlam bad katei ka la pynlong ia ki jingthung, ba kin sniew bad pyut ha ki lyngkha rep bad ki nongrep, ki hap ban tuklar dalade hi, ia ki lad ki lynti jongki ban pyniaid ia la ki mar rep.La ong U bah Shangpliang, ba ka sorkar jylla, ha u snem ba ladep, ka pynthikna, ba yn plie ia ki iew sharud ka nongbah Shillong, ba ki nongrep, kin die ia ki mar rep jongki bad u ong shuh shuh “Ngim pat iohi satia ia kitei ki iew”. Ula ong shuh shuh “Ki nongrep, ki la shah khang lynti bad shah pyndik ha ki pulit, namar ba ki kit ia ki mar jongki, khlem da don ki permit kiba biang” bad u ong shuh shuh “Ha ka jingbitar, ki nongrep, ki ieh, ia la ki jong ki mar ha surok bad ai ei ha u pulit”.La ong shuh shuh ba hadien ka jing khie bitar ki nongrep, ka sorkar, ka wad ia ka lad ban thied ia ki mar rep bad kine ki thaw ia ka seng jongki ban thied ia kitei ki mar rep, hynrei ki nongrep, ki ujor, ba kine ki nong khaii, ki shim kabu pynban ia ka dor ka mur, na ki nongrep, ha kaba u ai nuksa ba la thied ia u kubi ha ka dor T.5 shi kilo, katba ia une u juh u kubi, la die ha Shillong, ha ka dor T.9 shi kilo bad ia u muli, la thied ha ka dor T.4 shi kilo. U Bah Shangpliang, ula ujor ruh ba ki kali kit mar rep, 1917 ki dei ki bym trei kam satia, namar ba ki nongrep, kim ioh jingiarap eiei na kitei ki kali bad ula ong ba haba ki nongrep, ki wad ia kitei ki kali, kim ju lap ia kitei ki kali, namar ba ki bunkam sha kiwei pat ki jaka.U Bah Shangpliang, ula ong ruh ba ka sorkar kam shym la iarap eiei satia ia ki nongrep, hynrei ia baroh ki jingdonkam, ki hap ban thied dalade hi “Dei na kane ka jingkutlad ha ka kamai kajih, ba ki khun jong ki nongrep, ki la sangeh noh, na ka jingleit skul” ong U Bah Shangpliang. “Kim don pisa ban siew bai skul, kim don pisa ban siew ia ki smart mobile phone, ba ki khun jongki, kin ioh ban pule online, namar ba ki don bun ngut ki khun bad ki lah ban thied tang kawei ka smart mobile bad ki hap ban ia kylliang baroh shi para”.U MLA, ula ong shuh shuh ba ka sorkar India, ka ju ai ia ka dor kyrshan sha ki nongrep, hynrei, katei kam hap satia ia kito kiba rep soh, rep jhur.U Conrad Sangma, myntri rangbah ka jylla, haba jubab ia katei ka jingiakren, ula mynjur ia ka jingeh, ba ki ia kynduh ki nongrep, ban die ia ki mar ki mata jongki. Halor kitei ki jingeh, la plie ia ka iew nongrep ha 5mer, ha 7mer, ha Urkaliar, Shiliang Um, Lad Smit, Anjalee. Halor ka jing pynpoi ia ki mar rep, u myntri rangbah, u iathuh ba la aiti ha ki BDO, ha ki Majistor, ba kin peit ha kaba ailad ia ki nongrep, ba kin die ia ki mar ki jongki, hynrei u mynjur ruh ba don ka jingthut, ha kaba kum kato ka por jong ka jing jubor jong ka khlam covid.U myntri rangbah, u iathuh ba ka 1917, ka la iaid kamai haduh 700 sien, ha ki bnai, ba pynlong ia katei ka pakhang shnong ha ka jylla bad la kit mar ia 750 MT ki mar jong ki nongrep bad la iathuh ba mynta, ki don kumba 20 lane 30 tylli ki kali kit mar rep bad ha shwa kane ka rakhe sngi jingioh jylla, yn buh kumba 250 haduh 300 tylli ki kali ban kit mar bad ia kitei ki kali, yn ai sha ki samla, ba kin pyndonkam bad ba kin kit ia kitei ki mar rep. U myntri rangbah, u iathuh shuh shuh ba ha U Jymmang 2021, la lah ban shalan haduh 2,184 MT ia u jhur na ka jylla sha ki jylla ba marjan, kum sha Assam, West Bengal bad shawei.U Sangma, u iathuh ba ka jing pynmih kubi tang ha East Khasi hills, ka long 30 hajar MT bad 13 hajar MT, ka long tang na Mawryngkneng bad 9 MT, na Mylliem Block. La iathuh ruh ba ka iew nongrep, kan sa mih shen ha Samasi, kaba ha Saipung, ha Lawai, kaba ha Mawphlang, East Khasi hills, Mawjrong, ha Laitkroh 12 Shnong, ha Jatah, Mawkynrew, East Khasi hills, ha Jongksha, Mawkynrew, ha Lawmei, Mylliem East Khasi hills, ha Nonglatem, Thadlaskein, ha Nongkhrah, Umling, ha Nonglwai, Nongstoin, ha Pyndenlyngdoh, Mawkyrwat nalor kiwei pat.La iathuh ruh ba la sam ia 220 tylli ki power tiller sha ki nongrep bad la iathuh ruh ba ia mynta, ka thong ka long ban pynshlur ia ki nongrep ban rep shynrai bad ban rep tit, ha kaba la iathuh ba la sdang ban pyntrei kam ia ka Lakadong mishon bad la bei pisa haduh T.8klur na bynta katei ka kam pynmih shynrai bad la iathuh ba ka jing pynmih tit, ka la kiew na ka 27 MT sha ka 200 MT, ha kine ki ar snem, ha kaba la iarap ia ki 300ngut ki nongrep ha ka jylla. La iathuh ruh ba yn ai ram kaba T.50,000 ka bym donkam ban siew sut, ha kine ki bnai ban sa wan.U myntri rangbah, u iathuh ba la pyn trei kam ruh ia ka skhim kaba T.209klur, na bynta ka kam ri sniang, ha kaba la pynbna ha u snem ba ladep. Ha kaba iadei bad ka kam pynmih dud, la iathuh ba la ai jing iarap ia T.10klur, sha ki 260ngut ki nongri masi, kaba dei ka ram, kaba khlem shim sut satia. Halor ka jingtrei kam ka skhim MGNREGS, la iathuh, ba la lah ban ai bylla ia T.14,500 na bynta kawei ka long iing, ha kaba ki don 6lak ngut kiba don kyrteng ia katei kam bylla sngi. La iathuh ruh ba la siew T.24klur ia ki hotel, ba la pyndonkam, ba kin shong kin sah kito kiba trei ia ka koit ka khiah, nangta kiba leit sah kyrpang; na ka daw jong ka jingkhang dam, na ka jingwan lynshop ka khlam covid.
title: Bun ki khun, ki la pep skul noh, ba sniew kamai ki nongrep, ong U Bah Shangpliang; 750 MT, la shalan ia ki mar rep na jylla sha Assam, Bengal, ong U MR

content: Shillong:U bah Charles Pyngrope (Congress), ula kylli jingshai ruh, halor kita ki Fancy number, ha kaba u myntri, u iathuh ba kitei ki dei ki number, kiba la jied, da ki trai kali, kum ka nuksa kaba ula pyni ba ki don kiba kwah ia u number 0001, 0002.Halor kata, U bah Pyngrope, u ong ba haba kumta, ka mut, ba lada u trai kali, u jied ia uno uno u number, kata ka kylla long noh ka fancy number bad halor katei u myntri, ula jubab “Baroh ki number, ki dei satia ki fancy number, hynrei, ki don tang kiba la mynjur da ka Cabinet” bad U bah Pyngrope, ula ong shuh shuh “La ka long ne em kaba lah ban buh ruh ia ka kyrteng jong u briew, ha kitei ki number kali. Kam dei ba nga kren kai, ha ki katto katne ki ri, ki leh ia kata bad na kata phi lah ban khein kham rem bad kham kamai bun ka pisa”.
title: Balei ym buh da ka kyrteng u briew, ha ki fancy number, ong U MLA

content: Shillong:U Ma Sniaw bhalang Dhar, myntri ka tnat ka kit ka bha, u pyntip ha iing dorbar, ba ka khajna, na ki kali kamai, kaba la ioh lum, ha u Lber 2020 haduh U Lber 2021, ha kaba na ka STA ka long T.2,04,04,208.00, DTO Shillong T. 12,59,11, 000.00, DTO Nongpoh T.1,17,32,294.00, DTO Nongstoin T.2,02,20,248.00, DTO Mawkyrwat T.39,23,068.00 DTO Jowai T.4,29,10,378.00, DTO Khliehriat T.3,35,18,326.00, DTO Tura T.3, 37,8, 141.00, DTO William nagar T.6, 89,837.00, DTO Bagh mara T.43,44,829.00 DTO Resubelpara T.34,28,323.00, DTO Ampati T.34,44, 022.00. Total T.32,42,8 1,034.U bah PT Sawkmie (Congress), ula kylli ia u myntri, la ka sorkar, ka ioh khajna ne em, na ki bos saw, ha kaba u myntri, u iathuh ba ki bos saw, la shim, ba ki dei ki bos sorkar bad kumta kim siew khajna satia.U Ma Dhar, u iathuh ruh ba ka sorkar Jylla, ka la mynjur ban ailad ia ki kali, ba kin siew khajna bapher, nangta ia ki laisen niah kali ruh, haduh ka 30tarik U Nailur 2021, wat la ki dei kiba la kut por, na ka daw jong kane ka khlam coid 19, hynrei halor kane ka mat, U bah PT Sawkmie, u iathuh ba katei ka jing map khajna, kam trei kam satia, namar ba ki don ki nongniah taksi na ka Constituency jongu, kiba la hap ban siew khajna.U bah George B Lyngdoh (Congress), ula pynsngew ruh halor ka jingkiew dor ka bai kali, na ka daw ba ka don ka jingkiew dor ka bai petrol bad nangta ba ki nongshong kali, ki hap ban ia shong duna briew bad ula ai nuksa ba ka bai kali na Umiam sha Shillong, ka long T.100 marwei bad kumta, lada ki don ar ngut kiba wan skul na kajuh ka long iing, sha Shillong,ka la lut tang ka bai kali haduh T.200 shi sngi.U Bah HM Shangpliang (Congress), ula leit rah ruh ha ka iing, halor ka jingrem dor ka bai permit, kaba long T.25,000 ha ka shisnem, na kaba long T.2,900 mynshwa.
title: Wat hapdeng ka covid, ioh kamai ka tnat pyniaid kali T.32klur

content: Shillong:U bah HM Shangpliang (Congress), ula kylli myn hynnin ka sngi, ha iing dorbar “Shaei u myntri ka tnat rep” bad halor kane la jubab da U Conrad K Sangma, myntri rangbah, ha kaba u iathuh ba u myntri ka tnat rep, Bah Banteidor Lyngdoh, ula pyntip sha u lamphang dorbar, ba kiba ha iing jongu, ki don kiba ioh pang covid bad kumta ialade, u don ha ka jingshong kyrpang kaba shiphew sngi, kaba kynthup, mynta ka sngi ruh.
title: Kylli U Bah Shangpliang “Shaei u myntri ka tnat rep” jubab U Conrad “U shong kyrpang”

content: Shillong:Hadien ba u Bah Mayralborn Syiem u ba dei u MLA jong ka Nongpoh u la wanrah ia ka mat ha ka sngi ba san jong ka Dorbar Synrai, ha kaba iadei bad ka ishu kaba la wanrah shibun ki kynrum ki kynram kiba la mih ha ki jaka khappud bad ka jylla Assam bad kumjuh ruh ia ki jingjia kiba dang shu dep jia shen ha Ïongkhuli,Umlaper bad ha kiwei kiwei ki jaka.Haba jubab ia ka Special Motion hapoh ka ïing dorbar thawaiñ ka jylla, na ka liang u Myntri Rangbah ka jylla, u Conrad K Sangma u la ong ba ka jingthaw ia ka Committe kaba don san ngut kam mut ba kin don tang kitei ki san ngut hynrei ka Sorkar kan pdiang ruh ia baroh ki jingai jingmut jong baroh kiba don bynta bad ki nongialam shnong.U Conrad K Sangma u la iathuh ruh ba hadien ba u la iakynduh ha ka sien ba ar ia u Myntri Rangbah ka jylla Assam, u Himanta Biswa Sarma, ki la ia mynjur ba ki don kumba 12 tylli ki jaka kiba iakajia hapdeng ka jylla Meghalaya bad ka jylla Assam bad ka jingiakren ruh kan long thik ia kita ki 12 tylli ki jaka bad ka jingiakren nyngkong eh yn sdang shwa na ka bynta ki hynriew tylli ki jaka kiba duna ka jing iakajia.Shuh shuh u Conrad K Sangma u la ong ba ka Sorkar MDA ka la lum la lang lut ia baroh ki kot ki sla ba la pynkhreh da ki Sorkar kiba la ju bat teng ia u lakam synshar ha ka jylla ha ki por kiba la leit khnang ba kitei ki kot ki sla kiba la don lypa kin long ki jingmyntoi hynrei u Conrad u la ong ruh ba kan long kaba eh hi pat ban kam ia ki jaka ki puta tang lyngba ki kot ki sla kiba la don lypa namar ka jylla Assam ruh ka don ia la ki jong ki kot ki sla jong kitei ki jaka bad u la ong ba hangta ka long kaba eh namar ym tip shuh mano ba dei bad mano ba lait. U Conrad K Sangma u la ong ruh ba mynta um kwah ban ong ba ka sorkar Meghalaya Democratic Alliance(MDA) kan lah beit ban pynbeit noh ia u pud u sam bad ka jylla Assam hynrei kan leh katba lah ban wad pat ia ki lad ki lynti ban pyrshang namar kane ka mat ka long kaba jwat haduh katta katta bad ba ka dei ka mat kaba la slem bha. Ha kaba iadei bad ka jingkren jong u Myntri Rangbah ka jylla Assam, u Himanta Biswa Sarma u ba la ong ba ka jylla Meghalaya ka la shu kam ia ki jaka bad na ka liang u Conrad K Sangma u la ong ba um don jingtip ba na ka daw aiu utei u Myntri Rangbah ka jylla Assam u kren kumtei hynrei u Conrad u la ong ba ka daw lehse imat kadei namar ba ki jylla hapoh ka Northeast ki dei kiba la phiah na ka jylla Assam naduh kulong kumah.Ha kaba iadei bad ki kynrum kynram kiba ju iai mih na ka por sha ka por ha ki jaka khappud, u Conrad K Sangma u la ong ba ka Sorkar ka leh katba lah ban pyrshang pynbeit kloi noh naduh ki Block Officer shaduh ka kyrdan jong u Chief Secretary bad na ka liang ka Sorkar Meghalaya haba ki mih kino kino ki jingiakajia ha ki jaka khappud, ka ju leh kloi ban iakren mar mar bad ka Sorkar Assam.Na ka liang u MLA ka Congress, u Bah HM Shangpliang u la buh jingkylli ha kaba iadei bad ka jingthmu jong ka Sorkar Meghalaya bad ka Sorkar Assam ban ai bad shim ia ki jaka markylliang hapdeng kine ki artylli ki jylla bad u Bah HM Shangpliang u la pyrshah ruh ia kane ka jingthmu jong kine ki artylli ki jylla ha kaba u la ong ba ki jaka jong ka jylla Meghalaya kim iahap satia ban leit sha ka Jylla Assam bad baroh ki jaka ba la kam da ka jylla Assam ki dei ban wanphai biang sha ka jylla Meghalaya.U MLA ka Nongpoh, u Bah Mayralborn Syiem u la ong ruh ba ka Sorkar kadei ban phah tohkit bha halor ka jingpynkheiñ ia ka Land Transfer Act namar haduh mynta ki don ki briew kiba la die ia ki jaka ha khappud. Na ka liang u Bah George Lyndoh u la buh jingkylli ruh ia ka Sorkar halor ka jingphah pyrton haduh 4000 ngut jong ka jylla Assam ha ki jaka khappud bad halor ka jingkynnoh jong ka jylla Assam ba kim ju don kano kano ka jingiakajia khappud bad ka jylla Meghalaya hynrei la sdang nyngkong beit da ka jylla Meghalaya ban kam ia ki jaka jong ka Assam bad na ka liang u nongialam jong ka liang pyrshah ruh, u Dr Mukul Sangma u la kren ha katei ka mata ha kaba u la ong ba ki MLA jong ka liang pyrshah ki kyrshan ia ka Sorkar MDA ha kaba iadei bad ka jingiapynbeit ia u pud u sam hapdeng ka jylla Assam bad jylla Meghalaya lada ka Sorkar Meghalaya ka leh ha kata ka rukom kaba dei.Ki MLA jong ka liang pyrshah kiba la iashim bynta ha kaban iatai ia kane ka kat khappud ki kynthup ia u Bah Kimfa S Marbaniang, u Zenith Sangma, u Bah Sosthenes Sohtun, u Bah Process T Sawkmie, ka Kong Ampareen Lyngdoh, u Bah Adelbert Nongrum bad u Rakkam A Sangma.
title: Ym lah kular ka Sorkar Jylla, ban pynbeit kloi ia u pud u sam, ong U MR

content: Jowai: Ka Dorbar shnong Panaliar, Jowai ka la kyntu ia ki paidbah ban nym pyniap ne pynmynsaw ia ki shrieh kiba la wan paw pyrthei hapoh katei ka shnong ha kaba bun kiba la ioh ban ring dur bad shnong dur ia ki.Kane ka jingwan ki shrieh kiba kham phylla hapoh ka shnong ka long ka jingitynnad bad na ka liang ka dorbar shnong lyngba u Secretary Shnong u ma Riqouma Rq Laloo u la kyntu jur ia ki paidbah nongshong shnong ba kin sumar bad iada ia kino kino ki mrad khlaw khlem da pynmynsaw lane siat iap ia ki.
title: Wan paw ki shrieh ha Jowai, kyntu ban iada ia ki

content: Jowai: Ka KSU Namdong Unit bad ka FKJGP Thadlaskein Unit ha ryngkat ka dorbar Shnong Namdong B hynnin ka miet ki la ioh bat ia uwei u bar jylla uba kam ialade ba u dei u Doctor ha kaba u la leit rung sha ki iing briew ban ai dawai bad ban ai inject ruh.Hadien ba la ioh bat ia utei u bar jylla, ka bor shnong bad kitei ki sengbhalang ki la tohkit bad bishar ruh ia ki kot ki sla jong utei uba kam doctor, hynrei ym shym la don satia ia ki kot ki sla kiba biang kiba lah ban pynshisha ba udei u Doctor shisha. Kumta na ka liang ka bor shnong bad ka KSU, FKJP ka la beh krat noh ia utei u bar jylla na katei ka shnong.Kitei ki ar seng ka dawa naka sorkar ban pynthikna iaka jing wanrung wan mih ki mynder sha ka jylla ka jong ngi lyngba ki kot ki sla kiba biang ym ban shu ai lan ban rung katba mon ban wan thok wan shukor ia ki briew balui lui ha kane ka jylla.
title: Ioh bat ka  KSU bad  FKJGP bad dorbar shnong ia u Doctor thok bar jylla

content: Shillong: U Bah Adelbert Nongrum (KHNAM), ula leit rah mynta ka sngi, ia ka jing kylli ha iing dorbar jylla, halor ka jingkiew dor ka doh masi bad u ong ruh ba ka jingkiew dor ka doh, ka dei hadien ba ka Assam, ka la pyntrei kam ia ka ain khang bam doh masi; haba jubab ia katei ka mat, U Bah Sanbor Shullai, myntri ka tnat ri jingri, u kam, ba ka ka don ka jingkiew dor jong ka doh masi ha ka jylla ha kine ki sngi.U bah Sanbor, u iathuh ruh, ba ula thoh shithi sha u myntri rangbah ka Assam, halor ka jing iadei bad katei ka jing duna doh masi, kaba poi sha ka jylla bad ula pyn thikna ruh, ba yn sa pyllait noh shen ia ki permit, na ka bynta ki nong khaii, ba kin ioh ban ia thied masi.Halor ka jing kylli jong U bah Nongrum, ia ki lad jing iarap, na bynta ki nongri jingri, U Bah Sanbor, u ong, ba ki don shibun ki skhim kiba dang iaid shakhmat, ban iarap ia ki nongri masi bad ki don shuh sa shibun kiwei pat ki skhim, kiba dang sahteng bad ka sorkar India, na bynta ban ai jing iarap ia ki nongri jingri ha ka jylla.U Bah HM Shangpliang (Congress), u kylli ruh, la ka sorkar Assam, ka la jubab ne em ia katei ka shithi, kaba ula phah u myntri, ha kaba U bah Shullai, ula ong “Ngi dang ap ia ka jubab, hynrei lada ka Assam, kam jubab, na ka liang ka tnat, ngin sa peit bad pyrkhat, ia kaei kaba dei ban leh”. U bah Shangpliang, ula kren ruh halor ka jing shalan tuh ia ka masi sha Bangladesh, ha kaba ka dor jong ka masi, kaba shongdor T.20 hajar ha Meghalaya, ka shongdor haduh T.1lak ha Bangladesh, ha ka por jong ka jinglehniam id. Halor kane u myntri, u iathuh ba ula iakren bad ki BSF, ki pulit bad ki briew jong ka tnat sorkar, ban khanglad ia kane ka jing khaii tuh.
title: Tuklar U Bah Adel ha iing dorbar, ba kiew dor ka doh masi

content: Shillong:KA SUR KA BRI U HYNÑIEWTREP ha ka janmiet 16 tarik, mynta u bnai, 2021 hapoh ka jingïalam u Chairman Bah Sylvester Kurbah ka la leit ban ïakynduh ïa ki Nongïalam jong ka UDP kiba kynthup ïa u Bah Bindo M. Lanong Chief Adviser, Bah Paul Lyngdoh Working President bad Dr. Jemino Mawthoh uba long u Secretary ka UDP ha ïingsah (quarter) jong u (L) Dr. Donkupar Roy.Ka jingleit kynduh jong ka SUR KA BRI U HYNÑIEWTREP ka long shi bynta ban dawa sa na kitei ki nongïalam ba Rangbah ka UDP ba kin tuklar lem, ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingbym leh eiei ki MLA ka UDP kiba don ha ka sorkar MDA ïa ka shithi jingkyrpad ne Appeal letter kaba ïadei bad ka jingdawa pynsangeh kam shipor ne Suspension ïa ki 3 ngut ki Pulit kiba donkti ha ka jingshah dkhat jubor ka jingim u (L) Cheristerfield Thangkhiew.Katei ka jingdawa Suspension ka long ba kum ka SUR KA BRI U HYNÑIEWTREP ka kwah ban ïohi ba ka Bishar kaba khuid kan don ha ka JUDICIAL ENQUIRY khlem da lah ban mushlia shuh da mano re mano.Ha katei ka jingïakren bad ïa pyrkhat na bynta katei ka mat kitei ki nongïalam ba Rangbah jong ka UDP ki la kular ban shimkhia bad ban ïakren ïa baroh MLA ka UDP kiba don ha kane ka sorkar, ong ka kyrwoh na u Bah M. DkharSecretary, SUR KA BRI U HYNÑIEWTREP.
title: Tuklar lem ïa ka jingbym leh eiei, ki MLA; ong ka Sur U Hynniewtrep ia ka UDP”

content: Shillong: Kiba iohpang covid mynta ka sngi, ki don 229ngut bad kiba jem na ka jingpang, ki don 86ngut. Kiba iap, ki don 3ngut, ha kaba arngut, ki dei ki bym pat dep injek satia.Kiba dang don ha ka jingpang baroh, ki long 1,804ngut bad kiba iap, ki long 1,370ngut baroh.Ka East Khasi hills, ka don 132ngut bad ka West Jaintia hills 53ngut.
title: 229ngut kiba ioh pang bad 3ngut kiba iap covid ha ka jylla

content: Shillong: U Bah Ernest Mawrie, President jong ka seng BJP, ha ka jylla, ula shah jied kum u nongai jingmut ia u myntri rangbah ka jylla, ha ki tnat kiba kynthup ia ka DoNER, Tourism, Animal Husbandry and Veterinary Department, ha kaba u ioh ia ka kyrdan “A” bad katei kan trei kam, naduh ba u shimti ia katei ka kam.Labun tang ki nongaijingmut ki nongkjit Pisa paidbah balei ki officer Kim lah se bn leh ,sorkar bam sap
title: U Bah Ernest Mawrie, u nongai jingmut jong u myntri rangbah

content: Ki ehrang Taliban, ki la ioh kurup ia ka pisa kaba $12.4 million bad sa ka ksiar, na ka iing sah U Amrullah Saleh, uba dei U Vice President barim jong ka Afghanistan. La ioh kurup ia katei ka million, hynnin ka sngi, ong ki lad khubor.U Saleh, ula phet bak na iing la jong bad ym tip satia shaei ba u don mynta bad utei u nongialam, ula dep pynbna naduh kham mynshwa, ba un nym pyndem satia ialade ha ki ehrang Taliban bad ha ka taiew ba ladep, kiba ha iing jong U Saleh, ki kam ba ki Taliban, ki la siat iap ia u hynmen jongu, U Rohullah Azizi.
title: Kurup pisa ki ehrang Taliban, 12 million na iing U Vice President barim ka Ri

content: Shillong: Ka Executive Committee ka All Meghalaya Dancers Association ka pyntip sha baroh ki riew donsap don phong ha ka shad bad ka rwai kan pynlong ia ka Meghalaya Superstar Season-IV 2021.Kumta ka AMDA ka khot ka wer ia ki riewdonsap donphong jong ka jylla baroh kawei ban wan shim bynta ha kane ka rynsan lyngba ka sien kaba nyngkong kan pynlong shwa ia ka Online Audition ha ki No. WhatsApp 7641920853/8794541523/9774927286 bad ia ki jingtip ba kham bniah shaphang kane ka rynsan phi lah ban phone ha kitei ki number bad ia ka Semi-Final ngin pynlong hapoh hall ha u bnai October, 2021 bad yn sa pynlait ruh ha ka Youtube Channel bad Local Channel bad ia ka Grand Final yn pynlong ha u bnai December, 2021.Hadien ba ka AMDA ka la dep ban pynlong ha ki snem ba la dep naduh ka Season-I, Season-II, Season-III, dei lyngba kane ka rynsan la iohlad pat ban plie lynti ia ki riewdonsap rwai bad shad sha ki rynsan bapher bapher ha ka National Level. Ha kane ka kynti jong ka Meghalaya Superstar Season-IV ka AMDA ka la bhah noh la ka jong ia ki nongshad bad ki nongrwai ban ioh ia ka khusnam la ka jong.Ha kaba iadei bad u nongshad uba lah duh un ioh ka song tyngka Rs. 50,000/- uba ar Rs. 30,000/- uba lai Rs. 25,000/- ryngkat ki Consolation Prize, bad ia ki nongrwai uba lah duh un ioh ka song tyngka Rs. 50,000/- uba ar Rs. 30,000/- uba lai Rs. 25,000/- ryngkat ki Consolation Prize, bad ki Top Finalist ka AMDA kan sa jied ia kba tbit ban phah shim bynta ha ka National level TV Show.
title: Yn pynlong ka AMDA, ia ka Meghalaya Superstar Season-IV 2021

content: Shillong:U Bah Adelbert Nongrum (KHNAM), ula wan rah mynta ka sngi, ia ka mat halor ka jingthung kam thung jam ha ka ophis jong ka Deputy Commissioner, East Khasi hills, kaba la pynbna paidbah, ha ka 1tarik Nailur 2021 bad ha katei ka jing pynbna, la bthah ia kito kiba kwah ban applai ia katei ka kam, ba ki dei ban tynsat lang ruh ia ka syrnot, kaba pyni, ba ki la dep shah injek iada corona.“Katei ka mut, ba kito ki bym pat dep injek, kim lah satia ban tyrwa ialade, ia katei ka kam haneng. Kane ka dei ka jing kyndit kaba khraw, namar ba ka dei ka jingleh shi liang khmat, hapdeng kito kiba la dep injek bad kito ki bym pat dep injek satia” ong U bah Adelbert.“Kane ka jingleh jong ka Deputy Commissioner, ka pyni shai, ba ka don ka jing pynbor, na ka bynta ban shah injek iada corona” ong shuh U bah Nongrum.Haba jubab halor katei ka mat, U Conrad K Sangma, myntri rangbah ka jylla, u pynshai, ba ka kyndon, kaba la thoh halor katei ka jing tyrwa kam, ka dei ba la buh da ka kyntien “requested” lane kyrpad, ba kin suh lang ia ka syrnot ba ki la dep ia ka injekshon covid 19. U myntri rangbah, ula ong shuh shuh, ba katei ka jing pynbna, kam shym la buh satia ia ka kyntien “required” lane ba ki dei ban leh, hynrei, la buh ia ka kyntien kyrpad.U Sangma, ula pynshai shuh shuh, ba ki don mynta 418ngut kiba la dep applai ia katei ka kam bad shiteng na kitei, kim don satia ia ka syrnot, ba ki la dep injek iada covid bad ia ki aplikeshon jongki, la pdiang da ka ophis.
title: Ther U bah Adelbert ha dorbar, ba khot kam ha DC ophis, lem bad ka syrnot ba la dep injek covid

content: Nongpoh:Ki la don bun ngut ki kmie ki kpa jong ki khynnah skul, kiba phah leit shul ia ki khun ha skul bapher bapher ha ki thain Byrnihat, ki la ujor sha ka FKJGP Byrnihat, halor ka jingdon ki katto katne ngut ki nongniah Auto Rickshaw, kiba ju mlien ban shim tam ka dor na ki khynnah skul, kumta haba shimkhia ia katei ka jingujor na ki kmie ki kpa, ki nongialam ka FKJGP, ki la khot ban pynlong da ka jingialang hapdeng ki nongniah Auto Richshaw kiba kamai ha ki thain Byrnnihat lem bad ki kmie ki kpa jong ki khynnah, na ka bynta ban weng noh ia katei ka jingeh ki khynnah skul, kiba la shah shim tam ka dor bai kali ha ki nongniah Auto.Ha ka jingiakren hapdeng kitei ki nongniah Auto bad ia ki kmie ki kpa, ka la poi sha ka jingia sngewthuh jingmut bad haba iadei halor katei ka jingshim tam dor ka bai kali na ki khynnah skul, la ong ba la leh da kito ki nongniah Auto ki bym don hapoh ka Association, la ka long ia kito ki Auto Rickshaw kiba kamai na Byrnihat sha Narbong bad kumjuh ruh ia kito kiba kamai na Byrnihat sha Umling.Kitei ki nongialam ka FKJGP Byrnihat Circle, kiba kynthup ia u Henry Nongrum, President, u Bah Noah Khongstid, General Secretary, u Bah Kitbor Suting bad u Bah Devos Chyne, haba ki la sngewthuh ba ia katei ka kam shim tam dor ka bai kali na ki khynnah skul, la dei da ki katto katne ki nongniah Auto, na ka liang ki nongialam ka FKJGP, ki la buh ia ka jingmaham kaba tyngeh bad kata ka long ba ki la kyntu ia ki nongniah Auto ba kim dei ban shim palat ka dor na ki khynnah skul bad nangne shakhmat lada ka seng kan lap ia kiba shim kabu na ki khynnah skul, ka seng kan sa leh da kaba tyngeh ne wat ban ujor sha ki bor ka Ain, khnang ba kin ioh ban leh ia kaba donkam baroh.
title: Maham ka FKJGP ban leh tyngeh ia ki nongniah Auto, ba shim tam dor palat ia ki khynnah skul ha ki thain Byrnihat

content: Ki dang shu ia thaw sorkar, dang khyndiat sngi mynshwa, hynrei, mynta ka la mih ka jing ia kynad kaba jur bha hapdeng ki heh Taliban bad ka daw ka long ba ki ia knieh doh kyndang, ha ka jingthaw ia ka sorkar thymmai ha katei ka Ri, ong ka khubor jong ka BBC. La iathuh ba ka jing ia mai, ka long kaba la shyrkhei bha hapdeng u nongseng jong ka seng Taliban, U  Mullah Abdul Ghani Baradar bad u myntri cabinet jong ka sorkar Afghanistan, ha kaba ka jing ia mai, ka la long kaba jur bha, ha ka iing sah jong U President ka Afghanistan.U Baradar, uwei na ki nongseng jong ka seng Taliban, ula jah rngai, ha ki khyndiat sngi ba ladep bad la iathuh da ki lad pathai khubor ia ka BBC, ba U Baradar ula ia mai tyngeh bad U  Khalil ur-Rahman Haqqani, uba dei u myntri ba peit ia ki poiwir jong ka sorkar Afghanistan bad uba dei ruh u nongialam ka kynhun ehrang  Haqqani bad ka jing ia mai jong kitei ki heh ha ka iing sah U President, ka la pynmih ruh ia ka jing ia khluit sa ki nongbud jongki, kiba don ha bar jong ka iing U President. U Baradar, ula phet noh mynta na Kabul bad u leit shong leit sah sha Kandahar, ong shuh ka khubor.Kam dei tang ka jing iaknieh doh kyndang, hynrei la mih ruh ka jingiakren, halor ka nongrim jong ka jingjop bad ka jing synshar ia katei ka Ri, ha kaba U Baradar, u kam ba ka dei ka jing iadei bad ka nongrim jong ka jingiakren, kaba la ialam ia ki, sha ka jingthaw sorkar ha Afghanistan, katba U Haqqani, u kam ba ka jingioh thaw sorkar, ka dei beit, da ka bor jong ki kam ialeh thma bad ki kam ia pyniap briew.Katei ka jing ia kynad jong ki heh Taliban, ka la pynlong ruh, ba kin mih ki khubor hamsaia, kiba kam ba U Baradar, ula iap noh. Mynta ka don ka jing iai ap, sa ia ka khubor na u heh duh ki Taliban,  Hibatullah Akhundzada, u bym ju pynpaw pyrthei satia ialade bad uba peit ia ka kam sain hima, ia ka kam shipai bad ka kam niam jong ka seng Taliban.
title: Mar ia thaw sorkar, ia kynad ki heh Taliban, na ka jing ia knieh doh kyndang
Kiba iap na ka jingpang covid ha ka jylla

content: Shillong: Hadien ka jingshah khang lynti noh jong ki dkhot ka seng Hynniewtrep Integrated Territorial Organisation(HITO) ha ki pulit bad ha ki bor distrik ha ka por ba ki thmu ban leit sngap ia ka jingiatai jong ka Dorbar Synrai hapoh ka ïingdorbar thawaiñ ka jylla ha ka step jong ka 15 tarik u bnai Nailur 2021, wat la ki la ioh ia ki pass jong ki ban leit rung hapoh ka ïing dorbar thawaiñ ka jylla bad katkum ka jingioh jingtip na ki pulit, ki la iathuh ba ka daw ba ki la beh bad khanglad noh ia ki dkhot jong katei ka seng ka long hadien ba ki la ioh ka jingbthah na u Lamphang ka ïingdorbar thawaiñ ka jylla lyngba ka Deputy Commissioner ban nym ailad ia kitei ki dkhot ba kin rung hapoh ka ïing dorbar.Ha kaba iadei bad kane, na ka liang u Lamphang ka ïing dorbar thawaiñ ka jylla, u Bah Metbah Lyngdoh u la kyntait ia katei ka jingkynnoh ba u la ai hukum ban nym shah ia ki dkhot jong ka seng HITO ban leit sngap ia ka Dorbar Synrai bad u la ong ba um don jingtip satia ba na ka daw aiu kim ioh ban wan shapoh ka ïingdorbar thawaiñ.U Bah Metbah Lyngdoh u la ong ruh ba na ka liang jong u bad ka ophis ki dei ban peit beit tang ia ki kam ki jam hapoh ka ïing dorbar thawaiñ ba ki dei ban long kiba iaid beit iaid ryntih bad ia kata ka jingbym shah rung ia ki dkhot jong ka seng HITO, ka tnad pulit bad ki bor distrik ki dei ban peit ia kata ym ban peit ma u.
title: Kyntait u lamphang dorbar, ba ai hukum ban nym shah rung ia ka seng HITO, hapoh ka iingdorbar thawaiñ

content: Shillong: Hadien ka jingiather kuli hapdeng uwei u suba lehnoh bad ki pulit kaba la jia ha ka sngi ba ar kata ka 14 tarik u bnai Nailur 2021 hajan ka Sherwood School kaba don hajan Tura bad ha katei ka jingiather kuli bad ki pulit utei u suba lehnoh u la kyllon iap noh ha katei ka jaka.Haba kren sha ki lad pathai khubor ha ka 15 tarik u bnai Nailur 2021, u Myntri Rangbah ka jylla u Conrad K Sangma u la ong hadien ba la ioh jingtip na ka tnad syntiat ia ka iaid ka ieng ki dkhot jong ki seng lehnoh, kumta na ka liang ka Sorkar ka la pynkhlaiñ ia ki bor pahara bad ka jingtalasi ha baroh ki distrik jong ka jylla. U Conrad K Sangma u la ong ruh ba um kwah ban kynnoh ba ki dei na ki seng lehnoh aiu khlem da ioh ia ka jingtip kaba bniah.Ha ka 15 tarik u bnai Nailur 2021, u Dr Mukul Sangma u ba dei u nongialam jong ka liang pyrshah hapoh ka ïingdorbar thawaiñ, u la ong ba ki la don ki dkhot jong ka seng NDFB kiba la iaid la ieng ha ki thaiñ jong ka Garo Hills bad ha West Khasi Hills ha ryngkat bad kiwei ki samla kiba iaid lang bad ki.Ha kaba iadei bad ka jingkynnoh ka liang pyrshah ba ka Sorkar MDA kam shim khia bad kam shim lah leh eiei satia halor kane, na ka liang u Conrad K Sangma u la ong ba ka Sorkar hi ka khlem kheiñ sting halor kane hynrei ka Sorkar ryngkat bad ka tnad pulit ki la peit bniah bha halor kane bad haba ki ioh jingtip eiei la ka long na ka liang pyrshah ne na ki paidbah, ka dei ka kamram jong ka Sorkar ban leh eiei kumba ka ju leh beit man ka por.
title: Pynjur ka Sorkar Jylla, ia ka jingpahara; hadien ba la ioh jingtip ia ka jingiaid,  ki lehnoh ha ka jylla

content: Shillong:Ka ophis Executive Engineer (PHE), GSWS Division No-II, Mawphlang ka la ïathuh sha ki paidbah ba hadien ba la siang thymmai ïa pipe um 1000 mm dia Gravity Main Line kaba la sdang naduh ka 2 tarik mynta u bnai haduh mynta, ka jinglong jingman jong ka um ka dang long kaba jaboh ne jngut kaba la donkam ban pynphai kylla ïa ka jingsam um napoh ka jaka sam 750 mm dia Gravity Main Line kaba don mynta.La ong ba ha ka por ba la pynlait ïa ka um ha janmiet ka 13 tarik mynta u bnai, 2021 lyngba ka 750 mm dia main line, ka la don ka jingbthei ki pipe hapoh Shnong Pomlum Village, Upper Shillong.Namar kata, na ka daw ka jingbthei kitei ki 750 mm dia pipeline, kan ym don satia ka jingsam um haduh ka janmiet jong ka sngi Palei ka 16 tarik mynta u bnai, 2021.Ki jaka ban shah ktah ha katei ka por kin long ki Shnong ba hab hapoh ki thaiñ Shillong Municipal Board, Shillong Cantonment Board , Nongthymmai bad Mawlai.La ong ba na ka liang ka ophis ka dang pyrshang katba lah ban pyndep kloi ïa ka jingmaramot pynbha khnang ban ïoh sam um biang kumba ju long ha ka janmiet jong ka 16 tarik.
title: Yn ym mih um haduh janmiet 16 tarik, ong ka PHE

content: Nongpoh: Ki nongtrei ka koit ka khiah ha Ri Bhoi bad kiba don hapoh ka shatri Ri Bhoi Progressive Health Workers Union RBPHWU, hynne ka sngi ki la pynlong ia ka jingiakhih da kaba shong kyllain myngor, shah thngan bad rah lama iong ha phyllaw ka Civil Hospital Nongpoh, kata ka la jia hadien ba ka sorkar kam shym la pynshah skhor ia ki mat jingdawa jong ki, kaba ki la dawa la kham slem.Ka mat jingdawa kaba hakhmat eh jong kitei ki nongtrei Casual Worker ha ka tnat ka koit ka khiah, ka long ba ka sorkar ka la dei ban thungkam pura noh (Regularization) ha ka kam kaba ki trei ha ki tnat bapher bapher jong ka koit ka khiah.Kitei ki nongtrei Casual ka tnat ka koit ka khiah ha Ri Bhoi, kiba la mih ban iakhih na ka bynta ban dawa ia ka hok, ka long ba ki la dawa na ka sorkar jylla ba ka dei ban pyntreikam noh ia ka Meghalaya Regular Casual Workers Schemes (MRCW) 1996, ka ain kaba la kdew ba kino kino ki nongtrei Casual kiba la neh palat ia ka 10 snem, ki la don ia ka hok ba kin shah thungkam pura noh, ym ban khein shuh ia ki kum kita ki nongtrei bylla sngi ne ki Casual workers.Ki la don napdeng kitei ki nongtrei Casual, kiba la pynpaw ba kim banse ban mih madam na ka bynta ban pyrshah sorkar, namar ka sorkar ka la khein dew thala ia ki jingdawa jong ki, ha kaba ka sorkar ym tang ba ka khein dew thala, hynrei ka la lehbein ruh ia ki nongtrei Casual jong ka koit ka khiah, kata nalor ba ki ioh ia ka jingsiew kaba rit bad ka jingsiew ka bym thikna.Kitei ki nongtrei Casual ha Ri Bhoi, ki la kyntu ruh ia ki nongmihkhmat kiba dei na Ri Bhoi, ba ki kren lem ne ban pynsngew sha ka sorkat jylla halor katei ka mat jingdawa jong ki, namar kum ki nongtrei Casual ha ka tnat ka koit ka khiah, ki la kynduh shibun ki jingeh bad khamtam eh ha kaba kum kane ka por ha ka jingshah ktah ha ka khlam COVID-19.
title: Da kaba shang thngan bad rah lama iong, iakhih ki nongtrei Casual ban dawa thungkam pura

content: Shillong: Kiba ioh pang covid mynta ka sngi, ki don 243ngut bad kiba jem na ka jingpang, ki long 262 ngut, ha kaba kiba iap, ki long 6ngut bad ki bym pat dep injek ialade, ki don 5ngut.Kiba don ia katei ka jingpang, haduh mynta, ki don baroh 1,664ngut bad kiba iap, ki la poi sha ka 1,367ngut.Ka East Khasi hills, ka kiew bha mynta ka sngi, da ka jingdon 109 ngut kiba ioh pang bad ka West Khasi hills, da 75ngut.
title: Kiew kiba ioh pang covid ha East Khasi hills, iap 6ngut

content: Shillong: Ki pulit jong ka Tura, ki la siat iap ia uwei u suba kaikhlaw, uba siat shwa ia ki, da ka suloi AK 47 bad katei ka jingjia, ka dei hynnin ka janmiet, ha Sherwood School ha Tura, ha ka dong Daldagre.Ki pulit jong ka Tura, ki la leit sha katei ka jaka, hadien ba ki la ioh khubor, ba ki don ki briew kiba iaid sha katei ka jaka bad kiba kieng atiar bad mar kumta, ki pulit  SF-10, ki la leit sha katei ka jaka, ban khanglad ba kin rung sha ka nongbah Tura; hynrei ha ka por 7:30 janmiet, ki la iohi, ia uwei uba shong thuk thuk, uba wan na  Praharinagar sha Daldagre, kaba don hajan ka skul  Sherwood.Utei u suba ehrang, haba u iohi, ba ki pulit ki la ap thap ia u, kumta, ula hiar na ka thuk thuk jongu bad phet bak ialade bad ula sei da ka suloi na ka pla jongu bad siat sha ka jaka ba ki don ki pulit kumba hynriew, hynniew sien bad haba ki pulit, ki la pynphai kylla, utei u suba ehrang, ula kyllon iap ha katei hi ka jaka.Ym pat tip satia ia ka jingjia kaba bniah, hynrei, la antad, ba u dei u samla, uba kumba 20 snem tam eiei.Na katei ka jaka la ioh kurup ruh ia kawei ka suloi AK-56, kawei ka AK Rifle, 19tylli ki kuli 7.62 mm, kawei ka rong iong Bajaj Platina bike, kaba khlem number lem bad kawei ka helmet, 5 tylli ki sop kuli 7.62 mm bad sa 21 tylli ki jingsop ba thylli jong ki kuli 9 mm.
title: Shah siat iap u suba lehnoh, ha ki pulit ha Tura
